review_text:
Finally went to Liberty London, and what an amazing store it is. Once you enter the department store, executed in Tudor Revival architecture, you cross the threshold to another world --- one filled with rich sumptuous colours, eclectic interiors of dark oak and teak timbers, 100yo floors recycled from the 19thC Royal Navy ship HMS Impregnable, and flamboyant and theatrical display of goods!

I spent my first visit just walking slowly (and probably blocking shoppers), admiring everything from the way the Christmas ship centrepiece hung from the ceiling, to the way textiles are draped on mannequins, the tableware display, etc.

I'll have to come back another day to actually buy something!

Really nice shopping day at Liberty. Their Christmas 🎄 decorations are always wonderful. The ship in the centre of the main hall is just fantastic. Bought perfume from the ground floor, the staff was extremely friendly and helpful. You could easily spend hours looking at all the Christmas decorations on the top floor. We will be back again soon for more inspirations.

Liberty is the destination of dreams for anyone who sews, stitches, entertains, or wears cloths. Very fun to browse all the lovely patterned goods for sale. Check out The Haberdashery first if you're buying fabric - the quilting cotton is significantly less expensive than the lawn for some clothing and many craft projects. Lots of creative projects to inspire. Beautifully decorated at Christmas, but lots of people enjoying toye visit with you. Lovely visit and even lovelier staff.

Beautiful store with an amazing range for all ages. Amazing history and some pieces at great prices! Personally, I loved the collections of chocolates and sweets available in the food gallery, theres so many ways to prepare chocolate!

Such a cool building both inside and out. Really we came because the Cruella movie put us onto this, and were couldn't believe that such a neat looking place actually existed in real life. It's surprisingly extensive, being cozy and open at the same time. Wonderful selection and friendly helpful staff. Items are not going to be inexpensive, and there are some eye popping prices, but there are also many unique and reasonable finds. Free embossing on some items too!

I’ve been a paying model client at Daniel Galvin for years, but my recent experience showed a worrying lack of professionalism and accountability.

Twice I arrived for confirmed colour appointments only to be told on arrival that my stylist wasn’t available. No one contacted me beforehand either time, despite my specifically requesting this after the first incident.

When I tried to resolve it, I was passed between staff, promised call-backs that never happened, and had to chase four times before the owner’s son finally spoke with me. The explanations I received were contradictory, including being told I’d spoken to someone on the morning of my appointment when I hadn’t.

Instead of taking responsibility, management offered no real solution. Despite both missed appointments being due to their own internal miscommunication, I was told the next model slot would be in January (this was November) or that I could pay full price to fix their mistake. It felt unfair and unprofessional.

I understand that premium clients get priority, but how a salon treats every client  - reveals its values. In this case, follow-through, honesty, and care were all missing.

A salon can’t claim to offer a premium experience when basic communication repeatedly fails. Based on this, I would avoid.

I recently had my hair coloured by Rosie and I couldn’t be happier with the results! I hadn’t coloured my hair in a while and was a bit nervous about how it would take to the colour, but Rosie was absolutely incredible. She made me feel completely at ease and the finished look exceeded my expectations. I’m so pleased and already looking forward to my next visit!

I love coming here. Sienna is fantastic with my long hair, and can always give it that natural full bodied bounce we all love.

To top it off, the service is wonderful; everything you need for an upscale, luxe haircut experience: coat check; cocktails; full breakfast and lunch menu; etc.

Daniel Galvin Salon is the best! Lani always does an amazing job with my color, and Alan nails the cut and style every time. I’ve been coming here for years and wouldn’t let anyone else touch my hair.

Really pleased with my visit to Daniel Gavin (George Street salon) last week! I was a bit nervous about getting highlights done somewhere new, but Hannah was fantastic - took the time to understand exactly what I wanted and the colour came out perfectly. Not too bold, just really natural-looking highlights that brighten up my hair.

Joleen did my blow dry afterwards and honestly, my hair has never looked better! She really knew what she was doing and it looked amazing all evening.

The salon is lovely - quite busy but in a good way, you can see it's popular. Staff were friendly and I felt looked after throughout.
Definitely going back for my next colour. Would recommend if you're looking for a good colourist in the area.

Thanks Hannah and Joleen!

This Boots is on the main street which is handy, but the inside is a different story. Everything feels cramped and cluttered, making it really difficult to find what you need. The aisles are narrow and products aren't well organised. I couldn't find any staff when I needed help either. To top it off, click and collect told me to go to the basement but it's actually on the second floor. Great location, but frustrating shopping experience overall.

You can’t go wrong with Boots. The chemists here are always helpful and knowledgeable. The American drug stores like CVS which is abysmal could take customer relations lessons from BOOTS. For Americans who are suffering from a toothache menstrual cramps etc Boots has paracetamol with codeine without prescription. The chemist shares the contraindications but if you are in a pickle this medicine will help.
It was a great shopping experience! The store is large and worth visiting, and the service is excellent.

I visited the Boots Opticians at 361 Oxford Street, London today to have my glasses repaired, and I was assisted by Irute. She provided outstanding service with a perfect balance of professionalism, skill, and genuine kindness. Irute handled the repair efficiently and with great care, making the entire experience smooth and reassuring. I left feeling very satisfied and grateful for her help. I truly had a great experience and cannot thank her enough. Highly recommended!

Located near Bond Street station. Busy store with lots of tourist, 3 floors with branded makeup counters on ground floor with no customer payment area. Upstairs for healthcare area pharmacy and opticians. Basement for beauty sections. Seems to be well stocked at all times. Self check out counter with no queues.

I’ve been going to Marisa for the past 4 years, and I honestly don’t trust anyone else with my hair! Every time I leave her chair, I feel like a brand new person. She always gives me the most beautiful balayage with perfectly blended, natural looking highlights and soft, bouncy waves.

Her attention to detail is unmatched, she always listens to what I want and knows exactly how to make my hair look its absolute best. She’s professional, amazing, and so talented. I get compliments on my hair all the time thanks to her work. I couldn’t recommend her enough!! ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️

I went to Joseph Salon today and as always, Marisa did my hair. She’s been my hairstylist for a while now and I trust her completely. She gave me the most beautiful blonde color, exactly how I wanted it. Every time I go to her, she understands what I’m looking for and makes it happen. Her hands truly work magic. The entire team at the salon is amazing, so kind and welcoming. The energy there is always so positive and uplifting. I really recommend Joseph Salon to anyone who wants to feel confident and leave with hair and nails they love.

Honestly, the best salon I’ve ever been to! I couldn’t recommend them more. I came in having a bit of a hair crisis, and Marisa completely transformed my hair. Nivhh did an amazing job on my extensions—they look flawless! The whole team is so lovely, and I felt completely comfortable from start to finish.

I’ve been coming to this salon for a while now, and every visit is consistently amazing. Marisa Stefanes is an incredible colourist—she truly pays close attention to every detail and always gets my colour just right!
it's a complete game changer!
Neev takes such great care of my extensions; she’s gentle, meticulous, and always makes sure they look and feel perfect. And Joseph? His blow dries are outstanding.
They not only look flawless but somehow last for days! The whole team is professional, talented, and genuinely care about their clients. Highly recommend.

I had the best experience at Salon Joseph with Marisa! I came in with a total disaster of a hair color from another salon and had to get it fixed urgently. I needed it to be perfect and back to normal, which I know was not an easy task—but Marisa did it so seamlessly and perfectly without damaging my hair one bit. She truly worked magic! On top of that, she was the loveliest and sweetest person. If you’re looking for an expert colorist, I highly recommend Marisa and this salon.

They almost send me hospital
Why They sell antihistamines behind the counter? . I am asthmatic and started to have an allergic episode randomly so I walked in there to get loratadine but they deny me one because I am pregnant putting at risk my life and my baby’s life. They asked me for prescription when those medicines do not need prescription.
Luckily Sainsbury next door sells them normally and I was able to get them and be safe.
Shreeti in the opticians is wonderful, gave me lots of help choosing glasses and went above and beyond with her service. Thank you very much for your kindness :)
I hope the staff will treat foreign customers with the same politeness as local customers. The customer service needs to be improved.

I think this is the pharmacy we visited before getting on Tottenham Court Road station. We walked in not knowing what a smint was and now we know what a smint is. Anyway self-checkout was easy, thanks

I popped into this branch to purchase a chilly’s bottle today and Abdullah was so welcoming and helpful.
He made multiple trips in the store to help me find the correct bottle.
Other members of staff were also helpful in helping me find the correct item.
Very lovely people and great service!
Dropped by to use the Recycle at Boots scheme,the box is located near the entrance. Easily done - dropped off my recyclables and redeemed the voucher at time of check-out! Super easy 🙂
I got my flu shot here and it is very recommended. The staff is friendly and very helpful.

Horrible experience shopping here. I’m a long time customer of Boots and was in the area for work and popped in to pick up a few essentials for my trip.

Followed around by a creepy security guard - shame he didn’t pay enough attention to see me queue and pay for my items…
Luckily I opted for a receipt for the transaction as this security guard accosted me as I went to leave the store, demanding to know if I was going to pay for my items. Upon showing him my receipt he just turned away. No apology. When I asked him to inspect my receipt and acknowledge his mistake, he touched my arm without my consent.

This was a significantly unpleasant experience that made me feel very unsafe and not at all like a valued customer

Brunswick Boots Pharmacy...Wowww....

I recommend everyone to visit here...

The whole team working here is amazing....

A big thank you to the pharmacist Riddni (I'm sure she's the team leader) who surprises me every time I visit here with her smile, professionalism, advice and always a good mood.

Once again, a big thank you to Riddni for the good emotions, advice and beautiful smile...

I will definitely visit here again....

Got my flu jab from here for the first time and they were super courteous and understanding (I was very late due to cancelled trains). The pharmacist (Ms Mistry) was fantastic. Very friendly staff. Highly recommended.

I had my consultation with Sharen Cheema and I’m genuinely very impressed with her professionalism and honesty. She took the time to carefully assess my skin, explained everything clearly, and most importantly did not push me into any treatment that wasn’t suitable for my situation.

As my wedding is very close, Sharen honestly advised that certain treatments could increase the risk of pigmentation and recommended not proceeding right now, which I really appreciated. That level of honesty shows real care for the client, not just selling treatments.

She was calm, knowledgeable, reassuring, and answered all my questions properly. I felt listened to and confident in her advice. I will definitely return for treatment later when the timing is right.

Highly recommend Sharen Cheema for anyone looking for trustworthy, professional skin advice.

I had a great experience at the London Wall clinic. It is right next to Moorgate which is great to get to if you work in the city. I was seen by Faha who is always warm, attentive and diligent when carrying out all my treatments.
Excellent service from London Wall Clinic. Faha is very caring and listening to the client expectations. Will come back and would recommend. Thank you!
Had a lovely experience with Faha, she was super kind and mindful of my pain tolerance the whole session, and very knowledgeable. Definitely recommend the clinic and Faha 💗

The bad things are that the clinic located in Ealing does not have the necessary laser for tattoo. I had to go to the center of London every time, but it was worth it, the guys treat each client very well and responsibly, the tattoo is almost invisible, almost everything was gone in 6 sessions.

Pictures look the way better than place actually is. Everything is very tired. Not pleasant showers. Jacuzzi was not hot and didn't work properly. Pool is tiny, so you can't really swim there much. Sauna not very hot. Three stars only because staff is super super nice. Very lovely ladies are working there. But that s not enough for me to come back to the place again :)

Sadly, my experience is the same as many that have reviewed this place. I was brought a spa experience by a friend for Christmas. Trying to book this was a nightmare. Emails took over a week to respond to and with no way of calling and actually speaking to someone. Initially they tried telling me my voucher was out of date...(it wasn't). Once they admitted it was in date (3 weeks in to the process) they proceeded to tell me there were no packages left and I'd have to upgrade to a 'bonus' package. The email exchange was dismissive and at times rude. After agreeing to pay a £19.50 'admin' fee to upgrade I demanded confirmation in writing as something was not sitting right with me. Again, a week on I got confirmation that the fee was per person, which I had not agreed to. I requested they honoured the voucher that had been purchased but all I got back was a short.....I'm sorry, we cannot help you.
I have contacted the voucher company and they have refunded the value. They also informed me that they were no longer allowing this spa to advertise as there had been so many complaints.

If you're really fussy (the type of person who spends most of their holidays taking photos of their hotel room, to post on trip advisor once they get back) you're probably not going to like it. It's not exactly a luxurious/high end spa, and it could do with a bit of a renovation.

But if you're more down-to-earth, and just want a decent city centre pool/hot tub/sauna/steam room, you'll really like it. It's convenient, and has everything you need.

This place is terrible! Please please please if you’ve booked it via wowcher, exchange your deal to something else! It’s really not worth it and they lie. I bought my deal In September, and was refused to be given a booking. My deal was ending in February, and the lady (Rita) kept giving me weekdays which I couldn’t attend due to work. I tried to make early bookings in September for December and she still wouldn’t give me any although they were available. After a lengthy email, I was given the booking. When I got there, I was told I had to pay £30 for a facial which I wasn’t made aware of. I was told that if I didn’t pay for it, I wouldn’t receive any treatments. So me and my friend paid in the end. It was like we were literally bullied into it. Then we were asked to go into separate rooms to receive the massage. My friend had a terrible experience! Rather than making her feel relaxed and putting relaxing music on, the lady put on loud music about Jesus on with YouTube adverts in between. It’s quite sad we had to experience such a thing.

Poor customer service! 0 ratings. I booked a spa and treatment standard deal for 2 via wowcher more than a week before my birthday which the appointment was confirmed by both the booking admin staff at the spa and myself. 2 days before my birthday the woman at the spa who had booked me in cancelled my booking via email because they had "reached their capacity". When I replied saying why was my booking cancelled if my appointment slot was booked and reserved over a week ago, she rudely replied just saying "It's busy". No apology or valid explanation. This was a poor reason to cancel my booking last minute and both the woman who booked me in at was Angelsz and the manager who I spoke to just seemed unapologetic and did not seem to care that they had ruined my birthday plans. I suspect they probably gave my slot to another customer instead who booked after me. Who knows. I'm still waiting for my refund.

I had a great experience at the Boots on Long Acre! The store is clean, well-organized, and fully stocked with a wide range of health, beauty, and pharmacy products. The staff were very helpful and friendly — especially at the pharmacy counter, where they offered quick and professional service. Convenient location just a short walk from Covent Garden, perfect for both locals and visitors. Highly recommended!

Brilliant range of makeup and beauty products on the ground floor.

I popped in to get essentials on the 1st floor, which was quick, easy without a queue so I had 10 minutes to spare.

On my way out I had a little look. It was lovely browsing and the layout is great. Lots of testers and staff to help too.

It's a sign when I want to video it, as I like a place and think it's worth sharing. Hence the videos.

Also liked that the perfume testers weren't empty, as is the case in some Boots. :p

Hira was so helpful when I came 30 minutes before closing to repurchase my go to Dior concealer, that I ended up getting the foundation stick as well. ALL Boots staff that help sell an item should be getting commission, not only a few. She needs a bonus asap! 🙌🏼

Big store just outside tube station with beauty makeup and skincare at the bottle floor, also designer makeup brands, however the brand staff wasn’t present during weekday visit and boots staff is not familiar with them. Great upstairs pharmacy section and healthcare and more skincare. Store kept tidy and clean

Thanks Tania (the much helpful lady from Dior section) for helping me to get all these 61 Dior Addict for me. This is My one of the favourite 😍 one . And after hunting in almost every big names of oxford street and bond street, this covent garden store gave me my favourite shade of Dior Addict range.  Once again really appreciate you Tania for your kind gesture and cordial effort to find the shade for me.

I had a fantastic experience at the Boots store in Liverpool Street Station today. SANA went above and beyond to help me find exactly the right products. She was incredibly attentive, patient, and genuinely consultative in her approach, which made a big difference.

It is rare to receive this level of personal care in a busy station store, and I would like to express my heartfelt thanks to her for the outstanding service. I will definitely be coming back.

I have received best customer service ever today from Tahsina in Lizearl section. I usually buy body balm but today not only she was very friendly but informative and very helpful guided me through face creams and body wash that might be good for me. Thank you so much Tahsina. I apologise if I misspell ur name.

Worst customer service ever. I went to Boots and noticed that the prices of certain products, like the Ceramic Ve 454g cream, were misleading. The actual price in most London stores is around £17.50, but Boots had increased it to £19.50 and then added a “discount” to make it look like a good deal. This feels dishonest and misleading to customers.
When I raised the issue with the manager, she was extremely unprofessional, rude, and lacked basic customer service knowledge. It’s disappointing that Boots hires staff who are clearly untrained and uneducated in handling customer concerns. A manager should know how to communicate respectfully, especially when a customer is raising a valid point.
I’ve attached a photo for reference so others can compare the prices themselves.

Went yesterday in an emergency for some supplies, and I can't recognise Shipna enough as a lovely, kind and helpful member of Boots ! Honestly very knowledgeble and full of great advice in what she does. Lastly, I had a panic attack which I didn't expect to be handled with such hamanity and care.

I hope she is recognised and wish her the best x

I love this Boots shop. It is bigger than expected and has loads of products. They have photo printing service, over 40s free health MOT , you can recycle your beauty supplies and student discounts. They have usual offerings too such as: loads of make up counters, travel items like headphones, dental items, bathroom items, hair items, baby products, meal deals, snacks etc. there are self service checkouts so things move quickly.

Absolutely incredible balayage! Fairy has done my balayage twice now and both were absolutely stunning. She knew exactly what I wanted and I genuinely could not be happier with her work. The second time I came in with my natural hair colour (dark brown) and she lifted it beautifully to bright blonde in only 2.5 hours including cut & blowdry. She is also so kind and the whole team are very welcoming, I would highly recommend!!

I’ve now been to see Fairy 4 times, after 10 years in London I’d never been happy with any hairdressers I’d used before - until now 🙌🏻
I’ve had blonde balayage every time and it’s always been superb and exactly what I’ve asked for! The cuts and styling have always been exactly what I’ve asked for too - Fairy does an amazing job! The entire team are all so welcoming and kind on top of all being excellent at their craft! This place is an absolute gem and I’ve referred friends here who have had the same positive experience.
Fairly priced, excellent colour and cuts, efficient and friendly - you won’t find a better hairdressers!!

Came here for a last minute blowout and I was impressed! The hairdresser May is amazing! Such a professional, left me looking like a hair commercial model! Loved it, obsessed, would definitely come back!

I had my hair cut today from long to a bob, and I couldn't recommend my experience more. The staff are friendly, funny and welcoming, they washed my hair quickly on arriving, gave me a place to hang my coat and I was seen by my stylist very soon. The haircut she gave me what very close to the reference picture, but with a few recommended alterations to suit my hair type/face shape which showed she was very knowledgable. She was very lovely, kept complimenting me and asking me questions about myself and was clearly very talented at her craft. The whole experience lasted about 30 mins which I was shocked at- perfect for me as I don't usually love sitting in the hairdressers for ages! This was my first time at Hair by Fairy and definatley not the last!!

I’ve been coming to Hair By Fairy for waxing and eyebrow threading for the past 7 years because of the wonderful service that Ingy provides. Not only is she always smiley and happy to see her clients, but she also takes her time to give you the exact results that you would like to see. She is patient, efficient, pays attention to detail and knows exactly what her clients need without them having to ask. I cannot recommend her enough.
Meant to have a 45 min facial which only lasted 20 mins. The customer service was terrible, started late, left me by myself constantly and didn't wipe the product off my face properly
he

wondered in as part of my London exploration, and as someone who’s only ever heard of super drug online, I was literally a kid at a candy store. the place was decently big, with displays of brands I can never get back in my own country. there were some pretty good deals too and staff were super friendly.

the bus stop outside is also really convenient!

During my visit to Superdrug, Evelyn was very helpful and supportive. She was friendly and took the time to understand what I needed, which made choosing the right products much easier. Her recommendations were relevant, and the overall shopping experience was smooth and pleasant.

I had such a great experience at Superdrug! Roma was incredibly helpful and went above and beyond to assist me. She was friendly, knowledgeable, and made sure I found exactly what I needed. It’s always nice to meet someone who genuinely cares about customer service. Thank you, Roma, for all your help you made my visit so much easier and enjoyable! We found incredible offers will recommend for my family and friends

Highly recommend Superdrug,!!

Great store. Good service.
I’d like to give positive feedback for Muhammad, the customer assistant at the checkout. He was very nice, friendly, and helpful. Even at the end of the day, he remained polite and kind to me. I really appreciated his great attitude and service.

I visit to the superdrug marble arch yesterday and we mert the bery nice lady there her name was mim and she helped me to make the bundle from revolution. The way she helped me was really helpful and professional thanks for her again. It was my pleasure to met her there

I would love to review the products purchased and paid for over two weeks ago if Evri could deliver them. I have been waiting over 2 weeks for the delivery and/or refund on the purchase bought and paid for appalling customer service with telephone number that does not get answered

Am a big fan of their detangling hairbrush...finally got my own as kept borrowing it from my sweetheart. The palm-friendly shape is great too and one thing not mentionned on the box is that it provides too a gentle head&sclap massage! ^^

Best experience from their customers support department…I had some issues with my country’s customs service and my order and they helped solve the issue immediately..helpful,trustworthy, reliable!!! Great company
And their products very high end with great quality
These brushes are AMAZING ❤️🧡💛
Very good items 👌🏻

Loved this spa ! I booked it on the day and it was definitely one of the best spas I’ve visited in London! The entire area is so nice and clean and the staff are so attentive. Would definitely come back !

Customer Service - 9/10. The staff were nice polite and courteous throughout. They also serve a lovely biscoff tasting tea.
Ambience - 8/10. The place smelled lovely and the soothing music was calming and relaxing.
Spa facilities - 5/10 - I felt they were basic and nothing extraordinary. They worked just fine though.
Thai Massage - 10/10. Loved the intensity and felt the impact throughout my body. I wanted hard and got exactly that.

So pleased i booked this spa! 2 mins from the station (charing cross), very good service from the receptionist. Small changing room but has everything you need. The milk soak experience was amazing! The massage with Maria was brilliant also. I even had the spa to myself for 30 mins on a Saturday afternoon. Good value!

Just had a wonderful Signature Thai Retreat: 60 minutes Thai massage and 30 minutes Foot Massage. The woman at the front desk listened to my medical issues and recommended Patrick. He was excellent: a true healer. Very powerful but skilled. Every joint in my body feels relaxed and released. I have had many Thai massages over the years and this is one of the best. I always try to come to Thai Square Spa when visiting London. They are truly excellent!

I was in London for vacation and needed a massage after my flight. I walked into the spa and they were able to give me an appointment same day. I had an amazing neck, back and shoulder massage! The environment is relaxing, you can rest and drink tea in a zen environment while waiting for your massage!

Peaceful and healing facial, 100% relaxing, the therapist is truly amazing.
Products are great too, my skin felt much better after treatment.

Placed an order 78214 with them over Christmas paid for express delivery and product just arrived yesterday. Has to be the worst customer service experience - still no response to my chat, email or WhatsApp, surely they have a process to handle customer queries? These products aren’t cheap and if they want to keep their loyal customers happy then they need to fix poor quality service.

I had the most wonderful experience at The Organic Pharmacy Clinic in Chelsea! From the moment I walked in, I was welcomed by warm and knowledgeable staff who made me feel completely at ease. The space is beautifully designed - calm, clean, and luxurious, with a real focus on wellness.

I booked a facial treatment and was genuinely impressed by the expertise of the therapist. She took the time to understand my skin concerns and tailored the treatment perfectly. My skin felt instantly refreshed, glowing, and hydrated, hands down one of the best facials I’ve ever had!

Highly recommend to anyone looking for a results-driven yet relaxing beauty and wellness experience. I’ll definitely be back and check their product range next!

Unfortunately I did not get the product because the organic pharmacy did not include the correct forms when sending the package. They responded once, then ghosted me. I was super understanding of the situation - mistakes happen - but think it’s unprofessional to leave someone on read when they could have easily helped me resolve the error. I never leave reviews, but am still dealing with ups 2 weeks after the promised shipping date, so hoping that they’ll see this and respond.
I love this company. Their products are sublime. Their black Friday purchases are fabulous. I swear I look younger 😅 ❤️

I'm leaving tomorrow for a South East Asia trip and was so busy at work that I couldn't get the vaccinations yet. I was super lucky that Onsie (I probably misspell her name - sorry) was there - her colleagues insisted that I need to book online and that everything is booked out for tomorrow but she overheard my conversation and came to rescue and she was so friendly as well! So so happy that I can get my vaccinations in time!

Don’t collect your prescriptions from here. This is the second month in a row where I’m out of medication in between months.

They completely ignore their phone lines and when confronted all they do is shrug. It’s better to have the phone go straight to voicemail than to hold false hope for people trying to get in touch with their *PHARMACY* - really shows a lack of regard for their patients. 2/16 of my calls were successful in the past month and both times were when I had to contact the opticians to ask them to tell their pharmacy team to pick up.

On sunday, I travelled to this boots store for a specific beauty item, which had sold out elsewhere, but online stating it was in stock there. I couldn't find the perfume giftset, so approached two members of staff in the perfume section. They had a quick look then said it had sold out. I then stood there pondering if it was worth travelling 30mins to another store, only to be disappointed again. At this point the member of staff, who I had spoken to (a lovely young lady - who may have worked on the  Liz Earle counter) approached me and said that she would check the stockroom, if I didn't mind waiting. Thankfully she was able to find the perfume set and put it back with the display box for me to purchase. For this, I was very grateful, as it was a birthday gift, that I had travelled nearly an hour to get to. I have worked as a consultant in retail for over 18 years, including stores such as, Boots, Selfridges, John Lewis, Harvey Nichols, House of Fraser and Peter Jones, so I grately appreciated her help and coming up trumps with the perfume set. Thank you! Apologies for not getting her name.

Hirak gave us excellent service today in the audiology clinic. We were met on time and he was incredibly patient with my mother, when performing an ear wax removal for her and hearing test.

She was very nervous and kept flinching but he didn’t rush us and took time to pause lots so we could get the job done and not have to return. We really appreciated his time and encouragement today. Many thanks - it makes a difference.

Hello, I would like to say many many thanks,, in last week , I have had high blood pressure, the pharmacists were brilliant, helpful, spoke with my gp , monitored, advice , polite and cared about me. Even the day after when I picked up my medicines. Angel boots right place for me. Highly recommended 💐🤞

Incredibly rude staff. I politely asked a staff member about where I could find a certain medication. She just rolled her eyes at me, stared me down like I was an idiot and just arrogantly spat out “we don’t have it, go to a bigger store”. Trust me, if I knew I was going to have the displeasure of interacting with that woman I would have gladly gone somewhere else.
Not only she was arrogant, but she was flat out wrong, as eventually a different worker showed me where it was. I don’t expect all staff members to know about every single product but if they’re going to give wrong information at least don’t display such a nasty attitude with it.
I will not return to this store any time soon.

Went to Boots last night and unfortunately the staff, especially the cashier, were really rude to me but nice to other customers. I can only assume it’s because I’m a student, but all customers deserve to be treated equally. I’m here to purchase a product, not deal with an attitude. I wanted to ask for a help and they gave me a look and talked to me with a very rude tone and raised their voice at me just because i was only asking how to use the boots card! Be nice and relax take a deep breath. First time experiencing this , such a bad treatment.

I  went it at nearly closing time, trying to buy some lipstick for my auntie and I
would say thank you so much to Nusrat ( sorry if i spell it wrong). She was really kind, she took her time helping me find products, check out and everything.
Thank you so much Nusrat.

I would like to thanks Clare at Boots, Regent street at the prescription till. She was very helpful, it was a very difficult day for me, but she easily managed my situation. Appreciated, and many thanks again. God save you.

Big thanks two members staff Kaval shah pharmacist and cashier sietah went into boots regents street just on off chance to enquire about flu jab I couldn't book anywhere obviously lots people getting flu jabs and sietah ask the pharmacist would we be able to give me flu jab now so Kaval shah said no problems get this sorted straight away excellent customer service from both members staff and very polite thank you

Can't praise Danny and Darshini enough for their outstanding service, Darshini who is the eye specialist made me feel at ease and was extremely thorough, I said I  had hazy and mirror vision and pain in my right eye , Darshini went through every possibility thankfully it was nothing serious
Danny was also amazing, he helped me choose my frames and gave me great advice,also there was a misunderstanding regarding my %50 replacement offer that was available due to last year not being offered insurance for my new pair of glasses , so Danny gave me friends and family discount which really was a great gesture on his part tbh even without this lovely gesture I would still give him a 10/10 the same as I would give Darshini
They represented boots extremely well
Thanks again to you both for an amazing service

Opening at 8:30am is not!
So don’t bother, shops assistance are nice but by the look to the door… no punctual! 🤩
Well I am leaving at 08:50 and still close 🥵😓

Despite being a fairly standard Boots branch, this gets five stars from me for one important reason. It appears to be one store in the chain that still has meds that are in short supply (yes, today's NHS faces that).

This was the case for me, I was directed here to collect something out of stock nationally that I needed for my son.

A mention goes to pharmacist Raheda, who was especially helpful in getting me the prescription.
Always helpful staff on the counters and pharmacy. Its a small store but has good stock of different brands

An outstanding service from Abdul, who certainly helped me to sort out an advantage card in spite of the failures in the Boots app. From the first moment, he did everything to show me where to download the app, how to register and help me to find an ipad when the phone app failed, even after trying to link a physical card. I hope that software can be improved. Thanks to this kind and professional young man, who in spite of being busy and about to close the store, did everything to help me to get a card and in that way, get a good discount the company is currently offering. Cheers

This event took place Yesterday Saturday 29 JAN 2026 at 08:45 in boots 508 Oxford street .

While trying to inquire about a discount which did not show in the screen , I was met with an incredibly rude and interrogating tone from a female staff member about if i lived in the UK while using my advantage card. Despite my asking her to lower her voice as I was with my young daughter who was happily buying her list , she continued to be confrontational, claiming 'this is just the way I talk I am from the Caribbean. This is the way we talk!!.'
This unprofessional behavior eventually led to a heated exchange that should never have happened in a retail environment. I am deeply upset by how we were treated in front of my child and Extremely disappointed with the customer service at this branch.

The shop is not that big, but it has the ground floor and the basement. It looked dark. It didn't look that clean, and it looked a bit neglected. Most of the shelves were stocked, and they had a good selection. Employees are not really friendly or helpful. The security person sounded a bit aggressive to the customers. I greeted one of the employees in the basement, and I didn't receive any reply. There were a couple of girls on the counter chatting carelessly without paying any attention to what I was saying. I think boots can do better than this, I hope they give all employees of this shop a short curse about customer service that will lift the ambience of the place. It is very near to Marble Arch and the tube station.

Popped into this branch to find a clearance item but it transpired it wasn't available. This branch is fairly small with a small range of products compared with the bigger branches with a wide array of products giving an overall better shopping experience. Helpful staff and nice layout with a lovely umbrella selection. Men's product range is rather limited. Overall l would recommend this branch.

DOLMA is the staff member that every team should have.

She was essential in facilitating a transaction with the Love2Shop voucher.

🙏

Favourite drug store in London. Everything can be found here especially for beauty, toiletries and perfume products. You even can buy at cheaper price since there is always a discounted price at certain products.

I recently visited Parkland Natural Health for my first colonic cleanse, and the overall experience was genuinely positive. From the moment I arrived, the atmosphere felt calm and professional, which immediately helped me relax. The practitioner explained the process clearly and took time to understand my concerns, offering thoughtful observations about my general wellbeing. I appreciated the considerate approach and the way everything was carried out with care and respect.

One aspect I found particularly helpful was the bicarbonate-soda option, which isn’t commonly available elsewhere. While I cannot speak for anyone else’s results, I personally felt lighter and more balanced afterwards, and I left with a clearer understanding of how to support my digestion going forward. The guidance I received made it easier for me to adjust my eating habits, and I found myself naturally inclined to make healthier choices in the days that followed.

What stood out most was simply how smoothly everything went and how supported I felt throughout the appointment. For anyone curious about trying a cleanse in a setting that feels safe, attentive, and reassuring, my experience here was very encouraging. I’m pleased I chose this place for my first treatment.

I've had my first session hydra colonic and it couldn't have come sooner. I felt very comfortable, the room is cosy and allowed me to get the treatment in a dignified manner, which I appreciated. A sense of relief overcame me after the session and I have been having bowel movement everyday since - also ensuring that I drink my 1.5lr water a day!

I've been a long time client for a couple of years - Mila is fantastic!
I come at least once a month. I love how easy the booking system is here compared to other places I've been before. I'd definitely recommend Parkland Natural Health to anyone.

My review has been a long time coming. Thank you Tony for your professionalism and knowledge as always. Your advice is invaluable and to be followed. I am so grateful to have found Parkland. Tony your advice is worth its weight in gold and has proved markable improvement in my overall health.

This was my very first experience having a colon cleanse, and I must say I couldn't have asked for a better introduction than the one I had at Parkland Natural Health on High Holborn. I was initially a bit nervous, not quite sure what to expect, but Anatoli made sure the whole experience went by very smoothly.

From the moment I walked in, I felt welcome and at ease. The environment is calm, clean, and professional, but it’s Anatoli who really makes the difference. He’s not only clearly knowledgeable and experienced, but also genuinely kind, attentive, and easy to talk to. It was a pleasure to converse with him throughout the session, which helped me feel relaxed and reassured.

Anatoli walked me through every step of the procedure, answered all my questions with clarity and patience, and ensured that I was comfortable at all times. What could have been awkward or uncomfortable turned out to be a surprisingly pleasant and even insightful session.

I left feeling lighter, refreshed, and well taken care of. It’s clear Anatoli takes pride in his work and truly cares about his clients. If you’re considering a colonic, whether it’s your first time like it was for me or you’re just looking for a trustworthy place, I absolutely recommend Parkland Natural Health.

Great man. Great service. Highly recommended.

I requested a consultation and was quoted £1759 as my tattoo is “large” but based on my measurements, my tattoo would fit into the “medium” category of 12 x 4 .. which online is £849. My tattoo goes over 1cm. So they wanted to charge me double for the extra 1cm.. when I questioned them and asked how that is even reasonable, I was told to contact and email the management.. I think it’s very unreasonable and shows there is no integrity or even justification for how my tattoo even costs that much. I didn’t proceed, but just want to let others know that this place clearly cares more about money than clients

I’ve had the loveliest experience with Brooke and Erika at Pulse Light. They have both been incredibly respectful, especially towards my religion. As a Muslim, I asked if I could pray, and they kindly accommodated me by preparing a small area in the room so I could do so comfortably during treatment time— something I truly appreciated.

I did CoolSculpt during my visit, and Erica took her time to explain the entire process thoroughly, along with other treatment options! She answered ALL of my questions and made sure I felt completely at ease. Brooke was very smiley, warm, and friendly throughout the whole experience.

Their kindness and professionalism have honestly made me want to return to this clinic for more treatments in the future. I’ve had an amazing experience. Thank you so much to both of you — you made everything so smooth, comfortable, and welcoming including both of your professionalism!

Bank Clinic - laser treatment.
Behie is genuinely fantastic. The treatment Behie provided has honestly been the best experience by far. She is incredibly knowledgeable and clearly cares about her clients. Behie is also really lovely and great to chat to. I saw great results even after my first session which was amazing! I am so glad I found her and wouldn’t go anywhere else!

I had my laser hair removal sessions with Aferdita at Pulse Light Clinic, and I couldn’t be happier with the results! From the very first appointment, she made me feel completely comfortable and explained every step of the process clearly. She is professional, knowledgeable, and genuinely cares about achieving the best results for her clients.

The treatment was quick, efficient, and far less uncomfortable than I expected. After just a few sessions, I already noticed a huge reduction in hair growth. Aferdita always checks in on how I’m feeling, adjusts settings when needed, and gives great aftercare advice.

I highly recommend Aferdita to anyone considering laser hair removal—she’s amazing at what she does, and the whole experience has been fantastic!

Pulse Light Clinic was amazing!
My first full leg and arm laser hair treatment was unexpectedly relaxing, I almost dozed off to my surprise!! Therapist Kat was incredible, making me feel super comfortable from consultation to treatment. Counting down to my next session in two months. Absolutely recommend!

I came to this salon in a bit of a panic after a really bad experience at another place where my hair was left with striped bleach highlights. I wasn’t sure if it could be fixed, but from the moment I walked in, I felt reassured. My new hairdresser Kathy (wish I had gone to her in the first place!) was not only kind and professional, but incredibly knowledgeable.
She took the time to really assess the damage and explained clearly what she could do to fix it. The results honestly blew me away—she transformed my hair completely! It looks and feels so much healthier and the colour is exactly what I was hoping for in the first place.
I’m beyond happy with how it turned out. You can tell she genuinely knows her craft and cares about her clients.
Before and after picture below.

I’ve been going to Robert for the past eight years, and I can’t recommend him highly enough. He’s the perfect mix of professional and personable, with exceptional skill and attention to detail. After all this time, I trust him with my eyes closed — literally. Every appointment feels comfortable, consistent, and genuinely enjoyable. If you’re looking for a hairdresser you can rely on, Robert is absolutely the one.

Just really disappointed

Was given a gift voucher for my birthday for a specific service & after having had a really negative experience at another salon decided to give this clinic a try.

There is nothing so awkward as having to point out to the team you’ve not had what you booked in for (or even close to it), not once, but TWICE during the visit.

I am very grateful to the front of house team who immediately recognised things were wrong on both occasions & addressed them swiftly with absolutely kindness but the whole experience was just really disappointing and deflating.

Gavin, Fiona, and Kinga took care of my wedding day to perfection. From trial to the actual day, I felt like I was in safe hands with people who were able to visualize what I wanted and bring it to life. I particularly loved that they were able to arrange for a last-minute manicure on my wedding day which really saved the photographs with my new ring! Also, if you're like me, you'd be happy to see the various social initiatives they're involved in (including job exposure for students, helping women through menopause etc) Highly recommend, especially for Chelsea brides

I had an incredible experience at Richard Ward in Chelsea. The customer service was outstanding from start to finish. My stylist, Adolfo, did an amazing job with my graduated bob. Since I was going from waist-length hair, it was a huge change, but Adolfo made me feel completely at ease throughout the process. His attention to detail is impeccable, and the result was simply perfect — he is truly a master of the Vidal Sassoon bob!

I went back the next day because I decided I wanted it just a little shorter, and both the salon and Adolfo were so accommodating. They fit me in right away and made the adjustment at no additional cost, which I really appreciated.

I couldn’t be happier with the result and the whole experience. Highly recommend Richard Ward, and especially Adolfo, if you’re looking for precision, artistry, and a stylist who truly cares.

Really friendly team with sun bed and beauty room, very good value for money and helped me get a healthy glow a few weeks before my wedding. Only downside is its closed on Sunday. Made up for it as open late in the week and free parking for customers.
I get waxed here, and Leslie is the only person I trust with my waxing needs, I won't dare go anywhere else. I've been going for 8 years now. It's friendly, clean and good value for money.
It's a long time ago that I used this salon regularly. The women who owns this place is really friendly and good at her job! It was my favourite place in London for tanning!
Amazing salon, super clean and very friendly staff :) Made me feel very comfortable, and would never go to another beauty salon. Can't wait for them to re-open!
Absolutely love their beds & staff will never use another shop except here, I have used other places and burnt but here went a lovely brown the 1st time completely recommended xxx

When I sustained a serious injury to the skin around my eye area, Shenaz offered me the latest light therapy treatment
which completely eradicated scarring and swelling. My condition completely disappeared.
She has helped with a sluggish lymphatic system and has helped me increase targeted muscle tone, when I was in training for a sports event.
Shenaz is at the cutting edge of new technology and non-invasive treatments so if you have challenges facing you but have never found a solution elsewhere, don't hesitate in contacting Shenaz.

Shenaz is the most incredible practitioner in the industry. She cares for you and will tailor your needs and create your own package to help with any issues you may have. Helping with reducing scars, to the best massages, to aesthetics to IV’s - Shenaz is your very own Face & Body Guru who does it all and makes you feel wonderful ❤️ I love you Shenaz and thank you for making me feel beautiful!

I was experiencing pain in my shoulders and lower back, and Plantar fasciitis. Shenaz, with her remarkable experience and expertise, guided me towards a solution: the FIT Bodywrap Infrared Sauna.

This technology is a game-changer. As soon as I settled into the cozy confines of this blanket wrap sauna, a wave of instant heat washed over me. The soothing infrared worked its magic, melting away my tension and leaving me in a state of pure relaxation. I was so at ease that I even found myself drifting off to sleep effortlessly.

I cannot stress enough how much I recommend a visit to The Face and Body Clinic in Harley Street, particularly to seek out Shenaz's invaluable guidance. Her knowledge and understanding of the treatments available are unparalleled. If you're seeking relief from any kind of bodily discomfort, the FIT Bodywrap Infrared Sauna is an absolute must-try.

I left feeling rejuvenated, revitalized, and incredibly grateful for the outstanding service provided. Book your appointment and experience this remarkable clinic and the expertise of Shenaz.

The face and body clinic are one of the best aesthetic clinics I've visited in London. I'm always made to feel at home and Shenaz is great with providing the right advice and care for me. I'm very impressed by her and the teams knowledge. I highly recommend the FAB Clinic, best clinic in London.

I love how Shenaz will recommend things that are realistic for you and will make sure you are comfortable with it, it's not just about the money, it's about getting you results.

Coming here two times a week is something I look forward to!

The treatments are relaxing and do the job in a healthy and realistic way for long term results!

I had a wonderful experience at Beauty Essence. I tried the Facial Celluma Led, and from the moment I arrived, I was warmly welcomed. The atmosphere was relaxing, and the staff were professional and attentive.

The massage was absolutely exceptional. I left feeling rejuvenated and deeply relaxed. Even though I live quite a distance away, the service was so impressive that I’m already planning my next visit.

Highly recommended!

Beata

I had such a great experience at Beauty Essence. Mary was fantastic and removed a skin tag over the course of a couple of sessions. It was very easy and pain-free, and I will definitely be back. Would highly recommend!

Mary in my humble opinion is a subject matter expert in all things skin care. She has helped me choose the appropriate Environ products and formulate a at home skin care regime that has exceeded all my expectations and then some. Book in with her ASAP, your body mind and soul will not regret it! See you soon, Mary.

I've been visiting for years, and I can't say enough good things! The atmosphere is always warm and welcoming. The staff goes above and beyond to accommodate everyone as best as they can.

Mary, in particular, has an incredible bedside manner; she makes every visit comfortable and reassuring. I always leave with great results. Highly recommend!

After searching for salons across London that do electrolysis, and trying several places, I finally discovered Mary and her team at Beauty Essence, and now I wouldn’t go anywhere else. The results have been exceptional. The salon is clean, calm and welcoming, and all the therapists are lovely.

Very kind and accommodating staff, the process was relaxing and I admired the precision on my nails. She left my very blunt nails looking very beautiful as you can see in the photo. Could not recommend this salon enough!

I came at the start of April to get a set of acrylics and the man who done my nails was lovely and done my nails to perfection and exactly how i asked for them.They have lasted well over a month and don’t seem to be coming off any time soon. Best nail salon I have went to in London!

I’ve been to this salon a few times now and must say Ben does a great job every time! Fast, reliable and very central which makes life so much easier when you need to get your nails re-done after work.

ran by a vietnamese family, they were lovely and welcoming :)

the lady offered to move to the room with heater when I went to grab my coat. The nails were done with patience, and a decent price of 25.

would totally come back again.
Loved it!! Considering how complicated my nail design was, and the location of the salon, this was great value for money! The shop front was super cute as well - would definitely recommend 🥰

Visited in the summer before a trip and had an amazing experience from start to finish - and the best part was I was in and out in 20 minutes! I had the hot wax with Andreea who made sure I was super comfortable and ran me through the entire process (which was actually quite simple) as it was my second time having a wax, and the last time was several years before! Would definitely recommend for anyone wanting a wax pre holiday or just as a treat - great location and super quick.

I have been 3 times to Strip and every single time I leave happy with  the excellent service provided, and the studio is clean and inviting. I find it very relaxing to get my wax watching a tv show, helps with the nerves.

I've been coming to Strip Soho for over a year for both laser and waxing. I love how clean the salon is and the professional service given by the therapists who deliver a high standard of treatment. Booking appointments are super easy and I only come to this salon. Would recommend!

I’ve been going to Strip for many months now, and have always had great experiences. The beauticians are very friendly, knowledgeable and gentle. I’m usually quite sensitive to waxes, but have never had any issues here.

Great experience from when I walked into until I walked out. I actually was a couple minutes late and was able to be seen by another therapist (super grateful)! Mia was AMAZING, bet wax I've ever had - as painless as a Hollywood wax could be and bloody quick! 10/10 would recommend.
Knowledgeable and friendly pharmacist sorted emergency prescription via 111 service in just 10 minutes. Very convenient location by Baker St tube

Booked an appointment for a contraception consultation. Had to tell 3 different members of staff that I was there for a contraception appointment. They asked me twice whether I was ‘sure’ I had an appointment there (I was sure).

The consultation wasn’t done in a private room just by the till despite there being a private room that was unoccupied.

It was clear the male pharmacist who spoke to me had a very limited knowledge of the different contraception methods as, instead of guiding me through my different options and the pros and cons like he should have, he told me that I should see my GP for this kind of thing. The extent of his knowledge was telling me what his patients typically go for and that it was ‘good’.

On your website the appointment should have gone as follows: Our pharmacy team will ask you some initial questions and afterwards, you’ll have a consultation with the pharmacist in a private consultation room. They will ask you relevant health-related questions to work out the best way to help you, and you may have your blood pressure checked and your BMI measured by a member of the team. Our pharmacists will offer advice and, where appropriate, make a supply of oral contraception.

Would not recommend this pharmacist for their contraceptive consultation. And it is disappointing that in 2025 a male pharmacist does not have the correct knowledge to advise on contraceptive methods.
The usual great choice you expect from Boots, what sets it apart is the service. I was served by Grazia, she is always so lovely, friendly, helpful and kind, thank you very much,
Big thanks to Selda very helpful and nice customer service.
Iera was incredibly helpful and kind, good customer service

Best nail salon in London! I had nail extensions done by Lily and they look insane, I don’t think I’ve ever had my nails look that good. She’s very thorough and considerate, she recommended me a different shape from the one I always do and it was a much better choice and from now on I will always get that! Thank you, I will only come back to Beauty Box from now on!

This is my favourite nail place in London and the best in my opinion, my nails always look great (I usually get gels, no extensions or anything else) and they last at least 4 weeks, I have them removed because I like my nails short, otherwise I think they would last longer. When I've had my nails done in other places, they usually last about 2 weeks and peel off. I really recommend this place and it will always be my 'go to'.

Been coming here for years. Lily is one of the best nail technicians I have ever met. She has time for everyone, always a kind word and the most thorough and gentle pedicures ever. I won’t go anywhere else - even though I live abroad! If I could give 6 stars, I would!

I took a chance as I was in London and needed a girlish manicure before a business event.
I love my nails! Thank you for a wonderful treatment and for making my nails and my friend’s nails look good.
A great team who are friendly and accommodating. Wish they weren’t a 12 hour flight away!
Thanks again! It’s been a week and they still look good 😃

I don’t have manicures regularly but love having them occasionally. I booked these guys to try out as the price was reasonable and the location was convenient. Cuticle work made one of my cuticles bleed (as seen in photo) and nail filing made the side of one of my fingers sore. However, they did what I wanted with gel polish and chrome powder and the overall finish is pretty good (not the best I’ve had). Overall not bad but I probably won’t return

I truly cannot recommend the London Smile Clinic enough. Everyone I encountered yesterday was absolutely wonderful, so kind and so understanding. Especial thanks are due to the absolutely lovely Delesta, Dr Pratik Sharma's treatment coordinator, who went over and above. She was so warm and lovely, and she managed to organise for me to have a second appointment that very afternoon with Dr Tim Bradstock-Smith for which I was extremely grateful, as I had travelled all the way from the East Midlands. Both Dr Sharma and Dr Bradstock-Smith are exceptionally kind and understanding, and between them they were able to get to the bottom of a complex problem that my home dentist and orthodonist had not properly understood. I cannot tell you how relieved I am to have seen them. I have suffered a lot of dental trauma and I felt heard and cared for in a way that I have never experienced before. I will be pursuing further treatment with The London Smile Clinic and I would not have any hesitation in recommending them to other nervous patients or patients with challenging or unusual conditions. Thank you so much to everyone I saw yesterday. I'm truly grateful for the outstanding levels of care and consideration I received.

Still Exceptional After 25 Years
I had my veneers done at The London Smile Clinic nearly 25 years ago by Dr Tim Bradstock-Smith, and I’m now back having them replaced - with the same dentist! That alone speaks volumes about the level of trust and satisfaction I’ve had over the years.
What continues to impress me abot LSC is their investment in cutting-edge technology. The diagnostics they use now provide such a detailed view of your dental health, allowing for a treatment plan that’s not just about looks, but about long-term wellbeing. It’s thoughtful, precise and truly patient-centred care.
The professionalism and excellence of the entire team is just as strong as it was all those years ago. There’s a genuine culture of kindness - right down to my original Dental Care Manager, Dawn!  Everyone is welcoming and clearly proud to be part of a clinic that sets the bar for dental care.
If you’re looking for world-class dentistry backed by years of consistency, innovation, and trust, I can’t recommend The London Smile Clinic highly enough.

I’ve had a very disappointing experience with The London Smile Clinic, specifically with the scheduling for my composite fillings with Dr Bradstock-Smith.

I paid the full amount upfront to get the discount, and my other treatments at the clinic have been completely fine – the hygienist and the orthodontic team have been great. However, the appointments for my fillings were cancelled multiple times without asking me first. Each time I was only informed after the cancellation, and as a result my treatment has been repeatedly delayed and is still unfinished.

After paying in advance, I expected reliable scheduling and basic communication. Instead, my appointments were changed or cancelled without consulting me, which feels unprofessional and very frustrating. I really hope the clinic improves communication and time management, because patients should not have to chase the clinic for appointments just to complete treatments they already paid for.

Always utter professionalism from the staff at the London Smile Clinic. I've just completed a "full mouth restoration" - placing high quality porcelain veneers and crowns over badly worn-down teeth. Dr Bradstock-Smith ensured that underlying general dental issues had been addressed before using his expertise to fashion a great set of natural-looking teeth for a new smile. Attend the London Smile Clinic and you won't want to visit another dental practice again!

I have been coming here for almost 20 years because of the superstar that is Kristelle! She is an incredible hygienist. Thorough, skilled & knowledgeable - she is an amazing professional and so personable. I always look forward to my cleans and honestly never want it to end!

I had an absolutely amazing deep tissue massage session with Tatiana. She is incredibly knowledgeable, and you can really feel how deeply she understands the body. Every technique felt intentional and tailored to what I needed. I left the session feeling relaxed, aligned, and honestly a bit mind-blown by her skill. I admired her expertise so much and would highly recommend her to anyone looking for a truly exceptional massage experience.

I want to express my appreciation for Deinny Reyes, who is my favorite instructor at Tempo. Deinny’s consistently positive and encouraging energy, combined with her deep knowledge of Reformer Pilates, makes her an exceptional contributor to the team. I attend her classes regularly, as she is a wealth of knowledge. I am consistently impressed by the precision of her corrections and adjustments. I observe her making knowledgeable adjustments for a diverse group of students, including older women, those with various physical challenges, and pregnant clients. While Tempo consistently has terrific instructors, Deinny brings everything to the table and is an amazing asset to Tempo's repertoire.

One of my favorite studios! Knowledgeable instructors with great cueing and exercises. I like their different levels classes systems. I've been training with Demi and Ines. Definitely recommend! I wish I lived in London to be able to go there often! Also their interior is chic and clean.

I’ve been going to TEMPO for years now, and it’s my favorite place to work out. The atmosphere is always positive, the classes are well-structured, and the instructors really know how to keep you motivated and in great shape. It’s a place that truly makes you want to keep coming back. Highly recommend for Pilates!

I’m a big fan of reformer Pilates class as it has definitely improved my strength and mobility. The reception staff are lovely especially the lovely Megan who kindly assisted me with my class reservation when I was experiencing mitigating circumstances. Will highly recommend this studio!

Small pharmacy, well stocked and tidy, great for last minute purchases and prescriptions.
Friendly, helpful staff... especially the delightful Heather on the prescription counter, she always remembers a face and is so cheerful.
Pharmacists are super helpful and give great advice.... couldn't fault them.

The security guard followed me (and only me, despite there being more customers around) obnoxiously throughout my browsing, making me feel uncomfortable, treated like a criminal.

In ironic contrast, the cashier was engrossed in a conversation with someone else and hardly recognized my existence while ringing my items in, to the point that I had to take the initiative and say goodbye some 20 seconds after the transaction was complete.

All in all a pretty lacklustre experience and I would recommend going to a different location.

Absolutely useless. Pre-booked appointment for a specific time, the store showed absolutely no regard for the pre-booked time, put me in some vague queue and was not able to provide a reasonable estimate of how long the "queue" was. Absolute disgrace, especially given the shop is based in the City where people operate according to tight schedules and pop out at lunchtime for what is meant to take a few minutes...

Came here when I was staying in hotel nearby and realised I’d forgotten one of my important medications. The on duty  pharmacist told me what to do and it was sorted and she was able to prescribe.  Thanks.

This is my second or third time at this Boots. I came in from work carrying my backpack and I literally caught the secruity observing me twice. I wondered what my crime was? Carrying a backpack and taking a bit longer to decide if i wanted to spend 12 pounds on brush I didnt particularly need? Please educate your staff. I have every right as well as everyone else to take my time to locate items and to decide what i wish to purchase.

This was my second visit to Jubilee Hair Salon, and once again I had such a wonderful experience! The atmosphere is so warm and welcoming as soon as you step in. I was greeted by bodam, who did my perm. She was very polite, kind, and gave me helpful tips on how to take care of my hair. She even gifted me a curling product free of charge, which was such a thoughtful gesture. I’m really happy with the service and will definitely be coming back again!

This was my first digital perm, and I was a bit nervous. I chose Sophy because of all the lovely reviews she has. She made me feel very comfortable through the whole process, and let me know how to take care of my perm as well. I also got a complementary drink and biscuit!

I have extra long hair so it was a lot more expensive for me, but a great investment as digital perms can last 6 months to a year depending on how well you take care of it.

Highly recommend Jubilee Hair Salon, will be back again in the future!

Anna is an exceptional stylist, and I've been a dedicated customer at Jubilee for a year now—every appointment is a five-star experience! What sets her apart is her patience and expertise; she always takes the time to listen to my vision while making sure the final result genuinely suits me. She’s also incredibly friendly and welcoming, creating a relaxing atmosphere that makes the entire visit enjoyable. Highly recommend booking with Anna!

Hands down the best Korean Hair Salon in London! Been coming back to this salon for four years straight and they always know how to handle my super straight Asian hair. Their styling is the best and my curls stay the whole day :)

I’ve been to many hair salons in London, but Seon Jin truly stands out.
The attention to detail and genuine care really show — nothing ever feels rushed, and the style always suits me and grows out beautifully.
Honestly, I feel lucky to have found a stylist like this.

The receptionist was extremely kind and welcoming too!

Ordered 500ml liquid iron bottle from Just Eat as I am in severe need of Iron. Received the 250ml bottle whilst they took the money for the 500ml one. No compensation or informing me that they simply could not provide the requested item.

Positive:
There is a nice lady that works in the morning at the till.
Always smiling and happy to be there for every customer.
She really deserves to be a store manager or at least a pay rise!
Negative:
They never open on time!
Once I stayed under the door for 30 min and today for another 20 min, waiting for the pharmacist.
That's absolutely unacceptable!
Boots, Please take action, make changes and stop blaming the traffic!

Came this morning at 9am and the boots was still closed. They told me to wait 10-15 mins. By 9.12 i asked again and they told me the pharmacist was late and cannot do anything.  This is now the second time they open late. Not acceptable.
Jaskia and Rotna were so kind, caring and helpful. Best service I’ve ever received at a pharmacy- thank you
They have the Q schedule, they open at 9 and I was waiting 30 minutes outside, it is too much to be a pharmacy.

I have lupus (SLE) and due to photosensitivity, I have developed quite severe hyperpigmentation on my face. Finding a clinic that truly understood my condition and cared about my safety and confidence was incredibly important to me. From my very first consultation at The Laser Treatment Clinic, I felt completely looked after. The team showed genuine compassion, patience, and understanding. They didn’t rush me or treat me like just another client. They carefully went through all my options and made sure any treatment would be safe and suitable for my skin and health.

After a detailed assessment, I was recommended the Derma White Treatment, an exclusive herbal treatment designed for all skin types. They took the time to explain every detail and what results I could expect. I really appreciated how bespoke the whole process felt. It wasn’t a generic recommendation but something tailored specifically to me and my condition.

I’ve now had four sessions and I’m genuinely seeing amazing results. My hyperpigmentation has improved so much and I finally feel hopeful and more confident in my own skin again. What stood out to me the most was how personal and caring everyone has been throughout my journey. The therapists are so warm and welcoming, always asking how I’m getting on and taking the time to listen to any questions or concerns I have. I always feel comfortable and reassured and I can tell they truly want me to see progress rather than make a quick sale.

The clinic itself is beautiful, spotless, and calming. It’s professional without being cold or intimidating. I felt like I was in expert hands but still treated as a person, not a number. The entire team is lovely and you can tell they genuinely care about their clients’ wellbeing and confidence.

When I started my treatment, they even gave me a complimentary aftercare package and went through it thoroughly with me so I understood exactly how to care for my skin between sessions. This is something I haven’t experienced anywhere else. I’ve been to a few consultations at other clinics before, but none of them made me feel cared for or confident enough to go ahead. The Laser Treatment Clinic completely changed that for me.

It means so much to have found a place that truly understands my lupus and treats me with compassion, professionalism, and personal care. I’m so grateful for the entire team and I’ll definitely be continuing with more of their treatments. I can’t thank them enough for helping me not only see real results but also feel confident and cared for again.

I’ve had a great experience so far at the Laser Treatment Clinic. I have seen a massive improvement with my treatments in a short amount of time. I have had two different treatment with them so far and I am planning to have a third treatment. They are very attentive and experienced in treating African and Asian skin which is a bonus.

This was my first proper facial treatment to address the hyperpigmentation I had.
I’d considered an alternative topical treatment cream but had heard mixed reviews about it.
I had a combination treatment of both the Derma White Treatment combined with laser across my cheeks on the suggestion of the aesthetician.

I’d developed what I thought were very cute freckles in my late twenties,, but they developed into quite large pigment spots. I never thought the treatment would be so impactful.
After the  treatment (which involved around 4/5 days of peeling), all the large spots had faded very significantly. The fainter spots had completely disappeared.
I took lots of photos which were very satisfying to look at as they tracked the changes in my skin.
I now have noticeably clearer and brighter skin which is free of the dark hyperpigmentation. And I know it works, so that when they return- back I go!

I’ve had a big summer away, and can report that my skin was glowing and bright. I may have enjoyed the sun a little too much….so am returning for a quick treatment.

I paid £645 as a partial payment for a microneedling treatment package at this clinic. At no point was I informed—verbally or in writing before I paid - that this payment was non-refundable.
Due to ongoing mental health conditions, including ADHD and mild autism, I have been unable to attend sessions. These are protected disabilities under the Equality Act 2010, yet I was offered no reasonable adjustments or understanding. Instead, the clinic manager, Modjdeh Sheri, refused to issue a refund and tried to push a so-called "goodwill gesture" to transfer my treatment to someone else—which I did not ask for and do not accept.
This approach is unethical, manipulative, and shows a complete lack of care for vulnerable customers. I have now begun legal proceedings to recover the money I am owed. I do not recommend this clinic to anyone—especially those with disabilities or mental health conditions.

To reply to your response which further speaks about a separate treatment that has no relevance to this topic as I won’t be continuing due to the mental health impact this has all had on me. I am speaking strictly about the refund for the £645 for a separate partial treatment package NOT the first treatments I have already stated I won’t be continuing with them and this has NO RELEVANCE.

I am currently seeking legal advice regarding a dispute with this clinic, relating to a laser treatment package I was unable to complete due to mental health conditions, including ADHD and autism.
Despite notifying the clinic of these conditions, they have refused to refund £645 for treatments I did not receive. I was not made aware of their refund or expiry policy at the time of payment, and I did not sign any consent forms or contracts that clearly outlined these terms in relation to disability or medical accommodations.
While the clinic has offered alternative treatments or transfers of the package as a goodwill gesture, I have made it clear that I will not be continuing with the 12-session treatment plan or any other substituted service. My request is for a refund of the amount paid for treatments I could not reasonably attend due to my disability, which I believe is protected under the Consumer Rights Act 2015 and the Equality Act 2010.
If a satisfactory resolution is not reached within 14 days of my most recent written communication, I intend to escalate the matter through Small Claims Court and pursue any relevant claims under disability discrimination legislation.
This review is intended solely to document my experience and position as part of an ongoing consumer complaint.

Probably one of the worst clinics I’ve ever been to. There was absolutely no compassion shown during the consultation, and the lack of genuine care was very apparent. I definitely won’t be returning for any treatment. It’s clear that money comes first here not the client. The woman I had my consultation with was cold and dismissive, and could really benefit from improving her communication and people skills. Don’t be fooled by the postcode, the service is truly disappointing.
Best wax ever! I have been to many waxing places and had many bad experiences! Bonnie is the best so far, least painful, quick, and experienced. She knows what shes doing and it reflect in her work!

She's a magician !
