What really sets Sameer apart is how adaptable he is because whether I’m low on energy, dealing with a busy week, or ready to be pushed harder, he adjusts each session to suit exactly where I’m at while still making sure I’m progressing safely and effectively. Sameer is also very knowledgeable and pays so muc attention to detail, especially when it comes to technique and injury prevention. Sessions are always well planned, challenging, and varied, and I’ve seen real improvements in my strength, confidence, and overall fitness. He has helped me understand that it’s a lifestyle too! Training with Sameer feels genuinely personal, and I actually look forward to every session. He’s an amazing PT and a real asset to Nuffield Health Paddington. I wouldn’t go anywhere else!

I’ve been going to this Nuffield branch for almost two months now. Located in the heart of Paddington, it’s very easy to access. The gym floor is well maintained and highly polished, and the equipment is cutting-edge with plenty of space for everyone. The pool is a good size, and the sauna and steam room are top-notch.

All of the staff are extremely kind and helpful—especially Chris, who helped me find my locker (they all look the same, so it’s easy to forget, lol) and even my trainers when I left them behind. Highly recommended!

Izabelle has been teaching both my children at Nuffield for 4 years and she is absolutely fantastic. She’s gentle, patient, and amazing with young children. My kids love her lessons and have gained so much confidence in the water. My children have made great progress with her and always look forward to their lessons.
What I also really appreciate is how honest and thoughtful she is — when my older child was ready to progress, Izabelle told us she was old enough to move to a bigger pool and a larger group, even though it meant moving elsewhere. That kind of genuine care and professionalism is rare. Thank you Izabelle for all your support and dedication over the years!

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Absolutely Outstanding Gym

This gym is everything you could want and more. From the moment you walk in, you can feel the energy — motivated people, serious training, and a community that actually pushes you to be better every day.

The equipment is top-tier and perfectly maintained, whether you’re focused on strength training, conditioning, or functional fitness. There’s never a feeling of limitation here — you can train exactly how you want, without compromise.

What really sets this gym apart is the atmosphere. The staff and coaches are knowledgeable, professional, and genuinely invested in helping you improve. No egos, no judgment — just hard work and respect. Whether you’re a beginner or an advanced athlete, you’ll feel welcome and supported.

Cleanliness is on point, the layout is smart, and everything is designed for efficient, serious training. This is not just a place to work out — it’s a place to grow physically and mentally.

If you’re looking for a gym that delivers real results, builds discipline, and keeps you motivated long-term, this is the one. Highly recommended. 💪🔥

Approached Sameer in the gym while he was doing his own workout and asked if he wouldn’t mind showing me a thing or two about throwing a punch. Without hesitation he said of course, broke things down clearly, and even got me doing some pad work on the spot. Gave his time generously to a complete beginner, no ego, no charge.  Just genuine passion for the craft.

Since then, Sameer’s been my trainer and he’s been nothing short of superb. He makes you put in the work, but in the best way. Every session is focused, challenging, and purposeful. He explains the why behind everything, pushes you past what you think you’re capable of, and still keeps it fun.

If you want real boxing, real progress, and a coach who actually gives a damn, Sameer’s your guy! Five stars without hesitation. 🥊

Amazing gym. Fantastic facilities and most importantly the staff are welcoming and help you to feel at home. Special shoutout to Elona at reception for her amazing customer service, she's awesome!

The Nuffield gym in Islington is super clean, modern, and has a real touch of luxury. The staff are incredibly friendly, helpful, and knowledgeable and make you feel welcome no matter where you are on your fitness journey.

Whether you're pushing through a tough workout in the fully equipped gym or just looking to unwind in the pool and sauna, this place has everything you need. There’s also a great range of classes and a team of dedicated personal trainers ready to boost your motivation and help take your fitness to the next level.

Had a really positive experience on my first visit to the Nuffield Islington branch. Ekaterina went above and beyond to make me feel welcome. I even forgot my locker padlock and the team were incredibly helpful and accommodating.

The gym is fully equipped, the changing rooms were clean, and the sauna was exactly what you’d expect.

Big thanks to the Nuffield team, looking forward to training here again soon.

Joining this gym was one of the best decisions- it's such an incredible value! It’s immaculately clean, the staff are super friendly and always greet with a smile and the equipment covers everything I need. It never feels crowded. The showers and washroom amenities are comfortable and well stocked. The class schedule is varied and well taught. I couldn’t recommend this fitness club more! Membership gives access to all their London locations, which suits me perfectly as I live in Islington and work in the City, ideal for a lunchtime workout

Agata one of the duty managers at Islington fitness is really of the best manager I have ever seen on duty with excellent customer service. The gym is alway in a nice and clean place mostly on weekends and also the cleaner working at weekends is also so great, respectful and patent with customers. I really do enjoy coming to this gym all because of the beautiful peaceful atmosphere.

I am a Nuffield Gym tourist and I can tell you that they vary but this one is excellent! It’s very clean with cleaners on duty, a squeegee for the steam room (such a nice idea to clean your seat!) it’s got a lovely clean poolside with wide lane swim. There are nice touches like a rain shower and ice bucket. Front desk welcome was really lovely, exceptionally nice staff who couldn’t have been more helpful to a stranger like me. This is a beautiful, quiet oasis in London and so welcome after a long day at work. Thank you so much for making my day :)

Just had a replacement white filling put in two weeks ago after my old 20-year-old grey one in Australia was finally replaced at long last. And my crown was perfectly done too, and they fitted me in straight away on a Monday morning.

Ethan and his team, and Shaymah who's super quick and helpful, and his lovely dental assistant, are just great fun. He plays music, settles you in and makes you feel comfortable every step of the way, which is exactly what you need. I fidget a lot, which he knows well, so he always talks me through everything and calms me down.

I'm very proud to call Ethan my dentist. Personally, I won't go anywhere else, and I have been going to Dental Spa for well over 15 years. Ethan's technology and mind-boggling equipment are pretty astonishing to say the very least.

I'm lucky to have them.

Thank you!

I've been coming here for almost a year and the service is next to none. Kevin is such a wonderful dentist and incredibly patient. The staff are always lovely and the practice is pristine. Shaymah at the front desk is particularly lovely! A 10/10 experience
Ethan does a fantastic job! Been seeing him for years and he’s very professional and competent. Highly recommended.

Thank you Dr Ethan for making my experience super easy even though I was terrified! Thank you for a really efficient session and for your clear and comforting manner. I knew what was happening throughout and left feeling confident and in control of my dental care. Would highly recommend.

Wow Dr Ethan is a genius!
Super nervous as had dreadful experiences as a teen and mostly avoiding if at all possible going to a dentist.
Great experience, super quick efficient.
In out within the hour crown created on the spot.
Lovely music and team.
Pain free ⭐️

Nuffield Health Shoreditch is an excellent fitness centre. The gym is always clean, well-maintained, and never feels overcrowded. The equipment is modern, and there’s a great range of machines and free weights. The staff are professional, welcoming, and make the atmosphere feel really positive. A great place to train and unwind — definitely worth the five stars.

I am a home member of Nuffield city, so that's a tough gym to beat. This one is a tier below, so not as big or fancy, but they do towels and have a pool, a sauna and a steam room. The lockers don't have built in locks, so you need to bring your own. The facilities and equipment are clean and well maintained, and every member of staff I interacted with was exceptionally friendly and helpful. Special mention of Amber who was on reception, she was very helpful and friendly.

Unacceptable experience — unsafe, dishonest, and completely unprofessional.

I was a member at Nuffield Health Moorgate & Shoreditch with my husband, and this has been one of the worst experiences I’ve ever had with any company.

The gym equipment is constantly broken and rarely repaired, but that’s nothing compared to the complete lack of member safety. On one occasion, a man was openly changing in the women’s changing room, and even after it was reported, management did absolutely nothing. That’s unacceptable and made me feel unsafe.

When we decided to cancel, reception told us August would be our final month, so we cancelled the direct debit as instructed. After a long email exchange where they complained about “one month’s written notice” (which no one ever mentioned at the time), they finally agreed in writing to cancel both memberships.

Then today — 18 October 2025 — I woke up to an email from a debt collection agency saying I owe them money. After they confirmed our cancellation themselves! This is beyond ridiculous.

Nuffield Health clearly can’t honour their own agreements, treat members with respect, or ensure a safe environment. Total disgrace — avoid this place at all costs.

I really enjoy attending Nuffied health Shoreditch. All the staff are very friendly, always have a smile on their faces. And approachable. Nuffield is very well kept place. All the facilities are Great. All the members are nice and friendly. overall, everything is great. Thank you for being here for all of us. Thank you!

The instructors and their classes are great at Nuffield Shoreditch and reception staff friendly. But the maintenance and management is terrible.

The air con in the studio has been broken more often than working over the last 2 years, leading to unbearably hot high intensity classes and freezing cold yoga. Management has tried to blame members for breaking it and staff - never taking responsibility, apologising, or giving a date when it will be fixed.

When referred up the chain to the operations manager, he wouldn’t give me a straight answer, just rolling out the same old excuses about staff and members causing the problems and saying he couldn’t estimate when they’d get the parts to fix the air con! That’s his JOB.

Nobody wants to take accountability for anything here. I would never choose Nuffield as my healthcare provider, given the lack of care they show to the health and well-being of members of their gym.

Myself and my daughter had the most amazing day yesterday. We started by relaxing on the massage chairs, Followed by a lovely back and leg massage. We then relaxed with a herbal tea and cupcakes. All of the staff couldn't do enough for us made us feel so welcome and relaxed from the moment we walked in to the very end. We definitely be returning. Thank you all so much ❤️

I had an excellent facial with Jacqueline, that combined a hydrating facial with face, scalp, hand and foot massage. Came away with beautiful glowy bouncy skin, after an incredibly relaxing 90 minutes. Highly recommend, it's a very warm and welcoming spa and the service from everyone I met was outstanding.

Fantastic day with my 14yr old daughter. We had the mini me package which was wonderful. The spa is amazing with all the luxuries you could ask for. Beautifully designed with a very high spec and complete luxury. The massage was one of the best I’ve ever had. The staff were amazing especially Nicole who even arranged a birthday cake for my daughter. A fantastic day which we will do again very soon. I highly recommend this spa it is truly wonderful and a perfect location . Thank you for a memorable day!

Attended a couples massage and private steam-room experience at the Spa. Overall, the facilities were clean, the service was friendly and helpful, and the experience was a good value for the $ paid.

2 standouts:
1/ the massage was particularly good. My girlfriend and I both enjoyed the technique of the 2 masseuses. Heated massage beds were enjoyed.

2/ the service provided from Dawn was what really made the experience special. The steam room wasn't as hot as we needed it to be and she was quick to accomodate. Dawn was:
- Amazing
- Incredible
- Delightful
- Splendid

Would come back again and recommend.

Was a bit tired of all the traveling, work and workout, so went to searched for a Spa and this one was nearby, chose a random therapist and went for deep tissue massage as I always do … let me tell you something that it felt this is the first time I did a deep tissue massage, the therapist was super professional and could feel the relief for each muscle after she’s done from it, by the end I felt like a new person, went into the room with muscles soreness and came out totally refreshed and regionalized, I felt all my body is relieved from all muscle tension.
Really recommend Jackline and really appreciate her work and advice on how to release tension.

Having worked as a make up artist myself and having the pleasure of working alongside Dunja I learned a lot from her. It was without saying that i go to her for my permanent makeup. My eyebrows are amazing and the 3D effect is unbelievable and I have a new found confidence with the way I look. Dunja is immaculately professional and certainly knows her subject as you can see from her amazing results.

I had an excellent experience at the Cavendish Clinic. The customer service was outstanding from my initial consultation with Marta at Peter Jones to Eleni at the Fitzrovia Clinic. Eleni was incredibly caring, supportive and professional throughout. I also really appreciated her flexibility around what was most helpful for my needs. They made the whole process so easy and reassuring I cannot rate them highly enough!

I was recommended by a friend, and was truly impressed. Eleni gave my skin a thorough cleanse with the Hydrafacial and did an amazing job. I then met Dr. Luca for my polynucleotide treatment—he was fantastic as well and very professional. The manager at reception was kind and welcoming, which made the whole experience even better. I usually go to Harley Street for my treatments expecting high quality and service, but Cavendish Clinic proved that it’s not about the location—it’s about the people and the experience, and they absolutely delivered.

had a wonderful experience with Alaric Stevens. He took the time to provide me with personalized skincare advice and shared his expertise in a very professional and friendly way. I truly appreciate his guidance and would highly recommend his consultation to anyone looking to improve their skin.(Milad)🥰

BEWARE!!

I’ve noticed this clinic has quietly deleted dozens of negative reviews over the past few months. I know this because I had written one myself before, and I’ve seen many other people sharing similar experiences.

This clinic takes full payment upfront, and if anything goes wrong  - for example, if your body doesn’t react well to a treatment, or you can’t continue with the procedure for health reasons — they refuse to refund even a single cent. The staff are unprofessional and poorly trained in communication, showing little empathy or understanding.

The clinic itself feels overpriced and underwhelming. There’s nothing special about the place - it looks cheap for the amount they charge, and the whole experience feels transactional rather than caring or medical.

This beauty clinic is extremely disappointing. Most of their procedures, especially the so-called fat-freezing treatments and things like Emsculpt or Emtone, produce little to no visible results. They advertise dramatic outcomes, but in reality, there’s virtually no improvement even after completing multiple sessions.

It feels like they rely heavily on marketing rather than real results. Everything seems designed to make you pay more upfront, with no accountability when treatments don’t work. Overall, the clinic gives off a fake and untrustworthy vibe, and I wouldn’t recommend it to anyone.

This review is in relation to the Peter Jones Clinic AND the Cavendish Clinic Head Office.  I can only seem to leave a google review here.

The ladies that carry out the treatments are all very lovely and good at what they do. My rating is in relation to the lack of any customer service that isn't solely related to booking an appointment.

Disappointing doesn't even begin to describe it.

I've tried for over 7 months to get a call back to discuss a package of treatments that I had purchased but could not use by the expiry date due to medical reasons. Every time I call I get told the clinic manager or someone from head office will have to call me back but the call never comes and all of my emails have gone unanswered. As it stands, I have lost several hundred pounds and no-one at the Cavendish Clinic seems to remotely care or can be bothered to extend the courtesy of a simple call back.

I am not a happy customer (just in case that wasn't obvious). Based on many of the other 1 star reviews this seems to be the norm and not an exception. Great at taking your money but when it comes to the after sales customer service it basically doesn't exist.

Highly recommend Asiatic Thai massage. I’ve been coming here for years. It’s the best local spot if you’ve never been. I can almost always get an appointment anytime of the day, plus they are open late until 10pm many days. The staff are welcoming and professional. The massages are relaxing and leave me feeling so much better than when I arrived.

Wow! What an absolutely incredible experience! From the moment you walk through the door, being calmly greeted by the friendly staff, soothing music, subtle aromas and peaceful ambience, you slip off your shoes into a perfectly curated space of tranquility.

The rooms themselves are warm and cosy, and the bed is wide and warm, with an electric blanket underneath. My masseuse, Nita, and then Belle, made me feel welcome and at ease, asked me my pressure preference, and let me get settled. The massage itself was one of the best I've had in my LIFE. I usually ask for firm pressure, and often have to request more than I'm being given when it starts, but Nita has both incredible skill and sharp intuition, and found every little knot I barely knew I had, and attended it with exceptional sensitivity and the perfect pressure for my body. I cannot sing her praises enough, an incredibly talented body worker. I was also really touched that when I was having a moment of not being able to get my head comfortable, she noticed immediately, and found a bolster to make it just right. Afterwards, I'm absolutely flying, my body feels incredible and I feel very connected to myself, my heart feels at ease, and I cannot wait to come again!

If you are looking to de-stress, this is the place. From the moment I walked in, the atmosphere was incredibly calming. The facility is spotless, the lighting is soothing, and the staff at the front desk were so welcoming.
My massage with Sooya was pure bliss. They have an incredible flow and seemingly intuitive touch. I actually dozed off a few times because I was so relaxed! Every detail, from the heated table to the essential oils, was on point. I left feeling like I was floating on a cloud.

I have just had another fantastic Thai massage here. This time Alex was my therapist. As always the massage was great, perfect pressure and very calming. All of my Christmas stiffness has been dealt with and I am ready for the new year. I have been coming here for years now and have always had the best experiences. I highly recommend to those looking for a highly professional massage and kind approach.
Excellent experience - we had the foot massage on the chair! Great value for money and will be coming again. Thank you Asiatic 💫💫💫

Amazing massage and facial from Jade! She was such a wonderful therapist, instantly making me feel comfortable and she was extremely knowledgeable. Her passion for skincare shone through and I feel like not only did I get a great treatment but I also learnt a lot about my skin and what products would work best for me. My skin is absolutely glowing and I can't wait to visit again!

Had a fantastic experience, Holly the therapist was brilliant. Was bought a pregnancy massage for my birthday, emailed to see if they had availability and they booked me right in. From the moment I walked through the door I felt calmer with the lovely reception service and cosy, clean facilities. I was taken to the room, which Holly had thoughtfully picked to be away from where some roadworks were happening. Went through the massage and where I wanted to focus. And the massage, genuinely, was everything I wanted from a pregnancy massage. So comfortable, gentle pressure to help ease my lower back and tension in my neck, hands and feet, and finished with a relaxing facial and head massage. Holly was welcoming and calm, really spent time on each area, and the treatment didn’t feel rushed. I was shown the products after, alongside a complementary tea, but there wasn’t a hard upsell. Honestly a perfect experience.

Had the most amazing Hot Stone massage by Ren. I've had plenty of massages over the years, and this was my first hot stone one. From start to end the team at The House of Elemis were fantastic, warm welcome, polite and professional. Ren talked me through the massage and preferences. I felt relaxed and stress free after 60 mins of a massage I never wanted to end. There was no rush to exit after, and they provided a revitalising shot and hot herbal tea. There was no hard sale for other treatments or products, and the discretionary gratuity fee was optional, of course I pad, the service from the team was amazing, and I will be going back!

We were given very warm greetings, We were offered refreshments.
The therapists were very friendly and knowledgeable about the products.
We were given very good advices how to tweek our daily routine.
The massage was absolutely amazing and the facial as well.

Philippa and her colleagues were very good ambassadors for the company.

I highly recommend it and we will definitely go back

A little piece of luxury. My son bought me an Elemis facial for my birthday. Always a treat.  I love the products (if rather expensive!) And the treatment was fabulous. Skin is discussed beforehand and my skin ended up looking wonderful, the best for ages. Lovely therapist,  Amy I think, did a great job.  Thank you.

My experience at Mandara Spa was absolutely amazing. From the moment I arrived, I was welcomed into a calm, luxurious space that instantly made me feel at ease. The atmosphere is serene, the setting beautifully designed, and every detail is thoughtfully taken care of.

I had the pleasure of being treated by Dara, and I can’t praise her enough. She was warm, professional, and incredibly skilled. Her massage was one of the best I’ve ever had — perfectly tailored to my needs, with just the right amount of pressure. I felt completely relaxed and rejuvenated by the end of the session.

Dara made the experience feel truly personal and special, and her calming energy added so much to the treatment. It’s clear she genuinely cares about her clients’ well-being.

If you’re looking for a high-end spa experience with outstanding service, I highly recommend Mandara Spa.

Great Spa offering various treatments. Staff was friendly and attentive. The waiting room has a great selection of healthy snacks, naturally flavoured water and teas. You can also use the pool and sauna area if you are having a treatment for free. If you are staying in the hotel it makes sense to go and pamper yourself and a partner.

Such a nice experience at Mandara Spa — super classy but still really relaxing. Victoria was amazing and made me feel so comfortable, and the massage was unreal. Left feeling calm, relaxed, and refreshed❤️Would definitely recommend

Honestly, what a wonderful experience! The place is very calm and relaxing. The service is very friendly and professional, and the masseuse Victoria is amazing! Shes welcoming, friendly, excellent at her job and celebrates you and your occasions! Highly recommend this. Thanks everyone and a special THANK YOU to Victoria

Booked a night here in the adjoining hotel in order to use the Mandara spa facilities. The massages were fantastic by Rhiannon along with the delicious selection of fruit, nuts, cookies and teas that were in the relaxation area. Also enjoyed using the exclusive lounge area where more food was waiting already prepared for us to help ourselves.  The only thing we paid for all day was a bottle of wine as all the other food and drinks were included in our spa package which was on special offer at £129 for two people with four massages each and full use of the spa facilities which included pool, sauna, steam room, showers and loungers. (Could really do with more loungers or chairs). The hotel itself is large with restaurants, a bar area and live music with plenty of seating area. Also very good for sight seeing, within easy walk of the London eye and surrounding area.

I had an excellent experience with the facial treatment at Dr. Russo Clinic and couldn’t be happier with the results. From the moment I arrived, the clinic felt professional, welcoming, and impeccably clean. The staff were kind, attentive, and took the time to explain every step of the treatment, which immediately put me at ease.

Dr. Russo was extremely knowledgeable and thorough, carefully assessing my skin and tailoring the treatment to my specific needs. The procedure itself was both relaxing and effective, and I could tell that only high-quality products and advanced techniques were used.

After the treatment, my skin felt refreshed, deeply hydrated, and visibly brighter. I also noticed an improvement in texture and overall tone that lasted well beyond the appointment. It was clear that great care and expertise went into every detail.

I highly recommend Dr. Russo Clinic to anyone looking for a top-quality facial treatment with real, noticeable results. This was a truly outstanding experience, and I will definitely be returning.
Silvia W.

Had my consultation with Dr. Russo and felt instantly at ease. They were super clear, professional, and really took the time to explain what would work best for my nose. I felt well looked after and confident in their expertise. Excited for what’s ahead and fully trust the process!

Had a consultation at Dr Russo’s clinic in London today and was really impressed. The team was professional, welcoming, and informative throughout. I felt listened to and well-advised — looking forward to the next steps. Highly recommend!🩷

Wow I do not trust many people with my skin but I felt so safe in Dr Russo’s hands. He is a true professional in a lovely Harley Street location and I found him to be extremely informative and thorough. He gave me an honest skin analysis and was very knowledgable and recommended the right treatment for my skin based on my desires and concerns. So excited to see the results and continue my skin journey with Dr Russo! I highly recommend him and his services.

Complete con man.  Had a consultation for Co2 laser only to find out that he was going to do Fraxell instead.  Paid him £1000 deposit but when I found out he wasn’t going to do the co2 I cancelled the treatment. I am in a fight now to get my money back as Mr Russo seems to think he can keep hold of it .  I would advise anyone to NOT to pay him any money up front.  Because if you decide not to go ahead he WILL keep your money

Everytime I come to BellaSpa I leave with the most beautiful nails! I’ve been coming here for a year now, and all of the staff, especially Angela, make such an effort to provide a welcoming experience and stunning nails. The range of colours and extras is always so impressive. Today I got builder gel extensions with pink chrome and catseye (as pictured). I highly recommend!

I got my nails done at Bella spa and I’m really happy with how they turned out. The nails look nice, and the staff did a good job overall. Everything was done carefully, and I left satisfied with the results. I would definitely come back again.

Had my acrylics removed and BIAB nails done at Bella Spa — such a great experience! I was seen straight away, and the service was excellent from start to finish. The nail technician was very precise and accurate, taking real care with the details. Definitely recommend! 💅✨

I got my nails done at Bella Spa, and I couldn’t be happier with the result! 💅✨ The design turned out exactly how I wanted the red French tips and floral details are so elegant and perfectly done. The nail tech was super gentle, detailed, and took her time to make sure every nail looked flawless. The atmosphere was clean, relaxing, and everyone there was really friendly. I’ve gotten so many compliments already definitely coming back for my next set! ❤️

Had the loveliest experience today at Bella spa! I came visiting in Manchester and popped into Bella Spa due to amazing reviews! The service was the best I’ve ever had (and I’m a regular nail salon customer!) would definitely recommend in a heartbeat!
Popped in on the off chance and had a walk-in blood pressure check there and then. It was really quick and easy. And the staff really helpful and friendly.

Very disappointing experience. I went today (07/10 at 15:00) to pick up my prescription, and the person at the counter was rude and unhelpful. I explained that I had collected my previous prescription just a week ago, but he gave me the exact same one again instead of the new prescription. I hadn’t even opened the package since I didn’t need it, yet he still charged me for it. I ended up paying just to avoid further argument. I’ll definitely be changing my local pharmacy after this experience.

Long very slow moving queue at till at 6pm (so not the lunchtime rush), not enough staff serving (not all tills were open, and no self service tills?) Shop is shabby as well. I gave up waiting and went to store at Piccadilly station, much nicer (and quicker). The Piccadilly gardens store had better range of travel minis though (or it would have got 1 star).

The man at the pharmacy was probably the rudest individual I’ve ever met in my life. Told me the product I asked for didn’t even exist and that I was talking about completely different products, rolling his eyes at me and really aggressive tone. When I pulled him up on it he decided to tell me it was me that was rude. Unfortunately didn’t get his name but occurred on 3/9/25 at abojr 15:45. Worst customer service I have ever received in my life if you use this boots please try and be served by someone else I’d you don’t want your day ruined

I came here to add my student id to the boots advantage card. I just asked the staff if he could help me with it. He just stared at me and said no. Even though just in front of the till, it was a promotion 10% discount for student? How ridiculous

Looking at the other reviews this shan’t be a shock. I had an extremely unpleasant experience at the Superdrug on Market Street and will not be returning.

We came in knowing exactly what we needed and had been in the store for no more than 30 seconds when we were abruptly told, in an assertive and rude manner, to go to the till. After walking barely five steps, we were told again this time in a very condescending tone that the tills close at 8pm so we “couldn’t make any payments.”

This is simply untrue, as the tills were still working. Giving customers false information just to rush them out goes against the Consumer Protection from Unfair Trading Regulations 2008, which are meant to stop businesses from misleading customers.

If a store wants to stop serving customers before closing time, that should be clearly and honestly explained. Customers who are already in the store before closing are still entitled to be treated fairly and with basic respect.

Because of how uncomfortable the situation felt, we made our way to the till anyway. While doing so, a third member of staff looked us up and down and rudely told us that we “needed to leave.” We explained that we had already been told three times and were literally heading to the till at that moment.

The experience at the tills was even worse. No smile, no customer service, and our items were scanned and thrown onto the counter, showing a complete lack of care or professionalism. By this point it was around 7:57pm, so clearly staff wanting to close mattered more than treating customers decently. It genuinely felt like the staff were ganging up on us.

As we were leaving, the first two staff members were huddled together talking about the remaining customers, which just summed up the attitude in the store.

I understand retail can be frustrating I’ve worked in retail myself but that does not excuse being rude, misleading, or unprofessional. You’d expect better standards, especially from someone who appeared to be a manager, but this seems to reflect the overall standards at the Superdrug Market Street store. Very fitting.

Disgusting attitude. Won’t be returning to Superdrug.

Came today to view the le male jean Paul fragrance (black bottle) the lady that served me was super rude the whole experience I was came through the whole interaction, I explained could I see a 75ml for reference, I understand if you don't have something but the way I was spoken to and looked at wasn't the greatest experience. For reference the lady who served me she has a head covering she seemed very approachable but after the interaction I don't feel the same way. It may have been not the way I viewed the interaction but will probably not feel as confident to ask for help next time.

Extremely unprofessional customer service. On 22nd of July, a young woman (I didn’t catch her name) deliberately scanned the items for the customer ahead of me very slowly, even though she knew I was in a hurry to catch my coach. When I politely mentioned it, she became rude. Instead of addressing her behavior, the team leader sided with her and was confrontational toward me as well. I’ve worked in retail and have never witnessed such disrespect. This staff clearly needs proper customer service training, because this was unacceptable.

The customer service that works in the morning on Mondays are honestly so rude. I asked a simple question and they spoke to me like as if I was bothering them AT THEIR JOB. Fix your attitude please or find a new job its actually ridiculous

I went in as I’d been referred from NHS direct to get a emergency prescription because I’m going on holiday tomorrow and realised I didn’t have enough medication for while I’m away. The lady at the pharmacy counter sighed when I told her and rolled her eyes when I asked her to repeat herself because my hearing isn’t great. Really poor service

Fabulous experience from entry to exit. Geri was extremely reassuring as I was nervous. Made me feel relaxed and was very good at her job. The receptionist Natalie was friendly and warm. I had filler and botox. Very satisfied with results. Will be back.

Just about wrapped up my sessions of laser surgery at Skin Medical and my experience couldn’t have been better! The doctors and receptionists alike carry polite and hospital attitude that makes you feel at ease and ready to endure the more often than not excurtiating surgery! Thanks a lot to them for their help in my journey and a massive reccomendation to anyone in the same situation as me.

Skin Medical have treated me exceptionally well for my course of laser hair removal. The whole team are a delight and the technicians are both incredibly professional while also welcoming and friendly. Cannot recommend enough for anyone looking into LHR, bonus points for the free coffee after each session!!

As a trans person whose run the gauntlet of both NHS and private care I can whole heartedly support this place for your laser hair removal. The nurses actually have qualifications while many other locations only have beauticians with training in in laser.

If there are any concerns they are eager to help or answer questions. Their advice is also really helpful and has always been informative.

Wonderful, friendly staff. Clean, modern equipment very efficient and considerate service (I had laser hair removal on the face).

Even provide a nice drink first!

Having struggled with acne for years I finally made an appointment to see a dermatologist and was excited to start taking steps toward healing my skin. Unfortunately i left feeling deflated and extremely dissappointed. To spend such a huge amount of money and wait for a month from the time of booking to be in the room for less than 4 minutes with a specialist who offered no advice, asked almost no questions and barely looked at me apart from to shove an ipad in my face to take pictures feels like some sort of prank. The lack of empathy and depth of inquiry for somebody coming to you for advice for a condition that can affect your confidence and quality of life was truly upsetting and I cried outside. Accutane was suggested as a treatment but not discussed in detail (hard to discuss anything in detail in 4 minutes)  and I left with a prescription for a topical gel that my doctor has given me on the NHS (for free) 3 times already that stops working when the course of treatment is over. I feel as though I was given two choices: accutane or the gel and to go on accutane requires intensive health checks first and isn't an avenue I want to explore. I thought I would receive recommendations for products to use as well as lifestyle advice and maybe learn something about my skin type or a new way I can try to heal my skin however I feel as though I was just another appointment to get out of the way and another chunk of money to make from someone's suffering. If people come to you as a specialist with a medical problem they are struggling with, I truly feel they should be made to feel listened to and not rushed or dismissed, that's why people go private.
To pay an additional £40 on top of the appointment fee for something I have been prescribed by a doctor 3 times already for free feels like I have actually been robbed.  My gp has offered more sympathy and solutions despite clearly not being as well funded as this clinic and in the future I will not be coming back here for treatment or advice as I left with neither and was £250 out of pocket.

Having now read some reviews i can see that this is an ongoing problem specifically for acne appointments and that other people have left feeling the same as me. As a wellness clinic I truly hope people start getting the care they deserve from you.

I paid £50 to speak to a specialist because I was getting so upset trying different things for my acne scars that weren’t working. I thought that if I was paying, I would be able to get some expert advice. I don’t have lots of money, I use all spare money I do have to try and fix my skin so I really had hoped this would help. Instead, I felt as though I was the one suggesting things that might help. Many of the suggestions were ‘yes perhaps’. She in the end suggested CO2 laser, which I had enquired about originally. I was then told, they don’t actually do it in Manchester. She took photos and emailed someone in Chester, with the response ‘I have emailed, but we’re busy so it’s unlikely she will even call you back’. I feel really upset that I paid £50 to come away more confused as to what I MIGHT need, to find out they don’t do it in Manchester as advertised and they don’t really care anyway as they are too busy. I would not recommend these at all. And after speaking to other clinics after, I was told they were not recommended. Avoid.

Shocking customer experience. Turned up for my appointment in Wilmslow, but it had closed down without warning despite having an sms reminder for that location that morning. To this date still haven’t been refunded for my appointment and it was over 5 weeks ago. They have however offered a refund of £2 for fuel. £2! Shocking.
Went to Bridgewater clinic in Manc. Great customer service from Reception and Dr Jamil was lovely and arranged the treatment i want.

Just turned up for my appointment at Albert square only to find the doors locked and no notice at all. Only after calling, it said they have "ceased all trading" and to visit the website. There is no other information or contact available or email... I have paid a lot of money for my treatments and they were going great with Jenny (who was fantastic). I am extremely disappointed and expect a full refund given I was promised a service after paying and I am no longer receiving due to the company ceasing trading.

I regularly shop at this Boots branch, mainly because of its convenient location in the city centre. The store layout is well-organised, and the product selection is generally very good. Under normal circumstances, I would have given a much more positive review.

However, one particular incident has completely affected my overall experience. During my most recent visit, I was at the self-checkout and needed age verification for one of my items. I waited patiently for around five or six minutes, even actively seeking assistance. Eventually, a male staff member came over, but unfortunately, his attitude was shockingly poor.

While helping the customer before me, he angrily slammed down their items, clearly showing visible signs of frustration—though I have no idea what he was frustrated about. When it was finally my turn, he didn’t say a word, brushed past me quite forcefully, tapped his card for verification, and walked away abruptly without making any eye contact or acknowledging me.

This kind of rude and dismissive behaviour is unacceptable, especially in a customer-facing environment. It left me feeling very uncomfortable and unwelcome.

It’s disappointing that such a negative interaction overshadowed what would have otherwise been a smooth and pleasant shopping trip. I sincerely hope the management takes this kind of feedback seriously and addresses the issue—a single poor attitude can drive loyal customers away.

Today I had an excellent customer service experience at Boots, and I genuinely felt the need to share it. One of the beauty team members in boots Arndale, @Tannaz, was absolutely amazing!

She was extremely polite, caring, and professional on the shop floor, and she gave me very precise and premium product advice for my wife. Her attention, patience, and genuine willingness to help made a huge difference to our visit.

Thanks to her effort, both my wife and I left the store very happy, and it was honestly one of our best first experiences at Boots. Boots truly needs more people like Tannaz—she is a real asset to the team.

Thank you so much, Tannaz, for your kindness and dedication. You made our day! I hope this message will seen by the managers there because they weren't there so we can informe them about our experience.

Went looking for some travel items, was struggling until my man Arif stepped up and helped me. Not only did he take me to the right place, he also had lots of banter. Top man and employee of the month for me.
Very good place to get some makeups and skin care products.

I visited boots,market street today and had such a great experience thanks to Liv. She was incredibly friendly, knowledgeable, and genuinely helpful. She listened to what we were looking for and found us some really great beauty products that fit perfectly. You can tell she really knows her stuff and cares about helping customers.

Liv made the whole visit enjoyable — highly recommend her

I had a great experience here! Had my nails cleaned and done again. The ladies are super nice and friendly and did an amazing job. Also really welcoming! Thank you again and looking forward to more visits. I would recommend if you live near the area. Also don’t forget to make an appointment first :) 🌸❤️

Laser

I am on my second session of laser and have had a really good response. My hair growth has significantly reduced can't wait to see the results after my 6th session. Also not having to shave or wax regularly is fabulous. I'm south Asian with dark hair so it has worked wonders for me.

Thanks to Kirby, super friendly and professional. Definitely recommend for all those that are considering, I would say go for it, definitely worth it in the long run.

I have been going to connie for a while now! her quality of work is amazing. not only do you get beautiful long lasting nails , the whole experience is just lovely. she always has a smile on her face and a welcoming aura. you'll always have the best conversations and walk away feeling happy and refreshed!

Penelope is absolutely amazing! I went to her for lip blushing and eyebrow microblading and I am in love with my results. From the moment I walked in, she made me feel comfortable, listened carefully to what I wanted, and gave such honest, professional advice.

My brows are now perfectly shaped and natural-looking and my lips have the prettiest soft colour, exactly what I hoped for. Her attention to detail is outstanding and you can really see how passionate she is about her work.

Thank you so much Penelope for making me feel more confident and beautiful.

I have been coming to this salon to get my nails and toes done by Connie. She is so professional with unmatched attention to detail. I’ve loved every single set of nails and have never been disappointed. She’s also one of the most welcoming people you’ll ever meet. I would highly recommend her to anyone!

When you call - they won’t pick up.
Also when you stand there to talk to them, they just continue to work on the computer without even looking at you. Very rude behaviour. Was the last time I pick my prescriptions from there.

Update- today I discovered they gave me the wrong amount of my medication. I called and the assistant was going back and forth between me and the pharmacist and when I asked to speak to her she hung up on me. That was the same young pharmacist that ignored me when I went to pick it up 2 weeks ago. You think it can’t get worse and then it does.

I regularly collect my prescriptions from this store as it’s near my office and they’re always ready promptly and they send me a text to confirm everything. The staff are always friendly and I never have to wait long.

I came here and asked the cashier if they have what I was looking for. But the guy at the cashier named Ali whom I asked seems to busy even though there was no one he taken care of, so his friend next to him promptly looked at me and tried to answer me.
But when she tried to answer me, Ali rudely told me to wait because there is someone that she was taking care of. Well, I saw that as well that was why I tried to asked Ali but he seemed to be busy even though there was no one he taken care of. Even when I tried to explained and asked about my query to him he did not let me finish talking and rudely forced me to wait to asked the other cashier.
I hope that Boots can teach customer service to this employee named Ali.
And the other cashier was nice and helpful. Maybe Ali can learn from her.

Very mixed service, with one excellent pharmacist previously (she seems to no longer work there) and now one utterly dreadful woman, with very poor listening skills, an abusively careless attitude, and evident lack of any interest in patient needs. Every time, with one standard repeat prescription, I have to come back about 3 times to finally get it filled. Overall: really poor stock management, they switch formulations without consultation, and they are only interested in their protocols which aren't fit for purpose and fail to ensure patients get their meds in a timely manner, leading to patients running out of meds, which is clinically negligent.

Very rude pharmacist works here who really shouldn't be serving members of the public. She also has little understanding of the regulations around over the counter medicine. Very poor experience in this store due to this lady. Shame because this store is on a route I use often- I will use the chemist a little further up the street in future.

Not a fake review, even added pictures of the haircut, report me all you want. Terrible shop, halfway through a haircut told me he'd been cutting hair for a few months. I think they meant a few moments because now I look like a homeless villian from the 1970s. And I still had to pay full price of £31.

I’ve been going to Maclures NQ for a while now, and it’s easily one of the best barber shops in town. The vibe is relaxed, and the staff are super friendly, but I’ve got to give a special mention to Lenny.

Lenny is fantastic. She’s not just great with the clippers. I’ve had a few cuts with her now, and every time I walk out feeling fres. She’s got this easygoing personality that makes the whole experience feel less like an appointment and more like catching up with a friend. Plus, her attention to detail is unreal—she doesn’t let you leave the chair until everything is perfect.

If you’re after a great haircut and a genuinely cool barber, you’ve got to book with Lenny. She’s honestly the best.

Genuinely one of worst hair cut experiences I’ve ever had. Had to stop the barber* half the way through as he was clearly drunk or high he was clearly out of it. Who I assume was the owner then finished the hair cut half way through and salvage what was left. He didn’t charge me and was very apologetic as he told me the guy was in medication. I hate to leave reviews for anything as I know how it can affect a business but this just wasn’t acceptable. Absolutely awful avoid at all costs.

I’ve been using Robson at Maclures for almost a year now since moving to Manchester. Always cuts my hair perfectly, but he also provides expert advice on styles and cut when I’ve grown my hair longer or want it shorter for example. Robson’s recommendations are always spot on and I really trust his judgement.

Booking in with him is simple and he’ll always try to move things around if he can to fit you in.
Couldn’t recommend him highly enough!
Cheers for sorting me out mate

I had an appointment for a haircut today with Lenny. She's an immaculate barber with an amazing personality and a great attention to detail, she's not like other barbers who are happy to just hack off hair with clippers. I couldn't be happier with the result :)

I had a great experience at Superdrug in Cheetham Hill. The store is clean, well-organized, and easy to navigate, with a good range of health, beauty, and skincare products. The staff were friendly and helpful, and the whole visit was smooth and pleasant. Everything was well stocked, and I quickly found what I needed. Overall, a reliable and convenient store — definitely worth visiting!
Had a good experience at Superdrug. Staff were friendly and ready to help, and the store was tidy and well stocked. Prices are fair and service was smooth. Recommended.
Good store lots of different items clean well kept however staff can be little chatty between themselves which is not terrible but not professional or polite.

Imaan was very helpful and knowledgeable in helping me choose a perfume.
Excellent customer service with a smile.
Thank you

There was no stuff in the tills, just one, the stuff lady was chatting with another customer and didn’t even look elsewhere and constantly talking, that was fine no problem. But the other 4 tills all were unaccompanied so I had to wait like 5 mins. Then a woman (stuff) came at another till, so an older woman went to that till to checkout before me because I didn’t notice that someone came so I let the elderly lady go before me, but the stuff was shelving up and didn’t even bother to check on her but just doing her work, I understand, fine with me! She made that elderly lady wait until she completed her work. The customer lady paid with cash and the cashier got busy checking if the £10 is real or fake, she was using no torch or anything just her eyes with weird expression, that was so embarrassing for the elderly woman. Then the elderly customer left the till after paying and I went forward, she was still checking out the £10 note that the lady gave, keeping me wait for another minute! No Hi, No thank you! She didn’t even speak at all or look at me. No greetings, nothing! She just made a grimace, scanned it and didn’t even bother to ask if I want to pay with cash or card, I had to ask her if I can pay with card? She didn’t even look happy when I wanted scan my Superdrug loyalty card! She looked very annoyed, no smile nothing! That arrogance, that attitude for what? This is not how you supposed to serve a customer! Very bad and awful behaviour. Never going back again to Cheetham hill Superdrug!!!
Very good music near boots pharmacy, I like it
Wonderful beauty therapy skills and always friendly and welcoming

Excellent service
Thank you, Faye, for my botox, lips, and Jalupro. You always give me the perfect look for my face and never give me what I don't need. This is why I traveled for one hour to see you. You are the best in the business.
Thank you for everything ❤️
10/10 customer service, lashes look natural but good & decent price !!! I think these were called cluster lashes ! :)
lovely staff but had my eyelashes done and they didn’t last 2 days never mind 10 days): bit gutted. But like I said,lovely staff and service just didn’t last long

Very professional and friendly people. Robin did an amazing job with my hair! Exactly just what I needed before Spring. She helped me to chose the colours it looked like she knew exactly what I wanted. I had low and highlights and it all came out fantastic! I'm very happy with my new hairstyle.

Had a nice hair cut before. Went in and asked to shorten a bit and shave where it was shaven before. She brutally chopped my hair off and made me look like a boy with horrible hair cut. She tinned them even if I didn’t ask for it at all. I am actually depressed. Came home after appointment and had a mental breakdown. I wouldn’t recommend this place at all. Lack of communication about hairstyle and hair in general wasn’t in place. I am actually ashamed to leave the house with this hairstyle. Horrible.
I rarely leave negative reviews, but it’s been 2 years since I lost my long hair after a texture release with this place. My first and last texture release!

Amazing hair salon, always provides amazing service and great results. I have been going here for two years now and I have done 4 colour treatments, keratin treatment as well as a texture release. Each time my hair has been handled with care and I have been given loads of information before, during and post treatment. I always leave House of Tinu feeling and looking absolutely beautiful and it’s always been worth every penny. The ladies are lovely and all very professional. You can tell they prioritise the client satisfaction and work really hard to achieve it . I definitely recommend
Fantastic  salon 😍  I love my braids, and also how you gave  me a new fringe  to help cover my hair loss. Thank you I'm so happy 😊

After not having my hair done for the past 3 years almost it was in a really bad condition and really long and tangled. I had the texture release treatment and a trim and it was amazing, it’s a lot more smooth and manageable now. Very thorough and professional service. Really happy with the results. Thanks so much.

By far the best salon experience I've ever had. After a not so great experience with another stylist that wrecked my hair doing my weave I thought I've leave the weaves and just never get another one. Then I found House of Tinu on Facebook and I'm so glad I did.

Tinu is so pleasant and lovely and she's done an amazing job with my hair, I have definitely found my new go to hair salon. Such an amazing place where I feel so comfortable. Look forward to many more visits in 2019 :)

BAD LASHES I  paid £60 for “hybrid” lashes the woman had clearly not done them before and was winging it on the phone asking how to do them properly, I came out with flimsy lashes rock hard glue, overlapping lashes that really hurt and bad quality all over. Really disappointed as I used to love this place. Absolute rip off, if someone can’t do a service don’t say yes just to take their money.
Everyone working here is so professional. I love getting my lashes done at Lily’s Beauty and Aesthetics. They are very fast and friendly and my lashes always last for 3 weeks+. Highly recommend.
I got a lash lift here and I highly recommend it! The results were amazing and everyone was extremely sweet.

I will be reporting this salon to Trading Standards if I don't get my refund. Don't ever and I mean EVER get henna tattoo from this place. I asked for brown first of all and they did the chemical red henna which is dangerous for sensitive skin. The woman who did my henna didn't have a clue what she was doing, the henna looked so disgusting I had to come home and literally scrub my skin so hard it's sore. I am going to get my money back and never return to this place ever again. They also were talking and laughing in their native language but I understood most of it, they were laughing about my henna that I got. I am so disgusted. My 7 year old saw it and said she could do better. I believe she could

I have been coming here for 11 years to do my eyes brows as man, every time I come here the people who work there are very nice and patient and give their 100% in the work they do. Neha (owner) does my brows and I am always a satisfied customer. I highly recommend this store if you want to look good.
Reception is very rude. Could not recommend.

I have come in today for a curly perm. the service and the outcome was absolutely outstanding!!! I am in love with my hair, the service and professionalism. Thank you for giving my hair a new lease of life!!!!❤️ Best in the business!!!

After many years of having extensions in my hair, I decided it was time for a change.  My daughter had recently visited Jed Techniques, leaving with amazing results.
It was lovely to go back to my original hairdressers from all those years ago, family vibes.
Denise and her staff are amazing.  It  was  really nice to see some old faces and new ones. The head massage i received allowed me to enjoy the best sleep in a long time, i am so happy with my results. Thanks again, JT2

Had the best experience getting my hair done for the first time here today. Denise, and all the other members of staff were so friendly and welcoming, they’ve created a really calm and inviting environment. Denise was amazing and has so much knowledge. My hair has not felt so soft and cared for in such a long time. Can’t wait to go back in six weeks. Thank you guys

Excellent service I take my daughter to get hair done. My daughter has a sensitive scalp and it hurts her to comb her hair. the staff are good with her and she doesn't cry when they comb her hair. I also used one of their specialist oils for my hair which was thinning and nearly balled I have noticed a significant Improvement in hair growth around that area of my head. Outstanding place
friendly staff.

Absolutely first class service and styling!!! JT2 never disappointed...had my first ever braids done today and just being in the salón was a delight, such a warm, relaxed and friendly atmosphere. Keesha did an Absolutely stunning job with my braids, so professional and perfect ❤️❤️❤️

Absolutely appalled at how I was treated a while back. I came in after work (in work clothes). They had their opinion of me the second I walked in. I got my lashes eyebrows and nails done. I wouldn’t usually go only I was desperate as I had to fly home for a funeral the next day and my usual lady had no appointments. A friend recommended the place. Midway through nails so ignorant speaking in their own language to each other. The colour I asked for was not the one I asked for so I said to her I didn’t pick that one I wanted the one I picked. She tried to convince me I was wrong, I’m not colour blind. Asked me half way through doing my nails to pay for everything!  I asked why now you’re not finished your service. She responded with just so you don’t chip the nails when you’re getting the money after they’re painted.  (That shouldn’t happen anyways) I asked why nobody else in the salon was asked as I was there a while and didn’t notice anyone else pay mid way through treatments. I asked to speak to a manager and she started talking to her in her own language I asked if she could stop that I would speak to her myself and she didn’t. After my treatments which I paid every cent for, I spoke to the manager asked what was the reason I had to pay mid way through treatment I was actually laughed at by all of them horrible ladies for asking a question. So unprofessional. I genuinely think it is because I am Irish and some people do think all Irish people are travellers which I am not. I would never ever walk in anywhere looking for treatments that I couldn’t pay for.  Never ever again. Horrible bunch of ladies. Made me feel like a complete scruff and so small. And as for the nails eyelashes and eyebrows I looked worse than what I first did when I walked in 🙈 horrible

I used to go there and get my nails done by one of the guys and never had a single problem. He was nice chatty and funny as well so the whole process was fun. Today I went there but he was off but i didn't think it would be much of a difference. The girl who did them was quite nice at first but started being a bit rude with time sometimes ignoring what I was saying to her. She rushed my nails made it super painful kept pulling and bending my fingers in an unpleasant way and for some reason the UV lamp was burning my fingers A Lot when I asked her about it she said it was normal and told me to put my hand back in there. It isn't normal UV lamps can be warm but not burn. Her tools weren't cleaned properly and she kept getting pieces of glitter in my nails and had to scratch it off. The final shape wasnt even and my nails are hurting now.

Nails didn't even last over a week, staff was rude, some of my nails were not shaped right, even when I asked her to sort it, got me to get my own colour from the shelf and then left me sat there when went to go and do someone's eyebrows, the nails had bubbles within, I could possibly say they were the worst set of acrylics I've ever got. Definitely not going back. Wouldn't recommend :)

DISGUSTING SERVICE!! DO NOT USE.

Ripped my partners nail off and left the rest in a right mess then laughed when she was crying. Horrible, horrible people.

If I could rate 0 star I really would. This disgusting business ran by horrid, horrid people should be closed down

Absolutely not worth the money paid 35£ for ombré nails and it looked crooked unprofessional. I couldn’t get my message across because lady tech couldn’t speak a word of English. I tried to tell her to fix things it was like speaking to a brick wall, deffo never again! Please by all means do not go ask a five year old to paint your nails they would do a great job compared to these idiots!
I had an aesthetic consultation and treatment with Mamuna Asrhrad. She is amazing.

Had my brows done with Liam. Tint and wax
He was great.  Listened to what I wanted regarding shape and colour.  Best colour I’ve had and the shape is perfect.  Such a lovely person too.  Nice to chat with him   You can see how much he enjoys his job which is refreshing. Thank you

Khan was amazing! Helped pick eyebrow products that fit my brows the best and even took the time to show me the shade on my natural brows. So lovely and had an amazing chat with him, so refreshing to see someone take the time out to help, especially in such a busy store 😅

Literally the most last minute appointment, I just showed up and the amazing Chloe looked after me with the best wax & tint but also a great chat, honestly would go back every week just for this lovely girl!! Amazing work on my brows and a very welcome break after a few hours of shopping. Thank you Chloe I wish you all the best 🥰x

I had a brow wax and tint with Liam and had such a fabulous experience. He was really knowledgeable and advised perfectly on finding my perfect brow shape and colour. thank you Liam my brows have never looked better! would highly recommend.

Kân did my brows today.   A wonderful, gentle experience filled with laughter and joy.   Exactly what you expect from Benefit.  Very skilled and knowledgable about the service and exactly which products would complement my skin type and tone.   Will definitely be booking back in on my next trip to Manchester.

Great store with supplements and some organic cosmetics. Love the tea options and refill station.
Knowledge and professional staff.
One of my favourite shops in manchester! From their wide range of supplements, to their knowledge on nutrition and as well  as the wide range of beauty and skin care products, this shop has it all!
Booking a facial massage, all using natural products which was a relief to know my skin is in safe hands. Plus healthy snacks and products to buy. Self care at its finest!
The gentleman that works here is such a nice guy. very patient and knows all about shoes. 5/5 for service

I had a nail emergency on NYE while visiting Manchester, my nail was damaged and broken most way through. Walking by we saw the sign and I ran in, on a client, but desperately hoping for any advice that the nail artist could provide. Both the client and the artist were understanding of my distress, thankfully, and she offered a solution until I could return home to my artist this week. It is almost a full week later and the nail repair is still going strong. Thank you so much for your professionalism and for being kind to a stranger that barged in on a holiday, unannounced.

I've been here three times now and really impressed every time. My last gel nails from here lasted for a month, no chips or breaks! Only got them redone because they'd grown out so much. The ladies who work there are lovely and super fast to take off gels. It's costs £25 to have gels taken off and new ones done. They also have a loyalty card! On your 6th visit you get 20% off 😊 really nice selection of colours and they always shape my nails the way I want them. Really happy with them and a great location. Always busy so book an appointment to avoid disappointment

An amazing place with such a nice atmosphere, you can almost forget you are in a busy city centre, and can really relax.
The prices are reasonable and affordable (£25 for gels with an extra £3 for design / 10 gems) for such a good service too.

Also, staff are welcoming, friendly, professional and very patient with you - letting you take your time to choose the design/ colour you want, and not rushing the job.
Especially if you get Erica, she's very talented, a lovely person and you're in great hands!!
I had a hard gel session with Erica. I love and loved my nails. She is also so nice to talk to. Overall it was an 10/10 experience. So happy to find myself a nail salon I was really satisfied with.

I went in to ask if there was an appointment available, as I’ve never had my nails done before. I asked how long the technician had been doing nails and, in a lighthearted way, mentioned that I hoped they would turn out well. She responded by saying that if I was going to be fussy, she’d rather not do my nails and asked me to leave. I was already seated but got up and left as requested. Overall, I found her interaction quite rude and confrontational

Had my nails done there and the guy that’s there that did my nails had very poor customer services. And when the acrylic nail came Off with half of my real nails 🤢. When I went to complain the guy was very aggressive towards me. I wouldn’t recommend anyone to go there to be honest

I had absolutely amazing experience with Mitra. From the moment I arrived, she made me feel so relaxed, safe, and completely at ease with her calm and caring presence. I had a Hollywood wax and underarms, and the service was professional, gentle, and done with so much attention to detail. The results are flawless. My skin feels unbelievably smooth and well cared for. This was such a luxurious experience and I left feeling confident, comfortable, and glowing. I will definitely be returning and highly recommend booking with Mitra if you want premium results and exceptional care.

Mitra was excellent. Super quick, comfortable, I literally had zero issues. Really happy with her work. Everything felt clean and private, made waxing less scary.  Definitely returning. Thank you again.

If you want to feel pampered, avoid. I'd give the experience itself 1 star, and the results 3 stars. I had eyebrow shaping and tinting (they thinned my brows too much) and LVL (they gave my eyelashes a totally generic shape and used a medium shield when I typically use a large). Experience-wise, expect lots of noise, the stylist coming in and out of the room. It might be good for you if you don't mind the experience too much and aren't looking for spa-like vibes.

Mitra did my eyebrows and it was not good. I was really disappointed as it had taken me so much of patience to slowly grow out my eyebrows so that I could get them properly threaded and shaped. I needed this done before an event and was extremely disappointed at the result. She made it too thin (strange in this day and age), the threading was not gentle and felt like she didn’t know what she was doing. I will not be returning. I will say that Mitra was a nice girl but based on her skills it was an bad threading experience for me.

Absolutely the best waxing experience I’ve had! Raman is honest, professional, quick and has incredible attention to detail. She’s also very flexible and accommodating to individual needs, which makes such a difference. Her eyebrow shaping is the best I’ve ever experienced — precise and flattering every time. On top of her skills, she’s warm and pleasant, which makes every appointment comfortable and stress-free. Highly recommended!
Saw Shakeela for the very first time. She was so friendly and professional! And my results were amazing. Couldn't recommend enough, if you're in two minds, go and see her!
Shakeela is a miracle worker! I travelled all the way from London to see her and she has transformed my eyebrows! Thank you so much Shakeela :) x

Great experience at Shavata Singh Studio!

I had a wonderful experience today at Shavata Singh Studio. Shakeela did my eyebrow threading and she did a great job. She is very gentle, professional, and precise. I’m really pleased with how my eyebrows turned out. The place was spotlessly clean and the atmosphere was calm and welcoming, which made the whole appointment feel very relaxing. I highly recommend Shakeela at Shavata Singh for anyone looking for high-quality eyebrow care in a clean and professional setting!

Had a great experience with Nagina - she is incredibly talented and gentle, and always makes me feel very confident with what treatments to choose and which colours will suit me best. I can highly recommend her - all round a super experience. Five stars!!

I visited Shavata this week for eyebrow threading and a lash lift with Nagina, and I couldn’t be happier with the results. I’ve been going to Nagina for years because she consistently delivers exceptional service with a warm and friendly manner. She takes great care to ensure I always leave feeling confident and completely satisfied. I trust her expertise wholeheartedly – thank you, Nagina! :)

Update: to give ANOTHER 5 stars friendly staff recommendations are for your benefit - done my hair a lovely light fawn brown (2nd photo) instead of bleaching my roots too much! 10 stars total!

Bleached my roots and very kind & friendly - thank you girls xx 🩷

This might be the 2nd review I’ve ever written. But I have to say my experience here warrants it. Lauren was super patient and worked with me to figure out what exactly what I wanted and I really appreciated her expertise and input to create a haircut that balanced what I wanted and what would look good and work for my lifestyle. Going in I had a few things I wanted to achieve and she took her time to figure out how to translate those into a haircut that I’m super obsessed with! She also has experience cutting all different hair types. Specifically my coarser Asian hair which is what I was looking for. She’s also hilarious which is a bonus! Thanks again. I left feeling great :)))

I've been going here for many years for anything from trims to colouring and always been super-satisfied with the results.  Yvonne goes over and beyond to give great advice and really cares about making sure I leave the salon happy.  Great communication and friendly staff.  Highly recommend this salon.
Thanks Sarah for giving me a new face! I feel like flying without wings. My hair is now bouncy and healthy. Sarah took great care of each step of the process. She also gave me great tips to follow.

This place is awesome. Everyone makes you feel welcome and they do a fantastic job. My deepest thanks to Sarah, Lucia, Jasmine and Malacchi for helping me get the wavy long blue hair style I've always wanted. You are all fantastic.
Beautiful place, Lovely spa day had here just dissapointed as we were told that the back, neck and shoudler massage included a scalp massage then didnt. Staff were lovely though and we would return.

We had such an amazing time here yesterday for my mums birthday. Everything from the lunch, spa facilities, the massage treatments and customer service was efficient and fantastic. Will definitely be booking a spa day again soon! Thank you

For context, I visit a spa at least once a month so have a good idea of standards/expectations. I visited on a Friday afternoon, having booked the afternoon tea spa experience through Spa Breaks - excellent value at around £90. Yes, the facilities are slightly limited, but if you've the food and treatments to enjoy, it's absolutely fine as a place to spend a few hours. The afternoon tea itself is served with a glass of champagne, unlimited tea from a selection and food/service fab. My express facial treatment, which I also added a massage to, was fabulous and incredibly relaxing - thank you to Baneen who is an excellent therapist. Staff were attentive, facilities clean and well maintained, and I found the relaxation room a great place to chill with a book...especially after a late night beforehand!

Came here years ago and it was lovely. Went for my birthday a few months ago and the hot tub had mold all around, steam room was nice, the relaxation room was not relaxing lots of people talking loudly and can overhear staff. Its far from relaxing or luxurious. The beds feel dirty as so many people sit in them. I had a body scrub and the lady asked me to wash in changing rooms despite their being a shower in the treatment room. She said this was for the next lady. Its ok but not so amazing that I would go back.

Booked a last minute massage after a busy few weeks of work and left feeling absolutely amazing! I booked the serenity signature therapy and was looked after by Mia G who was incredible and I can’t thank her enough. The whole spa was beautiful and all the staff were lovely, I will definitely be coming back

I visit Manchester twice a year for a month at a time  from US. I was desperate to find a place to do a refill on my extensions as well as a manicure. Well I found it! London Lash has been amazing , I wish I could pack them up and take them all back with me. I have returned several times now. The quality of work is phenomenal- touch is light as a feather and my lashes last . Nail service is equally fantastic. I have never had such good cuticle work . Thank you to everyone for always being so friendly, professional and helpful. Whenever I reach out from across the pond to book an appt they reply promptly. Until next time ! Cheers Marina, Valentina,Ilya and Lily x

Best eyelash extensions I’ve ever gotten in my life, the salon is very clean and feels so comfortable and relaxing. Also I did biab nails and it’s so natural and not thick at all very professional work and I can never go to any other salon for these services. The best in Manchester.

First time here and definitely not the last! Valentina was amazing 🤩 so lovely and took the time to explain lash aftercare clearly. I’ve already recommended London Lash to my friends and they’re booking in too! 💕
Had my lashes done for the first time yesterday - amazing results. Thank you so much Olya, you were so lovely and made me so relaxed, knew I’d fall asleep it was so nice.

Had an amazing BIAB nails treatment. The service was professional, relaxing and very well done. My nails look so natural and strong with biab and the finish is perfect. You can really feel the quality and care. Highly recommend.
Had my gel nails done by Michelle today and I absolutely love them! Both Michelle and Maria are so lovely and made me feel more than welcome on my first visit - can't wait to go back! Thank you 😀
Great salon. Maria is very experienced. I can't comment on other services as I have only had waxes here but they are fantastic. She never rushes the appointment and gets every hair out
Went for a couples massage yesterday, it was a lovely experience :) Adrian even came to find us later in Manchester because we'd left a bracelet behind, great people!
Great treatment from Maria who was very accommodating when I ran late. Thanks again for your kindness and professionalism.
Professional fast and painless wax with super friendly staff

I had a fantastic experience at Nataya Beauty! 😍 From the moment I walked in, the atmosphere was warm and welcoming. I had my nails, waxing, eyebrows, and pedicure done, and each service was handled with such professionalism and care. The owner, Nat, is incredibly skilled and attentive, ensuring I was comfortable throughout. My nails looked absolutely stunning! 👌 To be honest, I’ve had my brows done at other places before, but they never turned out quite right. For the first time in my life, my brows were shaped perfectly here! The pedicure was also so relaxing and truly pampering.🥰 I genuinely appreciate their attention to detail and high-quality service. I’ll definitely be coming back and highly recommend Nataya Beauty to anyone looking for top-notch beauty treatments!
Thank you so much Nat! ❤️

I’ve been getting gel nails and eyebrow tint, wax and lamination done by Nataya for a while now, and I wouldn’t go anywhere else! Her attention to detail and care is second to none.
