Her gel nail technique is much more gentle on my nails than I’ve experienced from other nail techs, she also does amazing nail art! With my brows she mixes up a custom colour to suit my skin tone, and I get them waxed and laminated which is again the most gentle for my skin I’ve ever had done by a beautician. On top of her brilliant treatments, she’s a lovely person and based right in Manchester City centre so super handy to get to. I would recommend Nataya to everyone.

I had a disappointing experience elsewhere, so I booked with this salon and I’m so glad I did. Huge thanks to Sam for fixing my previous Hollywood wax - she spent 30 min making sure every hair was properly removed! Nataya was also lovely and made me feel comfortable when I booked over the phone. Professional, friendly, and highly recommended!
I always get my nails done with Tarani, she is always so kind and does the most beautiful nails 🩷 highly recommend (these are biab on natural nails)

Wow! What a lovely lady and a really wonderful experience. Thank you for such a lovely manicure with shellac. I couldn't be more delighted. We had a lovely conversation with brilliant background music and my nails are beautiful. Super easy to find, just above Starbucks, door with buzzer to the right. Up the spiral staircase to the 1st floor. Easy to book online and brilliant communication. Highly recommended!

I had a natural facelift massage from Sian and it was amazing. It felt incredibly indulgent and was very relaxing - I wasn't aware how much tension there had been in my face. My skin has felt lovely since and looks great. Sian is professional and very skilled, and I can definitely feel the benefits of this massage technique. I'll be booking in again soon, and would certainly recommend this treatment.

Sian's facial was unlike any other beauty treatment I had undergone before. The products are amazing and my skin felt glowing and radiant afterwords. I also felt so deeply relaxed I could have fallen asleep! Highly recommended.

Firstly Sian’s therapy room is one of the most tranquil therapy rooms I have ever been in, when I was having my natural facelift massage I couldn’t believe that I was in Manchester city centre. The massage was very relaxing and my skin feels great. Sian is very professional and also has great knowledge in terms of how you could change your lifestyle health wise. Definitely will be returning and would recommend this to anyone old or young.

I absolutely would recommend the facelift massage with Sian. I thoroughly enjoyed my whole experience and shall be returning. Sian made me feel extremely relaxed and my skin felt amazing when I left. The building itself was gorgeous. Sian explained the treatment to me and the benefits of the products she would be using. She was very friendly and professional and I would recommend her to anybody.
A gentle facial massage using Neil's Yard products.  My skin not only felt wonderfully soft afterwards but it felt firmer too and the puffiness under my eyes was reduced. A truly relaxing experience.

Lovely room, handy location but it was the service made it for me.
After a unfortunate mistake by myself. My booking complications were solved whilst being given some of the best hospitality I've ever received.
Thanks to Ben, Stephen,Laz and krzysztof you smashed it 👍

Booked a 55 minute hot stone massage on Sunday for £115, which compared to Nini Spa round the corner is more expensive. The Spa itself is lovely and the receptionist was great, however the actual treatment only lasted 40 minutes. When I came out and asked the receptionist if this was correct she said no, it should have been 55 minutes and would get a manager to call me the next day (yesterday) I received no contact which is disappointing as I was looking a new place to get my massages done and the actual massage was good, just  wanted the full amount of time I actually paid for!

I visited Retreat Salon after seeing that it was award-winning, but honestly, I don’t understand what the awards were for.

I paid £94 expecting a high-quality facial experience, but what I received was very basic — things I could have easily done myself at home. The treatment included simple makeup removal, face washing, and light exfoliation. No extractions were done, and when I asked the manager, she said: “This is what we offer, we don’t do extractions.”

The consultation with the therapist was nothing more than identifying my skin type and asking if I’m on any medication — no real discussion or skin analysis. The facial was supposed to be 50 minutes, but about 20 minutes of it was basic cleansing, and the rest was a very standard scalp and shoulder massage that didn’t feel professional or therapeutic.

On top of all that, the therapist had bad breath, which made the experience uncomfortable.

I left the salon with my skin still feeling clogged, and the blackheads were still clearly there. For £94, I expected proper care, visible results, and a level of expertise that just wasn’t there. Definitely not worth it.

If you are expecting a spa experience, this isn’t it.

There are treatment rooms but no spa facilities, the ‘relaxation room’ is just two beds (not very clean) right next to two of the treatment rooms. There is no spa feel whatsoever.

The changing rooms are quite frankly, disgusting. There was dirt, mould, sewerage smell, lack of towels, extremely dated. The water in the showers also had an odd smell to it, I rinsed my hair as I’d got salt in it from the floating tank & my hair smelt like sewer water.

The floating tank experience was ok, but the room it was in was small & the shower didn’t work, which meant after the tank, you couldn’t rinse the salt off. Due to this, it meant salt went on the bed and floor in the communal areas & the staff member was rude when she saw this.

We had lunch in the bar and the food was appalling, unfortunately, I didn’t take a picture but I’d ordered a Thai chicken salad and just got given some plain chicken and some raw veg? The staff in the restaurant were also not pleasant.

For a 5* hotel, this really isn’t a 5* experience!! For the prices, you can go to a proper spa or even a treatment spa and have a much more enjoyable (& cleaner) experience!!

I booked RE:TREAT as one of the activities for my sister's hen party, and I have nothing but positive things to say about the entire experience. Natasha, the spa manager, was incredibly helpful and accommodating; nothing was too much effort for her.

When our group of 19 arrived, we were greeted with a warm and bubbly welcome. The staff were all very polite and helpful. The facilities were lovely and clean, and our prosecco was waiting for us on ice.

We enjoyed body scrubs and neck, shoulder, and back massages, which everyone thoroughly enjoyed. Some even said it was the best massage they have ever had.

I just want to thank the entire team—Natasha, Becca, Vikky, Michelle, Jodie, and Sophia—for making us feel so welcome and relaxed. I would definitely recommend The RE-TREAT to friends and family.

Thank you!

Palomas Beauty deserves every bit of praise it gets. From the very first moment you walk in, the atmosphere feels welcoming, calming, warm and the most important for me genuinely caring.

The customer service, led by Grace, is outstanding, the staff set the tone with their professionalism, kindness and attention to detail. Grace makes every visit feel personal and is never rushed, and her team follow that example perfectly.

The sauna experience is exceptional. It’s deeply relaxing, therapeutic and noticeably improves how I felt both physically and mentally - melts away the stress!  After just one session I felt lighter, calmer and revitalised.

I don’t generally write reviews but I want to share my experience because the guys deserve a positive review! So, if you need a treatment or massage (massively recommended!) you will definitely be very well looked after here!

Highly recommended! 👍🏻🙌🏻

- L

I’ve been going to Paloma’s Beauty for 2 years, and Gracie is absolutely amazing. She truly understands what’s right for your skin and always recommends the perfect treatment. She makes sure you feel comfortable, relaxed, and well taken care of every visit. I also had a massage treatment after a bad cold that included cupping, which was incredibly helpful. If you’re into alternative treatments, this is the place to go. Highly recommend!

Absolutely phenomenal Dermalogica facials every single time! I wouid not go or trust anywhere else!
Grace is so lovely, experienced and knowledgeable.
Just about to book again for my monthly glow up ♡ Thank you ♡

I have been coming to Grace for facials for the past 7 years and I couldn’t recommend her more. She is incredibly knowledgable, full of advice and knows skin thoroughly. She does Dermologica facials and extractions, often noticing subtle changes in my skin and always remembering my skin type and goals.

The BEST facialist in manchester hands down 💆‍♀️🧖‍♀️🧴🧘‍♀️

Amazing package and treatments. Such great value for money. Grace was an amazing therapist that went above and beyond. Even sharing insights and recommendations on aftercare and ways to look after tense muscles etc other than massage. I will definitely be back.

We paid for a couples massage over 100 pound and there was music blasting the whole time! The worst experience I’ve ever had, we complained the whole time during the massage and after coming out, we expressed how unhappy we were yet again, for the women to give us 25 pound back and essentially told us it’s our fault for not saying stop and to go to the police, absolutely ridiculous customer service care and establishment will never go again.

Didn’t even want to rate it 1 star. Surprised my fella with a couples massage as we’ve been regular customers for a couple of years, to only 5 minutes into the massage there be a loud banging on the walls and very loud music being placed and continued through the whole hour. As we told them the music was annoying us and we couldn’t relax there response was laughing saying “ you should come earlier always loud banging on weekends”. Which we know isn’t true as we’ve always come on weekends. When we told the manager about our complaints she was awfully rude and told us “we can only give back 20% as it’s not our fault if you don’t like it get the police involved”. I’m absolutely disgusted in how the manager spoke to us and will not be returning.

Tucked away in a cute courtyard, really cosy location and the therapists were really sweet. The massage was FANTASTIC, a truly wonderful experience and 100% I will return. If you want the best massage you’ve had in a long time, Sarasin spa is the place.

I wish there was an option for more stars! I am still at Sarasin Spa & feel transformed I had to immediate write a review. My mind, body & soul has been revitalised. I feel new & relaxed. The pressure was perfect, the technique was incredible & I was transported to another dimension. I will 💯 percent be returning every time I am in Manchester. Thank you so much! Obsessed! Tempted to book another.

I had my first Thai massage here today with Tina. It was the best Thai massage I’ve ever had. The spa is beautiful, Tina was so friendly and professional.
The treatment was incredible from start to finish and I left feeling like I was floating :) thank you Tina and I will be back next month x

Definitely recommend LVL !!! I’ve had so many lash lifts at other salons and my lashes just don’t lift. This salons LVL technique (Done by Ishi) is amazing. The ladies are lovely and welcoming and are always asking if I was comfortable. Will be coming back here. Just bring cash as it’s a £1.50 fee to use card. Recommend.

Fantastic Experience at LILLY NAIL AND BEAUTY SALON MANCHESTER!
I had such a wonderful experience at Lilly Nail and Beauty Salon. The whole team was incredibly professional, knowledgeable, and friendly from start to finish.

Ishi did an amazing job on my eyebrows …..she really listened to what I wanted and shaped them perfectly.

Kady worked on my nails, and I couldn’t be happier. She was precise, patient, and really knows her craft.

Hallie did my eyelashes, and they turned out beautifully. She made me feel completely comfortable and explained everything throughout the process.

Everyone here is so welcoming and skilled. I left feeling pampered and confident. Highly recommend this salon and these lovely ladies 💕✨

Nicky did an absolutely amazing job on my lash extensions. She was so patient and calm while doing the treatment. I also enjoyed our conversation; she talked so nicely and reassured me when we talked about life in general. Very much looking forward to having my lashes done again soon.

Every time  I come here I am never disappointed. From birthday nail designs to elegant nails - even when I need a “red reset” lol. Demi and Katie are amazing nail techs. I also get my brows done with immaculate precision here. They make you feel welcome and aim to make sure you love your set - what ever you decide to try. I really enjoy coming here! Love my Frenchies today 🥰🥰🥰

Nails chipped after only a few hours.
Also my cuticles have not been removed properly. Very disappointing for 32£.

Further update after only 3 days, it’s not holding! Such poor quality
I LOVE HQ barber friendly Happy staff . I been doing my hairs with over 7 years Highly Recommended
Great place, fair prices, good vibes, positive atmosphere and friendly staff!! They’ve been in the barbering game for years and still going strong! Love the new shop and set up too!
The best barbers in Manchester!! I’ve been going for over 5 years now, I’ve tried a few other barbers in the local area and no one comes close to the skill level this shop has!

Had my haircut today from Kofi. One of the best skin fades I've ever had, very good trim! Kofi is a great bloke and I felt very comfortable with him throughout the cut. Will definitely be back soon! Would highly recommend for anyone looking for a new barber
John is an amazing barbe, very patient and kind. He makes you feel part of what he is doing, enjoying having haircut each time I come. Highly recommend

I had a balayage treatment with Carole and (I’m sorry I didn’t quite catch her name, I think it’s Rose?) yesterday and, wow.

Firstly and honestly, I know the price is probably considerably higher than your local salon down the road, I get that. It took me a while to just ‘bite the bullet’ and book the appointment - but wow, I am SO glad I did. I have found my new regular, go-to salon after years of searching! Although it financially stings that my now-firm-favourite salon is perhaps considered ‘high end’ -  it is the definition of you get what you pay for, and I am more than happy to do so!
I had two, sometimes three hair stylists working on my hair at all times - I honestly felt like royalty, or a VIP at the least!😅 I’ve never been treated so well in a salon, I can’t even describe it! It made the world of difference to my whole experience and I was just beaming. Carole and the team worked MIRACLES on my hair, I could not stop smiling from the moment my hair was dry (so I was able to see it properly), to when I left 40 mins later and that was only because I couldn’t see my hair anymore! The colour is even better than the inspiration photos I showed, and the roots blend into my lengths so seamlessly, I’ve never know anything like this artistry to be honest! The cut and style is also phenomenal - the neatest and overall best haircut I’ve ever had! I cannot thank Carole and Rose(?) enough for the self-confidence and happiness in my hair they have given me.

They were all so beyond lovely, friendly and kind too. Honestly incredible treatment and experience from beginning to end, I just love my hair now so much and it means so much to me that I can finally say I do love it!
I actually can’t wait to go back for my roots refresh and to treat myself to their keratin hair treatments and Brazilian blow dry over my next few appointments!🥰

I have been going to Carole for years now and there is no better salon in Manchester, especially for blondes. The colour remains a beautiful shade of blonde even after the toner fades which no other salon has managed to achieve as it tends to go brassy over time. Due to the high quality products the salon uses this never happens and my hair quality has never been better. Carole always takes the time before the appointment to understand what colour and style I want to go for and no ask is ever too much. The service at Antonacci is extremely professional and all the staff are so kind and polite. I would never go to another salon now I have Antonacci and Carole. Thanks so much for my perfect blonde hair! 🩷

Carole is so lovely and I recommend her wholeheartedly! It is a lovely, stylish and calm salon with great music. The products used make me keep sniffing my hair. I’ve just had side bangs cut which I love and last year I had lots of layers cut which was also so good! I wish I could get a blow dry every day. I’ll post a photo of my hair cut so you can see for yourselves 💕

Had a great experience at the salon. I got a men’s haircut and hair toning, and I’m really happy with the result. Carole was amazing, very friendly, paid attention to every detail, and clearly knows what she’s doing. The place has a great vibe and the service was excellent. I’d definitely come back and recommend it.

My experience with Antonacci Hair Salon has been outstanding!  Their professionalism, expertise, and gracious service has been a pleasure.  Ele has been nothing short of amazing with her expertise in color and hair treatment, and styling.  I absolutely love her “signature blonde” color for my hair!  She has nursed my hair back to being very healthy and radiant.  Carole has also been delightful with excellent skills in her color and style techniques.  I would highly recommend this hair salon.  You will not be disappointed.

I've just been here or a massage, and I was very pleased with the service. Its in a strange location, on the 3rd floor above Wing Yip, I was convinced I was in the wrong place...but there it was on the third floor opposite an accountants office. The lady was called "Sofie', and she was very attentive and friendly. I had a 90 minute massage, which was a combination of "hot stone" massage, and manual, and also "Thai style", where she uses her body weight to add pressure and to stretch. She made sure I was comfortable, and that the pressure was the way I wanted it.  Its not a fancy place, but it's; clean, warm, affordable and I was very well looked after. I'll definitely come again.

*Edited AGAIN to respond to more lies below. As I said on my initial edit, no-one on the phone mentioned a junk folder, so how could someone apologise for something that was never discussed? Maybe this happens a lot and you are confusing me with another customer. Also your insane lie about me mentioning reviews is disgusting. I'm not an influencer and don't try to be, I didn't even realise I had that many reviews, you have obviously just counted and then lied, or if indeed you were threatened, it was a different customer!

If you had just apologised for not apologising, I would have tweaked this review, but you have doubled down with more lies. Absolutely mind blowing.

*Edited my review to add this - the owner has replied to say they mentioned something about my emails going into their Junk folder - this is just a lie, no-one on the phone mentioned a junk folder or apologised for ignoring my emails, now you look worse for lying rather than just owning it*

I bought a voucher for my wife for Christmas 2024.

Fast forward to October this year and we decide it's time to use it, not realising it's a 6 month expiry and not 12 months.

Completely my fault, didn't realise.

I email Youth Spa to see if anything can be done, no reply. I wait a week and email again, no reply.

Finally 2 weeks later I thought I best call up, in case I'm getting the email wrong only to be told that they did receive my emails but the expiry date is a hard rule.

This rating isn't because they couldn't do anything with the expiration date, that's on me. This rating is because they ignored my 2 emails rather than just letting me down gently.

Its a real shame I didn't get the chance to experience the spa, I can see lots of good ratings, but I can only go off the service that I received.

Nice atmosphere
Booked in for all body massage.
Relaxing and refreshing.
Well worth it.
A must visit

Amazing! Absolutely amazing! Me and my friend went for the stress relief massage. They definitely did an amazing job. I have had massage done in Turkey and Morocco and honestly for 1hour 40min this was worth it. The package came with back massage, hand and foot plus a facial. I was satisfied and so was my friend. We even got a cup of drink and water and we drank it with a foot bath! Thrilled.

Great place for authentic massages that seeks to help your muscles. I got a Gua Sha knot racking massage that remove knots I had for years and allowed my muscles to realign my body structure. Not for the faint hearted. I highly recommend this place
Paid £377 for spa December 2019 , not able to contact them phone not working and not replying to emails, can’t believe they are still selling packages. Will be taking this further , Rip off ?!?
No phone number to speak with anyone,  no refund given as communication has stopped. Do not buy this voucher.
Wonderful service and excellent value.  I would highly recommend it. My sister and I had a fantastic day
9 years of using this company for my hair systems and I'm never disappointed. Genuinely been lifechanging. Thank you TCP! Also, their money-back guarantee is what made me try them in the first place!

Very pleasant on arrival.
Explained everything in great detail.
Overall we was happy and left feeling very comfortable for our next visit.

It was great to meet Jack and discuss the hair system today. I felt really reassured and Jack answered all of my many questions, extremely professional and lots of knowledge to share about the system and the maintenance. Finally taken the plunge and looking forward to having the system fitted in a few week. Many thanks Jack for all your help today.

I have been using 209 Hair Studios for nearly a year now and I’m so glad I found them! I was always really insecure about my thinning hair so did a bit of research on what I can do as an alternative for hair transplants and learnt about hair systems then came across 209 Hair Studios Manchester. I booked my consultation with Jack who explained everything very well and addressed any concerns I had. Needless to say I was sold and booked my first appt and it went well and I was happy with the results. Since I have been coming back monthly and been looked after Jack who always does a great job! I always walk away satisfied. If you’re wondering if you should go with these guys, I think you should book a consultation. And give it a go! It changed my life.

Been thinking about having this done for a long time, finally booked in with Jack who made me feel very comfortable and explained everything clearly. Measured me up went back for the fitting. After the fitting met my wife in Manchester..... To say she was absolutely shocked is an understatement 🤣 she left me bald and came back to a new man. She says it's taken at least 15 years off me.... I no longer look 65 (well I didn't before) but boy do I look and feel younger now. Absolutely love the transformation and will definitely be a returning customer. Jack's brilliant at the job , highly recommended. Thank you

Today was my first-ever hair appointment in the UK (after moving from the Philippines) and I couldn’t be happier with the experience. I booked a hair detox treatment and haircut with Andrew, and from start to finish, everything was just great. He was attentive, skilled, and genuinely made me feel at ease. My hair feels lighter, healthier, and styled exactly how I envisioned.

Finding the right salon on your first try feels really impossible, I was anxious when booking - hoping I won't regret my appointment. That's why I’m so glad everything turned out perfectly. It's also a bonus that the place was really posh and aesthetic. Thank you Andrew (and Avesta), for making this such a memorable start to my UK hair journey! 🩷

My 3rd visit to Avesta hair salon as always loving the vibe here!
I wanted to refresh my hair colours, Andrew my hair stylist was fabulous he was very incentive and took care of my hair for colouring/hair treatment explain it very well to what was best for my hair colourings so I trusted him. He has very good attention to details too so I’m very happy with the results thank you.

My first visit to Avesta was a great experience! The salon has a lovely atmosphere, and everyone was very welcoming, friendly, and professional. Anita did an amazing job with my curly hair; she really understood what I wanted and gave helpful suggestions. The haircut turned out beautifully. I also appreciated the nice coffee and the relaxing head massage and the massage chair while my hair was washed. I definitely recommend! Thank you :)

I had my hair done with Anita today and I am beyond happy with the results! I haven’t had my hair done for years and was apprehensive about getting it dyed but she was so reassuring and I could tell that she really cares about delivering top quality hair styling. My balayage is so beautiful, seamless and exactly what I wanted!! I would recommend booking in at Avesta salon, all the staff were lovely and so talented! Thank you so much, I am so happy with my new hair!

If I could give 100 stars I would! I came to Avesta to have my hair colour corrected & transformed by Anita herself. I felt honoured to have her time & attention for the whole day. I’ve never been so shocked & happy with the way my hair looked when it was revealed to me. I havnt had the best time with my hair over the years, but for the first time in a long time I’m so incredibly happy with it! Anita & her team went above & beyond during my appointment to make me feel like a “pampered princess”. Especially with the massage chair at the back wash area, WOW! The way the team work together is incredible. Such a stunning salon & academy, beautiful team of people, & offering bespoke treatments tailored to your desires & dreams. Thankyou for my new hair, my lovely lunch, & luxurious treatments. I already can’t wait to come back! ❤️
Can’t rate Tammy enough, her facials are unbelievable and she’s taken years off me. There is no one else I’d go to now for my Botox and peels ect.. xx

Home from home, always made to feel comfortable and welcome.
Tammy and Collette go above and beyond. Super professional and passionate about their work
Great service for an even better price. I was so happy with my hair!
As always had a nice experience It was great watching the girls do lots of makeup for a Halloween party very talented and thank-you Scott love my hair

Fab Salon, all the staff are brilliant at what they do, I have a variety of treatments of different members of staff and have never been disappointed, would highly recommend for your hair and beauty treatments

I came for my bridal hammam, and it was such a wonderful experience! We came as a group, and everything was perfectly organized — the place was clean, relaxing, and beautifully set up. The staff were extremely kind and welcoming. Highly recommended! 💕

Wanted to treat my mum whilst she was visiting from Canada and Nadia’s hamam was the ultimate experience! Absolutely fantastic staff who are very attentive and friendly! Such an authentic hamam and truly felt like we were in the Middle East! Nadia and the girls were tremendous and they really did go above and beyond to make sure we enjoyed ourselves! Thank you so much

I was very disappointed with the Moroccan hammam service. The experience felt rushed and poorly executed, with little attention to hygiene or customer comfort. The staff were unfriendly and did not explain the process, which made the experience uncomfortable rather than relaxing. For the price paid, the service was far below expectations. I would not recommend this hammam. When I reported the issue to Nadia she just said she had took new staff and tried to excuse the rude behaviour of her staff. I expected at least for her to discount for the service at least, but fully charged me when I was actually very upset! Nadia I won’t be coming again! The staff not only rude but lie too
Such a relaxing experience. Sauna, steam, scrub and massage. The place was very clean and I came out feeling brand new!

This was an absolutely wonderful experience from start to finish. It was a birthday present from my daughter, and since it was my first time trying anything like this, I wasn’t sure what to expect. The staff were warm, patient, and incredibly attentive, instantly putting me at ease. Every detail felt thoughtful and relaxing. I walked out feeling refreshed, cared for, and already thinking about when I can return. A truly memorable gift and an experience I’ll be recommending to everyone!

Sahara hair and beauty salon is the best place for doing beauty and facial. It was my first time. To do my facial there and it was amazing and relaxing time. Specially with Sahara. She does amazing job with fully kindness and patient. The products are high quality and herbal specially for my daughter for sensitive skins. I am totally satisfy with her work and kindness. I definitely keep with them up. Now a days hard to find the person like Sahara. Kind and generous human. Thank you Sahara. God bless you.    💕💕💕💕💐💐🤗🤗🤗

I struggled to grow my hair for many years and I don’t trust hair dressers as I’ve had some awful experiences but she did the best job ever she made me feel more confident then ever and I’m so please with the service she make you feel at home and comfortable and gives the best advice on hair this will definitely be my go to place for hair and eyebrows
I had a hair color done from Sahara Hair &Beauty It was very nice definitely I’ll come back and Aunty is so sweet
Great professional service. Happy with my hair cut!

This has to be the best beauty parlour I’ve come across. I’ve been coming her for years and I have never been failed, hence I’ve remained loyal for years.

I went to get my eyebrows done and Shanaz the owner excelled. I had brow pencil on which I forgot to remove before entering the parlour. Shanaz removed it for me and said she will put it back once she shaped my brows. The care and attention to detail was very very high. After I was done and the brow pencil was put back I couldn’t stop smiling 😁 I looked beautiful and I hadn’t felt that way in a long time.

Everyone in the parlour is super nice plus the ladies that work there always remember me even though I don’t go on a regular basis.

If you are looking to become that beautiful swan I would suggest you go there as you won’t be disappointed.

They provide a lot of services and open every day with late night opening on a Thursday.
Me and my mum have been going here for years, we have recommended S&S countless times. Amazing customer service and the job is always done perfectly. S&S is so good !!
Great local salon for threading and waxing. Owner, Samina, is super welcoming, efficient and fast. I'll be back soon.
Nice behavior very good salllon and so nice makeup and cutting also
Good service if owner doing her self
Very good threading

I've had my party makeup done by them twice and each time I was genuinely impressed with the results. The makeup looked flawless, lasted all night, and was exactly what I wanted. On top of that, their pricing is very reasonable for the quality of work they deliver. If you're looking for professional, reliable, and stunning makeup, I highly recommend them!

I have been using this salon for 6/7+ years. Basra is one the loveliest ladies I know and have encountered with however she has poor judgement on staff. Particularly the staff who wax. So if I was you- don’t visit after 5pm as you will be rushed, burnt and left unfinished because you want to escape the room. I had wax poured onto my semi permanent lashes due to the woman rushing for her then to scrub them with baby oil, she was asked not to touch the hairline and she took more than usual off, had the heaviest hands when applying the wax & pulling off so I won’t be back.

I recently got my makeup done from basra’s studio i have had been a waxing client as my first time getting my makeup done from her i wanted to come here and review her services as i loved the soft glam look she did on me and dolled me up so beautifully and flawlessly. Were so hygienic that made me love their services, would definitely be looking forward to get my makeup done from her on my important events

Went in for face threading and eyebrows before my wedding. Salon is a little hidden, but staff guided me when I rang them, no issues. Staff were friendly. Price was very reasonable. Eyebrows looked great but face was a little patchy, when I got home and looked in natural light I had to go over some bits but only a few so overall 4/5
Great place, very experienced staff. Basra her self is lovely. However staff can sometimes over charge.

I’ve been to Amberz Beauty a few times before and always had a good experience, but this time I had my eyebrows done by Farwa, and honestly, it was the best they’ve ever looked! 🥹 She was so lovely and really took her time, especially knowing I’d been growing them out. You could tell she genuinely cared and put her heart into getting them just right. I left feeling so happy, thank you, Farwa, for being amazing! 💖

I am more than unhappy with my experience I was asked if my step mother was my sister and when I explained she was my mums partner they were disgusted and proceeded to be rude and stare and not conversate with us. The results were horrible and I was left with thick black eyebrows. Do not recommend

I have been going to Amberz since I moved to Manchester I can not go to any other place to get my face done now as Amber is very good she will make sure you leave happily with the service you paid for. I also have started my laser with her, I have seen such a big improvement in my hair growth I barely get any hair growth on my face now which I am so happy about and it’s so relieving not to worry about the growth on my face anymore.

My mum and I have been coming to Amber for years, from when she first started her business to now, and we have never gone to anyone else. The treatments we receive are exceptional and her service is fantastic every time! We get laser hair removal, threading, waxing and face masks from Amber and the results are amazing, leaving us satisfied every time. We have been loyal and happy customers for years and will continue to be.

This is the best place I have ever gone to to get my eyebrows done. The service is 10/10 they check in on you to see if you like it but I never bother looking because it always comes out amazing. I’m a very particular person when it comes to getting my eyebrows done and they’re the only ones I trust to do them. I would highly recommend to everyone!!

Had a lovely one night stay here after a night out in Manchester. We booked a king sized room, which was lovely, and the bed was sooooo comfortable. It was the best night’s sleep I’ve ever had after a night out!

The hotel itself is done out in super funky decor with pop culture icons everywhere you look. Just perfect for the location.

Breakfast was absolutely delicious, and the finishing touches were really thoughtful.

All in all a fabulous stay, would love to come back!

An Unforgettable Christmas Party at Malmaison Manchester!
Our company Christmas party at Malmaison Manchester was absolutely fantastic from start to finish! The venue had a wonderful, festive vibe and the entire experience was top-notch.
Delicious Food: The food was outstanding, with everyone raving about their meals. I can personally highly recommend the beef cheek – it was cooked to perfection and melted in the mouth. The quality was exceptional, a true highlight of the evening.
Friendly, Attentive Staff: A special thank you to the staff who were incredibly friendly, helpful, and attentive all night. The service was seamless and they genuinely went above and beyond to ensure every guest was looked after, contributing greatly to the positive atmosphere.
Great Atmosphere & Music: The vibe was perfect for a celebration, lively and fun. The DJ played excellent music that had everyone up and dancing, making for a truly memorable night.
Malmaison Manchester delivered a brilliant event, and we couldn't have asked for a better venue for our Christmas celebration. We would highly recommend it to anyone planning a party or looking for a superb dining experience!

I booked this trip for my parents, uncle and I to celebrate my mam's 60th birthday. Unfortunately I became unwell and could no longer go. My parents enjoyed their stay at the hotel. They said it was pretty clean and comfortable, and they especially enjoyed the bar. The said the bar staff were brilliant and couldn't have been more helpful.

However, what is letting this hotel down is customer service. As I couldn't attend but was concerned about using the app to cancel when we still needed two other rooms, I spoke with a Hotels.com chat agent who tried to contact the hotel on my behalf but couldn't get a response.

I also wanted to arrange something special in the room for my mam's arrival and had used the app at time of booking to ask what was available. I never got a response via the app so a few days before the trip I emailed the hotel directly. Responses back and forth took so long that in the end they weren't able to set anything up as by this point it was check in day and I was told balloons were arranged via a third party.

I asked if there was anything at all that could be done to make her stay extra special while she was there as it was a 2 night trip, and they completely stopped responding. Have heard nothing since and was unable to make the stay special for her birthday. This would put me off staying again in case I needed customer service support.

Attended the New Year’s Eve party and had a brilliant night. The food was delicious and plentiful, the drinks were top notch, and there were no long queues at the bar. A great atmosphere and a fantastic party — would definitely return.

We were really excited for our New Year treatment and spa visit, but the experience was mixed. On arrival, there were no gowns or slippers available, which immediately caused some confusion. The treatment itself was lovely and relaxing.

However, the spa facilities were disappointing. The relaxation area was overcrowded, leaving us sitting on chairs rather than loungers, which didn’t feel particularly relaxing. The room was also quite chilly. There is also no swimming pool, which was a major letdown. Describing this as “spa facilities” feels misleading when it consists solely of a sauna- we had expected at least a steam room and pool.

To make matters worse, another guest was loudly talking on the phone in the relaxation area, and there was no staff presence to manage this or maintain a calm environment, as everyone was occupied with treatments.

On a positive note, the restaurant service was excellent and the food was delicious. The team kindly moved our restaurant booking an hour earlier when we decided we’d had enough of the sauna and noise, which we appreciated.

Lane swim during school holiday becomes general swim because they let people with kids in . This should be a time people can swim properly. Its extremely frustrating
The lanes are supposed to be clockwise, but this isn't adhered to, especially during female swim, its just a free for all.
At busy times there are fast swimmers darting through you in the medium lane and slow swimmers holding everyone up in the fast lane. This is not 'policed"
The staff are nice but usually chatting in pairs and dont pay attention to the lanes etc
The showers are communal and the changing rooms are cold .

pool staff has been very disappointing. Their attitude often feels unprofessional and, at times, discriminatory. It creates an uncomfortable atmosphere for members. I hope the management takes this seriously and works to ensure that all staff treat members with respect and fairness.

The swimming pool is very big and nice.
The teacher  wich is at stage 7 on Wednesday isn't very serious about her job si is strict and instead of telling the children how to swim, she's constantly talking to someone.

The showers and changing rooms get cleaned every day, which is great! There are also blow dryers that can be used after, so it's very convenient. But there are no closed shower cubicles. Also, those who are lifeguards and meant to watch, really don't seem to do a good job whatsoever. They sit on the side and just talk to each other for the duration of the swim session. I don't think they'd realize if anything happens unless someone were to alert them, which is less than ideal, obviously.

As a dedicated member of this gym who utilizes the facilities twice a week, I feel it is important to bring to your attention some serious concerns I've had regarding discrimination, particularly in the form of anti-Semitism, exhibited by certain staff members.

During male-only sessions, I have noticed a troubling pattern of differential treatment from the staff. This inconsistency creates an uncomfortable environment and contradicts the ideals of inclusivity and respect that any community space should uphold.

Discrimination of any kind is unacceptable. I urge the management to take this matter seriously, as it's crucial for every member to feel welcomed and valued, regardless of their background. I genuinely hope steps will be taken to address this issue, which could significantly improve the experience for all members.

This would be a 5 star review as the staff there are great, super helpful and not weird about my disability. Their wheelchair access is really good, especially for the downstairs pools. This place loses two stars for the "health suite". The main area was really wet and dirty. The showers smelt like piss. The men in there were really loud. Shouting, burping and groaning. I had to get a member of staff because a man was moaning in the steam room. I'm not sure what he was doing but it wasn't appropriate to be moaning in there regardless. I felt quite uncomfortable being there. I understand that's not the centres fault but the areas should be cleaned more regularly and have staff around. There was just no level of respect or etiquette in that area and I would probably not go back as I didn't feel safe.

Went swimming here as a tourist and it was very easy to get access, you can register at the entrance or online. Entry was £6.50 and you can stay as long as you like. The pool is great, and there’s also a café and a bookshelf inside, which makes it a nice spot to spend time, especially on a rainy day. Lockers need a £1 coin. Overall, very convenient and welcoming.

First time going in and how uncomfortable it was. There were about 6 teenagers in there sitting upstairs as you walked in talking about us, the staff just allowed them to sit upstairs unsupervised, i then was near enough shooed out of the shop went trying to find out information about rodents when i wouldn’t get a £50 cage from there even though i had already got one that i was told was suitable, i even asked about the best gender to get and he rebutted me with “well i’ll tell you when you get the cage”. Very bad experience weren’t willing to give any information if you weren’t buying everything from in there. Very disappointed as i wanted to get some new animals but the men specifically the bald guy was so rude.

I have been going to this center for a few weeks now and I am impressed to see how the team of the Aquatic center is made up of truly kind, cordial, and friendly people. The staff in the reception is super lovely and friendly and the really make sure that everyone his having a good experience. I wanna personally thank you Courtney, Danielle, Chris and Martin who are  extremely lovely,extremely kind and friendly all the times. They really makes everyone feel welcomed and supported with their positive attitude. Also the instructors Andrea , Suzanne, Simona , Andria, Sneha are seriously really good instructors and personal trainers, each of them has something special to share in their classes and they are all super friendly, kind but maintaining the right dose of professionalism all time. Thank you for existing guys :)

Great place to swim! The Manchester Aquatics Centre is always tidy, the pools are in great condition, and it’s excellent value compared to other gyms. Big shout-out to Martin, his kindness and willingness to help with anything really stand out. Staff like him make a huge difference.

Used to love this place but it's the 2nd visit in a row I called in advance to ask what girls were working and which were available at that very moment and the receptionist out right lied to me. The first time I arrived after speaking to the receptionist she gave my booking away to a punter who just walked in and said I can wait 20 minutes or take another girl, neither of which were acceptable. This time she told me there were 4 girls working and 3 were immediately available. I walk in a few minutes later and she tells me 1 girl is getting ready and the other 3 haven't come in yet to start their shifts. I wait 10 minutes then leave rather than have more of my time wasted.

Replace your lying receptionist with someone honest or lose customers, she's harming your business.

This place has always been spectacular! It's been 7 years since I left Manchester and still think about this place.  One of my life's  dearest friendships occurred at that location with I value very much . Long story short , Great place and I'm sure find the treatment u deserve all time everytime.
It gets better and better.I agree with kabir it's so clean and welcoming and all the ladies are beautiful.Lucy otherwise known as Paula connor is best so cute she has angel tattooed on her entrance
service is no good I not happy
Think I am pregnant

I was put off visiting this sauna by reading all the bad reviews on here. After visiting a few times I can honestly say that the place is fine. The staff are there to do their job, they have all been fine with me (treat people like you want to be treated). The place is clean, staff are cleaning and making sure everyone is happy constantly. I am at a loss as to why people can not understand that they HAVE to see physical I.D - this is stated on their website, and after a incident that occurred with a friend of mine, I am glad they do this as the staff barred this person and without I.D and knowing who he was this would of been almost impossible to prevent him trying to enter again without some sort of I.D. The place is good and if you go for the right reasons you will not have a problem. Enjoy and give it a go

Let me be clear!
I was surprised by the number of negative reviews, but as someone who visits gay bathhouses wherever I travel, I had to stop by during my visit to Manchester. Unfortunately, I couldn’t enter the venue this time because I forgot my ID (and yes, it’s standard practice for bathhouses across most European countries to ask for identification, which is perfectly fine). I’ll come back and update my review once I actually experience the venue itself.

But one important thing: there are dozens of negative reviews about the receptionist, the “guy with glasses,” as many call him. Well, I met him too, and we had a lovely chat. I asked him about the negative feedback, and he explained who usually writes those reviews (guess who is not allowed to enter and gets pissed 🚭🚯💊💉).

He also clarified the so‑called “cold shower” issue, which makes total sense: when 100+ men  on busy days keep pressing the shower buttons constantly, hot water for  the boiler doesn’t always have enough time to reheat the water. So it’s not the staff’s fault; it’s just how the system works in their case. Take a quick shower - you’re not at home!

Overall, I had a great impression of the guy. So please, keep your judgment balanced when leaving negative reviews. I’ll definitely be back.

P.S. Towels and condoms are free. Flip-flops (not disposable ones, but proper reusable plastic ones you can keep) cost £3.

Keep up the gay culture Manchester. Much love!

This is a nice, clean and modern sauna. It has a nice mix of customers and a polite atmosphere. A nice big downstairs area. Busy on Sunday afternoon.
As at January 2026 the sauna is not working but the steam room is large and nice. On a busy Sunday with 130 people the hot water ran out. So cold showers for everyone!

Man with glass on has 0 customer service skills , i arrived never been before to Manchester sauna nervous as it is man on desk said i on something i said erm what do u mean he said your eye is twitching, so said ohh I have vocal ticks  Tourette's and ADHD hhe so rude didn't pull me to dide for chat see everything okay as others arrived at. Desk other listen goot em going redder I was getting embarrassed, so his reply was need to need medical record to confirm this, as never had it he said come back in hour had travelled all way from Liverpool, if you have hidden disabilities this isnt place you turn u away, my confidence has now gone wont be returning

Very clean sauna. One of the cleanest I have visited. I have visited this sauna a few times before. I'm not from Manchester so this latest visit was a disappointment due to the staff being VERY clicky with what seems to be regular customers. I'm not asking to be spoken to by staff, but it felt like people that use the facilities on a regular basis get a very different experience. The other issue is it's expensive. I used to be a member which costs £5 . Mine expired as not been for a few years. Cost me £26 entry with new membership. I wanted to leave and come back, but the guy on the desk stated it would be and extra £3 for 5 hours if I did leave and come back. Seems just greed and taking advantage of people. I have friends that go there and say the same thing. I wouldn't be returning due to the above.

Hubby and I first went in November for spa and facilities, used vouchers from our wedding, had a really nice experience, booked before we left to go again in January, paid around £100. I said it’ll be something to look forward to in the new year. I was poorly and not well enough to go and enjoy it, I couldn’t help picking up an infection, I didn’t want to spread it around (NHS worker here) but this was less than 48hr cancellation (100% charge) which could not have been avoided. I asked to rebook for when I felt better, was denied request, no concern for my welfare. We don’t spend much time and money treating ourselves because I work such long hours looking after others so this has meant not only have we lost our £100, but we have completely lost the opportunity to spend a rare day out together during a cost of living crisis. Extremely disappointed with customer service and understanding provided.

Spa was lovely but they don't advise you that if you go over 4 hours parking you get a ticket for £100 from Parking Eye. We should have been told this at reception, especially as the spa asked if we had been before, and we hadn't. The sign outside doesn't mention 4 hours, nor does the spa confirmation booking details. This is clearly used to make more money as spa says there is nothing they can do to help!! Stay clear unless you want an extra fine. I was going to return as the spa was relaxing, but I will never use any of their facilities again. Disgusting way to treat clients, AND I AM DUSPUTING THIS!!!

Really decent spa. Perfect for a duo or solo. The pool is a good size and good temperature. The spa is very nice and warm too. The ‘access spa’ package came with the pool, a sauna, a steam room and a gym and a free complimentary drink and snack (we chose rose Prosecco and cake). They gave us a white robe and slippers. Spent 3 hours there.
Only slight downside is that there was no actual changing room, (only a room with showers toilets and lockers all in one) so had to get changed in the toilets, which isn’t really a problem unless the place is busy. Overall, a very positive experience. Would recommend and go again :) and very good for the price!

Attended the spa as part of a virgin experience voucher. It's quite an average spa setting (hotel pool with sauna/steam room), no jacuzzi), although it's clean and maintained. Changing rooms are pretty poor (hardly any lockers working, no where to get changed/put stuff down). The staff were friendly and nice and you get a drink with the package (prosecco, soft drinks or coffees). Treatments were reasonable as well. I'd probably not choose to pay/come here as there's nicer facilities in spas in the area.

Went with a groupon voucher bought for me as a gift in June , availability was a lead time of approx 3 months and not good choice of times
, had to pay a supplement for a weekend  - all good though  . However , having been before I can say I would never go again , this is not a spa , it’s a hotel pool with treatment rooms . A spa day used to be “a day “ you now only get 3 hours . Hotel restaurant used to serve food through the day , now only serves food from
3pm . The spa itself offers no facilities for food or drink . Groupon voucher included Prosecco - this was not offered or mentioned by the spa ( only remembered after the day) . Changing rooms- non existent - it is a very small room with. 2 showers and 2 toilets only so communal changing and a very small room the size of an average kitchen to give a guide ! I don’t think it’s appropriate to not have a private cubicle. Hotel guests and children allowed after 4pm  - no offence to children at all (I have my own !) but I go for a spa day to have a little peace and when the spa only offer the afternoon 3 hour session to groupon voucher guests feels a little like they don’t deserve some peace. Guy on reception so friendly and helpful cannot fault at all and he deserves employee of the month for his working attitude . Treatment staff - just felt a little formal attitude when you go in the treatment room but the treatments were good so cannot fault them  . Cleanliness - clumps of hair around the pool floor not nice . Pool - ok temp but not warm to be comfortable . Overall I would not go again as to me this is just a pool and not a spa day , been for spa days at other places who have the facilities and staff to provide what a spa day should be

My husband and I enjoyed a short break at this boutique hotel in central Manchester in June 2025. Ideally located - a quiet street with v little noise but only a 5 minute walk away from bustling bars, shops and restaurants. We enjoyed breakfast and room service within the hotel itself with a great choice offered for both. I visited their spa which is based in the adjoining building. I enjoyed a blissful massage and as a guest of the hotel was then able to stay and enjoy the other communal facilities of the spa on a complimentary basis. What probably sets this hotel apart from other boutique hotels in the area is their lovely rooftop infinity pool. With great views and open air (during the warm weather) it felt really special. Being a converted Georgian building there is only one lift (elevator) which is small. This is often in use by the hotel’s staff (housekeeping etc) so you may have to wait a little while. No parking on site but discounted parking a short walk away. The staff were really warm and friendly. Would definitely stay here again.

Cash flow alert!! Sadly, this lovely hotel does pre-authorisation on your bank card on check in - for the amount of the rooms plus £100 per person deposit.  You pay on departure as normal.  BUT they don't cancel the pre-authorisation!  Of course this affects your available balance.  We checked out on Tuesday morning, but pre-authorisation for nearly £800 wasn't removed until Friday, in spite of us contacting the hotel several times.  So you need to budget for twice the cost of the hotel for 3 or 4 days.  Sad, because the rooms are lovely, staff on reception and in the bar are friendly and the location is great - notably the wonderful 10 Tib Lane bar/restaurant round the corner.  But this practice spoiled it for us and we'd never recommend it to friends for that reason.

A lovely night’s stay in a ‘comfy’ room. Really big bed,stylish decor, robes/slippers ,coffee machine,teas ,well stocked minibar. Spa was a relaxing way to spend the next morning after a delicious breakfast.
Thoroughly enjoyable entertainment in the Tavern with a violinist playing.
A special mention to the extremely friendly and helpful staff,nothing seemed too much trouble.A particular mention to the porter Tom for excellent service and to the lovely Lizzy on reception who ‘saved the day’ by helping me retrieve my concert tickets! Assets to the establishment.

My partner and I recently had afternoon tea at King Street Townhouse Hotel. (We didn't stay overnight so cannot comment on the accommodation)
Our experience was exceptionally positive. The staff were friendly and helpful. One gentleman in particular served us and gave us great advice on tea choices. We opted for the Marsala Chai but he reassured us that he would swap it if we didn't like it. We did though, it was lovely!
The food served was delicious, the service was friendly, efficient and informative. At no point were we pressured into buy anything extra.
This was a real treat, would definitely recommend 👌

We went to the spa today and wow, what an amazing day. From the minute we arrived the staff were wonderful. Special mention for Natasha ( manager ) and she was super helpful and accomadating. Breakfast was fab. 100% recommend. The treatment was great to
The girls at alpha med aesthetics are great. I had botox done and the results are natural and effective. I would highly recommend the salon for those seeking precision and a natural look!
I couldn’t recommend Alpha Med Aesthetics anymore. I had lip fillers and Dr Abha was amazing and I felt so comfortable. I will defiantly be returning. Love Amber. X
The girls at Alpha Med Aesthetics are amazing .  I am so happy with my results and I will definitely be back .😊
Thank you so much, so pleased with my results. You are the only botox doctor I will go to from on, excellent. Thanks also for the advice about my skin after the skin analysis:)
Lovely and professional experience. I always feel in safe hands with the ladies at Alpha Med Aesthetics.

Booked a couples 90 minute massage that lasted barely 70 minutes
My wife said after that she thinks the masseuse was on the phone a lot of the time and was more rubbing than a proper aromatherapy massage
Mine was average and spent twice as long on one leg than the other.
Very disappointed and could not recommend

I’m so disappointed.
I’m sad to write this as Ive been here quite a few times and always had a 10/10 experience but today was just a whole lot of disappointment.
We were booked into a couples massage and the session started off fantastic even though there was a lot of leaving the room and coming back and forth by the masseuse’s.
None the less, my partner and I settled in nicely… started off on the back massage… fabulous only for mine, to be cut short by a ‘swop’ of therapist, mid way through.
I completely understand that popular therapist will be booked but to be (what seemed like) fobbed off with someone who had no clue as to what they were doing is upsetting.
I am a massage therapist myself and when I voiced my concern that I was just getting a ‘rub of the leg’, yes, the pressure did get more intense but it was still just a rub down, no muscle manipulation or kneading. I stopped the massage myself  and explained that I knew the lady was not a masseuse…. Without hesitation she apologised and admitted she was not qualified. With this i got myself dressed and watched on as my partner enjoyed his massage and I left the room.
The staff were lovely and I am not faulting their kindness. They even gave me £20 refund which is a lovely gesture but I’m just so gutted that I didn’t get to enjoy my experience as I have done before x

I’ve been coming to this place every couple of months for 3 years now, I’ve tried deep tissue massage with so many different therapists they’re all really good and they know what they’re doing, everytime i go in with a stiff neck & back and somehow i get out relieved.

I can see I’m not the only one writing bad review about this place.
I was so excited to go for couple Thai massage.
The two therapist ladies wouldn’t stop talking and laughing while doing our treatment. Relaxing music was to low and they were taking turns answer phone in the corridor.

After I looked at the lady, so she would take a hint that treatment has to be done in silence. She started to be extremely nasty to my body like she wanted to release all her life problems on me.

When she walked over me to prep my body for the treatment she was not really stretching but trying to harm me. Put all her body weight on one heel and moving left and right to dig and whole in by back.

It was no single moment during the treatment that I enjoyed. My body was scared tensed all the time.
The way she was grabbing my neck was insane. Not starting slowly and then increasing pressure. But nasty grabbing my neck or any other body part from the start.
To grab my shoulders she used rough cotton cloth that I thought will strip my skin away.
The way she was pressing my temples. I thought I will faint from pain.

My body was in bits for days. I couldn’t function for 2 days. I have bruise on my arm and still lots of pain all over my body.

I had Thai or sport massage many times.
This was something else!
Absolutely insane.
No work or human ethics.

She never asked if pressure was okay. And even when I moved a lot to show that it hurts she wouldn’t care.
They asked for money upfront.
After the treatment I wanted to cry that it was all done for my money that I paid and I was in a pain shock and wanted to get home as soon as I can.
I've been coming here for 2-3 years every few months, very enjoying the Thai massage, my husband been coming as well more often than me, always happy, very professional

Nuffield Health Manchester Printworks is a brilliant gym with everything you need in one place. The gym floor is well laid out with plenty of equipment, and the atmosphere is always friendly and welcoming. I really enjoy the variety of classes — the instructors are motivating and make every session enjoyable.

The pool, sauna and steam room are great for relaxing after a workout, and the whole facility feels clean, comfortable and well looked after. The location is perfect and easy to get to, and the staff are always helpful and professional.

Overall, I’m really happy with my experience at Nuffield Health Printworks. It’s a great place to train, unwind and stay consistent with your fitness goals. Highly recommend!

Nuffield Health Manchester Printworks has been an amazing gym to be part of. The facilities are top quality — the gym floor is spacious, the equipment is well looked after, and having access to the pool, sauna and steam room makes such a difference after a workout.

What really stands out is the staff. Everyone I’ve met has been friendly, helpful and genuinely invested in creating a great environment. The trainers are knowledgeable, the reception team is always welcoming, and the whole place has a really uplifting feel.

The classes are brilliant too, with loads of choice throughout the week and instructors who keep you motivated from start to finish.

I’m really happy I joined — it’s a great gym in the heart of Manchester and I recommend it to anyone looking for a place that goes above and beyond.

I’ve had a fantastic experience at Nuffield Health – Manchester Printworks. The gym is always clean, well-organised, and has everything I need — from a great range of equipment to plenty of space, even at busy times. The pool, sauna and steam room are brilliant extras that make training feel more like a full wellbeing experience.

The staff are consistently friendly, professional and welcoming. They’re always happy to help and create such a positive atmosphere in the gym. The classes are another huge bonus — really motivating instructors and a great variety to choose from.

Overall, it’s a high-quality gym with excellent facilities and a really supportive environment. I’d definitely recommend Nuffield Health Printworks to anyone looking for a gym in Manchester!

I have been consistently pleased with my membership at Nuffield Health in Manchester. It provides a high-quality environment and a positive community experience.

The atmosphere here is incredibly friendly. Both the club members and all the staff are genuinely nice and helpful, which makes such a difference to my motivation. A huge shoutout must go to the cleaning team—the gym and changing rooms are always immaculately clean.

Facilities and Layout

The facilities here are brilliant and cater to all my needs. The swimming pool, sauna, and steam room—they are perfect for winding down after a hard session. The changing room facilities and showers are also very good and well-maintained.

The gym layout itself is fantastic, offering diverse training areas. I especially enjoy the Functional Training area, complete with the sled track.

Classes and Timetable

The classes and timetable offer plenty of choice and are always well-organised. My personal favourites are the high-energy Met Con and Circuits sessions and the calming Body Balance class.

Personal Trainer Recommendation: Dan Nottingham

Finally, if you are looking for a personal trainer, I cannot recommend Dan Nottingham highly enough. I’ve been training with Dan for three years now, and he is absolutely superb. He's knowledgeable, motivating, and his guidance has been a core part of my fitness journey. The gym staff and all the personal trainers, in general, are great, but Dan is truly exceptional.

In summary, Nuffield Health Manchester is a clean, well-equipped, and friendly gym.💚💚💪

First of all, the cleaning staff are absolutely spot on - I didn’t catch his name, but the core cleaner in the men’s changing room does an amazing job. He’s always cheerful, helpful, and keeps everything immaculate. The sauna, steam room, and swimming facilities are also really good and clearly well maintained — you can see regular checks being done, which is great to see.

Now, onto the rest. The actual gym staff
aren’t helpful at all - same goes for the reception team. They just don’t seem interested and the customer service is really poor. It gives off the impression that they couldn’t care less about members, which is disappointing considering the price point of this gym.

The gym itself feels dated, with worn-out equipment that’s long overdue an upgrade. There’s much better kit and value for money at other gyms in Manchester that cost far less. The layout is also frustrating - it makes no sense at all. For example, there’s a dumbbell rack placed directly behind a barbell thrust machine, so when someone’s using it, you can’t even access the weights rack. It’s just poor design and really inconvenient.

Overall, the cleaning and spa facilities are a credit to the place, but the actual gym area and staff experience seriously let it down. It feels like it’s running on reputation rather than quality - definitely not worth the premium membership cost.

1st time in one of these places I like to think I was very respectful .. very friendly welcome by receptionist .. didn't feel uncomfortable in the room . I only used a very short visit but everything in that time I got what I asked for .Ignore the other Asian comments they are paying the cheapest prices an expecting the world 🌎... some things in life money talks loud .. ring up pay offer double or triple an I can guarantee itll be a better time pretty sure that's how the game goes depending on worker but like I said you are paying the CHEAPEST an most likey far too demanding .  They are human not your pet . You can always get that at half the price I imagine but risk aids in carpark lmao.Respect goes along away an soo does hygiene .

Girl Becky- very friendly didn't mind small changes wasn't in anyway rude with boundaries.

Unfortunately not a good experience. Chyna was a good looking girl and I was happy to see her but on multiple occasions, as I was about to climax, she would push her hand onto my groin and intervene. This was disruptive towards my climax and at one point, I had to explain this to her. She was very nervous and didn’t seem to know what to do with me. She also complained about friction burns but that could have been sorted with some lubricant. The reception staff were nice and I will note, chyna did give me some extra time. This was a plus and she’s very pretty and a British girl but I have to give 2 star because of the interruptions when I was trying to climax. I won’t be back.

I did not have a good experience here. The receptionist and management were polite but the behavior of one of the staff members during the service was very unprofessional and made me feel uncomfortable. The quality of the service was also below expectations. I hope the management pays more attention to improving staff behavior
Ava the best, of all the girls, I recommend, I will definitely go back x
First time doing this I chose this big Greek girl Zoey she made me feel welcome definitely coming back for more.

Most friendliest parlour I have ever visited. Nicola the owner goes out of her way to make you happy.....and the girls are fantastic. There is a no hurry service and they are more than happy for you to stay after your service to chat.
It was my first time in here but they really nice and the girls r lovely thankyou I will be coming back

How a parlour can not have a warm working shower, for customers and ladys is crazy, if had know before hand over my cash i would have gone elsewhere -- only able to give half a star .. avoid if you have desire for cleanliness
I had my first experience here, a bit confusing but great. They are clean and friendly. I will be back here.

Said I would not be back again but thought I would give it second chance. So I visited Tuesday morning met great girl Lois so glad I did what a great time I had think she enjoyed it as much as i did deffo seeing her again hope you read my review Lois

The library is a great place. Clean, employees are always busy dealing with customers and a lot of community groups seem to congregate here.  Exactly as a library should be.  It reminds me of a library I went to in Ireland: a good sense of community. I've only used the swimming  pool once and everything is as you'd expect, swimming pool on point and clean.  Highly recommended.

There’s not one good class in the evening except Tuesday spin at a decent time. All dance and Zumba. One spin class at 8pm at night!! Not enough body conditioning or strength. Prioritise good classes, strength classes starting from 5pm onwards for those who have been at work all day and don’t have the luxury of coming in the day time. Too much consideration given to people who come to day classes and then aqua and dance in the evenings and have the luxury of doing them at 6pm… Put aqua and dance last! Too much inexperience too. It shows.

I really look forward to Nicole's aqua class on a Thursday evening. I love that every week she does something different and not the same routine. I love the music she's plays which keeps you going throughout the work out. She if very informative. She gives you easier options or harder options. She always introduces herself to the class and tells you which part of the body you're working on durning each exercise. Nicole's is always energetic, I don't know how she does it!

The absolute worst leisure centre ran by Manchester active this side of Manchester. The staff are really poor, I had my child join Gymnastics lessons and Swim lessons and they really are awful, the staff teaching them are absolutely shocking the way they talk to the children and theres no structure or progress. I did put a complaint in after my child became upset about the way a swim teacher was talking to her, and had a basic reply from callum tongue that did NOT resolve anything and with a poor excuse that staff complete a 50 week training course, this cant be true or its really poor training, I cancelled the gymnastics as it was extremely poor and the kids where stood about bored. And after 9 months of swim lessons with about 11 different teachers and no progression or structure theres absolutely no point, my daughter loves swimming but says the teachers nasty and she doesnt want to go anymore and shes only 6! With my complaint being ignored I have now cancelled my childs swim lessons, the worst of the worst I would definitely avoid any of the childrens lessons its a complete waste of money and time, and putting a complaint doesnt help as the managers just ignore it. Avoid at all costs

I currently pay for two memberships at £39 each at this 'community gym'. However, several ongoing issues are making it difficult to feel that the membership offers real value.

The £3 fee for each class cancellations within four hours is discouraging and doesn’t reflect an understanding of members’ reallife schedules. Combined with a limited and repetitive class timetable, it feels like we’re being charged extra without being given enough choice or flexibility in return, no variations just mostly dance classes and not enough allround
Access to training spaces is also restricted. The back room is kept closed outside of classes, which means there’s no open mat area for stretching or functional work. Most of the dumbbells are locked away, further limiting what members can actually use.

Cleanliness is inconsistent, and in the women’s gym the Stairmaster has been broken for months with no updates or repairs. For a facility that encourages community engagement, these maintenance gaps are noticeable.
I am checking other gyms this would mean traveling further away and this is upsetting.

I’ve been coming here for the past 7–8 years — it’s been a long time, and for good reason. Seyhan has been cutting my hair since day one (and probably even longer), and he’s an absolute star.

The whole team at this barbershop is fantastic: super chill, respectful, and genuinely friendly. The atmosphere is always great, and the service is consistently top-notch.

I recommend this place 100%. I have no intention of going anywhere else.
They’re all incredibly skilled, professional, and committed to quality.

I’ve been coming to Barbers Boutique every two weeks for the last 13 years, and I won’t go anywhere else! The quality, consistency, and attention to detail are unmatched. I genuinely look forward to every visit — it’s not just a barbershop, it feels like family. Highly recommend to anyone looking for exceptional service and a welcoming atmosphere! Ste x

I couldn't recommend Barbers Boutique enough! Such a fantastic team - Joanne, Seyhan, Nic and Tony - everyone's so friendly, there's always decent tunes playing, and it's a really comfortable environment. All go hand in hand creating a great barbershop atmosphere.

I've had the pleasure of having Tony cut my hair since I first moved to Manchester back in 2015. Followed him from the original Barbers Boutique on Great Ancoats Street to the shop on Rochdale Road, and now to the current location. I don't even live in Manchester anymore but have continued to drive over from Warrington once a month for a trim and a catch up. Picture is from 2016ish!
The best barbers in Manchester! Been going to Nicola since I moved to Manchester a few years ago, she’s brilliant and always does a great job! Would definitely recommend 😀

I’ve been coming to Barbers Boutique for years across all three of their sites, and I genuinely wouldn’t go anywhere else. Joanne’s looked after my hair from day one and she’s absolutely brilliant. Always consistent, always spot on with the cut. I walk out feeling sharp every single time.

The shop has a chilled, friendly vibe that makes you feel welcome as soon as you step through the door. There’s no rush or fuss, just proper service from people who know their craft and care about doing a great job. Big thanks to Joanne and the team, top notch every visit.

Highly recommend!
I received holistic treatment from Hong, e.g. acupuncture, breathwork, and whole-body health care, and recovered from long covid after 3.5 years of suffering. His approach made a real difference to my overall health.

Had a few courses of fertility acupuncture with Flora Grace during IVF and it made such a difference! Didn’t have any for my first round and had low egg retrieval and post egg collection symptoms whereas after a series of acupuncture with the giga laser for my second round, got more eggs retrieved and hardly any post collection symptoms. Also had sessions around embryo transfers and currently 17 weeks pregnant! Flora gave great advice including nutritional information to support, and the sessions were always relaxing and reassuring. Was recommended to me by a friend and I have recommended her to others too!

Had my first ever facial with Lucy yesterday and was wowed by what went into the 60 mins! I felt like it was so worth what I paid :-)

When asked she happily explained the reasoning behind what she was doing which was really interesting to hear all about. She was also a truly lovely energy and spirit which carried me into the rest of my evening with positive vibes. Very very worth it and shall be recommending to friends!

Ive seen Hong Kim a number of times recently for my back problems which he's managed to help by relieving a muscle that was very tight, my husband also saw him for stress and sleep issues, and depression and amazingly has had good levels of sleep for the whole month since his treatment, and less migraines we also sought  advice and examination with (chinese medicine & acupuncture) with my daughter age 11 who  suffered with Mesenic lymphadenitis/ stomach pain and fatigue no pain killers were helping her, he's made a number of suggestions for helping her recover and she's now fully recovered.  Over many years ive known Hong, Flora, Lucy ,Martina and Anna  at Neals Yard Remedies ive seen numerous people receiving help from all these incredible therapists,  i would not hesitate to highly recommend any of these therapists some of the best you will find in Manchester.

I've been to see Flora Grace a couple of times for a problem I've been having with my skin and I can honestly say after the first session, I could see a huge improvement which continued for a month until my next session. The facial acupuncture has given my skin a clarity & glow that's been lacking for years despite seeing other skin specialists. The facial acupuncture is pain free and really relaxing and Flora Grace is very knowledgeable and has a lovely calm aura. Highly recommend this treatment for anyone that is worried about their skin aging but doesn't want to go down the tweakment route.

After finding a last minute deal online,  my partner and I visited the spa today with the hope of a relaxing few hours (the booking stated 2 hour use of the spa facilities) Although the full body massage was lovely, there were hardly any facilities there.
