We expected at least a pool which wasn't the case. There is a tiny sauna and a tiny steam room. There is no possible way you could spend 2 hours in there. There were no slippers provided as they hadn't arrived on the delivery so we had to walk through the main reception with bare feet!

Can't fault the staff, they were so friendly but if you're after a 'spa day' this isn't the place!

Disappointed with the overall experience and not worth the money. The whole hotel and spa were being refubrished so had to walk through the hotel there and back a few times. There was no swimming pool, no access to the gym, one of the saunas didn't work and there were only 2 hot beds to chill and relax. The changing room was in one of the hotel rooms on 1st floor with just one toilet/ shower available. The afternoon tea, staff and treatments were good thou.

Regrettably, our visit to Harmony and Serenity Spa at Manchester Hotel Piccadilly left much to be desired. The experience began on a sour note as the lack of clear directions coupled with the ongoing construction made locating the spa entrance a challenge. Upon expressing our concerns at the hotel reception, we were met with indifference rather than understanding or an apology for the inconvenience caused by the construction.

Navigating through the maze from the hotel reception to the spa, we were informed of an afternoon tea arrangement, only to discover that the changing rooms were inconveniently located in a separate area, resembling unused hotel rooms with inadequate privacy due to large windows. Furthermore, the relaxation room offered anything but tranquility, with the incessant noise of drilling disrupting any hope of relaxation.

Disappointingly, despite being informed of the availability of massages, we were informed upon attempting to utilize the spa facilities that they were not ready for use. The cleanliness of the premises also left much to be desired, with unclean stairs and malfunctioning saunas detracting from the overall experience. Additionally, the afternoon tea provided fell short of expectations, with small portions failing to satisfy.

The culmination of these issues led to a decision to cut short our visit, as the overall experience fell far short of our expectations. As someone not inclined to leave negative reviews, it pains me to express such dissatisfaction, but the subpar experience at Harmony and Serenity Spa Manchester has left me with no desire to return in the future.

The Spa was anything but relaxing. Booked the Spa deal for 2 with Prosecco on arrival and afternoon tea. We had upgraded our 25 minute treatment to a 50 minute treatment and paid for everything before arriving over the phone.
Upon arrival we were told to go to the 2nd floor to the Spa reception. Here we filled a questionnaire in asking if we had any allergies etc. After this we were sent to the first floor to the changing rooms, which were basically a hotel room with the bed removed (do they not have such rooms on the 2nd floor closer to the Spa? This may have prevented us from walking up and down corridors and going in and out of lifts full of workmen in our bath robes).
After getting changed we found our way back to the second floor where we used the sauna and steam room. One of the saunas was out of use which made us have to wait near the showers until the small sauna that was working was free. We spent about 40 minutes in this area but as its only small, we decided to go for a cup of tea in the relaxation room.
This room was very untidy, all the cups were just left on the tables, chairs all messy and cushions too. I had to ask the receptionist for clean cups as there were none, no one seemed to be replenishing cups or keeping the area tidy at all. The teabags were almost gone and there was no sugar either. All in all not very appealing as a relaxation suite. We waited around 20 minutes for her to return and then decided to go back to the sauna as we had got tired of waiting.
We now went to lie on the heated loungers but that lasted about five minutes as the sound of the workmen's drills, saws and them singing/shouting to one another in the next room was unbearable. I know you mention on your website that a refurbishment is taking place, so I expected a little disruption, but you also state that this does not affect your Spa experience at all. This is not true, there is no Spa experience on a building site!.
Back to the Spa reception area we went.
As the tea cups were now replenished, we thought we would ask when our afternoon tea would be served as we thought we could have that now with the cups of tea.
The receptionist looked on the computer and smuggly told me my afternoon tea was at 12pm and as it was now 13.30, I had missed it. I said "excuse me, what do you mean" she smirked and said "it was booked on for 12.00 so it's too late now"
I reminded her that we had arrived at 11.50am so in plenty of time but that there had been no prosecco on arrival as promised and no mention of the afternoon tea, so being polite we had decided to wait until it was served to us. The receptionist looked at me as if I was asking too much of her and she said she could rebook it for me for 2pm. Then she told me it was in the restaurant on the 2nd floor!! Sorry??? So now as a part of this "relaxing Spa day" I have to go back to the first floor, get dressed, go to the second floor, passing countless workmen carrying mattresses and other things over the landings to get my afternoon tea at 2pm? then eat it as quick as I can because I have then got to go back to the first floor, put my wet bathing clothes back on, then it's back in the lift in my bathrobe because I have my treatment booked in at 3pm in the Spa area on the 2nd floor.
This has nothing to do with the hotel having a refurbishment, this is just shocking service. I have been to many spas all over the world and this is by far the worst experience I have ever had. I would like some kind of compensation for a terrible Spa day.

We booked last minute after being let down by another Spa. The Afternoon Tea was delicious and they catered for our vegan and dairy free requirements brilliantly. Spa treatments were lovely and the heated spa facilities are a great addition to the package. Perfect little city centre spa treat!

After trying massages and chiropractors for many years, I was still living with constant discomfort in my back, shoulders, and stomach. Feeling frustrated and desperate for change, I decided to explore alternative therapies and discovered Ray Haq - Kinesiology and Structural Release Therapy. At that point, I was willing to try anything that might help me live more comfortably.

Just four weeks into my treatment, I can honestly say I am incredibly grateful for the difference Ray has made in my life. Within only two sessions, the pain in my back and shoulders was gone. My posture has improved dramatically, and without even realising it at first, my mindset has become more positive and balanced in my day-to-day life.

As the treatment continues, I’m also becoming aware of areas in my body that had underlying issues I never even realised were there. Addressing these has made a huge difference, and I’m continuing with my treatment to help me feel 100% back to myself.

I cannot recommend Ray highly enough. If you feel like you’ve tried everything and are at the end of your tether, I wholeheartedly encourage you to give him a call — it could truly change your life, as it has mine.

What Ray offers is remarkable. I reached out to him following 18 months of pain and numbness in my hands, wrists, arms and shoulders, which had been diagnosed as repetitive strain injury caused by poor posture and long hours slumped over a laptop. My symptoms started to alleviate almost immediately after I started seeing Ray, which has been incredible, but really is only the tip of the iceberg in terms of the benefits I’ve received. My posture has also improved enormously and my body feels more open and less physically restricted than it has in years. For me though, the most significant change has been in my mindset, emotional resilience and general experience of life. I feel open to life and opportunities in a way that I certainly wasn’t before my first session with Ray. I have already recommended Ray to several friends and they are equally grateful as me for the transformation they’re experiencing.

Luckily I was aware of myofascial release therapy and found Ray via an online search, after being suddenly debilitated by an agonizing pain throughout the length of my right thigh, which came on after a yoga session. I went to the doctor who wasn't sure what was causing the pain, guessed it must be a pulled muscle, told me to rest it and take painkillers. However I knew that myofascial release treatment would most likely be more effective and since the practitioner I had been to before was indisposed, I booked an appointment with Ray who saw me later that very same day. At the time I couldn't walk or stand up because the pain was so excruciating and I could only sleep on a concoction of strong painkillers and sleeping medication. After my first session Ray alleviated the pain to such a degree that I no longer needed any medication. Within six days I could walk again, pain-free. Within three sessions (over 2 weeks) I was also able to stand up for long periods with no pain. In fact all the pain had disappeared.
Ray began by assessing me holistically and explaining that he could get rid of the pain no problem but it was a symptom of a bigger cause which was bad posture, which I'd had for years and needed rectifying. He explained that by manipulating myofascial tissues he could create the spaces for my muscles and bones to grow into to prevent further issues like the one I had just suffered. I am now committed to a long-term course of treatments from him to realign my body and strengthen my muscles in all the right places so that I can carry on with the rest of my life exercising regularly and not getting any injuries.
After a treatment with Ray my body needs to rest and absorb the effects. It is obvious some level of profound work has been done. I find myself far more aware of my posture and the position my body should be in. I find my body moving into the right places on its own - even in my sleep. Once my treatment is complete I will be able to do this without having to think about it and exercise safely moving forwards. I would totally recommend Ray to anyone who needs healing from physical pain. He is amazing!

After trying the usual routes for pain relief such as physios,chiropractors and regular massage a friend suggested I visit Ray for my facial and structural release treatment.Since then I have worked with Ray for a number of years and once I had overcome my natural scepticism I have felt significant relief in pain from his work. I can honestly say that he has transformed me both physically and mentally.The work he does is truly amazing, I credit him with being the most positive influence in my life in recent years.For those who are ready to commit I couldn’t recommend him highly enough.
Thank you Ray.

I have been suffering from chronic shoulder pain and tightness that was effecting me every day. This also meant it was slowly starting to affect othe parts of my body.  I found Ray when searching on Google over a month ago, and let me tell you I am so glad I did! From the very first treatment he was able to relieve me from the stress and tightness in my shoulder that was there for almost 23 years. There is still some work to do and I continue to see Ray fortnightly.  There is no one else like him and i can honestly say he has given me hope for the future. Thanks Ray.
Absolutely stunning apartment,  amazing location very clean. Very accommodating with us, always at the other end of the phone if needed. Thanks.
Great apartment in a superb location. Easy check in. Would highly recommend.

Gorgeous flat. We loved it. Accessible to town and really well kept. We did ask if it had kitchen utensils and they said no so we took some but the kitchen is packed to the top with stuff ha. Maybe the owner has not visited physically in a while. We wasn’t complaining though. Would say the living room could do with more atmospheric light. It was very white and bright, but just lamps alone are too dull. Same for the kitchen. Couldn’t find the iPod dock but we took one anyway. A draining board would be useful. It fits 10 people but that would be a bit of a squeeze because three beds are in the living room and due to no door to the kitchen it limits the house in the early hours for people sleeping in or wanting to get up. Maybe a draw across curtain would be good between the kitchen and living room. Host was extremely quick responding and attentive.

Booked for the night before my wedding for me and my family and Jen was so attentive and communication was excellent! Jen even left me and my mum a bottle of Prosecco to celebrate. Easy to find rite in the Middle of Manchester. Lovely, clean apartment with all mod cons. We even had bath robes which was a nice touch. Thanks Lushpads!
Amazing apartment lots of little extras. Lots of space ideal for going out into centre of Manchester prime location. Couldn’t recommend this apartment enough.

Every time I come to the Beauty Gurus, I always leave feeling 100 times better!
Lesley is amazing! So welcoming and knows her stuff. I had my brows laminated for the first time and Lesley made sure they were perfect and I was happy with every step of the process.
I had my nails done again after the last set lasted 5 WEEKS! My nails feel strong and look incredible every time!
My go to for all things beauty!

Cannot recommend Yasmin enough. Was my daughter’s first visit for consultation for facial hair. We had been called back by the manager who was extremely apologetic as there had been a mistake with the appointment booking and we had been on our way home feeling very disappointed. She promised if we could turn back they would see us straight away for as long as we needed. We went back and the manager introduced us to Yasmin who did the initial consultation. As we had a lot of questions Yasmin was extremely patient and lovely, did the initial questionnaire and talked through the plan going forward and how to prepare for each treatment and what to do after. She also gave us her phone number in case we had any questions at all going forward. At all stages we could not have asked for a more professional, understanding, kind and lovely person. I knew she would look after my daughter going forward as she attended appointments going forward. I would give Yasmin 10/10 and completely recommend her to anybody who was wondering where to go.

Yasmin is excellent. Her work is quick, precise and she is lovely and calming presence during the treatment. Plus she is a Britney fan so A+++. Would absolutely reccomend having electrolysis with Yasmin for anyone looking to get it done : )

Went to Sam for waxing, she was absolutely brilliant, first time going to the Beauty Guru and was made to feel totally at ease, despite originally being nervous! Everything was explained beforehand and Sam was friendly and professional throughout, making sure to check in during the treatment. Sam also let me know whether or not other treatments I asked about would be suitable for me. A lot of other salons try to upsell regardless of suitability and I liked that Sam didn’t do that.

After booking, you are asked if there are any accommodations you need which I think is brilliant. The Beauty Guru is also such an inclusive environment which is so nice. Will definitely be back!

I’m currently on my third laser session on my intimate area and I’m already seeing such great results. I’m getting hardly any regrowth and didn’t even need to shave between the second and third session! I suffer a lot with  ingrown hairs, but these have also calmed down so much after getting laser, which I’m thrilled about. Sam works with me during the session to keep pain as minimal as possible whilst still doing it on a high enough setting to see fast results.
Totally messed up my eyebrows, I think the staff were pissed or needed glasses!  Awful Awful Awful experience ....... DO NOT GO
Excellent service, the staff were very nice and attentive to me and my mother. I would recommend it.

really nice staff and very good massage. I was working in the area and they fit me in at short notice. like most thai people, the lady knew exactly how to massage me and what i needed at the end, a really slow and sensual happy ending. Wow, two weeks of stress and tension was released from my body at a fair price. Explosive. i will return.

I had a very unpleasant experience at this massage place last night. I booked an 8:00 pm appointment on 13 October with Patty (one of the two masseuses shown in the online booking system) and received a confirmation email.

When I arrived about 10 minutes early, I phoned from outside the shop to check if I could come in. The staff member who answered seemed clueless and suddenly hung up on me. When I went inside, there were three staff members at the reception desk. One of them asked me rudely what I needed. I explained that I had an appointment with Patty. She looked confused, went inside to check, and came back saying Patty wasn’t in — without explaining what went wrong.

She seemed impatient and was frowning from the moment I walked in. Then, in a very unwilling tone, she said, “It’s fine, I can do it for you. You can pay now.” The way she said it made it sound as though she was doing me a favour. I told her she seemed unhappy, and another masseuse quickly tried to smooth things over by saying, “She always talks like that,” as if I should just accept her colleague’s rude behaviour.

I replied, “With that attitude, why would I want a massage now?” The rude masseuse said nothing, didn’t apologise, and still looked annoyed. I left the place in disbelief and anger.

Later, I checked their Google reviews and noticed several others had also complained about rude staff. The owner’s replies sounded serious, but clearly, the service hasn’t improved. Customers shouldn’t be treated like that. If an employee “always talks like that”, then she shouldn’t be working there.

I’ve had massages many times in England and was never treated so disrespectfully. This was by far the worst experience ever.

Best massage in Manchester – I can’t recommend it enough. Kat is amazing: she really listens and focuses on the areas that need attention. I always leave feeling completely refreshed. My boyfriend and I often book at the same time (in separate rooms) and we both love it. Fantastic every visit!
Fern was absolutely brilliant, found all the niggles, even the ones I didn't know about! Very friendly and professional. Nice surroundings, reasonable prices, was able to drop in on short notice.

I went in for massage with no appointment.the girl reception fitted me in in no time at all she was lovely relaxing and kind ...but the best was about to come my therapist did great work on me what with carrying shopping bags and a heavy workload well she worked on me from head to toe just pure perfection and hitting all my sore areas with her brilliant Thai hands I came out of there ....brand new... Best one IV had in a long time..can't wait to go again and get a top up...I would strongly recommend..enjoy...THANK YOU TO ALL t.THERE NAMAATE xxx
🙏

I have been going to Dr Grace for a number of years and her skill and expertise in the cosmetics field is impeccable.
From peels to injectable to threads she is amazing and the results are always great.
I had a peel last week and my skin is looking magnificent.

I highly recommend Dr Grace for any skin treatment.

Dr Grace  is an excellent practitioner, who is helping me heal my gut . I'm still on the journey  of healing and she is a good support and always  on hand for any questions .. I am sleeping  better my bloating and reflux has stopped . After suffering  for years with h pylori and reflux .
Absolutely love Dr grace I would not trust anyone but her she is profe she knows what she is doing I've been going to for her for few years and she has done amazing job..

I’m nearly 3 months post op, I had a breast uplift with implants by Dr Mounir. I’m 24 and lost a lot of weight fast so I was very down about how my breasts had dropped, and this whole experience has changed my life for the better! I can not express how amazing Dr Mounir is. My breasts have healed perfect and I have had no problems with them what so ever. My scars are perfectly neat and almost invisible already and everyone has said what an amazing job he has done. The whole experience from my first consultation to this day has been faultless, even under the circumstances with the pandemic. All the girls along the way with my appointments were great too. Dr Mounir is lovely and very professional, he made me feel so comfortable and welcome and he genuinely took interest in everything I said, he listened to me and never rushed me with anything. I left all my appointments feeling very positive about my choice of surgeon. I had my operation at First trust hospital in Preston and stayed over night at the hospital. The staff were incredible, everything ran smoothly and they were constantly making sure I was okay and assisting me. Dr Mounir came to see me almost straight after I woke from my surgery to check how I was and sat and spoke with me about everything. I was discharged with everything I needed and had more than all the information I needed, I couldn’t stop smiling on my way home and could of cried with how happy I felt about how it all went. Any questions I’ve had since the operation I’ve directly asked Dr Mounir and he’s replied to me within minutes, an hour tops.. if that isn’t great care then I don’t know what is! I can not thank MYA and Dr Mounir enough for making the whole experience the best I could possibly ask for and he has certainly changed my life and confidence. Nothing I can do will express how grateful I am and if anyone is considering the same procedure as me I would totally recommend Dr Mounir. I am usually the type of person to find something wrong with everything but I can not fault Dr Mounir or my experience at all.
I am almost due my 12 week check up and I can’t wait! If I was to ever have anymore surgery I would 100% go to Dr Mounir again without a doubt.

Amazing and 5 stars is not enough Dr Mounir so caring, professional and gives you honest expectations, he is always there if you need him . I just had 6 week checkup and we both really happy with the results I had to have implant removal from surgery I had 16 years ago with A different company I had severe capsulated contraction. And I also had new implants and uplift. So all I can say is if your considering surgery I would 100% say go for it with Dr Mounir .

I had my surgery with Mr Mounir four weeks ago and I cannot be more pleased with the results, they are already healing so well and the process has been amazing from start to finish! Would highly recommend anyone wanting surgery to go with Mr Mounir

Dr Mounir gave me new beautiful breasts and a new better life.  He is very friendly, he explained everything to me exactly and he perfectly selected the size of the implants for me! I am premature that I fell into his hands.  The entire course from the first visit to the operation was an extremely pleasant adventure.  Contacting Dr. Mounir is extremely easy and fast.  He is a master at doing this to you.  I cannot express my happiness and thanks to him! I recommend Dr wholeheartedly!  He is the BEST!!
THANK YOU SO MUCH ❤

I highly recommend Dr. Mounir. A very trustworthy and honest surgeon. I recently had a breast augmentation after having 4 children and I'm amazed at my results! I researched before my procedure and knew I wanted Dr. Mounir to do my surgery before I even met him. My consultations were very informative and I felt happy and relaxed. I would definitely go back to Dr. Mounir if I wished to have more surgery in the future.

A gorgeous spa with thermal suite including sauna, steam room and salt cave along with heated loungers in the relaxation room. Shame there wasn't a hot tub or pool to plunge into, but the staff were amazing - as was my massage and the 2 course lunch I enjoyed as part of my package. Highly recommended!

Amazing for a back massage! Me and my family went for a spa evening yesterday. The spa itself is quite small and doesn’t have a pool but it’s relaxing, clean and nicely designed. I especially enjoyed the heated beds. The best part, however, was the 30 minute back massage from Ellie, definitely the best massage I’ve had and I felt amazing after 🤍

Had a spa day but it was pretty average. It’s a really generic hotel spa. No jacuzzi or anything. Room where you get the massage was cold, therapist hands were cold and you could hear everything going on in the hallway.

Lovely spa in the heart of Manchester. We booked a package with a light lunch and the food was amazing! IThe hot stone massage was excellent and the facilities are great. I have to also thank Caitlin on reception who could not do enough for us. We will be returning.

lovely and friendly staff, everytime i come in and leave im always greeted with a friendly hello and a smile! during my first few sessions here i was pretty nervous but i asked one of the employees for help with equipment and they were more than happy to show me round! there’s no cable row but they showed me an alternative which works just as well! given the space, they have everything you could need and even a dedicated hip thrust space with a barbell for the girlies looking to grow their glutes!

Changing rooms are always clean and tidy, never have to wait too long for equipment aside from the cables occasionally. have been coming here for quite a few months now and no real complaints!

the facilities here are great, as a new gym goer i was quite nervous about starting but the girl behind the front desk (didn’t catch her name sorry! she had dark hair) was so friendly and put me at ease instantly! highly recommend 🫶🏼
Pretty decent gym. Pool needs a makeover and a women’s only sauna would be good. But for the price it’s good value. The classes are amazing and the staff and members are lovely. Recommend.

Facilities are great but cancelled my membership after 2 visits due to the girl behind the front desk being rude and unwelcoming! She made me feel so uncomfortable on both occasions, not the experience you expect for a £40/month membership

I recently joined but cancelled membership after a trial.
Positives:
Pool is great.
Sauna - is very hot great.
Staff i signed up with were fine. Although some others seemed unfriendly.
Really friendly patrons.

Negatives:
Opening hours on Friday evening and weekend are very limiting.
They hire out some of their lockers which is just a bizarre thing to do. Why?
The poolside closes at 45 minutes before closing time, what??
There is no spinner to dry wet gear and no bags provided. I askes staff where the spinner was and they replied only posh gyms have those! Ahem.. No!
The lockers in the male changing room absolutely manky. The lino is coming up in places and its very dirty. This entire area needs a serious makeover. The benches in the changing room are very uncomfortable to sit on and the area seems very humid with very little space. There seems to be no air con which is surprising as this will encourage mould given the damness and heat in this area
The hot showers are like something from the 1950s. You cant adjust the temp and they all seem to go off after about 30 seconds. This is really annoying as you have to keep pushing the button while trying to have a shower.
No seats on pool side, although there are two recliners.
There are no hot showers on poolside. They seem to have invested in a lot of cold showers because at least half the showers are cold showers. The cold showers dont go off after 30 seconds! 🤔
The steam room is really hot which is great but the seating is really uncomfortable.
The male changing room and showers gives the impression that management are skimming as much profit as they can off the top but not investing anything back into the business. Disapointing

Came in today and had my hair done by Lucy, she was so sweet and did such an amazing job! The whole process took about 6 hours (I have a lot of hair) and she took so much care and attention to detail throughout, consistently made sure I was happy with it.

I had a full head balayage, toner, cut and finish (you can book this all as one service, price varies slightly depending on whether you get a Stylist/ Senior Stylist) and added on an olaplex treatment on top of that. The total came to £165 - no hidden add on charges (cough cough Rush) and I had the option to pay before or after.

I’ve never paid less than £200 for a balayage, never mind having a cut thrown in as well. It looks and feels absolutely gorgeous (see pic)

I definitely won’t be going elsewhere when I need my hair done! Thank you Lucy and New Church House 🫶🏻
I had my hair cut & styled by Oliver yesterday and it was such a great experience!! He gave me exactly what I asked for and I love my new hair !! 10/10 service throughout :)

Excellent service I had my hair done half head of highlights with Elise and I’m absolutely in love my blonde couloir. Best hairdresser 💇‍♀️ I’ve found in Manchester.

Thanks so much Elise 💕 highly recommend.

I’ve just done my haircut with Crystal and she was lovely, friendly and professional. She put so much effort into my hair and took the time to explain all the things I can do at home to help maintain it. Couldn’t recommend her enough!

Crystal Li is the best stylist, for years I couldn’t find someone who knew how to manage Afro curly hair and give it a blow dry that looks smooth silky and lasts long, my hair stays straight for 7 whole days! I absolutely love it and I’ve returned many times since the first time I’ve been. She’s super lovely and has the hands of the hair gods! Highly recommended it to the curly hair girlies who want their hair straight or a smooth curly blow dry. I have weave extensions which is a lot harder to deal with but Crystal works it like magic!
Avoid this place many other better massage places available which are more experienced and won’t charge you any extra fees

Brand new nice and clean environment
Nice staff and very polite service
I had a visit tonight and a nice well experienced young Indian lady done a good massage job for me , also by the end I meet the manager Tip which I knew her from long time ago in this business and she had a very nice welcome to her new place to me , definitely I will visit swan 2 massage and spa in the George Street number 48 again and I do suggest them services to everyone.
Overpriced! No muscle stretchs and no hot water! Avoid!

I I haven’t had a massage in almost two years, and today I finally booked a 1.5-hour session with a lovely therapist — it was amazing. She was incredibly skilled, gentle, and had such a warm service mind. I’m definitely coming back again. Highly recommended! 💆🏻‍♀️✨

I couldn’t have asked for a more skilled, knowledgable and accommodating practitioner than El! After my first lymphatic drainage massage I felt so much lighter, physically and mentally, I was astonished. I can’t wait to book my next treatment
Brilliant massage with El - perfectly firm pressure and definitely got out some deep knots! Will be back again for sure, thank you 🙏
From start to finish, my experience with El was exceptional. The studio was clean and calming, and the treatment felt really personal and effective. Thank you so much El

I had a very nice sleep after my massage session with 'The Sculpting Art '. That was a one in a million experience.
She was so professional and attentive.
She’s an amazing masseuse, very knowledgeable and very professional

I’ve had many wonderful experiences with my laser hair removal specialist Wesley! She’s always made me feel so comfortable right from the beginning.  She’s always been very professional and attentive towards tailoring my journey and really cares about her clients. I would highly recommend her and the service I’ve received!

This was the worst experience I’ve ever had. Yesterday, I went in for my half-face laser treatment. Normally, I book this online, but that option has been removed. Instead, I booked lip and chin, which showed a 10-minute appointment. My usual half-face treatment doesn’t even take 10 minutes to complete.

Initially, I was told they couldn’t do the half-face treatment. After I explained the situation, the technician eventually agreed to proceed with the half face. However, after the treatment was completed, I was informed that I would be charged for a full-face session—even though only half of my face was treated. The justification given was that it was “more cost-effective.” While I understand that point, it should have been clearly explained before the procedure. I was only informed at the payment stage. Had I known I would be charged for a full face, I would have used the service accordingly.

On top of that, the staff’s attitude was extremely disappointing. The manager appeared visibly displeased when I came to make the payment, seemingly because I had only done half face—even though the entire procedure took less than 10 minutes. This kind of attitude is completely unacceptable.

I travelled nearly an hour for this appointment, and unfortunately, this is not the first time I’ve experienced such behaviour here. I will not be returning, nor would I recommend this place to others.

Hi. I recently got laser hair removal from half face to get hair removed from my jawline, chin and upper lips. Even after taking 10 sessions, I am getting hair like crazy on my face. I paid so much for these 10 treatments but 0 results. I have attached photos for the reference too. The hair has not even gone less, they grow at the same rate as they used to before I got laser done. Had I known I would be getting no results, I would have opted some other place .

I had the most amazing experience with my laser hair removal specialist Kornelija! From the very first session, she made me feel completely comfortable and at ease. She is highly professional, attentive, and genuinely cares about her clients. The procedure was explained in detail, and she patiently answered all of my questions.

Her technique is gentle yet incredibly effective — I noticed visible results much faster than I expected. The clinic is spotless, modern, and creates a very relaxing atmosphere. What I appreciate the most is her warm personality and the way she makes each appointment feel personal and tailored to my needs.

I cannot recommend her enough! If you are considering laser hair removal, this is definitely the right place and the right specialist. She goes above and beyond to make sure you get the best possible results. Absolutely five stars! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

I’ve had a really great experience of Laser Hair Removal. In 6 sessions I really saw a difference. The service is really quick but on my last session I had to wait 20 minutes. But Farah really went above and beyond to help the situation. She’s a great practitioner with lots of attention to detail and was able to get me a free session to apologise. Thank you Farah!

Dr Kami is the most kindest person ever! She puts her patients over everything. I was very nervous at first and she calmed me down straight away! I would recommend her very much and you won’t be disappointed!!
Real professional! She knows what she’s doing! If you want beautiful lips or have a Botox or much more definitely recommend dr Kamila! Definitely will be coming back

Dr Kami amazing,  understanding so down to earth helping people achieve their amazing smiles/ looks, she is so caring and knows how to ease patient nerves.. I would definitely be coming back for more treatments i feel more comfortable and def recommend her to everyone.. she very thorough in her work and very informative with patients. 👍
Fantastic and effective treatments! 10 years younger !! Hot lip fillers!
Amazing botox treatment!

I’ve been visiting house of vanity for almost a year now for almost a year now and recently visited them for a special celebration for me and my team - the girls here cannot do enough for you, (Elena especially) and both me and my team were absolutely over the moon with our hair - I was even fussier than usual and Elena made sure I was 100% happy before I left; even doing last minute touch ups for me when needed. If you’re based in Manchester and you need hair up or a bouncy blowdry, this is absolutely the place to go! X
Loved my visit to house of vanity! My curls turned out gorgeous and all staff were so lovely, will definitely be coming back💗

They were just wonderful. I was super anxious and they put me right to ease, offering tea, coffee, I even was given Chocolates! The salon was super clean, the girls were just so lovely and my hair turned out wonderful. They had such a short turn around and I was so happy with the result. Absolutely highly recommend!

The person who cut my hair was lovely but unfortunately it’s the worst haircut I’ve ever had. Fringe miles too short, uneven layers and nothing like I requested. I just wanted to pay and get out quickly to avoid any further damage. Hoping it grows out soon. Wouldn’t recommend (although the head spa I had separately before the cut was great!)

I’ve lived in Manchester for nearly 10 years and have tried several salons looking for the perfect bouncy blow dry, but was always left disappointed.
I found Elena at HoV last year and she’s just truly perfect! I would now never go anywhere else and always leave with the perfect bouncy blow which holds for days!!
Gorgeous hair products are also used which are suitable for extensions 🫶🏼

I had such a fantastic experience at REVIV Manchester! The whole team was warm, knowledgeable, and made me feel completely comfortable from start to finish. The clinic is beautiful, clean, and relaxing — a real self-care space.

My treatment was explained clearly and done with such care and professionalism. I left feeling recharged, hydrated, and genuinely glowing. You can tell the staff truly care about your wellness, not just the treatment.

Highly recommend to anyone looking to invest in their health, recovery, and overall wellbeing. I’ll definitely be back — thank you to the whole team for the amazing service! ✨

— Journey with Rue 💜
Rue

Booked the Megaboost IV drip at Revive and left feeling amazing. The team were welcoming and knowledgeable, and they explained everything clearly. The clinic is spotless and relaxing, and the whole experience was smooth from start to finish. I will be back and happily recommend Revive to anyone considering IV therapy.

Me and my boyfriend went together for IV drips and had such a lovely experience! The staff were so kind, professional, and made us feel completely comfortable the whole time. The clinic was super clean and relaxing, and we both left feeling so refreshed and re-energised. Definitely one of the best wellness experiences we’ve had — we’ll 100% be coming back soon!

Around 4 months ago i underwent the 10x Precision Genetic test at REVIV. The results took around 3 weeks and I arranged a consultation with Dr Michael Barnish to explain the Health and Weight loss aspect of the results. Dr Barnish was both knowledgeable professional and caring. He took his time to explain every aspect of the test. And at the end of the process I felt able to follow a comprehensive course of action to improve my health.

Although I was motivated enough to go ahead and take this test as a 64yr old relatively fit woman I was a little bit sceptical on how to improve.

Over the following 3 months I took Dr Barnish’s advice on how to follow the results in line with the recommended food types and I subscribed to the 10x supplements.

Well I have to say I am absolutely shocked, astonished and amazed!!! Better than I could have imagined …..I have far more energy and my constant lower back and shoulder pain has now gone.

I really can’t thank Dr Barnish /the REVIV team and 10x enough for changing my daily life.
Huge thanks you are all amazing, thank you again.

Fantastic. Attended over the weekend. This was so relaxing. Clinically clean. I had a NAD+ injection which was done painless and effortless. Really enjoyed my time here. 100% reccommed this place. Will be coming back regularly. Thankyou

I’ve struggled to find a salon that understands Asian eye shapes, but this place is amazing. The lash design was customised perfectly and looks beautiful without feeling heavy. Super detailed and professional service. Highly recommend!

Found this lovely beauty salon in Manchester Chinatown and I’m so glad I did! The technician was very professional and took time to customise everything for me. My lashes look natural and clean, and the whole place feels calm and hygienic. Will definitely come back.

TLDR: Absolutely amazing head spa and highly recommend!!

I had an absolutely amazing time at The Head Spa Manchester!! I had Jade and she was lovely as always and made the experience super relaxing and enjoyable!

The consultation was super straightforward and easy to understand, even having a peek at what your scalp / hair condition was like (I was lucky mine was proven to be healthy).

The entire massage experience was a blast and I fell asleep multiple times due to being super relaxed! The products used made my hair feel super hydrated, light and felt soft the entire day!

The overall experience was super positive and I highly recommend giving this a go to pamper yourself 💖

What a a fantastic morning I had at The head spa,  it's a beautiful relaxing space. The staff are so professional, kind and make the whole experience really enjoyable from start to finish. Everything is Explained through the whole process. The decor is lush and really professionally done.
Special thanks to (Marcelina) who did my treatment.  A perfect birthday treat to myself.

Highly recommend the spa and a great location.

Wow, this is a whole experience, an experience that everyone MUST be lucky enough to have.

I cannot express my gratitude to Molly enough. I have never felt so comfortable with someone. Her aura, softness, and incredible work transports you to a healing space . You’re a truly incredible artist thank you.

Attention to detail is not something taken lightly here. A high end experience surrounded by beauty.

From the moment I first messaged The Head Spa, the care and consideration they have was obvious. Molly told me that my session was all about me and that I would be looked after. I genuinely was. As soon as I stepped foot through the door, I felt the ethereal, relaxed vibe. Molly has an incredible aura and I could have stayed in that room for the rest of my life! My hair feels amazing too 😍. Will definitely be going again and recommending to everyone!

First ever head spa after seeing the salon on TikTok and my goodness I was not disappointed! Marcelina was amazing and the whole experience from start to finish was so relaxing and enjoyable including our little yap mid blow dry discussing all things Olivia dean and our top 3 baby names whilst sipping on a hot fruity cinnamon tea! I cannot wait to come back and will for sure be buying all my besties a voucher to come visit! Worth every single penny. Thanks so much Marcelina!xxx

I had horrible experiences here….  I’m quite decided not to go there anymore! These girls are very rude and unprofessional, most are east European girls; rushing up their clients, not letting you touching them, and more than that not offering the whole service you pay for. Their language is unacceptable. Not worthy at all for the price they are charging.
I am disappointed and definitely won’t go there. This review is for those interested in an honest recommendation.
Absolutely shocking establishment. Shoddy and utterly the filthiest I've seen! 0/5 stars
Mind blown, not just a lip service, good grip on the events even though clearly experienced. Nothing was off the menu and no one in a rush
Nice massage and nice grills lovely and I'm very happy when I go there
It's alright.

I had a fantastic experience with Dr Ali. From the moment I arrived, he made me feel completely at ease with his calm and reassuring approach. He took the time to explain everything clearly, answered all my questions with patience, and made sure I was comfortable throughout the entire process.
Dr Ali is extremely professional and knowledgeable, and it really shows in both his technique and his results. I felt I was in very safe hands the whole time. The outcome was exactly what I hoped for; subtle, natural, and really well done. I couldn’t be happier and would highly recommend him to anyone considering treatment.

I had an appointment scheduled with Dr. Rosh, yet I was left waiting 15 minutes past my time. Not only did he fail to offer any apology, but he also dismissed my concerns entirely. His demeanor was arrogant, unprofessional, and clearly motivated by money rather than genuine patient care.
Do not be misled by his TikTok and Instagram presence — that’s nothing more than clever marketing. The reality is completely different. If you are considering treatment with Dr. Rosh, save your money and go to a clinic that treats patients with professionalism, respect, and courtesy. Overall he was outright rude and his behaviour was insulting and degrading!!!!!!
Throughout the consultation, he was rude, inattentive, and spent more time on his phone than engaging with me as a patient. He didn’t even acknowledge me as a person. Thankfully, I did not have to pay for this consultation — it would have been an absolute waste.
AVOID DR ROSH AT ALL COST.
Superb experience.  Stunning clinic and Dr Rosh is top of his game. Loved the results and have already booked back in for more treatment.

Dr. Ali is just amazing. He’s so professional and easygoing, as someone who hates needles he made me so comfortable, especially as I’ve never had anything done prior. If you’re someone whose anxious about needles or anything like that just know that he will help you feel at ease. I left the appointment not only looking great but feeling amazing about myself!

I came in for tear trough fillers and left feeling like a fresher, more confident version of myself. Dr. Ali Nahiyeh was professional from start to finish, he took his time to explain everything clearly, made sure I was comfortable, and the results? Clean and natural.

Imma was very nice and helpfull.
Explained how the swidish massage works,  as was my firts time.
She really makes a good massage.  My shoulder is much better.
Thank you Imma.

Imma give great massages. She clearly cares about her clients health and I've already gone back for a second session. I'm now going once a month and I'm tempted to make it twice a month.

Her deep tissue massage is serious, the amount of pressure is unbelievable. I really needed a good massage and now I no longer have any back pain at work which is a total blessing

Can't wait to go back

She also does Indian head massage and hot stone. If you haven't tried you need to 😁

10/10! Ima is a true professional, not only is she a fantastic masseuse but a wonderful person to boot. I came here for my first ever massage and she more than helped me feel at ease and completely fixed the pain and tension I was feeling in my neck and shoulders. Lovely person, amazing service and very affordable, would highly recommended!

Unfortunately, this was a disappointing experience. This was booked via Groupon as a gift. At no point was I asked about my health and well-being, which I was expecting right from the beginning. As it was a gift, the deep tissue massage wasn't suitable, so in all fairness, the therapist switched to a Swedish massage instead. During the massage, I did ask for less pressure, however her response was a sigh and she wasn't happy about making adjustments. Going forward, I feel the therapist should take into consideration the needs of each client, particularly when it comes to pressure as it can ruin people's experience if too much is applied.

I booked for a special massage via Groupon for a 60 minute Swedish massage, and I've had an awful experience. I had an appointment booked for 10am today; rang the lady at 9:49am and 9:51am, and there was no response on both attempts. We were struggling to find the shop, as it is not clearly located or stated in the booking. It is a one room shop within a building of other shops. I also messaged the lady and again no response. I have all the evidence.
Luckily after going from door to door I managed to find her outside the building about to walk in at 9:56am?! I asked her if she knew where Soul fit is and she said yes that's me etc. So I said I'm going back to my car and come round to drop my mother off at the entrance (all one way roads in Manchester).
My mum was pressing the buzzer at 10am, and got started at 10:06am. This was one issue!
The next one was when my mum entered the room was very cold as she had only arrived herself! The lady was very rude to my mum. My mum kept on saying that she was very cold and she was no it's fine! A thin towel was given to my mum which obviously didn't help! My mum didn't enjoy it what so ever. She rushed the massage and oiled one leg only without massaging it! The lady finished at 10:50am. I then went into collect my mum and again the lady was rude to me, I said that I wouldn't be coming back and she snatched some leaflets from my mother! I will not be going back there again!

I visited Manchester for work and needed a massage for relaxation. Teresa's Massage was recommended to me by a friend, and I rate it 10/10! Teresa's technique was incredibly relaxing. She targeted my muscle pains skilfully. And the lobby downstairs was spacious and quiet.

Been here since it opened, they do the best massage in Manchester. Very effective, the masseuse concentrated on my shoulder and back which was very stiff. Overall a very good experience and another thing I would like to say is that the massage room is clean, peaceful and very private.

Thank you 🙏🏻

Excellent massage technique and really helped my muscles and back tension. Lovely, safe and warm room. Teresa is friendly and provides one of the best services in Manchester.  Convenient location. Highly recommended.

Absolutely exceeded expectations! From the moment I walked in, the staff’s professionalism and personalized care blew me away. The massage was a game-changer – it melted away my stress and muscle tension, leaving me feeling rejuvenated. The beauty treatments, tailored to my skin type, left my skin glowing. Every detail of the service was top-notch, making it the best beauty and massage experience I’ve ever had. I’ll definitely be back and highly recommend it to friends and family for unbeatable pampering. A true gem!
THE best full body massage I’ve ever had! The room & facilities are very clean, comfortable and especially relaxing 😌 Thanks to the lovely Theresa xxx

Nill was fantastic. Her consultation process is flawless, she’s excellent at making you feel relaxed by expertly providing advice and explaining the procedure. Her naturalistic approach provides beautiful results and I’m so happy I chose to go and see her. I have recommended her to many and will continue to do so.

I've been having treatments with Nill for a while now and I cannot reccomend her enough. It is clear to see Nill's medical training in her thorough approach to consultation, discussion of risks and expectations of results. Nill always works with me to make sure I'm happy with the overall result. Added to this Nill is such a lovely, kind person who will instantly put you at ease. I wouldn't trust anyone else with my face now!

I cannot express enough how grateful I am to have found Nilli at Tweaks Clinic! From the moment I walked through the door, I was greeted with warmth and kindness that instantly made me feel comfortable. Nilli’s lovely personality and genuine care for her clients shine through in everything she does.

During my consultations, Nilli took the time to listen to my concerns and recommended wonderful treatments that were perfectly tailored to my needs. Her expertise and passion for her work are evident, and I truly appreciate the thoughtful guidance she provided. The treatments have not only enhanced my appearance but have also significantly boosted my confidence!

I am so happy I came across Nilli; she has made a positive impact on my life, and I can't thank her enough. If you're looking for someone who is skilled, compassionate, and dedicated to making you feel your best, look no further than Nilli at Tweaks Clinic!

It’s always such a lovely time when I’m in the clinic, Nill is an angel! I always feel so comfortable, she’s such a professional, great at what she does and I wouldn’t trust anyone else! Couldn’t recommend her more!

Dr Nill is totally amazing! Her consultation was thorough, knowledgeable, and honest. Rather than jumping in straight away with treatments, we discussed my goals, what treatments would help me get there, and what maintenance of those results would involve. I felt like I was in very safe hands throughout, partly because of Nill’s calming influence, but also knowing that she is a highly skilled and trained medical professional. I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend her to my closest friends and family. Thank you Nill!
Doesnt appear to be a genuine business - booked for appointment here, arrived at location but no sign of the business in the building and no answer on either of the mobile numbers given

I had a massage with Fede and it was one of the best I’ve ever had. Her technique was amazing, firm yet relaxing and I left feeling completely renewed. The clinic and the room is spotless, cosy and calming with soothing music. I’ll definitely be back and definitely recommend Fede to anyone looking for a great therapist in a great location.

I’ve tried EMDR and somatic therapy a number of times but never really ‘got it’ until I started working with Sarah
I don’t know exactly how it works but it does and week by week I can my life gradually transforming.
Would definitely recommend, especially if you find it hard to pinpoint specific issues and memories. She creates a safe, supportive space and is incredibly skilled at gently guiding you through the process at your own pace.

I recently booked a deep tissue massage with Fede, who provided a unique experience with impeccable service. As soon as I arrived and met Fede, I felt an atmosphere of complete relaxation. The room was also clean and immaculate. As a therapist she is phenomenonal. The experience was wonderful. I cannot recommend her highly enough. I will definitely be back.

I had a lymphatic drainage massage with Elaine and it was an incredibly relaxing experience. From the moment I arrived, the atmosphere was calming, soft lighting, soothing music, and Elaine was a very professional and welcoming therapist. Will definitely be returning 😊

My lymphatic drainage massage with Elaine was a lovely relaxing experience and she made me feel super comfortable as it was my first time having one. She was very kind and the room itself was warm and cosy.
I’m beyond happy! The cosmetologist is very thorough, gentle, and truly knows her work. She created such a beautiful result – I felt amazing! 💕
Isobella was amazing! I had slim face procedure and I am super happy with the results. Highly recommend and have already booked my second treatment.
I loved the results, the doctor's kindness was essential. I'll be back for my touch-up
An amazing experience, felt so looked after and the results just followed! Can’t wait to be back in!
Isobel was so professional, can’t fault her and my results are INSANE 🥳🩷

I had my haircut on 9 December. It has now been a week, and the situation has still not been resolved.

During the consultation, I asked to add soft layers at the bottom. Instead, my hair was cut unevenly with random, choppy sections starting halfway down the length. The front — which I asked not to be touched — was cut significantly shorter, and on one side around my face there is an abrupt short section that looks very bad and cannot be blended.
I spent two years growing my hair, and in one appointment it was damaged to the point that the only way to fix it now is to cut it much shorter. I now also have to spend more money at another salon to fix this than I paid for this haircut.

I was asked to return and discuss possible next steps, but I do not trust the salon to correct damage that should never have happened in the first place.

Management confirmed in writing that a refund would be issued and asked for my bank details, but despite multiple follow-ups, nothing has been done. My last two emails, sent on Friday, have received no reply at all, and no refund has been processed.

This is not a minor styling issue — it is permanent damage to hair that took years to grow. I would strongly advise others to be very cautious, especially if you care about maintaining your hair length.

I am posting photos of the haircut, so people can judge for themselves.

UPDATE / PART 2

This is an update to my experience following my haircut on 9 December.

Since my last review, the situation has still not been resolved. Despite multiple follow-up emails, my last emails received no reply, and no refund has been issued.
I was explicitly told by the salon that a refund would be processed and was asked to provide my bank details, which I did. I provided them and then was ignored for a full week — no refund, no updates, no replies to my last emails. After waiting and getting nowhere, I left a review. A week after we called to ask what was happening and were told that the refund would no longer be issued because I left a bad review.

At this point, I am out of pocket, and I am also having to spend more money at another salon to fix the damage caused to my hair.

This has been handled extremely poorly from start to finish. What’s most shocking is not just the bad haircut, but the way this has been handled afterward — broken promises, no communication, and then retaliation for leaving an honest review.

I’m leaving this update so people can understand not only the quality of the work, but how problems are handled when something goes wrong.

Charlotte went above and beyond during my appointment to have my hair extensions taken out, cleaned, re-fitted. I also had my hair colour refreshed and my red moneypieces bleached and dyed red again. The whole process was fantastic - Charlotte shared her opinion on what would look best and I was guided by her ideas and thoughts which was a great call because I am incredibly happy with the outcome. Charlotte provided hair care tips too which has completely changed the way I look after my hair extensions for the better. I loved my appointment and know I’ll always be in safe hands with Charlotte.
The whole team were friendly and welcoming, and made me feel very at ease.
Thank you!

Absolutely loved my haircut and style with Jordan. He was so lovely from start to finish and really took the time to understand what I wanted. The result honestly exceeded my expectations. It is the best my hair has ever looked. I walked out feeling confident, fresh, and genuinely thrilled with the finish. I would recommend Jordan without hesitation and cannot wait to book again.

I had my hair done by Jordan and had a really great experience. I went in with very dark brown/black hair, and Jordan did an amazing job lightening it far more than we originally thought would be possible, while still keeping my hair healthy and well cared for.

He was really friendly and reassuring throughout the appointment and took the time to explain what he was doing at each stage, which made me feel comfortable and confident in the process. The balayage is beautifully blended and the overall finish looks polished and professional.

Thank you for such a positive experience - I’m really happy!

I just purchase the beautiful skin 101 estee lauder for gbp45.00 and i try to ask for some sample of estee lauder products as i am very regular customer.the girl at the counter did not even try to look at the estee lauder drawer and told me we dont hv sample. Its not not helpful.Boots please find more helpful people to assist that can make your company reputation grow and bring more sales to your company. PLEASE DO INSIST TO FIND THE RIGHT PERSON TO GROWTH YOUR COMPANY. AISH

Always back for Boots! Easy to get to, near Grand Central. Used to have a door by the bus stop outside, but now it's closed you have to enter from inside The Bullring itself. Still one of my favourite Boots in the city.
The lady on no7 this evening was incredibly helpful. she introduced me to this new mascara and though i’ve never tried no7 mascara until today, she was brilliant so i ended up buying 3.

To the Asian woman standing at the Sol de Janeiro section at around 3pm on Christmas Eve, you need to learn some manners. You asked if I need help, I said I’m okay thanks, but then you continued to stand there and intensely watch my every move and look me up and down in a judgemental manner, and as I’m sniffing the spray part of the bottles (I did not want to spray on myself as I’ve already sprayed some perfumes and it’s not like there are unused sample papers around) you’re there looking so closely and then had the cheek to say “you know you can spray them if you want”. Nooo way really??? You don’t say!

Going to preface this by saying that I am a muslim wearing hijab. As I was leaving, many people were leaving at the same time, the alarm went off. Security pulled me back in and accused me of taking something, he kept asking me what I’d taken, I kept saying I had not took anything, I told him to check me, I offered to empty my pockets and bag, I told him to check the cameras. He kept refusing. So I couldn’t prove myself. When he let me go, the alarm didn’t beep. Because I didn’t take anything. And I didn’t even get an apology. I have never been so humiliated and embarrassed in my life. To be falsely accused of something in front of everybody else, and I’m sure he singled me out because I’m visibly muslim.

I recently bought a backwash unit and a chair from DIR for my new hair salon, and I’m so happy with my purchase! The quality is amazing — sturdy, stylish, and super comfortable. My clients always comment on how comfy the backwash is.

The customer service was excellent too — they were very helpful and quick to answer all my questions. Delivery was smooth and everything arrived in perfect condition.

Highly recommend DIR if you’re opening a salon or looking to upgrade your furniture!

Online order was super easy, I had to change from collection to delivery and I got an email back within 24 hours to organise delivery and it arrived the next day. Can’t fault it, process was seamless. My new bed is exactly as expected and works perfectly!

Thank you so much to DIR for the fantastic support and assistance throughout the process. The delivery was very fast, and everything arrived perfectly. The chairs are absolutely lovely ,all of my customers comment on how comfortable they are. The backwash units are also fantastic , stylish and so comfortable, my clients really enjoy their experience.

The reception desk is so elegant and makes a great first impression when clients walk in. I’m extremely happy with the quality of everything and highly recommend DIR!

I have been looking for the ultimate solution for my pedicure/massage treatments for a good few months now and my choice fell on Libra 5 motors chair. This is not an investment that has been done lightly. I had to be sure that I will have access to spare parts etc…after the guarantee period ends. I have been comparing functionality, prices, terms of delivery and guarantee and I couldn’t be happier getting it from DIR Salon Furniture. I had questions and they have been answered promptly and professionally. I have done a mistake in my order and the sales manager put it right in a friendly and reassuring manner. Delivery was a breeze, with all the updates, tracking number, and very safely packed.
I have to say, this Chair is a piece of art! The leather feels so luxurious and soft, every seam oozing with quality, all mechanisms working smoothly and quietly. It’s just beautiful and doesn’t take much room. It does everything I need it to do and more. I am so happy! I excited to see my clients faces when they use it. It’s incredibly comfortable. Now my back is safe and I can be of service and do what I love for many years to come.
Thank you for producing such a majestic piece. It was a great experience purchasing it from you. All the best!

P.S I performed a couple of pedicures on this chair and it’s a breeze. My clients are very impressed with the level of comfort I can deliver now, thanks to this piece of equipment. The adjustment range is more than anyone would need. The size of sit can easily accommodate plus size people, which is very important. 🙏🏻

P.S A couple of weeks after my first purchase, I decided to place another order from DIR for a rolling stool with back support, to be used for manicure and pedicure services and to match my Libra chair. My choice fell on “Medusa”  model. Honestly, the quality is amazing, so robust, compact and comfortable and it’s really beautiful too! It rolls across my space so smoothly and quietly. I am fully equipped now but will recommend your store for other professionals as the quality of your products and communication in my experience is on a high level.
And once again - all the best!

Absolutely outstanding quality and service!

I recently ordered my salon chairs from DIR Furniture, and I honestly couldn’t be happier. From start to finish, the experience was seamless — professional, fast, and super helpful. The team went above and beyond to make sure everything matched my salon aesthetic perfectly.

The chairs are stunning — stylish, sturdy, and unbelievably comfortable for clients They’ve completely elevated the look and feel of my salon — I’ve had so many compliments already!

Delivery was quick, packaging was secure, and customer service kept me updated every step of the way. You can really tell DIR takes pride in both their products and their customers.

If you’re setting up or upgrading your salon, don’t look anywhere else — DIR Furniture is the best in the game. Beautiful designs, luxury comfort, and quality that speaks for itself.

Thank you so much for making my dream salon come to life! 💇‍♀️✨

Fantastic Clinic.!  I have been coming to this clinic almost 4 years know. I can’t recommend Courthouse clinic highly enough. The staff are so polite, caring and very professional. Always giving me the right advice and help. The atmosphere is very warm and welcome every time I visit the clinic. The receptionist’s Helen and Jane are amazing, caring and very helpful.  The therapists I have my treatment done by is a lady called Ansari. She is very knowledgeable and professional, makes my treatment very relaxing. I recommended this clinic to my mum, who is also a regular client. Amazing staff and therapists, thank you for all your support. Best Clinic in Birmingham!.. x

This is my first clinic visit and i must say, it will certainly wont be my last because all of what i experience was AMAZING. The staff are the best. They are so friendly and hospitable. My physician had a smashing personality. She radiated a very friendly and positive attitude which makes me feel comfortable in each and every visit. Each treatment and products are thoroughly explain so i could have a good understanding. after each session, the would reach out to me to check in which is so good. I want to say thanks to each and every member of staff for making my experience breath taking.

Several family members have been coming to this clinic for over ten years and when I recently joined, I felt extremely welcomed. I find my therapist, Norelle really comfortable to be around, she always checks on me throughout the procedure and is very efficient. Helen on reception is also great, as a university student I have restricted time for appointments, only on weekends when I’m home. Helen is so accommodating and always tries to squeeze me in! I love the relaxed environment you all create and am loving the results of the laser treatment!!!

I couldn't recommend this clinic highly enough. I was very nervous to have botox for the first time but the staff there were so friendly and really helped to put me at ease. The doctor I saw explained everything well and I am over the moon with the results of the treatment. The staff called me a couple of days later to check how I was after my treatment and I really felt that I was in the hands of professionals. I will definitely be returning.

Friendly, caring and professional advice followed by a fantastic treatment. Very happy with my decision to contact Courthouse. I was made to feel so welcome by all the staff. It was lovely how much care and consideration Dr Robin Stones gave me and I am very happy with the results. Thank you

Dear [Boots store /Uber Eats],

I am writing to express my outrage and deep concern regarding a serious error with my recent order placed via Uber Eats. I urgently ordered Kendamil Goat Milk First Infant Formula for my newborn baby — a critical item for her health and wellbeing. Instead, I received a completely unrelated and inappropriate delivery: paracetamol and ibuprofen.

This is not a minor mistake. It is a gross failure in duty of care, especially given that I am currently unwell and relied on this delivery to avoid leaving home. The substitution of essential infant formula with adult medication is not only negligent but potentially dangerous.

I demand the following:

• A full and immediate refund
• A formal explanation of how this error occurred
• Confirmation that corrective action will be taken to prevent this from happening to other families

I have retained all packaging and taken photographs of the incorrect items as evidence. I expect this matter to be treated with the seriousness it deserves.

I went to boots on 31st October, ( Bullring)  I needed a foundation, as I looked around I could not see any staff visible apart from a staff member who was stocking up.
It was very busy in boots it was roughly 18:00pm.
I thought I should test the foundation on the back of my hands and see the difference.
As I took a swatch the foundation gushed on to my off-white cream coat , Gucci scarf and coffee brown top! I was absolutely furious since I had foundation over me now!! I went to the nearest till to ask for wipes or tissue .
I seen a female staff member “safa” serving.
She smiled at me to acknowledge me while she was serving at the same time. I was huffing and puffing as it’s so busy and I have social anxiety.

As soon as she finished serving she greeted me with a hello and asked if I was ok or if I needed any help.
I explained what had  happened she said don’t worry come with me .
Not only the lovely safa took my foundation of my clothes and accessories, she also swatched the right foundation for me , served me at the same time she was telling the customers she will be right with them as soon as she has finished helping me!

It was extremely busy there was less staff as my sister was shopping and looking for cheek and lip blushers.
Safa helped my sister too, the blusher that my sister was after was sold out , safa then found an alternative which my sister purchased.

I went on to say thank you to safa and how I will approach her when I go next in to shop at boots.
Safa customer service was excellent I can say that since I have a retail background.

Boots overall had less cosmetic staff around on the makeup section but safa still didn’t fail to use her customer skills.
I have been shopping for many years in boots but the level of experience I had on the 31st October 2025 definitely needs to be acknowledged and recognised.
I’d like to thank safa one more time and she got my foundation match bang on I did tan on holiday, she gave me the perfect shade!!
Carry on with the great work safa & I hope to shop there very soon!
My feedback on safa customer service is : if boots had been mystery shopped on the evening she would definitely get boots 100%!!
Keep up the good work safa !!! :)

I’ve visited this store four times and every single time the price at the till was higher than the price displayed on the label. Staff did correct it after checking, but this is getting ridiculous. This is unacceptable and misleading. Always check prices before paying.

Unfortunately didn’t have a great experience here. The store is a real mess with testers everywhere, damaged/unclean and basically not able to use. Every tester that was somewhat useable, once we’d find an appropriate shade, I asked a colleague on several occasions for a sealed product. Every time they checked, they were out of stock/unavailable. Wasted an hour in this store, ended up going home and ordered off LookFantastic. The whole store is untidy and really hard to shop in (even the clothing is a state).

I didn’t even want to give one star

Disappointing Experience at Boots

I went to Boots and accidentally  purchased a broken item that , I wanting to return it immediately after noticing it was leaking through the unopened packaging. Instead of receiving assistance, I was blamed for breaking the item.

The staff manager's attitude was unprofessional; I felt looked down upon, and the customer service was incredibly bad. I was disrespected and humiliated in front of other customers, and nobody offered to help me. I walked out of the store feeling deeply upset and frustrated.

I have always appreciated Boots for its products and service, but this experience has made me reconsider my loyalty. I hope the management addresses these issues to ensure a better customer experience in the future.

My experience was terrible. initially, you’re promised the earth, told communication will be good, you’ll be supported throughout and the results will be amazing. nothing could be further from the truth.

I had a hair transplant, the ‘office manager’ is one of the most arrogant and awful people i’ve ever met. the technicians performing the procedure barely acknowledged me, didn’t even notice when blood was dripping into my eye. i wasn’t given any notice for when it would finish and when i asked i was told by the technician she was trying her best to finish it, no time given still so when it abruptly finished i had to wait 45 minutes for a lift home with 3 very impatient looking staff staring at me telling me they couldn’t go home until i did.

no expectations set so i bought myself a neck pillow and there was one provided so that was a waste. i had to ask about what medication i should take, should i use minoxidil, the answer was ‘yes probably’

aftercare didn’t exist, when trying to contact the clinic for questions and concerns, you’re calling a switchboard, took days to get answers.

nothing about this was good, it’s very expensive and results are rubbish, so much so the surgeon said he wanted to correct it free of charge but because the office manager was so awful with communication, this never happened and the surgeon left… i think? how would i know, no one answers my queries.

do not waste your money

I am extremely disappointed with the level of service I have experienced. I had arranged my appointment well in advance and even received a text message confirming it. Earlier today at 11am, I received another text confirming my appointment. However, to my surprise, I then received an email at 6pm informing me that the session had been cancelled and that there was no further availability for the foreseeable future.

This situation is particularly frustrating given that I was told there would be a confirmation call on Thursday and that my booking was secured. The lack of communication and last-minute cancellation reflect poorly on the reliability and professionalism of the service. Clients should be able to trust that confirmed appointments will be honoured, especially when they have been arranged and confirmed in good faith.

Don’t be surprised if you have a similar experience as unfortunately, reliability does not seem to be a priority here.

I have been considering this clinic for a long time, I had 2 consultations here, I was unable to proceed after my first one, and I also went to see another clinic to weight my options...
After looking into other clinics, I had no doubt I wanted my treatment to be done here. Staff are professional and give a high quality of service from the time you first walk through the door, until the very end of your treatment. I felt listened to and valued as a client, and if needed in the future, I would only consider this clinic.

Had a very bad experience with the Private Clinic Team. I ordered Minoxidil from here and I got told it would arrive within a week. 3 weeks later and it's still not here; I chased it up 5 times and I get told by every colleague that they order it from elsewhere so now I'm wondering why I even buy it from them since they charge extortionate prices too. I don't mind paying more for good services, but this was a terrible customer service and anyone ordering minoxidil really should contemplate buying it from elsewhere.

My experience with the Private Clinic has been very positive. Emma is very knowledgeable & thorough with the treatments she provides. A nice calm atmosphere & very accommodating. My skin is improving with each treatment & I would highly recommend this clinic to anyone who has or is suffering with skin conditions.

This salon will always have a special place in my heart as I spent my teenage years in this place and I have watched this place go from strength to strength! Bobby and the team are so warm and welcoming and they are so well at what they do and make you feel at ease! P.S I always feel like a brand new woman when walking out of the salon.

Fantastic experience with world of beauty! This was my first visit to the salon, the atmosphere was warm and welcoming. The staff were outstanding, very friendly and professional, attentive and informative. Kam threaded my eyebrows beautifully, she was so lovely. I really can’t wait to back to the salon for future threading and other treatments. Highly recommend

I have been visiting World of Beauty in Edgbaston since it opened last year, I can highly recommend.
The salon is immaculately clean and beautifully designed.
Kam who does my treatments does an amazing job and always makes me feel at ease.
The whole atmosphere makes you feel special from the surroundings to the family feeling as soon as you walk in .
I always feel fantastic when I leave .
So a massive thank you to all the ladies who work there not just for making me look a great deal better on the outside but so much better on the inside.
Keep up the amazing work ladies especially Bobby your a real treasure x

The service at world of beauty is excellent, all the staff are friendly and welcoming and helpful in answering all questions queries I had. this is my second time going there and happy to go back again for more services and treatment. One of the staff Kam in particular who has done most of my treatments is very good and patient. Have recommended this place to my family and friends and would recommend to others too.

Absolutely love coming to World of Beauty. Always so accommodating when booking appointments and the salon is always so clean and well kept The staff are always so friendly but Kam is just amazing.
