Always makes me feel comfortable and at ease but is amazing at what she does. Great asset to World of Beauty and I’m just glad she’s back!

I had an absolutely wonderful experience getting my hair straightened by SK Sandy. Her expertise, attention to detail, and professionalism truly stand out. She took the time to understand my hair texture and concerns before starting, and the results were beyond my expectations.
My hair is now incredibly smooth, silky, and easy to manage, while still looking natural and healthy. The entire process was comfortable, and Sandy explained each step clearly, which made me feel confident and relaxed.
If you’re looking for a hairstylist who delivers exceptional results with care and precision, SK Sandy is the best choice. I’m extremely happy with the outcome and will definitely be returning!

I've been going to this hair salon for a few years now and can say that I've never had to go else where. Having your hair washed before your cut is so relaxing and a nice touch. I always feel like I am in such a safe pair of hands when Sandy cuts my hair; she is professional, friendly and listens to my requests.

What can I see. This is the absolute best best best experience I have ever had in Birmingham. The hair cutting service quality is unparrelled. Having worked in Tokyo Japan for 5 years, I have grown used to the ometenashi service standards of the Japanese. Finally I find a hair salon which reminds me of the quality and service I have received in some of the best Tokyo 23-Ward hair salons. Kudos to the Hair Salon Director Sandy for cutting my hair and the cute young lady who provided my hair wash services. Look no further. Come to SK Hair studio for a proper well deserved haircut experience.

Nice haircut but so heavy handed! The man who cut my hair poked my face with a hairbrush, scratched my face multiple times, and hurt my hair when doing the blowout. I have thick hair and he did not know how to handle it, he also made it shorter than I would have liked. I literally said ow at some point when he scratched my head again, so ridiculous!

Sandy was really nice and worked on my hair a long time.She did a really good job.
Will definitely recommend her serious 😁
Avoid at all costs! Got my ear pierced there and it got infected! Earring was sooo small that it went through and healed over the actual earring!! She had no after care advice!. Please avoid!

We came from London to Birmingham with a very limited time frame, and found Millies. The service was great and the kind lady was so flexible and helpful to our last minute needs for my two girls, would definitely come back next time we are passing!
Got my 7month old daughters ear pierced here. Alhamdulillah no issues. She's 9 months old now.
Lady messed up my ear piercing!! No after care advice and was given such a small earring that the ear piercing got infected! Had to go to the doctors at the end to remove it!
My local beauty salon. Get everything you need from here. The beautiful lady is highly experienced. If you want pampering then this is the place to go :)

I had a pleasant visit to Amala Spa, however I was surprised to hear that treatments are not available during the week, which was slightly disappointing. Given the treatments were not running, it felt more like a health club than a spa as there are no relaxation areas, hot drinks, darker lighting, or any other amenities typically associated with the spa experience.

Saying that, the facilities included a small gym, a nice 1.68m deep pool ideal for some short lengths, a boiling hot sauna, a small steam room, a small jacuzzi, and a plunge pool (though it wasn’t particularly cold - the dedicated cold shower was much colder!). There are several beds/chairs to relax in, and the overall atmosphere is nice and calm.

The changing rooms are a decent size and offer combination lockers, but many of them were broken - it took me four attempts to find one that worked. I arrived later in the evening, and the changing area was showing signs of use throughout the day, with towels, sandals, and a left over swimming costume with bottles etc. left in the showers. One of the shower heads was also on the floor. One of the showers also didn’t get hot, so I had to switch showers to one that worked.

Overall, it’s a nice space to unwind if you’re staying in Birmingham for an event at the ICC or Rec, but it could definitely benefit from more regular upkeep throughout the day, as well as a few maintenance issues being fixed such as the lockers and the showers. It looks to be showing its age a little bit.

Dissapointed with the Spa day package, we booked for a girls day out and on arrival were told that the treatments wouldnt start until the afternoon.
Lockers were broken, and the pool was cold.
The only refreshments available was water unless you get dressed and go upstairs to the restaurant!
Food in the restaurant is excellent and staff were very nice.

Gorgeous spa. Treatments were amazing and well worth the money. Only disappointment was the pool is far to deep especially for petite people. That's something that should be considered as some people can't swim but still want to enjoy a dip in the pool. Definitely look at a shallow and deep end!

Booked a sweedish couple massage and had an amazing experience with my partner at Amala spa this afternoon. On arrival we were met by our masseuse Justine and Preston Signed our waivers and was shown to our room. Beautiful room, set up really nicely. The atmosphere was lovely and calm with relaxing music playing in the background.
My masseuse, Justine, was absolutely amazing. She applied just the right amount of pressure and her technique was on point. The hot towel experience was amazing. My partner equally enjoyed his massage too.
Overall I really enjoyed my time here. Staff are friendly and willing to go above and beyond to accommodate your needs.
Definatly recommend this treatment.
Will definitely be looking to return... soon

I had a week revive spa here which included exfoliating salt scrub, massage and use of the facilities. Sandy was excellent applying the perfect massage pressure with a really nice technique. The massage cabins and changing rooms were amazing. The pool and the jacuzzi were good with comfortable lounge chairs.

I went to have my pre holiday full glam at J beauty  by Nilima.

I had my hydra facial done by Preet. She analysed my skin in depth.  Gave me useful  tips for everyday care. She did not emphasize on any of the products  specifically  to buy  which shows her non biased attitude.   During facial  she  told me what product shes using and its benefits. I woke up with a glowing skin I really  couldn't  believe its me!

I had full leg and hollywood wax. I swear the Hollywood  wax was painless and I was done in total 4 patches. This was my first time with Hollywood  wax and  I cannot beleive this could  be so painless  essentially. This was because  Preet is quiet expert in her technique. She has her way of calming the client as well.

Both the sessions were filled me light talks and laughter  with her beautiful  sense of humor. I came home refreshed like I went for to see my girl friend.😃

I was there for a quiet long time and I felt that mostly sessions like these at other places are filled with some offering of tea or coffee . TBH the services are so good that I cannot complaint about anything.
I don't  think  I would go anywhere  else other than Preet now 🙂 . Keep it up Preet  and  the team at J beauty

Today was my second time at this amazing place in town, sukhi was my beauty therapist and she always does a delightful job. I felt so comfortable, she took so much care and time into my eyebrows. She asked me every step of the way if I was happy and if I wanted any changes. I haven’t received service like this anywhere for my eyebrows. I can say I am your permanent customer. Keep up the great work. Great business, great staff. Very professional.

I had my third facial with Preet on Saturday 17 January and it was awesome. She took her time and it was so relaxing. My skin feels rejuvenated and fresh. I have booked in for another facial in February. Keep up the good work Preet.

J Beauty by Nilima is excellent! Nilima helped me very nicely and gave the best service. She is skilled, friendly, and makes you feel comfortable. I’m very happy with the results and will definitely visit again.

I’ve been going to J Beauty for a while now and I honestly can’t fault their service. Preet always makes sure my eyebrows are absolutely perfect every time. They offer a wide range of treatments, including facials and microblading, and the salon is conveniently located right in the city centre. Highly recommend if you’re looking to treat yourself to some well-deserved TLC 😊

I’ve had my hair done here by Kate several times, and every time I walk out extremely happy. No matter how long I leave between visits, she always finds a way to transform the look. The prices are fair and honest (if I book for a treatment that doesn’t take as much product / time as expected, they inform me & will charge me the proper amount). All the team are super friendly, and I love coming into the salon in general! (They also have lovely coffee & great tunes). Highly recommend!

Had another fantastic experience at Cora Hair today. Kate always enables me to leave a better version of myself, she listens to what I'm thinking of and always elevates the style beyond my expectations. It's always a pleasure to visit the salon as the staff are so friendly and welcoming and that's the reason why I will continue to return again and again. Thanks Kate and the rest of the team, you smashed it again today 🫶

had a complete change of hair colour by kate, i was worried it wouldn’t take at first as i had bright yellow roots but kate made it happen. im so happy with the results, tysm!! (first pictures also include one of her famous bouncy blowdries)
Wonderful experience at Cora! Love that I can go on and my hair will be well taken care off! Thank you Haily for my wella treatment

I just had my hair done at Cora Hair with T’neiyah and I genuinely cannot say enough good things about her. From the moment I sat in her chair, she was so incredibly nice—warm, funny, bubbly, and instantly made me feel comfortable. I was nervous because it was my first time there, but she completely put me at ease and made the whole experience feel effortless.

She listened so carefully to what I wanted and absolutely nailed it—my hair looks AMAZING. Not only is she clearly talented, but her energy is everything. She makes you feel relaxed, welcomed, and like you’re in the best hands.

The atmosphere at Cora Hair was just as lovely—everyone was friendly and welcoming—but T’neiyah truly stood out. I left feeling so happy and confident, and I will 100% be coming back just for her. If you’re thinking about booking, do it—you won’t regret it!

I use to go there all the time. When I go , most of time I go for filling as my nails grow up . Maybe one or two times one of my nail come off after 3-4 weeks. I`m not demanding, I don't choose special sophisticate models , because I like my nails look good all the time and not worry about one stone come off or other type of model. I like some glitter and that's all. I love also that my nails look natural and they are not overloaded with too much gel or that shape which make nail wider (as my finger are short and nails are wide). Anytime the nail look almost transparent if you check in the light and nobody believe actually thats not my nail.Happy customer at Happy Nails!   ***Just an update to my old review . Still happy customer ,just more daring and willing to try different colours! About durability, sometime I have to cut them bit shorter as they grow too much and I didn't find time to go to do the filling.I mention that I'm always do my home maintenance by my own ,I use different type of solution for house cleaning , I don't use never gloves. Actually I had a problem when I try to remove them because I was bored with same color for 4-5-6 weeks. So, I just go back to salon to do the job :))
Fantastic customer service and amazing nails every time
Bad customer service nail started to break after a week and my colleague had the same experience. When I was there also someone phoned to complain about her nails save ur money and don't go there
Nice people but terrible at nails.shellac chipped within one day. Went back chipped and peeled off and within a week 2 nsils broke off at nsil bef. Dont waste your money
Happy nails is a really pleasant place to sit and have your nails done, and the owner- Roy does exactly what u ask for unlike some places.. 🙂

Had a wonderful experience at benefit 66 high street bham. I was abit nervous as I’ve never been to this benefit before but I had nothing to worry about the lady was lovely and we discussed my brow shape,tint and lamination I walked in with thin brows and walked out with thicker looking brows so pleased and I will be back! 🙂

My experience was very good. The assistant who did my brows was very polite + knowledgeable. She asked me all the relevant questions+ about my skin type+ I was happy with the way my brows looked after my treatment. She also said about the new line of foundations + after testing some on me I chose to buy one that suited my skin tone as advised by the assistant.

Best result I’ve ever had! The lady was absolutely lovely and really took the time to explain every step and to discuss the desired result with me. It was at the brow bar in boots and I did it with Anumta. Would 100% recommend 👌
Anumta was so professional and helpful. She showed me how to use a brow pencil for the best effect with my white hair. Shall certainly go again.
Anumta was amazing, she reassured me throughout the whole service. She did my brows loving. Highly recommend, 10/10.
Those who work there are responsible and kind and trustworthy

Last week, I had my makeup and hair done by Zoha, and there are so many things I loved about the experience. It was a Monday, her day off, yet she still came in at 9 a.m. When I thanked her for coming in on her day off, she simply smiled and said, “No problem, I love my job,” which truly meant a lot to me.

She did a phenomenal job with my makeup and hair in just 1.5 hours. I was initially quite worried because I did not want very bold makeup, but the moment I saw myself in the mirror, I absolutely loved the subtle, elegant look she created.

Thank you so much to Tandis for understanding my emergency, and a huge thank you to Zoha for giving me such beautiful makeup. Highly recommended! ✨

I had an amazing experience with Fara!She did a fantastic jobs with my haircut and highlights—I’m absolutely in love with the result. She took the time to listen to what I wanted, gave great advice, and made sure everything looked perfect. The whole appointment was comfortable and enjoyable. My hair looks healthier and more vibrant than ever. Highly recommend her to anyone looking for a talented and caring hairdresser. Thank you so much!

Today I had my eyebrows done at Tandis with Zoha , it was my second time for the same. I loved her professionalism, she was too kind and listened to my needs and gave the best. I always had the problem when I go to a new place for by eyebrows they ruin my shape but Zoha patiently did her job and corrected the shape of my eyebrows. She is the best I have seen so far in this profession.Thank you Zoha you made my day . 😊

I had a lovely experience! I didn’t have an appointment as it was kind of an emergency, but they didn’t say no and still took care of me. They stayed open and did my treatment until 10:30 PM, even though they usually close at 8 PM. Leila did my hair treatment, and she was amazing. I truly appreciate the service definitely a 5-star experience!
A lovely friendly salon. I had a great wash and blow dry by Leila on a Sunday morning!

Whenever I visit the UK , I will make a point to visit Dr Liam for my treatment . I have very low pain threshold but Dr Liam handles and manages my pain so well every time and before I know it, it is all done . I have been looked after by Dr Liam for more than five years and I am truly satisfied with his skill and competence as an aesthetics Doctor. I would highly recommend anyone to consult with him on any concerns you may have on your face.

I was searching for a professional and trusted clinic in Birmingham with great natural results and reviews and after some research I came across Primedical Aesthetics. I am so happy that I chose them to get my mid face rejuvenation done as I was reluctant at first, but Dr Richardson made me feel at ease from the get go and explained everything about the treatments they offer in great detail. During the procedure itself Dr Richardson and Shay made me feel so relaxed and did their best to make it as painless as possible. I am extremely pleased with my results as I was looking for a natural look with a huge difference. I highly recommend them!

I have been visiting Dr Richardson for a number of years for all my aesthetic procedures. There is nobody else I would ever trust. Dr Richardson always ensures we have a full consultation before any treatments are taken place to make sure I’m comfortable and happy. The team are so lovely, Shay is so welcoming and always ensures my aftercare info is sent to me as soon as I leave the clinic.

I just wanted to say a big thank to Dr Richards, my lips are now healed and I just love the shape! They look so natural and full I never thought they would look this good after one appointment! I had my first night out since lockdown  over the weekend and had loads of compliments and they looked gorgeous with my lipstick. Dr Richards was extremely professional, knowledgable and talked me through the process, I would recommend him to anyone thinking of getting fillers! 💖

A message from my girlfriend (very happy customer)  'I approached Dr Richardson as I wasn't too happy with my lips the way they were but I was hesitant to go else where as I have heard very good feedback from friends who have used Dr Richardson. He guided me through the process and how it all works which made me feel at confidentially at ease, Dr Richardson has been fantastic throughout the whole process and I couldn't recommend him enough! My lips are fantastic, plump and well shaped! Highly recommend to anyone who is thinking about having their lips done!!!! THANK YOUUUUU!'
Brilliant training provided
Thank you so much to Navneet, she always shapes my brows to perfection. She’s always smiling and her service is always amazing. Couldn’t think of anyone better to do my brows than Navneet.

It was my first time ever getting my brows threaded and lashes lifted with tint and Shabnam was simply fantastic. My eyes are now more accentuated and I’m excited to try on mascara. I felt very well taken care of through her expertise and I’ll definitely be back! 🩷

I can't express how grateful I am for the exceptional service I received from Shabnam at Shavata Singh Harvey Nichols. My eyebrows were a complete mess, overgrown and misshapen from my own DIY attempts. Shabnam truly worked wonders!
From the moment I sat down, she took the time to thoroughly explain everything she was doing. She talked me through the entire process, which was incredibly reassuring. She even gave me some fantastic advice on how to fill in my brows to maintain their shape between appointments. What really stood out was her willingness to accommodate me, even though I hadn't booked an appointment. She took time out of her own break to ensure I was taken care of, which I found incredibly thoughtful.
I'm quite nervous when it comes to brow treatments and have a very low pain threshold, but Shabnam was so attentive and patient with me. I can honestly say that it didn't hurt at all! I am extremely happy with the service she provided, and my eyebrows look fantastic. I highly recommend Shabnam to anyone looking for a skilled and caring brow technician

I’ve had my lash lifts done by Shabnam a few times now, and she has always delivered the most beautiful results! She’s so attentive to my requests and needs, and even though I can feel quite anxious, she instantly puts me at ease with her calm, professional, and reassuring manner. She listens carefully, explains everything clearly, and makes sure I’m comfortable throughout the whole process.

The results are consistently stunning — exactly what I hope for every time — and I honestly won’t go to anyone else. Shabnam is not only highly skilled, but she also genuinely cares about her clients, which makes all the difference. I can’t recommend her enough!

Great first appointment with Navneet. She really took the time to find out about what I’m looking for with my eyebrows and how to get there with tips on how to fill and gel them to really achieve what I want. She was has a great attention to detail with achieving the perfect brows. Definitely recommend!
I have been going to CJ for years for Microblading. Lovely professional who knows what she is doing and we have great catch ups during treatments. Highly recommended!
Fantastic service by a lovely lady.  CJ certainly is a master at her craft and makes you feel very welcome and relaxed.  I can't wait to have more semi permanent make up tattoos done

CJ is amazing!! If you want beautiful painless microblading eyebrows, go to her. She is extremely professional  is skilled and knows what she is doing. I was told by people that the process could be painful but CJ numbed my brows for 30 minutes and the result, beautifully shaped eyebrows without any pain! If you are planning to have microblading done, I highly recommend her. I was quite nervous about the whole thing but she made it all so easy and worth every penny.I have told her she has a client for life, I booked the derma facial with her after the microblading and my skin is flawless. Rolls Royce service for a good price! I am so in love with my brows!!!
Jewellery Quarters best kept secret! Absolutely amazing service. The technician really knew her stuff. Charming and attentive. Highly recommend 👍🏽
I rang 2x and sent a text to book a appointment no one returned my call I think that’s disgusting obviously the salon don’t want my custom so I’ll go elsewhere

I've tried lots of places for eyelash extensions in Birmingham, but none made me want to go back. Then I found JK Salon. Located conveniently, I was greeted by Jane with a warm smile and genuine kindness. Once in the treatment room, she patiently explained everything and helped me choose the perfect lashes for my eyes. Her expertise showed through as she recommended various lash sets tailored to enhance my natural features.
I was so happy with how they turned out! Now, I don't need to search for another place. I can't wait to go back for my next appointment! So one more time, thank you so much Jane :)

Jane was absolutely amazing and friendly. This was my first time getting my lashes done and we went through the different kinds. My biggest fear was that the lashes would be too long or thick but Jane knew what she was doing and gave me amazing results. Lovely place and will definitely be coming back.
Took my appt very last minute, loved the outcome of my lashes very professional, would come again !
Brilliant service from all staff big thank you to miryam, very happy with results classic eyelashes and brow lamination, very accommodating, will defo be coming back!

Absolutely love JK salon , been coming here on & off over the years along with a couple of other salons around the UK as my job requires me to move around a lot but this is truly the ONLY place that I can truly trust & 100% rely on. At £80 for a full set of Russian volume it's a little more than most salons but worth every penny and you get exactly what you pay for !  This place is a serious little gem in the heart of birmingham when it comes to your lashes & your Brows Jane is the girl to know !💖 xxx

I have had my lashes and laser done with tina many times and each time i always leave feeling super happy. Tina has amazing talent and always does my lashes exactly how i want them. They last, dont itch or burn and tina is always so friendly. The salon is clean, bright and today with lovely music on in the background.
I have PCOS so it means my hair can be quite stubborn but only with a few laser sessions, i can truly see a difference in my hair growth, follicles and thickness. Tina took me through each process, explained everything in great detail and answered alll my questions as i was very anxious. Tina explained the before and aftercare, the machine is up to date and doesn’t hurt, and tina always pauses when j need a minute! The room is always safe clean and tidy and i wouldnt go anywhere else!
Tina is welcoming, friendly and professional. She always gives great advice regarding my lashes and we have experimented different styles. I always leave feeling relaxed and loving my lashes x

Miss Beatique is a great place,
It's hard to find a good salon.
I have my nails done Regular facials.
Now I've started laser treatment.
I feel comfortable and the owner is very nice and understanding to your needs and requirements.
Thank you
I can't believe they now do HYDRAFACIALS!!!! lED
Recommended it, definitely should pop in and see the wide range of services.
I have attached pictures
Thank you 💗

I recently had my first labs lift experience in Birmingham, and I couldn’t be happier. Tina was absolutely fantastic. She took the time to do a patch test beforehand, ensuring everything was safe and suitable for me.
I was very grateful that Tina managed to fit me in last minute for the treatment. The whole process was smooth, and I felt comfortable throughout. The results are amazing - my lashes look beautifully lifted and defined.

I would highly recommend visiting Tina.

Tina is great, she did my eyebrows and managed to fit me in for gel nails too ahead of a holiday and I loved how both the nails and eyebrows look! Even more the atmosphere and Tina herself is amazing and it's such a relaxed and fun environment! Will definitely be coming back!

Worst experience of my life would never go back, been going here for a long time but this experience has put me off forever. Yasmin cut my lip blood everywhere and did not tell me or apologise. She then left my Eyebrows  wonky and still made to pay after knowing i was upset after this experience, the alum-rock branch is no better with Amina removing half my eyebrow and leaving me with pencil brows. They rush you in and out and do not care about their customers, provide worst experience ever. They use the same wax stick on every person and never change it so unhygienic and disgusting i had to tell her to change the wax stick!! Absolutely horrendous 0 stars would never ever go back rather pay double the price elsewhere and have my eyebrows in 1 piece !!!!!

Beautician is always flexible with last minute appointment requests. Had threading done to a very good quality. I have sensitive skin and she was very careful with my eyebrows to ensure I did not have any flare ups. She also have good aftercare advice. Very happy with the service and will definitely come here again-thank you !

Got my eyebrows done by Maria, she is lovely and an asset to your company! Great service and she did a really good job, also makes everyone comfortable and has a nice chat with them. Thank you, new eyebrow lady for me!

I love this salon amazing people and very warm welcoming I’m not from around Birmingham but have family here so whenever I come to stop over I get my eyebrows done only trust eternal Roop for eyebrows I can honestly say I don’t go anywhere else my all time favourite is maria but saima also does a really good job I have also been coming here for years and so do my aunties highly recommend keep up the good work ladies.

First time coming here to get my eyebrows done and iwas so scared lol because idont trust no1 to do my eyebrows apart from my old eyebrow lady. I can’t believe how good Mariya done my eyebrows. I had such a bad day at work and she was so lovely and just such a sweet lady! Defo found my new eyebrow lady x

Absolutely amazing professional and friendly service from Shaista. I’ve had a variety of facials and she has always left my skin feeling brand new, and me feeling incredibly relaxed throughout the appointment and after. The laser hair removal has been amazing and worked so incredibly well. Thank you! I’ll be seeing you again for sure!

Amazing and super professional
Recently, I had my first ever skin treatment (peels microneedling )done by shaishta .she explained to me clearly and I was made to feel very comfortable, especially as this was my first time having any treatments done to my skin.after the treatment My skin looks more even and clean after the treatments, this treatment is very. Help full for hyperpigmentations..Would like to recommend friends and family…

Never had my nails feel so fragile before. I only went in for biab removal and the male artist was in such a rush he filed my nail bed down so thin and it still hurts days later. He also filed the length of my nail down too low after telling him just to shape it. Not happy. Would not return.
The staff are nice but the service is not.

The worst Nail shop I have ever come across in my life. They work so slow, and overcharge so so unfairly. A full set at any other nail shop is a simple £25. I got there at 7PM and at 8:20PM (A WHOLE HOUR AND 20 MINUTES LATER) and I hadn’t even had my nails filed. I had to leave the shop with the base acrilic on, no varnish, no shape and no colour. And they had the audacity to charge me £33😩for what? They spent 20 minutes on each finger. Absolute pisstake. So I walked away with not even a full set priced at £33. I feel sick 🤢

UPDATE: I painted my own nails as can not afford another £6 as had already been charged do much. One of my nails have completely snapped ff and pulled my real nail off... really poor quality and so upset with how much I was charged for this to happen - I wont be able to get my nails done again for a while! Please can I have a refund as I do not agree with how my nails have been left.

The shop isn’t essentially bad and it has a lot of potential. The location is great and the interior is quite nice as well. There are about 3-4 chairs for customers, although when I went there were only 2 employees.

I’ve had my nails on for around a week now and it looks as good as the first day I got it done. I had to ask the nail tech to fix the amount of acrylic applied a few times throughout the session as it was an ombré set and each nail was starting to look different than the last. The staff listen to feedback and generally fix their mistakes along the way.

Overall, my nails look pretty now and my nail tech was enthusiastic about doing his work but I don’t think the price of the nails are worth the actual experience or set. That being said all the issues could be easily solved so everything could be improved.

DO NOT COME TO THIS SALON!!!!!!!!!
Went yesterday to get my nails done. Did gel so that I spend money on something that would actually stay properly for longer that normal nail polish. Started peeling off today!
Bad bad quality!!!!
Went today to ask for my money back because I paid for a service that I didn’t completely get. Said they could fix it but not give the money. Of course I didn’t want it fixed! why would I waste time fixing it to probably come back the next day again because of the bad quality?!!!!!!!!!
Service is not great, quality of nail polish isn’t either. Just look for somewhere else.

Overall I am happy with my gel manicure, but there were a couple of issues

Pros: extensive range of colours, friendly and polite staff, offered a drink, good value and location

Cons:
- booking through treatwell I selected nail art, but was told I'd have to pay more when I got to the salon. When I mentioned the nail art they didnt seem confident or show me any ideas of what they could do, so I chose to just have different colours on each nail.
- the equipment looks pretty ancient and unclean, especially the buffers and files which were super worn out and unhygienic. There was a lot of nail dust in the air (which could be prevented if they had good ventilation at the tables), so there is some debris stuck to my nails (see the middle one). Not hugely obvious but its preventable.

Overall I am satisfied - I would consider going again given the good price and location.
Best clothes shop people good i haven't long time
Lovely staff varied items under one roof, highly recommend a visit.

Beautiful Lady who does a fantastic job, booked last minute today and 1st time at Chelash. Lovely relaxing atmosphere, great experience, my lashes look lovely! Thank you so much, lots of love, Bevleen xx
Lashes were done very well. Look very pretty and neat!  Polite, professional technician. Would recommend to others.
Wonderful service. Lovely lady
Very good service and clean environment
The best lash technician, perfect and attentive, and the lashes last so long!

This place is brilliant for long term hair removal. Laser hair removal has been a game-changer for me. After several sessions, I've noticed a significant reduction in hair growth, especially in stubborn areas. The process itself is relatively quick and relatively painless, with just a mild sensation of heat. Plus, the long-term results are worth it. Overall, I highly recommend Laser Boutique for hair removal for anyone looking for a more permanent solution to unwanted hair. They offer a personalised packages to suit your needs and discuss everything with you beforehand. Moreover, they take care and time when dealing with older individuals who require a little more patience when getting the treatment done. Overall, their very good at what they do and the service they offer.

Absolutely amazing! I have had 5 sessions of laser (full face and neck) and have seen a significant reduction in hair. My problem area was mainly my chin and the hair is now literally non existent. So happy with my results so far!

The setting itself is always exceptionally clean, you can really tell they keep on top of cleanliness. They girls are great, they make you feel welcome and are really easy-going and professional (which is exactly what you need when you go with your insecurities). Could not recommend this place enough!

They are honestly so great! The two sisters are lovely, so easy to talk to. Lovely people, lovely atmosphere. My sessions have been amazing you can really see the difference it makes. You pretty much see instant results which only gets better from there. I also appreciate how clean the store always is as well. They do a great job, the price matches the quality.

The staff at laser Beautique are very friendly,I have been coming to them since 2022 I’ve had 11 sessions and I’m very happy with the results. My hair growth has reduced a lot ma sha Allah. I used to do waxing every 2 weeks and it use to cost so much money and waste alot of my time . I feel so relaxed that I don’t have to keep going to the salon. With laser I booked appointments after every 6 to 8 weeks and my hair growth is much lesser and less darker.thank u to the team :)

I have been going to laser Beautique for the past few years for laser hair removal. They have definitely helped reduce my hair growth on my face and I would highly recommend them to anyone! I don’t see myself going to another laser company as the staff at laser beautique are lovely and make you feel comfortable during each session, and provide amazing results!

Worst experience of my life, full body wax took 3 and half hours, was left bruised and sore, the therapist faffed about and went over my bikini on the same spot a dozen times. I was left with only half done as the wax had dried up and wasn't budging. To top it up I put myself through this torture whilst being pregnant and paying for it at the end (which I shouldn't have). I had tears in my eyes but the owner of the place didn't care the slightest. This is a business no doubt all they care about is making money. Hopefully this review will prevent someone else going through the same experience.
Brilliant customer service, competitive prices and brilliant haircuts. Would highly recommend v lounge and have no criticism
I think a trainee cut my hair, she was too nervous and I was not satisfied with my hair cut. Wish I went somewhere else.
Said that it opens at 10 and stayed here till 11 and no one opened up or even answered my calls.
Good salon
Good

I fully recommend!!!!! Absolutely amazing, brilliant service by Farrah and Sammy, treated me like a little sister, I came in heartbroken due to negligence from another salon. They took me in and completely transformed me from the horrendous ginger colour to a beautiful blonde barbie, asked me if I wanted food, spent the whole day doing my hair and even curled it. All for a very reasonable cost. Thank you so much, will be back soon.
Alhamdulillah 🦋
I was more than satisfied with my haircut. Tahira is an excellent hairdresser, and the services are definitely worth the money! Surely a great all-female salon in Birmingham!

I had my hair highlighted at Cute Hair & Beauty Salon and I couldn’t be happier with the whole experience! From the moment I walked in, I felt so welcomed and looked after.

Farah did an amazing job!!
she gave me the exact colour I wanted and was so gentle and caring throughout. I also felt such positive, genuine energy from both Farah and Sam.

They’re incredibly trustworthy, friendly, and professional.

Thank you both so much! honestly so grateful thank you!
can’t wait to come back x

I went to cute hair & beauty salon today and had a wonderful experience. I went to get my roots color done, Sam was absolutely amazing, love my color my hair looks so healthy shiny and glossy now thanks so much Sam,  amazing service and amazing results, I definitely reccomend

Highly recommend this place. Been here a few times and had hair cut by different team members and they all take their time to ensure your hair is cut as you want it and take pride in their work. They don't rush you in and out to get it over with just to take your money like some places.

The haircut at this salon was budget-friendly and decent, but it was just alright overall. While the pricing was affordable, the quality of the haircut was average. If you're looking for a basic, no-frills haircut at an affordable price, this salon could still be a suitable choice for you. However, if you have specific preferences or are looking for more skilled styling, you might want to consider other options.

The beauty salon (downstairs) is fantastic! The staff are always welcoming, and I’m consistently happy with how my eyebrows turn out. Varsha is an exceptional beautician who always keeps me coming back.

Hands down, Omar is the best barber in town! Their skill with the scissors is unparalleled, crafting a haircut that perfectly matches my style every single time. Not only are they masters of their craft, but their friendly demeanor and professionalism create an atmosphere that keeps me coming back for more. Whether it's a classic cut or something more adventurous, Omar consistently delivers exceptional results. If you're searching for a barber who combines talent with top-notch service, look no further than Omar!

Went in this afternoon after chatting to the guy outside for a bit. Was pleased that they didn't charge me extra despite my very long hair, which is something every other place I've been to has done.

I showed the barber the kind of cut I was after and he was very happy to cut and shape my hair as I had asked along with a shave for good measure. They were both also very friendly and chatty!

On a random side note, they also made me a pretty good cup of tea while I waited!

Very pleased, will be coming again!

My experience at The hair salon downstairs still haunts me till this day, I had my hair cut on Nov 18 2023, till this day, my hair still hasn’t grow out properly like how it used to be, the lady who cut my hair was pregnant at the time so I didn’t wanna cause too much of scene, but little does she know how I feel over the past months, any woman would understand how hair matters and the fact she cut my hair in bowl hair, jelly fish way cutting just makes me feel bizarre how is she qualified, till this day I have to get extensions monthly to cover how ugly the layers are! I’m writing this comment almost a year later to warn you guys, like how can you do that to any woman’s hair! The next day I got called in to refund me 20 pound out of the 30 I paid, lol I was too nice, im literally writing this comment with tears, please be careful who cut your hair

Awful costumer service and poor quality braids. I went to buy extensions from next door and when I arrived back I saw the young lady dry brushing my daughter’s 3C/4a hair. My daughter was in visible pain  . When I asked her not to dry brush her hair (I explained her hair needs water! ) she kissed her teeth and my daughter later told me she didn’t bother to untangle at all , just went straight to shampoo. The braids looked HORRIBLE , when I asked to redo some of the braid and as it was extremely thick and did not look good she kissed her teeth. Started talking in her language to the other lady’s . Which obviously told her to redo as it was sooo bad ! Even after Pictures speak for themselves. Contacted the owner and waited a week to see if she would reply to me . Radio Silence . Would not recommend at all !!

Very poor service, booked 2 weeks in advance.
I booked for 11am, she had a client waiting from 10 am, walked into the salon at 10.50am. She has no professional skills at all, told me if I was not willing to wait then she would cancel my appointment. (I was flying out the next day), then proceeded to do the other ladies hair. She then rushed my hair, left way to much hair out for the leave out for my sew in, did large cainrows, pull my hair way to tight, did a bogus job of a sew in, then left me to straighen my hair myself, the hair didn't even last 2 weeks. I would advise you ladies to say far away from this woman as she literally played in my hair and face, was late and rude. She made me late for my nail and waxing appointment, and didn't even apologise

I was quoted £55 over the phone for a weave with closure, but ended up being charged £68. This included around £3 for parting the closure and an additional £10 because one of my tracks was cut into pieces.

I don’t mind paying extra where necessary, however I do not agree with the amount I was charged especially when the end of the tracks were pocking out and I had to then part the closure myself again because the lady was parting it on the side and saying it was in the middle.

I requested parting in the middle but the closure was placed more towards the right. This resulted in less hair on one side, making my roots visible at times, and I constantly have to cover it.

Additionally, the closure was not tightened properly, so after a few days it shifted backwards. It’s been 5days now.

I arrived at 4pm and left around 8pm, 4 hours for weave and closure is a lot.
Hope with this review there could be some improvement.

Great barbers located locally around the perry bar, Aston and Handsworth area, this shop specialises in hairdressing and styling for all occasions. The staff members are always kind and polite. The quality of the service is excellent, and their are also items that can be bought from the saloon itself, such as wigs hair extensions etc,

Customer service was terrible. The hairdresser pulled on my hair hard and asked why I was crying. Her attitude was disgusting. She was screaming and laughing down my ear the entire time with her friends. Defo not returning

Fantastic service always! My sister and I have been coming here for years now to have our eyebrows threaded. Joti is so skilled and always leaves our eyebrows looking absolutely flawless. We both moved out of the area and still travel back for her eyebrow services. Clients for life. I highly recommend!

IF YOU WANT NICE THICK EYEBROWS, this is where you need to come!
I would give Jo 10 stars if I could. She's amazing. When I first came, I had literally no eyebrows due to them falling out/being thinned down too much by other ladies.
However, she assured me she would bring them back. Gave me the best advice on what to do at home and set new goals upon every visit. Always so patient and calm. Now, 6 months later, I have nice, long, beautiful eyebrows 😀 A very happy customer. Most importantly, Jo responds to text messages within an hour. she's always there when my eyebrows need some TLC.
Thank you for your amazing service ❤️

First time in this salon today for an eyebrow wax and threading, and I only have the most positive feedback to give!

Jasbir was able to fit me in for an appointment very last minute, which I appreciated with my otherwise hectic working schedule. She made me feel very welcome and cared for in her studio. I felt little to no pain with the treatment she carried out on me, and she also took the time to give me advice at home on how to reach my eyebrow goals.

I very much look forward to making this studio my go to, and will recommend to my other friends too!

Will be back again very soon and may even try some of the other treatments I.e. A well needed facial.

Thanks Jasbir! 😊

Excellent service. You have to book an appointment. The owner always responds back quickly.
Once you’ve booked an appointment you get excellent service.
My eyebrows were not the best as I had been to loads of different threaders and they were all doing something different each time.
She threaded my eyebrows and told me that I needed to grow them out as the length wasn’t even.
Grew them back and now they look fab. I always get compliments on them.
Also had some body waxing done.
Private room and she made me very comfortable.
Highly recommended her.

I came upon this salon for a last minute appointment and I am absolutely happy with her service. The staff is very warm and welcoming. Very well done. I barely felt much pain. Good job with the waxing and threading.  Highly recommended 👌 I will come back again for my next appointment for sure.
We had a great experience! We were able to come on such a short notice. We called and were able to have our henna done 30 minutes later. Definitely recommend, will come again! 😀
Gave a couple of inspo designs, for henna, that I really liked and she did a lovely job of making them her own. So pleased with the results.

Second time going, will sure go again. Love the hospitality and henna designs
Always recommend
Maryum booked me in last minute and was brilliant! Super friendly, calm atmosphere, she is very friendly and fun to talk to and the henna design was perfect as requested!

Absolutely wonderful family, welcoming at a moments notice. Me and my partner both had Henna's done and WOW what a beautiful tattoo we both had. Couldn't be anymore happier it really made my day. Thank you Beth and Dean x

so I paid for 6 session of laser, it seems like it was IPL not laser which I am very annoyed about. Also, it is very very hard to get into contact with the lady to book an appointment. at first I had to make a fuss to get an appointment, now after lockdown my messages and call are being ignored. I have a few sessions left and want to use them.]
I bought the package of groupon.
After I managed to get my first appointment months ago pre covid, she was lovely and always replied to my texts/calls, but now I haven't heard from her since and no replies to my messages

Unprofessional and advertised 'laser' is actually IPL. This place is tiny, and the treatment room has mouldy wall paper and a damp smell. There is no heating other then a plug in heater so it is quite cold. The lady in charge isn't professional as she cancels booked in sessions last minute, messes up her diary and then blanks calls and texts to rearrange. She also talks about her clients in front of other clients in a derogatory way. The laser she uses is a very old IPL machine, so not a laser at all and not worth wasting money on. She once didn't have any gel for the IPL so had to cancel the session and another time she didn't have any of the paper roll for the treatment bed. There are much better and professional places to spend money on and ones that don't advertise an IPL machine as a laser machine.

I wish I had read the review for this place sooner!! Took me a whole month to book an appointment after I paid.. came for my appointment today at 5 and still no sign of her at 6:15.. calls being blanked and then phones off. Honestly have never had a worse experience ever.. what a waste of time, money and the journey
Excellent service .

Absolutely brilliant! I didn't know they was even in one stop market and after so many places refused to do my brows as a male, the lady (whose name i forgot to ask) waxed and threaded my brows and did a fantastic job! This is now my new place to go!

Absolutely fantastic 👍👍went yesterday to have nails infilled and painted there for the first time and am more than happy. Took her time making sure the shape and size were exactly what I wanted. No rushing like I've experienced in other places. Friendly relaxed atmosphere even good music played!! Am so glad to have found a nail salon I will be returning to everytime they need doing and also will be going for eyelashes too. Thankyou to owner. FIVE STARS   ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️😊

Samantha is a brilliant professional and a patient, caring, relaxed and calming soul. When she gives a manicure, the whole experience is wonderful. She is thorough and my fingernails were manicured to perfection. Great attention to detail was taken. My hands were exfoliated,  scrubbed, massaged and oiled with such care. I felt valued and respected.  I am very much looking forward to my next manicure and pedicure appointment.
Thank you very much Samantha 😊

I went here a few months ago and I was more than happy with my nails and how strong they were! My nails lasted two weeks and it wasn't until the 14th day that they started to come off! The woman who did my nails was extremely friendly and I am returning to get my nails done again for my holiday! The only let down is the choice of colours available!

This place is actually situated in the market area of One Stop Shopping Mall. Very nice, warm and friendly set up. I had my most enjoyable nail experience here and went away with a fabulous set of acrylics. They also do a range of beauty treatments. If you want your nails done by a professional, this is the spot!

Had an amazing couples facial and massage; both the girls were super friendly and ensured my husband and I were comfortable and relaxed. The hour went by so quickly and it was honestly the best facial and massage we’ve both had. It was well worth the money and we will be booking again.

One of the best massages I’ve had in Birmingham. Susie was brilliant from start to finish and the room was exceptionally clean and snug warm. She’s very calming and will help with any aches and pains you have. Highly recommended.

I have just received a full body hot oil massage with a scalp massage from Susie. I can honestly say it was the best massage I have ever had. I rarely leave google reviews but I could not let this go without shouting about it. I will definitely be rebooking. Thank you Susie.

Had the Korean facial massage with relaxing hot oil back and arm massage done. Never had a massage done before so didn't know what to expect. Highly recommend for the experience: back, neck & arms feel light and face is glowing. Would come back for further treatments. Very relaxing and almost fell asleep. 1 hour goes fast. Tae was very assuring and made me feel safe. Hope to visit again soon

I recently had a Thai massage at Amara Thai Therapy in Birmingham and I was very impressed. The therapist, Susie, was very professional and knowledgeable, and she tailored the massage to my specific needs. She used a combination of traditional Thai massage techniques and aromatherapy to help me relax and release tension. I felt much better after the massage, and I would definitely recommend it to others.
The massage room is very clean and relaxing.
Overall, I had a very positive experience at Amara Thai Therapy and I would definitely recommend it to others.

Emma was amazing during my HydraFacial treatment. She took great care of my skin and explained everything clearly before the treatment, as well as what to follow afterwards. She is very kind, friendly, and caring. I would definitely give her 5 stars ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐. She is hardworking, and my skin looked amazing after just the first treatment. I’m so happy with the results!

I recently had the pleasure of being treated by Larissa, a highly skilled laser practitioner, and I am absolutely thrilled with the results. Larissa's expertise and professionalism were evident from our very first consultation.

She took the time to thoroughly explain the procedure, answer all of my questions, and ensure I felt comfortable and informed every step of the way. Her precision and attention to detail during the treatment were impressive, and she clearly has a deep understanding of the latest laser technologies and techniques.

The results exceeded my expectations, and I couldn't be happier. Larissa's dedication to her clients and her craft is truly exceptional. I highly recommend her to anyone seeking laser treatments. She is a standout practitioner in her field.

When i was finished the treatment I was happy to go from there. The lady (very good looking without any good experience) refused to attend me even though I had an appointment for today.
Even my face looks a little bit much better is not the result that I expected.
For the money that I was paying for hydrafacial I go in another place 3 times for much better procedures.
Thank you for taking my money and my time for nothing, very dissatisfied, disappointed and deceived. I was there because one of my colleagues recommend me this place but I do not recommended for anyone.

The level of professionalism in skin is wonderful. I had my appointment today and before the lady treated the area she massaged my face and wiped off the sun cream. After the treatment she also massaged in some sun Cream which made me want to go sleep. I am very happy with the service here and would highly recommend Birmingham central clinic.

I completed the latter 3 of my 6 full body laser top-up sessions at this clinic and it was a positive experience and I am very satisfied with the customer care and experience received by all staff. In particular, I would like to praise Eva for her awesome full body laser services. She made me feel very comfortable, at ease and worked through the steps of laser strength increase and was kind enough to show patience where I got a slight tan on my arms, rescheduling this appointment for a later date. Eva has great bedside manner, her conversations are polite and courteous. I would highly recommend Eva as the clinician / practitioner for full-body,

Absolutely outstanding beauty salon! From start to finish, everything was handled with utmost profession. Appointments are always on time, Rekha is incredibly reliable, kind, and you can truly tell she cares about her clients. The service is consistent, high-quality, and delivered with skilled professionalism and she knows exactly what she’s doing. I always leave feeling confident and well taken care of. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a trustworthy and professional beauty salon!
I have been going to Rekha for eyebrow services for many years. She has always been professional, polite and listens to your needs carefully. Wonderful service always and cannot fault on anything :)

She let her husband walk in while I was without clothes. Once while telling me to turn over when waxing she smacked me on the backside. I told my mother about this who told her and she did it again; touched my backside again when it was not necessary. A bit touchy for some reason. I asked her just to remove the spare outside hair from my eyebrows and without asking me she did clean cut look instead. She handles hair roughly while doing haircut wash and blow dry. Safe to say I’m not coming here again.

Been going to Rekha over 7 years she is brilliant really friendly and caring. All I do is sit on the seat and rekha knows what to do, I don't trust anybody else with my eyebrows.Place is nice and clean. Rekha does a really nice facial, takes her time. Even though Soho Rd is s distance from my home I don't mind travelling.
Reet is an amazing lady, love her work! She is very professional and makes me feel comfortable. Amazing at her job! I would recommend coming to reet for eyebrow threading and other beauty services!

Kuldip is amazing! Me and my mom go there for our facials and she’s the absolute best! Our skin feels so subtle and soft afterwards, and she creates such a calming and relaxing environment. Highly recommend!

I’m so glad I came across serenity. Meeting kuldip was like meeting an old friend, it honestly didn’t feel like we had just met for the first time. I shared my previous waxing experiences and what I was nervous about and she really listened and assured me. She talked me through the process, and why she was doing what she was doing. Throughout the entire process kuldip asked me how I was feeling and if i was okay. She did areas of my body that are generally quite painful with minimal discomfort, to the point I didn’t even realise she’d finished. She was so professional, and polite and it was like talking to a big sister. Kal on front desk was a gem and gave me some great cooking tips and people to follow, and let’s not forget the beautiful fluffy fur baby they have!! He was just so adorable! Can’t wait to visit again and see you all. I couldn’t recommend serenity enough, from customer service through to client delivery it’s all there.

I tried Serenity after seeing all the glowing reviews, and they were absolutely spot on! I only wish I’d discovered this wonderful family-run salon sooner. Kuldip is so lovely, she instantly made me feel at ease and did an incredible job!!

Ive been coming here for almost 20 years that kul, kal and even blue are part of my family lol. Kul is amazing at everything thing she does with great attention to detail and information. Kal is alway lovely, smiling and talkative giving great advice at the front desk. Do book in for there services i promise you it will be worth it.

I had a mini pedicure and gel nails for my sisters wedding. Kuldip immediately made me feel welcome and spent time going through different colours with me and advising on what suits my skin tone. She took a lot of time and care over my treatments and was friendly and warm. The salon manager was also welcoming and friendly and Blue the dog is 😍 It's so lovely to visit a family run salon in Birmingham.

My skin has gone from rumbly tumbly to smooth and glowing in only 2 months. These ladies know the business and communicate on the level with good advice on what treatments are available and which treatment will be best based on individual circumstances. I note a few negative comments on this place and having being a customer for many years, i can highly recommend this salon as they are the best. Love the banter with the staff and great owner. See you soon.

Friendly staff,  always welcoming New faces no discriminating. Its not just the beauty treatments and excerise sessions why I attend. On Wednesdays the owner also host a coffee morning we have different discussions and reasoning as well as a good laugh. 👍😊

I visited hair and beauty in Dudley Road Birmingham…. Iam so impressed with the service and got a complete makeover by Valentina ❤️❤️❤️she’s amazing 🤩 worth every penny I spent on my hair colouring.., Iam so obsessed with my new hair ….thank you Valentina for the makeover xxx this is gonna be my go to place henceforth thank you very much

Excellent service, a lot of beauty treatments available even SHR Laser! The staff that work at time 2 Tone are polite and helpful. They are a range of beauty treatments , also have a brilliant hairdresser .

I had a very good experience at time2tone,  the staff were friendly,
the beauty therapies guided me what type of facial I require for my skin, will definitely  come back and recommend it to friends and family.5 stars.

Absolutely amazing experience with Christina Mytikiotis at sk:n Birmingham Edgbaston!

From the moment I walked in, I felt welcomed into a calm, clean, and beautifully professional environment. The clinic has such a relaxing atmosphere that instantly puts you at ease.

Christina is truly exceptional — kind, caring, highly knowledgeable, and incredibly professional. She took the time to explain everything in detail, made me feel comfortable throughout the treatments, and showed genuine care for my skin and results. I am currently doing laser hair removal and Hydrafacial, and I am beyond happy with the experience and the results so far.

Her attention to detail, gentle approach, and confidence made me feel I was in the best possible hands. Everything was done with such care and precision — I couldn’t ask for more.

I genuinely look forward to every visit, and I highly recommend Christina to anyone looking for top-quality treatments with outstanding service. She is amazing at what she does — a true professional and a wonderful person!

Thank you, Christina, for such an amazing experience 🌟💙

e aware - NEVER USE THIS ORGANISATION …
I never leave a complaint about anything as I always choose to put it down to experience, but on this occasion I am so disappointed I feel I should warn other customers!! I have added all the email I received so you can your own mind up!! However two points to consider - an organisation that holds you to terms and conditions that you never signed or agreed?? But they failed to provide me the service I paid for but no consequences for them? All I wanted was the service I requested! Over 2 months later and three chaser calls this is the response!! I am appalled! I will be taking further action - but please prevent yourself being in a similar situation.

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and for affording us the opportunity to investigate the concerns raised in your complaint dated the 17th of October 2025. Following a full review of the concerns and having completed our investigation with the relevant internal teams, I hope this response provides clarity and reassurance.

Firstly, we would like to acknowledge your frustration and apologise that you feel your experience did not meet the standards we aim to deliver. It is regrettable that you felt the need to raise a complaint, but we are grateful that you did — feedback from our clients is crucial in helping us improve our service.
We understand that you raised concerns regarding your Laser Hair Removal packages for upper lip and chin that you purchased at our Edgbaston clinic on the 16th of July 2025. Our records indicate that your first treatment was scheduled for the 30th of July 2025, but unfortunately, this appointment had to be cancelled due to staffing issues. We also understand that you were expecting a call from the clinic to reschedule your appointment, which regrettably has not yet taken place.
We have since engaged with the Edgbaston Clinic Manager, Ms. Maisie Wilkins, and the team at the clinic are working diligently to ensure smooth operations for all clients. The team would like to extend their sincere apologies for the lack of communication and the handling of your previous appointment.

We fully acknowledge how frustrating this must have been, especially with the expectation of attending a clinic to receive timely and effective care. While we recognise that the scheduling inconsistencies you encountered at our Edgbaston clinic has fell short of both your expectations and our own, outlined within our Terms and Conditions we state; “pre-paid course treatments are only refundable for medical reasons which require approval of the Clinical Services Director. Any refund agreed is calculated by deducting the cost of all treatments already performed, from the total price of the course of treatment paid by the patient.”

In light of this, we must respectfully decline your request for a refund of your current package.

Whilst we have no contractual obligation to do so, as a gesture of goodwill we will provide an extension of your package of three (3) months. To confirm, the package expiration date for your Laser Hair Removal packages will now be the 16th of October 2026. Thereafter, any unused treatments will be redeemed.

While we cannot change your previous experience, we remain committed to supporting your treatment journey to a successful outcome.

Yours Sincerely,
Sk:n / The Harley Medical Group
Megan

SKN just feels different — there’s a real sense of trust in everything they do. Marni has been amazing. She’s warm, caring, and genuinely brilliant at what she does. She’s a real credit to the clinic.

Im Having My Hair laser Treatment at Sk:n Edgbaston and I must say What a Lovely Clinic With Wide range of Treatments My experience soo far has been great Very Friendly Staff Very Helpful They explain Everything About the Treatment Very Clearly, The Lovely Lady Doing my treatment Christina Has been Very helpful, sweet and Careful, consistently asking the client if they are Okay during the treatment, i would 100% Recommend Sk:n :)

I had laser facial hair removal today and have been coming for a while, today Christina treated me and I found her very professional and competent in her treatment and overall the service has been excellent at the clinic.

This member of staff was extremely rude. Her manners and body language were unacceptable, not just towards me but towards other customers as well. I was trying to use my Boots card, but needed to download the app. She insisted she had to log off the till and kept telling me to hurry up, sighing throughout the interaction.I found this behaviour very disappointing and feel the level of service needs to be improved.

the one in the blue and white top

We went to boots today and did not like the treatment at all. First there wasn't any announcement about closing because I was anticipating it to make my way to the till in a timely manner. We went to the tills as soon as requested. We paid for our shopping and a lady came, stood behind us and consistently kept telling us that the store is closed and to make our way to the exit. 4 times. We understood it the first but obviously we weren't going to leave without taking what he had paid for!!!! To add to that, the till did not print our receipt properly and instead of helping us out, she kept repeating the store is closed like a broken record! The security staff was also unnecessarily rude and were seen arguing with other people! This is not the way you should treat your customers. Specially ones that come to your branch very often and usually enjoy being there. Highly disappointed.
I urge the managing team to kindly look into the staff's behaviour today and take appropriate action.

DON'T DO VACCINATIONS HERE! I paid £185 for one dose of HPV vaccine and £65 for one dose of Tick-borne Encephalitis. The doctor went away for a long time and then came back with two open cardboard packagings where the vaccines supposedly were taken from. How do I know they didn't switch the genuine branded vaccines for cheap knock offs or just saline? All vaccines must be opened in front of you and used immediately! Do not allow to take them out of your sight! The manager assured me it's their "protocol" and refused to reimburse or do a second shot under my observation. Scammers!

I must say I am absolutely gobsmacked, my experience here was HORRIBLE ! One of your workers (Madira or madina whos a beauty specialist ) has been so disrespectful towards us and when we asked for her name , she told us she didn’t need to say it and started giving us dirty looks with two other white women ( they had quite a lot of makeup on) . Honestly it’s people like this that make you feel scared to go shopping . A boots worker should never act this way towards customers. We hope something is done about her horrible personality. P.s her bright blue lenses scared me .

A heartfelt thank you to Ms Sue at Boots, High Street

Today was a really tough day for me — I couldn’t make it to Dublin as planned, and I lost £67 on the trip. I was feeling quite low and decided to go shopping with my husband just to clear my head a bit. We went into Boots on High Street, and that’s where I met Ms. Sue at the customer service desk.

From the very start, she was so kind and genuinely caring. She went above and beyond to help us sort out an issue with my Boots Advantage card, and she did it all with such patience, warmth, and professionalism. You could just feel how much she truly cares about people.

When she heard what a rough day I’d had, she gave me a hug, and wished me all the best — and honestly, that simple act of kindness meant so much to me. It completely lifted my spirits. In a world where everyone is rushing, meeting someone like Ms Sue — so pure-hearted, understanding, and kind — really stands out.

Thank you, Ms Sue, for turning a bad day into a reminder that there are still beautiful souls out there. Boots is very lucky to have you. 💛

Found my new nail shop so happy!
Fantastic service from staff, lovely atmosphere, staff all friendly and professional. Mary was super attentive and warm, I left this shop with the exact nails I wanted, I had zero issues for the entire time I was there, and will definitely be visiting again. Thank you!!
My favourite nail shop. They do hands and feet at the SAME time saving loads of time! And the shape and service is always amazing. I have been coming here for 2 years. No complaints
I had a very good experience today. Selena done my nails for me and she was such a nice lady u would deffo recommend going here. Will be back again for sure.
Selena did an amazing job on my French tip nails!  The service was super quick and she was so nice. Definitely 5 stars for the beautiful work and great customer service.

I am very very happy with their service, my wife did her nails done there. And very nice all staff and very helpful. I forgot my phone and next morning when I came to collect they literally told me that they’ve been waiting for my phone and handed me my phone safely. And plus the price is also very affordable and reasonable. Highly recommend this nail salon ladies.

Such a lovely salon to visit! I came in for a trim and was greeted straight away by John. I told him what I wanted and he set to work! He was lovely and chatty and gave me a fantastic cut. He even made me a delicious coffee.
I will definitely be returning as the price was very reasonable and I had a great experience here!

I’ve been going to this place for 5 times across the span of a year and a half. It was a hit and miss with the other stylists. I initially got Cheryl, lovely lady but didn’t follow through the model picture i showed. I wanted an A-line cut but she gave me more of a Dora the Explorer cut 😂 The 2nd visit, I got Gabriella. Also a lovely lady, really friendly fun to chat with but the haircut she gave was sort of messy since the right and left side wasn’t of the same length. It’s pretty obvious since i have short hair. Luckily, my hair grows very fast since i tend to cut my hair at least once in 2-3 months. The 3rd time I got John and i’ve been requesting for him ever since. I showed him the model picture and he follows through with a slight tweak since i wanted a fringe. Refer to the pictures attached! His skills got better and better the more i go there and on the 5th time, i have no comment at all. Just absolute perfection. And the pricing is good for me since i only got a dry cut but they always straighten my hair first before the haircut. Too bad I’m moving away soon so I won’t be able to visit anymore. Kudos to John though 😙👍🏻❤️

Cheryl has cut my hair twice and done a fantastic job each time. She was patient while also being efficient and professional, informing me about how my hair would look compared to the reference pictures I brought to the appointment. Decent price, good location, and a great experience every time.

Went in to have my hair cut for the first time, Jon was lovely. Already booked in for
my follow up appointment. Perfect if you work in the city and can pop in over your lunch break.

Update on my original review -
So today I went back to Christodoulous and had my hair cut by Jim who was brilliant. Made sure I was 100 percent happy when he was finished and was super friendly throughout the cut and has a great sense of humour. Will be booking in with Jim in future as he did a wonderful job at sorting my hair ready for my son's first birthday in a week, he was also able to fit my mum in at short notice despite it being a busy Saturday, thanks Jim!
Update on my original comment - Today Jim rang me to investigate what had happened and was really apologetic and lovely and offered to look after me for my next hair appointment personally, and offered a complimentary cut due to my last experience.I will update my review further after my next hair appointment but this is a lovely personal touch, showing genuine care for how people feel when they leave.

Jim is very friendly, really nice welcoming service.
It's just a shame about my actual experience having my hair cut. My stylist was very blunt, absolutely no personality or customer service present at all... It made the whole experience feel very awkward and I couldn't wait for it to be over which is a shame as after not brinyg able to have my hair cut for a while due to giving birth and having a little one I was looking forward  to a good hair cut.
I asked for a certain style to be put in (one I have had before and liked) only to be told it would look bad on me in quite a blunt way, and that I should have it cut another way, feeling pressured I did so... The cut looked adequate in store after having to get the fringe shortened quite a few times.... But upon looking in the mirror at home I can see my right side  is slightly longer than the left side and part of my fringe has been missed at the side so I will have to trim that myself..
Also, I was charged £27.95 for a dry cut, not the advertised £21.95.... not sure why to be honest. Don't think I'll be revisiting at all, will find an alternative for my next appointment.

I’ve had the best help from this pharmacy, but today, I remembered how they do meal deals, along with any other shop in the vicinity. Difference is, the staff here are lovely; so small a branch, there’s no space for self check out. Your lovely lady just genuinely asking if I’m okay before ringing up the bill - your staff in this tiny branch are always awesome and deserve recognition x

Thank you to the pharmacist that helped me this evening, I asked for a certain item however she actually recommended something else for my symptoms, and without asking explained exactly how the medicine works and why the medication I asked for is no good with my condition. I ended up leaving feeling much more optimistic about getting better and so much more knowledged, she made me feel like she cared and went above and beyond to talk to me, I went to the doctors in the morning and felt more hopeful leaving the pharmacy then I did the doctors appointment. And in general this boots really stands out I’ve never had a bad experience with any pharmacy but this one has wonderful staff that want to help you.

We have only the highest compliments for Sarah. She is always smiling and very helpful. My husband, Rewat, always went to Sarah. Many thanks to all the pharmacy staff in Brindley Place. We are leaving Birmingham for Bangkok but will remember Boots.

Store opens at 8am but the pharmacy which inside the store st 9am…. So plan accordingly with this bizarre arrangements. Waites till 9am only to hear that the pharmacist is not there on time …. Again…,

Worst service ever. I had an emergency parcel to collect and it was pouring down and I was delayed by 1 minute. They didn’t even hear my problem and treated me rudely. When I reached at door the girl said ‘stand back!’ as I was a robber or something. Atleast they could have been polite in telling that it’s closing hours. But they were so rude and I really had an emergency package to collect.

It has been difficult to find a hair salon that deals with special needs for regular visits. Having contacted Minoo about my sisters hair she was respectful and accommodating to book us in.

During the visit she made my sister feel at ease, reassured and playfully kept her spirits up and my sister is generally not so quick to lower her guard

The end result is a much needed overdue haircut and clean up to help her with managing better going forward

We will be back and my daughter wants her nails done… 😅

Stop, drop and roll on over here to get your cosmetology services!! I got my hair washed, cut and styled by Minoo, who was incredible all-around! From high-quality, professional service to care and compassion, I felt very comfortable and love my hair
OH, and a huge bonus, it their pricing is affordable :)

First time getting my nails done at this salon and Iqra has done such an amazing job. I booked super last minute and she managed to do everything so quickly. Service was amazing, she is so lovely.
Would definitely book with her again.
This was my first time getting my nails done here and they did such a wonderful job. It was exactly what I wanted and the service was great❤️

Absolutely love my nails! The salon has such a welcoming atmosphere and the staff are so professional and friendly. My nails were done with great care and attention to detail, and the finish is perfect. I’ve had so many compliments already – can’t wait to go back! 💅💖”
Amazing experience. Wonderful Consultant who spent so much time and patience explaining everything (Kerstin). The clinic is beautiful, the staff are super friendly. Can’t recommend enough!!!

Mrs CC Kat came recommended to me as a very understanding and conscientious surgeon who takes her patients needs and wants very seriously. She is friendly and approachable, unlike some surgeons, she is not at all intimidating. She also has a great reputations for operating on pigmented skin, which carries greater risk for scarring and keloids.  Mrs Kat gives her recommendations, and does not oversell surgery, just what she recommends for your best health and outcome. I am looking forward to having my surgery with her.

I had the most wonderful experience at Kat & Co Clinic, and I can’t thank the team enough for the incredible care I received. From the moment I arrived, I felt truly supported and reassured. I was especially nervous due to previous horrendous clinical experiences, so the kindness and patience I was shown meant more to me than anyone could know.

A special thank you to Nadia, who looked after me with such warmth and professionalism. She made me feel completely at ease throughout the whole process. I also want to mention the lovely nurse whose name I didn’t catch, but who gave me the warmest hug when I needed it most — that simple moment meant the world.

My anaesthetist was fantastic, taking the time to explain every step clearly and making sure I felt safe and comfortable. And of course, my amazing surgeon, Seni, whose skill, care, and calm confidence made all the difference. I couldn’t have asked for a better surgeon or team.
