Every single person I encountered at Kat & Co was thoughtful, patient, and genuinely caring. They guided me through each stage with compassion and clarity. Given my past experiences, this level of care was truly exceptional. I’m beyond grateful and would wholeheartedly recommend them.

I had a really positive experience today at Kat&Co Clinic when I came in for a CO₂ laser patch test. From the very start, the service was excellent — Becky, who helped with my consultation booking, was incredibly helpful and knowledgeable, especially when it came to explaining pricing clearly and honestly.
My consultation with Dr Sonya was an absolute pleasure. She was professional, reassuring, and refreshingly honest. Rather than simply going ahead with the CO₂ laser, she took the time to assess my situation properly and actually advised me against having the treatment, as it wasn’t the best option for me. It was clear that her priority was my best interest.
It’s rare to find a clinic that operates with this level of integrity and care. I left feeling informed, respected, and confident in the advice I was given. I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend Kat&Co Clinic to anyone looking.

Ps I’m back there next week for a more invasive consultation since the clinic won my trust 👏🏼

I recently underwent a cosmetic procedure at Kat and Co under Surgeon Maria Chasapi. From the first consultation I felt completely at ease with Miss Chasapi. She explained the procedure thoroughly with me so I understood fully what would be involved.
The day of the surgery was exceptional from start to finish. Every member of staff, from the anesthetist, theatre staff, and recovery nurse. was so attentive to my needs and made me feel so at ease every step of the way.  I would recommend highly to anyone considering a cosmetic procedure that they have a consultation with Kat and Co

A tranquil oasis right next to Birmingham train station - Maxine was amazing, talking me into the building, and naturally setting me at ease through the classic awkward procedure we women put ourselves through. Highly professional, yet also made me feel we'd been friends for years. The wax is perfect, the price was decent and is an experience I would choose to repeat again. Thank you Maxine! And so lovely to chat to you and Chris after! 🥰 xx
They really know their stuff! Staff were amazing and left feeling smooth

I booked based on the reviews and I was not disappointed! Annette is very professional and makes you feel really comfortable. The results are amazing, my skin feels so soft. Great location for a central stop, highly recommended.
First time here and had a great experience. Maxine was very friendly, quick, gentle and efficient. Highly recommend.

Best waxing service in town. Lisa, Annette & Maxine are friendly & professional. Convenient location & never an issue to get an appointment. I always leave with a smile and I wouldn’t go anywhere else. Thank you ladies!

Spicy seafood udon.

The broth: Good tangy flavour and although spicy not overpowering. 9/10

The seafood: Big chunks of lightly battered greatness and a few prawns. 8/10

The fillers: Cucumber mostly, large chunks of sliced chilli and some big fat Udon noodle! 10/10

Fair price for what you get and would recommend!
My lashes always last long and the service was 10/10
Nice
I found a nail salon that’s affordable and great! I’ll keep coming here. I love this place Pretty one!
Very good

We stayed at this hotel on Saturday 17th January and had a truly fantastic experience from start to finish. From the moment we walked in, the reception staff were incredibly welcoming and friendly, which immediately set the tone for our stay.
Our room on the 6th floor (room 614) was spotless and beautifully presented, with an amazing view over the city. It was my wife’s birthday, and she was completely surprised by the stay — and especially impressed by how clean and tidy the room was.
My wife is a big coffee drinker, and we had gone through all the coffee in the room quite quickly. We spoke with the housekeeping maid on the 6th floor, who genuinely could not have been more helpful. She went out of her way to provide us with extra coffee and tea and was absolutely fantastic. A huge credit to the housekeeping team for the excellent standards they clearly maintain.
The bar and restaurant staff were unbelievable, and the food was amazing — both the service and quality were spot on.
I would 100% stay here again and would happily return in the future. A brilliant hotel and an all-round excellent experience.

Food and service were absolutely excellent, could not fault the staff and quality of the food, we booked the hotel package with evening dinner and breakfast included. The room was clean and tidy but a little bit warm in places, door frames and bathroom need some maintenance. Overall the visit was very enjoyable. The bar staff and restaurant staff cannot be faulted. The location in the mailbox is also a great place to stay in Birmingham. I would have given 5 stars, just that small attention to detail and maintenance required.

This was an Xmas gift from our daughter. Service was great and the food was delicious. we had the chef's table for starter's great choices and could go back for more if you want. I had the pork for my main course and my wife had the roast beef 😋 for drinks I had a pint of Guinness my wife had a spicy bloody Mary 🙃 which was very nice.

Absolutely fantastic location 5 minute walk to train station and maybe 10-15 to the coach station. Located in the mailbox which has other food and drink places. The rooms itself was very nice and clean. Had all the amenities you'd expect and a very nice breakfast in the morning, with a later finish time which we liked. Would definitely use again next time I come to birmingham. Even let us leave our bags as we were a few hours early.

Nice comfortable room with all you need and good location.
Check on the parking. You need to prebook the mailbox which isn’t clear and can be costly.
Restaurant was amazing. Lovely food and staff excelled. Thursday was steak night - such value.
Bar staff, especially the manageress, need a lesson in customer service. Waited 15 mins with no acknowledgement and treated like dirt when I dared to ask could I order one drink. So rude and dismissive. Such a stark contrast to the restaurant team. Really burst the bubble after a lovely night. Ironic given the bar was empty and soulless and she just had one customer to sort:
If you take the bar out of the mix and nice place to be.

I’ve come here for massages a few times a year for the last 8 or so years and it’s still my favourite place to come for a massage. I’ve read other reviews, and feel sad because the women who have massaged me have been really kind, caring and genuinely great at Chinese massage. The massages are intense, more like a sports massage, which I really enjoy. I’ve always felt comfortable here and I’ve not witnessed anything like other’s reviews. They also offer reflexology, which I’d love to try!

These people hardly speak English, the room was not relaxing at all, no music or candles or scents, the woman massaged me with a towel on, I had no oil applied. I had never been massaged over a huge towel before. I wondered if they didn’t want to feel skin why do they do the job then? Half an hour later she applied baby oil rubbed it in aimlessly and finally slapped my back hurtingly and said , FINISH. So awful I don’t recommend

i loved this little gem. I went yesterday after another massage parlour let me down. sure the floor could have done with a hoover and decor was a bit tatty but none of that matters when you have genuine kind people. I had a long massage for a good price and it was great. Just reading the stories about happy endings 😂  great extras if it floats your boat. not my cup of tea but still another good bit of customer service. My advice is ditch the snobbery and high prices and go here.
Used to be very good I paid for one hour  but I get massage only 40 minutes  massage  wasn't  good

I paid £25 for half an hour. I got put into a room that was so cold and tacky. The lady didn't even wait for me to get comfortable on the bed she came in whilst I was naked and watched me get on the bed. There was no relaxing music, I could here street noise outside the whole time, I heard weird sex noises coming from next door. I was very uncomfortable. The lady said something to me in Chinese and the massage was done with baby oil.  I will not be returning, something very very off about the place.

My second time visiting and I have no regret. I booked a couples massage as a birthday gift for my man. I knew he was satisfied because he asked me when our next session was! On arrival staff were welcoming and professional throughout. The room was clean, fresh, with a lovely ambiance. I'll definitely return soon. Thanks guys 😀

King Thai Therapy exceeded my expectations. From the moment I arrived, the staff were attentive and welcoming. The massage itself was absolutely amazing I left feeling fully relaxed and rejuvenated. Excellent service all around. Highly recommend and I will definitely return 👌🏻

We had an amazing deep tissue massage. The staff were very professional, knowledgeable, and made us feel completely at ease. We left feeling relaxed and refreshed. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a quality massage experience

I had an incredible deep tissue massage that exceeded every expectation. From the start, the therapist Soaryana was attentive, welcoming, and took the time to understand my specific areas of tension. Their technique was outstanding—firm, precise pressure that reached deep into the muscle layers without ever feeling rushed or overwhelming. Throughout the session, they checked in just enough to ensure the pressure was right, while still allowing me to fully relax into the experience. Would definitely recommend.

I had a deep tissue and head massage for the first time today with a lovely therapist named Jasmine. She was honestly one of the most gentle and kind people I’ve ever met. Throughout the whole session, she made sure I was comfortable and happy, and her technique was amazing. She was very respectful and had such a great personality. I immediately booked another appointment with her and will definitely be coming back! Highly recommend!
Looks a tad old and outdated, but having used the gym, swim and sauna facilities, a fantastic friendly atmosphere, staff are fantastic, super friendly and helpful. For the price you pay it's 10/10

Great gym , people are extremely nice and just a comfortable gym.

Only let down is one of the younger staff members is extremely rude
If your thinking about taking swimming lessons, have kalok teach you. Very good swimming instructor
Best place to sweat out. They have all kind of sports activities. Swimming, badminton, squash, gym, tennis etc..

Hall 1-  In my opinion and based on my personal experience, the worst worst court I have ever played in. Too much ventilation and the shuttle was dancing in the air, floor is ok, but the ceiling is white, wall paintings are light mint green, which when you hit a drive, you can’t see the shuttle until it travels to your side, while the shuttle’s positioning will move because of the ac , probably side wind. Also, the net is sliding every 2 seconds, swinging in the middle of the games.
I would not recommend to people who want to enjoy badminton.

All the comments are based on my own experience and my opinion.

15th May 2025

First (and probably last) visit to Blue Belle Suite – Oxford Street, early December 2025.

I booked a 30-minute private massage, paid the normal rate at reception and picked one of the ladies from the line-up.

Unfortunately it was a really bad experience. The lady seemed to be in a huge hurry from the second we went into the room. The back massage lasted literally 2 minutes and was very mechanical. When I turned over she spent even less time, then suddenly said the session was over and told me to get dressed – even though only about 4 minutes had passed in total.

I politely said I had paid for 30 minutes and still had plenty of time left. She just laughed, said something like “you’re done now” and told me to leave. I ended up walking out after less than 10 minutes. Felt completely cheated and embarrassed.

For a first-time visitor this was shocking. I won’t be going back and I can’t recommend it to anyone else. Plenty of other places in Birmingham that actually give you the time you pay for. Staff seems sleepy and too tired to greet with a smile. She is from  🇷🇴 and she had tattoo on her lower belly i believe and her hair is👱‍♀️. She was bbw

Entering the joint welcomed with a lame entrance to establishment. Paid the fee got 2 drinks and 3 Eastern gals came and sat down didn't seem enthusiastic to meet and greet. The girls just sat aside and talked to each other in there own lingo. There's no atmosphere here it feels cold and unfriendly. Girls seem to try and rule the joint. Customer has left after seeing the confrontation between the working girls. It seems this place has now become controlled by the eu girls, atmosphere is totally dead no1 is trying to make it a fun place. It feels like as soon as any1 walks in they just want to take them upstairs for service without any small talk,  it all feels hurried rushed. This place has gone don hill.
Would not recommend at any cost!!!!
Great experience had fun times

I attended today for a consult with Dr Zoya- booked this weeks ago so couldnt remember what i had actually booked lol but luckily Dr Zoya did a thorough consult so it didnt really matter! She was so lovely and welcoming- and super straight talking- like …no ifs or buts …she just said it how it is- which is so refreshing ! She took background details , spoke about my lifestyle / skin routines etc and made recommendation on how to tackle the areas that bothered me about my skin. There was no hard sell or pressure to do anything - which again was so reassuring. I did end up having a treatment as i felt comfortable and informed enough to do so. I look forward to recieving the breakdown of options and products discussed so i can start my skincare journey with the clinic. Aside from Dr Zoya being fabulous- the clinic itself is so nice! Modern, clean and private- what more couod anyone ask for!. Super friendly staff and the place is really easy to find in harvey nics right at the back. They also validate your parking which is a bonus. Would definately recommend to anyone considering taking the leap into learning more about thier skin and treatments available to address any problems areas. Thanks again and i look forward to returning soon! My cats also looking into sorting our her frown lines 😂

I had treatment with Dr Rabi today. He was amazing. He really listened to all my concerns and provided the best advice and reassured me. He advised the best treatments and completed this upon precision. He  his work and results were truly satisfactory. He took his time and talked me through everything he was doing step by step and this really calmed me. I will definitely be returning to him.

From the moment I stepped into the reception area I was made to feel relaxed and welcome by the receptionist. I was shown into a beautiful room where I could sit in a massage chair and watch Netflix whilst I waited for Dr Naqvi.
Dr Naqvi instantly put me at ease and explained everything about the procedure. He was very gentle and spoke me through the treatment. From start to finish I have absolutely no complaints and I would highly recommend Secret Aesthetics.

The best Aesthetic clinic in Birmingham that anyone can trust with their skin for sure!!! I have had polynucleotides and Botox done a good few times now with Dr Taran, and let me tell you that she’s the most experienced Aesthetician I have ever met   (and I have been to a good few Aesthetic clinics in the past.) Dr Taran not only very experienced and knows exectly what she’s doing, but she’s also very very friendly. My pain tolerance isn’t very good, and Dr Taran always making sure that I’m super comfortable. Not rushing the treatment, instead she’s encouraging me to take as many breaks as I want if I need to, and she’s taking her time to make sure the treatment done perfectly. Very calming and relaxing personality and the only person I trust with my skin. Also the results of the treatments is amazing. I had 4 polynucleotides in total done and I never had any bruising after each treatment. My skin started glowing even after just the first treatment. I had so many compliments from everyone I meet and I tell everyone the answer is Secret Aesthetics.

I deeply regret choosing this clinic. I underwent microneedling for stretch marks after being assured they had experience treating brown skin and shown results claiming up to 90% improvement. I paid £700 per session, trusting their expertise. The procedure was unbearably painful, and throughout the treatment the practitioner showed little care, empathy, or support while I was clearly in distress. I was also made to feel extremely uncomfortable due to a complete lack of privacy when changing.

What’s worse is that the hyperpigmentation caused by the treatment never healed. Instead, it left permanent-looking scars. I spent a significant portion of my savings hoping to fix an existing skin concern, only for it to be made far worse due to what felt like negligence and poor aftercare. This experience has been emotionally and physically distressing.

I am not sharing names or photos for personal reasons, but I strongly urge anyone especially people with brown or darker skin—to be extremely cautious before trusting this clinic. Please do thorough research before putting your skin and money at risk.

Had an amazing holistic experience. Your're greeted and talked through your treatment in their comfy seating area beforehand. All the staff here are  knowledgeable and friendly.
I had the good hour treatment and was treated by the lovely Amy. My needs for privacy and a female therapist was met with respect. Top it off with a nice cup of black tea with a biscuit or fruit ❤️

Had such a great experience at Lush! Huge thank you to Brinja, who was incredibly helpful and knowledgeable. She took the time to help us pick the products I needed, explained how to use them, and also introduced me to some new ones I hadn’t tried before. I really appreciated her recommendations and the samples she sent to me to test at home. Amazing customer service — made the whole experience enjoyable. I’ll definitely be back!

I visited the spa for the first time today for a rewilding facial treatment. The therapist Sandra was brilliant, talking through all the products and steps prior to entering the treatment room. It was such a relaxing atmosphere and I can hands down say the best spa experience I've ever had. Afterwards I was given a lovely probiotic drink.
I'd recommend the spa to anyone, it's a lovely atmosphere and makes you forget you're in the middle of a busy city!

It was my first time visit as my birthday treat , a one hour Validation facial treatment . I arrived 15 mins before appointment just because I need to discuss with my therapist Sandra what products will be using on my face for each step . I didn’t realise that level of detail and care at all , very impressed.

The treatment was so lovely , Sandra got her technique of massage , really nice and the only bad thing was timing is just too short to enjoy 🤣

Need to mention the fresh fruit drink given to me afterwards that was sooo nice ! Over half of glass were full of fruits ! I felt so energised and detoxing after all . Recommended 👍🏻👍🏻

Wow! What an experience! I feel fabulous! Becca was amazing! She took me through an almost magical experience and all of my senses feel stimulated but relaxed at the same time.  Just what I needed and more! The venue was alternative, chic, clean and relaxing! Totally recommended! Treat yourself!
Good company to deal with

Tried for a day pass 25£ all facility was splendid. Only bummer is they charge 3.50£ for towel hire. And a bit expensive for a day they charge 25£ . It should be arround 8-10£ for day . All look neat and clean.

We booked this spa experience to celebrate our mom’s 60th birthday, expecting a relaxing and special day — unfortunately, it was anything but. From the moment we arrived, the staff were extremely unpleasant, and the senior management in particular was shockingly rude and dismissive.

Instead of feeling welcomed or valued, we felt uncomfortable and unwelcome throughout the visit. What should have been a memorable celebration turned into a stressful and disappointing experience.

We will not be returning, and we would not recommend this spa to anyone looking for good service or a positive experience.

I give it 3 stars. It is a pleasant place with nice staff. When we arrived the receptionist offered for us to upgrade our massage to deep tissue and add more time for a fair price so I did that and I was happy with that. The atmosphere and decor is not luxurious but is pleasant nonetheless. I really enjoyed my massage I think the masseuse's name was January? If I heard correctly. She did a lovely massage one of the best I've had great deep pressure. I would say it should be more clear where to get food from, but that wasn't a problem for us as we brought sandwiches with us. There was a hot drink machine which was nice. I enjoyed the gym there was a great boxing area there good for releasing rage but I did have to ask about where the boxing gloves were as they were in a different room. The relaxation lounge was lovely the water beds were nice and comfy I could have had a nap!   It would have been good for the receptionist to state the different facilities at the start of the spa day so we were informed of all the areas, however it was OK because we went on a mooch around the place and found our own way around. In general it was a clean and tidy place I would say the bathroom sinks need a bit more cleaning around the rims and the changing room floors and walls need a little more attention but in general it was clean enough. It was a bit hard to find the showers after using the spa as they just look like changing rooms someone had to show us. So be aware of that. We didn't go in the pool as it wasn't warm enough but that might be influenced because we were warm from the steam room and hot tub. We enjoyed the hot tub bubbles although sometimes the bubbles took a while to come on. The steam room was very good for working as a decongestant and good for asthmatic cough and chestiness clearing the chest afterwards. Very hot in there could only do 5 minutes at a time. There was only 2 elemis testers on display which was a downfall. My friend and I were disappointed because when we opened them they were Completely empty and no sign that there was cream in them it was completely clean. We mentioned this to the receptionist who said we should have said something earlier as they are supposed to have cream in them. But didn't explain why they were empty so I am still baffled as to why they were empty. As I was very excited to do testers so I was disappointed. But other than that we did have a lovely day and a relaxing day. The highlights were the massage, the gym, the relaxation lounge room and the steam room. All in all a nice place and had a lovely day. There are more fancy spas out there that I've been to but this one was close by and affordable and pleasant. So we did have a lovely spa day.

I’ve had a massage with Kasha a few weeks ago and it was the best massage I’ve ever had. She’s very professional when it comes to care prior and after the treatment. Explained well how it’s going to look and made sure the pressure was to my liking, made me feel relaxed and can not wait to have another one soon!!! Kashas amazing at her job and couldn’t recommend her more!!!!
Love this gym, classes are at a convenient time and the facilities are top notch. Staff are friendly as well. I get a beautiful view overlooking the canal every time I work out 💪🏽

Person answering the phone denied claims that the therapist caused me major pain during the waxing process will never book here again very disturbing experience the therapist name is URSULA she causes harm and pain by not letting the wax dry she then pulls it off and starts waxing your back even though back was not included in the treatment very odd experience causes pain and torture to a customer. Not only this seemed odd spending 1 hour for a short Hollywood and peri anal. Apparently she's highly experienced lmao 🤣

UPDATE IMPORTANT: Decided to give this place another go even after reading the complaints experienced the exact same being banned 🚫 I am unsure if the manager wants to actually run the place into the ground. I called a few more salons and their tone and behaviour was exactly how I'd expect please search around and do not use this spa it is the most disgusting worst customer service ever!!!!

The other spas don't care if you have made a complaint but this one will demonise you and harass you. The manager needs professional help thank god she doesn't have my other details or else she would be dangerous.

Disgusting attitude of the Spa Management in 2024. Been going to the spa over 20 years since it opended intermittently but it has become very, very toxic since the pandemic reopening. They never answer their phone and always make excuses when trying to get through to book an appointment. Had some wonderful facials with some lovely therapists (Skye) and (Freya) over the recent years. Despite having numerous treatments booked by the spa manager herself (Luci Tovey), she is resorting to banning customers for making legitimate customer service complaints. Paid £50 for gel nails, one nail fell off within  7 days. Luci Tovey was not happy and bullied/victimised me as the customer. There was no apology and photographic evidence showed my nail had completely fallen off. Not what you would expect from what they claim is the 'best spa in the city'. Instead of an apology and fixing it, Luci Tovey arranged to ban (victimise) me as a customer so she comes across as running a good spa where they have no complaints. The nail was fixed after complaints were made but the poor original member of staff (Skye) went on sick leave on the actual morning. I am concerned Luci Tovey is bullying the spa staff the same way she arranged for me to be banned (victimising customers) for making a genuine service complaint. Please do not visit this spa - they have turned into toxic poision and are self-serving rather than customer serving. They will also make false accusations against customers (which they cannot support) to justify their own toxic practices. AVOID! This will soon die it's death. Read the review of TC below; mirroring the same point about the attitude of the management mistreating customers.

I would like to firstly say that on my previous visits I have had lovely treatments and really friendly staff. However, recently it was terrible!!!. The therapist I had was not great at all very rushed and parts of the treatments was missed (unfair to mention the therapist name) How I know this is that I’ve had the same spa package before and it was amazing. I advised the manager how I felt. However, the manager found it difficult to believe what I was saying. I have spent allot of money over the years at this spa and I’ve never had an issue. It’s shame really as I have recommended the spa to many family and friends. The response I got from management over email, it’s put me off from even rebooking. :(

Absolutely amazing experience friendly staff who offer person centered treatment just to your liking. A booking you will not regret for jacuzzi and sauna access after treatment be sure to purchase the beauty Pass I think for less than a day pass.🩷

Spa experience, adequate not great.  Staff were lovely and Helpful, facilities adequate, jacuzzi broken so couldn’t be used, other than that there is use of steam and sauna.  We chilled in relax room, had a massage, which was lovely, had a steam and sauna then started to get bored so changed and left, didn’t spend more than a couple of hours there, not enough to do.  Changing rooms need renovating, very tired, needs to be cleaned more often, glasses And plates left around the relax space for long periods.. unfortunately I would not return, for the money you pay, you can enjoy a better experience somewhere else.. shame!

I wanted to write this review for those who are still doubting which cosmetologist to choose. It was my first time doing Radiesse and my first time meeting Iryna, so naturally I was a bit nervous. But Iryna did an excellent job, and the results I’ve received have met my best expectations. She was confident in what she was doing, supportive when I was nervous, and took her time to explain each step — a true master of her craft. Thanks to her, I am now more confident, and although it’s only been a few days post-procedure, I’m happy every time I see myself in the mirror. The procedure itself is not very painful, with only a few minor bruises. I’m genuinely happy I found her and trusted her with my face.

I visited Dr Irina  for a series of beauty treatments, and I couldn't be happier with the results. The environment was clean and calming. The attention to detail and professionalism throughout the appointment were truly exceptional.
I can recommend this place to anyone looking for expert care and stunning results. I will definitely be returning for future treatments!

I recently visited Iryna and had an outstanding experience. From the moment I walked in, I was impressed by the clean and welcoming environment. She is incredibly knowledgeable and professional, taking the time to thoroughly explain each step of the procedure and answer all of my questions.

The treatment itself was fantastic, and I could immediately see and feel the results. Iryna uses high-quality products and advanced techniques that truly set she apart from other specialists I’ve visited in the past.

I highly recommend Dolce doctor to anyone looking for a skilled and caring cosmetologist. I will definitely be returning for future treatments!

I have been a patient/client of the DA Clinic for over 2 years. I have had various aesthetics treatments done and recently had laser hair removal treatments too. I cannot recommend the Clinic more. Perfect results, service and advice, always! Thank you Iryna and Viktoriia for taking such good care of me. I cannot wait to try the new body contouring treatments soon!

Had some treatments done by Irina and Viktoria. Firstly the clinic is very clean, girls are always using gloves when touching your face and always show you the packaging, the product it self and expiry date on it. Irina is not only very knowledgeable and skilled, but also quite honest about what you should or shouldn’t do,she will not perform a treatment if she thinks it’s not necessary or not suitable for you. Products she uses are the top of the range and combined with her techniques  allow you to have the best results ever. I was very hesitant of having my lips done, as I was afraid to have “duck lips”, but guess what , Irina just nailed it- now my lips are more defined, plumped but still very natural. Can’t be happier! From now on only girls from this clinic are touching my face 🤣

It was my first time coming here and i booked a full body Swedish massage for 50 mins. Georgette was fantastic and I’ve had one of the best experience here. Her massage technique was quite unique compared to other spa’s I have been to. I also noticed straight away that my body is much less tense. I highly recommend going here and I would definitely come back again!

Such a wonderful experience, I had a deep tissue massage and was extremely comfortable. I have been having trouble with shoulder pain and discomfort for a while and felt immediately better after the massage. I was made to feel super relaxed and reassured throughout the session.

Will book again and definitely recommend to family and friends! Many thanks again.

Terrible service! Please avoid!!!!
I was sent two confirmation messages to say I’ve been booked in for a massage. Please look at photos attached!
When I got to the salon at 6pm having travelled from coventry I get an email saying my massage has been cancelled?!
I spoke to Georgette,  she said she called me at 5.06pm to confirm my appointment?!
It was a private number?! How would I know who it was no message was left either?!
I got to the salon at 6pm to find my appointment was cancelled and she had booked someone else in?! How unprofessional and a total cowboy job?!
How can you cancel a client and book another one in?!
Georgette said, I should have called to ask if my appointment was confirmed?!
Why would the client call to ask if the appointment is confirmed, when you have two confirmation messages and an email?!
She failed to understand her wrong and continued trying to shift the blame on the client for not calling in to confirm the booking?! How does that make any sense?!  Terrible and unprofessional conduct.

I felt very welcomed, the moment I stepped in the room. It was a friendly and pleasant atmosphere and loved the service I booked for. Before coming for my appointment, I had a stiff neck, however after receiving a massage, I went home feeling brand new! If you haven’t been to Sublime House Beyouty, what are you waiting for!?

I have nothing but amazing things to say about Sublime House Beyrouth Limited. Excellent customer service and very friendly/welcoming environment. The price is fair and to be honest less than it should really be compared to the quality and time they spend really making things perfect. I’m forever grateful to come across this beauty room and I will never change again salon again. Thank you very much !!

Came in today for a wax, also got a haircut. I absolutely recommend this place! I was seen by Maha, and she was outstanding. She is so friendly, professional and shows that she really has a passion for making sure you leave with the best possible service. Everything she did was done to perfection, and she talks to you with such ease throughout to help you through the process. I could hardly remember I was being waxed, I was enthralled in conversation instead.
I will absolutely be coming here to see her for every wax and haircut I ever need. Just absolute impeccable service, and the shop was very clean.

I got my hair beautifully transformed from Maha. She guided me well before the procedure and meanwhile the process she listened to how I want my hair and did the best work.
Anyone looking for hair services, I can't recommed herself more. She is polite, professional and very talented. Everyone has been appreciating my hair.
Got a HydraFacial with Lyba and it was amazing! She’s super gentle, explained everything, and made my skin glow. Loved how fresh and hydrated my face felt after,definitely booking with her again!

Finally Came today for dry cut after couple of booking attempts  due to weather few days before. Nadera was amazing, professional and kind. My hair was a disaster before coming hair but nadera showed patience throughout the session with advices on how i could take care of my frizzy and uneven hair. I am so happy with my hair cut results. Looking forward to book again and hope i would again be served by nadera. 5 STAR for NADERA.

I'm a regular, have had very decent experiences and I highly recommend my cousin and nieces to book their services. Today I took my cousin in for her laser patch test, I was extremely embarrassed by Dr Saher's behaviour and attitude towards my cousin. Dr Saher was talking about my cousin with her colleague in front of us, making rude facial expressions and hand gestures indicidating why its taking so long for my cousin to fill out the bunch of forms given to her. Dr Saher then without even asking my cousin, assumed that my cousin did not speak English and had told her colleague to translate. Clearly the Dr struggled to speak in English herself and preferred a customer that would speak urdu to make her life easier.  My cousin was very upset with the Dr's behaviour towards her. There are other doctors who are brilliant there but for me and my cousin, moving forward, we do not want any service from Dr Saher and I would not recommend anyone else to deal with her either. Very unprofessional.

Ranjeet is professional and creates a comfortable environment. I’ve had a Swedish massage as well as a deep tissue massage and felt so much lighter afterwards. Definitely recommend going for the Indian head massage too!

I had the most amazing experience with Oscar! From the moment I walked in, the hospitality was top-notch and made me feel right at home. Oscar really took the time to listen to what I wanted, and the haircut he gave me is absolutely perfect. I’m beyond happy with the result! His attention to detail and expertise truly shine through. I left the salon feeling refreshed and confident, and I can’t wait to come back for my next cut. Highly recommend Oscar to anyone looking for a talented and friendly stylist!

Service into the barbers immediately started with an enquiry into how I was doing, and if I'd like any refreshments; tea, coffee, water. My personal belongings were then taken and put somewhere safe.

Absolutely lovely experience from Sam. Guided me through the process, some of the materials used, the procedure in how he'd be cutting my hair, and why certain methods are more effective. Definitely a passionate barber, and a lovely feeling afterwards, too. Truly felt looked after here. Would recommend to a friend.

Thank you, Sam!

Best barber in Birmingham, hands down. Ben delivers top-quality haircuts and I’m always pleased with the results. His attention to detail, friendly service and the overall experience make every visit worth it. Highly recommend 🫶🏻
My mum had a full body Ayurvedic massage with Ranjeet and she said it was amazing! Ranjeet was very skillful and professional. She highly recommends her!

I would like to share my feedback about my first laser hair removal session.

From the moment I arrived, I received a very warm and professional welcome from the reception team, which immediately made me feel comfortable.

I would especially like to praise Constantina, who carried out my treatment. She was excellent — very kind, reassuring and professional. I was quite nervous before the session as I had heard that laser hair removal could be painful, but she calmly reassured me that it wouldn’t be. She was absolutely right — the treatment was very smooth and far more comfortable than I expected.

Thanks to her care and approach, the whole experience was as pleasant as possible. I would highly recommend this clinic and Constantina to anyone considering laser hair removal.

I’ve finished my 10 sessions of laser hair removal and found it quite effective. The first few sessions were fine with great staff, however I found that every staff member I had would provide a different type of service. Some are really friendly and chatty, some are extremely rude and make you feel awkward. Some provide great treatment covering every part, others do half a job, rushing you out and forget to put laser aid and sunscreen on and you have to remind them. Knocked the stars off for the lack of customer service and consistency.

Tanya is absolutely amazing at laser clinic Birmingham grand central. She is so kind and friendly. When you’re having intimate body areas done you don’t want anyone who is unsure of what they are doing. Tanya is the perfect persons as she is confident and reassuring at the same time. Talks you through what she is doing and is so easy to talk to. Thank you Tanya for making my experience so good

The skin care range is absolutely fantastic.
For years have had a battle with very sensitive dry skin.
Shamara recommended arrange and wrote down the routine. My skin cleared and brighter. Within a week, I could see results.

I had an amazing experience with Jag at the laser clinic. I did laser hair removal with her, and she works with true care and professionalism. From the first session, she made me feel comfortable and explained everything clearly. She’s very detail-oriented and keeps everything super clean. The results were great and noticeable early on. I highly recommend her to anyone looking for quality service and someone who truly puts effort into their work.

I am currently undergoing full-body laser hair removal (including face and neck) at MY Skin Boutique Birmingham, and I couldn’t be happier with my experience so far. From my very first session, I noticed a huge difference in hair reduction on both my body and face, and the results have continued to improve with each session.
Parv has been absolutely amazing throughout my treatment journey. She is professional, knowledgeable, and makes you feel completely at ease. Her expertise truly shows in the results — only a few sessions in, and I am already miles away from having to shave, which was a major concern for me as I used to shave every other day.
My experience here has been especially positive compared to a previous clinic I attended, where I had 8 sessions for my face and neck with very minimal results. I was then advised to pay for an additional 6 sessions, which I did, yet still saw no real improvement and eventually stopped attending. The difference with MY Skin Boutique has been night and day — real, visible progress from the start.
I am genuinely excited to continue my sessions and can’t wait to be fully hair-free by summer, without the constant worry of shaving. I would highly recommend MY Skin Boutique Birmingham, and especially Parv, to anyone considering laser hair removal and looking for effective, honest results.

I would highly recommend Parv at MySkin Boutique for laser hair removal and hydrafacials.
Just after my 3rd underarm laser session i've seen a huge hair reduction (40%) and i'm really happy as i was struggling with really thick hair.
I've also did 2 sittings of hydrafacial and my skin feels healthier,soft and shiny.
Thanks a lot Parv!

I have been going to MySkin Boutique for Hydrofacials for a few years and I have been so impressed with the whole service as well as the results!
From the moment I walk in there, I feel so relaxed and Parv creates a cosy atmosphere for ultimate relaxation! She provides a bespoke facial based on your skin concerns/needs and explains every step of the process in such a polite and professional manner.
I especially found these facials super effective in the run up to my wedding! I had monthly facials and found that my skin had a glow, felt deeply nourished, and my makeup sat so well on the day!
I recommend these facials for anyone looking to see great results or wanting a relaxing self care experience! I can’t wait to continue my facials with Parv 🥰

My hydrafacial lady, Parv, truly knows what’s best for your skin. She takes the time to create a personalised treatment plan and the results speak for themselves. Every visit leaves my skin feeling refreshed, glowing, and healthier than ever. I can’t recommend her enough!

I would highly recommend Parv at MySkin Boutique for hydrafacials. Parv tailors these to your skin needs and she was very accommodating, sharing so much knowledge. I had the pleasure of getting tailored hydrafacials done ready for my wedding, and it really helped prep my skin for my big day!

Having had a long drive to Birmingham, I was suffering from shoulder pain.  I managed to get an appointment at short notice, had a wonderful deep tissue massage which really helped relieve the tightness before my onward journey. The spa is within walking distance of the train station, so very convenient for people visiting the town centre.  Would definitely book again if I’m in Birmingham.
A truly relaxing and therapeutic experience. Made sure I was comfortable throughout. I will definitely be returning!
Nice atmosphere, pleasant staff.

I had a Hollywood wax today by Danielle Roberts. I can’t tell you how comfortable she made me feel, she made the atmosphere insanely calm. She is incredibly professional and beyond kind. I’m absolutely happy with my results and I can’t wait to tell everyone I know about her. THANK YOU Danielle ❤️
Had a wax done today, Danielle made me feel very comfortable, very relaxed. Explained everything in detail. Honestly the best wax I've had in a long time. Will definitely go back.

I got the Cinderella facial and it was a great service, Danielle explained everything she was using and gave me a quick mini skin analysis and explained different issues with my skin and how to fix them, overall the experience was amazing and the customer service was even better, would 100% recommend and I will be making this place my regular.

I attended the appointment but no service was provided. I had a special condition and tried to come up with a solution with Arivon but they didn't try to help at all. They told me at my face that they will charge me full price without doing nothing and even though I asked for continuing the service or replace it with other services, they said it's a waste of wax, which I have paid for? The attitude is absolutely terrible!!!

Great experience! It was my first time visiting Arivon and I will now not be going anywhere else for my waxing. Danielle was amazing, so professional and really lovely. I felt instantly comfortable and we had such a good laugh during my appointment. So happy with the results and would definitely recommend.

I would recommend the Private Practice to anyone looking to understand more about their skin and face. I visited Raisah in the London practice, she is so knowledgeable and created a tailored appointment for me. The results with my skin were amazing, I found the whole appointment both successful for results and very interesting to learn as well! 5 stars would definitely recommend

Had a few sessions with Raisah….  Firstly body sculpt then some injectables.   Shes very friendly, professional and took her time in my consultation to get the best and right treatment for me.   Despite my fear of injections she did her best to make sure I was as comfortable and relaxed as possible throughout the session.   Would definitely recommend.

I looked online and saw this place me and my wife made a appointment explained what we wanted and on the day were met by Raisah

She explained all our option and other treatment option and everything Was explaining properly and at no point did me and my wife feel uncomfortable.

It was an absolutely brilliant experience cant recommend this place enough both me and my wife have used them they are reliable and honest and operate with integrity, if you need any treatment, The Private Practice is definitely the place to go.

I will definitely be planning more treatments. From start to finish Raisah explained the treatment very well and is very knowledgeable and knows exactly what she is doing at no point did I feeling uneasy. Everything was explained properly

Thank you for a great service.

Ps after the 10 treatment course my wife did the final result were absolutely incredible she has found new confident and feel amazing.

Returned to the Private Practice for some treatments and to try their new LED Light machine.
Once again, a wonderful experience.
Both clinicians are very knowledgeable and have excellent training.
The clinic is also beautiful! Will be back again.
Thanks for another wonderful experience.

I had lovely experience at The Private Practice. Nasira is very professional and understanding and she made me feel at ease right away.  The treatment was very relaxing and each step was explained along the way.  I felt the results instantly.
Top up done once again. As always I’m extremely happy with my lips. Thank you Klaudia, you are simply THE BEST 💝

I was very disappointed with both the service and the way my concern was handled. While I understand that the volume in the lips can be affected by a person’s metabolism, the shape is something that should be considered by the esthetician. I had my lips done with Klaudia around 5 p.m., and I was initially happy with both the volume and, especially, the shape. However, by the next morning, the shape was completely gone, as was the volume. I reached out to Klaudia via Instagram to express my concern, making it clear that I wasn’t asking for anything in return, but just wanted to inform her of what had happened. Unfortunately, her response was rude, and she took no responsibility for the situation. I would not recommend this service.

I was really, really nervous, as I haven’t had lip filler before and I didn’t want it to look obvious. Klaudia was patient and put me at ease, and after 0.8ml she has left me with a a very natural and plump look :) thank you! Edit: It has been 6 months now and they are still looking fab and natural!

I have always been an opponent of aesthetic medicine treatments. Thanks to Klaudia, I broke through and performed lip augmentation and chin correction. I heartily recommend it. Master at what she does.
Klaudia was doing my bridal makeup and I was delighted.
I love u, Klaudia! :*
Klaudia is very professional beauty master. She has a very good aesthetic taste and is very accurate. No doubts, i trust her 100% to touch my face and cant wait to do my lips again 😍❤️
Amazing, amazing find! I came over needing to feel more like myself and feminine. She turned my nails into an art piece. I love them! Definitely coming back

I had the most incredible experience at this nail salon! From the moment I walked in, the atmosphere was warm, relaxing, and welcoming. The staff went above and beyond to make me feel comfortable, and their attention to detail was absolutely flawless.
My nails came out perfect, shaped beautifully, polished to perfection, and exactly what I wanted. You can tell Miki truly take pride in her work. Everything was spotless, hygienic, and professional, which made the experience even better.
This is hands down the best service I’ve ever had at a nail salon. If you’re looking for perfection, this is the place to go! ✨

I have been getting my nails done with Miki at Alzibak salon for a few months now and have always left feeling very happy with my nails. I go every 4 weeks, I’ve never had any issues with them, no lifting or chipping. They always offer me a drink on arrival, really happy with their quality and service and I highly recommend.

I had such a wonderful experience at Alzibak Salon! Miki is not only professional but also very skilled at what she does. She always makes sure I feel comfortable and cared for throughout my visit, which makes the whole experience so enjoyable. Highly recommend :)

Miki is amazing! I have been coming to this salon for many months now and every time the service has been really professional 👌 nice atmosphere, kind service and really high quality nails 💅 that really last 💖💫
Very good service
Relaxing

I usually don't write reviews but I want to share my amazing hijama experience. I am a hijama practitioner myself so I have high standards.  From the moment you enter The Hijama Clinic, you're made to feel welcome and trust you're in good hands. The clinic is clean and high quality equipment is used. I have had multiple sessions now at and I found Aneesa has a friendly nature with a medical background as a qualified pharmacist and has a wealth of knowledge about hijama and alternative therapies and holistic healing. You can see her compassion and commitment to her clients, she gives great advice on lifestyle changes and nutrition. Aftercare is important and she provides a variety of high quality snacks and never rushes a client. Aneesa really goes the extra mile and I can feel a big difference after my hijama sessions. Clean, professional and effective, I highly recommend booking in a session with her! 🩷

My mum and I had an amazing experience with the Hijama (cupping therapy) service. From the moment we arrived, we were made to feel comfortable and well cared for. The practitioner was professional, gentle, and explained the whole process clearly, which really helped put us both at ease.

The environment was spotless, calm, and followed excellent hygiene standards. Both of us noticed a big difference afterwards — we felt lighter, more relaxed, and our aches had eased significantly.

We’re truly grateful for such a caring and professional service. Highly recommended for anyone considering Hijama for their health and wellbeing. We’ll definitely be returning!

I had a wonderful experience at this hijama clinic. I was welcomed by the lovely Aneesa, who instantly made me feel comfortable and at ease. She was very gentle and reassuring throughout, taking the time to talk me through each step of the treatment which really helped calm my nerves. Everything was carried out to a very high standard it was clear that she was professional and attentive, with no corners cut. The aftercare provided was excellent too, and when I had a few questions afterwards, Aneesa responded quickly and helpfully. I would highly recommend this clinic to anyone considering hijama. I have had a few seasons with her now and waited to post this review.

Aneesa is a knowledgable and skilled practitioner. Previously, I had an unpleasant hijama experience in terms of discomfort, however with Aneesa I did not feel any pain. Her clinic is clean and well equipped. I have definitely noticed a difference since having hijama. There was a period of time I had experienced muscular pain which did not shift despite my many attempts to alleviate it. I asked Aneesa for a last minute hijama session which had significantly helped with my pain. She responded quickly and took her time throughout the entire treatment. I’ve also had some micro-needling sessions which has made a big difference to my skin texture, to the point people have started to notice and compliment my skin. As a longstanding customer I would highly recommend!

Over the past year, my wife has had Hijama treatments many times and the benefits have been incredible, both physically and mentally. She often tells me how amazing the detox feels, and I can see the positive difference it has made to her overall health and wellbeing.

What makes these sessions stand out is the expertise behind them. As a pharmacist, she has an in-depth understanding of where to place the cups for different concerns and ailments, which makes each treatment feel truly tailored and effective. Every session is carried out with the utmost care — she is attentive, kind, friendly, and never rushes the process.

On several occasions, she has also generously provided us with a free bottle of pure, cold-pressed black seed oil. The quality is exceptional and it has become a valuable addition to our family’s health routine.

Hijama is a non-toxic, non-invasive, and chemical-free treatment that I cannot recommend highly enough. The aftercare is always excellent too, with thoughtful discussions both before and after each session.

We are so grateful for the positive impact these treatments have had — thank you for your amazing work and see you again very soon ! 🤗

Came here on my birthday for lymphatic drainage and infra-red sauna. Wonderful experience. Symon was very attentive professional and knowledgeable. My back injury feels a great deal better and I left feeling light and energised. I will definitely be attending for more treatments.

I feel amazing during and after the  red light sauna. Ending the treatment with a mineral shower. I definitely recommend this centre. Daniel is caring and knowledgeable. He clearly interested in clients health and wellbeing. Been her a few times and will make it part of my health care routine .
I had 6 sessions  and highly recommended  for body and maind oxygen inhalation  . Simon and Daniel are professionals they have knowledge about health are friendly and helpful 😀  , thank  you guys 😊

The centre offers many therapies that are amazing for your health - maintaining it as well as go through a treatment if need be. Daniel and Symon are kind, caring and very professional. With a lot of knowledge, they explain what each therapy does and how it helps your body to heal itself in the best possible way!
I have more energy and better sleep after the hyperbaric treatment, less pain after the cryotherapy and I'm sure lots of good processes are happening in my body after the lymphatic drainage and the sauna.
Keep up the good work, guys!
Thank you for having me!
Looking forward to be back soon!

Excellent place, i have used the oxygen chamber, cryo chamber and the kangen water. I have tried to find a good cryo spot in the Midlands and this is the best! Chris and Simon are great people and very knowledgeable.

Really pleasant experience , the owner makes you feel relaxed from the moment you enter and explains the entire process.

The float tank itself is a surreal experience you basically feel weightless  , I slept like a baby when I got home.

Towel and shower provided to wash off and everything is really clean.

Would recommend and anyone anxious if giving it a go just do it 🙂
Anticipation & excitement to peacefulness, darkness and Total silence. Floating spa is calming, relaxing and takes you from reality to tranquility within the hour. Can't wait to visit again.

First time floating and from the minute I arrived, I felt comfortable, the guy that owns the place is great, took the time to explain the whole process and really knew how to help relax you and make you feel comfortable. Really took time to answer questions and explain the whole process, without making it seem formal and regimental. Left feeling so relaxed and refreshed. Will definitely look at going back in the future at some point.

Welcomed and relaxed from the moment I walked in, I’m not used to taking wellness or relaxing moments but this was made easy to approach. You are really looked after and it’s not just about doing your time slot. I really enjoyed my float and the time flew by. I would recommend.

Great little spa located in the Jewellery quarter. Booked in for a one hour floating session, as was my first time total visit took just over two hours. Once booking done they have a nice relaxation area where you can just lounge around to start to relax all the while gentle background music playing. The lounge consisted of three different lounge areas including a hammock and a chalk board where your can leave your thoughts. The lounge also gives you access to toilet facilities and a " powder room" consisting of two hair dryers, mirror and some cosmetics if needed after the session. The floating experience its self was very relaxing and definitely worth the try.  Will be back to try their tai chi. Note they also have a in house masseuse for those looking for ultimate relaxation.
A lovely firm Swedish massage, very relaxing.  She used a good amount of oil and it included head and feet. Would recommend.
I'm so glad I found this service! I've been having regular massages with the lovely Amani and always leave fully relaxed and refreshed. I recently got my nails done by her too.. so happy!

New up and coming beauty therapist trained to a high level. Based in the Custard Factory. Clean modern salon. Specialises in nails, massage, facial waxing and facials.
I came with my daughter to have her nails done and I'll be back for my shoulder massage next week.

I had a wonderful deep tissue massage that left me feeling so much better than when I walked in! Great communication - confirmation message received plus a reminder shortly beforehand about where to find the business and what to do on arrival. Wonderful scents too, highly recommend.

On the whole I enjoyed the Swedish massage and mini facial. Professional and polite. Room was a bit cold but I was covered with layers to keep me warm when the massage of different areas were happening. The massage was delivered with very good pressure. Certain areas after the massage was then pressed with a hot cloth which felt really good for the muscles.The only point I would mention was that I wasn't very comfortable with the bed when facing towards the floor where the face is positioned.Couldnt adjust in a way where my face skin didnt touch metal. I didn't mention it during the massage. I am sure if I did, something would have been done to make me comfortable.So that was on me. I did get to reception 15mins early but was met bang on time and escorted into another building, mini consult and took some time for massage to start .So it wasn't full time stated for the message which I didn't mind too much as the massage was good and I would definitely recommend going here.
Sabina is an amazing professional. I went here on a friend’s recommendation and was blown away by how good the service was. I got the detox massage and will definitely be going back.

Girl I had Stephanie. it posed to be half an hour service. Which I never had. We went up stair to a room. It had shower, Bath which never been clean. !!! She had to go down stair hand over the cash at the same time. I put my stop watch on to see how long I had. The sooner she step in to the room. First thing she said in her own word ( I need you to Cum quick I in control ). its was mad rush to start. She was a bit tipsy and and speaking loud. Which really  put me off. Only had 20 min for £60 which is not very long. Trying to complain never took any notice.
Girls have upped their game. All hail Romania, traveller families win. Don't wanna spend the cash, don't get no good custom. Bad man ya kno'w

My husband and I had an absolutely wonderful experience at The Mansion Spa in Birmingham. We originally wanted to book a couples Thai massage, but the therapist who offers this was unavailable. However, the receptionist was incredibly helpful and suggested the closest alternative—a sports massage for me and a foot massage for my husband—which turned out to be a fantastic choice.

From the moment we arrived, we were warmly welcomed and made to feel completely at ease. We were both placed in the same spacious room, which had a calming, relaxing ambience with soft lighting—perfect for unwinding together.

The massage itself was exceptional. I had injured my back a few weeks prior, and after reassuring my masseuse that nothing was broken or nerve-related (I’d had an MRI), she focused carefully and expertly on the problem area. It was a full-body massage, and my therapist, Christina, was absolutely amazing—attentive, professional, and very intuitive. She regularly checked that the pressure was comfortable and adjusted it when needed, which made me feel completely cared for.

This was honestly one of the best massage experiences I’ve ever had. My body feels incredible, my pain has noticeably reduced, and my neck and shoulders feel unbelievably light. I would 100% recommend The Mansion Spa and will definitely be returning—10/10 experience!

Absolute heaven! My partner treated us to a one hour full body couples massage. He had Thai with Deborah and I had Deep Tissue with Lana. We feel so light and revived. The best deep tissue massage I have ever had! I will definitely be returning to Lana and wish to bring my Mommabear for Christmas. Really focused on my knots and tightness. My partner loved his also. We need to make this a regular thing!

Myself and Brandon booked a couples deep tissue massage, when we arrived we were greeted by a lady at reception who was extremely professional and friendly also gave us some complimentary bottles of water which was a nice touch.

During the massage we were greeted by Lana & Deborah who was extremely professional and very gentle, understood where we were tense and soon got to work!

The venue was really nice and I absolutely loved the decor (please see pics!) we would highly recommend this massage centre for a place of relaxation and beauty, deffo will be back again!

Massage was incredible! Had a deep tissue massage with Sue which was honestly life changing! Her attention to detail is impeccable and she constantly checked on me throughout the appointment. Would highly recommend to anyone!

Had an aromatherapy massage with Sue and it was great! She was very good about checking in with me to see if the pressure was good and I felt very relaxed both during and afterwards. I'm glad I went for the hour and a half massage instead of the hour long one and I will happily go again soon!

Highly recommend! My skin was in a really bad state with lots of texture, bumps and closed comedones. After just one deep clean facial, I noticed a huge improvement — my skin looked and felt significantly smoother and healthier. I did experience some redness and light bruising afterwards, but this settled within a week. I’ll definitely need a few more sessions, but even after just one treatment, the difference was visibly noticeable!

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ A Life-Changing Experience with Esra

Esra is nothing short of amazing. As an aesthetician, she has completely transformed my skin — something I never thought possible. Her expertise, attention to detail, and personalized approach have made a noticeable difference, not just in how I look, but how I feel.

Thanks to Esra, my confidence has grown tremendously. My skin is healthier, clearer, and more radiant than ever before. Beyond her incredible skills, she has a warm and calming presence that makes every visit feel like a retreat. She genuinely cares and it shows in everything she does.

If you're thinking about starting your skincare journey, look no further — Esra is the best decision you can make.

I had an amazing experience at Ke.skin ! From the moment I walked in, the staff were incredibly warm, professional, and attentive. The clinic is beautifully maintained, clean, and has a calming atmosphere that immediately puts you at ease.

I received treatment for acne/scars and the results were beyond my expectations. The dermatologist( Esra) was very knowledgeable and took the time to explain every step of the process, answering all my questions thoroughly. I appreciated how personalized the treatment plan was, tailored to my specific skin needs.

After just a few sessions, I noticed a significant improvement in my skin's texture, clarity, and overall health. I felt truly cared for and never rushed during any visit.

I highly recommend Ke.skin to anyone looking for professional skincare solutions with real results. I’m so glad I found them!

I’ve been coming to KE Skin Aesthetics for a year now, and the transformation in my skin has been incredible. From the very first appointment, Esra and Zehra have been nothing but supportive, knowledgeable, and genuinely caring. They have guided me through each treatment with a professional yet personal approach, always offering honest and helpful advise tailored to my skin’s needs.

Esra and Zehras expertise and attention to detail have made a huge difference in my confidence and overall skin health.

I hardly ever write reviews but I had to share my experience with you all . I cannot thank Esra enough , she is the best at what  she does. She is professional , knowledgable and can read your skin needs like a book! I always know I am in safe hands with her and getting the best treatment . You only have to look at her, and you know she is the best in the game !!!! Thank you

I have been to Misskin 2x now and both of my experiences have been wonderful. Salma goes out of her way to maximise the tranquil and relaxing treatment of choice. She is also deeply knowledgeable about all products used, and happily will provide insight into your existing skincare routine, suggesting any improvements or products that might be unnecessary for your skin. Can’t recommend Misskin enough 🥰

I’ve visited this place with a friend after work twice now as we work within walking distance in the jewellery quarter. Both women were really kind and attentive and the treatment I got the Deep Cleaning Facial was very relaxing and rejuvenating

It was my first time at Misskin and it was overall such a lovely and calming experience. I had an amazing facial with Salma who was really lovely and so welcoming. Definitely recommend and will be rebooking soon! 🥰
I had an appointment on sunday, absolutely amazing service couldnt reccommend enough, a beautiful clean space and left my skin glowing, would highly reccommend.

I got a relaxing hydrating facial. I really enjoyed the whole facial. My skin felt hydrated and calm afterwards. Aside the facial, I really appreciated the lovely customer service and the thorough explanation during our skin consultation.

Finally the search for a clinic that is using high quality injectables with an expert practitioner has been realised.  I’ve been using Botox for about 18 years and was always happy to have my injections right here in Birmingham, that is until about ten years ago when I began to find myself continually disappointed by the results.  I went from clinic to clinic trying to recapture the results I’d come to expect in years gone by,  but sadly the results continued to disappoint. When I discussed this at my follow up appointment, I was often told things I believed not to be accurate such as “ Botox is less effective as you get older “ or “ it’s because you are over using Botox “,  a simple search on google will tell you that the excuses I was given as to why my treatment was disappointing was not accurate. In the end if I wanted an effective treatment, I would have to travel to Manchester or London, it would appear that Botox still worked outside of the Midlands. The good news is, all this was until I discovered Dermoperfection.  I can’t tell you how happy I was to stumble across this Clinic when I was with a few friends at the Mailbox.  I decided to give it a try and I couldn’t be happier that I did. The results are always great, I am no longer disappointed and I no longer have to travel to Manchester or London to get the high quality results I want.  The practitioner ( Stuart ) is excellent, always puts me at ease and more importantly knows exactly what I need for the perfect result. I couldn’t be more happier.

Got lip filler for the first time and decided to come here based on positive reviews. The staff at reception were very polite and very welcoming :) Amy was absolutely incredible! She took on everything I said regards the results I was looking for and made me feel so comfortable, she is an absolute credit to the team!!!

I regularly have my appointments with Stuart, who is highly professional and consistently delivers excellent results. The clinic staff are friendly, attentive, and welcoming, creating a very positive experience each visit. I am extremely pleased with the outcome and would confidently recommend this clinic.

Personal Rejuvenation with Plinest Poynu .What a difference it has made, I have been having this course of treatments over some weeks, with Stewart and i can honesty say I can see the difference that it has made to my skin, it looks fresher and my lines are much more smoother on my neck and under my chin aawell the difference is a amazing. The confidence it has given me. I am 66years young and ladies are saying how lovely I look and how lovely my make up is. It's all thanks to Stewart for his help and advice and care he is such a professional and with his experience it gives you confidence. The staff are always so friendly and professional. You should go and treat yourself. Go to Dermoperfection Birmingham when you look in the mirror be proud ,and confident .thank you Stewart. Xx 💕

Had a consultation with Aimee. She was very professional and made me feel comfortable to go through my concerns. I was interested in the Co2 laser therapy. She was very thorough and weighed out the procedure with the ideal outcomes and possible risks. She explained this well and was very confident in doing so, which is very reassuring as a customer. I just wanted treatment for a scar on my eye area and she focused on how we would treat this, additionally she went into concise detail that it was a small area and for the same cost she'll also be able to treat the smile lines around my eyes, along with the scar. I thought this was very meticulous, thoughtful and complimentary with what I wanted done. I could see customers being really happy with this so I thought to mention it, but I am very happy that I can just get the scar treated. Exemplary work.

Also, the clinic was very clean and tidy and the girls on the front desk was wonderful too, who I'm sure were the girls who offered the superb helpful communication and customer service via WhatsApp and phone call conversations prior to the appointment (I know that one of the girls who did this was called Charlotte. Thank you Charlotte!). Great first impressions and experience overall. Looking forward to my treatment in the new year.

A coffee and a slice of toast whilst filling out the form would have been nice 😅 again, fantastic work!
Fantastic location, great staff . Left feeling a 100 per cent. These therapists really know what there doing - level of care and professionalism

I love this place! Kay is super kind and genuinely cares about what’s best for her clients over selling procedures. Her ethical background as a counselor was clear when she cost herself a ‘sale’ by giving me clear, straightforward explanations of the risks and benefits of a procedure I was considering. This helped me make an informed decision not to go ahead with it, and I really appreciated her integrity and the time she took to explain things to me.

I did do the platelet treatment for dark under-eye circles and was very happy with the results and how quickly yet carefully Kay handled everything.

I had a PRP vampire microneedling (injections to under eyes to address dark circles). Kay was professional and friendly, and made me feel comfortable. She communicated every step of the process with me and made sure I was ok at each step before she took it.  I’ve booked my second session in 4 weeks. For me, it’s important to trust the person who is giving me a treatment, especially this one as it involves needle injections and taking my blood and I trust Kay to do a clean, professional job.  Her place is super clean which is important to me too.

I recently visited the glam fairies for a microneedling session, and I couldn’t be more pleased with the experience and results. From the moment I walked in, the clinic exuded professionalism and warmth. The staff were incredibly welcoming, knowledgeable, and took the time to explain every step of the procedure in detail, which instantly put me at ease.

Overall, the glam fairies is an excellent choice for microneedling. The combination of expertise, advanced technology, and outstanding customer service makes it a standout in the field of aesthetic treatments. I highly recommend them to anyone considering microneedling or other skincare services.

I was a little nervous as it was my first time getting fillers done however they made me feel very comfortable and talked me through everything. She made my cheeks look exactly how I wanted them. Definitely going back. Very lovely lady and great service!

Friendly professional staff. I am so pleased with my Skin Booster treatments on my eyes and it has greatly improved the puffiness that I had. Would thoroughly recommend this treatment and The Glam Fairies clinic. They gave great advice when I first enquired and every time I have visited or rung them they have been so friendly and helpful.

I booked Jeremy online — he doesn’t work every day, so I made sure to grab a spot while I could. And wow, it was absolutely worth it! He’s incredibly skilled and truly knows what he’s doing. Hands down the best treatment I’ve ever had. I’ve been needing that kind of deep tension relief for a long time, and Jeremy delivered it perfectly. Highly recommend if you’re looking for someone who really understands the body and takes their time to get it right.

Perfect service. I have had neck pain for nearly a year, and the moment has been restricted. After I got my first treatment today with Ted, I can feel it has improved immediately. Recommend to everyone
The doctor is very professional. I went 5 times and my neck and waist are in the right positions. Great Physical therapy experience!
Clinic WeChat: SssmileAlex

Was recommended to get bloods done and found it difficult to find someone. Dr Khan sent me the kit I needed and I got my results within 48 hrs, Straight forward and explained very simply. All my questions answered and advice moving forward. Dr khans knowledge is incredible. Highly recommended.

Really impressed with the service from start to finish. Booking was quick, my blood test results came back within a few days, and the advice I received was clear, professional, and genuinely helpful. Friendly team and a smooth, efficient experience overall — highly recommended!

This guy knows his stuff!
Had my bloods taken Wednesday afternoon, results received Thursday evening!
Absolutely brilliant and looking forward to our next consultation!

Blood test done with TransformNow. Results back really quick, really high standards and professionalism. Dr has explained everything gave advice how to improve things until next blood test so really happy with that. Will be definitely going back. Thank you
Excellent service. Full bloods completed and follow consultation to walk through the results. Feel much better knowing which way to maintain good health

Received an absolutely amazing head massage from Isvaara Ltd! They took the time to understand my situation and specific concerns, then developed a bespoke oil blend for me to use during the massage. The pressure was great, they tailor the session so it's great for those that like more gentle massages or for those that prefer a really strong level of pressure. They offer both. I loved it and have already recommended it to others. Would love to go back. They also managed to fit me in last minute which was much appreciated! Definitely try this place out!

I visited Isvaara recently as i had many concerns regarding my skin.  I was looking for a facial massage.  I wasn’t sure which facial massage to book. I got in touch and I was advised to fill in a form to determine which facial would be best suited to my skin. I went for the glow facial, which was amazing, relaxing and i really felt the difference, my skin felt amazing and even got complimented on my skin the next day. The communication start to finish was consistent, didn’t have to wait long for replies and most importantly it was so helpful (i had a lot of questions) about products/my skin/ingredients. Although i booked a glow facial, after reviewing my skin i was advised what i should get in the future and i really felt a sense of care and honesty. You were extremely informative and i would defiantly recommend Isvaara, i will be visiting again. Thank you for your time and answering all my questions.

I went for a 60 minute facial at Isvaara and it was so good. Loved the massage that the facial started off with. My facialist was also very attentive. They asked me all the relevant questions before the facial and it was tailored to my skin concerns and they also informed me of appropriate after care. I can see the effects of the facial now and my skin is glowing. An overall enjoyable experience, specially with the price point and I would definitely recommend it as well as go again myself too 💯.
A lovely face massage at Ivsaara, relaxing and effective. Attentive to my needs and tailored for my skin concerns. Will definitely visit again!
