I had a wonderful Indian head massage at Isvaara Ltd. The experience was incredibly relaxing and helped release a lot of built-up tension. The therapist was professional, attentive, and created a calm, soothing atmosphere. They were also very accommodating when it came to scheduling my appointment, which made the whole experience even more stress-free. I really appreciated the thoughtful aftercare tips provided, it showed a genuine commitment to well-being beyond just the session. I left feeling refreshed and re-energized - highly recommend!

I was looking to grow my nails after years of biting them. I was recommended to go and see Penny and she has transformed my nails! It’s early days but I can’t begin to tell you how great they look! I would highly recommend!

It’s not always easy to find a place where you feel comfortable as a man getting beauty treatments, but here this is absolutely possible.
I booked an eyebrow waxing session and couldn’t be happier with the result: clean, symmetrical lines that gave my face a nice look.
Penny’s technique was precise and gentle.
The pricing is extremely competitive for Birmingham.
I’ll definitely be coming back. Highly recommended.

Just had my lashes done by House Of Omorfia, staff are very welcoming and lovely and made me feel at ease. Absolutely love my lashes, natural, soft, wispy and very light weight 😍 would definitely recommend 👌

I have been looking for a new nail tech in Birmingham and I came across Penny. She is absolutely amazing and just what I was looking for. She is super friendly and tailors/consults with you about what is best for your nails. She takes really good care of the cuticles and nail care itself before continuing with excellent gel or acrylic ! She is really knowledgeable and will be staying with her for the foreseeable :)

I hardly get my nails done. However, I found House of Omorfia by serendipity on a last minute hunt for a nails place hours before a long holiday trip. Penny accommodated my late afternoon request and I'm glad that she did! She made me feel so welcome and it felt like I'd been a client since forever. Her friendliness and professionalism made me comfortable and confident that I was in safe hands. She took her time with my cuticles and nails; TBH my nails have never experienced such care and attention from my nails person before. She advised services according to my needs and prioritised that above profit even.

I got BIAB nails done, they lasted well and of course I went back to Penny to get new ones, and will most likely continue to go back to House of Omorfia from now on. 10/10 Recommend 💯

I had shoulder and neck pain for weeks, and this deep tissue massage was amazing. The therapist was excellent and really focused on the pain areas. I felt immediate relief. Highly recommended!
Thank you so much for this service.

Amazing service always on time and so knowledgeable especially in Lympho massages. You get your full time and very good quality oils to suit all skin. The massage bed is so comfortable. I have fallen to sleep so many times as I am that relaxed. Such good value for money.

As a fitness instructor, I get massages regularly. When my usual therapist wasn’t available, I came across Kav and was able to book a same-day appointment. Kav was highly professional. he asked about any injuries, allergies to oils, and whether I preferred more or less pressure. He clearly knows what he's doing. One thing I especially appreciated was his attention to hygiene: he used disposable tissue sheets and a fresh, clean sheet for the session.

The best massage I’ve ever had!
I’ve had deep tissue massages for years – but Kav was on another level. From start to finish, he was incredibly thorough and attentive – taking his time to work through every tight spot and old injury. He came to my home with his mobile service, and I started the session feeling completely tense from training and old injuries – by the end I felt lighter, looser, and fully recharged. He even left me with tailored aftercare – including pictures and diagrams of stretches – so I can keep improving between sessions. His knowledge, technique, and genuine care made all the difference. I’ll definitely be booking in regularly – thank you, Kav, for such an amazing experience!

Not only was this one of the best massages I’ve EVER had but it was extremely thorough and filled with information about aftercare. I booked a massage to help with my lower back pain and I now feel the best I’ve felt in ages.

He came over while I was holding my back in agony and he left with me able to stretch like the pain never existed a few hours ago. I’m able to jump around instantly.

Wonderful conversationalist and beautifully calming and friendly energy.

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

I’m SURE I will be a returning customer

Excellent experience all round. Was my first time coming to a place like this but Anna made me feel very at ease the whole time. Bear in mind the spa itself is located in a little courtyard behind where the maps apps etc. may take you! I had a deep tissue massage (60 mins) and will definitely be coming back.

- Gilbert

Booked an hour session for Swedish massage through their website,  overall it was an amazing experience, my therapist Kay was very professional, and her technique was excellent! I will definitely come back thanks.
- Karm

Just finished my massage here, it was exactly what I needed. Professional service, clean space and my muscles feel much better afterward.
Thanks ☺️

Absolutely Amazing Experience!

Just had a massage with Anna- and wow! She's incredibly talented, super friendly, and made me feel totally at ease. Her massage skills are next level - I felt all my stress melt away.

Highly recommend visiting - you won't be disappointed.

It was my 1st experience here for deep tissue massage. Place was tidy and warm enough. My therapist Anna was skillful, knew how to maintain optimal pressure on different areas and made me feel comfortable throughout. Highly recommended her. Will revisit soon.

Professional Service from the Girl at Aston Hijama Aesthetics, Very nice and clean Space in Jewellery Quarter, Very informative and Gave me the best Body Massage and Body scrub! Recommend to EVERYONE!
Amazing Massage and Professional Team at AHC, I feel so good after my Body massage, girlies get your mani/pedicures too!

Here is the type of language you get from the owner of this business. Disgusting.

Prospective customers should no entertain this kind of profanity, particularly where the business owner is utilising islamic practices to upsell their business sevices.

Pleasant staff and professional service, delightful owner who greeted me well on arrival and i was seen too in a timely manner and was given privacy.. couldn’t have asked for anything more… clean and friendly environment. Shall revisit again for sure.
Best facial in Birmingham, highly recommend to others. The service was phenomenal will definitely be back again.

Terrific staff and products. Always so many free samples to try out and mini Facials to keep you going back for the perfect products.
Well done Elizabeth and team your stuck with me for life!!
Love this brand. A bit more expensive, but worth it. Go John Lewis.
Great products and friendly knowledgeable staff, will be back!! Xx
Good shop , nice staff
Lovely selection of skincare products.
Good coffee
Great experience as always, the staff are fabulous girls and always make you feel very welcome at all times.
Only place I use. Staff are friendly, beds are great. Always great deals running
Some of the staff have attitude issues and problems so I stopped going to the shop in Duke Street an went to hot,the staff are far more friendly
Beds are always spot on and the place is always really clean also they always have great offers on
Such friendly staff, great deals for packages, very clean too
This place look terrible. Staff are nice and helpful but as soon you enter you feel uncomfortable and you want to get out as quick as possible

Boots Sauchiehall Street is a good branch. However, they don't have everything, you may need to go to a bigger branch like boots in the buchanan gallery. In general, the staff in this branch are very friendly and kind.

The old man security it's been awful made me really uncomfortable he stood literally five steps distance , looking me right in the eyes freaked me out, looked at him said you okay?  Didn't sey anything just kept staring at me I've asked one of the staff to get me the manager after she showed up told her what happened she never took me serious very disappointing this is, after 8 months depression trying hard to socialise and build up connections with people after I lost it.
I didn’t even buy anything, but staff very nice and seemed super friendly. Asked if they did Huda beauty and they told me to try Buchanan/Enoch. Found it :)

Today I had a very bad episode of a recurring medical issue, and after trying to walk it off, I found myself in front of Boots and realised I could go and speak to a pharmacist and get prescribed medication I didn't have with me to help.

Nnaemeka (my apologies if I have got that wrong!) took immediate action, getting on the phone to my GP practice and dispensing the medication I needed. He was kind and empathetic and I am so, so grateful for his help as I weaved back and forth, breathless and scared, probably looking quite a sight. These actions helped me get the episode under control, and get home, instead of having to head to the hospital, or potentially worse. Thank you!!!

Donna is an amazing therapist, so knowledgeable and professional. I noticed a massive different in my face after my lymphatic facial. I also had a beautiful salt scrub after my massage and my skin felt amazing. I would definitely recommend 🩷

Excellent experience and will 1000% be back. I booked the spa day for my sister, aunt, mum and I to help boost moral after my mums cancer diagnosis. Gemma and her team were so loving, gracious and professional especially when advising they would be unable to perform certain treatments on my mum because of her diagnosis.  They treated her so kindly and made her feel safe and really looked after her! Gemma especially went out of her way to ensure, that despite the lack of treatments available for my mum, that she was looked after and made to feel relaxed and pampered. Gemma and her team were fantastic and are an asset to the company! Thank you so much for your kindness and hospitality - it meant a lot to my mum but also my family and I knowing there are still good people in the world. Thank you xx
Sasha & Janine were so lovely and welcoming. Made us feel at ease and we really enjoyed both of our treatments. Hopefully be back again soon! Thanks again

I went for a luxury pedicure & a 30 min soothing aromatherapy. We were welcomed by your friendly staff &   talked through the process as I booked 2 treatments. Both treatments were absolutely amazing. Very relaxing & your team (Sasha & Janine, who looked after my daughter) really made the experience. Definitely will be back. Thank you :)

This was my first treatment at Spa in the City and I booked a hot stones massage. Janine was brilliant and let me know how she would do the massage. I felt so relaxed afterwards. Everyone who I interacted with at Spa in the City were so lovely, I’ll definitely book in again

From the moment you walk in and are greeted by the lovely Victoria, the experience continues to be first rate at Esteem Beauty and I've had a really positive experience. Kasia is a brilliant artist and I am so incredibly happy with my eyebrows (microblading) - they look so natural but I look well groomed!
Definitely will be coming back for other lovely services like facials etc soon.

I booked my mum in for a treatment for deep rooted blackheads… and OMG.. my mum’s skin is glowing. Not a blemish on her face! Kasia treated my mum with the most love and care… she is truly wonderful and an expert in her field of work. I would highly recommend esteem beauty Glasgow. And a shout out to Victoria who helped us through all the ups and downs of booking and payment. Thank you so much ladies from the bottom of our hearts ❤️❤️

Excellent as always. Kasia explained the procedure in full detail so I knew what to expect and kept checking that I was comfortable at every stage.  The clinic itself is warm and welcoming and hyper hygienic. Kasia is highly experienced and knowledgeable and I knew I was in very skilled and safe hands.

I thoroughly recommend Esteem Beauty. Kasia is hugely knowledgeable and experienced in skincare, and really looks after you. I was very impressed with her professionalism and skill during a recent pigmentation treatment.

I thoroughly recommend Esteem beauty so pleased with my brows
I was nervous never had microblading before Kasia made my feel totally at ease  she was lovely thank you so much.

Went there having forgot a medication before a holiday and 20 mins before my train. Rory was super helpful, went out of his way to help me out. I got my pills in time for my holiday and left within good time for my  holiday. Thank you Rory!

I went on Tuesday the 18th of November and a lovely beautiful girl approached me at the Chanel counter, she supported me through the entire process of helping me find the best makeup fit for me and trust me with the makeup she applied on me, I’ve never felt better in my skin. She made the entire process beautiful from A to Z. At the end of my experience I asked her for her name and it was Xena. Beautiful girl. Will be back again for her.
Anne at the Clinique counter is wonderful! Full of knowledge, compassion and advice. Thank you so much for your all your help. Absolute asset to Clinique ❤️

This is the first time I’ve written a negative review. I’ve had several disappointing experiences with the staff in the beauty section, and my most recent one was in the perfume section. I approached one lady for help, and she said she wasn’t responsible for perfumes—but minutes later, I saw her assisting another customer there. Two other staff ignored me even after I made eye contact, and the one who finally helped did so reluctantly, looking unhappy about it.
This made me wonder whether this behaviour was general poor service or discrimination because of my hijab. It’s very different from what I usually experience in stores like John Lewis, where staff are consistently polite and welcoming.
I didn’t note the names of the Boots staff because I’ve decided not to return. I prefer places where staff are more approachable, and genuinely willing to help.

I was in store looking for some makeup products for my wedding and Lauren helped me to pick the right products and gave me a full face makeup. She also advised to pop in for some makeup lessons they do. She was absolutely amazing❤️❤️

absurd! i went in with my friend as a normal does and this woman/worker kept following us because i accidentally picked up a too faced concealer and walked about the shop with it innocently! i completely forgot it was in my hand, and i placed it down while i was picking up another thing and forgot about it. i continued walking and the woman came up to me and ask where i placed it. as in she thought i was stealing in! she was rude and cheeky in the tone, i lead her to the place where i placed the too faced concealer down and she went silent as in her theory was wrong about me stealing it. she then told me i must pay for it!? i was shocked but i didn't shout back or cause a scene' i went and payed for it and then i walked back with my friend while she was still shopping. she then kept following behind us and then we left. im so upset and embarrassed!

I went in to look at primers for my skin as well as skin care and Sadhbh was extremely helpful and spent so much time with me to make sure I got what I needed. She is extremely knowledgeable with skincare and did not make me feel like I was wasting my time. She is an absolute credit to your shop and if I ever need anything again I will 100% be coming back to ask for her advice. Excellent customer service.

Nicole at the Mac booth was an absolute star! I have never gotten this good of a shade match before. It is evident that she truly loves what she does. She was incredibly knowledgeable, helpful and upliftingly warm the entire time. Honestly one of the best retail experiences I’ve had in a while - highly recommend seeing her!

The store is well stocked. However dont expect any help from the beauty girls they are only passing their time. No one helps and when they do it's with a grudge. Come to work and stand around and get paid for turning up lmao seems to be the new normal. If you want good beauty advice go H Beauty in Silverburn or Boots Silverburn they are more professional there.

Was served by a lovely cheery lad named Callum, he was so helpful and friendly.
Very clean and tidy store and lovely to see and hear all the staff cheery in Christmas spirit,

Been to this Superdrug a few times now and every-time I have visited I have been followed around the shop by the same employee. She is usually in the makeup isle and has no shame to stare and make me feel uncomfortable. As I was shopping I could see her watching me at the bottom of the isles. She consistently radios through on the headset and asks every other employee to “Keep an eye” on me. This is totally unfair. Not only to mention that all the other staff are so unhelpful and rude. Very minimal customer care. Do not go here unless you’re willing to feel uncomfortable the whole time you shop.

Fairly large superdrug with most of the things you could expect out of a health/beauty store. Staff seemed friendly, building was clean with no visible issues. Option to use self-service checkout is a bonus.
Hires specky "people" from Easterhouse which really lowers the qaulity of the superdrug experience. 1 star is being generous would give 0 if I could.

Very large store, with one WHOLE WALL dedicated to make up alone..
A beauty treatment section at the back.
Medicine and health care section.
Fast till service despite the queues.

They don't even deserve the one star i'm giving them.
1. the shop is never stocked and its impossible to shop because the workers just start restocking while you’re looking at products and get in your way, keep in mind this is a store thats almost always busy.
2. workers are very rude and make you feel like an inconvenience, if you ask them where anything is or if they have an item in stock they either ignore you or just tell you to check.
3. the workers do ANYTHING but their job - for example i was at the shop today and the cashier was on call with someone and kept ignoring me when i told her i had a health and beauty card! she also ignored me when i greeted her as i walked up to the counter and when i asked for a bag she just looked in the direction of the bags in the self checkout area and and turned around (gave me her back) to continue talking on the phone.
4. This is the closest superdrug to my house so i have been there a lot but there were a couple times where the security and workers would chase me around the whole place while im shopping and obnoxiously talk to eachother about “keeping an eye” on me. they do this to almost every customer that walks in, and i’ve noticed it’s even worse if that customer is a person of color, i’ve overheard the workers and security say many inappropriate and unacceptable things.
5. this happened today as well- i spent over £250 on products and the security guard kept following me up until i left the door.

8th January 2026, 8pm.
While at the checkout, I did not understand a promotion that was being applied, so I politely asked a female staff member for assistance. Unfortunately, I did not note her name, but she was of short stature and had dark hair.

When I politely asked her to come over to help me, she rolled her eyes and approached me in a visibly irritated manner. I calmly asked her to remain calm, as nothing serious was happening. At that point, she attempted to raise her voice; I immediately stopped the conversation from escalating further. However, her dismissive and tense attitude made it increasingly difficult for me to understand her explanation, which caused unnecessary confusion and tension.

Eventually, I understood the promotion, thanked her politely for her time, and the interaction ended. She then walked away still visibly annoyed, leaving me with a strange and uncomfortable feeling after what should have been a simple customer service interaction.

I strongly believe that customers should not be treated in this manner. Eye-rolling, visible irritation, and an abrupt attitude are unprofessional and inappropriate

Supposedly open from 7am. It's now 9am, staff are inside, the shop is closed - I understand things happen but the lack of information and communication is frustrating, a simple note on the door would be enough.

Central Station Glasgow. Every time you go in here you stand and wait at the pharmacy counter for someone to serve you!! Poor customer service. Again today standing waiting, 2 members of staff were filling shelves and chatting. One lady walked straight past me after placing some products out. I had to ask her to serve me!! This is poor customer service. You should not need to ask if a customer is waiting they should stop what they are doing to serve them instead of leaving them standing like an idiot waiting!!! This happens all the time. Sort it out

Went on Monday night after phoning NHS 24 and being advised to go to get antibiotics. Had already walked to Park head pharmacy and then had to walk to central station to be told I cannot get antibiotics for a UTI. Finally got them this morning from doctor. Not impressed walked for 2 hours and was ill and in pain when going to the loo. Terrible service no one even acknowledged me stood for 10 minutes before even being said hello to as they probs don't want the hassle at 9.30 at night....don't work in a chemist then. Not even I am sorry I cannot just matter of fact and rude. I work and pay tax and it's no wonder I have a private health care as this is what we are dealing with.
Both me and my wife had our winter flu jab here, it went well, staff was kind, provided guidance and asked the required questions. It was a great experience.

I’ve been a client for 10 years.
This is a long established , great family run business in a cool part of town.
Super friendly and Zeeshan always gives me a great hair cut at a time that suits me.
I highly recommend Miu 😎

I’ve been a client of miu hair since October 2024. I was looking for a salon that can handle asian hair. I’ve read the review and saw the first recommendation here.

I’ve been a regular customer every 1-2 months now and Miu always gave me the best haircut. He understands what works best for me. He always listens and suggests what’s the best for me and I always trust his “Magic”.

If you’re asian and looking for a haircut this is def the place for you. Miu is very nice and I know sometimes the hustle being introverted person but don’t worry you’ll be treated as a friend in here. As a customer my experience here has been a 10/10.

I will be coming back again and I’d def recommend  this place to everyone looking for a fresh haircut! :)

Dana was absolutely amazing, she transformed this old lady to a beautiful lady, make up and hair up, not only that her beautiful personality somehow shone with me, I’m from Aberdeen and we were down to Glasgow for a wedding, I was a bit nervous? No need, this beautiful lady made me feel so lovely 🥰

After moving to the area I have been going to this award winning barber for 6 plus years.

Always great customer service with a smile and chat. He always takes time to advise and discuss requirements.

The salon is family owned and operated with mens barber and ladies stylists.

My wife and 3 grown up daughters also regularly visit the salon.
All very competitively priced.
Got a men’s perm done yesterday and all staff were excellent and the outcome was brilliant. Will be back!

First time here (I got a voucher as a gift) but it won’t be my last. Booking process was really smooth. Friendly welcome and nice spa. The treatment was lovely, one of the best back massages I’ve had in a while and I go to a lot of spas. Chelsea was brilliant, so professional, she certainly knew what she was doing, but very friendly too, I felt very relaxed. It’s been a very difficult few months and this was exactly what I needed. I’d throughly recommend. Unpretentious, relaxed and very talented therapists.
Was looked after so well today (even helped me past barrier)Massage was perfect and surroundings really good too.Definitely recommend.Julie done a grand job back feels great

Popped in today to get a full body deep tissue massage and it did not disappoint! Staff were lovely and very accommodating. Elsa and polly were phenomenal and made us feel so comfortable. Left the place feeling amazing after
This is such a lovely place to go for treatments. The therapists are without exception all so friendly knowledgeable and professional. I cannot recommend Ocho enough x

What an experience! I went for the Yummy Mummy package at 35 weeks pregnant, and I have never experienced anything like it before. The most relaxed massage ever. I would highly recommend. A massive thanks to Aimee for making it the most comfortable experience, she made me feel at ease straight away(felt nervous at first as I was in a new place with strangers etc) however it was the most chilled 2 hours ever. Lovely atmosphere as soon as you step in the door, and all the staff I spoke to were so lovely! Definitely coming back after baby is born, would like to try some of the different treatments 😍

First time in about face today for electrolysis treatment. Was very nervous before arriving as this was a new treatment for me. Staff were so helpful and super friendly. Made me feel so at ease. The explanation of what was going to happen through electrolysis was fantastic. And the treatment itself was made so comfortable. Staff amazing and treatment great. Thanks so much! Highly recommend About Face!

I have used About Face for years.  The beauty parlours are in pristine condition, they offer a 5 star, luxurious service, the treatments are highly effective and you leave feeling like a million bucks.  I highly recommend this extremely professional, multi treatment clinic who also exclusive aftercare products from Sothy's.  I am currently doing the CACI facials which have left me looking and feeling better and more vibrant.  The staff are very compassionate and their personal approach is half the reason I enjoy my treatments there as they make you feel seen and I truly appreciate them.  About Face is the only beauty clinic I would recommend.

The girls are nice enough but the reasonings as to why I won’t be back are as follows-
Inconsistent service- first time I went for consultation girl done both armpits as I have a bunch of stragglers
and fine hairs from laser/waxing. Noticed in the shower that only the noticeable black hairs were gone so I wouldn’t say job finished as she put it. She also underestimated how long it would take for the next appointment as it took the next girl the full hour to do both armpits and she used more pulses or currents and even then she still said there were some fine hairs.
The set up is also horrible, not at all friendly for those getting electrolysis in areas which would take longer to cover. Feel like the bed should be in the middle of the room as I did notice it does have wheels.
For the type of service this is- not a necessity and luxurious- I would expect better service.

I was recommended About Face for there professionalism. I went for a full body massage and spoke to the woman who looked after me, everything we spoke about was attended too i.e problem areas and future advise. I would recommend and will return for more treatment.

Fantastic, welcoming Team. About Face were recommended to me by another clinic! That says it all!! Would thoroughly recommend About Face for all treatments. The staff are so friendly and put you at ease. I love their professionalism and their chat! I see such a huge difference from the electrolysis I’ve been having. 5 star establishment!

Poped in to MCR on Saturday to get my hair done for my best friends wedding. And was introduced to Marie. She was a lovely woman very polite and friendly. She listened to what I was looking for a I think she done a great job. I'll definitely be back. 10/10 from me.
Loved the experience, got my hair colored and a haircut. Got exactly what I wanted

sophie knows what she’s doing when it comes to styling hair and colouring, but not with haircuts. very friendly, and excellent customer service. but once i went home, i began to notice some problems with the cut of my hair. curtain bangs and all throughout my hair was obviously uneven, and dead ends were left. I had communicated clearly what i wanted. had to go to another salon to have it fixed

Love this Salon. Really accommodating. They put up with my many requests to work miracles and always get me fitted in. Staff with great experience who don't mind getting stuck in. I miss Keri the stylist from the shop but I'm sure she's doing great elsewhere.  Marie and Sophie, along with Jodie have made sure it's still the best Salon in the Southside xx

Got my hair done by Sophie after being linked through Instagram. Loves the cut and her vibe. It’s hard sometimes to find someone in Glasgow who’s into not super glam but trend led contemporary style like you would get in bigger cities so it’s nice to have options of a certain atheistic :)

I came in today (tue 2nd April 9am). The lady who served me was brilliant. I usually use another sunbed shop that’s slightly closer but they don’t open until later. She talked me through everything and was so friendly and lovely. Love the shop. Really clean and lovely vibe. Might have to switch over to this shop instead!

It was my first time using a bed and the girl at the desk (I didn't catch her name but i was in on saturday at 13:30) was super helpful. Despite me not knowing how to work the bed, she helped me out. I didn't feel like I was being judged or looked down on. I will definitely be back.

Hot tanning salon in maryhill is a disgrace, the beds are never clean when i go in. The other day the floor was oily and the bed so i cleaned it and told her nicely after i left that although i had cleaned the bed for myself before and after i used it, the floor was still oily and needed doing only to be met with a disgusting look because i had interrupted her gossiping with someone else at the till. Tonight ive turned up at quartet past 7 because its not supposed to shut till 8 and the door was locked and she was sweeping up (someone trying to skive off early i think) wont be using this shop AGAIN! ill drive to the next one down the road where the doors are open to 8. Bunch of children running the place who cant even be wrsed to be there.
Great vibe when I walked in girl on front desk was great explained my options good customer relations.
Staff are very helpful nice clean shop
It's always a pleasure getting my nails done at Swoon. The lassies are super friendly, have a wealth of knowledge, great ideas for design & colour combos. Hunners of good chat too. X

I loved getting my nails done after so long without them. Holly was very friendly and professional. She took the time to help me choose colours and a design that I absolutely love! I love coming to Swoon Nails and I can’t wait to come back soon. X

Have wanted my nails done at Swoon for so long and was treated for my birthday.  I am so pleased with the result! They are an original, one-of-a-kind design and I love them!
Sarah-Louise was so good at talking me through options and helping me chose what to get done.  Will definitely be back!

All of the swoonie girls have sorted out my nails on a regular basis - and each of them are absolutely incredible at what they do. Lianne is the OG: super talented, creative, patient, skilled and absolutely top banter. Holly is a total legend - her chat is out of this world and her energy is just amazing, it’s impossible to feel anything but happy when you’ve Holly opposite you! She’s phenomenal at doing nails too which is a major bonus! I love my swoon days - the atmosphere in the swoon room is the best ever and you always come away feeling, and looking, fabulous.

Getting Swooned is one of the best nail experiences in the city. Lia+Holly are so welcoming, knowledgeable, super creative, working their magic with any brief. And I love the quality (usually get 4-5 weeks out of my nails).  Can’t wait to get back!

I am not impressed.  I had a massage booked for 14.26 on Monday 6 Oct. I was sent a reminder and asked to confirm which I did. The salon was closed. A huge negative from me. ☹️
Alessandro was running late and with a client o couldn't answer door or phone. Salon closed on a Monday. She phoned me and rescheduled. Massage was excellent.

I booked in with Andi for LVL and brown lamination, through a friends recommendation!

I’ve never had either done before and I am so happy with the results! Andi was amazing, great communication, made me feel comfortable and explained the aftercare to me in detail.

Would definitely recommend and I’ll be a regular!

Bold is the absolute best salon I've been to. I can be nervous at getting beauty treatments, and the team make you feel so at ease here. The service is always excellent, the products they use are high quality and the salon is impeccably clean. I've been going to Bold every month since they opened and I wouldn't go anywhere else.
Such a lovely place! Great location, very welcoming throughout. I really enjoyed the full body massage and the atmosphere. I would definitely recommend and will be coming back.

Just had my first ever wax with Ashley, Ashley was extremely professional and made me feel soo at ease. Ashley was really friendly and spoke throughout my session which eased my anxieties. I will continue to book every 4 weeks with her! Highly recommend.
Had a great facial, took years off my face and was so relaxing. Will definitely be back again.
Very nice team! I visited this place for the second time, and once again I left satisfied. Long-lasting nails, done quickly and aesthetically. I will definitely come back.

Best beauty salon that I ever been to. Had a Brazilian wax, felt really comfortable throughout the whole appointment, that when about fast and smoothly. The place is also really clean and looks professional. Highly recommended, would certainly be back! Thank you so much again
I had such a lovely relaxing time while i was here. I highly recommend her hand arm and delux facial it was heavenly.
Louise is fab! Felt so comfortable and at ease, she put all of my nerves to rest and explained everything thoroughly x
Nice relaxing head massage ✨ and the woman was so lovely!
Fab salon, great service. Always get the eye package.

Lovely lady, excellent massage, very firm. Would definitely go back. Got my eyebrows waxed as well as eyelashes and brows tinted after the massage too. Happy to recommend this salon and would definitely return again in the future, myself.

Had my nails done with a groupon deal.  My nails were not filed to the same length, my cuticles were not done and after my nails were filed they were ragged.  The shellac was put on on top of nails that had not been wiped of them having been filed.  I have had to re-do my nails and they are already coming off.  Not a pleasant experience and I would not recommend this place for shellac.
Tina is amazing, wouldn't go anywhere else over 5 years I've been going here 5* service every time, keep up the good work 😘
Tina very good at her job a nice homely environment
Tina is the brow queen! 🙌
1st Class experience with Megan at the Beauty Bar !

Laura keeps you relaxed and is very professional i was quite nervous about my first session of electrolysis but the 45 min app flew in, and im looking forward to my next 1 ! Highly recommend! Treatment room was also spotless and Laura went through the treatment before hand (consultation) explained everything in detail before we agreed on the plan going forward. :)

I had an amazing Floating Facial  treatment with Laura and my skin feels the best it's been for quite some time. Laura and Sandra,the therapists at Natural Beauty, are fantastic. Professional, friendly and they put you at ease immediately. I wouldn't go anywhere else for my treatments and I can highly recommend Natural Beauty.

I had two treatments with Laura today. I thought she was really knowledgeable, explained everything to me and immediately put me at ease. Overall a very professional salon and I will definitely be going back. So pleased to have found this place.

Amazing treatments. Loving my manicure, mini eye lash lift. Feel fabulous. I’ve been going to Laura for over 20 years and wouldn’t go to any other beauticians. Laura and Sandra are excellent. The salon is immaculate and the products are all fabulous.

I had my first consultation with Sandra today for a hair electrolysis appointment, and it was brilliant. She clearly explained the procedure and did a patch test to see how my skin would react. Throughout the process, I felt completely at ease—especially impressive considering how daunting it can seem from the outside. Sandra is incredibly professional, and I’m really looking forward to my first full session!

Eroma highlighted my hair but i had some issues, I went back to her and told her what i didn't like.She is so sweet and understanding. She said no problem and fixed my hair. I really appreciate that she did my hair again without any complaints and she made sure I left with a smile on my face. I'm definitely going back to her for other services.

I went to this place for first time just to get my eyebrows done, the lady own this place was super nice that made me choose this place for my haircut as well. I honestly had the best experience. Everything is 10/10 let from customer service to cleaning everything. And the owner is super experienced and her works literally speaks for itself. And the attitude of the owner is super humble and nice literally it’s cherry on the top. I just love love love my haircut I have never been this satisfied with my haircut.

Had a great experience at Eroma Hair and Beauty today! Both my daughter and I got fantastic haircuts. Shamim was absolutely lovely—so friendly and welcoming, and she did an amazing job. We felt really comfortable and well taken care of. Definitely planning to come back regularly and try out some of their other services too!

Lovely and welcoming. A great massage and facial treatment. Very relaxing. I have rebooked :). I would definitely recommend.
Babs

Got my hair colour and hair cut absolutely an amazing experience the owner been so gentle and professional was very mindful for what she's doing
I have tinitus and get panic when someone washes my hair she treated  me so nicely and understood my condition cant get good experience enough more than this place
Love my hair cut and the deired hair colour
Thanks Eroma Beauty xx

Booked last minute while visiting Glasgow, I booked my daughter for her first brow wax and myself for a tint and wax. Jude was amazing, giving us loads of advice and helped create the perfect shape for us both. She also perfectly colour matched our brows with the Benefit products, so happy we popped by. Thank you Jude for all the advice and making us both feel at home.

Jude is an absolute expert and superstar. She has fixed my patchy brows and given me the most amazing, natural lamination! She is also a wonderful person. Thank you SO MUCH. And I will see you for a tidy up in a few weeks. 5 star plus 🥰

First time using benefit brow bar  for my eye brow wax and I’ll definitely be back. They took the time to explain everything they were doing and made sure I was happy every step of it. The wax was gentle too which I was slight nervous for but was made to feel at ease. Greg job of my eyebrows too!

Had my treatment done by Jude an exceptionally lovely lady will be definitely going back to see her ❤️ it felt like more a just my eyebrows beautiful lady xx can't seem to get my new review on so I'll just add to this 1. Myself and my sister both had our eyebrows done by Jude we would so recommend this lady she's very knowledgeable about her job. Also she's such a LOVELY ❤️ LADY 💖

Had the most amazing service from Jude she made me feel so comfortable in that chair I highly recommend she is the loveliest member of staff and she even went out her way to colour match my foundation. Will definitely go back to her again next time!! Thank you Jude for my amazing eyebrows!! Keep up the amazing work and customer service.

I have just finished 6 sessions of acupuncture for shingles nerve pain. Sessions 1 and 2 included fire cupping, session 3 included heat lamp therapy. It transpires that any form of heat is detrimental to this condition. On my final session they were about to give me electro therapy and i had to remind them that i had an ICD and that this could potentially kill me.I was also sold 2 lots of herbal medicines at a total extra cost of £88 that made me very sick. At the end of all this the pain is still there and I believe that it is worse now than when I started.

My mother and myself have been to Dr Lisa on and off for over 5 years for help with extreme mental, physical and emotional issues which was helped dramatically by Dr Lisa and herbs. She is amazing in her field of work and really knows and cares for her clients. Her knowledge and intuition of the clients mind and body is exceptional and she is a true healer. I don't believe I would have made the progress in my life without her and now my mother is back for acupuncture for excruciating hip, thigh and knee pain which is already improving immensely and she had her first full night sleep last night after only 2 sessions with Dr Lisa. I cannot recommend her and all the beautiful people who work there enough, they really help you on your road to healing.

Ming Chen clinic has helped me enormously, I went to them due to lots of sleep and hormonal issues and they have helped me take back control of my body and life. The staff are always so pleasant and kind, and the environment is very relaxing. I really cannot recommend them enough, especially if you are new to acupuncture and feel anxious, they will absolutely put you at ease. The clinic is also easy to find and the staff are very flexible with appointments and definitely have a customer first attitude. Thank you so much for everything you have done for me :)

I first attended the clinic around August/September 2022 for fertility acupuncture.  I was referred for IVF by my own GP, and was waiting for my appointment but was willing to try anything at this point.   I have had acupuncture elsewhere for pain relief and so looked into acupuncture for fertility and this is when I came across Ming Chen clinic. I managed to get an appointment fairly quickly and was booked in to see Dr. Wong.

She took a detailed note of my history and what my reason for attending was.   I had weekly sessions of acupuncture along with herbal tea daily and I fell pregnant after 5 sessions.
I have just given birth to a beautiful baby girl.  I cannot thank Dr. Wong and the team enough.  I will definitely continue attending for acupuncture for other reasons.   Dr Wong has a gentle manner and is clearly well versed in what she does.

Thank you Dr. Wong.

Highly recommend acupuncture to everyone.

I was suffering from severe pain in my shoulder and arm for 7 years. I have been through the NHS,  physio and sports therapists umpteen times which never helped. I went to see Dr Lisa and she recommended acupuncture which after 3 sessions has completely removed the problem. It is such a relief not to live every day with the nagging constant pain and I can’t thank her enough for helping me.

Just had my first ever waxing appointment and it was a fantastic experience,  Louise was amazing and she could see that I was nervous and she calmed me down and made me feel relaxed.  Will be going back and would 100% recommend

Louise is amazing. I’ve had my wax done in 3 of the best recommended places in Glasgow and I only liked her service. She’s really nice, respectful and always rather quick, doesn’t make me bend in all sorts of positions for a Hollywood!

I had my eyebrows done yesterday and I absolutely love them, having very uneven brows that are difficult to shape makes me anxious going to anyone new but I had a great experience here and will definitely be making a regular trip for my waxing needs 🫶🏻

I've been doing waxing in this place over a year and honestly Louise is absolutely a professional!! She is very quick and the waxing is completely painless!! She also gives you great advice and always takes care of you and makes sure you will not feel pain. Definitely recommend it to friends and as for Louise for an absolutely painless and fast waxing!!

Amazing service. The therapist was a lovely person and she done an absolutely amazing job of my Hollywood wax. She was so nice to chat with and I will definitely be back! Thanks a million. Glad I found the place ☺️
Best makeup I've ever had. Don't miss out.

Dr Niki is honestly the best. I’ve been getting my Botox at Thérapie for the last few years now, and every single doctor I’ve seen there has been amazing. The results always look natural, never overdone — just fresh and rested.

What really blows my mind is how long it lasts. I’ve noticed my Botox lasts way longer than most people I talk to. I last had mine done in April last year, and I’m only now starting to get movement back… that says it all!

Professional, friendly, and consistently incredible results. I wouldn’t go anywhere else. Highly recommend 🙌

Best birthday present ever when my sister first took me here. The botox took ten yrs off me. Since returning for various skin rejuvenation treatments including some filler. I always feel I get the best advice. I feel I'm a safe pair of hands with treatments that are not over the top but enhancing, I usually doctors for my treatment dependent on the treatment itself. And you can see from the before and after picture album what your treatment results will be I'd give 10 even 20 stars if I could.Roll on my next appointment- sculptura, a liquid facelift no less I'll let you know how I get on clare x

and a very friendly welcome awaits.

Shannon does my regular sessions, she’s so friendly, chatty and makes you feel at ease. Gemma the manager accommodated one of my sessions and I had the same experience, she was so lovely as well and made me feel comfortable and chatted away. My sessions always fly by with minimal discomfort. Would highly recommend this clinic and I wouldn’t go anywhere else !

I was a bit nervous before my first laser hair removal appointment but Gemma put me at ease straight away. She was very friendly, knowledgeable and professional. She chatted the whole time and made the appointment very easy and enjoyable. The treatment was practically painless which I was very pleasantly surprised about. Would most definitely recommend this clinic to everyone I know!

This was my first experience of attending an aesthetics clinic. The girls were very welcoming on reception and Dr Niki made recommendations of treatments available and gave me a proposed treatment plan, what we would hope to achieve. I agreed to the first step, she was very gentle and relatively pain free. Back for a review in 2 weeks and potentially next step of my plan.

Always come away from MoL with a smile on my face! Can't believe how effective my treatment has been and it's so easy having pay as you go sessions. All the staff are brilliant and so lovely. Particularly Kirstin - I was nervous the 1st few sessions but she makes me feel super calm and it's never awkward as I think it's going to be. Would deffo recommend!

After attending the salon for several laser hair removal sessions, I now feel able to give a genuine review.

I had previously tried laser hair removal elsewhere and saw little to no results, despite paying similar prices. The equipment simply wasn’t as effective.

After just two sessions with Liz, I noticed a significant reduction in hair growth in the areas being treated. I’ve since had another two sessions and continue to see fantastic results, even though I haven’t always been able to attend as regularly as recommended due to my own schedule.

I highly recommend Ministry of Laser and Liz.

Ministry of Laser is amazing!  Truly incredible service. The entire team is exceptionally knowledgeable and welcoming and take the time to ensure you feel comfortable and well informed throughout the process. They are so friendly and take the time to get to know you. The results have been amazing and 100% effective and far exceeded my expectations. The space itself is beautiful, modern and immaculately maintained which really adds to the overall experience. It’s also centrally located with excellent transport links making it ideal for anyone travelling from outside the city. I would highly recommend to anyone looking for this style of treatment. Would give it more than 5 stars if I could. 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

I’ve had a few sessions of laser on underarms, Hollywood and legs and have been very happy with the results. I’ve had appointments with Mairead and the most recent with Kirstin, both put me at ease and tailored the treatment based on feedback. I would recommend Ministry of Laser to anyone considering laser hair removal.

Throughout my course of treatment, everything has been great. After receiving 12 months of laser removal treatment I’m practically hairless and only have to shave before an appointment is coming up! Regrowth has significantly slowed or stopped in most areas and the treatment itself is mostly painless. If you’re thinking of laser hair removal, Ministry of Laser is the only place I’d recommend going to!

Have just left with my sister who is experiencing hair loss due to Chemo, I can't recommend enough as the care and attention given made my sister feel so incredibly comfortable with the whole process and it felt like the most natural thing in the world. Her choice is stunning and this will restore her confidence no end. First class 5 star review from me. Thank you girls x

Had a lovely experience shopping here. Sharon was so patient and understanding , made me feel so at ease. She found me my ideal wig which is so like my own hair.
I'll not feel so bad now once I lose my hair with chemo knowing I have my wig at hand. Thank you Sharon for making what I thought would be a difficult day a happy experience

I have been going to LA Hair for years now and Sharon has been dealing with my wigs since my hair fell out when i was 13 years old. She is compassionate, caring & always helpful. Amanda is always so friendly and approachable when you arrive too. They have separate rooms for privacy & the team here have only ever made me feel comfortable. I wouldnt go anywhere else.
Great staff and I would defo go back

I was worried when LASolutions took over from the previous owner of the Glasgow salon,  I needn’t have been.  My long time consultant, Lynn was still there which helped and the new staff have been nothing but kind and helpful.I’m no longer able to attend the salon in person because of age and my being at high risk from Covid but the service I’ve received even using the phone has been second to none.  Thank you all so much.
I booked for a haircut with Mehnaz! She was so nice and cut my hair exactly the way I asked. Lovely service

Highly recommend this hairdressing salon! Danielle is so friendly and she is the one with the good heart.

I am loving my new haircut! I will definitely be coming back!

Came in for the £5 blowdry & curls and love my hair so much! I don’t usually curl my hair but if I could do it the way Sadie (i think that was her name, the girl with pink hair) does it, i’d curl it way more often lol 🫶 will defo be back

Very friendly staff, great price - especially for students - and very happy with my haircut. Danielle did a great job in cutting my hair to be exactly what I asked for and I would highly recommend both her services and the services of the salon to anyone looking for a haircut
Brilliant service love my new cut thank you Danielle and Amethyst for your kindness 💜

They cancelled my wax appointment very last minute, giving me no time to book anywhere else. I explained I booked it 3 weeks ago as I need it done for going on holiday. Told all staff off sick and these things happen. Was also told that I should have booked direct rather than through Treatwell as they can control apps better that way. Maybe they should take Treatwell off their website as the main booking system rather than blaming the customer.

I tried multiple times to book an appointment for a pregnancy massage. Often getting to the point of discussing dates/times then not receiving a response and losing the date. When I finally got a date/time, I showed up for my 11am appointment at 10.40. Door was locked and no answer on any of the 3 contact numbers. Eventually at 11.10 the door was opened. I was informed they had written the appointment as 11.30 (in my correspondence with them I was told 11am) and the former client had been late. Received no apology and was repeatedly told they were a small business. With the lack of apology I asked for a refund of my voucher which I received. They seem very disorganised and it was a bad experience coming through at 9 months pregnant to have to sit on the stairs outside for 30 minutes.

Had a half leg waxing done today. Extremely efficient, lovely results. I don't think it even took as long as the 15 minutes suggested time.
Staff were just delightful, chatty, friendly and incredibly pleasant.
Though I've only tried one treatment, I'm sure I'll go back for others as I was so impressed. Their pricing is great too!

Wasn't what I had expected unfortunately. Staff member was pleasant however lacked knowledge. Shame after all the good reviews I had read about this salon.
The room where I had my wax treatment wasn't very clean and the ancient waxing rollers were very dirty and unhygienic. I know I should have said something but it was one of those things where it had already begun and regrettably it was too late to walk out.
While waxing the lady knowing my skin was fragile and sensitive waxed my arm so hard and roughly that I now have a very black and blue bruise up my arm . She was very apologetic and I understand these things happen but even after all this, I wasn't offered a free treatment or a discount on the price paid.
Most places out of courtesy would let one of the treatments be free as a gesture of goodwill.
Really disappointed as I thought I had found my go-to place.
A peice of criticism would be to be more gentle when waxing. The skin is very sensitive so you should be trained om how to deal with different skin types. I've had waxing done in many places and by far this has been my worst experience till date.

Located between Barolo and Revolution, just 5 minutes away from Glasgow Central. I’ve had a few treatments here over the last few years, mostly brows and waxing treatments. The staff are absolutely lovely and make you feel very comfortable. I was in yesterday and saw Lauren, she was great, honestly the best waxer in Glasgow. Prices here are very reasonable. I hope the staff are valued here as they really make it a good venue.

First time having Reiki massage.   Jo was very friendly/ helpful.  I suffer from Athritus helped me get down stairs/ off bed 😆.

I must admit afterwards I felt so relaxed, like a weight had been lifted.  Personally 30 min was sufficient.

Would definitely go back.
Jo is brilliant, makes you feel at ease. Always does an amazing job. And is great to chat to. I wouldn't trust anyone else with my eyebrows!
Had an amazing Swddish massage for myself and partner from Jo. Will definitely be going back soon.
Jo is a wonderful massage therapist, fully recommend her - five stars all the way!!
Friendly, professional and quick - can't fault the service.

It was my first time and I had a lovely experience! She's really sweet and made me feel rlly comfortable. The products used for waxing are really good, I barely felt it and my skin does not feel irritated at all. Really professional, I'd love to visit again xx

Highly recommend louise very professional make you fell comfortable! Got my lips done best ever Russian lip lift! Great deal too. Got Botox too. I’m 20 years younger. Everyone is complaining how good a look. She is the best will never go anywhere else

I visited Lola’s for the first time today and had the best customer service experience, as well as having the most amazing eyelash extensions. I felt totally comfortable and the attention to detail was wonderful. There was no rush to complete my treatment and the room smelt lovely with the waft of relaxing aroma therapy oils.
Going back next month for a course of  micro-dermabrasion and facials.  Well worth a visit and throughly recommend the treatment.
Thanks so much. I love my new lashes.

Fantastic service. Amazing results. Think I have tried everything available in this salon and never failed to be delighted. The lashes are the best! Light, long and natural with no damage to your own lashes. Couldn’t recommend enough ❤️👏🏼 Louise is lovely, professional and knows exactly what suits best. Xx

After looking for a place to get my lash extensions done I found Lola’s Lash Boutique, and can honestly recommend to anyone looking for a fabulous set. Location is in the center of Glasgow, the place is welcoming & beautifully decorated, and she is kind and attentive, with an eye for detail. A beautiful job overall, I’m already excited for getting them topped up! 💕

Had an express pedicure today and really happy with the attention to detail to make sure my feet look fabulous- will book a full pedicure next time as really happy..

Updated with the full pedicure I had on18th December 2024 and 55 minutes of pure bliss… my feet felt rejuvenated and very happy with everything will definitely be returning… thanks Teri you are fantastic.

Updated 18 Feb 2025 another fabulous supreme manicure with Teri. Amazing job!

I selected this salon based on the reviews, having had many mediocre pedicures so the Supreme Pedicure sounded like just what my feet needed. I was warmly greeted on arrival and settled in for what I thought would be a feet treat before my holiday. However, the therapist broke the skin on the side of my foot and little toe with her rough filing and later cut the cuticle on my toe. She had the audacity to suggest that I needed to see a chiropodist and took no action to disinfect the broken skin. The pedicure was far from supreme with rough edges and skin left around the nails and the polish was uneven and poorly applied. I politely pointed out the areas around the nails that I would expect to be clean and tidy on any basic pedicure and the therapist continually told me there was a limit to what she could do, she was in fact satisfied with her work and expected me to pay and leave. I offered another opportunity for a positive resolution but got nowhere. Luckily Kinka stepped in and took me downstairs for a chat and a look at the pedicure and then kindly offered to fix everything if I was able to return in a hour. I am grateful for Kinka's pedicure and would recommend you request a senior staff member for your treatment or select a named therapist from a friend or the recommendations. This was far from the experience I had been looking forward to. My foot hurt on holiday due to the scratches incurred and also ruined the look of my dress sandals for a special occasion.

Reading so many 5 star reviews I was looking forward to my Supreme pedicure however there was nothing supreme or 5 star about it. There are 2 treatment chairs beside the reception and shopping area - perhaps my expectations were too high but I expected a treatment room or private area.
My feet were roughly filed with a basic foot file followed by a foot scrub, a bowl of water was brought over for me to soak my feet in. The therapist did offer me coffee etc before she left me but I wasn’t there for coffee I was there for a pampering relaxing pedicure. When she returned my nails were cut and skin buffed around my toes but not to the standard I have had elsewhere. Nails uneven and rough skin left around my toes. I had asked when I arrived if, instead of having polish I could have a longer massage which the therapist agreed to. I have no idea how long the massage should be but it was quick.
Overpriced and very disappointing.

The where fabulous really great at their job only disappoint was the add on I had booked a month in advance could not be performed. I did have my medical pedicure and it was fantastic full recommend one Rochelle was proficient and knowledgeable.

Had an amazing experience today having used other podiatrist over the years this was by far the best experience I have had. Angela listened to the issues I had and explained why they may have occurred and solutions to each issue. Felt well informed and my feet felt amazing at the end. Would highly recommend

Zero stars would be better. Booked and paid for massage online, took a train into town and was told there was no appointment, she wouldn't even let me through the door and just said no via the intercom. Scammers. Will be going after the £150 charged.

The stairs leading up to the studio were a little off putting but once we got in we forgot all about them. The two girls doing the treatment (full body massage) done a great job for the full hour. We would make a return visit now we know about it. Well worth a visit.

Wish I could put zero stars because they don't even deserve one star. Worst customer experience I have ever experienced. It took around 1 month to even get hold of the staff working there. This involved us calling them multiple times, emailing and visiting the location to merely book an appointment for treatments we had already purchased. Their phone inbox was full and they called back twice in response to over 20 calls in a month and called it "several occasions". They even hung up mid sentence on the phone when dealing with a complaint. They did not reply to emails and did not apologise for the way they treated us. I do not recommend this place to anyone. Extremely rude staff and appalling customer service. Bad management and did not offer any compensation.

My partner and I went on a groupon deal for couples massage. Bit daunted by some negative comments I'd seen but what a wee gem in the heart of the city. Lovely staff, massage room was warm, cosy and very relaxing. Massage was excellent!!! We will definitely be back. Nice idea for a day out with your Mum or girlfriend too! :))

This was definitely the worst wax I've ever had! First off the place it's self looked dirty and the staff were unprofessional, I was left to wait for nearly an hour after my appointment time and when my treatment finally did begin the beautition didn't know what I was booked in for! The wax job it's self was patchy and at times it seem as though the beautition was waxing in a random pattern across my legs, I was then told that I would need to come back to have my wax finished as there was another customer that couldn't be kept waiting. Left the salon still covered in hair and covered in wax! I definitely will not be returning!

Glasgow - Worst customer service ever. I went for an appointment and waited outside of the building for more than 20 min. Main entrance was closed. Ive tried to call several times and nobody picked up the phone. If there's no receptionist at least make sure somebody picks up the phone. What a waste of time and money!

Cherie is an excellent practitioner. Her knowledge and experience combined with her friendly and lively personality rets in great customer experience. I had Haifu and Plasma and she talked me through everything really well. Definitely go back to her again.

Cherie did my second Hifu treatment and I can't wait to go back. The treatment was excellent, she explained everything and checked in with me the whole time. Had such a laugh bonding over growing up in similar ways, can't wait for my third session!

Ignore the older reviews, I'm glad I did.
I cannot recommend this clinic highly enough for customer care and service. I was very anxious about my treatment, but Joanne put me right at ease as soon as I walked into the office. She was friendly, kind, and very professional. She really explained everything in detail to me about the process, aftercare, etc.
Very efficient online booking system with the best prices for good quality treatments.

Update - second treatment with the wonderful Cherie yesterday. Couldn't have gone smoother. Such a cheerful and friendly woman who put me right at ease and chatted throughout. I definitely felt as thought the results of my second session were even better. Looking forward to my next session with her!

Fabulous experience yet again with Cherie. This was my third HIFU session & the results so far have already exceeded my expectations. Highly recommend Vivo & especially Cherie, she is very knowledgable and passionate about her work & makes the whole experience very enjoyable

Had my wedding make up done by the wonderful Alisa!! The make up was absolutely incredible and I felt so comfortable in it x Alisa is an incredible artist and works collaboratively with you to prioritise your comfort and vision! The make up was flawless and made me feel so confident! It lasted all day and all night without needing a single touch up! I cannot recommend her enough x also, her chats are unmatchable! She made my wedding morning so much more relaxed and anxiety free! 🩷✨️ if I ever need to get my make up gone again, you will find me in Alisa's chair x

I had the absolute pleasure of having my makeup done by Beth for a wedding I was attending, and I couldn’t be happier with the results. From the moment I arrived, she made me feel comfortable and listened carefully to what I was looking for.

She truly understood the look I wanted,  natural, and she delivered it perfectly.

Beth is not only incredibly talented, but also professional, warm, and easy to talk to. The makeup lasted all day and night without needing any touch-ups!

I can’t recommend Beth enough, she’s amazing at what she does, and I’ll definitely be booking her again in the future if I visit Glasgow.

Caitlin is an absolutely amazing makeup artist, and her service is truly outstanding! You'll be completely blown away by her incredible talent and the stunning makeup skils. From the moment I stepped in, I was greeted with kindness and some great chats. This was hands down the best experience I've ever had! I can't wait to return to get my makeup done for my next night out!

I had my makeup done by Caitlin and she did an amazing job! I loved how the look turned out and the experience was extremely smooth, relaxed and enjoyable. Can’t wait to get my makeup done again in the future!

The makeup I recieved from Caitlin was absolutely perfect!! I have had my makeup done now numerous times with Caitlin and I have become one of her regulars! She really listens and gets exactly what kind of look I’m going for and it is always executed perfectly! The way she cares for her clients is absolutely 10/10 and she is just an a lovely girl all round, will never go anywhere else now💗💗💗

I've been one of Mitra's clients a good few years now. I've had eyebrow, liner & lip blush done.
Initially with these enhancements, especially with them being on my face, I was nervous, however i put my trust in Mitra and I'm glad I have. I am always very pleased with results. I would say Mitra is a perfectionist which is what you want & expect in her line of work👌🏼
I'd say for anyone who has wanted or wanting any sort of these enhancements done, to go for it with Mitra. She is a real sweetheart whilst a complete professional. I would definitely recommend Beauty enhancements by Mitra😊

She is one of the best in Glasgow 👌, if you're looking for the best advice, solution, and service for your beauty, Mitra is the one you need to speak to; she listens patiently to your requirements and give you the best result.
Mitra is fantastic what she does and does not try to upsell but equally will give honest opinion if you ask. Professional and a lovely lady 💕
Amazing experience. Very knowledgable. I will be returning here for sure
Mitra is very professional

I've had botox in my forehead, crows feet and frown lines and juvederm filler in my jawline, cheeks and chin from Jennie at Etre Beau for years now so thought i best leave a review. Jennie is top class, highly qualified and her clinic is spotless and welcoming. You can tell straight away she has had years of aesthetics experience. Jennie always takes the time to listen to my ageing concerns and work out the best treatment for me. Her knowledge and skills in terms of facial muscles, wrinkles and lines and how botox and fillers can help always amazes me! She is truly world class in her field  She is always in tune with the latest treatments and products. I always leave feeling amazing and valued as a customer. Thank you.

Had my first beauty treatment  with Jennie a fortnight ago and a follow up session today. She’s so friendly, makes me feel comfortable and very professional. So happy with the result, highly recommended indeed! :) xx
Highly professional clinic. The best in the area for botox and juvederm filler in my opinion

I had an amazing experience with Elle at Boots - St. Enoch, Glasgow! She did a fantastic job on my eyebrows — tinting and trimming them beautifully. Elle was incredibly kind and took the time to explain every step of the process, which made me feel really comfortable. I also mentioned that I’d had an allergic reaction to waxing in the past, and she was so understanding and reassuring, making sure everything was done safely and gently.
My brows have never looked better. Highly recommend Elle! 💕

Absolutely loved my brows done by Brodie!!
I’m so so fussy and she really took the time to listen to what I liked/ didn’t like and got my brows perfect! She was also very friendly and made me feel at ease straight away, and answered all my questions too! Very professional and highly recommended going to her.

Brodie did my brows for me with a wax and tint and I can honestly say it’s changed the way I look at my face. I had no idea eyebrows could make such a difference to your face and I’ve never felt more confident. Brodie made me feel at ease and was lovely and bubbly and I thoroughly enjoyed my appointment with her. I will absolutely be back! Benefit should be proud of this stellar employee.

Had my brows recently done by Brodie and honestly can’t recommend her enough!
Fabulous job and she really made me feel comfortable and made sure my brows were perfect!
Thank you again!
Professional, friendly staff that take great care to tint and wax your brows to your requested specification. Their three bundle treatments deal is good value for money.
Shellac is brilliant, really long lasting.

Champagne prices for shandy quality!
My booking was at 11am the day prior to attending a wedding, the salon opened at 10am so I arrived 10 mins early- only to be told there was a staff meeting and I had to sit outside or go away and come back (no sign was up to say this).

I modified my booking weeks ahead of my appointment- because the employee never amended my booking.

I was told I wasn't getting what I actually wanted because of the time allocation I was given by Nora my nail technician...prior to my appointment one of my nails broke but there was no attempt to find a happy medium with the length of nail...there was an atmosphere of my nail technician not being able to speak freely in-front if certain coworkers (managers possibly).
Finally with my lash lift the employee was lovely but very opinionated about her views and was very vocal on them with regards to my personal life- to clarify I am happy in my personal life and wasn't seeking advice. I felt so uncomfortable with my experience I couldn't get out of there quick enough- definitely not worth the £135 for wonky shaped nails and someone criticizing my personal life.

It was my first time ever getting my nails done so I was quite nervous and unsure what to expect. I decided to go for a BIAB french manicure to start healing and growing my short nails. I had my nails done by Meghan and she was the loveliest girl - her attention to detail is amazing! She talked me through the whole process and made sure i was completely comfortable. The salon is beautifully decorated and clean, and there’s a friendly and warm atmosphere as soon as you walk in. Will definitely be my go to salon from now on! 🫶🏻

Eilidh made my nails fabulous with a full set of intricate nail art even though I was late.

She is a NAF nail pro and makes dreams come true!

This is the best nail salon in Scotland, I travel from Dundee every few weeks as they’re brilliant. Whether you want acrylics, a gel polish or a lash lift you cannot beat NAF! Plus there are usually some puppies to snuggle - what more could you need?! 💅🏻🐶
Terrie did my nails for my birthday and I could not be more delighted. I had an idea in mind and she elevated them. Lovely atmosphere and people as per usual 🤩

Had lip filler done by Gemma and I absolutely love it! Gemma made me feel so calm throughout the appointment and explained in lots of details what to expect and how to care for them after. Really happy with my new lips!

Consistently lovely and patient . Amazing at what she does and makes you feel a million  dollars.  Feel so comfortable coming to love those lashes All the staff are just such a lovely bunch. Love the new premises girls and wish you all a merry Christmas.

Gemma was honestly amazing! I was pretty nervous and she made me feel so calm and relaxed and was just fab the whole appointment. Felt like I’d known her for ages and it was my first time meeting her! The results of my tear trough filler are gobsmacking too, I didn’t realise how bad they looked until I seen the fantastic results! Will definitely be back at Gemma again! Thank you!

had the BEST experience getting my lashes done today! Not only do they look absolutely stunning, but the whole appointment was so relaxing and enjoyable. Alison was so lovely, welcoming, and made me feel completely at ease. 100% recommend – I’ll definitely be back! 💕✨

I got classic extensions done by Olivia. Olivia's pre-treatment consultation was quite personalised and I was impressed with the way she listened to me to figure out what to do with my lashes! She was very thorough with her service too. 100% recommend! 🫶🏻

Today I got my hair cut for the third time at Mesart, and from the moment you walk in, it’s truly a unique experience. This is my second time getting my haircut with Darryl, and I couldn’t be happier with the results. The entire team provides outstanding service and makes you feel very well taken care of. A top-quality experience all around. Highly recommended!

This is my regular hairdresser and I love coming here. I’m regularly complemented on the highlighting technique (carried out by Darryl & the team).

Recently I brought my mum who hasn’t been to a hairdresser in over 6 years due to anxiety and fear of judgement. She has mobility issues and all the staff here made her feel so at ease. They helped carry her mobility aids up and down the stairs, and Niamh gave her an amazing blow dry and recommendations. They made her feel relaxed and not judged. She left happy and confident. Thank you everyone x

Absolutely wonderful experience. Lovely welcome to the salon with incredibly friendly staff, and, at last, an outstanding stylist, Darryl, who actually listened to everything I asked for and produced the best cut I have had in a decade or more.

Georgia is absolutely amazing, gave me exactly what I asked for and it’s stunning. Never been so happy leaving the hairdressers. I also got a bouncy blowdry for the first time by niamh and I love it, my hair looks better than ever.

I had a lovely experience today.  It was my first time in Mesart GWR and the staff were so lovely not to mention my amazing stylist Georgia.  You are made feel welcome by all the staff such a comfortable experience I highly recommend it

In need of a change i booked an appointment with Nat who i found via Tiktok. I left my consultation so excited as Nat really listened to what I was looking for & offered her professional advice on colour. Left my appointment last night & I'm absolutely buzzing about my new hair. Not just a great stylist but a genuinely lovely person. The salon is in a great location too!

Thank you so much Suzanne for the beautiful haircut I had yesterday! I absolutely love it.
It feels so fresh and suits me perfectly.
I really appreciate your care and talent 👍🏻

My first experience at this salon with hairdresser named Natalie doing my keratin treatment went down a treat! The whole experience was so lovely and Natalie was so down to earth and conversated with me the whole time and made me feel so comfortable she even got me a lovely tea and biscuits! I absolutely loved the results of my keratin treatment and couldn’t recommend this salon enough 5 stars! Thank you
I came in for a simple restyle trim with Suzanna and walked out with the best haircut I’ve had in ages. Thank you so much – if I lived here, this would be my go-to salon! :)

I’ve been going to ohair for years now and they smash it every time! I’ve had treatments from Suzanne, Natalie and Racheal and they’re all amazing. My copper that Natalie did in the autumn and going back to my natural blonde that Racheal did today are both pictured and have been so so happy with both! I don’t even live in Glasgow anymore and travel back because I trust their judgement so much, even when I go in not quite knowing what I want. Highly recommend!
Would recommend this place to everyone, girls in here are so lovely!

10/10 service. My daughter and I got our hair done by Amanda today. Can not reccommend her work enough. She done an amazing job. Also let my daughter help around the salon as she was working away. Will definetly be returning ❤

Had a wonderful time getting my nails done!! Beautiful end finish and will be back up shortly and really looking forward to booking facial and massage as the salon is absolutely gorgeous and smells divine!! x

Lucky I've even gave this place 1 star as I phoned up and booked a pamper day for my daughter and I for part of her 21st birthday day out. Told them on the phone exactly what we wanted and when we arrived on the 22nd March to find out they didn't have my booking and couldn't even fit us in after travelling over 50 mile to get there and would managed back up before the voucher ran out. There was no sincere apologies from the girl behind the desk who sat there and smirked. I hope they realise they ruined my daughters birthday day out not that they cared. Left the shop feeling very angry and upset and spent the rest of the day apologising to my daughter I will never be back worse experience ever

Cowboy Salon!! Tried to use a Wowcher to book treatments + they took my no. + said they'd call me back - no call back so I called again + booked treatments - when I mentioned I was using a Wowcher was told they had cancelled all Wowchers.
