If I hadn't mentioned it they would have let me show up only to find this out. Shocking + cou ter-productive way to treat potential new customers 👎👎

I would like to state under no circumstances would I like to ever book this place customer care absolutely shocking booked treatments through Groupon emailed establishment called to agree treatments no problem turned up today told all Groupon vouchers were cancelled would no longer receive treatments and would have to contact Groupon myself to get refund contacted Groupon in shop to be told vouchers were valid Groupon did not cancel them and they were valid shop offered treatments at full price today us it was the only way we could receive them feel as though this is what shop had planned all along put grivience in with Groupon felt staff ridiculed me my friend treated us with contempt waste of holiday from work very dissatisfied customer wouldn't even award one star rating.

I had my first tattoo removal session today, and I just wanted to share my experience. Karen was absolutely fantastic! She was so helpful, kind, and welcoming from the moment I reached out about the service until we left the clinic.

Karen was super professional and gave me all the info I needed about the treatment, what to expect, and the aftercare. She made me feel really relaxed and cared for, which certainly helps calm the nerves. The laser treatment was almost totally painless. I’ve had a few sessions at another place and the difference in the entire process has left me regretting not coming here first!

I can’t thank Karen enough for her amazing service. I’m already looking forward to my next session, and I’m so confident that I made the right choice by choosing Clinic 21. See you in 8 weeks x

Clinic 21 is a welcoming clinic space run by Karen who is absolutely top of her game and utterly professional in what she does. My friend and I were both having eyebrow tattoos removed by her.  She was kind, warm, considerate, understanding and humorous. She demonstrated an immense knowledge and professionalism within her field and made us both feel completely at ease. Therefore we have no hesitation in recommending Karen to anyone who might require tattoo removal.
D and M.

Karen has done an amazing job removing a large tattoo from my back. She is professional but also very friendly and reassuring. I would recommend this clinic to anyone thinking of having a tattoo removed

I can honestly say I've never had better service than what I get from Karen. She's welcoming, warm and professional. I've had two tattoos removed with her and the customer care has always been faultless.
The location is great with on site free parking. The treatment is, as you would imagine, pretty painful. I use numbing cream and wrap area in cling film before treatment and put an ice pack over the tattoo which really helps. she an incredible machine and only needed 6 sessions to remove tattoo on arm.

Thanks Karen ❤️
Karen was very professional and friendly. She talked me through every step and made me feel at ease. I would highly recommend anyone need a tattoo removed to visit Karen .

Here visiting from Canada for awhile and the staff are pretty friendly, and gave me some great hair advice and tips. Honestly could not have had a better experience. Thank you Ashley and Sharon for being so friendly and for caring about the final results.

Definitely don’t recommend for eyebrows. The lady just messes up with your eyebrow shape. I said I just want to tidy up and keep my eyebrows thick and keep the arch. They even took before picture. After she messed up with the shape, made one eyebrow round and kept the other with arch and blamed me that already my eyebrows are one round and one arch. Didn’t even say sorry for the mistake. Not worth £9. Having been getting eyebrows threading since so many years, never one said and blamed the shape of my eyebrows. Made one eyebrow thin and she can see she messed up but not owning up her mistake. And instead said I’m just removing the baby hair and messed up my whole eyebrows!!
Friendly and talented staff. Wouldn't trust anyone else. They are all brilliant.

Highly skilled and super friendly hairdressers. Ashley listens carefully and discusses the plan while my hair is still dry. I always have a straight forward cut and blow dry having previously grown out my colour. Great value for money.

Just had the most relaxing bed spa with Chloe, not only was the treatment relaxing but my hair feels the cleanest it has been in a long time, Chloe is so knowledgeable and friendly . Can’t recommend this enough!!

Very professional. Myself and my sidekick both enjoyed our massages. So good. You know it's good when you feel as if it's only been 5 minutes. Would recommend. Used spa facilities afterwards. Free parking available.

I just had a fantastic full body hot stone massage with Ahlam at Riverside Beauty. .. It was absolutely wonderful!! Feel great after it ☺️
Thank you Sam and Ahlam 💜💜

I had 2 appointments on concurrent days prior to my daughters wedding on the 18th of September. The 1st appointment was a facial. It was wonderful. The therapist took her time. It also included an arm, neck and hand massage and was fabulously relaxing. I left feeling pampered and relaxed. The next day I had my makeup done and was delighted with the result and it lasted perfectly all day. It is a lovely salon and well worth a treat if you are staying in the hotel.  There is work ongoing in the lifts near the salon and I didn't feel it spoiled my treat, however I do feel perhaps the hotel should be being a bit more supportive to the salon in that regard. That said would I go back knowing this? Absolutely.

I rang up to make a booking only a few moments ago. I asked the receptionist some questions about the treatment. Once the call was finished the receptionist obviously didn't put the phone down properly and I heard her laughing with her colleague about the question I asked. Needless to say I won't be attending the appointment.

We purchased a massage deal on 5pm, and Jac was our therapist. Jac was so warm and friendly and provided the most amazing massages. Jac was so professional and very impressed with her effort in providing the most amazing massage. Very professional experience and can't wait to book again!

Been before to get a lash lift and brow wax/tint - loved it so decided to go back a couple months later. I got the same treatments, however my lashes were over processed and basically curling inwards in all directions. It’s been just over a month and a half since this and they’re still super curled. No amount of perming will get them back to the way they were before I had my appointment. Can’t fault my brows though, i preferred them this time!
Love this place! Have came here for years for nails, lip fillers, Botox and eyebrow tattooing. Always great job and professional
Got classic lashes and eyebrow wax and tint. Look fab. Lashes aren't too long or heavy. Miriam did them. Really pleased with the results.

Got my semi permanent eye lashes done here a few week ago, should normally take an hour took the girl 20 minutes, rushed them! couldn’t properly open my eyes for about half an hour after so much glue had got in! & haven’t been applied properly thick clumps of glue, has ripped most of my eyelashes out & left bald patches!! Definelty would not recommend!!!!!!!
So professional with the personal touch. Absolutely delighted with my new brows. Would strongly recommend Mir Image for all your aesthetics

Had short haircut and loved the results, very neat and tidy. Apprentice hairdresser was brilliant,  - friendly enthusiastic and keen to do the best job for me. Both care and service given was fantastic and I would definitely recommend bon vivant work and staff, so well done! Beauty and hair results have both been good for me for ages now, very professional and efficient -always a good outcome. Lisa's a natural and will go far, Thanks very much BV! A.McNeillx
Really nice salon, hair dresser (Lisa) is lovely and attentive. Will definitely be going back - thank you!

I am absolutely dis gusted with the service I have just had from this company.  I had my hair coloured n not fault it was lovely.  However I missed an appointment due to my dad being rushed to hospital having 7 blood transplants was in a critical condition and could have died.  The last thing on my mind was to call the Salon at that time. No compassion from them what so ever. Which it just awful. They say I need to pay another £80. Before I can have my cookie redone paying another £80 and I also got a birthday voucher for a massage which I certainly will not be using so another waste of money. I would revert going here as the compassion from the girl was disgusting and had no sympathy that my father could have passed away.

Massage and hair today fantastic. Came to Eilidh with worsening lower back and buttock pain. She recognised straight away what the issue was and worked on the muscles precisely and effectively-came off the table a new woman. So fab having a masseuse trained and knowledgeable in sports/msk issues as well as giving super relaxing massages. I've been to Eilidh for Swedish, revival and sports massages and all fantastic. Also booked in with Megan for cut and colour. First time meeting Megan-she made me feel so relaxed with such a gentle and friendly manner and managed to brush out my very tuggy hair without me feeling a twinge. Really enjoyed a wee head massage when having hair washed out and I love the finished result of the colour and cut. We were both giggling by end of the app, I'll certainly be back to see her! As always, Bon Vivant is the perfect remedy.

I absolutely love this salon especially the beauty therapist cat .

cat managed to improve my face over the space of a year and advised me on all the correct after care and products to use .  she was always there out with my treatments for advice and guidance.

slowly and surely after a year of having a nightmare with my skin it is glowing and that's all down to cats expertise!!

I will not go anywhere else now and nobody is touching my skin but cat

This place is and always have been beautiful 😍  however,  since its been taken over the welcome service,  the social gathering and overall staff have improved! Room was immaculate, and the pools and spa were so relaxing also. I would like to say a special thank you to the guy in the morning serving us 2x (Arsenal fan) he was so welcoming, funny, inviting and did you proud as a company.

The reviews are on point - the staff really are absolutely lovely here - it really adds something to the stay. We loved the little touches like free minibar, yoga mats in the room, being able to borrow straighteners and other bits and pieces and the unexpected 5pm wine and mingling (free!) which bought such a vibe to our evenings. Central is in walking distance. Hope the Kimpton team got a bonus at Christmas because they deserve it!

We were super impressed by this hotel. We would definitely come back and recommend it to our friends.

The entire staff works to make the guests feel special and takes care of smallest details. We spent our Christmas there and it was a memorable experience. Food is excellent, well seasoned and we fell in love their Shakshuka!

Staff went out of the way to make sure we had tea in the lounge (closed for Christmas Day) while their restaurant staff prepared for the Christmas lunch.

Very nice hotel! Good service and lovely breakfast(we chose to stay here because of a cancelled flight).
We also lent bikes to cycle around - for free.
Only negative thing was that our room (located in basement/ground floor) was not silent/quiet and was next to a busy street. For the money you pay this is not an option in my opinion.

Utterly earned ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐s  An Exceptional Stay – A Rare Gem for Disabled Travellers

Our recent stay at the Kimpton Hotel in Glasgow was nothing short of outstanding.

As a disabled traveller, I’ve stayed in many hotels over the years all over the world, but it’s incredibly rare to find one that gets accessibility so right.

The facilities here were far above expectations everything was thoughtfully designed, genuinely accessible, and clearly put together with care and understanding rather than as an afterthought.

From the moment we arrived, the staff were warm, welcoming, and incredibly attentive, ensuring that every detail of our stay was comfortable and seamless. They went above and beyond to make sure we had everything we needed, and their friendly, professional attitude made us feel completely at ease.

The accessible room itself was superb spacious, comfortable, and beautifully finished. The bathroom was exceptionally well equipped, with all the right adaptations that actually make a difference day to day.

It’s clear that Kimpton Glasgow truly values inclusion and takes pride in offering a first-class experience for all guests.

Breakfast was another highlight a lovely, relaxed atmosphere with delicious food and plenty of options. The service once again was flawless.

It’s rare to find a hotel that strikes the perfect balance between luxury, comfort, and genuine accessibility. Kimpton Glasgow sets a new standard that many other hotels could learn from.

We left feeling truly cared for and look forward to returning very soon. Highly, highly recommended.

We stayed for three nights, checking out on Christmas Eve. The guest house was not exactly what we had expected, but it was charming. Can certainly see why it’s called a guest house rather than a hotel. Lovely furniture throughout and comfortable amenities, though not quite spectacular. The breakfast was a very nice touch and we were really very happy with what was offered. The area was a bit sleepy, though there are some nice restaurants and bars nearby. It couldn’t be more convenient for getting to Kelvingrove gallery.  I’d say the price seemed fair for what we received.

At first arriving at the Alamo we were a bit disappointed by how small the room was. We had gone for the most affordably priced room as the price range is high. The room was conveniently labeled 'intimate' on the brochure and website, we felt that the online presentation of the Alamo on the website gives the guest house a more luxury feel than what it is in reality. It was explained that the bathroom was outside of the room when we booked online which we did not mind much when staying, they provided lovely robes and the bathroom itself was nice with a deep bath. The woman who greeted us was super friendly but we did find it slightly unprofessional that she was wearing socks and it made it have an almost hostel like vibe. What was a bit disappointing was the breakfast, it came out undercooked and cold. It also took them an hour to bring it out and it appeared the staff were flustered and underprepared. We were the only ones in the breakfast room at the time so it really shouldn't have been that much of an undertaking to cook two breakfasts. We left feeling hungry and disappointed. However the staff member who served us apologised and offered complimentary cream tea to make up for it which we appreciated. I would still recommend staying here as I feel the breakfast was perhaps due to some fault in the kitchen and it seems we were just unfortunate in our experience. Overall we had an enjoyable stay and the room was cosy, quiet and comfortable. I would definitely stay again and was happy we had chosen the guest house. Also the standard of cleanliness was exceptional. The area where it's situated is a great too!

We won an Instagram competition which included a free night stay with bed and breakfast, we chose to stay in the Arran Suite, and it was AMAZING! Everything about that room! From the bed to the shower and bath facilities it was perfect!

I can’t thank the members of staff enough for their kind hospitality while staying here, if you are looking for a place to stay while in Glasgow this comes highly recommended! Clean, affordable, Relaxing and just all round good vibes!

Thank you once again! I promise you we shall be back!!

We stayed at Alamo Guest House and had mixed feelings. The location and the historic house have potential, but for the price (about £250 per night), we expected more.

On the downside: you need to ring to get in, and there are only stairs to both entrance and rooms. Breakfast has to be reserved for a fixed time, which feels a bit restrictive. We unfortunately had a 24-hour flight delay and, although the booking was non-refundable, we provided proof of the cancellation. A goodwill gesture (like refunding the missed breakfasts) would have been appreciated, but nothing was offered. The rooms are carpeted throughout – which is a matter of taste – and we ended up in a basement room. While no “park view” was advertised, a basement wasn’t what we expected for this price. No bathrobe was provided, which would have been useful given the shared bathroom. The toilet flushed poorly (needing long, hard pressing of the button). Coffee at breakfast was very disappointing (just French press and not tasty). Overall, it felt expensive for what you get.

On the positive side: the young woman at check-in and check-out was very friendly, as was the breakfast staff. The beds weren’t very large, but we slept well. Even from the basement, we had a partial view of trees. The bathroom was pleasantly warm, and the à la carte breakfast itself was tasty.

I was absolutely blown away with the service and accommodations offered by the Alamo. From the moment we arrived until we checked out, my family was treated with phenomenal kindness. The rooms are spacious and decorated in theme with the architectural style of the building. The included breakfast is cooked-to-order and was a delicious way to start the day. The hotel is tucked just outside of downtown Glasgow, offering a quiet retreat while visiting the city.

First visit this Friday night. Martin at reception was very good with the induction, all explanations, provided, and questions, answered. Very good and safe facilities, friendly crowd all in all. Registered for the yearly membership and shall use it soon… :@

Just been for my first ever visit and was impressed very clean, unfortunately it was dead but whst do you expect for a Tuesday when everyone is at work. The second I got in there I was greeted with a very nice young lad Sam who works there never seen him before but it seemed like ages very polite.
I will return again it's worth the 3 hour train journey each way

The review is reflecting on the business, not the people who visited! First of all, we have travelled 4.5 hrs to see and experience something 'new'. The building from outside looks scary, but inside I would say 'immaculate' clean, and regarding the other similar places up to date, modern. Large bar, where they are serving alcohol (normally other places don't!), beverages and soft drink and also food! Free WiFi, condoms, lubes. Heated smoking area. 3 storeys, with the playrooms on 2 (basement and top floor). Definitely you need a lot of walk... Mostly mature people visited the sauna, and some younger students. The visitors were all very friendly - had a lot of chat with them 🙂 - it is very unusual in other saunas that people have a conversation, they're only there for fun. The guys were from all nationwide, also from Italy, Poland, Hungary, France, US...
All the experiences in this places start from the front door... Staff - I wouldn't say rude- is very simple, they could only manage a yes or know answer whatever we tried to ask. Were absolutely not bothered with people. That's pretty shocking. Normally staff in other places are buzzing around the guests to make sure they're OK, comfortable and having a grant time of their visits. I have read in other comments about this fact already so I'm just wondering why the management kick them out and employ people who loves their jobs and brings more fun and experience to their guests and also more guys to visit the place. When the guy behind the counter rolling his eyes just because I've asked where to leave the locker keys before we left, that's pretty mind-blowing.
The place has a great location, in the heart of the city centre, and for those who might travel by car, there's a huge Q-Park around the corner (safe and tidy) with a charge of £20 for 24 hours. Though after 12 hrs of stay you have to pay the full day! It is worth because while you are in the sauna your car is safe...
Just because of the staff I don't recommend this business at all, especially for those who are keen to visit new experiences and travel for hours. Also I wouldn't visit myself this place again just because of the simple reason I have mentioned. They need some similar competition businesses to learn the lesson what is business and the basics: who's money is the matter for them (visitors) or what is first the visitors or the staff's attitude.
Lovely staff (bearded man) and venue. Clean and modern. Diverse clientele who were respectful and kind. Thank you!
The place is good, the staff very friendly and the Scottish people very welcoming. I recommend the place. Ah, there are types for everybody

Go for kids swimming lessons. Used to use the gym but no longer as a better, cleaner and more modern gym opened near me. Swimming lessons great, small class sizes and friendly teachers. Actual gym itself is a bit old. Equipment old and not the easiest to use. Everything’s a bit worn. The ladies changing rooms are clean enough (cleaners do a fantastic job) but the stench that comes from the drains is unbearable. It absolutely stinks. Some of the groups of men in the gym are annoying too. Why do they have to shout to communicate? I also get annoyed at the amount of able bodied people using the disabled/kids parking bays. It’s always the same culprits.

Went here to go swimming as there aren't too many pools in the west end and I was surprised by how small the pool was. Definitely less than 25m. They don't have any length written down on their website that I could find apart from an article for a 1.6km swim challenge which suggests the pool is about 16m long.... Also no pool flags which makes swimming quickly quite stressful. Otherwise the pool was clean and the sauna was nice. There was a very strong naff smell coming from the drains of the ladies changing room. You'd get a better gym/pool experience elsewhere for the same price...

I've been coming here for years, however the gym is really showing it's age and very disappointing that there has not been much investment in a complete refurb and much needed new equipment.The changing rooms and showers are dirty and the machines are really old with some needing urgent repairs. Not worth the £47 per month.

Only reason I come here is because of the people that train there, great folk! However I have recently purchased a new membership with a different gym which has brand new facilities.

Good gym, but full of kids of all ages, in particular groups of teenage boys. In particular they make the locker room areas uncomfortable with how they act. I wish there were adult only hours available.
Hooked by the size and variety but the place is falling apart and it’s too much with the hot water not working all the time

I do the swimming lessons here. The swimming instructor is fantastic, patient and kind. No issues with front desk, all nice and welcoming.

My issue is with whoever is in charge of the swimming lessons behind the scenes. There is absolutely no communication to the members and this would be fine but this also extends when classes are cancelled. Members are not notified when classes are cancelled and are only aware when they turn up for the supposed class. This happened once or twice back in Nov/ Dec. They say if they cancel a lesson before their defined cutoff date, your next Direct Debit bill will be adjusted to reflect this. I’m assuming this would be reflected by a refund or additional class(es) to make up for the loss. Unfortunately, this was not the case and again, there was no communication about this. Members need to give a month’s notice if they want to cancel their lessons (double standards) but good luck trying to get a quick reply. They do not pause your membership or hold payment regardless of circumstances. You will continue paying even if you are away for that entire month. For how expensive the lessons are, you would hope they would be a little more accommodating.

As other posts have mentioned, the jacuzzi pool is cold and not warm. The pool water can be dirty sometimes and some areas in the pool are slippery which is honestly concerning due to H&S.

If you decide to join, proceed at your own discretion.

Love the gym. Love the culture and the people in it. Pleased they have made some upgrades to the facilities recently. Would like to see some upgrades to the gym equipment to give more variety. More so the smaller equipment rather than the larger machines. More for stretching and yoga purposes for warm ups etc. keep up the good work though. Staff are lovely.

Excellent staff, especially on reception (Lesley) and in cafe - very friendly & kind.   Good variety of studio classes. All my classes instructors are vg, eg those taking Body Conditioning & Pilates - Tues & Thurs. This Nuffield Glasgow Central Gym has a friendly atmosphere, a pleasure to look forward to being there - well done managers at the top (Ian & Ewan).  xx

Staff are brilliant! The Joint Pain Management course was amazing! Collette the PT is a great asset to the gym. Loads of classes and equipment and just about to get a refurb which will improve facilities. The cafe is also great for a catch up or a quiet coffee.

Clean luxurious warm and welcoming. Top notch free weights and other equipment with plenty of space and variety.
Highly recommended for training and then
relaxing in the sauna steam room and pool.

Hi The Glasgow Club maryhill is nice with nice staff but unfortunately there is just a women staff in reception which her beaver is not acceptable. She is vey rude and was very rude specially on Sunday afternoons. If you change the rude staff to a smiley face and nice talking one it will be good for its progress.
Thanks
Nice club with a good atmosphere. Friendly staff and a clean space. I’ve been using the gym so far and had a good experience overall
It is a nice pool and a nice baby/toddler pool. But the water is too cold in both. My granddaughter ended up shivering so had to take her out early.
Good space for daily workout. Staff is great and friendly.
The gyms real nice but on the small side but really good

I had a brilliant 60-minute sports massage at Glasgow Physiotherapy and can’t recommend them highly enough. As a runner and someone who runs a run club in Glasgow, I’ve had my fair share of treatments - and this was easily one of the best.

I was treated by Rebecca, who was fantastic. She was professional, knowledgeable, and really took the time to understand the issues I came in with. I left feeling looser, more mobile, and genuinely looked after.

I’ll most definitely be recommending Glasgow Physiotherapy to my runners and will be returning for future massages. Excellent service all round!

A superb physiotherapist service. Knowledgeable, understanding and considerate to the client's needs. As a runner, I need someone who appreciates what I need either as a sports massage or when injured a good rehabilitation programme to get me back. Scott offers a full diagnosis and then advises on an exercise programme to support and complement a running schedule. Exercises are provided with video clips by email and an app which makes sure that you never forget your routine and that you are actually doing your rehab correctly. I've known and worked with Scott for many years now, and wouldn't want to work with any other physio!

Glasgow city physiotherapist are the best you can get! Excellent service from a friendly group of people, I’ve had calf pain for several months now which effected my daily lifestyle.I went to many different places but saw no result. First time meeting Scott, a kind consoling person. He explained in detail what the problem was and how to fix it, I now experience no niggles whatsoever and visit Glasgow City Physiotherapy on a regular basis.

Cannot recommend these guys enough, top facilities and a great group of people to work with!

Can’t recommend Glasgow City Physiotherapy enough. From start to finish the experience was brilliant, and Scott was fantastic throughout.

Scott took the time to properly assess the issue, explain what was going on in a clear and reassuring way, and put together a treatment plan that actually made sense and delivered results. The sessions were focused, practical, and tailored to what I needed, with great advice on exercises and recovery in between appointments.

You never feel rushed, and it’s obvious Scott genuinely cares about helping you get back to full strength, whether that’s for sport, training, or everyday life. Friendly, professional, and extremely knowledgeable.

Would highly recommend to anyone looking for high-quality physio.

I have visited a number of times now. Scott has been fantastic at helping build up a training regime that not only addresses current injuries, but will help guard against future injury - really important for someone like me, in my 50s. He listens closely to what you want from the sessions and all ongoing feedback. I'm really happy and will keep coming back

This has been my favourite massage place for around 5 years now. The massage therapists are all very kind and amazing at massage. The place it decorated beautifully and I always leave feeling on top of the world. Thank you so much for always getting all the tension from my back

I had a wonderful massage with Ong at Dara’s Massage & Spa. From the moment I arrived, she made me feel comfortable and welcome. Her technique was incredible – she combined strength with gentleness, finding all the tight spots while still keeping the whole experience deeply relaxing. Ong clearly knows what she’s doing, and I could feel the difference straight away. By the end, I felt lighter, calmer, and completely renewed. The spa itself has such a peaceful atmosphere, and the service was professional from start to finish. I’ll definitely be booking with Ong again – highly recommended!

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 5/5
Fantastic experience at Dara’s Massage & Spa. The traditional Thai massage was both relaxing and energising, and the calming atmosphere made it even better. Convenient central location and very professional service – highly recommend!
I had a great massage with Jack, and it was one of the only places in Glasgow I could find that offers male Thai massage. The experience was excellent and I’ll definitely be back!
This is a hidden gem! The staff are lovely and my massage was great. They used tiger balm because my legs and feet were so sore

Transform  Medical are  an unethical, money grabbing, unscrupulous company that practice unsafe medical procedures. my experience with them was horrendous, i was not advised of any risks associated with having a procedure and as a result I was horrified at the after math of my operation. my face lift procedure was below standard and was very rushed on the day. I had been lied to by a sales person about the invasive impact of a face lift. Transform are not taking any responsibility for my complaints, and they have lied to suit their own narrative. Do NOT use this company they are dangerous and below standard on every level.

I completed the webform, got a call within a minute from an automated service to book a consultation,  so far so good. It was intuitive and was able to book the appointment I required. Once that call had finished, I received another call, from a human this time to book an appointment. I advised I have just booked an appointment with the automated service.
Day of scheduled appointment, no phone call. I tried calling the number on the website and was put in a queue. I started off at being number 1 in the queue, this increased to me being 2nd in the queue with a stuttering message.l which is bizarre given its an automated, recorded message. What is going on!
On checking their website a few days ago, it was down for some reason.
This experience so far is not giving me the confidence to go any further with this company and was planning on spending a significant amount on the surgery I wanted. Their spam emails are a bit much too.

After posting a poor review I am having to edit this as things have totally changed and I can't thank them enough

I know times have been tough through covid but now things are getting back to normal I highly recommend this clinic.

Staff are amazing and it's always a joy going into get a fill on my band and having a chat with them.

Any one going for a gastric band I recommend going here.

Both me and my partner are happy with the results and happy with everything they have done. Keep. Up the good work

I went to the Glasgow clinic for a blood test and everything was beyond expectation. When I called to book the appointment I spoke to a nurse called Belinda and when I arrived, it was the same person who did the test, which was very nice. The interiors are brand new and very clean. Belinda was very personable and professional at the same time, I also learned something new about the equipment they use. I have an unconscious fear to blood and needles but on this occasion the overall experience was really very good.

I've had several positive experiences from the clinic. For surgery, from first consultation with Patient Co-ordinator (Gabriella), to meeting the surgeon (Mr. Antonacci), to going into hospital, everything was very well organised. The clinic staff are very accommodating and keep you well informed. The nurses (Tess, who was fab) are on hand to answer any queries anytime, not just during pre-op screening and post-surgery check-up. It is up to you as the patient to arrange for 12 week, 6 month and annual check-ups but any questions I've had, just pick up the phone and the staff are happy to help. I also visited Claire for fillers on 2 occasions, she did a great job. I opted for a subtle enhancement however I'm fairly terrified of needles: Claire made me feel completely relaxed and even left the numbing cream on for a little longer! I'm really pleased with the results.
Really great hotel. Right in the city centre, but really quite inside. Rooms really clean, comfy and quite too.

The team here have been warm, kind, attentive and extremely helpful since I started going to this gym a few months ago.

It’s a great gym, small in size, but all the machines are well looked after and majority of the time available to use straight away.

The gym, pool and spa areas are always clean and well looked after. Staff aren’t hesitant to resolve any issues being experienced by customers and members.

Special mentions to Alanah, Stevie, Melissa, Morgan & Euan who make this place special.

Euan has raised the bar to EXCEPTIONAL! His new management has revamped EVERYTHING to the highest quality & standard! My husband, Frank Frulio, and I are thoroughly impressed. The club is super CLEAN, METICULOUS & VERY WELL KEPT! It's an escape from reality & true serenity. One of my favorite hidden treasures in Glasgow! THANK YOU EUAN for all your hard work!
Absolutely amazing hotel. The staff and the food were great I would highly recommend this hotel

you have to book online beforehand.
I booked as a day guest for £ 10 and half an hour later I was in the sauna! The sauna and steam room were lovely and relaxed and the pool was big enough for a swim. The employee, who even speaks German, was very nice and charged my cell phone because my battery was empty. Very helpful! The parking lot was free, but you have to let them know.
I had my first hot stone massage today with Elena. It was absolutely amazing n I felt wonderful after the 90 min session. I felt the tension leave my body immediately! Superb!

I just had a massage from Elena and all I can say is wow, how incredibly wonderful I feel right now. Elena just removed all the stress that built up in my body from last year. I definitely know now it’s not healthy to go without a massage for too long. I will definitely be booking back in soon as Elena has removed all the stress from my body. I understand now the importance of going for regular massage. Thank you so much superstar

I had a deep tissue massage from Rebecca. The experience was great and just what I hoped for. After being injured recently and getting back to my usual training my coach recommended this. A friend recommended Deserved Massage and I will absolutely be back.

I have had sessions with Wendy for over a year. She is a highly skilled therapist, who takes the time to assess any specific stress / injury point at each session. She has a good knowledge of musco skeletal systems, and her sessions are tailored to any particular issues. Apart from a specific injury, the holistic benefits from her massage have been fantastic.

Wendy is incredible! She is Very knowledgeable and makes you feel so comfortable. Explained where I was feeling pain & she explained where would be the best areas to work on. Felt completely lighter afterwards and will be back in a few weeks again to keep the maintenance on my back up. Wouldn’t go anywhere else.

Awful gym. My partner and I have used this gym for over 15 months and there are a LOT of issues. Key training equipment (with no alternative for the muscle group) is left broken for almost 5 months. If you’re working with a legitimate professional trainer (not the Village staff) they’ll be struggling to adjust your plan. Critical machines are consistently out of order. Staff simply blame Technogym (the equipment manufacturer and take zero responsibility). The machines are old, dated and very tired and worn as I’ve used Technogym equipment in other gyms and it’s significantly better and way more modern. Village have clearly been going cheap on the equipment and maint contract. No supervision. Amateur gym users handling the machines stupidly and violently, inevitably contributing to the constant break downs. There’s so much plate slamming. It’s frustrating when Village PT staff are in and walking around but they don’t intervene with these people. They just leave everyone to their thing and ignore the basics. Paper Towels and cleaning Spray after often not restocked. The changing rooms, lockers and toilets are not open at 5am when the gym opens. This is because it gives access to the pool which isn’t open at that time. Still a pain for gym goers when it’s already failing to be open 24 hours. They are also filthy when they are open so I’ll do pretty much anything I can to avoid them. Sadly, the stairway to the gym smells like a sewer by 6am+ as there’s no ventilation there and too many sweaty patrons using the mini lockers at the bottom . I’ve complained to staff, management and even Village HQ about the broken key equipment for over 4 months and no changed or adjustments are made. There’s a pretence of care in their emails but this hasn’t let to anything being fixed. Overall, this place is dressed up and presented as a premium quality gym, and the price is really high but my partner and I will be cancelling our membership shortly as nothing could be further from the truth. Oh yeah, they also want 3 months notice after the full year. They’ll happily take your money but they really couldn’t care less about the actual gym. My advice: look beyond the fresh pull up banners and posters and don’t subscribe to this gym. It’s seriously neglected and the contract is exploitative.

This gym has gone seriously downhill. The men’s changing rooms and toilets are filthy and clearly not cleaned during the day. Unacceptable for a paid gym.
The equipment is outdated, and long-term members are clearly not a priority. Management seems more focused on handing out free guest passes and chasing new sign-ups than maintaining basic standards.
This place used to be great. Now it’s poor, I do hope it can go back to being the same again

The Village Gym in Glasgow provides a solid overall experience for anyone looking to train consistently with a good range of facilities. The gym floor is spacious with a mix of cardio machines, resistance machines, free weights, and functional training areas, allowing both beginners and more experienced members to train comfortably. The equipment is generally well-maintained, and there is enough variety to rotate exercises without feeling limited.

The class timetable is a strong point, offering spin, strength-based sessions, yoga, and other group options that suit different fitness levels. Instructors provide clear guidance and help structure the session effectively. The pool, sauna, and steam room add extra value for those who want recovery options after training or prefer low-impact exercise.

Staff are approachable and available to answer questions or assist when needed. The environment feels clean, organised, and suitable for regular use. Like any gym, it can get busy during peak times, but outside those hours there is usually enough equipment to train without waiting long.

Overall, it offers a balanced combination of training space, class availability, and wellness facilities. It is a suitable choice for someone looking for a gym with variety rather than just a basic workout space.

Awesome experience at the Village gym, super warm welcome from Sammy and Holly at reception, and an amazing tour given by Michelle, will definitely be coming back tomorrow with my details to get a membership with Michelle’s help.

My boyfriend had an intro session with Neve who was so friendly and supportive. The staff really sold the village to us and we’ve certainly found our new gym! Highly recommend heading down to the village to give it a try, they won’t disappoint.

The staff are worth their weight in gold! Honestly, I probably wouldn't have joined and kept my membership going if it wasnt for the amazing staff. From the warm welcome when I signed up, to the encouragement and incentives of pool staff (Shout out to Beth!), and the amazing knowledge and passion of the PTs, particularly Adam who's definitely fuelled my fire about Powerlifting,l. He has built a programme thats engaging, fun and motivating, whilst also being specific to the sport. I would also really recommend Adam as a PT to anyone who's neurodivergant. He has been so understanding of my ADHD, and has really worked with me to build a trusting relationship and really get to know how my neurodiversity impacts my lifestyle, my training and my day to day life. Hes also good chat and doesn't just talk shop (in fact, he hates it!).

Never thought I would be a morning gym goer, but with an engaging and inspiring team on the ground, why would I not want to come in to train hard and make good gains.

My only complaint is the the membership cost is high! There is often broken down equipment, and regular gym users not helping to keep the facilities tidy. Sometimes its really difficult to locate the equipment or alternatives to broken pieces of kit. Staff are constantly busy trying to keep the place tip top, but when punters just leave stuff where they like, its definately a never ending task.

Very friendly helpful staff when booking appointment. Beautiful salon & decor and very clean.
Staff very friendly and accomodating.
Body scrub was amazing! My mums luxury pedicure was amazing! Celine 5*!
Defo recommended and will be back when in Glasgow!
Lorna was lovely! My wax was quick and much less painful than any waxing I’ve had done in Canada. Thank you :)

5*****
💕Would highly recommend The Beauty Store.  Lorna is very talented and professional at everything she does.  I always leave the salon feeling a million dollars.  She offers great advice and always makes me feel at ease.  Never leave without booking my next appointment.  Keep up the good work Lorna, would be lost without you 💕

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Absolutely Amazing Experience!

I can’t recommend The Beauty Store enough!
Lorna is an absolute gem! From the moment you step in, you know you’re in the hands of someone who truly cares. Her knowledge, skill, and attention to detail are second to none, and she always goes above and beyond to make sure you leave feeling your absolute best.
The atmosphere is warm, welcoming, and professional, and Lorna’s passion for what she does is so evident in every treatment. Whether it’s skincare, beauty treatments, or expert advice, she delivers perfection every time.
If you’re looking for top-quality service and results that speak for themselves, this is the place to be!

Very professional and welcoming. The salon is beautiful and makes you feel comfortable. Lorna was very sweet and made me comfortable from the start. The waxing was very fast and didn’t hurt at all.

I would recommend the experience to anyone who is looking for a beauty salon in Glasgow.

This is an excellent swimming pool, with child friendly rapids and lane swimming. The staff are brilliant too. Unfortunately too much time and space is dedicated to teaching swimming at the expense of normal swimmers. This pool has recently also been shut a lot off and on, which I presume is due to lack of staff.

I visit more of the Glasgow clubs and this one is nice. It has all the facilities you would need and the dressing rooms are vell placed not as crammed as some other locations.
The FT area is big and well equipped. The place is clean and the equipment is in working condition most of the time.
There is on the ground help with fitness instructors and several personal trainer also but if you check the machines bar code with the app suggested you’ll get a generally good advice and plan according to your parameters.
Parking is good although you’ll need your band to open the gate or the code given inside the gym floor area.

In my opinion, my experience was not good.  Why?  Well,because, the changing rooms were full of gum.  Pre-chewed.  The ground was not clean, there was lots of grass on the ground.  The whole changing room bit was very dirty.  Other leisure pools I've been to, have been cleaner.

The changing rooms were small, the family changing rooms were like a changing room for one person. There was three of us in a changing room and we barely even fit.

The lazy river was in such of a place, that if you tried to get out.  You'd just get sucked in the river again.  Also, the circle pool was right next to the lazy river.  That you'd get sucked in the river instead of going into the circle pool.

But we did have fun, I just feel like the sanitary was not the best.  No harm or offence intended.

My partner and I went swimming here for the very first time today. It is a very bright and welcoming venue and the staff are very friendly as are the life guards. However, there was rust like marks on the showers closest to the kids pool. Everything else was spotless though within the changing areas.

Regular changing cubicles, family changing cubicles and accessible changing cubicles too as well as larger lockers too!

There were three lanes in the pool but still a large amount of space for leisure swimming. The only issue we had was the fact that the pool water was freezing cold which as being someone who has Fibromyalgia wasn't at all helpful as Fibromyalgia and cold temperatures don't mix and it can cause a flare up.

But apart from the water being a bit warmer and the rust like stains in one of the showers? Everything was great and we will definitely be back! £10 for 2 adults swimming is fantastic price if you are paying as you go as well!
Great club. Staff are great amd friendly too. Staff make it a great place to be

On reflection, I left feeling really disappointed with my experience here. For the price and expectations, I genuinely thought the facilities would be in proper working order, but that wasn’t the case at all. The reason for my review is that currently I wouldn’t recommend spending your money here until significant improvements are made.

There were multiple issues throughout my visit. The whirlpool wasn’t working, no lights and water only coming from the centre. The snow room was completely out of order. Walls in the main pool area looked dirty or cracked, which took away from what should’ve been a relaxing environment. The big sauna and steam room were both far from hot enough but that could be personal preference, and the heated beds in the dark room didn’t work at all. The only space functioning as intended was the small sauna, which was disappointing considering the range of facilities advertised.

Even the basics were rather poor, the shower doors didn’t close properly, and there wasn’t anywhere to put personal items such as own shampoo, conditioner etc. inside.

Overall, nothing was communicated about certain facilities not working, the facilities weren’t maintained, and the experience fell far short of what I expected from a spa. I really hope management takes these issues seriously so future guests don’t leave feeling the same way.

I recently visited the spa for the first time, and overall, it was a worthwhile experience. The reception staff were very friendly and accommodating, and the facility was clean with a good variety of options. However, there were a few issues that marred the experience.

First, the jacuzzi jets kept turning off without any way to switch them back on, which was annoying as I was trying to relax. Additionally, the fountains in the pool were not functioning, and the window in the main sauna was quite dirty. While the spa itself wasn't overly crowded, there was a grown adult screaming for no reason, which was quite frustrating . It would have been helpful if a staff member had reminded guests to be more considerate of others.

Despite these issues, I still enjoyed my time at the spa and hope they can address these concerns in the future.

Oh, this place is absolutely amazing.  The spa is incredible with so many different spaces with different health benefits. My favourites were the lemongrass steam room and the snow room!! There were two different sized, extremely hot saunas, a salt room and a tepidarium. There was a pool with string different jets and a dark pool at the end with a surprise!!! That dark pool needs a railing! Just incredible. Loved the whole experience. We had room service and breakfast both of which were delicious and the staff were so accommodating, helpful and friendly. All in all, it was an amazing experience. Can't wait to come back.

Any chance of a family spa day?!!!

Disappointing. I booked this as a treat for myself and my daughter and it was definitely not a 5 star experience. Staff were lovely and helpful and the massage was nice, but the spa itself wasn't great.  The shower heads in the spa and jets in the pool were all rusted and dirty looking, the shower doors did not close, the snow spa was broken and pouring out water rather than snow (I had been particularly looking forward to the snow spa). For the price, I expected it to be pretty perfect and in truth it was fairly average.

Had a wonderful relaxing day at the Thermal Experience with Afternoon Tea. All of the staff were so friendly and helpful, especially Erin who checked in with us throughout our visit to make sure we had everything we needed.
The hot drinks and food were all fantastic and came out really quickly whenever we asked.
The dryer for swimsuits was really helpful so you didn’t need to take away wet swimwear. Will definitely be back!

I have recently transferred to the "Transform Clinic" in Glasgow for laser hair removal treatment and cannot recommend the clinic highly enough for its (1) excellent customer service, care and expertise in laser hair removal; and (2) the excellent equipment. I've had previous experience at a different clinic with another laser that was rather painful (and time consuming) - whereas the "Harmony" laser machine at Transform has literally transformed my hair removal experience - it's painless, super efficient (much less time consuming!) and gives amazing results. While the machine is a great reason to consider that clinic, Marie, who operates it and does the consultation is a true professional with great expertise in consulting and treatment. Her outstanding care, knowledge and professional experience have truly made my hair-removal journey a breeze and I couldn't thank her more!!
This is an excellent conference/ meeting venue, modern, light and well managed with a polite and friendly staff.
Great experience, amazing building, well definitely return 👌

I had a lovely, very relaxing place. Staff were warm and friendly and not at all intrusive. We were there for a hen do and got a package that included two treatments, afternoon tea and a glass of prosecco. The highlight of the day for me was the full body massage I got instead of two shorter treatments. Jenny did an excellent job. She made me feel comfortable, asked me at the start how much pressure I wanted, and expertly massaged away all the tension in my back and legs. It was a proper professional massage and she was brilliant.

I was here for a conference and didn't use the spa or eat in the restaurant. The conference facilities worked really well. Good quality projection and audio facilities and support. There is Wi-Fi provided but that could be more secure. The catering was very good. The staff were friendly and very helpful.

Was disappointed that  this place is advertised as a Spa. They have no sauna or steam room or swimming pool. I had a salt scrub treatment which was very good and done by a lovely therapist. Afternoon tea was very good and they have gluten free options.
Laura is a fantastic hairdressers and andcmakes you feel comfortable definitely recommend hairforce  hairdressers

The beautiful Claire is a joy as soon as you arrive❤️warm and welcoming and such a caring person. Then you see her skills at the end of your treatment and wow what a fantastic colourist and cuts your hair to perfection.  I would highly recommend and I'll be a return customer now after my first visit yesterday. Thanks Claire and team 💯👩‍❤️‍👩

I took my son here for a haircut 4 years ago and the guy who cut his hair was shocking lol the haircut was atrocious and my son said the guy was shaking. Now this shop is known as the shop with shaking stevens and we have a good laugh about it 🤣

My teenage son has Autism and after a LONG time of refusing to get his hair cut, we were recommended Hairforce.  He now goes without any trouble, he gets his hair washed (as we found he hates being sprayed with water) and then gets it cut.  Staff have been great (especially Alana) and charge a fair price.
Claire was amazing. Listened to what I wanted and gave examples.  Will be back in new year. Thank you Claire, very kind & considerate 😊 xx

Great service provided I had a problem with rosacea and some burst vessels. I had 5 laser treatments. My skin looks a lot cleaner and is less irritable. The service provided by the staff was top notch. Very happy. Would recommend. Thank you

This is a gorgeous clinic. The staff are very friendly, professional, and knowledgeable. Clinical Aesthetician Claire McCallum was so thorough and clearly has a wealth of knowledge to put you at ease and help you get the results you are looking for. Highly recommended.

Was in seeing Dr Emma for toxin and filler treatments and once again was delighted with the whole experience. The clinic is beautiful and clean, Dr Emma is professional, gentle and amazing at what she does. Would 100% recommend and I will definitely be a long term patient and would never consider going anywhere else.

I have been treated by Dr Emma for a few years now and she is magnificent. She is a true expert in her field. The quality of her work is excellent. She instinctively knows what needs done and the results are always subtle and effective. She is always complimentary and never makes you feel as though the work is doing anything other than improving your own skin and facial structure. I appreciate her friendly and professional manner and feel very well looked after by her. Emma teaches all over the world as well as addressing aesthetic practitioners at global conferences. You know you are getting one of the best with her. All of the Clinetix team are friendly and caring and it is a pleasure to be treated there. I would always caution people - if you want to look like you have had work done then don’t go to Clinetix. They don’t offer the overdone, obviously fake look but if you want to make the very best of yourself whilst still looking like you then I couldn’t recommend Clinetix enough.

The care and attention in prep for a procedure is top class. I had major concerns relating to any potential complications with dental implants. Claire, who undertook the procedure, had taken steps to alleviate this by liaising with the dentists and doctors at Clinetex to fully check that the procedure would be safe and produce results. On administering the procedure, she made me as comfortable as possible and informed me what was happening at every stage. She was very professional, reassuring and kind. The procedure I had takes a bit of time to see the outcome, so I will post a wee update when I start to see the results. But as far as my initial experience goes, I’d like to thank Claire and the team at Clinetex for making it easy for me.

Skin Consultation with Clinical Director Shirley, who came across as a bit rude during short consultation and with interaction with receptionist. Advice was to use a product that no one could advise how to buy. Still waiting for email a month later. Not worth £60 appt charge.

I was very impressed with the set up of the clinic but more impressed with the Staff. I had booked in with Shirley Nicol for my ongoing skin issues, looking for a magic cream or something. However Shirley was very honest with me and acknowledged that due to the multiple complexities with my health and other skin issues that I needed to see a Consultant ASAP. Shirley very kindly worked her magic and got me an appointment at Ross Hall immediately. Not only did she listen to me and comfort me as I was distressed ,, she then advised she would reimburse me my fee as she couldn’t help . Little did she know she did help just by listening and navigating her way through various numbers to get where she believed I needed to be. I cannot thank Shirley for her time and efforts , something the NHS has failed to do in 8months . Thanks so much for your kindness.

Five stars to the staff at Clinica Medica from reception staff who are so welcoming to Dr Basma Paulina who is very friendly and her private GP services for hormone replacement and weight management are first class. Highly recommend this clinic have attended many times and never had any issues.

I had dermal filler done here and will definitely never go back. It is badly placed, not even the area that I asked to be treated, leaving my face deformed. It’s also crooked, one side has a lump and the other doesn’t, it looks at the very least very unprofessional. on the day I specifically pointed out where I wanted it but the dr placed it in a way that tottaly deformed my lower face. I am very unsatisfied with the results and will never go back to this place

After great pressure by my wife, I finally made an appointment for a consultation with Shirley to consider the spider veins on my face.
I was placed completely at ease by Shirley who carefully considered and explained the appropriate treatment and she administered the laser therapy with immediate and miraculous effect. I was very pleasantly surprised at the cost effectiveness of the treatment. I would have no hesitation to recommend this professional clinic to all.

Well done ANNA 🥇🥇 🥇 🥇 🥇 your absolutely amazing human being thank you for going above and beyond nothing was a bother your doing amazing job & very much appreciated. Well done Glasgow Club Springburn🥇your staff are so approachable & helpful more than I can say for other Glasgow clubs... Found my forever club.

The gym is great , sturdy equipment . The classes they provide are fantastic, the place always clean and smell good. The staff are very kind and polite . If they just keep the  music down
And not put the same music for the  whole year it would the best gym ever existed.

Only just started using the gym here, which to be fair is quite nice, good range of equipment etc, and not too busy in the mornings. Where it falls short is cleanliness, the changing rooms and showers are pretty disgusting, and inside some of the shower cubicles are covered in mould. Been noticing this a lot with Glasgow Club facilities, hygiene does not seem to be a priority 😣

I went to the swimming pool today dam the staff who where there are soo dam rude ,I don't know how people can employ someone who doesn't know what Customer service is,am glad I come to read the reviews seems everyone is not happy about the staff, imagine last week i was there and my 2 year old didn't pay.  today i went there my 2 year old has to pay i was confused when I asked them to explain why ,they are said am refusing to pay soo disgusting, mannerless, they never went for training on how to work with people gosh am even regretting why i even go there ,the water was dirty eeeeeew.

I started back swimming following a long period of working from home and gained alot of weight and very low fitness level.
I was welcomed by all staff from reception to pool side who were smiling even at 6.15am in the morning.
The other costumers where so friendly and helpful keeping me right where everything was as my first time in the leisure centre.
Also provided support of encouragement in the pool.
What a lovely experience

Had such a lovely experience! Cara cleaned and polished my teeth so nicely, they look brand new. She was super sweet, welcoming and chatty, which made it even better. I’ll definitely be coming back and I’ll be asking for Cara every time 💕✨

I had a root canal treatment done here recently, and unfortunately the experience was quite disappointing.

After the procedure, the treated tooth was left with a rough, uneven surface, which caused my tongue to be constantly scraped. Within days, I developed multiple painful mouth ulcers. On top of that, the filling material had overflowed onto the adjacent tooth, which should not have happened in a professional setting.

I reached out to the clinic for help and am waiting for them to address this, but the level of discomfort has been extremely difficult to deal with.

I attended the clinic in Bath Street and was treated by Dr David Pearson. The waiting room is exceptional and very comfortable. From the start David explained the treatment and costings which I feel was competitive. The appointments where flexible for me and my treatment lasted 3 months which included two dental implants, composite bonding and whitening. I can honestly say that there was only mild discomfort for around 6 hours after the implants where installed. I was really surprised at how pain free the entire treatment was and David constantly reassures and explains as he goes. The entire team where good from start to finish. Would highly recommend 👌

Cara is amazing. I struggle with anxiety when visiting the dentist, but she always puts me at ease as soon as I step into her treatment room. She’s kind, understanding, and never judgmental. Her work is always top-notch – so thorough and professional – and she’ll leave your teeth looking spotless every time. I can’t recommend her enough – thank you!

Rita is the best out there. I have been going to her for around 6 yrs and the difference she has made to my self confidence is amazing. She is such a professional but is also one of the loveliest people you could meet.

Highly recommend the Peppermint Group.

As soon as I stepped into the Clinic for the first time,
I knew I was in good hands. Dr. McAlister always takes time to listen to what you want to achieve and explains as she goes. I'm very happy with my results.
Have yearly Botox appointments with dr c she's amazing

I have had multiple services done at this salon. I’ve had lash lift that made my lashes extremely lifted and curled. It left my lashes looking beautiful and I was complemented on them all the time. I’ve also had multiple facials that have left my skin soft and hydrated each time. The services were done professionally and I have already booked in for another hydrofacial! Highly recommend this salon.

I have had many services from this salon including Hydrofacial and have really enjoyed it. I can see that the treatments are working and will continue to visit the salon. It’s a professional and clean environment, the lady is very chatty and makes you feel comfortable.

Visited Salon today. Very pleasant experience. Received voucher as gift for 3 treatments. Picked back scrub, back/neck and shoulder massage plus mini facial. Was lovely afternoon. Actually purchased additional treatment at reduced price. Eyelash lift and brow tint, still trying to get used to them. Thank you

Having just had the second of 3 planned treatments I  must say my experience is much different to the previous reviewer.. I agree the shop is small but compact, clean and warm with 2 therapy  rooms which are private..

The therapist was friendly welcoming and chatty many topics discussed  which I feel helped in making me feel relaxed .. I felt my treatments to date have been  excellent . Good advice about post treatment care and information about other services/treatments available which  was helpful.

Already looking  forward to my next treatment..  Many thanks :-)
I just had a hydrofacial and lash lift  and I am in love with the results. Will definitely be coming back.

I recently had a Deep Tissue Thai massage with Maliwan, and it was truly exceptional.
This is my third visit so thought I should write a review.
From the moment the session began, she created a calming, welcoming atmosphere that made it easy to relax. Her technique is outstanding- precise and incredibly intuitive. She knew exactly where to apply pressure and how to release tension without ever causing discomfort.
What stood out most was her professionalism combined with genuine warmth. Every stretch and movement felt purposeful, and I walked out feeling lighter, more flexible, and completely refreshed. It was easily one of the best massages I’ve ever had.

If you’re looking for an authentic, deeply restorative Thai massage, I highly recommend booking with Maliwan. She is truly gifted at what she does.

I had a Thai massage here recently and the experience was a mix of positives and challenges. The massage room was spacious, ambient, and very comfortable, especially the massage table. The masseuse was friendly, attentive, and clearly skilled.

The massage itself was mostly relaxing, but at times the pressure was stronger than I could comfortably handle. I was reassured it was “good pain” due to the tightness in my shoulders and back, but I did end up with bruises on my arms and back and felt very sore for a couple of days, which affected my sleep.

On the positive side, a few days later I noticed that I felt lighter and less tense, which shows the massage did release a lot of tightness.

I would recommend this place for those who like deep, strong pressure massages, but if you prefer something gentler, I suggest making this clear to the masseuse at the start.

A beautiful experience — highly recommended

I had the pleasure of booking a Thai massage in Glasgow today and it was a truly beautiful experience. From the moment I arrived, I felt welcomed and at ease. The team was very friendly, incredibly professional, and delivered excellent work throughout my visit.

The atmosphere was calm and relaxing, and I could tell that great care was taken in every detail. It’s clear that the ladies working here are passionate about what they do, and I’m so grateful for the hard work they put in.

This is definitely a place I’d love to return to — and I’m already looking forward to my next visit.
Thank you again!
1st time going was really nervous but the respectful and chill atmosphere really calm me, the treatment was fantastic my back felt a lot better after leaving will definitely visit again. - Kierin

Just had a traditional Thai massage – the best I've ever had in Glasgow.

The therapist was extremely professional and clearly well-trained. Traditional Thai massage isn't necessarily relaxing in the conventional sense – it requires skill in muscle manipulation and pressure point work, stretching techniques and this therapist had this knowledge.

I often worry that the pressure won’t be strong enough, but that wasn’t an issue here. In fact, two areas of muscle tension were quite painful and needed less pressure – impressively, the therapist picked up on this without me having to say a word, responding intuitively to my reactions, my muscles repaonses and adjusting accordingly.

As someone who regularly uses traditional Thai massage as a form of therapy, I’m thrilled to have finally found a practitioner in Glasgow who truly understands the technique. This will now be go to place.

I wish I had caught the therapists name so i can book her again. She really was excellent.

Don’t overlook this spa because it’s in a busy city centre and almost hidden behind roadworks.
It’s as good as any I have been to. Very clean with low lighting and the massage and facial were amazing.  I feel more relaxed than I have in months

First and last time customer. Went yesterday for the Deluxe Pedicure for £62. The “shape up” left me with hangnails on 6 toes (I didn’t have when I walked in.)

You get a salt scrub in the beginning to exfoliate, then coconut oil on the feet wrapped in plastic bags.. you sit for 10-15 mins with your feet in these unsanitary foot heaters. Then a very unenthusiastic 15-20 min shin rub which I think was meant to be the foot massage.

I had a laser appointment afterwards and said I could not have all this coconut oil on my skin, she handed me the dry towel we’ve used throughout the appointment and said I could wipe myself down. Which I did, and put on my socks only to notice the painful new hangnails on my pinky toes.

I booked an appointment at 2 through Treawell for Padi&Mani package. when I arrived at the salon the receptionist was on the phone for about 30 minutes, although I didn’t wait for a long time until a nail technician approached and asked me for my name and told me that there was no appointments for me. They made me wait until the receptionist was done from the phone only to tell me to come back after an hour. I came back after an hour and a nail technician started filing my nails when I had gel polish on. She didn’t even ask me if I want them removed or not. She took two hours only filing and she had no idea I booked for toes as well. so eventually she left and called her manager to come and tell me that they don’t have enough time to do my toes and I saw the technician leaving the salin even before I speak to the manager. The receptionist had an annoying attitude as well.

Henrieta is amazing. Her massage technique and skill is excellent. She not only made me feel relaxed by the end of the massage but also refreshed. It was the perfect balance between soothing and therapeutic. She is highly skilled and I would recommend her to all.
Really enjoyed my appointment today at pure spa. Jennifer made me feel relaxed and enjoyed my facial. A+ service, would go again.

Brilliant massage here! Caron is lovely, and made me feel so comfortable and relaxed for my first ever massage. Really got into those deep knots and released so much tension in my back and shoulders. 10/10 would recommend!

Had a great experience with Caron she was so lovely and attentive. I originally went in for just a little relaxing massage but Caron found a lot of knots in my shoulders and got them all out. I didn't realize how much tension I was holding in them, I felt great afterwards.

This been my second time recieving services and I can't express enough how amazing I feel afterwards. I feel energised and my muscles feel relaxed which I expected coming back but with the face massage included this time I feel like my face is less puffy and feel much more awake. Recommended wholeheartedly ❤️

I had a great experience! The massage, with a mix of techniques, was very effective and relaxing. The service was professional, and the friendly atmosphere made me feel comfortable from start to finish. I highly recommend it! Basia has great knowledge and answered several of my questions. You can see that she is very passionate about what she does. Her dedication and professionalism truly stand out! :)

I had the pleasure to experience body massage with Basia in Baska Natural Wellness. It was  relaxing massage in response of my body that really needed to be look after special that a day before i felt a pain in my back and headache. Basia is experienced masseuse, she by first touch knows what to do and the same time she was asking what I needed if it was just head massage or back, neck and head.
The office is very unique, calm and pleasant with relaxing music. Location is just 5 minutes walk from Central Station.
I really recommend to experience the massage in Baska Natural Wellness.

I booked a 90 minute massage at Baska Natural Wellness. Located in  central Glasgow it was very easy to get too.
I was warmly welcomed and any questions I had were answered. The massage was incredibly relaxing, I even found myself dosing off, exactly what I needed. Thank you and see you again :)

I had the most relaxing experience at Baska Natural Wellness during a gentle lymphatic massage with Barbara. From start to finish, the atmosphere was calming, and Barbara was truly remarkable. She is extremely skilled and so knowledgeable, and explained everything in such a way that I felt completely at ease and well cared for. After the massage, I felt lighter, calmer, and deeply relaxed. I highly recommend this to anyone looking for a rejuvenating experience, and I can’t wait to return soon.

I booked a block of 10 post op massages with a different practice. I only came here as my usual place was closed during new year. This place was night and day. Flavia was outstanding. I unfortunately have another 6 left with my other massage woman but l'm going to continue with Flavia and just use my other booking as infill. She is friendly, warm, put me at ease, shifted more fluid build up in one massage than my previous place down with 4. Honestly, book it and you won't be disappointed.

LEMON BOTTLE TREATMENT AND CYPRO FAT FREEZING TREATMENT
I would just like to say I visited Flavia’s on 5 December  2025 and have been there a few times before I have used lots of different beauty companies for years and years and I will honestly say this lady is 100 per cent professional in every way Aldo the salon is immaculate clean and when you enter you feel right away your going to be treated with respect and not just after your money.
It’s very upsetting when people try there best and who are doing everything right there is always dishonest  not nice people who want to try and destroy someone’s livelihood
This is not a fake review I’m a genuine customer who believes more people should try and me more nice in life it cost nothing.
Flavia is a great women and believe me I would not settle for anything but  first class treatment and this lady certainly provides this service.
Thank you Flavia’s for making me feel relaxed and  satisfied with everything you have done 🙏

I honestly can’t believe how bad my experience was at
SB COSMETICS CLINIC. I was really excited to try a new beauty salon with such high ratings, but now I regret it completely. I went in for a facial treatment and mentioned several times that I have sensitive skin, but it was clear that my concerns were either ignored or not taken seriously. The staff was not thorough in assessing my skin type or discussing the products being used on my face. They seemed in such a hurry to get through the treatment that they didn’t care to address my needs.

The results were devastating. My skin started reacting immediately after the treatment, with redness, irritation, and visible breakouts that I’ve never had before. The next day, my face felt dry, tight, and even more sensitive. I had to cancel my plans because I didn’t feel comfortable leaving the house looking like that. It’s incredibly frustrating because I trusted them to use professional products and techniques, but instead, they left me with damaged skin and no apology or remedy.

To make matters worse, the staff didn’t follow up with me after the treatment to check on how my skin was doing. There was absolutely no aftercare or advice offered, which only added to my frustration. I tried reaching out to them, but the response was cold and unhelpful. It felt like they were more concerned about getting the money than ensuring their customers were actually satisfied and cared for.

I wouldn’t trust this place with my skin again, and I highly recommend people with sensitive skin to stay away. I’m now left with the consequences of their poor service, and I’ve had to spend extra time and money at another salon to fix the damage done here. The glowing reviews don’t reflect the reality of my experience at all, and I feel misled.

Avoid at all costs if you care about your skin health.
Flavia is an absolute magician! I didn't even have to tell her what/where to do - I was in heaven throughout the whole session. Very highly recommended and will definitely be coming back soon *****

i went with my mum as she got fat freezing Flavia was absolutely lovely she couldn’t be any nicer as i was waiting she went out of her way to offer me a drink from her drinks station she made my mum feel so comfortable and at ease and that’s all anyone could want when getting a procedure the clinic was absolutely beautiful and spotless couldn’t of been more of a comfortable experience definitely recommend

Went in today for a deep tissue massage and what a place! Staff are so friendly and professional. Also spotless. I seen Nook and she got to work taking away all my knots in my shoulders and lower back. Feel so relaxed and refreshed. Highly recommended.
Thank you Nook and looking forward to seeing you again soon.

I play a lot of sport and very often get a tight lower back. This was not the first time I had been to tiger Lilly, however it was certainly one of the best.

I had Carmen and she did two sessions, deep tissue massage on my lower back which completely freed up all of my pain. I would highly recommend her services for anyone looking for deep tissue massage.

The venue is very clean, the rooms are comfortable and calming and all the staff are extremely professional.

I will certainly be back when I have played too much sport once again!

I walked in without an appointment and was warmly welcomed.  The lady was very friendly and happy to help.

I had a one-hour full-body Thai massage and it was incredibly relaxing.  I left feeling refreshed and would definitely come back next time I'm in Glasgow!
Awesome. Did deep Thai for 30 mts. She did it for more than 45 mts. Cost wise affordable. More important techniques were used. Quite glad that we did it.
They talk you through the entire experience if you want, which is great if you’re not used to the whole massage process. The place is also clean and relaxing. Cool!
Absolutely loved my polynucleotide treatment from Dr Kerry. The difference is amazing!! So much more confidence in my skin, barely wear make up anymore. Brighter under eyes and happy customer! Xx
