Kerry’s expertise really show during her consultation. She is knowledgable and professional and really makes her clients feel at ease. We discussed my goals and my problem areas, and Kerry recommended a treatment plan with anti-wrinkle injections and medical grade skin care.

As always, a wonderful treatment with Dr Kerry yesterday. I am very scared of pain but Dr Kerry puts me at ease and delivers the treatment to the highest professional and hygienic standard. The results are absolutely wonderful and I feel I am in the safest hands. I don't think I'll ever go anywhere else for my aesthetics and 100% recommend Dr Kerry.
Botox in 2 areas, love the results. Kerry makes you feel at ease and very reassured. Booked back in for top up!

I have been going to Dr Kerry for about a year now and always have a great experience. She is knowledgable and professional and makes me feel at ease every visit. I’m delighted with the results and would highly recommend her.

Visited 10/10/2024 after initial consultation.

Beautiful salon, reception and welcome lovely.

Karen, my skin therapist was fabulous. As she  explained, my best option was a non-invasive, full face and neck treatment, spread over 3 to 6 months.
I was slightly nervous before treatment, but was delighted at minimal discomfort- nothing much for GenX.
Anyway, I’m posting this just one week from first of three treatments (over 3 months) and I can actually see beginning and feel a plumping and tightening of my face/neck.
Not cheap (£1800-£3500)- but much nicer than £6000-£10000 for unnecessary ‘under knife’ surgery.
Don’t leave reviews often-but if you’re GenX-women-near Glasgow- who would like an affordable rejuvenated face&neck - go see Karen.

This review is coms based only.  I have contacted the salon 3 times by text and whatsapp previously and have never had any reply, despite the messages showing as read.  Basic info request on my part, so would have took seconds to reply.  Poor coms puts me off a clinic, so I won't be visiting, which is a shame as ive heard positive reports
Stunning clinic and fabulous team. Professional and knowledgeable. Would highly recommend.
Visited the talented Louise for my annual eyebrow top up, could not recommend her highly enough
Would highly recommend, great clinic!

Had a 90 min Thai massage here and honestly it was amazing. The therapist REALLY knew what she was doing. I felt all the stress and tightness just melt away. Walked out feeling so much lighter and relaxed. Definitely one of the best massages I’ve had in a long time. 4th floor and they accept card payment.
I had a FANTASTIC Sports massage, felt amazing after! Lovely and friendly staff,  will come back the next time im in Glasgow!

If you like to have a great massage in a quiet eniviornment by skilled therapists, this is the place. Massage itself is excellent especially the streches. Like one of the reviews suggested, a bit more communication about the process would be helpful to avoid confusion for the new clients. I've become a regular whenever in Glasgow. Highly recommended.

New to the Glasgow scene- and this was my first massage in the city so maybe things that seemed ‘odd’ are actually normal.
The massage itself definitely deserves 5 starts, however I won’t be coming back as I don’t even know the name of my masseuse- they never introduced themselves , nor did they welcome me,  say goodbye or asked if the pressure is OK during the procedure etc. The ending of the massage was a bit awkward too- the person  said something very quietly and then left the room. I thought we are done so I started putting my clothes on, only to find them come back (after good few mins) with a bowl of water to wash off the oil of my body. At this point, I was ready to go so just paid and left the room but the whole interaction was a bit odd with no more than 2-3 sentences exchanged.
Now, I was there for a massage not to chat but right at the beginning I did highlight that this is my very first time in this establishment. And I’m afraid I did not feel welcomed at all. I have no issues with minimal interactions as long as I’m informed  upfront that the person is an introvert, on a spectrum or just shy. But without this additional input, it just felt uncomfortable on a social level.

Diamond is the best. She’s so kind and gentle lady. Even she came down to pick me up. Quiet and calm room, very relaxing massage she gave me. Recommend for all people who’re looking for good massage in Glasgow city centre.

Had an AMAZING deep tissue massage from Nanya this evening!  Nanya really got into my knots which was exactly what I was looking for! Lovely and very clean premises, and I was treated more like a friend rather than just a customer :)   Was my first visit and certainly won't be my last!  Highly recommend! Thank you Nanya and see you again next month :)

Massage was amazing! Authentic Thai!
The lady was very friendly and accommodative.
There was some mix up with my Itison voucher,  but the owner was very helpful.
Will definitely come back!!

Thank you Praan Thai!

I had a great experience at the Praan Thai Spa. I visited with my friend. I had a lot of neck tightness, which was reduced with the massage! I feel much better. We were both very pleased with the service - thank you!

Had an amazing back neck and shoulder massage yesterday. I have been waking up with headaches for 3 weeks, not today, I feel like a new person. This is a lovely and  calming place and I was made to feel very welcome. I will most definitely be back.
Great experience! The massage was relaxing and helped release a lot of tension in my back and shoulders. Nanya was professional and the atmosphere was calm and peaceful. I’ll definitely be returning

The 1 star is only as I cannot give 0 stars. Never in all the years going to salons have I ever been treated so despicably by a therapist or in this case a part business owner and never have I had the need to give a bad review.
I Purchased a groupon  voucher for eyebrow micro blading, made my first appointment and the therapist Nanda did not show up to the salon, apparently it was her day off but did not inform me. I left and made a 2nd appointment, this was then cancelled by Nanda as she was unwell. My 3rd appointment was also cancelled due to Nanda again being unwell. On my 4th appointment, I arrived at the salon only to be told that again Nanda was not in and did not think she was coming back to the salon. (I now know they rented space in the salon) After several calls where the girls in the salon were very helpful, Nanda called me with lies saying she did not have my number to let me know she no longer worked there and was renting at another salon in town. Even after all of this I agreed to walk up to the Gallowgate to finally get my treatment. On arrival she apologised for all the confusion over the previous 4 wks.......!!! Finally, after numbing cream for over half an hour, I had my treatment done. During this I was so embarrassed as she told me the salon owner who did my brows before was not good at her job, my brows were a mess and she had fixed all of her clients eyebrows....!!! Nanda then told me that to get this treatment, I had to pay a deposit of £50 to return for a top up which I agreed to, however, did not tell me that it would be another £150 on top of the £50 plus the  £89 voucher to have this done. I felt I had no choice but to agree or I would have lost the voucher and £50. My brows were a nice shape when I left but the tint she uses had faded by half in the middle of the brows within 2 weeks.
Again, left without much choice I made an appt to return to have them topped up as they did not look good at all, very patchy.
New appointment was made and on this occasion I had to cancel due to bad news, I tried to re-book and was told no appointments and since then she did not answer my txts or the answer the phone. Then I received a txt saying I didn't give 24hrs notice. My friend had a bad diagnosis that morning and I asked Nanda to have a bit of compassion, especially since I did not complain once for all the occasions she let me down. No reply at all. Basically this woman has no care or compassion for her clients and as far as I'm concerned, stole my money and got away with it.
I apologise for the lengthy review but in this case, it is 100% warranted as this woman is basically a thief and a very unreliable therapist I would never want anyone else to have to deal with.

This review is for Prado Brows who have changed to Prado aesthetics.

Had the eyebrow microblading done. When I went they told me I should have it 'topped up' after 6 weeks. They charged me £50 in advance. Went back today and they told me the £50 was a non refundable deposit, albeit they never told me that. Moreover they charged me another £100. So the repeat treatment was £150.  That was twice the cost of the original treatment. They tried to tell me they advised my partner by email. He has never received an email from them. I feel badly let down by these people. Clearly you need to ask many questions before you use their service.
I would highly recommend Prado Aesthetics. I got my eyebrows done today by Fernanda a really beautiful lady, made feel so relaxed and felt no pain 😊 I’m sooooooo happy brows. Thanks Fernanda 😊😊😊😊😊

I would highly recommend Prado Brows and Beauty, Nanda knows exactly what she's doing, she makes you feel so welcome and at ease, she explains everything in great detail, she is very friendly and so professional, I'm so glad I chose to go to Prado and have no hesitation in recommending her. 1st class *****
Amazing place and amazing staff 👏🏼 Felt so at ease when getting my procedure done and Nanda was very accommodating to all my needs as well and was very helpful! 10/10 will definitely be back soon! xx

I had a 60min float experience & sauna.
Anna was brilliant at explaining the process & keeping me at ease.
Very clean environment & helpful staff.
I’ll be back & would definitely recommend a visit!

Had such a beautiful and relaxing experience for my first time floating! The experience from start to finish was amazing. I loved the float room , dressing room facilities, and tea station.

Rosario was so sweet, welcoming, and informative, and is the reason I will be returning!  Could not recommend enough.

Thank you so much xx

First time floating here, and had an amazing experience. The whole place has a relaxed feel, nice warm welcome by Rosario on reception who talked me through the whole process and showed me round.
The facilities were amazing. Previous experience elsewhere was in a small, slightly claustrophobic floatation pod, but the spaces used here were roomy and calming.
Nice toiletries provided to use before and after. Teas/fresh water offered. Didn’t feel rushed after.
Definitely will return, in fact signed up for membership straight after!

Amazing float experience from start to finish. Sraff member,Amber talked me through what to expect and answered any questions I had.Float space is magical,loved it and booked another session.definetly worth trying.Amazing pamper session for yourself to reset.Thanks

Great experience in the flotation room which was more spacious than individual float pods I have used elsewhere. The guided mediation audio was great to help me ease into a deep relaxed state. Showers and facilities were modern, clean and spacious. Anna was very progressional and explained things well. Will be back for another float and try the cold plunge with sauna next !

This was my first massage (I got a full body massage) and I was a little anxious but Marianna made me feel at ease and comfortable. She walked me through the process and was very kind. Did not rush and took great care in what she was doing. Clean and tidy room with a relaxing environment. Felt very relieved after. Would definitely recommend.

I had an exceptional experience with Marianna. Had a full body massage and her attention to detail showed her years of experience. She made sure I was comfortable and listened attentively to my requirements. Great customer service and truly it was a great massage, one of the best I’ve had. The consultation was helpful as well. Would recommend definitely.

Thank you for your great service
Marianna is fantastic - got my mother a massage here and she loved it. Very professional and lovely - completely put at ease and top level service. Definitely recommend thank you!

Mariana is an excellent masseuse and is very knowledgeable in alternative health options. She is a warm and friendly person who really puts you at ease.
I purchased one of her massage candles (relaxing) and the smell is wonderful even before burning it filled my bathroom with a beautiful scent then using the melted wax afterwards was an added bonus post my bath experience.
I 100% recommend olive fountain

Fabulous full body massage this morning. You can really tell she worked on the areas that needed that bit of extra love opposed to just doing a set massage. I feel fabulous, my neck has hurt for 2 weeks and the massage has relieved it massively. Will be back for sure, already trying to book another this week. 😅🤣 Marianna also has memberships available for those who can commit to 1 treatment per month!

I have been getting massages regularly and have very high expectations when it comes to massage quality. I’ve been seeing Nicky at Thai House Massage & Spa for over a year now, and every single session has been excellent. She always takes the time to understand my body’s needs and tailors the massage accordingly. Her skill is outstanding, professional, and consistent. I always leave feeling relaxed and my body noticeably better. Highly recommended!

No other massage is as good as a real Thai massage. I was returning to Glasgow with sore muscles after my Ben Nevis trek. My back, calf, and toes were dead. Ms. Alin, the masseuse, fixed me in just 90 minutes. She is blessed with the skills. I am already boasting about her to my friends, and a definitely a must-visit place.

My other half and I booked in on one days notice and we were able to be accommodated. I had a 90min deep tissue massage done by Nicky and would highly recommend. She was able to tell my previous injuries and work through years of scar tissue. Will definitely be back. 5*

First things first..this is not a spa .. it’s just two empty rooms with massage bed .
I paid 50£ for one hour relax massage and it was just oil rubbing…
They don’t have clean towels, only paper to dry your body after the massage
The rooms are cold

Terrible experience, waste of money, I don’t recommend it at all
Great massage. Went for deep tissue massage following doing the great Scottish run. Lovely and fixed my legs ready for next run. Thank you.

Wonderful massage. I had been traveling, planes, trains, automobiles, a concert, 240 stairs to the Tower of London and in need of a therapeutic massage. It was just what I needed. Laya was lovely and very strong!
I had a massage today, the lady was so lovely and the massage is probably the best I have had outside of Thailand. (And im from Thailand)
I went to Glasgow and find this place for massage it’s very good massage and very clean and relaxing room highly recommend be back again for sure
Best massage place around by far been once booked in again great friendly people they need a 10 star review ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
So good. The only therapist that has ever helped my knee mobility. Friendly and professional.
Had excellent 90 min massage with May. Highly recommended.
May is wonderful and very experienced.
Friendly staff and a great message.
Lovely deep massage

I had an absolutely amazing and sensual transformative session unlike anything I have ever had in my 42 years on this rock. This is not an exaggeration. I couldn't recommend her more highly. She was incredibly welcoming/professional, intelligent, talented, and truly knowledgeable and passionate about the work she does. It really shows and I encourage you to see for your yourself, but read her website as she very clearly articulates what she is about. It's worth the read. Her space is very clean and comfortable too. I may have a touch of bias with respect to her decor, but I found that lovely as well. I honestly could keep going on, but I'll end with a thanks again to her.

You are a intuitive and wise soul beyond your lived years. I appreciate you. :)
If you are stupid enough to pay £350 for low-quality erotic services disguised as “tantric.” Then go ahead, remember after 1 hour or 1hr 30 it’s over and you’ve just wasted £350, it’s a pure scam!

This was my first tantric massage, and to be honest I was quite nervous and didn't know what to expect.
The masseuse was lovely, beautiful, calm and super skilful. The whole experience was stunning and felt amazing! I can't recommend bliss tantric massage Glasgow enough. Give it a go!

Incredible session with a lot of elegance, style and sensuality. Katrin has a unique touch!
Every time I pass through Glasgow, I like to see her.......
Highly recommended!

Undoubtedly the best tantric massage I’ve had thus far. A beautiful ,very polite and professional lady, the location was lovely too! The massage was perfect - she hit all the right spots. This was a full 90 minute massage and she didn't take any breaks. Still feeling brilliant. Thank you Pearl xx

I went for an Indian head massage which included head, neck, shoulders, back, arms and face. It was truly one of the best massage I have had in a long time. Viki is very professional and has very soft hands. I felt so relaxed and the feeling next day is awesome - feel re-energised. Would definitely recommend everyone to try this place and next time I am going for a full body massage. Thank you.

Excellent work. I got complete relaxation for my entire body. The girls gave me a hot stone massage and a facial massage. It was an incredible feeling, especially after a day of work. I highly recommend them. They are masters of their craft. And they recommended a full course of treatments to get results. I've been there three times already, and it's an incomparable feeling. I feel lightness in my back. Thank you very much.

Today I received this wonderful facial treatment for the second time. All the elements of the skincare routine complement each other perfectly, and the entire procedure, combined with relaxing music, leaves not only a beautiful visible aesthetic result but also a deep sense of inner comfort, which is just as important for looking and feeling 100% your best.

I have already booked my next session. It is never too late to start professional self-care, and our face and body will thank us for it.

I booked a hot stone massage and a head massage — and honestly, it was exactly what I needed. The warmth from the stones helped my back and shoulders relax almost instantly, and the head massage was super calming. I felt less tense, more clear-headed, and just... better. It's definitely worth it if you’ve been feeling stressed or stuck in your head. I can  recommend both treatments. With no doubt, I'll be back

I have been having lots of stress since couple of weeks, and was suffering from terrible shoulder and back pain. I was in desperate need for a spa day..I visited Sasha, she offered Indian head massage service that included back and shoulders massage and head massage. I felt so relaxed after the service, pressure was perfect, she was able to spot the muscle knots on my back and work on them .The pain has been reduced tremendously! Also, her hands were so soft ❤️. The head massage was so calming, could feel the instant stress relief !!
I also had a relaxing facial and it was so calming.
Ambience was very relaxing, Room was very clean, smelled great. She took care of everything.  Would surely go back ❤️❤️I would definitely recommend her!

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Relaxing and Professional

One of the best massages I’ve ever had! The atmosphere was calming, the therapist was incredibly skilled, and I left feeling completely refreshed and relaxed. Every knot in my shoulders was gone! I’ll definitely be coming back.
First time and girls were amazing we'll worth a visit.
Very good massage

I got the HIFU treatment about 4 wks ago and I've still not seen any difference or improvement on my face. Sorry to say but that's £400 I won't get back. I would like to add to my last review.  Sumera got me back in and showed me photos from when I first went, then today's photos and I do see the difference. Sumera also gave me a complimentary cyro facial which was very kind. I can not fault Sumera. She explained more thing to me in detail. Thank again.

Sumera at sculpt is professional , enthusiastic about her work, informative & caring .Her extensive experience in this field is the reason why I wouldn’t look elsewhere & will be back for more treatments!

I was looking for a bespoke service & I did not want to feel like I was ‘ just another client’ . Sumera has gone above & beyond to offer a combined service using various advanced machines to target my problem areas.

She listened to my concerns and also gave me advice and guidance on how to achieve the results I am looking for.

I have had 2 sessions of cyrofacial & combined my second session with HIfu. I cannot believe how quickly my face & neck is responding to the treatment.

During the session Sumera makes sure to cover every area of my eye area, face & neck , and no corners are cut ( as I have previously encountered in other clinics)

I feel very comfortable during my sessions.m & the results are showing fast!  Thank you Sumera & I look forward to my next session with you.

Really happy with my results so far! Sumera is amazing and makes you feel so at ease. Explains each treatment in depth and recommends what she thinks is best for you as I really wasn't sure. Amazing deals are always on as well so has worked really well with me being on a budget. I have always struggled to reduce belly fat and the results have been life changing so far.. 100% Recommend!

Amazing results from HIFU and Cryofacial. Sumera really takes care of you and explains every step. It’s a very thorough HIFU and Sumera takes her time, covering all my face and neck. I can see the results and they keep getting better every day. 5 ⭐️ Treatment and very central location and lovely treatment room. Cannot recommend enough. Thank you Sumera! X

I must say since having the combined Femiwand and m sculpt, I have noticed a huge difference. I think the combination of the 2 and having a course is a must. I’ve had 3 children and a prolapse and no longer suffer from mishaps when I am desperate to go to the loo. Everything is tightening up nicely. Thanks Sumera for your time and knowledge x

Been to Lisa on numerous occassions and she is always so friendly and professional. Lovely salon space and Lisa makes you feel instantly at ease. First facial with Lisa and my skin looks and feels amazing. Would highly recommend. Thanks as always!

I bought an itison voucher for a facial and massage with Lisa as i wanted to try somewhere different to the more well known spa places in Glasgow. I’m so glad i did, Lisa is absolutely amazing at both the massage and facial, I felt so relaxed afterwards and booked another appointment for myself and a friend straight away! I’ve been recommending Lisa to everyone, it’s so nice when you find somewhere like this that is great value and really makes a difference to your health and well being (I have 2 young kids so some time to myself getting a decent massage means a lot!). I can’t wait to go back 😀

BEST LASH LIFT EVER!!! Lisa really knows her stuff and kept me well informed with everything she was doing while also keeping me entertained with wee stories and good chat. I could not recommend a better place to go and have already told all my friends and family about how great Lisa's services are! I have never seen such consistently brilliant results. Thank you so much Lisa!

I’ve been to nails and beauty by Lisa a few times now, and every time has been amazing! I had never had a lash lift before and was a bit nervous as I’ve heard some horror stories of it going wrong! Lisa made me feel so at ease and explained everything to me before the lash lift and also step by step during the treatment!
Truly a hidden gem in the city!

Thank you Lisa!

Lisa saved my eyelashes! I went somewhere else and ended up with way too tightly curled eyelashes that were all crisscrossed to the point I couldn’t even get mascara on. Having been to Lisa’s salon before i contacted her that night and she was so helpful giving me advice on how to try and relax the perm and was able to get me in the next morning to try and fix them.. and it worked!! I ended up with exactly what I had wanted and what a good lash lift should look like. I won’t chance going anywhere else ever again. Thanks so much Lisa!

I received a very effective sports massage from Felix focusing on deep tissue. Sufficient pressure was applied and he was very thorough, attentive and responsive. I felt comfortable and safe. The massage massively helped ease muscle soreness and tension in the following days.

I received a wonderful sports massage focused on my calves and hamstrings. This helped to release the muscle tightness that I had been experiencing. He then worked on both my feet to effectively address plantar fasciitis related issues. He listened attentively to the specifics and my needs for each foot then tailored the massages accordingly, frequently asking if I was comfortable. I commend his services.
The Best! Leeanne is really knowledgeable and her customer service is 10/10. Been going to Leeanne for years and wouldn't go anywhere else

Amazing experience! Was quite nervous as I came here for my first ever (!) manicure, wanting chrome nail extensions. Beth was super patient trying to find just the right products to achieve the style I was going for, and patiently talked me through every step of the process & aftercare. The salon is stylish & clean, staff are super friendly, and walk ins are welcome. My nails look absolutely amazing - only problem is I'm now so obsessed, I can't stop looking at them! 😊 Definitely recommended!

Got a gel manicure with art and I love them!! I had Beth and it was the best nail experience I’ve had! We had a chat before to make sure I liked the colours and she was always checking to make sure I was happy and if there was anything I wanted changing. Whenever I get them done at mint they always last ages as well 😊 another happy visit!

Just a heads up to not go here for a builder gel manicure. I went here a week and a half ago and the nails started lifting within a week, and had started to chip off by this weekend just past. Gel nails should not lift that quickly - let alone builder. Bit of a red flag that the whole treatment was done within half an hour too. My advice is to go somewhere else!
Went to get my gel nails removed (they were done elsewhere). The price was reasonable and included clipping and shaping. Jodie did them for me and they were very friendly and efficient.

Best experience I’ve had getting a manicure. Lovely warm welcome from Claire, then Latisha (hope I have the name correct) did a fantastic job of making my nails look lovely and neat. I wanted to wait a week to review, it’s actually been 2 weeks and they still look just as good now. The product and application is brilliant. I’ve had gel manicures in the past that have started peeling off after a few days, but that is not the case here. I will definitely get my nails done here again.

I am extremely disappointed with the level of customer service I received in Boots. I approached a member of staff with a simple, reasonable question about a product on the shop floor. Instead of receiving help, I was spoken to in a rude, dismissive, and completely unprofessional manner.

The worker responded by saying, “It’s not for you to know as it’s so close to Christmas so we don’t use them,” which is an unacceptable way to speak to a customer. No explanation, no attempt to help, just a blunt and condescending comment. To make matters worse, they then walked away without giving me any opportunity to respond or ask further questions. I was left standing there feeling embarrassed and brushed off, as if my presence was an inconvenience.

There is absolutely no excuse for this behaviour. Being busy, especially near Christmas, does not justify rudeness or a lack of basic customer service. Boots is a well-known, trusted retailer, and I expect staff to be knowledgeable, polite, and willing to help customers — not dismiss them with attitude and walk away.

This experience has genuinely put me off shopping here again. If this is the standard of customer service being allowed, then it seriously needs addressing. I will be taking my custom elsewhere and would not recommend this store to anyone expecting respectful treatment.

I went into Boots on Leeds Trinity to buy a foundation. As  Chanel is my favorite brand , I went to the section. I was served by Nicola  who was so professional and very informative .She told me about deals to save money and gifts as well . I was very comfortable to ask about products which is the key point for delivering excellent customer service that I received from her. I bought  a foundation for my Mum .  Nicola is brilliant .She should get a recognition. Thank you !

Date of experience: 29/01/2026

I had a great shopping experience at the Boots store in Leeds. I was helped by a lovely lady named Hafsa, who was extremely kind and helpful. She took the time to understand what I was looking for and helped me find all the makeup products I needed. Her customer service was excellent and made the whole experience really enjoyable. Thank you, Hafsa!

Good store but VERY busy and a bit of a maze so just a heads up if you have anxiety like myself as it may feel overwhelming.

Also, if you haven't seen it the times are different for the shop and pharmacy. Pharmacy closes at 6pm, I found that out today unfortunately.

Had my makeup done by A fabulous makeup artist by the name of 'Emily" yesterday in your store.
I was feeling rather drab after my divorce & needed help.to get my glow back & the first step was through a new makeup range.
She found me the perfect flawless foundation, bronzer & lip tint.
I felt like a new woman once she had done her magic .
A stunningly beautiful young woman with an equally stunningly beautiful heart.
A lovely lady & superb at her job.
It was a pleasure meeting her , she brightened up my day ! :)

I’ve been going to Ego Hair Studio for years now and honestly wouldn’t go anywhere else. Haim is always so friendly and welcoming, and he really know what he's doing. Every time I leave, my hair looks amazing and I feel great.

It’s such a lovely atmosphere — relaxed but professional — and you can tell they care about their clients. Can’t recommend them enough!

I found this amazing hairdressers the stylist always gives me a beautiful cit and colour.
They are very professional and friendly and their prices are reasonable.

I came to see Rosie for my balayage refresh and I just absolutely love the results. She makes you feel comfortable from the minute you sit in her chair from start to finish and would recommend her to anyone! The finishing product speaks for itself! If you are looking for a salon where you’ll walk out feeling amazing head over to Ego and get booked it with Rosie! 🤍

I’ve been coming to Rosie for years and she never disappoints!  She’s super friendly, always makes me feel welcome, and really listens to what I want.  I’m so happy with my results every single time – she’s a true pro!  I definitely recommend her to anyone looking for a stylist they can trust, and I’ll 100% continue coming back  💇‍♂️💇‍♀️

Completely disappointed with my experience at this salon.
I showed a clear photo of what I wanted — a simple reference to make things easy — but the end result looked nothing like it. I’m not sure where the disconnect happened, but it was obvious that what I got wasn’t even close. I paid good money expecting a result that matched my request, but I walked out feeling frustrated and let down. I won’t be back, and I wouldn’t recommend this place to anyone who wants their expectations respected. Inexperienced!

I’ve been going to Cutting Room for a billion years and can’t recommend it highly enough. Matt is a pure genius and always makes me feel amazing. I always walk out feeling like a million dollars as well as recharged by the laughs and conversation. The receptionists are superb too and make me feel like one of the family. True customer service at its best xx
Charlie was very friendly & chatty, really happy with my hair. She really knew what I was looking for. I will definitely book with her again. Thanks Charlie x

Within 30 minutes of leaving the salon I went into two different places where I was complimented on my hair by complete strangers. I have never experienced that before. Absolutely buzzing.Thankyou Charlie for a great cut 😀😀😀

Disappointing experience. The lady with the curly hair at the front desk staff was rude and patronizing, making me feel like I was asking for something unreasonable when I wanted to double check the total cost.
Despite booking a colour consultation for a change, whilst appearing to try and as accommodate, they seemed reluctant to work with me to achieve the look I wanted, and instead encouraged me to stick with my current colour. I frequently felt I had to apologize for the condition of my hair as they tried to work out the "huge job" that this would be. In the end with the cost of the hair change nearing 300 pounds I decided to leave it.
I left feeling angry, sad, and embarrassed.
I had gone in feeling very excited about this new venture and left feeling ashamed.
I understand my hair colour is currently patchy after being done at home, but I was left to feel like I was asking for the moon the stars and all their friends!
Unfortunately, I wouldn't recommend this salon to others.

Had a children's cut my partner said my son moved, so it went up higher, but the whole hair cut is terrible there's no blending at all, he has block steps all around his head, it's just awful he looks like William the conquerer. I could cry we only booked here due to going away to see family and couldnt get in his normal place. We will be returning to his normal hair dresses next time. Not suitable for kids.

I appreciate all people have to learn but if having a trainee on the beauty stand at least have a professional working alongside. £9 isn’t cheap and when getting eyebrows threaded I would expect the person threading to take more than 3 hairs away, kept asking for more off but she was clearly clueless so in the end I gave up and have now had to pay again elsewhere.

I came into store about 9.45 today and I was served by a new starter, Kenya. She was polite, had a lovely manner, didn't get flustered at all and answered my questions professionally. She will be a great asset to the store.
Went into this store yesterday. There was a very lovely girl called Erin on the till, she was a massive help! I’ll be coming back for sure!
Was served by a lovely girl Sadie she was very helpful and polite. Highly recommend.
Betty at the Briggate Superdrug store was an absolute delight. So helpful and friendly and very knowledgable about the products. Fantastic service!

Bought groupon voucher with booked appointment 8weeks in advance due to going on holiday. Got a text message off salon 1 week prior to appointment to cancel due to apparently not working that day! Saturday 🤔 then went back on groupon and still have the same cancelled day with slots showing availability. Think reading reviews this is very common for and looks like happened many times before. Luckily got refund from groupon would never use this salon again.. shocking service and let down completely unreliable and crock story for cancellation. Avoid avoid avoid.

I bought a groupon voucher for Hollywood lashes for £23. According to the website, the full price of this is £85 (which baffles me). My eyelashes were okay but to be honest I was a little disappointed. You don’t get an option of what lashes you want and mine didn’t look that great or noticeable. On top of that the service wasn’t that great at all- the woman who did my eyelashes wasn’t very friendly, neither was she to another potential customer that came through her door. I’m surprised, because you’d think the reason they are offering groupon vouchers is to gain customers who want to return.

I'm shocked at all the negative reviews. I discovered this salon via Groupon and will continue to go back.

I've had shellac nails which lasted 3 weeks... possibly more. No chips.

My Hollywood lashes lasted 2 weeks looking great!

Booked online because that's the only option with this salon - their email link doesn't work, and the phones go to messaging. Their on-the-hour appointments were showing ALL available. I then left phone messages about 2 treatments for which I had Groupon vouchers. No response. Two days before my first treatment was booked for, a woman rang to inform me that the appointment I'd booked was not available, and suggested another time slot, which I couldn't do. This happened on a previous appointment, which had been booked prior to a holiday. I booked online, but the day before my scheduled appointment, I was told that there were fully booked that day, and suggested another day. As I'd be going away that day, I refused it. I contacted Groupon, who contacted the salon, and by some miracle, they could fit me in on the date I'd booked for! I declined. Deciding to give them a second chance, I made the booking for Hollywood lashes, but they let me down again. I don't know how this business keeps going, but I know they give preference to their regular clients, even if it means they have to cancel a Groupon client. If they don't want voucher clients, they shouldn't offer Groupon deals. I will not be returning to this salon, along with many other people who have had  similar experiences.

Groupon gone bad. They say you get what you pay and here it's bad customer service and a poor quality manicure.  On arrival I was greated, if you could say that, by someone who could barely bother to get off the phone.

The nail technician, whilst working on another person then asked me to put my nails in the soaking bowl.  After a while, I asked how long it was going to be and said that I wasn't happy about putting my fingers in solvent which were now turning white at this point.  She replied that this was their usual removal technique and she would scrape off the polish. It's not a technique I've ever experienced before, it seems to be a means of getting as many customers through as possible.  Before she continued with the polish she took the money for the removal, it's usual for payment to be taken after a decent service has been provided, not before, they have obviously had complaints and refusals to pay.

Why bother with cuticle tidying up when you can simply paint over them!  Although the polish was a nice colour it wasn't Shellac, which I had been misled to believe it would be on the voucher.

Needless to say, I won't be returning and will be complianing to Groupon about the misleading sale of Shellac.  I feel sorry for the technicians who are obviously forced to book in as many appointments as possible and to rush through the procedure. I've had bad manicures before, but this is the worst possible.

amazing salon with such skilled hairstylists ! I have been getting my hair cut by Rohan for the past 2 years and i will continue to do so for the rest of my life hopefully 🤞 He is so talented, lovely to speak to and does most perfect layers and voluminous blowouts. I always leave the salon with a huge smile on my face:) definitely recommend if you're new to leeds or a uni student !!🥰

This was my second visit with Rohan, and I can honestly say he has completely changed the way I feel about my hair. I have curly hair and I’ve spent years struggling with it. Feeling unsure, frustrated, and never quite satisfied after appointments. Rohan is different. He truly sees curls and understands them in a way that instantly makes you feel at ease.
He listens with so much care, explains what he’s doing, and works with your hair instead of against it. I never feel rushed or overlooked, I feel heard and looked after. Walking out, my curls feel healthier, more defined, and more “me” than ever before.
Rohan isn’t just a talented hairdresser. He’s kind, thoughtful, and genuinely passionate about making people feel good about themselves. I’m so grateful to have found him and already look forward to every visit. If you have curly hair (or honestly, any hair) you’re in the best hands with Rohan 🫶🏼

I went to Renegade for a curly hair cut and by the time I got home and my hair eventually fully dried!, I realised Chantelle did an amazing job with my hair with all the layers and rounded shape that brought everything together nicely. It turned out to be one of the nicest curly hair cuts i've had. I highly recommed Chantelle for anyone looking to bring their curly hair back to life again. She was also very accomodating and sweet!

I had Stacy cut my hair at Renegade studio. She was absolutely amazing! She was very welcoming and kind, and she cut my hair fabulously. She was super patient and always clarifying to see exactly what I wanted done. Thank you Stacy you are the best!

Highly recommend, I got an amazing haircut from Daisy yesterday, who was very friendly and patient. I was a bit nervous about cutting a lot of my hair off but she made me feel really relaxed and comfortable throughout the whole process, and now my hair looks and feels amazing! Cannot recommend more :)
Easy to find location. Felt at ease immediately. Great service. Great advice. Lovely lady who genuinely cares. Will be going again.
Lovely lady who gave a really good cut to my damaged hair. Good hair care advice also offered. I will be back.
Very nice and warm Lady, good cutting skills.I felt at ease immediately
Veronica is a very lovely and talented person will be back soon Tamara
Terrible quality of dreadlocks, had to take them out 2 days later, used very poor methods and lost out on a load of money and came away with damaged hair
I've known the hairdresser for years shes an amazing hairdresser and never fails to disappoint.  If you want your hair braided properly sunita is the woman to go to!

Did this place ever re open after been a gay sauna and the big fire when the manageress got killed in the fire ?
It was such a dodgy seedy place but brilliant you just didn't dare leave .
This business looks like is no more in service.
You guys still open
Hoping for a massage and sauna, their services were unavailable. I guess they were living up to their name - Spartan !
Very good nice an clean.fantastic pool woman are clean an tidy

Victoria is absolutely amazing. I completed a course of three polynucleotide treatments, and I can already see a real difference - my skin looks brighter and healthier than before.

The experience with Victoria was fantastic. She is professional, very experienced, and genuinely friendly. She really understands what I need, which is exactly what I’m looking for.

I truly cannot say enough wonderful things about this aesthetics salon. From the moment I walked in, the level of professionalism and genuine care was exceptional. Victoria was an absolute dream. She was warm, friendly, and refreshingly honest. She guided me with such expertise, making sure I didn’t overdo the filler and helping me choose exactly what would look best with my natural lip shape. Her precision and eye for detail are incredible, and my lips have never looked better. I’m obsessed with the result!

The aftercare was just as impressive. I had minimal bruising, and Victoria’s communication was amazing. She explained everything thoroughly, checked in, and made me feel completely supported throughout the whole process. I appreciated her honesty when I wanted to get more filler too soon after my initial appointment. This experience exceeded every expectation. If you’re considering lip filler, this is the place to go!

I visited the clinic today for lip filler and I’m honestly thrilled with the results. Victoria was very honest in her appraisal of what would and would not be the best treatment approach for my particular anatomy and I was very impressed with her skill and ability to create a natural looking result. My lips look much better but the result is subtle enough to not be immediately obvious. Victoria was so welcoming and made me feel at ease throughout the treatment. I would not hesitate to go back.

Victoria is great. I had a lip filler with her and she hasn't only given me my dream lips, she also sat for good half an hour talking me through the procedure and giving me an honest opinion regarding my current situation and realist goals.
People like her really make the investment worth it. I highly recommend her!

After so much research, I was lucky to find Victoria at Serenity Aesthetics. I have lived in France for the last 20 years and frequently visit my mom near Leeds. I can honestly say I wouldn't ever go anywhere else, I have 100 % confidence in Victoria, my treatments have all been fantastic, with zero side effects, from my first appointment I was made to be completely at ease, France is meant to have a high standard in beauty care etc but the standard of care and experience here is exceptional, thank you again ❣️

Lemeka did an excellent brow wax for me today - I'm so pleased with the results. She was lovely to chat to, and I was really impressed with her customer service skills - she was the only member of staff on the Benefit counter for a while and was great at acknowledging other customers and indicating when she would be able to help them even whilst in the middle of waxing my brows. She showed me some other products in a really helpful but non pushy way. Really lovely service.

As always my appointment with Chloe at the Benefit Brow Bar in Leeds was delightful and I am very pleased with the results.
She is a careful and professional worker, who makes you feel at ease throughout the procedure.
I highly recommend her.

MY Daughter fir her 15th went on Sunday 11am and Chloe was brilliant really friendly and did her brows lovely and her cousin also had it done after watching how good Chloe was. Great service with a smile and lovely chatty approach thanks I can see why you all get great reviews

Lenexa is a credit to the Benefit Beauty counter. She has amazing customer service, friendly, made sure I loved my outcome of my brows, and even let me test a few products and led to buying a new foundation and very happy with it! Thank you again x
Hannah - Boots Leeds Trinty. Benefit counter experience was excellent with Hannah guiding me and the two tweens with me through the products. Great Service with a lovely approach and a smile

Terrible tied to book an appointment  it requires me to put my card details in which I did 5 times my abd I approved it  would not let me go any further just kept wanting me to put card details in  I don't know wheather I am going to be charged  as I do not know if an appointment as been made terrible I am now going to have to stop my bank card
This is the first time I have booked with wax for men and will be my last no help at all

This is a review for Wowow - the women's section of this company.
Samera is amazing, always a pleasure to see her & she is the best in her field imo.
I had Giuliano wax my shoulders and back, super professional and friendly service, no irritation. Really happy with the results, would definitely recommend

I've been coming here for years now. Giuliano is always super amazing in making sure I feel comfortable and relaxed. Super professional and friendly atmosphere. Couldn't be easier to book and Giuliano always does a perfect job 👌.

I’ve rated wax for men Leeds and Manchester several times now having visited both and have just had a full body wax done at Leeds. As always the experience was pain free, relaxing, professional and quick.
🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 absolutely 5 stars every time, you run a great business and the many reviews on here show that.

Rana was really professional, kind and chatty :)
I booked with her after seeing some good reviews and they were all definitely accurate. I felt no pain and she did the threading with care.
I highly recommend and I will be definitely returning

I have had my brows tint and threading done by Rana. She always exceeds my expectations and l get compliments from family and friends. I doubt l will be going anywhere else to my brows done. Thank you Rana for making me feel good after a session with you.
A wonderful first visit to Shavata Singh in Leeds with the lovely Devinder. She was friendly, welcoming and worked wonders on my brows. I’d definitely recommend and have already booked to go again!
Rana took very good care and was highly skilled in shaping my brows. I hardly noticed the threading as she worked so gently. The bestt brows I’ve ever had! Thankyou

I had a lovely experience with Rana today who did my brows exactly as I wanted. Although I am very sensitive skin wise she was so considerate and allowed me to take breaks whenever I wanted to. Definitely will be back to see Rana!

I am extremely disappointed with the service I have consistently received at New York Nails, despite being a loyal customer for a long time. Unfortunately, I have experienced ongoing issues with almost every nail technician at this salon, with the exception of Tina and a young lady who wears glasses. The other technicians have repeatedly been disrespectful, including speaking about me in their own language while I am sitting there. On several occasions, I have recorded these conversations and had them translated, only to hear unpleasant and inappropriate comments being made about me. This behaviour is completely unacceptable.

In addition to this, my nails and toes have frequently been done poorly. My nails have been filed unevenly, and when I have raised concerns, I have been told that my nails are naturally wonky, which is not true, as I have had my nails done professionally elsewhere without any issues. On another occasion, my toes were painted very poorly, not close to the cuticle, unevenly, and in a way that made them look inflamed. Instead of correcting the issue, the technicians became defensive and again began speaking about me in their language.

Today I experienced a similar situation. I politely explained that I was unhappy because my toes were not painted to the cuticle and had been filed unevenly. The technician immediately began speaking about me to other staff members and told me she would remove the nails but refused to redo them. I explained that I was already late for work and even showed her the time on my phone, yet there was no understanding or consideration. I then offered to still pay for the service and simply asked if two to three pounds could be taken off due to the poor quality. This was refused until I spoke directly to Tina, who resolved the issue.

As I was leaving, I was told that I should not come back because the technician is leaving, or that there would be no one willing to do my nails. This was extremely upsetting and unprofessional. Overall, I have had problems with nearly every technician at this salon. Whenever I raise valid concerns about the quality of my nails, I am made to feel as though I am the problem or that I am exaggerating, which is not the case. I will be providing photos to clearly show the poor workmanship. This is not how a loyal customer should ever be treated, and the level of customer service I have experienced is unacceptable.

I went to New York Nails and Beauty this afternoon for a classic French set. I have never had such a beautiful manicure. Tina did my nails, and she was so attention to detail focused, ensuring my nails were perfect, and they are!! Thank you so much Tina and the team for your warm and welcoming hospitality. I more than enjoyed my experience at this salon. I will never go anywhere else for my nails!!

I’m in love with my nails!
This was my first time visiting this salon and I’ll definitely return. I came in with a few different reference photos for nail art and my technician did an amazing job at making my set unique.
She had an incredible attention to detail, was attentive and really took her time to perfect my holiday nails.

I didn’t get the name of my technician (she was young and wore glasses) but looking at other reviews it could be Tina?

Thank you so much 🤍

Ive had this lovely lady becky do my nails several times now and I was over the moon with them. Today she has done my feet ,not only are they the best I've ever had done ,but her effort and the pride she takes in making sure they are perfect is unmatched. Honestly she's a master at her craft. Please go to her ladies, honestly you will not be disappointed. I won't be going anywhere else. AMAZING SERVICE. IM ONE HAPPY LADY 😊

Absolute agony!! Went in for a full set, wasn’t asked to go wash my hands so all the dust got pushed into my nails, looking terrible. The woman doing my nails was squeezing so hard i had to ask her to stop hurting me, she didn’t, to get to my thumb she twisted my entire hand and im watching the rest of the nail techs they wasn’t squeezing until there nails was white with pressure. Reached out to the salon via Facebook no reply. Nails wasn’t applied straight which even she noticed. I started experiencing pain and my partner removed one, she has applied so much pressure my real nails are growing into my skin. Wake up this morning one of my real nails are hanging off attached to the acrylic nail. Nail art couldn’t even be colour matched she did blue and green and left me no option as “they didn’t have the colour” and as you can see in photos it’s terrible. Salon will not respond, disgusting and disrespectful people, leaving customers in pain and costing them there real nails.

Had my hair done today by Abigail at Allertons Leeds and I couldn't be happier! She gave me a lovely trim with layers and finished it off with a beautiful blow dry. She's not only a talented hairdresser but also such a lovely person to chat with! Thank you, Abigail x

I have androgenetic alopecia so going to get my hair done is a bit daunting and I've struggled to find a hairstylist who I feel comfortable with. Abigail has made me feel comfy from the start - she's understanding and empathetic whilst also not being too serious about it which I appreciate so much! 👩🏻‍🦲👀

Tom is such a fantastic hair stylist. Always attentive, listens to what the client wants, and gives his professional recommendations which makes you feel more confident. I have been going to Tom for a colour for almost a year now and it always looks amazing. I always feel very safe in his hands. 10/10 for Tom and his skills, I couldn’t recommended enough.
Tom is the absolute best. I’ve never coloured my hair before and based on how dark my hair was (the most darkest form of brown) Tom managed to pull off the unexpected. I am so glad I went to him.

I came in today for a colour consultation. I have bright pink hair and wanted to change the colour. I was very disappointed in the fact that the lady who saw me said she couldn't help me and that I needed to come in again for another consultation with a more experienced member of staff.  I took time off work to attend the appointment and when I initially booked the consultation I was told the stylist was a specialist at colour correction which was a lie. I completely wasted my time and will look into a more professional salon.

I have had Botox in  3 areas previously with Dr Andy.
Always with fantastic results.
On my visit today I booked for 4 areas & my lips to be done, after my consultation Dr Andy advised me that I didn’t need the 4th  area
( bunny lines ). He also advised on the amount of filler & the shape I needed to get a natural look to my lips.
All of which I was happy with.
He put me at ease & explained every step of the treatments in a very professional & friendly manner.
I am super happy with the results & will continue to visit Dr Andy to achieve a natural look. Would highly recommend.
I have come to this clinic now for over 3 years not only are the staff welcoming they explain procedures that are the best for you personally and the results are always exactly how I have expected 🙂
So proffessional, love my lips! Cant wait for my next treatment. Thank you!!
Dr Whealen was very reassuring and professional I was very happy with the results.
Professional service with god follow up. Would recommend

Even though I usually have to navigate public transport to get to the market, it's all worth it just to get my eyebrows threaded at this location. I'm not one to change places for this kind of service, so I have been loyal to this shop since I found it. The staff are incredibly friendly and accommodating. The wait is never too long, as you can always shop around the market if there are others waiting for service ahead of you. I usually get my eyebrows and lip threaded for less than £10, and you simply can't beat that price for the level of service you receive! I always feel more beautiful and confident after leaving. 10/10 for this location, services, and staff!
Although prices are reasonable, but, the lady doesn't have good hair cutting skills. Not recommended for hair .

I highly recommend this place,the lady who does the treatments is amazing, she is so friendly and lovely and professional in her work.  I had my eyebrows threaded and tinted and they were done spot on,I also had a gold facial which was so relaxing and made my skin clear and feel soft.  There is many other treatments here and I will be trying the full body massage and head massage next. I also noticed there is another lady that does hair treatments,styles and colour which I shall also be trying. One last thing the prices and very reasonable esp being in leeds city centre. 😀
She do not know how to give shape or do eyebrows properly. Will never visit again.
Very nice service here

Visited the salon today, my first time venturing out after a year of cancer treatment.  Felt a little nervous but I didn’t need to.  The team were so lovely, wearing masks and everything was spotless.  It was wonderful to be back and have my nails done once again by Inna who’s done an amazing job.

I don't get my nails done often, but when I do I always choose Eva at Beauty Assembly. She's so talented and really enthusiastic about trying things out. She recently did my wedding nails - the gorgeous golden cats eye (pictured holding a glass). They were so beautiful - perfect for our NYE wedding. And my celestial hendo nails where she literally repaired a nail that then lasted till I was on holiday 4 weeks later!! (Pictured against the blue sky). I can't recommend her enough. The salon is such a calming space as well. The perfect place for some time out.

I have been going to Inna at The Beauty Assembly for my nails for around a year and a half now and it’s safe to say she’s by far the best nail tech in Leeds. She’s such a perfectionist and my nails look amazing every single time, even if I just get a simple colour. I get the luxury gel manicure and it is genuinely worth every single penny!

I booked my appointment under different name and had my nails done by Eva few months ago.

She wasn’t friendly nor made the effort to chat! Also, it was very odd that I was the only one asked by Georgia to wash my hand while waiting for Eva to finish her previous customer. Other customers who came after weren’t asked to wash their hands at all by Georgia. Also, I have never ever been asked by other nail salon/ artist to wash my hands before a nail appointment!

Also, I thought it wasn’t really nice for Georgia and another girl (not sure her name but had dark hair) to unprofessionally chat about another customer who had issue with booking and had just left the salon. Very bitchy and unprofessional !

Overall, due to these issues, I have not returned to the salon and I hope they take these feedback into account and treat all their customers fairly and with respect!

I have been going to the Beauty Assembly for my nails for about 5 years and Inna has done my nails for the last year or two. Although the luxury gel manicure is slightly more expensive, since Inna has been doing my nails they are in the best condition and last so much longer so in the long run it works out the same. The time and care she spends on the cuticle work and the scrub at the end makes it feel like a treat to myself every month. If you’re looking for a high quality gel manicure, I would definitely recommend booking the luxury gel manicure with Inna!

Lorna is the best beautician out there!! I've been seeing her for years now and she is fabulous.  Easy to book, perfect service and always a good chat and a laugh!! Prices are fair and the services she provides are top notch 👌. Highly recommend booking with her! You wont be disappointed!! Thanks Lorna for being so fabulous !

I have been coming to Lorna for the past couple of years to get my brows done and I honestly wouldn't let anyone else near them - she does an amazing job!
The studio is always in immaculate condition and there is a lovely, calm, relaxing atmosphere. Lorna is such a professional and the conversation flows so easily, making it a joy to get my brows done by her!

I recently visited Lorna at Pin Up Beauty  had Waxing for Men, and the experience was honestly far better than I ever imagined. The treatment was pain-free, which was a huge surprise, and Lorna’s attention to detail was absolutely spot on.

She also provided really useful aftercare advice, making sure I knew exactly how to look after my skin afterwards. On top of all that, she was warm, friendly, and great to chat to, which made the whole appointment feel comfortable from start to finish.

I would highly recommend to anyone, thank you making me feeling smooth!

Lorna is the best!  I’ve been coming to her regularly for a while now. She is the only person I trust to wax me and she always does an amazing job. She is friendly and professional and will always put you at ease. 100% recommend ❤️

I've been going to Lorna for my waxes for a year and she’s incredible. She works fast but still manages to be gentle, and even when a spot stings she helps you through it like a pro. She’s also great to talk to, which makes the whole appointment comfortable. Highly recommend :)

Worst experience! Would give this place zero stars if it had the option. Firstly I asked for my nails short and almond which I always get. The young female technician seemed to have a problem with "short almond shape" and said no the need to be long so we agreed on a short oval shape. After she clipped them and I said I want them shorter she looked at me angry. I remained very polite and said thank you once she had done the shape. Once they was painted I asked for ten diamonds on each of my wedding fingers and when she asked where do I wasn't them on the nail I just replied no particular order just all over. She then filled my whole nail with chunky diamonds, literally like 20 and after I explained I only wanted ten she had a full blown argument with me. I tried helping her suggesting she took the bottom and sides ones off and she got my whole finger pulled all the diamonds off as they hadn't set and started talking in her language very frustrated. I told her I didn't want the diamonds on now as she was making it extremely awkward huffing and puffing under her breathe at me after I paid them £51 for shellac nails and toes. I will never ever return here. Customer service was the worst I've ever experienced!
Only 30 pound for a ombre.  They are not chunky, didn't make me bleed and the service was lovely.

By far the worst nail salon I have been to. The prices were very misleading. One area of the shop said 50% off infills and full sets with gel! But kept been told other prices. The poster had no terms and Co dictions and was very mislead. To add to that, the lady’s doing my nails were bother very rude, answering calls. Shouting over the top of me. Not only that, but they somehow thought my fingers can bend at a 90 degree angle when applying acrylics. Both girls were very rude when I questioned them about the pricing. They called the manager who came strutting in, and spoke to me like dirt on the bottom of his shoe. Asking me ‘ can I actually read’ the sign when infact 50% of 30 isn’t 22. Will not be returning again! Only came here because my usual was closed!!! NEW YORK NAILS

Amazing experience, first time going. I wasn’t sure how they would react to me getting my nails done, but they didn’t say anything or say no. Great attitude towards me and other customers, would recommend them to a friend or a family member. ❤️💅

My 16 year old daughter went here today and rang me  up crying and distraught. All this because she didn’t realise she had 10 pound extra to pay. They wouldn’t accept a card payment so sent her walking around leeds to get the cash, and kept her bag for security. Refused to let her keep her bag! Disgusting way to treat a 16 year old girl, any respectable salon would have either let her pay by card or trusted her to bring the money in. All they had to do was take her number and mine and it would have been paid asap. I am sorry if you are so desperate for a tenner that you would put my girl at risk. You are lucky I was working as I was fuming. Never again and after all that you didn’t even do the nails she asked for!! What a horrible place.

Just wanted to say did not expect this to be such an amazing service well done i would 100% recommend don't waste your time summer is around the corner!!!

Book Now!

It is truly shinning place.
I have had a few healing sessions there, and I have had the most wonderful experience with Kay.
She is so professional, kind, respectful and absolutely fantastic at her massage. I could feel her passion for work she is doing, and unconditional love to human being, she is giving. I can say that I really needed it!!!
Kay help me with my migraine, and thanks to her and her healing hands I could come back to my work.
It is worth the experience and I am so incredibly blessed to have met her.
Thank you my angel!!!
Mag

First class service and a beautiful experience with a lovely therapist. I was gently take care of and felt very well held by her. If you are looking to unwind from the stresses and strains of your life and to have a few peaceful moments in a warm and inviting space, then Divine Shine and the lovely welcoming ladies who work there, is the best place to be. Thank you ladies. I'm deeply appreciative of the fabulous service you provide and look forward to my next session.

I had a deep tissue/sports massage with Kay. She really knows where to put her elbow on and checked with me if I feel okay and what needed to be done more. She also did cupping on me which was amazing! The 90 minutes just flew by without me noticing it. Will definitely go back for Kay!

Kay is an extremely positive person who seems to pass it on to others. Her love for her work shows. Also, being a very experienced masseur she caters for the individual needs of her clients. I ALWAYS come away feeling much more relaxed and less tense. This massively helps with my Fibromyalgia symptoms. I wish I hadn't waited so long!!! I intend trying the other types of therapy that are on offer at the Cardigan Centre as I feel that they will greatly help.

I’ve just started a series of planned massage sessions due to my back being very painful and problematic.
All the team have been great at advising me on the best course of action, and today Alison was amazing! The treatment was great, professional and I felt 100% comfortable and already looking forward to my next treatment!
Thanks guys!

have been coming to Ewa for several years and I can’t recommend her enough. She is extremely professional, always takes an individual approach, and makes me feel truly cared for. The atmosphere at the clinic is wonderful – relaxing and welcoming – which makes every visit a real pleasure.
Eva was friendly and professional. I had a really relaxing treatment in a lovely setting. I will definitely be returning.

The best beauty expert in Leeds! I started to visit Ewa in 2019 when I had skin problems during pregnancy and it was the “love” from the first sight.   Her profesional approach, in depth explanation, incredible knowledge and open atmosphere made me trust her. This was the best decision as my skin problems went away. Now I only use skin cosmetics that  Ewa have recommended to me and I will never go back to the off the shelf  skin care products.
It’s a pure pleasure to have a bit of time for myself in such a wonderful place🤩🤩🤩

I have been a customer for a number of years and this is my holly grail of skincare.

The variety of facial treatments tailored to your skin type and recommended by Ewa is what will make your skin look and feel amazing.

Top marks for the knowledge and professionalism.
Very professional and relaxing service from Ewa.

I went before my holiday in July.  Hanna did my hair just as I ask. 100% satisfied. She give me a confident professional new hair style. I defiantly will go back. She is cool, we did not talk lot but I went for a haircut not a chit chat session. :D

I had a very disappointing experience at this salon. I first called ahead to ask if I needed to book an appointment, and the owner said I could just walk in. I arrived less than 10 minutes later by Uber.

When I got there, I politely asked how much it would cost to do cornrows (without attachment). She looked at my hair, didn’t respond right away, and after about a minute, she said it would be £25. I was a bit surprised by the price, so I calmly asked if it would be okay to pay £20 instead. She said no, and that’s completely fine, it’s her business and her price.

However, instead of leaving it at that, she became rude and angry. I explained that this was my first time ever going to a salon on Dewsbury Road to make my hair, and that I usually use home services that charge around the same amount. That’s when she suddenly snapped and started raising her voice, telling me I should “use common sense,” and going off about how shop prices include rent and electricity.

At no point was I rude. I came in calmly, asked a genuine question, and simply tried to negotiate respectfully. I didn’t argue or push. Her reaction was completely uncalled for.

If you’re looking for professionalism or basic customer service, I would think twice. Everyone deserves to be treated with respect, especially when they’ve done nothing wrong. The owner seriously needs to work on her communication and anger management.

Hannah is rude. I’ve been a loyal customer for over 5 years too, but I’ve just had it now. I never wanted to leave a review but I just feel like I’m not appreciated as her client at all.

She was sat doing braids for me for over 7 hours (she plaits slowly) and plays gospel music really loudly, which I found too loud and overstimulating. I don’t mind her listening to the words of Christ but as a customer, it’d be nice to be aware that not everyone wants their ears to be continuously hammered.

She always hands me the extension to partition when I’m already paying over £180 to get my hair done yet gets mad when I partition the hair too much, which leaves me feeling uncomfortable and awkward.

She also tried selling me a half used packet of extension, which is highly unprofessional because if that was anyone else, she wouldn’t have even felt comfortable doing that. Never again— wouldn’t recommend!

Worst salon experience of my life!

Summary: I won’t advise anyone with 4C hair to go this salon. They didn’t handle my kinky hair with care and the salon owner got condescending and verbally abusive to me for opting to comb my hair myself.

Full story: I came to this salon today, 31 May 2025, to wash, steam and get crotchet faux locs done. I had rang prior and we agreed for £110 (£30 for a wash & steam, £80 for faux locs). The salon owner was all nice and lovely at first until I politely told her stylist she wasn’t detangling my hair properly - it was hurting so bad and half my hair was going to break off. Rather than asking how I’d like it done, she got offended and walked away.

I have 4C hair, you don’t just rack a comb through it. I happily opted to detangle and comb my hair myself then call the stylist when my hair was ready for the faux locs. The owner of the salon wasn’t happy that I was making them look incompetent by combing  my hair myself rather than sitting there and allowing them mess up natural hair.

She got angry and said to me, “You want us to comb your hair one by one (in sections). How much are you even paying? Since you know how to do hair, I should employ you in my salon. As a Christian, will you do all the work you’re asking for the amount you’re paying. Tell me, I’m talking to you.”

“All the work” she was referring to was to simply detangle and comb my hair with care, the proper way - something I was more than happy to do myself btw but ego is more important than professionalism.

Lol, truth is, I didn’t have an issue paying extra but she clearly didn’t have the right skills required to handled 4C hair. I paid her no mind and didn’t respond to any of her abusive comments cause there was no way I was getting in the mud with a grown woman who resorts to abusive words in public. She said a lot more in Twi which I didn’t understand too well.

Anyway, I ended up paying her for the wash & steam only and went to get my faux locs done professionally elsewhere in a lovely salon not too far off.

Currently sitting in the chair I have been here a hour already.  Waiting for my install hair ready b it they still blow dry my hair which only really needed combing out. At present I have one braid in my hair waiting for stylist to deal with a customer who came in to buy products. If more stafff is needed should let me know as the price should be set and assured the timing will be around correct as we have things to do  I understand is a business then please behave professionally. I am disappointed I’m going to have to pay for a service that wasn’t carried out properly

Karen is absolutely amazing! She did tattoo removal for me over the course of a few years. She's very professional, friendly and happy to give advice.
Highly recommended!

Have had several sessions of tattoo removal across 3 tattoos with Renude with a gap due to the pandemic and they've always been absolutely brilliant. The new location (walking distance from city centre) is fab, spacious and very clean, both Mark and Karen have done sessions for me and they're lovely, really put you at ease. It's about as pleasant as tattoo removal can get! Best prices I've found anywhere in Leeds too.

Hi, I want to share my experience with Renude clinic. First of all I was quite unsure about it, but then I decided to took a shot and see how was it.
I went for the tattoo removal service. Karen is great. The service too, and also the prices are very affordable since the very good service overall. Waiting for my next session in a few weeks. Thanks you Karen.

Karen is very professional and does an amazing job with her micro blading. I have very faint eyebrows and was never happy with them until I went to Renude Karen has done an amazing job and look forward to going for my touch up recommend her and her fiancée. Mark gave me a cyro facial and was very welcoming 🙂
Really pleased with the service and also the price for the laser tattoo removal is great! Very happy to be using Renude

I’ve visited SAKS for a couple of years now, and Francesca is my go to for my nails and lash lift! Not only is she amazing at what she does (she’s brilliant at nail art!), she always has a smile on her face and is always there to lend an ear! I’ve even recommended her to my best friend, who is now a client of hers too! :)

I’ve been a loyal client of Saks Hairdressing for years, and every visit has been nothing short of exceptional. Over time I’ve experienced a variety of treatments and worked with different stylists, and the consistency of quality and care has always impressed me.

The team are welcoming, professional, and genuinely attentive, making each appointment feel special. Whether it’s a wash, cut and blow dry or a more indulgent treatment, I’ve always left feeling confident and delighted with the results. Their expertise shines through, and it’s clear they take pride in both their craft and their customer service.

I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend them to anyone looking for outstanding hairdressing and a truly enjoyable salon experience.

Excellent customer service and spa experience received. Today’s booking was a walk in appointment where we were given availability in the afternoon to receive a full body massage and facial Skin30 treatment for two people at the same time. We were received on time and had a lovely experience with great service. This is a very high quality for value and we would highly recommend Saks. The staff members were brilliant and delivered high quality massage.

Lovely atmosphere despite salon being so busy. Shannon took great care of me and my hair - explained everything she was doing and really took into account my hair goals and the current condition of my hair. Would recommend this salon and Shannon in particular to anyone needing some hair TLC in Leeds :)

Was looking for a last minute treat for myself and got a booking through Treatwell. Saks always makes me feel at ease and comfortable, could quite easily spend the day there! Great chat, atmosphere and service! Thanks for my beautiful Christmas nails!

I have been having my nails done by Lorna for about 3 years now and i refuse to go anywhere else. She does a fantastic job and I always receive compliments on how great they look. She is a professional, polite and friendly young woman who I would recommend to all. She seriously needs to put her prices up tho!
I love my nails. I was made to feel comfy and welcome in her home. I will definitely be back again
Fantastic shellac nails. Highly recommended. Will be a regular client.
Would highly recommend such a lovley person n great quality nails x
Nails look lovely, thanks Karl🙂

I had my first laser hair removal session and couldn’t be happier. Everyone was professional, kind and made me feel completely at ease
They did a patch test first and explained everything clearly.

The procedure was almost painless and I can see results after just one sessionThe space was clean, modern and comfortable. I’m really looking forward to my next sessions. Highly recommend!
Great place to get eyebrows patched up. Good pricing and staff are friendly.

Very good customer care. I loved every moment of it. Very professional service and all was explained in details to me before the treatments. Thank you Hiba Salon I will surely recommend and come back again and again.  I feel elegant within and outward too. Bless you all
I have been coming to Hiba for a number of years now and still happy with the service
£5 for a walk in eyebrow threading, was seated right away, really happy with how they look
Thank you did a fantastic job removing extensions, colour and cut, love it 🥰
Known this hair salon for years. Very friendly. Good prices, great advice and support from to get the look you need. I see them every 6 weeks for my colour and cut. Love going there.
