After months of just pinning my hair up and not really caring for it finally went and got it sorted. There was a hood 6-8' took off but now my hair looks healthy again. Amazing stylists and a very friendly environment.
My hair looks fab. Hair cut, fringe , colour. Absolutely brilliant even without make up. Thank you Sam xx

A very nicely decorated and very clean salon.
I didn't have an appointment but was seen very quickly.
I had my hair cut by Chelsea who did a great job. Also very reasonably priced. I will definitely be returning.

The treatment I've received has been amazing and Katerina is very accommodating. Kat tries her best to always work around my busy schedule. She always available to provide advice on what is best suited to me, with the biggest smile on her face. She even goes to great lengths to ensure I use the best products by ordering what I need. If you are having any trouble with your hair or skin, I certainly recommend coming to this amazing place! I'd give it a million percent if I could!

Katerina’s knowledge is outstanding. Professional and first class service with a honest approach. I went to Katerina for the hair loss injections, results are amazing, 3 sessions done and hair feels youthful and thick. In males hair loss in common, hair loss injections are a great alternative to other therapies. Thank you Katerina you are great at what you do!

Katerina was wonderful, generous with her time and knowledge and an all-round lovely person. She did a great job with my skin (deep cleansing / extractions) and I look forward to returning. Do not hesitate to book and appointment with Katerina! You will be in very safe hands :)

Had my appointment with Kat discussing my skin. Had a valued advice of what can be done in my particular situation. What products I should use and what is best to avoid. She is very patient, listen to every question carefully and provides complete very well explained advice.
Kat is very passionate at what she does, she makes you feel cared for and you just know that you are in good hands.
Cannot wait till my next appointment!!!

100% would recommend to anyone! Felt at ease as soon as I walked in, Oksana & Katerina are both very friendly and professional. They take their time so you get exactly what you want and how you want it. Definitely be going back if I ever want anything else doing. I absolutely love my eyebrows. Thank you so much!

Absolutely amazing experience!
I’m in love with my haircut. It looks even better than I imagined. Diana is truly talented, she understands exactly what your hair needs and gives honest and professional advice you can really trust. Highly recommend her!
The private room is beautiful and made my experience extra comfortable. The tea was lovely, and the salon atmosphere felt warm and relaxing.
The team is incredibly kind and caring, which made everything even better. I’ll definitely come back for more services. Thank you very much :)

Amazing salon with the best team. Been going to RMUK for many years now and recommend to anyone. I take my mum and daughters there too and everyone is so friendly and welcoming. Tim and Michelle are fabulous and know we are in safe hands with them and Massi is amazing with his colour work. The salon is lovely and very disability friendly. Always get offered a hot drink and a head massage too. 10/10

I have been a client with RMUK for over thirty years. Previously reviewed several years ago but I still give five stars. I have never had a problem with haircuts or colours. I’ve previously had a straightening treatment too and was very impressed with  the result. Over the years I’ve had long styles, mid length and short styles but have never felt uneasy about making a change because my stylist is brilliant at haircuts and she offers good styling advice. I also have a sensitive scalp and my stylist is aware of this and uses the relevant products. You will always be made to feel welcome, a very relaxed atmosphere.

Beautiful haircut with Tim today! Was looking for a last minute haircut and treatment in Leeds and am so glad I found this wonderful salon with such a kind, friendly, and professional team. My hair looks and feels so healthy and fresh for the new year. Thank you!

Got my hair cut by Bethany and I'm obsessed! She’s super kind, took the time to explain each step, and made the whole experience feel easy and relaxed. The cut is exactly what I wanted, and the styling? Chef’s kiss. 🥰

Just had my nails done here for the first time, and personally, I wouldn't recomment. The staff far too informal. When I walked in, no greeting or a smile, just a brisk:" have you got an appointment booked?". They have a good banter on a far too casual, for my liking, level, including swearing slipping in here and there, while clients around. Like a bunch of trainees at the end of a full year training, where they know each other a tad too much, and are slowly getting bored of doing the job and being stuck together in one place.
My consultant, very lovely, but also somewhat inexperienced. Little pride for the work, little constructive criticism from colleagues, and when the attention to detail was lacking, and I pointed it out- she was genuinely surprised, and unaware. She couldn't see the issue. I suppose, when in Rome...-not a place for growth or development nor seeing good customer care in practice.
The job got done, reasonably well (one thumb nail didnt get cut, and disnt get stuck, it seems, as has come off when I got home) - edges still not buffed to even, in places bits missed out on the white, in places uneven white at the edge, to me, not enough attention to detail.... tried to take a couple of pic to show what I mean. The nails should be smooth and perfect.
I don't think I will be coming back, as ,try as I might, the environment and the stuffy room, made me rather uncomfortable. There was also a distinct smell in the room, nothing to do with the nails, more like a mix of damp and diy amonium hair dye, that felt rather intrusive after a short while, and you're there for over 1h. I don't think the staf notice anymore. Just somewhat disappointing experience.
Had my hair done by emilie today. Very professional, friendly, good to talk to and checked her work in detail to ensure she did a great job. I’m very happy with the service, definitely recommend ☺️

I would like to say a huge thank you to Maisie 🥰 it’s the first time she has done my lashes today  , and wow I got exactly what I wanted and they look amazing 🥰   So attentive to detail thank you so much , rebooked and see you again soon … Marie  xxx
First time getting my nails done at Vanilla, Molly was absolutely lovely and did a great job. Love my nails

Just had the pleasure of having my nails done here.  Amazing,  kind and very relaxed atmosphere.  Soon as entered the place was made very welcome and put at ease.

Cannot complement them enough.  Definitely be recommending you to fellow community at large.  Thank you.

Taken me ages to write this as I hate to leave bad reviews but it was truly awful.
Most painful wax I've ever had.
Not sure if they use a different type of wax than I'm used to, but I was thinking of calling it off even at the calves, it was truly agonising.
I was terrified for my labia, felt like they were sustaining genuine harm.
If I had been raised to be more outspoken, I would have stopped the wax and just gone home. I kept thinking I need to stop this before she causes a serious issue, but I didn't dare speak up. I did mention a few times that it was a lot more pain than I was used to with other waxes, I guess that was my subtle way of seeing if she would offer to stop, but I should have been a lot more direct.
My intimate area was covered in swelling and bruising for days after, not ideal for a holiday.
It looked beaten up and abused.
I ended up getting folliculitis all over my bum cheeks and legs, had to rush and find a pharmacist who would sell me antibiotic ointment.
My hair was long but I did ask if I ought to shorten it to an appropriate length, was told no.
It's put me off getting waxed, I can't see myself daring to do it again.
I've never had an issue before, but I don't want to risk harming my body like this again.
Sorry to write a bad review but this cost me so much stress and worry, what with going away covered in infected folliculitis and bruises, and I just need to offer my perspective.
I did take photos but obviously can't add them due to the intimate nature, but trust, it was quite horrifying.
Also another thing I felt quite rushed and ended up with a different wax to the one I had intended on getting when I went in, which was a little disappointing but not the end of the world. I think she just presumed I wanted the most popular one.

Eyebrows their way.

Was looking for a new salon for eyebrows, sadly Inches was not it. When I tried to explain what I wanted and liked, the owner (who was doing my eyebrows) talked all over me and didn't listen. When I asked for a mirror so I could explain, her response was "I don't have a mirror". I was trying to explain that I liked them to be straight rather than arched and was waiting for the hair to grow back. I also said I liked them thin at the ends. Her advice was not to go thin at the ends as it would thin them out (my eyebrows, so if I want them thin, that's my choice). It took a while for her to do them and then she lathered over some white stuff and asked me to take a look in the mirror in the reception area. Why you'd put your clients through the humiliation of looking at their lathered eyebrows in public view is beyond me. She had done exactly the opposite of what I asked....arched and thick at the end. She also started waxing areas of my chin without asking! Finally, she spent time telling me why hot wax was not good...I've been hot waxing my bikini area for 15+ years, and it works for me. It seems this is not a salon that is evolving with the times.

My advice: you should always listen to your clients and try and do what they ask, rather than what you want.

Best in Leeds, hands down. Inches have looked after me and my friends since we were in high school. 9 years later and they have never disappointed us. I wouldn't dare go anywhere else, we are well looked after by Michelle and Natalie.
No judgement at all, just care and love within the salon.

I highly recommend this salon and especially their waxing specialist, Anna! I'd never had full body waxing done professionally before but decided to treat myself now that lockdown is finally lifting. Anna totally put me at ease, I hardly felt a thing, and I'm just loving the silky smoothness. So much better than shaving and creams! She’s so chatty too, which I really liked. The clinic is very welcoming and friendly too and the prices are very reasonable, especially for the city centre.

Michelle is amazing.
Waxes thoroughly and professionally.
As a male I don't want to look over-groomed but Michelle finds the right balance and I pay a fair and ethical price
So many salons are over-priced and rip you off but not this one.
I reccomend this place, no complaints.

I would also like to raise concerns regarding pharmacist, Charlie. His attitude towards patients is consistently unpleasant and unprofessional. When speaking to people over the phone, his manner is abrupt, authoritarian, and dismissive. In contrast, when dealing with people in person, he remains largely silent but appears to listen in on conversations in a way that feels uncomfortable and inappropriate.

This behaviour creates an intimidating environment for both patients and staff and falls well below the standard of professionalism expected within a pharmacy setting.

My friend suffered racial discrimination from Estee Laudre, a white tall girls was so gross, so rude. We bought 10 packs. She made us feel like we were beggars. On the contrary, the Chanel girl is so so nice. Will never buy beater Lauder from Leeds city center boots again.   Anyway the set on promotion was not good at all, cheap low effection stuff
The most horrible pharmacist ever. I have had bad experiences both times trying to get medication. She was rude, impatient, judgmental and seemed miserable.

Elaine in Boots Pharmacy at Leeds City Station is an absolute star!…She went “above and beyond” to help me sort out my daily meds after I’d been caught without them due to my dad falling ill and me staying in Leeds whilst he receives end of life care. She was empathetic and compassionate, caring and friendly - all very much appreciated!  Thank you Elaine!
Useless people behind the counter. Tried to buy some pain killers but got a non qualified idiot who asked me stupid questions to the point I walked out. Don't go there !

I love going to Linzi's salon for various beauty treatments. She is friendly and super professional, and her treatment room feels comfortable and safe. Linzi creates a relaxing environment and does a great job with each treatment. I always leave feeling relaxed and that little bit more confident!
Linzi’s salon is a calm tranquil environment to fully relax while enjoying one of her treatments. Linzi does a fabulous job and I love leaving feeling relaxed and refreshed.

If you are looking for a great place to be pampered I highly recommend using Linzi's beauty salon. I love her pedicures with the great choice of nail colours but she also offers a wide range of other treatments. Linzi is professional and very friendly and has made her treatment room feel comfortable as well as Covid safe.

Lizzie is brilliant. She is very friendly and personable. During massages she was intricate and allowed me to relax. Waxing is always professional and accurate. I LOVE her pedicures too. What a treat.
Amazing massages. Get rid of all my knots. Have already recommended Linzi to my friends!!

She is very professional and an amazing person. Highly recommended! I had my eyebrows done by her and they look fantastic. She also bleached my hair to achieve an ash blonde color, and now I finally have my dream color.😍😍

The store has a foul odour and the owner breath is awful especially when she is close to your face, the entire store is very unhygienic and I do not recommend. She had extremely high prices due to her “incredible expertise” however this was not true, she cannot thread eyebrows at all, all she does is pluck the eyebrows, my eyebrows were left crooked and barely visible, when I told her to thread instead of pluck, she argued she was threading when I could feel her plucking my eyebrows. Awful experience, she has terrible attitude and service, do not recommend.

Nancy is so good and professional, I did cut color and highlight and style is perfect my family and I really love it, highly recommended.
All staff are very friendly and polite. ♥️

I have done hair coloring last year and just did my hair cutting and  eye brow threading today!

Was an amazing experience  with great perfection
Changed my look with a  stunning hairstyle 💇‍♀️

Even when they did the eyebrows threading, with perfect shape which matches the best for my face
First time, I ever met a beautician with such great patience , perfection and with great skills to make the best look for their customers
My girlfriend had her highlighted by Nancy , and she looks absolutely stunning! Nancy did an amazing job

I've been having skin treatments with Kat for months now, she really knows her stuff! Her skin advice and treatment recommendations are always spot on and I really enjoy having them. Being someone who suffers from rosacea I can definitely say my skin has improved so much. If your looking for a new skin treatment Kat is definitely your lady! Many thanks as always xx

I have been going to Kat for over 20 years (sorry that ages us!).
The service she offers is exceptional. I get regular waxing treatments but over the years have had, facials, nails you name it! Every service she offers she carries out with care, a smile and a friendly chat.
The fact Kat has been my beautician for over 20 years speaks for itself.
She even did all my treatments for my wedding!
Highly recommend a visit.  Becs

I love Urban Beauty! I have been coming for years and it’s like hanging out with the girls! Everyone is so friendly and professional and they look after you always. Kat always gives me nails to show off and Lydia has given me lashes to die for. As a natural redhead whose colour has faded gradually over time I have always worried about finding a colour that works...  well hello Evie... she is a total star... not only has she controlled my frizz with her keratin treatment but she has found my colour for me. She is very honest about what is and is not possible depending on your hair type and my vibrant red is a game changer .. I love it... could not recommend Evie and the girls enough ❤️
I’ve been coming to Kat to get my nails done for years and years! The whole experience is excellent: the chat, the vibes and the quality of the nails is 10 out of 10. Love it!

I’ve been getting my nails done by Kat for a few months and would definitely recommend! I saw a post Kat made about welcoming new mums and babies for a pamper - which as a new mum is definitely what I needed! She welcomes me and my baby every few weeks, and was even able to extend my appointment when my baby needed to settle on me. Kat always does an amazing job and is so lovely, I’ll be looking at getting more treatments in the future :)

Had my hair dyed at SC Glamour today and I’m so impressed! helped my Aunt and me pick the perfect shade and the colour for our hair
turned out beautiful and exactly what I wanted. The staff were lovely, the salon was clean, and my hair still feels super healthy. Highly recommend!

I had a balayage done recently and cannot explain how happy I am with the outcome the colour is better than I thought it would be🥰✨☺️. I had so many compliments since my new hair💕. I would definitely recommend to all my friends and family

I recently had the pleasure of visitingSC Glamour to get my highlights done. Now long story short,  I am not a new customer here. I've been getting various services done for ma  ny years now and I always always come out a happy bunny. People often compliment me and I recommend SC glamour to them such that, everytime I visit, I meet at least 2/3 ladies I know 🤣. Shahida is an amazing person inside out and she ensures she goes that extra mile to keep her customers happy.  Aman does threading really well and I was specially impressed with Heero, the hair specialist. She gave me top tips on how to look after my hair and it made total sense. I also bought the in-house spray on conditioner which I loved as it made my hair super soft and silky. Thank you ladies, I hope all your hard work makes you proud of yourself every single day🥰🥰🥰

Had  a wash and cut today which was much needed after so long , brilliant hair wash as well as cut, gave my neglected thin hair the lift and volume it needed, defo will be returning back. Excellent service would highly recommend!

I recently had my hair colour done here and I am getting compliments everyday Shahida has so much experience in doing hair you can trust her with anything hair related she will never disappoint you.😍💕❤️

After travelling to Manchester and London for the past several years for skin treatments with other practitioners, I decided to attend Skin Doctor Clinics, Leeds to see Dr Saleena. As well as the location being ideal, I had researched Saleena’s work and felt confident to trust her expertise.
Each appointment I have attended, Saleena and the staff have been extremely welcoming, reassuring and professional. Her knowledge and outlook is excellent as well as reassuring. I’m so pleased I made the change to Saleena and would highly recommend the clinic to all, especially if you are particular about facial treatments and maintain your look to high standards!

Rhyse is a fantastic practitioner, super warm and friendly and also very professional. The hydrafacial and hydraneedling I had felt like a real treat and I've noticed a massive improvement in my skin. Looking forward to more treatments in future and would recommend to anyone!

I've been seeing Holly for several months and she's worked wonders on my skin! She's incredibly knowledgeable, yet explains things so clearly /thoroughly ... so I can understand what's what! Her warm energy is so calming and I love going to see for my treatment (and a giggle!). Would highly recommend.

I had a lovely relaxing facial with Chloe. My first time at this clinic and I will definitely be returning. My skin was immediately brighter and over the next few days I noticed the texture of my skin had also improved. Thank you!

I've been coming to Skin Doctor in Leeds for a couple of years now and wholeheartedly want to recommend the lovely Rhyse. Aswell as being someone I love to chat to, she has a wealth of experience and knowledge - I completely trust her with all procedures I've had done. I can't write a review without acknowledging Dr. Saleena too... the best in the business! Also front of house Lucy for being so welcoming. Thanks guys, my skin has never been better and I'm always receiving such a lovely compliments.
Made me feel like the girl I am on the inside
WercS
Had a brilliant experience having my hair washed and cut, absolutely love it!

Lisa is the best hairdresser, I’ve been going to mutu for 13 years and would never go anywhere else. Lisa managed to get me from black box dye to blonde in 4 sessions while keeping my hair healthy and long 🥰
My first time at a hairdressers and I was so nervous. The staff made me comfortable and Lisa did an amazing job to make my hair look beautiful. I would wholeheartedly recommend this place to anyone!

Really annoyed! I've let some time pass before writing this review, hoping I'd think my hair wasn't so bad. But no. Haircut is the worst I've had in years. Been using this salon for an absolute age but have seen standards decline massively, but continued to go, because I had a favourite stylist who has now moved on.

Have never been a fan of Lisa salon owner. She's unpleasant, or artificially polite, and just makes me feel on edge. Bit of matriarch energy maybe? Just odd on the phone and in person. Not sure why she says 'yes with Lisa it's...' instead of saying 'with me...'

Had a different stylist on my last visit, and she's left my hair feeling like l let a 5 year old get happy with playing hairdresser! I'm a grown woman, so a bad haircut isn't as forgiving!

I get it! Everyone is stressed about the economy and life right now. But when you're wanting a pamper and paying steep prices, you want what you pay for!

I overlooked the entire experience on my last visit. From a shockingly dirty, yes dirty, and cluttered room where they wash hair, to a stylist that was insanely rushed when doing my hair (she must have knocked me at least 6 times!), and who was so zoned out, huffy puffy and fed up, I had to tell her a gazillion times what I wanted, and eventually gave up! She was clearly booked back to back which is always annoying! Doesn't make for a relaxing experience especially when your stylist is running around knocking you throughout! Oh and, my hair was washed before the stylist came to see my hair and ask what I wanted, which up until this visit, was standard protocol!

Just a God awful experience! Don't pay for a pamper to feel stressed. I left very stressed, wasn't particularly pleased with my haircut at the time, but couldn't wait to get out of there, won't be returning. No one wants a butchered look!

Sadly my time to see if I can find a new stylist!

Lastly, I thinks it's absolutely ridiculous that the price of a trim is the same as a cut and blow dry! And the price of a hair colour doesn't include hair drying?! Make it make sense!

Fantastic hairdressers. Lisa works absolute wonders with my hair. I walk out feeling as though I've been really pampered and looked after. I've been a regular customer for 10 years plus and wouldn't go anywhere else.

I’ve had both hydrafacials and microneedling at the clinic, and every treatment has left my skin feeling incredible. It looks so plump, fresh, and flawless afterwards! I’m already booked in for my next sessions.

The girls at the clinic are so lovely and welcoming, you feel comfortable from the moment you walk through the door.

Highly recommend to anyone looking for quality skin treatments. Thank you! x

I had filler with Rebecca and Botox with Hadassah. I was quite nervous and did a lot of research beforehand, but I was recommended here by a family member — and even though it was a bit of a journey, I’d rather travel somewhere I trust. The team were so helpful and responsive, with great communication throughout. They really listened to the results I wanted and used their expertise to advise what would work best. The outcome is so natural, and I wouldn’t trust anyone else now. Highly recommend!

I had nurse Lucy doing my lip filler today and im so happy with them! They look lovely!. Nurse Lucy was very friendly, professional and caring from start to finish. This will 100% be my new place to get any treatment done in the future and I would 100% suggest coming here. Thank you so much again!

I had a hifu session with Nicole and I was thrilled with the advice she gave me, her knowledge of the product and the way she managed my expectations. She was honest and clear with potential results and made me feel completely at ease during the treatment. I felt so comfortable with her approach that I booked another hifu session. Would highly recommend her and beyou.

Booked facial with Amber, it was such a perfect experience from beginning to end, I wanted some me time (as a mum) and also to walk out looking refreshed and new! I got exactly what I wanted, Amber was really informative about the treatment, throughout I felt comfortable and I was amazed with my end result- so much more than a treat for me- really felt like I have new skin and a perfect glow! Thank you so much! x

The consultant is amazing. Always puts me at ease, is extremely knowledgeable, and is very patient with me, (low pain threshold). All treatments are planned around discretion, no ability to over lap with other people. I feel I can talk openly about my procedures, and possible future needs. I highly recommend using the service.
Brilliant and professional service! I have had amazing results. Clinician is very knowledgeable and makes you feel very much at ease, I would highly recommend.

Ive had 4 sessions so far of full beard laser hair removal. As a transgender/non binary woman my facial hair was so bad. 4 sessions and my hair has greatly reduced!! Amazing and life changing. Emma makes me feel so comfortable. The pain is bad but the results are worth every penny

Must avoid. Rude & unprofessional. Toxic environment.

⬇️

Reply

Dear Chris,

This is not true i most definitely am on your system as it wasnt to long i had treatment done. If you are the owner or in-charge of anything please i urge you to make a change. Thanks alot
The  person at cristianos is  nice  perlite  nice to chat with & tells you all about it & does a good job as well  & I still hope to finish what needs doing  from MS D SUMMERS...

There is consistently a problem when collecting prescriptions from this pharmacy. The pharmacist is often on a lunch break or unavailable, and Linda is frequently left managing the counter on her own, visibly overwhelmed. Every time I visit, it feels like I am causing inconvenience just by showing up. On one occasion, Linda told me she was alone and busy and that I needed to come back later. I asked them once when would be a good time to come in in the future,  when they are fully staffed, but they were not able to answer.

I also have to double check my prescriptions, as not all items are given to me. Although the Crown Point location is convenient, the service here is the worst I have experienced when it comes to dispensing medication.

At my last visit, before handing over my prescription, I was asked if I take blood pressure medication. When I said no, I was still pushed to have a blood pressure check. I found this intrusive. It is not appropriate to question customers about their medication unless there is a clear clinical reason, and it should not be made to feel like a required step before dispensing. I just want to collect what my GP has prescribed and leave.

Do NOT make this Boots your preferred location to pick up prescriptions. The pharmacy is rarely actually open and the online hours are unreliable. I'm changing my chosen pharmacy in the NHS app right now to avoid ever coming here again. It's worth walking an extra 20 minutes to find another pharmacy.

Giving 2 as the staff have always been pleasant and the shelves are well stocked, but not a great place if you need a prescription or any restricted medicines. The last 5 times we have been there has been no pharmacist at the counter. Cocodamol and stronger antihistamines, whilst technically OTC medicines, can only be issued by a pharmacist and it’s not possible to get these when there is no pharmacist there 🤷🏻‍♀️ seems pointless having a pharmacy section if it is never manned and therefore unusable. It’s an okay place to shop if you want Paracetamol though…

The employees are nice and the place is clean and all, this review concerns the lack of health related products. There's a lot of knee, wrist and ankle support, but nothing for shoulder support, not even a tourniquet.
Customer service from Emily was outstanding today, she’s so lovely and gorgeous thank you Emily

I went to Angels after a really bad hair cut had left my hair looking wispy and damaged. I was advised that it would probably take two cuts to repair the damage. Elthia worked her magic and transformed my awful hair cut. I won't be going anywhere else in future.

I had a wonderful wash, cut and blow dry from Karen, the BEST blow dry I’ve ever had! Karen was so lovely and friendly, gave me exactly the cut that I wanted, I left feeling great! Thank you so much Karen :)
I had keritin treatment with Elthia for my curly frizzy hair what a absolutely fantastic job it is so smooth and a lot more easier to manage I’m one happy customer.

Been here a few times now for myself and to get my husband and two boys hair cuts. The staff are friendly and the service they provide is amazing.

One of my boys has a fear of hair cuts (due to past experience) and they were so calm and patient with him, his hair looked great too - he was so happy with it!

My hair is very thick and long, so they took such good care to make sure it was perfect for me.

I joined Karen's place in Leeds, at two different locations and came back to the new salon- Angels Hair, after moving out of the city and now with Elthia, who is a very knowledgeable person not only on hair cuts but in general re styles, colour and tips on healthy hair etc. Very friendly, polite and courteous team, always make you feel welcome and supportive!
Keep up the good work guys!

I bought a package of four treatments and wasn’t told that they expire after 12 months.

I’ve been having treatments every 4-6 months for several years, so they know I don’t fit four in during a 12 month period.

They confirmed I could have the final treatment after the expiry date was made known to me, and then failed to honour this, refusing to do the treatment.

I have lost a treatment and after being a loyal customer for about seven years, I’m finding a new clinic.

Atrocious treatment of former loyal customer.

I was supposed to receive a laser hair removal and prepaid +£600 for the course of treatment. The clinic cancelled my appointment twice the night before, I still have not had a hair removal and they are holding my money of £600 for over a month now and are unresponsive to any calls, emails, etc. Worst experience and customer service ever and would strongly advise anyone not to go to this clinic.

I had laser treatment on my cheeks and neck area which is quite sensitive area especially being male with coarse hair and It was Lucy from Leeds clinic, she did the treatment area.
It was really fab experience and by far the best session iv ever had, she was friendly, hospitable and perfectionist, she did the treatment area with ease and minimum discomfort despite it being sensitive area. Lucy was brilliant and would definitely ask for my next session to be with her. Just wanted to personally thank Lucy for the session I had it was outstanding service she provided...

Been going there over the past year for facial hair removal and from start to finish I’ve been made to feel comfortable and taken care of everytime. The treatment worked a wonder and I feel so much more confident now and there was no issues with any side effects or the appointments as the staff were very friendly and careful to ease any anxiety or worries I had. I would very much recommend this place!

In April I had a consultation with a nurse who was absolutely lovely however, she said she has only been doing the job for 6 months. I expected someone who was highly qualified to be advising me on my skin treatment not someone who has just started learning about skin!

She recommended a skin peel but due to knowing people in the industry, I knew that it is risky. I asked for the side effects and she stated the normal ones and said she she could do it for me. When I questioned her even more, I told her that I'm a skin type 4 and said I think it can damage my skin.

She then researched and confirmed that it could cause hyperpigmentation. The nurse then found out that she won't be able to do it due to the risk and a doctor would have to do it.

If I was a customer who didn't know anything about it, I would have booked in with her straight away thinking that there were no risks!

You SHOULD not be putting a person into consultation appointments after 6 months!!!! The nurse was lovely, it was not her fault. The management team are to blame.

I am still owed my £50 deposit.

I expected a professional clinic not a back street market shop.

I had my first ever massage with Tabitha and it was such a lovely experience. She was incredibly friendly, respectful, and made me feel comfortable straight away. The massage itself was amazing and I left feeling so relaxed. I genuinely had a great experience and would absolutely love to book with her again. Highly recommend!
Beautiful salon great atmosphere Stephanie is so lovely and welcoming, beautiful treatroom rooms, cant wait to go back already its so strange I've never noticed this place before!
Steph was brilliant, the massage was so relaxing but still got knots out. The room was warm, clean and calming, the 50 minutes full body massage flew. I will definitely be back, thank you!

Lovely experience having a Swedish full body massage with Stephanie. The experience was very calming and it felt safe and comfortable. I left feeling very relaxed and will deffo book again as well as look at some of the other services. Location is also great! Thank you

Very lovely staff- professional and attentive.  They had concerns about whether I could get the treatment done since I use retinol so they double checked everything before starting the  facial. Tabitha was amazing and explained every step. I would come again / turn this into a regular treatment
From what I've heard it's average.

Since completing my complimentary therapies course in April, i am still awaiting certification and have spoken to around 5/6 different members of staff in the college and head office and still nothing. The rest of my cohort has happily received theres. I have since started a level 5 course and now i am having to come to a halt due to lack of evidence in qualifications, due to insurance requirements ect.
My portfolio was even lost when turning up twice for it.
I have previously done courses when the college was owned privately and it was amazing. However, since a break for learning and coming back and it being taken over by learning curve, it is horrendous. If it wasn’t for Louise, our complimentary therapies tutor i doubt the majority of the class would have even stayed, she goes above and beyond in supporting.

It is like banging my head. No one ever answers the phone and i am always told someone will sort it and ring me back and never do. So deflating. So much potential, as it is a lovely learning space but more personality in a cemetery.

Avoid this place at all costs!
Attended this college around 5 years ago and I still feel the trauma!
Staff are rude and bully certain students, especially Emma.
Tutors would single you out and scream in your face in front a whole class for just making an innocent mistake.
Staff make up lies to try get you into trouble, Emma was bullying me and a couple of other girls in my class to the point where she even called my mum in for a meeting to say Im never in and that I skive college / I’m always late as well as trying to degrade me to my own mother!! which my mum laughed in her face as she dropped me to college every day and watched me walk in.
On one occasion I didn’t attend due to been in a accident with facial wounds I was pulled aside and made to feel like I was worthless and scum for having injury’s and was made to participate in other students apply makeup to my face on broken skin.

Please DO NOT go to this college! I started a 6 month course, Adult Level 3 beauty therapy course in May 2023 and was due to take my end exam in Dec 2023 - we did not take our final exam until NOVEMBER 2024. We were delayed nearly an entire year due to the appalling organisation, communication or care of this college. Our teacher left during the course and we were constantly told conflicting information about how we should do treatments. We were left in the dark for months waiting for a date, we were made to change from a sunday class to two 3 hour classes on a weekday evening which is NOT what we signed up for. I wasted 19 months of my life on a qualification that is absolutely no use. For example, the manicure section of the exam required us to do a manicure prep on only one hand but paint all 10 nails, all in 20 mins. What kind of skill does that even show? We were not allowed to wear any sort of nail polish/gel/biab/acrylics and my skin was absolutely ruined from the facials we had to do on each other every week, done with dirty equipment and instructed incorrectly. This was all dragged out over 19 months not to mention the near year’s worth of extra train journeys I paid for having to continue going in college after we were supposed to have finished the entire course. They’ve had 3 different managers while i was there and I was told this is all down to the booking team. I raised 3 separate complaints to the complaints department at the college and all i got was a ‘we apologise and we’ll do better for our future students’ email. The college is absolute mess and the emotional stress and the hold it has had on my life constantly weighing on me until i was able to finally finish the course has made me furious. Only 2 of us on my class finished the course this November. There is absolutely no accountability or acknowledgement from anyone. It’s appalling the money that has been spent on this course for the way we have been treated & I am so so disappointed in education systems getting away with this.

I've completed level 3 complementary therapies currently studying level 4 as well as studying level 2 & 3 beauty therapy  and soon to be studying level 4 beauty as well. Louise has been an incredible tutor throughout my studies in complementary therapies. Not only is she lovely and down to earth, her knowledge is impeccable and her teaching style is outstanding! I wouldn't have got this far without her incredible ability to make the information I needed to learn digestible. Not forgetting the classes are enjoyable and we often have a good laugh in class which really helps on the tougher days. Louise is a true asset to the college, she deserves a raise with the effort she puts in to helping us students!
Lois has been teaching my beauty therapy course. She too is lovely and has great knowledge of the industry.  She makes the lessons fun and exciting and I really enjoy her classes. She is very thorough and also a credit to the college.

I have been studying here since September 2018, I am doing two courses L2 Beauty therapy and L2 & L3 Nails.
Emma my tutor is amazing, really inspiring and extremely helpful.
Kelly and Emma in administration are really helpful too nothing is too much for them.
The way the courses are set out and taught are easy to understand and keep up with. I was worried at first as I’m a bit older and thought I would be surrounded by lots of young ones but the other students are all ages and backgrounds. We all get on extremely well and help each other out.
I would highly recommend this college as their standards of teaching are very high so to go into a spa setting would not be a problem. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Rebecca is not only one of the most professional people you will come across but has a lovely warming personality which straight away puts you at ease and fills you with confidence.

From my experience with previous services elsewhere, she goes above and beyond and I cannot fault her or her skills in anyway, shape or form!

Although it takes me around a 20/25 minutes drive to get to each appointment as I’m the opposite side of Leeds it is a billion percent worth it!

Fantastic service, price and results - I cannot say how impressed and delighted I am that I found her!

In short - she’s amazing and worth every single penny (in relation to what you get service and results wise, she’s very underpriced!)

————————

If you have time to carry on reading, or wanting an in depth review read below:

This was my second lash lift and tint with her, and can say I’m even happier with the results compared to the first time (which is a bold statement as they were perfect the first time)

Being a male & neurodivergent and booking in for a lash lift is not something I find easy nor comfortable normally however from day one dealing and speaking with Rebecca it was never an issue!

My first time with her I got the best results I ever had! Even though I have an issue with my eyes and forgot to mention this to her (water even when I lay down or on my side) she carried out the service impeccably and was incredibly patient and attentive to my watery eye - which again previous lash technicians haven’t been.

I also had the best results I’ve ever had from a lash lift and all credit to Rebecca.

My lashes never looked as good and as natural after a service! I found they also lasted well over 8 weeks - I have never received as many compliments about how beautiful, long my lashes are, or how lovely my eyes/eye colour is before either!

(Previous places made them look obvious, un-natural and results were limited to around 5/6 weeks max - not the case here)

I couldn’t be happier with everything from start to finish, and can certainly say you will be glad you chose her to provide the service you’re after!

So if you’re looking for an amazing new lash technician, in a fantastic clean professional environment then look no further! I also found it easy to park every time I have been to the salon

Also popped in before and after pics so you can see the difference it makes

I have gone to Rebecca for about a year now for LVL and my lashes always look amazing and lifted afterwards. I tried a last lift treatment elsewhere before I went here and they did not lift or last as long as they do with Rebecca. Rebecca is lovely and makes you feel at ease and everything is always clean. This is a brilliant treatment and I never have to wear any makeup for work. 100% recommend!

I found Rebecca through Instagram and I’m so glad I did. I booked in with her for LVL and it’s the best thing I’ve done!! I’ve not had LVL before but she was so lovely and talked me though everything. I’m so happy with my lashes it’s boosted my confidence massively already, booked in for my next appointment and definitely going to stick with her! I have naturally really straight lashes but since the appointment they’re everything I wanted and just beautiful. 100% recommend.

Rebecca is such a lovely person and goes above and beyond to ensure you are 100% happy with your lashes. The customer service is absolutely outstanding and the results are just fabulous. Would highly recommend Rebecca and will definitely return for more treatments.

Just been for my first lash treatment with Rebecca and after having my LVLs done in various salons over the past 5 years this is the best lash lift I've had by far! Rebecca is so lovely and a total pro and the salon is extremely clean, welcoming and relaxing. I can't wait to return!

visited today at 4:30 the member of staff on with black hair and creole earrings 😁 is always super friendly and helpful.
New stand ups are great!

Great uptodate sunbeds
Very Clean
Staff friendly & helpful

I have been using this excellent facility for about 10 months now and I have yet to find a business in Leeds with the same incredible customer service skills. All the ladies in this place greet you with smiles and always take time for a chat and a catch up. It’s really does make my day to pop in each week. And the prices are very fair indeed. Hope the management are very proud of their wonderfull staff! Regards Simon.

Excellent tanning shop with friendly professional staff.
Highly Recommended.
The cleanest newest beds, the staff is more than helpful, and you get discounts each time you top up. 10/10

I was lucky enough to enjoy the synesthesia treatment with Katie at Lush Leeds Spa today - It was incredible!
I was really worried that it could be too overstimulating that I wouldn't be able to fully relax - I couldn't have been more wrong.
The massage was the perfect amount of pressure & Katie was wonderful, nothing was too much trouble and she was incredibly patient and understanding. She is very good at her job too - i actually cried a little during the massage, a sign that I was truly comfortable, relaxed and relieving a lot of built up tension.
I had never had a spa treatment before, so I was going in blind with what to expect - I think the bar might have been set quite high as I don't think a bog standard massage/spa treatment from just anywhere will do, Lush Leeds really exceeded my expectations today. The whole experience was immersive, relaxing and sensual for every single sense.
This treatment is expensive, but I can assure you, it is Worth. Every. Penny! I definitely recommend it, especially if you want something really special - a perfect gift for someone you love, that needs to relax and have some time for them!!
Thank you so much Katie and the team at Lush Leeds, I can't wait to come and visit you again soon!! ❤️

The best spa I have ever had. Sara the therapist was outstanding she provided so much reasurrance and care. The massage was wonderful and made me feel extemely relaxed. The products used smelt amazing and my skin felt so soft. The spa setting is down stairs and is very peacefull and nicely set out. The room tempretures are perfect and Sara asked if i was ok or if the room temp needed adjusting. This was my first Lush Spa but already looking at booking another. The dignity, comfort, relaxation and professionalism really made this experiance worth while. Sara moved around the room without shoes and with delicacy ensuring a tranquil environment the music playing helps set the scene and makes you feel far away from the hustle and bustle of every day life. I got a free bath bomb to take home and enjoyed a cup of tea before heading home. Choosing your own word and writong it on a black board and choosing your own oil really makes this spa personal to you and you can make it personal every time you visit by choosing different words and oil. 10/10 cant wait to visit again 🙂

Treatment was amazing.

Went tor the signature sensory treatment (Synesthesia). Unlike any other spa treatment I’ve had before.

Highlights were the aromatherapy, treatment music soundtrack & service from the Leeds team. My masseuse Abi was friendly and skilled.

Will return to try out the other treatments.

I came to the Lush Spa in Leeds for the Highlands treatment today, my treatment was with Aiste. What an amazing treatment, involved an hour long full body massage with hot stones. Aiste talked me through everything at the start before entering the treatment room, which also included a stone reading. The atmosphere was perfect, and the Highlands tea afterward was a perfect ending. I have had treatments with Aiste before, and she is brilliant at her job! No massage will ever live up the the Highlands massage now.

Such an amazing experience at Lush Spa in Leeds today! I had the Rewilding Facial done by Abigail, she created such a warm and peaceful environment. The treatment was everything I could of wanted definitely a workout for the face! The stocked bathroom and tailored drink after was also a lovely touch.

The Spirit Health Club on Wellington Street has a gym facility, but it’s not a full gym. The space and equipment are quite limited, so you can get a workout in, but only within those limits. The real highlight here is the leisure side: a swimming pool, jacuzzi, sauna, and steam room, which make it a good spot if you’re looking more for relaxation and light exercise.

That said, the same space issue applies to the locker room and showers. They’re functional, but on the smaller side. Overall, it’s not ideal if you want a fully equipped gym, but works well if you value the pool and spa facilities.

Having stayed in the hotel and used the pool facilities multiple times over the last few years we've never had an issue with our son using the jacuzzi. Yet last night a red headed man came and told me he had to get out as it wasn't to be used by under 16's, no explanation on why that policy was in place (my son's 13 and was sitting next to me talking not causing any issues in any way). There had been young children from the age of 3 upwards in the jacuzzi from when we arrived (medically jacuzzi's aren't recommended for young under 5's) yet he chose to ignore this and pick on a young adult who was quite literally sitting there talking to his mum! Between that and the fact there are now two hours in the evening's that under 18's can't use the pool even with parental supervision, really gives the vibe that ageism is massively at play here and really they don't want children or young adults in there.

The shower area in the female changing rooms are dirty and the pool area as a whole could do with a good clean and modernisation.

I’ve been a member since June, and the facilities are excellent with a friendly team. The place is consistently clean, thanks to the staff’s hard work keeping up with the cleaning demands.

However, some members show a disappointing lack of respect for the environment, almost as if they deliberately create extra mess. This is especially noticeable with the group that regularly arrives around 9 am.

Been a member since January, Facilities really good and team really nice. Place is always clean as the team work hard to keep up with amount of cleaning

however some of the members are just have a lack of respect for the environment, its as if they do it deliberately to cause more mess for the staff always seem to be then group that come in at 9am

I have been a member for several months now and would definitely recommend this gym/spa. The staff are friendly and always greet you with a smile. If I've ever reported a maintenance problem or I've seen another member ask for something, the staff are always happy to help. The facilities are perfect for what I need. There's a good range of equipment in the gym and it's never too busy to get on the equipment I want. The spa is perfect after a long day! The sauna, steam room and pool are just the right temperature. The complimentary towel, shower gel and shampoo in the showers, and hairdryers in the changing rooms are a welcome extra touch. I would definitely recommend a membership to anyone! The added discount on the bar/restaurant with the gym membership is also a bonus.
If you love grotty, unkempt, and generally unclean then you'll love it here. Place needs a deap clean, failing that, some explosives and demolishing.
Excellent place very spacious, don’t miss out more people attending you’ll definitely enjoy it

Excellent facilities and capacity however it is the dirtiest sauna I have ever been to which is pervasive and distracting from the experiences and facilities within. I would suggest closing off some of the sections in quieter times so that it is easier for staff to maintain as it is also the largest sauna I have ever been to. I would return and its a fun and interesting place but the whole thing needs a wash. Sorry.

I have found the whole experience underwhelming. The showers had cold water. The shower wash units were empty. I had to ask for them to filled and when I mentioned the showers being cold, the receptionist shrugged his shoulders and said nothing he can do, get used to it. This to me suggests the showers very hardly get used which in turn suggests the shower gel units haven't been filled a very long while. I did not see anyone cleaning, the whole time I was there. The play rooms were filthy with used condoms which I can only presume had been left from the previous day or earlier from the day visited. It is a shame that the big talking point throughout the reviews is about cleanliness and hygiene. I would like to visit again but thinking about the latter is putting me off for life 😕

Bloody terrible place. Save your money and go elsewhere. Catering more for the straights with posters of women everywhere. Where's the gay element? Plus it's filthy. There wasn't anyone cleaning while I was there. Horrible place and very bizarre for a 'gay' sauna. You pay membership aswell which is an absolute con. How come other saunas I know don't charge membership and they're entry fees are cheaper? Plus, rather than apologising,  a member of staff just starting arguing with me when I mentioned how filthy it was. His excuse was, have you seen the size of the place? That's not my problem. More staff should be employed.....

Anyway, I'm never going back there BUT I'm so angry as they have my membership money now.

DO NOT GIVE THEM YOUR HARD EARNED MONEY!

The gym is great, I like the amenities provided and the perks like the classes. Particularly the Ashtanga yoga class by Rebecca Riley. Rebecca is an absolutely brilliant teacher, not just going through the motions but making sure we all get the maximum effect from the poses and the mind-body connection. She’s always on hand to ensure we’re being safe but also being our best selves. She’s proactive, informative and very empathetic. After every class, I always feel like I’ve loosened my muscles and unburdened my mind. It’s amazing.
The pool is also very great and the gym facilities are nice and up to date.

Nuffield Health Leeds – Not Worth the Premium Price

I’ve been a member for almost a year and unfortunately Nuffield Health leeds does not  reflect its premium pricing. Membership fees increased this month with no clear communication or explanation, and there have been no visible improvements to justify the rise.

The gym floor is very outdated: old flooring, poor layout, no proper accessibility, limited strength/functional equipment, and machines that are frequently broken or under repair. Maintenance is slow and reactive. Classes are often run on the gym floor, disrupting workouts, while dedicated studios sit empty.

The changing rooms and showers are particularly poor for a gym at this price point. Persistent bad smells from drains, dirty toilets, broken scales, loose panels, and showers with doors that don’t close properly, no locks, and little privacy. Cleaning feels reactive rather than routine, with issues lasting weeks.

The spa and pool area has potential but is underwhelming: the steam room smells unpleasant, noise travels easily into relaxation areas, seating is limited, and lighting is harsh.

Importantly, the staff are excellent — consistently friendly, kind, and helpful. This is not a staff issue, but one of investment, maintenance, and management priorities.

Many cheaper gyms in Leeds offer newer equipment, cleaner facilities, and better layouts. Until meaningful upgrades are made — including improving the overall aesthetic and environment — Nuffield Health Leeds does not offer value that matches its price or brand.

Absolutely love this place! The staff are amazing — always polite, friendly, and ready to help with anything you need. The gym is spotless, well-equipped, and has such a positive energy from the moment you walk in. The sauna, pool, and recovery areas make it feel more like a wellbeing retreat than just a gym. You can tell everyone here genuinely cares about members’ progress and comfort. Joining this gym was one of my best decisions! Highly recommended. 💪🔥

Being a member is a wonderful experience.
The staff are professional and friendly.
The classes are amazing with excellent teachers.
The pool, steam room and sauna are top class.
There is an amazing gym upstairs.
My mental and physical health has improved since joining.
Best devision ever ! ❤

I’ve been attending Richard’s boxfit class regularly for the last two years and I honestly couldn’t recommend it enough. When I first started, I couldn’t throw a single punch properly, but now I feel confident and capable, as a woman, I genuinely feel I am more confident walking in Leeds at the dark.
Richard Bennet has excellent skills and teaching techniques, and he has taught me so much over the years couldn’t be more thankful. He’s always approachable, supportive, and happy to give advice whenever you ask and have great sense of humour.I did consider changing gyms at one point, but this boxing class is by far the best compared to other gyms. It actually focuses on proper technique and always finishes with a solid cardio everyone always leaves sweaty!
Please don’t ever change the way you teach :)
The staff is also very friendly at the desk and at the gym floor it never feels like it’s a some commercial gym where no one care. Always checks for example the pool area and tell people off if someone acting inappropriate at the pool so everyone feels comfortable. Could do with some hip thrust machine on the floor:)

I visited this clinic for TMJ Botox and lip filler for the first time and couldn’t be happier with the experience. Keely was absolutely brilliant, she explained everything clearly, and made the whole process feel very professional and reassuring. The reception team were also incredibly friendly and welcoming. The procedure itself went smoothly, and the results are high standard and very natural looking. I’m more than happy with the service and the results and would highly recommend this clinic!

I am Carlos from Colombia. I want to tell you that I am in love with Perfec Face for the excellence in the procedures and the quality of the services offered. They are professionals.
Thank you very much, you really are wonderful.

GRACIAS!

Carlos

I had an amazing experience at this Botox beauty clinic! From the moment I walked in, the staff made me feel welcome, comfortable, and completely at ease. Everyone was warm, professional, and incredibly knowledgeable.

A special shout-out to the lovely lady who did my Botox—she was absolutely fantastic. She took the time to explain everything, answered all of my questions, and really listened to what I wanted. Her technique was gentle, precise, and the results are better than I could have imagined. I look refreshed, natural, and completely rejuvenated!

I couldn’t be happier with my visit. Highly recommend this clinic to anyone considering Botox or any  beauty treatments. I’ll definitely be coming back! ,

Great experience with this clinic, everyone there is so lovely. Their skin care monthly packages are amazing. They're also easy to get in touch with and accommodating if I needed to reschedule.
Shahista is a star, she was able to counsel me on every treatment, what to expect and suggested what would work best for me. Very knowledgeable and very friendly.
Ruth was amazing with profhilo and botox injections with no side effects.

I had a really great experience at Face Perfect Clinic. Dr. Keely has an excellent aesthetic sense and was very patient, explaining the differences between two brands in detail and helping me choose the one that suited me best. The injection process was smooth and quick with almost no discomfort. The result looks very natural and exactly how I wanted it to be.
The overall service was professional and warm, and I truly enjoyed the experience. I’ll definitely come back to Dr. Keely for other treatments in the future. Highly recommended! ✨

Took a massage for one a hour (£40) and it was the best! It was relaxing for the first half an hour and then the lady stretched me and removed all my nodes! It’s a lovely atmosphere and very relaxing, also got a traditional Thai drink at the end.

Rang in and arranged for my girlfriend to go in at 6pm when we arrived we rang again where they then said we’re busy, and that it must of been another lady who booked it and left, awful communication. dreadful customer service.

I booked online on their page a day before my trip to leeds, and it said I booked successfully. When I got there, the staff on the other side of the door sent me away because she was 'busy'. She didn't even open the door and talk to me face to face. This is absolutely the WORST customer service I've ever had. Thanks for ruining my trip.

Friendly and kind people, who didn't mind my tummy rumbling for the majority of the hour Thai massage I had! They accommodated a room for 2 with no both and we're happy to mix in some oil with our Thai massage too! Comfortable and relaxing rooms. Great massage, will be going back.

My wife and I found them on the Internet. No reviews on Google. The prices were good @40€ per hour. The girls were very sweet and we had a couples room. My massage was stronger than my wife's as I said specially I wanted a stronger massage. Dim lights and we asked for a combo Thai/Swedish oil massage. There was even a shower in the room! Plus-They took credit cards with no extra fee (pay in advance). I think will go back tomorrow....

Felix is the best massage therapist I’ve ever visited. I carry a lot of tension in my upper back and shoulders and his treatments have really improved their condition. The atmosphere is always incredibly relaxing and the service professional without seeming clinical. I’m often anxious about being touched but Felix creates such a soothing environment that I find my anxiety doesn’t come into play at all. Definitely one of the best in the business. I will always go to Felix for my treatments.

Great massage therapist. I had my first deep tissue massage with Felix today and I have already booked my next session. Felix focused on the areas I'd identified experiencing the most tension; my back and shoulders. The massage was fantastic and Felix worked hard to alleviate knots and tension. Felix is highly trained and able too use a variety of massage techniques to get the desired results. I left feeling destressed and relaxed. I'd highly recommend Felix and I shall be sending my life coaching clients for what is a high quality and high impact form of therapy for dealing with stress, anxiety and depression. Less a treat and more a self-care necessity.

Really enjoyed my treatment with Felix. I had a deep tissue back massage and found this to be more effective than anything I've had before and I feel so much better for it. Felix was friendly, very professional and made me feel at ease throughout the session. I will definitely be returning and would highly recommend him to anyone considering booking a treatment.

Felix is a dedicated and extremely knowledgeable therapist. He puts you at ease and explains everything he is doing in great detail.

I cannot recommend him enough. Try him out and I can guarantee you'll feel amazing after treatment.

Professional and fabulous therapist practising in Leeds. Felix does a great job of bespoking his techniques to suit clients needs. I will definately be returning again for further treatments. Thank you Felix!

Not sure what the bad reviews are about. I went here with my bestfriend (F) and had the best experience, it was warm in the treatment room and the ladies did our massages at the same time. The lady I had did perfect pressure and asked if its was ok for us all the way through. She had a laugh with us and gave us a hug when we left. Very knowledgable staff and very experienced. Such a good price for a fantastic service, definitely coming again.

⭐☆☆☆☆

Very unprofessional experience. I called to book a massage and confirmed that I was coming, but was then repeatedly called multiple times before the appointment — even outside the agreed time. Each time, the tone was abrupt with no greeting, just “Are you coming?”

There was zero professionalism or courtesy, and the attitude felt more like harassment than customer service. I can now understand the other negative reviews. As a paying customer, I expected to be treated with basic respect. I decided not to go through with the appointment based on how I was spoken to. Avoid if you value good service and communication.

Reasonably confident that this isnt the most kosher outfit. There was a shower cubicle in the treatment room and a lock on the door. I'm not sure the dressing gown I was offered had been washed since the last customer which was a bit worrying. The smell of the place was quite distinctive. Two big lads showed up and loudly proclaimed which of the female masseuses 'they would take' (I could hear them through the door and when I exited it was clear that they weren't zen seekers). In terms of the massage I had, it was pretty good for the most part. Lovely work on my back but then just a lot of soft stroking of my legs which was a bit odd.
It's a really good place to go as on they ask you throughout the massage is alright, and if there useing a right pressure, and it's I lovely chilled atmosphere in there

Walked in for a massage today at around 5.45pm fantastic service very warm welcome. The girls took care of me and made me feel relaxed and comfortable. I had very tight calves and traps which my masseuse sorted out and advised me on what to do to try and prevent the tightness from occurring. I will definitely be back to visit always such a warm welcome and you leave feeling rejuvenated

I attended my first beginner yoga class yesterday, my first since I was 18, and that is some time agi!
The small group made it feel friendly, relaxed and very welcoming. The instructor was lovely, approachable and encouraged us to work at our own pace with no pressure.
I’m doing yoga as a holistic way to support healthy ageing, flexibility and mental wellbeing, and this felt like the perfect place to start. I’m really looking forward to the next session.

I adore this place. I have seen around 6 different instructors and every single one has been so kind and welcoming. I normally do a Sunday morning or evening and they really help either round up a busy week or set you up for a new one. Since joining classes here at We are Wellness over a year and a half ago, I have learnt so much about yoga and the way we learn about ourselves. Would highly recommend.
Great place, great teachers and I always leave feeling better than when I went in

Friday Creative Flow is magic, wakes you up, helps shake off the stresses of the week and puts a smile on your face! I loved the grounding at the start, quite strong flow sequences, building energy with options to rest more or try a balance, then relaxing with a couple of yin postures before the end. The teacher is so welcoming and skilled at creating a fun, interesting class with a peaceful soundtrack, in a beautiful setting and relaxed no-pressure atmosphere. Thank you

I had a deep tissue massage with Emily, and as a fellow masseuse I can highly recommend her style of massage. Pre-consultation was thorough, her technique is incredibly relaxing and yet very efficient at removing knots and overall tension. I honestly couldn't believe how much she could fit into one hour! Will definitely be coming back for more!

This was my first time at Rosa Thai - Oxford Place Leeds. Pepsi did my massage and it was amazing 👏🏽
She found knots I didn't know I had and gave me stretches. Strongly recommend, especially if you have a job that makes you sit for hours 👍🏾
Jeab was amazing! She was so kind and made me feel very comfortable and not conscious. She took great care of my areas that needed work and has magic hands. Fabulous massage will be back next week!

Pepsi was incredible, I can’t recommend her highly enough. I booked for 60 but really wished I’d had 90 minutes as it was that good. I booked a couples massage with my hubs and he had Ann who was also brilliant. We’ll be going back for sure.

I got a massage today from Pepsi in the Rosa Thai massage place. It was really AMAZING! At first she stepped on my back and with Her height she started to measure my back and then with a couple of movements she really did a Great Job! If it was too much pressure, then she would stop and then she would continué. Really really amazing. Totally recommendable!

Came here for a massage, been coming to Rosa Thai for years, Pepsi is an amazing masseuse and I always leave here feeling so much better. Thank you so much and see you again soon for another amazing deep tissue hot oil massage!

I had some filler put in my cheeks by a different company salon and I wasn’t happy with my results. My cheeks and eyes were over filled and made my face look distorted. I went to rose and asked if she could fix this by dissolving some of the filler and I have to say she’s done an amazing job. My face looks so much better, it looks natural and it’s brought back my original look. I’m so happy with the results. Will definitely be going back to rose In future for more treatments. Thank you rose

I visited NS Skin Clinic to get my lip filler topped up. Rosa was very welcoming on arrival and made me feel at ease straight away. Before performing the treatment, she told me what she was going to do to increase the volume of my lips and even out the existing shape. Rosa took care whilst performing the treatment and checked in to make sure I was comfortable. I'm really pleased with the final results and I'll definitely be returning to NS Skin Clinic for treatments in future!
Hi, I had my lips done today, I look fabulous 😍thanks to Rosa💋I can’t wait for another treatment with her, she is extremely professional and dedicated to her work, highly recommended!!❤️👌👌👌👌

been having my brows done for 5 years now also my lashes, lashes last me over 4 weeks and love the result every time and my eyebrows always look amazing 100% recommend friendly service good price and amazing results

I always look forward to my monthly facial with NS Beauty Aesthetics. Not only are my visits super relaxing but my skin always looks and feels amazing. I am in no doubt whatsoever that skin is in a much better condition now thanks to NS's expert care. NS Beauty Aesthetics staff are very friendly, highly skilled and extremely professional.

I’ve been going to Ale Aesthetics for the past four months for PRP hair restoration treatments using plasma drawn from my own body, and I couldn’t be happier with the results. The entire experience has been amazing — the procedure is completely painless, I’ve had no side effects, and I genuinely feel great after each session.

Alessandra, the aesthetic injector, is incredibly professional, knowledgeable, and caring. She also recommended I try the Guam UpKer Planctidil Vials — a Hair Strengthening Seaweed Treatment to support my hair growth between appointments. I’ve been using the vials at home for the past two months, and I can already see a big difference in the strength, shine, thickness, and overall health of my hair.

The clinic itself is absolutely beautiful — spotlessly clean, modern, and fully sterilized, which gave me full confidence in the quality and safety of the treatments. Everything from the environment to the personalized care makes Ale Aesthetics a place I fully trust and highly recommend. If you’re considering PRP or hair treatments, this is the place to go!😘

This was my first time getting a treatment from Kate, however it was actually my second time getting Botox - so I was nervous going into it as I could recall it being painful the first time I had Botox done. My nerves weren’t long lived as Kate put me at ease straightaway - she has a lovely, friendly approach and filled me with confidence with her knowledge of the treatment; explaining everything in detail and making sure I was happy with everything before we proceeded. My nerves were even further alleviated once treatment was underway - I was so surprised how painless it was this time, which I’m putting down to Kate’s nursing background! From the moment I stepped foot into her treatment room through to the moment I left was great - Kate gives all the care and attention you would expect, and then some! I’m absolutely thrilled with the results and will certainly be back again at some point in the future! Kate well and truly deserves my recommendation!

Kate is highly professional, reassuring and very attentive. She is highly skilled, knowledgeable and her attention to detail is second to none! So glad I finally took the plunge after so many years of wanting lip filler, highly recommend! Would not go anywhere else. Thankyou! Xx
Kate is great! She’s friendly and knowledgeable, putting you at ease with treatments. I’d highly recommend

Genuinely the nicest place I have ever been to for getting my nails done! All the girls are so nice and welcoming and every single manicure I've had has been fantastic! They make me feel fab and I get so many compliments on how great my nails look. The music in the salon is always on point too! I look forward to my visits and always come away feeling suitably pampered! The best gift to myself every month!!

I get my nails done regularly at SABLE and always have a great time! Everyone is so lovely and helpful with choosing designs, they are easy to talk to and make me feel at home. My nails always last 4+ weeks and I get so many compliments! My favourite nail salon in Leeds 🥰🥰

Sable is the best salon around. The whole team are so welcoming and lovely and the salon is beautiful and really cosy. It really makes it feel like a special treat when you arrive to have your treatments done and you feel immediately at home - whether it’s your first time or you are a regular. I have had gel nails, facials and brow laminations there and love them all! The attention to detail and care in all of their treatments is really special. I wandered in three years ago and am so glad I did as I have returned ever since despite moving further away. The team even pulled out all of the stops to help me feel my best for my wedding day earlier this year. I’d recommend Sable to anyone!

Having tried 3 other nail salons I can tell you that nothing compares to the amazing work done at Sable. The care and attention to detail is first class. The end result is always immaculate too. I recommend this place to all my friends and they all love it too now. I have attached some pics of nails I’ve had and loved.

I’ve been going to Sable for almost 10 years now, and honestly, I wouldn’t trust anyone else with my nails. The salon is always spotless, calm, and welcoming, and the girls are genuinely some of the nicest people you’ll meet. They always take their time, listen to what you want, and consistently deliver perfect results.
I regularly get gel polish, pedicures, and nail art, and every set lasts for ages without chipping. The attention to detail is incredible the nail art is always so precise, and the pedicures feel amazing and leave my feet looking and feeling brand new.
One of the biggest highlights for me was having my bridal nails and pedicure done here. They made the whole experience feel really special, and the results were absolutely beautiful. It’s memories like that which remind me why I keep coming back.
If you’re looking for a salon where you feel cared for, relaxed, and always leave with gorgeous nails, Sable is the place. I couldn’t recommend it more! 💅✨

I LOVE the Wednesday & Friday 12pm noon mat classes at Kuwa! Megan and Natalia are so skilled and encouraging with really effective and enjoyable classes. I see how I’ve improved each week and am so glad that I added this to my life. After one year there, I can safely say I’ll continue. Plus, the mat studio is lovely, and the equipment is top notch. Highly recommend Kuwa! Mat Pilates is amazing!

Kuwa pilates is the best studio I’ve ever been to! Everyone is so welcoming and the quality of teaching is amazing, the best I’ve experienced out of the many studios I have tried. Consistency here has significantly improved my strength & gives me a moment in the day for some mind body connection. I enjoy both the Mat and reformer!
I’m a student and the student discount is so helpful! I highly recommend booking here - I’ve always left feeling better than I walked in.
Thank you Kuwa & team x

Such a lovely studio!!!! I took two classes with the owner, and it was fantastic. Her classes were challenging and creative. The attention to each clients form and positioning really showcased how knowledgeable she is as an instructor. Would highly recommend to anyone looking for a gorgeous reformer studio!
Easily my favourite place in Leeds. The studio is so aesthetic, the instructors are so skilled, and the classes are incredible. I’ve been coming since they first opened and I don’t plan on stopping🤍

The absolute best in Leeds! I’ve been coming to Kuwa for a year now and it’s changed my body for the better. Hind and Shamz are world class instructors who are so attentive and precise in their teachings of both reformer and mat. The equipment is first class and the studio is absolutely beautiful. I cannot recommend them enough from their warmth to their expertise, having done Pilates for over 10 years I can say with confidence this is one of the best out there.

I have a full-time job and often struggle to attend appointments exactly at the scheduled time, but the team has always been incredibly understanding and flexible. They genuinely try to accommodate me and always manage to find a suitable slot, which I truly appreciate.
Every visit is a pleasure — the girls are always friendly, welcoming, and sincere. From the moment I arrive, I feel completely comfortable and relaxed. The atmosphere is warm and professional, and I always feel well taken care of.
I am very grateful for your hard work, kindness, and excellent service.

I had an amazing experience at Rejuva Skin Care. The clinic is clean, modern, and very welcoming. The staff is professional, friendly, and took the time to explain everything clearly before the laser treatment. I felt comfortable throughout the process, and the results have been great so far. You can really tell they care about their clients and their skin goals. Highly recommend Rejuva Skin Care to anyone looking for safe and effective laser treatments! 😊

Staff are so lovely!! They all make you feel comfortable and at ease. Pricing options are flexible with different packages.
