The advice and guidance they offer for treatment is top tier, especially for getting the best and long lasting results. I’ve had laser hair done other places and will never change from rejuva.

I had an amazing laser session with Sanaa at Rejuva Skin and I honestly couldn’t be happier with the experience. Sanaa is so professional, knowledgeable, and reassuring. She explained everything clearly and made me feel completely comfortable throughout the session. I would 100% recommend Sanaa and Rejuva Skin to anyone considering laser treatments. I’m really glad I chose her and I’ll definitely be coming back!

I’m currently going through my hair removal treatment with Sana at RejuvaSkin, and I’m extremely happy so far. Sana is professional, knowledgeable, and very reassuring. She takes the time to explain each step, answers all my questions, and makes sure I’m comfortable during every session. I’m already seeing great results and feel confident knowing I’m in safe hands. I would highly recommend Sana and RejuvaSkin to anyone considering hair removal treatments

Was involved in a crash on my way for my appointment and I've since requested a refund since no reschedule has been communicated to me and they went mute.
Very poor communication

Had a couples massage for 1 hour. Very clean and price was very good (£100). Room was spacious and comfortable and looked nice and tidy. Would recommend! Went for a relaxing massage and come out feeling refreshed. Would advise calling the number on their website, not the number on Google. Ask about availability as the website seems to have full availability, but over the phone they told us the times they had available, must be a problem with the website. Can't complain! 5 stars!

Had a couples massage on 11 Jan 2023. I had Rose doing my massage . Absolutely wonderful, me and my friend felt so relaxed and had all our knots taken away . The salon was lovely, nice subdued lighting and very clean. The beds were great, so comfy and sturdy. We had the 90 minute massage which was £70 each . Can highly recommend. Will definitely be going back again . Thanks Rose x

Had a couples massage with my sister, neither of us have ever had a massage. The ladies made us feel very comfortable and the place was so clean and calm! I am extremely ticklish and the ladies changed their technique to suit me! Will definitely be back

This was my very first experience in getting a massage. I booked for a couples massage which cost £95 in cash. We were greeted at the door, given tea, hospitality was 10/10. And can I just say, as my first time getting a massage, they exceeded my expectations to the point where I felt bad for not leaving a tip. I will definitely do that next time as no I didn’t have more cash on me. Definitely coming back again and again and again.
My body felt amazing after the deep tissue massage 💆🏾‍♀️, she was keep asking me if I was comfortable and if it’s too hard just let her know.
VERY professional. I don’t know what else to say but BOOK LA BELLA  SPA.🧖🏾‍♀️
Amazing experience😌✨ they got themselves a client

What a disaster!!! Booked for my friend and I to have a foot massage at the same time, this was booked 2 weeks in advance, we made a day of it, had some lunch first then arrived for out foot massages that we had been looking forward to. When we arrived I could tell by the vacant look on her face that she didn’t have us booked in, I showed her my confirmation on my phone of the booking, she proceeded to tell me there was only one other person there and herself and she wasn’t well, she told us this 4 times in the space of 5 minutes! She said her colleague could do it but we would have to have it done one at a time, I explained that that was not acceptable and we had booked for it doing together, she then said she could also do it but reminded us again that she wasn’t well?? We agreed and she asked us to pay, I said we’ll pay when we’ve had our treatments, this was not acceptable and she wanted payment first and it had to be by bank transfer, by this time we were so angry we left. They didn’t even have the decency to email or call me to advise of any of this even though they had all my contact details.This place is so unprofessional DO NOT GO HERE.

Recently, due to overtime work, my neck and shoulders have been as stiff as rocks. A friend recommended this place, and as soon as the therapist started working on me, I could tell it was different. He was able to accurately locate all my pain points and knots, then slowly worked them out with very skillful techniques. Throughout the process, he constantly communicated with me, asking if the pressure was right. He also gave me some tips on how to relieve shoulder and neck fatigue in my daily life, which was very thoughtful.
After the massage, my entire upper body felt clear and my breathing was easier. The essential oils at this shop smell very pleasant, and the background music is very relaxing. Definitely a five-star review!

My friends brought me here as a surprise for my birthday. I’ll start by saying the massage itself was really good. The therapist clearly knew what she was doing, very skilled, focused on the areas I asked for, and explained everything in terms of Chinese medical treatment, which I appreciated.

However, the experience overall just felt weird. First, the room wasn’t heated, and since I was only having a back, shoulder, and neck massage, my lower body wasn’t covered or kept warm at all. I was actually a bit cold throughout and there was no soothing music played.

But the strangest and most uncomfortable part was that the therapist didn’t leave the room while I was changing — not before or after the massage. She just stayed there the whole time as I took my clothes off and put them back on. Personally, I’m not very body-conscious, so it didn’t bother me too much, but it did feel very unprofessional and left me wondering if that’s their normal practice with everyone… or if she didn’t trust me for some reason (which made me uncomfortable).

So overall — the massage itself was excellent, but the environment and professionalism really let the experience down.

Very professional staff and good environment.
Really like the hot stone massage, and my friend got the hot oil one. Really sleepy and relax.

Paid £80 upfront for a 60-minute full body Thai massage for my partner, after clearly explaining that his shoulders needed particular attention.

He is not the type to complain, but the experience was poor enough that I went back myself to question it.

What he actually received was around 40 minutes of pressure over a towel, followed by about 20 minutes of light stroking on his neck, despite repeatedly asking for shoulder work. She briefly used an elbow on only his left calf with no work on the right side at all, showing a lack of balance or technique. No oil was used on his legs or lower back, and the front of his arms and legs were completely ignored, despite this being sold as a full body massage.

There was no background music, the main light was left fully on, and no effort was made to create a relaxing or professional environment.

The person carrying out the massage appeared to be the receptionist rather than a trained therapist. She wore jeans and an oversized jumper and stood in the room while he undressed and dressed, which was extremely uncomfortable and unprofessional. He is also fairly certain she was using her phone during parts of the massage itself.

When I questioned what we had paid for, I explained that I am trained in Swedish massage and that both of us have had many genuine Thai massages. What was provided was not a Thai massage at all. She then admitted they are not Thai therapists, despite selling the treatment as a Thai massage, and simply kept repeating “next time” instead of addressing the issue.

For £80, this experience was misleading, unprofessional, and extremely poor value. I would not recommend this business.
The environment is very good, the massage time is also very focused on the hair, after the massage, I feel much more relaxed, and my sleep has improved

I had an excellent experience at Laser Clinics Leeds. The management and team are great, professional, friendly, and very welcoming. Everything was explained clearly, and the treatment was carried out with care and expertise. The results are amazing, and I honestly wouldn’t go anywhere else for laser. The clinic is clean, well organised, and made me feel completely at ease. Highly recommend! Excited to continue my laser journey.

I had an excellent experience with my laser treatment. The clinic is extremely clean and professional, and the staff made me feel comfortable throughout the process. The lady who performed my laser treatment (I’m not sure if her name is Iqra💗) was incredibly kind, professional, and reassuring. The treatment was quick, effective, and virtually painless. I’ve already noticed great results and would highly recommend this clinic.
Thanks xx

I had a very disappointing experience at the Leeds branch.

I was refused treatment in a way that felt discriminatory, as the explanation focused on my ethnicity rather than an individual skin assessment.

I have a light skin tone (equivalent to Fitzpatrick Type II), and the same type of laser equipment is commonly used in clinics in South Korea for people with similar skin tones. Despite this, my appointment was cancelled.

When I suggested a patch test as a reasonable way to address any safety concerns, this option was not offered or accepted, and no alternative assessment was provided.

As a result, my time and expenses were wasted, and I left feeling unfairly treated. I hope the clinic reviews how suitability is assessed and ensures customers are evaluated individually and professionally, without assumptions.

Photo caption :
Attached photo shows my natural skin tone for reference.

Update:
For clarity, no clinical test, device-based assessment, or patch test was performed prior to my skin being labelled as Fitzpatrick III.
During the recorded telephone call, I was told that Korean clients are classified as Type III without testing, and in person my skin type was determined based on appearance alone.
I have written manufacturer guidance from Candela confirming that ethnicity is not a contraindication, that Fitzpatrick II–III are approved, and that patch testing is recommended where there is uncertainty.
I am seeking accuracy and transparency, not conflict.

I am very disappointed with my experience. I booked a package of six sessions. I used three sessions and still had three remaining. However, when I visited today, I was told that my remaining sessions had expired.

When I first joined the clinic, I specifically asked about expiration, and I was told that I could still use the sessions even after one year. In fact, I did use sessions after one year before, so I was very surprised to hear that the rules had changed, or that I was given incorrect information.

At no point was I informed that the sessions would expire, and I did not receive any reminder or notification about an expiration date. If the policy has changed, customers should be clearly informed.

Because of this situation, I believe it would be fair to either refund the unused sessions or provide proper reminders before expiration. I am very disappointed with how this has been handled.

I've had laser hair removal sessions for awhile now here and I've had great results! After 12 sessions I barely get any hair growth anymore, I'm now doing just my top up sessions twice a year when I can buy them on sale. The staff is always friendly and quite knowledgeable. Shout out to Lindsay today who's been really friendly and nice but also gave me some really valuable information which I wish I knew earlier x

Horrendous!! I had a massage booked for Saturday 10th July and I called 2 days before to check the time as I’d forgotten and not had a confirmation. And they said “oh I’m sorry I’m gonna have to reschedule for Monday” ??!! What??!! I called you?? I would’ve turned up to this appointment with no one working? Appalling 🤬

So I arrived and didn’t realise it was the upstairs of a supermarket so it was hard to locate at first and this was not detailed on their website, I was a little early so I waited for 20 minutes, during this time there were 3 unsupervised young children wandering, shouting and playing. Not the kind of vibe you want when you’ve booked a relaxing massage! Eventually the lady came to get me and the massage itself itself was relaxing but I’d booked an aromatherapy massage and no scented oils were used, I was put in a few odd positions and wasn’t really explained what was happening. You could hear the children shouting and running around during the massage which made me feel the opposite of relaxed. It might have just been a bad day, I know every business has them but this was quite a bad first impression and I don’t intend to go back. Really subpar experience.

This was such an amazing massage and I've had so many!! I was in Leeds for the first time and had booked a 90 minute deep tissue massage. I thought it would be back, neck and shoulders but it was full body and it was just incredible. She also clicked my back at the end after putting me into all sorts of positions. She could tell/feel I had a bad shoulder and before I came here I was taking codeine every day for the pain. I visited 3 or 4 weeks ago now and I still haven't had to take pain killers since. I literally left feeling brand new and genuinely wish I lived in Leeds purely to come here all the time!! Whenever I come back, I will a million percent be coming back here! The ladies were so friendly and lovely too!!
It was a little hard to find, you have to walk into the supermarket and walk up the stairs at the back to get there. I phoned them to say I couldn't find it and they helped me on the phone.
One of the best massages and experiences I've ever had.

I've been to Charm twice now and really enjoyed both visits. I think it's not a place to go if you are new to Thai massage. The therapist is very strong and doesn't shy away from putting pressure on problem areas. This can cause pain/discomfort but if you are experienced then you know this is normal. If it's too much, say and they will stop. I think it's great value for money given over the road at Nuad Thai Boran you pay £20 more for the same thing.  Happy to recommend and will definitely return.
Excellent Deep Tissue massage by Ray. I felt so relaxed afterwards and she was really helpful with the whole process, making sure I was comfortable with the massage! ✨

I visited Dragonfly Skin Day Spa for a Swedish massage and a classic facial with Nerissa, and it was truly wonderful from start to finish. The atmosphere was calm, clean, and beautifully designed perfect for relaxation. Nerissa was professional, lovely and made the whole experience so comfortable. Both the massage and facial were exceptional, leaving my skin glowing and my body deeply relaxed. It was one of the most rejuvenating spa experiences I’ve had.

Highly recommend this place for anyone looking to unwind and treat themselves!

Amazing experience at the Dragonfly Spa!

I recently visited this spa and had the pleasure of experiencing floating therapy for the first time in my life, followed by a relaxing massage with Natasha. Floating therapy was absolutely mind-blowing—it was one of the best experiences of my life!

The massage was equally incredible. Natasha was highly professional, attentive, and truly poured her heart into every moment of the treatment. It was deeply relaxing and exactly what I needed.

Malaika welcomed me and introduced me to the floating therapy with such outstanding service that I immediately felt at home. She was incredibly kind and professional, and at the end of my visit, she surprised me with a lovely Christmas bracelet and a sweet treat—it was such a great gesture!

The spa itself is conveniently located in the heart of busy Leeds, providing a peaceful oasis amidst the hustle and bustle. I highly recommend this place for anyone seeking relaxation and rejuvenation. I’ll definitely be back!

♥️

I received the Signature Body Ritual with Nerissa and hours later I still feel completely relaxed. It was my first massage so I was a bit anxious but the people are so nice and welcoming. Just writing this review makes me want to go back for another!

I visited Dragonfly Skin Day Spa recently and had a wonderful experience. I tried the floatation therapy and a de-stress massage with Nerissa. Jonathan was also very kind and took the time to explain how the flotation therapy works, answering all my questions. Nerissa was excellent — she’s clearly skilled at what she does. I went in with a knot in my back and left feeling completely relaxed. I’d definitely recommend booking a session at Dragonfly Skin Day Spa!

Dragonfly Spa is a little oasis in the city centre of Leeds. I highly recommend the private sauna and massage experience. An hour in a private sauna with tv or music and there is a shower to cool off. It’s a nice private space. The therapists Nerissa and Tatiana were superb and Jonathan provides a warm welcome

Such a pleasant experience having treatments with Dr Bailey. Her manner is so warm and professional. She talked me through everything and made sure all my questions were answered. I could tell she really knows her stuff.
I felt comfortable her clinic as it was spotless and sterile yet at the same time it calming and relaxing.
Dr Bailey is a professional with many years of experience and it shows! I couldn't go anywhere else now.

I would definitely recommend Dr Bailey to anyone who is interested in skincare or facial aesthetics. She has helped with me with my skincare routine and I am really pleased with the results, my skin looks brighter and more refreshed.
Bailey is up to date with the latest treatments and is happy to answer any questions to find the right plan for you. She takes care to provide good quality treatment every time and is dedicated to looking after her patients.

Bailey is friendly, instantly putting you at ease. She always takes the time to talk you through everything. She also gave me advice on skincare which has helped me achieve excellent results. I would highly recommend her!
Bailey's treatment was wonderful; she was calm and friendly, listened carefully to our needs, and answered any questions we had. I'd never had a treatment like this before but she converted me!

I’ve been a client of Dr Bailey for several years, and her consistently professional and compassionate approach has always left me feeling reassured and confident. The results are exceptional, and the aftercare is second to none. I appreciate the dedication and attention she brings to every appointment.
Very relaxing massage and friendly, attentive service. I had the head shoulders and back massage would highly recommend.

Not quite a relaxing experience as my massager was a bit rushed to finish my session. She sometimes turned/moved my body not too gently. I would only recommend it if you are looking for an affordable thai massage but if you are after a more relaxing experience, maybe other options would be better paying a bit more.
Had a lovely time, I had the oil massage and jacuzzi session. The massage therapist made me feel very relaxed and comfortable, she was very friendly. The staff are overall nice people.
It had a reeally good massage! Amazing job from Rose. All other people were friendly and really good service there! Will come again definitely.

Go inside and you’ll see  how amazing it is.. Best Thai massage in Leeds!  Hands down.  Thank you 😊
Can’t wait for next time.
I love having a shower after the lovely massages I get from staff at Phun Tawee and just being in there gives me calm vibes.

I highly recommend Ayush Ayurveda to anyone seeking relief from shoulder pain or any other health concerns. Their skilled practitioners, personalized treatments, and holistic approach make them a standout clinic in the realm of Ayurvedic healthcare. I am grateful for the positive impact they have had on my well-being.

If you're looking for effective solutions to alleviate shoulder pain or other health issues, I wholeheartedly endorse Ayush Ayurveda. Their adept therapists, customized therapies, and comprehensive approach distinguish them as a top-tier clinic in the field of Ayurvedic medicine. I appreciate the beneficial influence they've had on my overall health and wellness.

Excellent experience, and I wholeheartedly endorse Ayush Ayurveda for everyone.
I received excellent care treatment at Ayush Ayurveda for my backpain .The customer service was friendly and outstanding.
Thanks a lot

It's not massage therapy but treatment to recover from muscle related issues.
I have a good recovery from back stiffness and frozen shoulder.
I had a good treatment with Ayush Ayurveda for my backpain .The service was very excellent,approachable.Always recommended to others .Thanks Ayush  .

i’ve been going to zara for my lip filler since moving to leeds, today was the 4th time, and honestly i wouldn’t trust anyone else. i only go back every 2 years because my filler holds so well, which says everything. this time was my second 0.5ml and she’s absolutely perfected my lip shape, she never overdoes it, just tops them up to look natural and perfect.

what i love most is that i completely trust her judgment! she would never give me more than i need (she’d never push 1ml if 0.5ml is enough). zara is so knowledgeable and reassuring, and both her and her sister estelle are genuinely the loveliest.

the clinic has such a warm, energetic, welcoming vibe it’s such a nice place to be. i love my lips every single time, and my girlfriend has booked in with them now too. couldn’t recommend them enough !!!

there is truly nobody i would trust more than zara with anything on my face. time and time again i’ve gone to her thinking I wanted one thing only for her to suggest something completely different and every single time what she recommends works a million times better (obviously🤣) . her knowledge, perfectionism and skill are genuinely incredible, she has such an unbelievable talent

everything zara does is carried out with such care, precision and expertise. she understands faces on a level that is SO reassuring and she is completely honest, she will happily say no if she doesn’t believe something will look right for you. that alone speaks volumes about her professionalism and integrity. she listens to exactly what it is you want to change, takes the time to really understand your insecurities and problem areas, and then does everything in her power to make sure you leave feeling your absolute best inside and out

i went in wanting tear trough treatment, something id wanted for such a long time as I’d always had deep lines under my eyes that were a huge insecurity for me. instantly zara told me that tear trough wasn’t what I needed and wasn’t right for me and suggested an alternative. trusting that advice was so daunting especially when you have your heart so set on something you THINK will work for you but the results were so much better than i could ever have imagined and i am so overwhelmed by how much better i feel, i genuinely don’t know why i doubted her for a single second. this is just one example of how perfectly she understands what your face truly needs. she applies the same level of precision and care to everything she does, my lips and botox are always so beyond perfect and exactly right for my face and something i get complimented on soooo often (even after not having them done for 4 years because they lasted so well). she has never let me down and honestly knows my face wayyyyy better than i do

beyond her talent, zara is one of the most beautifully kind, purest people you could ever meet. i genuinely look forward to my appointments just to see her, even more than for the treatments themselves. she will always squeeze me in for last minute appointments where she can, she is always asking about me and my life but honestly the entire team at the clinic are just as wonderful. everybody is so warm, welcoming and attentive. they remember all  the little details, always take the time to chat with you, and consistently make sure you feel comfortable and cared for

i honestly couldn’t recommend this clinic more and would talk about it until i was blue in the face if i could. zara has built something truly special and hearing how much her business continues to grow at each appointment makes me so happy because you really see and feel all of the hard work she puts in and there is absolutely nobody more deserving. if you’re ever unsure where to go for aesthetics, there is absolutely no question that this is the place. truly the best in the game 🥺🤍

Had such an amazing experience on the mentorship day with Zara & Yildiz. The support received, skills shared, and knowledge gained was second to none. Seeing the live demos up close as they worked on models was really special.  For anyone thinking of receiving mentoring with these ladies I highly recommend them. I was made to feel so comfortable, supported and valued from the second I stepped in to the room with them. The ongoing support is also a lifeline for practitioners, especially those who work alone.  10/10 experience. Thank you so much ladies 🤍

Had my lips done for the first time today I LOVE THEM.

Zara was just so amazing , very informative , practically 0 pain. Love love love love

Was unsure about filler etc but was definitely in safe hands

Thanks so so so much

Had my lips done by Zara after going to several different places before, can 100% say i will never go anywhere else again! All staff lovely and welcoming and zara is amazing she really takes her time and explains everything to you in detail! Results are like no other too!

What an amazing experience. Not only is the massage amazing but Magdalena made me feel so much at ease for the whole experience. In the crazy world we live, Magda helped me ‘disappear’ into another beautiful world. To wake with her beautiful presence and smile. Magda you are truly amazing and will see you time and time again ❤️

Magdalena's Hawaiian massage in Leeds is a hidden gem! Her intuitive touch and skilled technique provided a truly transformative experience. As a former holistic massage practitioner, I highly recommend her.

I experienced Magdelena’s sacred touch today. I have to say the whole thing was a masterpiece. She took me on a journey of self discovery and reflection with her healing loving hands Lomi Lomi massage.
The blessings and prayers that accompany this massage make it extra beautiful with specially curated music and sacred space. Magdelena really takes care and pride in her work and knows how to move the body to ensure the best results possible.
I will definitely be back as no other massage will ever come close to this.
Thank you 🙏 and Aloha 🌺

Really lovely experience with Magda and her amazing touch. Magda made me feel very comfortable and cared for from the very first email. Massage I received was unlike anything I have experienced previously, it really is like receiving unconditional love through touch. I recommend Magda wholeheartedly to anyone who is needing compassion, acceptence and respect. She made me feel cared for and I will be back :)

Arrangement very easy, confirmation by WhatsApp.
The room is warm and cosy.
Magda does an amazing energising massage. Two hours were all too short. Just a wonderful experience.
For those who’ve not had a Lomi Lomi Nui massage it’s worth knowing what to expect and this met all expectations.

I had such a wonderful experience at Dr Sanniya and I honestly couldn’t be happier with my decision to come here. I’ve been a customer since December and from the very first appointment I felt listened to, cared for, and genuinely supported.
Mia has been absolutely amazing throughout my entire skin journey – she is so kind, knowledgeable, and incredibly reassuring. I had a burn on my top lip and was feeling very apprehensive, especially with my wedding coming up, but she took the time to explain everything clearly and made me feel calm and confident in the process. Her support honestly made such a difference.

Neda was also wonderful – always smiling, chatting away, and making every visit feel friendly and welcoming. The whole team creates such a warm, professional environment where you feel truly looked after..

I’ve previously been to other medical aesthetics clinics and unfortunately found them unhelpful, which left me really disheartened. Coming to Dr Sanniya was a completely different experience. The treatment Dr Sanniya recommended genuinely worked, and seeing real results gave me so much confidence, especially leading up to such an important time in my life.

I’m genuinely so glad I chose to spend my money here and trusted them with my skin. I would 100% recommend Dr Sanniya to anyone looking for expert care, honest advice, and a truly supportive team.

Love my experience here every time I book! Dr Sanniya provides an informed, knowledgeable assessment that isn’t rushed, and considers facial anatomy And because of that the results do not disappoint, but enhance and harmonise the profile. I was able to communicate my desired outcome and I was listened to, I’m very happy. The clinic well kept, neat and the other practitioners are kind and skilful with the treatments they provide also. Would recommend!

*Dr Saniyya at Leeda Clinic*
I’ve had treatments with Dr Saniyya at Leeda Clinic and I’m really happy with my results. The outcome looks completely natural, which is exactly what I wanted. She truly knows what she’s talking about and is incredibly professional and friendly. I’m so glad I plucked up the courage to go and see her – I only wish I’d done it sooner! I will definitely be recommending her to others.

I’ve had multiple treatments at Aesthetica Medical and the standard and knowledge of the treatments have always been amazing! I’ve had the Laser hair removal and even after 3 sessions i can already feel and see the results. I’ve also started Nuera skin tightening on my tummy as i have stubborn fat that i couldn’t shift, i’m about half way through my course and i’m really happy with the results. Finally i’ve had the Hydrafacial which has been really good for refining my acne scars and making me feel less congested - as i’m acne prone. I can’t wait to try the Microneedling once i’ve finished this course. I was really nervous about trusting anyone else with my skin as it’s always been an issue for me, but all the ladies have been amazing and helped me feel so much more confident and comfortable in my skin! My skin therapist is professional and honest about my skin journey so i feel i’m always kept in the loop! All the treatments i’ve had here are of such a high standard and the staff especially, make it even a nicer experience. I would 100% wholeheartedly recommend aesthetica medical.

I had a fantastic experience at Aesthetica Medical! The team was welcoming, professional, and made me feel completely at ease. The clinic itself is modern and spotless, and the staff took the time to explain every step of the procedure. The service was excellent from start to finish, and I left feeling very satisfied with the care I received. I would highly recommend Aesthetica Medical to anyone looking for quality skin and aesthetic treatments in Leeds.

Such a lovely place to visit for treatment. Very friendly atmosphere. The treatments I have had so far have been amazing. The lymphatic drainage massage really helped reduce swelling significantly. The deep cleansing facial cleansed and brightened my face. I would highly recommend visiting this Bonitaz Serenity Spa xxx

Paula made me feel really comfortable, positive and relaxed about the whole experience i had a Hydrafacial which has left my skin feeling super clean, soft and glowing ✨️ amazing service and treatment 👌🏽 Thank You so much ☺️

Just had the most amazzzzing lymphatic massage ever ever! The fact we both got excited after seeing the initial difference was unmatched. More than that, the customer service and chat was the best. Will definitely be a regular and will most definitely be staying up to date with them!!

I had two specialised treatments to enhance appearance and glow. These were immediately visible . Great techniques used with all areas explored, and so I am extremely happy with plans to return.
Thank you.

I recently had the most amazing experience at this spa. The moment I walked in, I was greeted by the most relaxing atmosphere. Paula was incredibly friendly and made me feel right at home. The treatment was amazing  left me feeling rejuvenated. I especially loved their Hydra  facial, it worked wonders for my skin. I would highly recommend to anyone looking for a little self-care and pampering. Can't wait to go back

Erica has been my massage therapist for a few years and she is essential to my wellbeing. Deep tissue massage with Erica is part of my overall maintenance for pain I have in my body. Without Erica I would not be able to function as well as I do and my quality of life would be affected. Erica knows my issues and she knows how to treat them. I don’t need to explain anything to her because she knows. She takes care of her clients and she is passionate about looking after her clients as individuals. Erica is also a genuinely brilliant yoga teacher. Erica is just overall a truly lovely and caring person who wants to give her clients the best. She’s set up a beautiful studio and therapy space that is much needed in Leeds.

I have experienced some of the best holistics therapies at Id Holistics and would and do recommend it to everyone.

Deep therapeutic body work is my favourite go to.
As the name suggest it goes deep into the muscles of the body to release tension and toxins in the body. For me it is full body work, the physical and the emotional. I have to breathe through the pressure and succumb to the release but it is worth it for the feeling of space created in the body and the mind afterwards.

Erica is an amazing therapist who I trust to work on body in this way means she knows things about me that I might not even realise about myself but she helps me work through the signals my body is giving. This level of connection takes time to build but I am so glad I stuck with this work and have now found a therapist who soothes my aching shoulders and my soul!

I've been coming to Erica for a few years now for reflexology and holistic massage. Erica is amazing - knowledgeable,  intuitive and caring - I always look forward to the next treatment! Her studio is serene and cosy - a warm oasis in Leeds city centre.
I ventured to take Erica and Esmee's candlelit Yin yoga workshop last week. I don't practise yoga regularly, so was a bit uncertain. Erica talked through the poses and gave alternatives which was great. I felt restored and Esmee's amazing sound bath transported any stress away. What a wonderful experience! Hope to do it again. 🧡

I just had a reflexology session with Erica. I didn't even know how much I needed it till I was laying in the massage table wrapped in Erica's caring, loving and nurturing energy.
I had about 3 weeks of one shock after another and as she was pressing the diferent painful areas I could feel emotions getting unblocked and released. Being able to share my inner experience in the safe space of acceptance that Erica creates has helped me even more.
I feel so much lighter and more alive.
Thank you so much Erica!

I could only truly describe my happiness with the retreat day at ID, by sharing the fact that I cried upon entry to the studio as I laid my eyes on the beautiful and fresh floral laid set up for our day. It was like walking into a wall of kind intention and pure love, just from Erica and Eva’s time setting up our retreat.

An incredibly special session, with a watchful eye on every detail. The Cacao ceremony was heartwarming, the Reiki was deeply healing and all the girls had a beautiful experience to share after the sessions with Eva. Anyone who has received a massage from Erica knows how incredible her touch is, and the Indian head massages were no exception! Yoga on point as always! We visited for a retreat day last year with close friends to celebrate a birthday, and spent the whole day swimming in relaxation, smiles and connection.

Thanks ID team. What an absolute treat. Thanks for going above and beyond with the whole thing, the surprises along the way made it even more special. One Love x

I had a facial done today by Gosia, and it was absolutely incredible! Gosia was so welcoming, kind and professional. It was such a relaxing experience and my skin looks and feels great. The salon itself was super clean, I highly recommend Gosia she was great!

I had a hydrafacial done by Gosia, and she was fabulous. She took the time to understand my skin and my concerns before beginning any treatment. She made me feel comfortable throughout, and gave me great advice on products I should and shouldn’t be using. My skin felt so lovely afterwards, I will definitely be back

Even though i love good pampering, i am usually not a fan of beauty treatments because I can't sit still for too long. 🤭 HOWEVER, with Emilia and her approach, I loved it and it seemed to go so fast. She took such a great care of me and I'm coming back. 😇

Absolutely amazing experience!
I had a HydroFacial treatment at this clinic and I’m beyond impressed. The location is super convenient, just minutes from the city center. The atmosphere is warm, stylish, and welcoming. you feel relaxed the moment you walk in. The staff is incredibly friendly and professional.
After the treatment my skin looked fresh, glowing and smooth . even fine lines were softened and clogged pores were visibly cleared. I truly felt like a new person.
From the bottom of my heart I highly recommend this place. If you want real results and a lovely experience then this is the clinic to go to! 💖
I had a great facial from Gosia today! She made me feel really comfortable and has helped understand what my skin needs going forward! Looking forward to my future treatments. Thank you

Had an exceptional experience from start to finish today at Angels. The atmosphere is serene, the venue immaculate and I was treated with genuine care from the moment I arrived. The staff are warm, discreet and highly professional, creating an effortless sense of comfort and indulgence throughout.

Without a doubt, the finest Leeds has to offer!!

Tried here for the first time today after reading about it for a while. Was very impressed. Dale on reception explained everything in a friendly and efficient manner, quickly answering any questions I had. After paying my entrance fee I went in and was warmly met by Channel and Alexandria. After a bit of a chat and a coffee Alexandria took me to the massage room and gave me an amazing massage. Felt totally relaxed by the end . She definitely has magic hands. Would definitely recommend

Best club around
Been coming here last 5 years
I was a winstons regular but main guy at winstons started working there.
The short guy with the biggest arms I've ever seen. Like the hulk
He is a lovely chap and always made me feel welcome.
Good looking chap as well.
Girls are all friendly.
Place is clean.
Place is safe
Recommend 10/10

After watching football
Treated my self
On entrance was an extremely good looking man who took £10 off me with a tremendous smile.
Slightly got me going.
When in the club had a great time.
Service was amazing.
When leaving was booked a taxi.
Will definitely go back just to see the receptionist

Absolutely 100% disappointed £10 entrance fee but facilities are poor. Everything is rushed just to get you out the door and if pay for an hours company you’re lucky to get 45 mins. Definitely a waste of money and a bad experience. Stay away from here

What can I say! Simran is amazing, polite & professional. She made me look a million dollars at all the events for my daughter’s wedding. Everyone complimented me. Highly recommend her without hesitation for hair & makeup

The best eyebrow threading I've ever had! Simran was so kind, gentle and thorough with the treatment, you can really tell she puts a lot of love into what she does. The results are amazing, I'm so happy!! I will be a lifelong customer now.
Amazing is all I can say hair and makeup looked amazing would definitely recommend going to the salon everyone is very friendly and professional
Loved my makeup simran listened to want I wanted and did an amazing job of my make up got so many compliments

I always go to be beautiful by simran because she does the best eyebrows!! Her threading and tinting is so amazing and her price is so affordable. Such a lovely owner and amazing results every time!! I’ve been going for years now and I will never go elsewhere! I can’t trust anyone but her with my brows!! Highly recommend

Been getting my nails done for years and decided to go with Anka while visiting my partner in Leeds, and she is by far the BEST nail technician I’ve ever been to. She was gentle but fast and efficient, the fastest nails I’ve had done. I’m used to it hurting in some way but it was relaxing from start to finish with Anka. Previous nail technicians have done damage so she took extra care with my natural nails. The end result are my favourite nails yet!
Anka is a very professional nail technician. She is really good at what she does. Every time I walk out with a smile! :)
I am very satisfied, thank you very much for my nails.

I was looking for a sports massage that could help me with the issue of pain from my lower back I was very pleasantly surprised when I found this therapist. I often find I'm unsatisfied but this wasn't the case. He was able to get into my muscles with deep pressure that I needed and was always asking me if the pressure was too much he gave me a score of 1-10 of how hard to go. I was very pleased and highly reccomend this therapist. If I hadn't gone to see him I don't believe I would have been able to get out of my bed the next day if I hadn't seen him., that's how bad my pain was. I hope to see him on a monthly top up.
I had a lovely experience. My lower back and joints have in bad shape . Had pains all over my body. He is so good with his hands he knows his job. Will recommend him any day.
Thanks Wondi for the massive relief I had after your massage. I can now move the affected area better than it used to be. All the best!
Fantastic Deep tissue  massage - already feel vibrant and booking again in 10 days 👍🏽
he has experienced masseur, I recommended this man for sport massage and deep tissue massage. he is excellent to pain manegement too

I had a Hollywood wax with Abi, and she is such a lovely, bubbly person. She chats with you and really puts you at ease. Her salon is clean and hygienic, she uses gloves, a new stick, and fresh wax sheets, so everything feels very safe and well cared for. The space looks lovely, and she didn’t make me feel uncomfortable at all. Very professional and genuinely kind. I would highly recommend her salon.
Had my waxing done by Abi yesterday - she was so lovely and I’ll definitely be back 🙂
Abi is a pro and makes you feel at ease throughout your treatment. I have been coming to Eden beauty for only a few months, but I am definitely a regular now! Highly recommend for waxing, especially!

Abi is the absolute best! Been going to her for 3 years now for waxing/laser and wouldn’t go anywhere else. Her treatments are always perfect and she’s such a lovely person, I look forward to our monthly catch ups

Abi is one of the best out there. Very friendly, makes you feel comfortable and at ease. I had a lovely massage and she was flexible with the massaged areas as I am pregnant. I had a relaxed and lovely time!
If only I could do it every week!

I had a wonderful experience at this clinical aesthetics. The atmosphere is calm, beautifully maintained, and instantly makes me feel comfortable. The staff are attentive, skilled, and genuinely care about delivering the best results. Every treatment was done with precision and professionalism, and I left feeling refreshed, confident, and very well looked after.
Highly recommended for anyone looking for quality service and a touch of luxury.
We are the best Andreia🥰 Many Thanks

“ Relaxing Touch Beauty” what an amazing experience it was! I went in there for a facial treatment and back massage and everything was incredible,  Andreia was extremely professional, and provided exactly what my body needed. The atmosphere was super clean and calming, and you can really tell how much care and skill goes into the service. I left feeling completely refreshed and already looking forward to my next visit very soon.

Highly recommended!

Relaxing Touch Beauty Spa is absolutely wonderful! The atmosphere is calm and welcoming, the staff is attentive, and the professionals are highly skilled. The experience was relaxing from start to finish. You can truly feel the care and attention to detail. Highly recommended!

Such caring and professional service!
I recently had surgery and needed lymphatic drainage, so I reached out to Relaxing Touch Beauty Spa. From the very first session, she made me feel safe, supported, and truly cared for. She was gentle, knowledgeable, and took her time to explain everything, which helped me relax so much. I could feel a real difference in my recovery after each appointment. I’m genuinely grateful for her kindness and professionalism.
Highly recommended! 😊

She’s amazing! Very professional and caring, with such a calm and positive energy. The massage was perfect, and I felt so relaxed afterward. You can tell she really loves what she does. I’ll definitely come back!

Ray is an absolute professional and truly knows his craft. From the moment you walk in, you can tell he’s passionate about what he does and genuinely cares about providing the best experience possible. His knowledge and technique are on another level you can really feel the difference in his work.

Whether you need to relax, recover from training, or just treat yourself, Ray’s the one to go to. He takes the time to understand your needs and tailors the massage perfectly. You’ll walk out feeling refreshed, relaxed and like a new person.

Honestly, his passion and skill will take him far. If you’re in Leeds and want a proper massage, don’t think twice — Ray is your guy. 100% recommend him, the best massage therapist around!

I first met Ray through athletics after he was recommended by one of my training partners, and from day one he has gone above and beyond to ensure I’m always in the best possible condition to perform at the highest level. His professionalism is exceptional, yet he still manages to create a relaxed, positive environment with good vibes and a laugh, something that makes every session enjoyable. What truly sets Ray apart is his dedication. He takes the time to understand not just the injury, but the athlete or person behind it, tailoring his approach so you feel supported, motivated, and confident in your progress. His commitment to his clients is unmatched, and it’s clear he genuinely cares about helping people reach their full potential and fixing issues to the best of his ability. I couldn’t recommend Ray highly enough. Whether you’re an elite athlete or someone simply looking to move and feel better, he delivers the level of care, knowledge, and support you’d expect from a top class physiotherapist.

Thank you Ray!

I climb fairly regularly and had a lot of aches and pains, especially upper body.
Ray was very knowledgeable, and quickly able to find the problem areas. He was friendly, professional, and he clearly took pride in delivering results.

I can't remember the last time my body felt so relaxed, I will definitely be going back regularly

Recently visited Ray for some shoulder and hip issues. After a thorough consultation, he helped me understand the problem and provided effective treatment. He clearly knows his stuff and is highly qualified in sports therapy. The care he provides is well tailored and personal.

After just one session, I’m already feeling much better and can notice real improvement. I’ll definitely be returning!

Ray was excellent came in with lower back pain after being a consistent runner. He did a simple initial assement. He was super professional explaining in details what he issues could be and why he was targeting specific areas  affected.  Honestly pain has completely gone and feel a lot more mobile! I’ve been to a few sports massages now, however super grateful found a therapist who works! Well recommended and would recommend to anyone who struggles with muscle pain! Thanks again

Sonia is amazing at her work she is such a lovely person. Very professional and you are made to feel relaxed the moment you walk into her salon.
She has given me exactly what I asked for and more. As a woman in my early sixties she has given me my confidence back.
At first I had lip blush then semi permanent eye brows. I was so pleased with the results, I decided to go back and have a mini face lift with botox and fillers, the results are incredible so much so when someone asked my age lately they couldn't believe it they thought I was in my late forties ...... this lady can definitely work her magic
I will definitely be back in the future!
"I had my lip blush done, and i must say the prices are so reasonable  ! Sonia, was incredibly friendly. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for quality service and a warm atmosphere."
Definitely recommend this salon! Sonia is such a lovely woman. Prices are very reasonable and worth it. More than happy with my treatment and will definitely be going back for more treatments.

Absolutely brilliant service!! My lips look amazing after getting the lip blush.

Highly recommend! So worth the price you pay. And for the service you receive from sonia is just a bonus. :)

I highly recommend Sonia for lip blush, not only is she so lovely and professional she has given me exactly what I asked for and my confidence has improved massively. Will definitely be back in the future! Thankyou :)

A huge thank you to Mobina! She’s an energetic, lively, and beautiful girl, and her attitude was amazing throughout the entire service. The treatment she provided was truly professional and carefully done， you can really feel her dedication. I had an incredibly relaxing and enjoyable two hours with her. Highly recommended! 💖

I visited Vivo today in Leeds for an appointment with Keisha. She is very friendly and extremely professional at what she does and completely put me at ease, explaining the treatments I had so I knew what to expect. Highly recommend her!

Mobina is absolutely amazing! She is so lovely and well informed. She made me feel really comfortable and explained the difference in options and effects of the treatment. At first I was unsure, but she was reassuring and I have already started to see a difference in my stomach. I would recommend! I am in the early stages, but excited to see the end results with perciverance.
Hi I was so happy with my treatment done by Keisha. Definitely recommend her very professional. Also explain for all my questions. Thank you

It was a very relaxing experience at the Leeds Studio. Mobina was very welcoming and informative in the treatments that I was having.
I will definitely be booking again.

I was in the area and I made a last minute decision to come to the shop to get a quick 30 min relaxing massage!

There were two lovely Thai ladies available and they were very reassuring and chatty whilst I was waiting for my room!

I went with a lady called Mintra she was lovely and her massage service was excellent, super friendly and totally unrushed! I will be back soon!
They are really amazing in the works especially jojo
My husband and me have both had a few massages by Sunisa and very much recommend her services. Sunisa is a very talented and professional therapist, we will definitely be using her services again!

I just called to make a appointment... She kept saying busy, and  I am trying to ask her do you have any appointments at all for today?.. She said yes 6 or 7.. then I said can you fit me in for full aromatherapy massage?.. She cuts me off obviously she doesn't want the business... Why the hell are you open!!!!!!
Absolutely amazing massage. Friendly staff and made to feel at ease. Will definitely be going back

Just had a 90-minute session with Hugh at Magic Hands Massage and wow, hands down the best massage I’ve ever had! From the initial consultation through to the very last moment, Hugh was incredibly thorough, professional, and explained everything clearly based on my specific needs.

His expertise shines through , with over 20 years of experience, he truly knows what he’s doing. The precision, pressure, and intuition in his hands are on another level.

He identified and really sorted my tension and stiffness out !

I genuinely can’t recommend Hugh enough he’s easily one of the best in the business.

Thank you I’ll be back !!!

I had the most amazing experience with Hugh. From the moment I walked in, I felt completely at ease. The ambiance was serene, and their professionalism was unmatched. High truly has a gift—every technique was perfectly tailored to my needs, and I could feel the tension melting away with each movement.

Hugh took the time to listen to my concerns and addressed every area with precision and care. By the end of the session, I felt rejuvenated, relaxed, and completely renewed. This wasn’t just a massage; it was a healing experience.

Thank you, Hugh, for an extraordinary session. I can’t wait for my next appointment!

What a massage! I have been looking for a massage therapist who is strong enough and prepared to manipulate all my knots and pain points for ages. And now I’ve found Hugh. He understands your anatomy, listens to what you need, recommends the best approach, creates an immediate trust and rapport, and delivers over and above. Thanks Hugh 🙏🏽

My massage with Hugh was amazing. It was my first visit and he made me feel relaxed and welcome. During my consultation, Hugh listened to what I had been struggling with and was able to target those specific areas during the massage. The ambience in the therapy room was very comforting and the smell of essential oils enhanced my experience of relaxation and peace. Highly recommended!

I booked a 30 minute Swedish massage with Hugh and now feel fantastic! The venue is clean and comfortable, Hugh is very professional, the booking is very straight forward and the massage has left my back and neck feeling released of tension. I loved the electric blanket as a base, and the beautiful warm oil…all help with relaxation. It was a super massage and I’d be happy to rebook and recommend Magic Hands.

If you want your spa day with treatments cancelled or rearranged not to your convenience on THE DAY of your spa day, then go ahead and book here. I booked a spa day well in advance as a gift for my mums 70th birthday. They contacted me a week before that due to staff sickness, one of us will have to have a different massage to the one I booked. I accommodated this. They then contacted me just as we were about to leave for the spa day by EMAIL (not even by telephone) that there was staff sickness and we either had to rearrange for another day or one of us has the treatment and to come back another day for the other treatments. I tried calling customer service several times. No answer. I emailed back and had a late response. I have NEVER been cancelled last minute for a spa day, as other places have always had freelance staff working for these occasions. Absolutely outrageous, especially for a first time customer. I would not book again. Well done for ruining my mums birthday surprise.

I had a really positive experience at Bannatyne, thanks to Rahul and Zak. Rahul was friendly, efficient, and professional, always providing great service with a positive attitude and making the café a pleasant place to be. Zak manages the team extremely well. He’s approachable, organised, and ensures everything runs smoothly. You can clearly see a strong focus on customer experience and teamwork throughout the facility. Overall, a great environment and a place I would happily recommend.

Very outdated and needs a revamp ASAP.
Let’s start with the reception, we have been asked whether this is our first visit to which we have confirmed. We have expected an explanation how everything works here, as we also had towels and robe rental. The email confirmation stated that flip flops will be provided, however, they have ran out those and have not made any effort to explain until we came back to ask for it, yet we have been charged £10 for the towel, bag, robe and flip flops. The receptionist simply guided to upstairs to say where the spa procedures are but there are no clear indications where the spa treatments rooms are, as the sign above the door states different information. When we walked into the ‘spa salon’, ladies working there didn’t bother to greet us, and only a third lady (who we believe is a spa manager said Hello and someone will be with you shortly). Hubby enjoyed the massage, but not me. The lady doing the massage seemed very pleasant though.
The pool is overcrowded allowing people to play using toys that are not suitable for pool. There are fast and medium lines that are quite wide and runs through the pool, but the slow lane ir short and overcrowded - difficult to swim. Showers in the pool area are close to non running. Jacuzzi is cold, not temperature it should be. The families we chatted with also confirmed the same. The changing rooms are cold too - aircon is blasting - should be kept warmer. We have not been shown where to drop off dirty towels and robes, I stood in the reception for few minutes listening to three members simply sipping their coffees and chatting rather than helping me out, whilst the receptionist was on the phone. When I noticed where the drop of point is, and made a comment the receptionist didn’t bother to acknowledge or speak to me (she was off the phone by that time). Staff needs to be more respectful and helpful to the members and especially first time comers, as well as some urgent changes are needed.

I've been going to bannatyne for the past few years and wanted to say I've really noticed positive improvements with the club over recent months. The staff are lovely and helpful. The equipment is good, although the gym is a little small I think the space is used really well.
I found previously the sauna/steam room/hot tub were often broken or not at all warm but now all have been consistently hot and working. Ice baths are also a lovely addition.
Overall really enjoy coming here.

BEWARE! You will be overcharged. I signed up for a 3 month membership and you get charged 4 times. There's apparently no way around this even though I cancelled with more than 1 month notice. £350 for 4 months membership and I only wanted 3 which should have been £250. Overall very disappointing experience with the customer service and really disingenuous. Reporting to Trading and Standards who will hopefully sort this out. Reading through the reviews I can see I'm not the only person this has happened to! Don't bother signing up you'll regret it. I’d love to discuss this with the manager, please talk to Gothami and contact me via email.
Edit: Went in to speak in person and the person I spoke to was friendly, as well as Brooke who signed me up. It’s not the staffs fault but the conditions are ridiculous and very unclear. Overall do not trust this business and be sure to always check the fine print!
I have only words of praise for my waxing appointment with Lucy - she was so calming, gentle and friendly. Definitely coming back again!
The kindest and warmest experience. I was so pleased and will definitely be going back. Thank you for being so lovely (and efficient!)

Lucy was absolutely AMAZING! I travelled for over an hour to have a wax with Lucy, I can honestly say all of her reviews speak for themselves, she is such an amazing lady, she is so chatty bubbly and smiley, she completely put me at ease, her treatment room was clean and tidy and it smelt amazing! She was such a conversationist and made me feel so good about myself, with all this being said the wax was still done to a professional level, and she went the extra mile for me to make sure that she got every single hair, I was really happy with the experience. I would recommend anyone to go Here, Make sure you don't get confused as there's another business with a similar name in Bristol, but this is the one you want to book in for !

Great service!

I booked a hot wax which I'm always super nervous about as I'm pretty sensitive but Lucy was amazing. Not only was she really relaxed, professional and personable but it was the quickest and least painful wax I've ever had!

Will definitely be booking my next here.

Now let me start by saying the woman who did my treatment was lovely and friendly and she did apologise for the 15 minute late start, but it was a little annoying as I don't drive and had to travel to park row from Hengrove in the rain and had planned my journey accordingly. The place itself looks quite thrown together and the facilities were quite run down and scruffy considering the location and prices they charge. The customer toilet door didn’t close so I had to wee with the door open, which felt a bit weird and unprofessional. There was no proper loo roll so I had to use hand tissues that had been put in there, and I wasn't offered a glass of water so had to ask for one. I know it's only a small thing but most places will offer you one when you arrive. Nothing about the treatment was explained to me beforehand, I wasn't  asked about any health conditions or injuries and it all felt quite rushed. The massage itself was really lovely and I actually fell asleep during because I was so tired. However the masseuse had really cold hands to start with, which was a bit of a shock initially, and I would definitely consider the oils she used to be far too strong for use on the face and head area. Overall it got the job done and I'm glad I went, but for the price charged I wouldn't go back.

Boots is always a good choice if you need to do some cosmetic shopping or pick up quick medical essentials. This store was no different – we found exactly what we needed. Nicely laid out, very clean, and with super friendly staff.

Awful staff and poor customer service. People at the till don't talk to you which makes you feel like you've done something wrong and when you want help on one of the self checkouts they don't speak to you they just look at you like "what are you looking at?". I wanted to cancel my item because I could afford it in which there was only 1 staff member in the whole shop which was on the till who was too busy with the couple he was helping. The queue was getting ridiculously long with loads of other people needing help too. One member of staff finally comes over and comes over to my machine, looks away from me to talk to someone else and cancels my item then just stands there. I wait for her to turn back around so I can tell her " could I please put this item back?" To which she just stares at me after I say it and takes the item away and I leave. I don't understand what is so hard about helping a customer and making them feel welcome in a shop. if you are understaffed just don't bother opening that day and save everyone the stress of a bad experience. Also everything in that shop is stupidly priced, you can barely get a drink that isnt over 2 pounds. Please improve your staff and get this matter sorted, I'm not the only one who has experienced this type of treatment more than once. Thank you.

A lack of customer service and staff. Pharmacy staff when you’re asking them a question are having a laugh after saying hello to you, keeping you waiting. When going upstairs to collection point, half their staff are on lunch break at 3pm, Menai g there’s a whole line of people waiting and very few staff members to help.

Just hire more staff during the busy holiday period. Another big business taking advantage of staff making them do the work of many people…

Replaced all the checkout staff with automatic machines that don’t work very well and confuse a large subset of customers. This means the queue is even longer than it was before, there is just one person juggling all the rubbish machines and they are saving money on staff but still charging the same for a lack of service

I visited your pharmacy at approximately 12:20 today, August 5th, to pick up my medication. I was very displeased with the service I received from the young Asian lady who served me. She was very rude in her dealings, and I noticed she had previously served an elderly lady and treated her the same way.

I recommend that she receive customer service training and learn to communicate with customers professionally.

I’ve been a customer for decades in this store and much more recently have found it to be incredibly intimidating to be in. The security guard patrols the floor like you’ve committed a crime by even being in there and the staff are always so judgemental and rude too. I used to enjoy shopping here and also be able to buy a MUCH wider stock of men’s toiletries but not anymore sadly. I really loathe having to shop here and that’s a great shame because I truly never used to feel like that. I’m unable to get to another store aswell, if I was, I would.

We had a very bad experience in this Boots, usually the staff are nice in others. The first person raised her voice slightly to my mom telling her the cashier was over that side. The second was the bigger reason of writing this review (younger person with mask at cashier desk) . They refused to give me a student discount eventhough I am a student and showed her my ID. Actually we were 3 students and rushed us away which makes it ironic.

Time stamp: Saturday 4th Oct- 2pm

Being racially profiled and followed around the shop was not something I expected today. Your security guard made it painfully clear there was only one reason he was targeting me while ignoring everyone else. To make matters worse, your till operator tried to gaslight me about what happened. The whole experience was humiliating and unacceptable.

WARNING!
Don't buy prescription medicines here, they will inflate hugely the price, specially if you are a foreigner. Best to use online options where you can get prescription medicines after a short questionnaire.

They wanted to charge my girlfriend £70 for a 3£ medicine I found online, then I went to ask for the price and they told me they really said £25 (still super inflated), these guys are really abusers.

After a few bad Pharmacy experiences trying to source an out of stock HRT medication, I ended up at Boots Queens Road on Saturday 3rd May. Both the assistant and pharmacist were extremely helpful, understood about an SSP, and ordered In some medication for me. They also added me to a text alert system, so I would know when my medication had arrived.

Great first experience here. Bit my usual place to go as I do have a regular nail tech, but on this occasion I needed to find new tech I trust and liked when my usual lady is away which is quite a few times a year… have to say, I think I’ve found her. Rosa is very sweet,knowledgeable and skilled.
I’m quite a fussy client with sensory issues when it comes to my nails. She was very attentive and handled my “fussiness” well with no attitude whatsoever so ever. She was so accommodating and understanding. We got on really well and I left feeling very happy with not only the whole experience but the finished result.

Cannot recommend her enough.

I shall see you again next year.

Natalie has done my brow lamination, lash lift, and tinting of both a few times now and she has always been absolutely amazing! She took her time to give me a proper consultation before the service to ensure that she laminated my brows in a style that I liked. Her execution was amazing!!! And she also gave me a lot of advice on how to prolong the treatment and ensure the health of my brows and lashes. The brow gel that she recommended which was available to purchase at the salon was also amazing and feels so lush on my brows and lashes! She always goes above and beyond for her clients to ensure perfection at every appointment.
Lovely salon, I always go here for my beauty treatments with Kayla / Natalie. Both are lovely, amazing at what they do and make you feel comfortable - would definitely recommend!

Love getting my nails done here, this time a lovely sparkly set from Rosa!
(BIAB + Gel)

Rosa is an incredibly talented nail artist. She does a beautiful job and is always enthusiastic about my colour choices! She and Natalie are a ray of sunshine when you walk through the door, always with smiling faces and a funny story to tell. My cheeks usually ache from laughing by the time I leave. Can’t recommend them highly enough 🤩

I have been having beauty treatments at Serenity Beauty since it first opened. Even when I moved abroad I still returned to the salon. I decided to have  Botox treatment and didn't hesitate to book in with her. Why, because Niget is one of the best therapists I know. Over the years she has kept up with the demands of the industry to provide the best service to her clients. She is kind and always professional and I highly recommend the treatments she offers. Niget you are one of Bristol's gems. 💎
Nigit has just done my teeth whitening & I had a fabulous experience with her. Shes very comforting & the results were great. Highly recommend.
Nigiy was amazing. Had my teeth lightened. She was very professional and friendly. Highly recommend anyone wanting there teeth whitened to come here
Nigit has done a magnificent job on whitening my teeth. A nice warm welcome, easygoing and efficient!Very happy, highly recommend😁
Amazing service! Thank you, Nigit. Could not be happier with my teeth. They look whiter than ever! I can’t wait to come back. X

I go to Eastgate on a regular basis and there has never been a problem that Shahid has not been able to sort for me. I am generally the instigator of the problems but Shahid listens and is understanding and finds solutions that work, so if you have any issues ask for Shahid.

Went to the Eastgate store in Bristol, to exchange a perfume with a faulty spritz  pump that I got in an online order.  Sam, who helped me was incredibly helpful and after speaking to his manager managed to authorize an exchange so I can get my goods. Very happy with the high level of costumer care!

Always love coming into this boots store. The staff are always friendly and ask how you are and hope we have a good day. They always greet my children warmly and interact with them.
They have good offers on and they have a good range of products. There is a pharmacy inside, and a photo area.

Very bad customer relationship of the staff member Sam who did bill me for the products at 12:42 on 1/08/2025. The customer standing in the queue has told me they feel sorry for me. MR Sam was very rude and i have requested him 2 bad for 5 pack of Aptamil weight 800g he have given one bag and asked me to take. I Asked him how can i take all fine Aptamil in one paper bag. And he gives me another. I have requested him to give me the receipt and he was making me repeat many time and last said I can't understand what you saying. I would really appreciate for giving a customer relationship training for this staff members. Thank you

Why don’t you update google with opening hours for pharmacy.  Went down @ 6 to get urgent prescription to be told pharmacy shut @ 5pm.  When asked member of staff he was quite rude & said times are on the door!

I had The Loyalty Glow Experience today and I cannot thank the team enough. Great value for money as a little January treat to myself. The staff were all so lovely and professional. I was made to feel comfortable and relaxed throughout. My skin looks and feels incredible. Can’t wait to book with you again!

I have been coming to the Beauty Box Clifton for about 15 years and I wouldn't get my waxes done anywhere else. They are quick and efficient which is what you want with a wax. I met the new manager Elly today who was very personable and sweet, she carried out my treatment. A reliable salon and I will remain a loyal customer. Sometimes how comfortable the treatment is can vary depending on who you have but the results are always good. Clifton is also the best one compared to the Coldharbour clinic.

I was the lucky winner of a facial from a instagram competition. Lauren completed a microdermabrasion facial for me & it was the most dreamy start to the year! She explained everything in full & completed the treatment in a very relaxing environment. I will 100% be back! Thanks so much 🫶🏼

Came for micro needling and the therapist decided I didn’t need numbing cream, then proceeding to do three rounds on my face which was already bleeding after one. I Had severe bruising and swelling for weeks after and now have a scar on my face which I am now having to pay an actual professional to help with. Absolutely appalling. I will never go here again.
Trust me - do not go for cheap deals and inexperienced so called professionals.

And in response to you, please do not insult my intelligence, I’m well aware which salon it was. You just whatsapped me photos of somebody else and their before/after treatment. Other than this being an invasion of privacy for that client it really proves my point on the professionalism of the salon. Please do not call me or contact me again.

One of my best wax experiences I've ever had!! Was made to feel very comfortable, and my beautician knew EXACTLY what she was doing and pain was some of the least I've experienced. Would thoroughly recommend

My first time getting waxed today and Amanda was amazing at making me feel comfortable. Such a daunting experience to go through but honestly nothing to be anxious about! It was like a friend working down there and I was left so clean. Booked another appointment, can't wait to see results! :)

I had my nails done last Wednesday (in-fill with biab). Yesterday,I noticed that one of the nails has already chipped. I am really disappointed as the last time I had them done, the gel lasted for 4 weeks. I feel that the Polish this time.was not put on very evenly also. I called into today but the salon was closed. I would be grateful if just the one nails could be fixed please.
First time visitor this morning (birthday treat!) and very happy! Summer really looked after me - professional, lovely chats and so happy with my nails. Will definitely go again!
While staying at my daughters, booked luxery pedicure. Lovely friendly salon fabulous pedicure. Best I've had in ages. Would highly recommend.

This is my 3rd visit to have my eyebrows waxed and tinted. The girls have done a lovely job every time.
Today I also had the express facial which was really lovely and so relaxing.
The girls here are so friendly and welcoming and a real credit to the salon.Looking forward to my next treat day already !!

I was gifted various treatments here by a family member for a special occasion.
They posted pictures of me on their social media without my permission; I was told the pictures were only to show me a before/after.
Sams response/attitude when I asked for them to be removed was less than pleasant (telling me she didn't want me to return to the salon, etc)

Moving to Chicago from the UK i was looking for a new barber. So I looked on the website and booked an appointment with the only barber at Bespoke.
BEST DECISION I made!

Fast forward 1 year, I now have a friend, a  therapist and a barber all in one! And not to mention the compliments I’ve had!
Elisa has been the best!

Thank you so much!!!

Great service from Hayley.. felt at ease and above great cut. And the time passes by having good banter.
Can't wait for next appointment
Great place very friendly for men and women great place and easy to park

Richard has been cutting my hair for probably more than fifteen years. Would highly recommend him. He adjusts the cut to ensure it is contemporary while still keeping it appropriate for my work and lifestyle.

A very well-stocked and spacious Boots store, complete with both an optician and a pharmacy – everything you need in one place. The staff are very friendly and helpful, making the whole experience pleasant and easy. Great for quick shopping or more specific health needs. Highly recommended.

Terrible customer service.

Asked to return an item I bought from another boots only to be told I couldn’t refund it because there was no barcode. I said it was gift wrapped by the other boots just rip it open and they wouldn’t. Said I needed to go back to the original boots so they can check the camera? Baring in mind I hadn’t touched the item since buying it and had the receipt.

Went to the original boots today who literally ripped it open in front of me and scanned it back in for a refund.

Mental. What a utter waste of my time and quite frankly unhelpful customer service. Even the original boots said this boots probably couldn’t be bothered to return it. Was pretty obvious.

Change your policy or do your job please.

I don't know about the pharmacy, but the shop staff are lovely and helpful. I popped in for a pregnancy package and they went out their way to get one for me. They had some hassle and trouble from a customer who was escorted outside and the staff handled it well and made other customers feel safe.

Very friendly staff, but I've been sold glasses with really poor-quality lenses.

Really disappointed, as the overall experience was positive but the final product simply isn't providing what it should.

Well... May be just my interpretation of the facts however, last time I've been there I felt like the security staff were chasing me, and following all my steps inside store only because I was carrying a bag? Or maybe not very well dressed? Have to way to prove however, did not feel good at this store.

The poor review is for Boots and not for this specific store. I booked a blood pressure test on Boots website and received a text message confirmation and a reminder on the day. I took a bus after work to rush there just to be told they don't offer that service. What a disappointment. They're aware of the issue and had already informed Boots, but they haven't  removed that store from the website. Really poor service Boots!

honestly I am not a karen but this is the worst experience I have had in a pharmacy in my life. Went in at 1.20 and was told by security that the pharmacy is closed from 1-2, I thought this was a bit odd but waited nonetheless to be seen. Came back in at 2pm and asked for my prescription, the lady told me that I would have to wait some time (didn’t tell me how many hours or anything) I explained that getting this prescription was quite urgent and that I was told by the Boots on Kings Road to come here. I explained that I was flying abroad tomorrow to look after a sick relative and she proceeded to shout at me quite abruptly saying that this medication wasn’t an emergency and that there were plenty of people in the queue before me and I have to be patient. I responded saying I understand but if there was anyway this could be prepared earlier as I had already been to two other pharmacies who both explained that the medication should be here.
