She said again I had to wait in a very rude and patronising manner. I left the pharmacy in tears with frustration. Honestly never been spoken to like that before and very upset by the whole experience. I understand there can be issues but I felt that the communication could’ve been less abrupt especially considering the circumstances I had voiced.
They are ridiculously slow to serve people, be it for medicine or even just a meal deal as you pop in after work. They need some competent staff because the current ones are utterly useless.
Good prescription service, sometimes closed with no warning but I think it's just a staffing issue, hasn't happened in a while

Don’t bother sending your prescriptions here. Apparently they’re closed 1-2pm to hand out prescriptions despite that being nowhere on the website and it being completely counter intuitive as most people take their lunch breaks then. Was unable to pick up time sensitive medication I needed during my only free time that day, putting my health and wellbeing at risk. Sales assistant was rude, unhelpful and dismissive. Do yourself a favour and send your prescription to another pharmacy.

I've been going to this salon for cuts and colours since I moved to Bristol.
Martine is fabulous, she really listens and talks through what you want, and takes so much care over everything. She's so talented, best colour and cuts I've ever had. She's a wonderful, kind person too, my hair takes hours but I don't mind it in her company. The salon is very quiet and chilled and peaceful. Such a little gem ❤️

Martine from Lavish did my wedding hair and 2 bridesmaids. Not only was the hair perfect, but she was so lovely to have on the day. She was also very patient during trials when I was changing my mind. I would recommend to any Bristol brides

Absolutely love Lavish. Such friendly staff and great environment to beautify your soul! I could not believe they got the red I wanted when most hairdresser say it's not achievable so I was amazed I got the right red I wanted!! Also got my eye brows tinted and nails done and it was A++  every time I am in Bristol I will only go to Lavish because of the amazing staff there. See you in July!

I've been getting my hair cut and coloured at Lavish for ages and the brilliant staff never let me down! Couldn't go for a few years because I did a stint of living in London and try as I might couldn't find such a lush atmosphere and great service anywhere else. I have thick wavy hair and Martine is so good at managing the mane. Have recommended lots friends and will continue to do so ❤️

Really great little salon with friendly staff. Shelli has been doing my wax for years - it’s pretty painless and she always does a great job. I’ve recently started having pedicures ready for the summer…my dry skin from my heels has gone and I always come out feeling pampered and super relaxed.
I have my nails done regularly with Alison, and I'm always happy with the service she provides. Premier Beauty provides a friendly and comfortable environment, I'd definitely recommend.
Have been using Alison at Premier Beauty for some time now. A nice variety of services and good value for money.  Alison is helpful and very polite and lovely to talk too. Highly recommended
Alison was so welcoming. I had never had a lash lift & tint before and she explained everything throughout. Will be booking in again ready for my wedding!

Alison is so friendly and professional and will put you immediately at ease. I’ve visited her for multiple lash lifts and she’s always very gentle, and achieves long lasting natural looking results. Highly recommend!
Alison is great! She will be my go to now that i am in the area. She does exactly what you want and makes you feel at ease. I got waxing legs, bikini and eyebrows. Very happy
My wife went here and was thoroughly impressed. The hairdresser and beautician are lovely and she said the treatments were great, and I was pleased that it's reasonably priced
Lovely place

Daughter had her nails done her, totally professional
Will definitely let her return, friendly staff
Well done

Katie has been doing my eyebrows for a couple of years now and she always does an amazing job. Very friendly with the best customer service. She offers her advice and gives me the best ways to maintain my eyebrows. Throughly recommend Katie!

Amina did an amazing job with my brows, she is very knowledgeable and followed all my requests. She understands what it’s like to have fuller brows, and kept their natural shape (didn’t over wax them like I’ve had from other services). She’s such an easy to talk to, and sweet gal. She even gave me some make-up tips and helped me pick out some products. 10/10 would recommend.

Thank you to Pigeon for making me feel very comfortable and welcome at the boots benefit brow bar counter. She helped me with my brows in a way that worked well for me, and to find a nice shade of foundation. Very happy 😊
I have had brow lamination by Katie twice now. Her customer service is brilliant and shes always easy to talk to. I definitely recommend for great service (and outcome). I am definitely going back
Katie has been doing my eyebrows for a few years now, and they always look amazing. She is really precise and very friendly so I only ever get them done here.

I've been here a few times now and had a different tech each time. Today I went in after not getting my nails done for a month, so they were quite long, (~6/7mm of growth on top of what already were pretty long natural nails). I asked for a fair bit of length of and specified not more than half. The tech, who was quite rude, cut the nails off completely. He did two before he looked at me and asked if its okay. It wasnt okay but I only do gel on natural nails, don't like glued extensions, so I just said it is what it is. On top of that the whole nail job was sloppy and cost me £40. I didn't have a chance to look at them closely before leaving as I was in a rush, otherwise I would have complained there and then. I absolutely hate these nails, overall a bad experience.

Very kind professional staff. I brought in a design, and they made my nails look amazing.  They took their time to make it look as good as possible.  I got a matching pedicure.  Happy customer,  would recommend.  Also, it is a very clean salon, I appreciate the attention to cleanliness.

Been coming to nails deluxe for 6 years & always use the same nail technician ♥️
Never had a bad experience ✨✨✨✨✨

Absolutely terrible , aggressive cuticle care
bleeding and having cut on few fingers
Never gonna come back again!

Had a few visits here have really liked the outcome of the nails however when they drill they drill the nails temperature is so high it burns. I wish they would just take more care I believe the equipment use is pretty strong.

Had great experience by brightening my hair and getting a haircut by Kateryna! Felt safe that I will
Leave with amazing sparkling back to life hair and here you all can see the results 🤩🤩🤩

I had my hair done with Nicole and she is incredible! By far one of the best stylists I have ever come across, she thoroughly looks at the way your hair grows, feels and sets etc, and cuts to suit all of this. She talked me through different styles, and constantly asked for feedback and made sure I was happy! She’s an absolute queen!

Dani does my eyebrows there too, and she is also another absolute gem, and honestly is incredible! Again, always making sure I’m happy and asking for feedback, and super intricate and thorough! A true perfectionist. Both of them some of the loveliest people too! My absolute favs

I had a piercing done here in April and have emailed Crisp studio a few times regarding this and haven’t received any response whatsoever.
My Medusa piercing has had a bump at the base of the piercing that hasn’t gone away since I had it done. I had this looked over by a different piercer who determined that the bump will most likely never go away because it is there due to friction from the piercing being done incorrectly. My piercing has been pierced completely at an angle when it should be straight. I’m really disappointed by Crisp that I have heard nothing in response to my emails, especially as I was a loyal customer for a few years (getting my hair done) . The prices of the piercings are quite expensive and I expected it to be done correctly. I would not recommend getting a piercing done here.

I've have my blonde colouring done by Lisa for a few years now, I will always go back to her! She's fab, excellent coverage like no other I've been to, she takes her time and is a really lovely person to boot - highly recommend!

I'm extremely disappointed of Lucia, I was a regular customer of hers as she got good skills and know how to properly cut your hair but it looks like if you become her regular she will become comfortable and not listen or put any effort into the haircut. I asked for some layers and she cut the front half of my head short and the back hair left it long, untouched. I  have spent week's crying about it as there is not fix but to wait it grow out which can take years.
She also made me feel extremely uncomfortable during the cut as she kept fake smiling at her other members of staff and not paying attention to the cut.
I wanted to finish my haircut with some curls and she was not in the mood so I ended up without any style at the end.
I rescheduled an appointment to fix the cut but then decided not to in the end as I'm too scared to destroy the little hair I got left. Will never go to glitch again..such unprofessional service as well.
I have attached photo of the haircut in question so you can see how bad it looks.

Update: the salon just called me, harassing me over the review I left, calling me a liar. I was trying to speak to explain exactly what happened but he kept yelling at me over the phone twisting my words around so be mindful, they will harass you over the phone if you leave a a genuine bad review.
If he would’ve called me and asked about my experience and being understanding of my feelings instead of yelling at me over the phone, calling me a liar there was a chance of me removing this review. Never in my life experience this lack of customer service and so much disrespect.

Dreamy pregnancy massage at 19 weeks. It was so relaxing but also felt like all the tension I’ve been storing just melted away. I really enjoyed being massaged on my side and I could choose the pressure, temperature of the room and just closed my eyes and drifted in an out of sleep. My friends all clubbed together for my birthday to get me a voucher towards it and it made a fab present.

Holly was incredible! My first time going to Loop, and I was dealing with a lot of personal issues, which had left me emotionally raw. On arrival, I had a discussion with Holly, who, learning of the difficulties I'm dealing with, adapted the massage to focus on areas of tension but also added a holistic element to it to help ground and relax me. The whole process was professional, empathetic, and wonderful! Best massage and customer service I've ever experienced!!!

I had a really lovely experience at Loop Massage. The space is peaceful, clean, and stylish, and the treatment rooms feel especially comfortable and relaxing. I had reflexology with Kath, who was so welcoming and professional. She did an amazing job helping with some foot pain I’d been having, and I left feeling incredibly relaxed with a real improvement in my feet. Overall, just a wonderful experience and very much worth it.

I am 31 weeks pregnant and was given a pregnancy massage for my birthday. It was amazing and so relaxing and calming. My body really loved it and it was great for both mind and body. It really helped ease my usual pregnancy aches and pains. I would highly recommend it and will definitely be going back before the baby arrives.

I can’t thank Gemma enough! My shoulders and neck were incredibly tight and sore after overdoing it in an exercise class. She really listened to me and gave me an intense but also really relaxing massage. I could feel the knots just melt away and afterwards I felt like a 10lb back pack had been removed from my shoulders and I could also move my neck again. Can’t wait to go back. 10/10 experience.

I honestly couldn’t be happier with my tape extensions from KC Hair Extensions. From the moment I walked in, the whole experience felt professional, welcoming, and completely personalised. The consultation was thorough, and everything was explained clearly, which instantly made me feel confident I was in safe hands. Kate explained all the proces carefully as well so I was prepared what the upkeep will be.

The tapes themselves are incredible, super lightweight, discreet, and perfectly blended with my natural hair. They feel so comfortable that I genuinely forget I’m wearing extensions, and the finish is flawless. The colour match is spot on, and the hair quality is amazing, soft, glossy, and easy to style. This is my second set and we have gone for european hair this time which blends in so well with my fine har

What really stands out is the attention to detail and care. The application was quick and precise, with no pulling or discomfort at all. I’ve had tape extensions before elsewhere, but these are by far the best I’ve ever had, they sit flat, don’t show, and still look fresh weeks later.

If you’re considering tape extensions and want a natural, luxury result with hair that actually lasts, I couldn’t recommend KC Hair Extensions enough. Absolute experts and such a lovely team. I’ll never go anywhere else ❤️

I absolutely love Katie and her team — they are truly amazing at what they do. I go to this salon for everything I want done, and I always leave more than satisfied and so happy with the results. Katie’s extensions are incredible and very well priced. Her colleagues do an amazing job with hair cutting, and the nail technician is absolutely fantastic as well. The whole team is friendly, professional, and makes you feel so comfortable every time. I genuinely recommend this salon to everyone — you will not be disappointed!

Got tape in hair extensions here for the first time about 6 months ago, and I'm absolutely obsessed. Kate is lovely and very knowledgeable, i trust her with my hair. The hair is still looking great and my natural hair has grown longer with no damage, which I know a lot of people worry about with extensions. Ive also had Amelia who is also great and very professional. Definitely recommend this salon.

Kate and her team are fantastic!! Always a pleasure going to the salon- professional, calming aesthetic and great results. I highly recommend and have become a regular for my tape extensions. Having originally searched a salon for wefts, Kate provided me with a personalised extension fit (colour/type/style) and I haven’t been happier! If you’re thinking about extensions / styling or even aesthetic treatments, it is worth visiting the salon! Thank you Kate and team. 🤍

I am absolutely in love with my hair extensions. The blend is flawless, they feel so natural and the confidence boost is unreal. I walked out feeling like a new woman. Kate is pure magic at what she does, hands down the best decision I’ve made for my hair. Thank you for making me feel this good!

I had a blemish removed from under my eye very close to the lower lashes. One treatment, very professional service. GP offered small private surgery for £700 and it cost me here £135. Expected to be painful, but was not bad at all. Both ladies are lovely, they really care about you, I highly recommend them without a doubt.

Visited for blemish removal. Was a bit anxious but straight away was informed of what to expect and made to feel comfortable. So pleased with the outcome so far. Very friendly, kind staff and a nice and clean environment.

Life-Changing Experience – Thank You, Becky!

We cannot thank Becky enough for the incredible care and expertise she provided at the salon. My husband had been struggling with multiple skin tags for quite some time, and they had become a source of discomfort and a knock to his confidence. From the very first consultation, Becky was warm, professional, and reassuring.

The treatment took several visits due to the number of skin tags, but each session was handled with such care and precision. Becky made sure my husband was comfortable throughout the process, explaining everything in detail and tailoring the approach to suit his skin. Her attention to hygiene, her gentle manner, and her genuine passion for helping people shine through in everything she does.

Now, with the skin tags gone, my husband feels like a new man. It's been truly life-changing – not just in appearance, but in confidence and overall happiness. We’re so grateful to Becky and the salon for making such a positive difference. Highly, highly recommend to anyone considering this kind of treatment!
Amazing sugaring treatment and eyelash tint by Rebecca. I'm very pleased with the treatments and Rebecca is just lovely. Highly recommend.
Rebecca was very professional, friendly and prompt in delivering the treatment. I would certainly go again if I had a similar skin complaint. Ed

Been here 3 times total for full leg and Brazilian wax. Had a wonderful experience with Barbara the first two times (who's now left unfortunately!!) and she recommended Carolina saying I'd be in good hands. She was right :)
Booked half leg and Brazilian and Carolina was really patient with me and super friendly! Had upper lip done as well and really impressed with results. No irritation in any of the areas waxed and she even managed to squeeze in the other leg half even though I hadn't originally booked it. Won't be going anywhere else 💕

I had my first ever wax recently at Ministry of Beauty, I was definitely nervous but Barbara was great. I don’t have much to compare it to but I found it efficient and a friendly environment will always make you feel more comfortable. Thank you Barbara!
I had an amazing hot wax treatment with Carolina today at Ministry of Beauty. Always an impeccable service with an attention to detail every-time from all the staff ~Thank you 🙏🌟💕
Carolina attended to me. She was so kind, patient and comforting. I loved the experience. The ambience of the place was also charming.

Went for my first wax ever here with Barbara and it was such a great experience. She made me feel very comfortable and we just chatted the whole appt. Would recommend in general but especially if it’s your first time.

I couldn’t recommend Rachel’s services more highly- especially for group bookings. Rachel came over to provide us with a pamper party for my mums hen do. There were 9 of us each having a 25 minute treatment. She was just fabulous. It was very easy to book and it was so seamless as soon as she arrived. We all really loved our massages: reflexology, back massage, Indian head massage, and leg & foot massages. Rachel is very skilled- even though the treatments were shorter she made sure they were tailored to each of our needs. For example, she extended my back and neck massage to my head as I told her I suffer from headaches. Really recommend!

I have just had a full body massage with Rachel and it was amazing! Rachel fitted me in when I messaged this afternoon which was great ! The massage was beautiful, really made sure I was comfortable and warm with electric blanket and played lovely music in the background. The pressure was really good and Rachel tailored it to my needs. All this made it a wonderful experience. I will definitely be booking back in with Rachel. Reflexology next 😁.

Absolutely fantastic, will definitely recommend, very professional
Thank you so much I feel fantastic

I have been coming to Sasha at Held Ritual Therapies for a couple of years for sugaring (legs, underarms, G-string).
Having had a couple of uncomfortable experiences at other places, I am so grateful that I found Held.
Sasha will instantly put you at ease, she is warm-hearted and radiates positivity.
Her work is amazing, with incredible attention to detail, I am always thrilled with the results.
You can tell she is passionate about her craft, so knowledgeable and skilled in up-to-date practices and using eco-conscious products.
The treatment room itself is beautiful and relaxing, when I leave I feel refreshed and confident. 1000% recommend!!

Just had sugaring done for the first time by Sasha - all I can say is WOW, what a fabulous experience from start to finish. Sasha is warm and welcoming, and her work space is so beautiful and calming. She explained everything to me so clearly before getting started, and the sugaring itself was a total breeze. So much nicer than waxing! I would recommend Sasha to anyone and will definitely be returning for future treatments.

I had the most incredible facial at Held Therapies with Sasha, and I can’t recommend it highly enough. I came in with acne concerns, and Sasha was not only welcoming and kind, but genuinely knowledgeable about skin health. She took the time to assess my skin, did gentle but effective extractions, and used Dermalux LED therapy—which left my skin feeling calmer, clearer, and noticeably refreshed.

The whole experience was so relaxing: the room was peaceful, the scents were beautiful, and the treatment bed was unbelievably comfortable. Sasha created such a soothing environment that I felt completely at ease from start to finish.

If you’re looking for a results-driven facial with someone who truly knows what they’re doing, Held Therapies (and Sasha!) is absolutely the place to go. My skin is glowing, and I’ll definitely be returning.

I do not know how anyone who has actually experienced a treatment from Sasha could give her anything other than a 5- star rating, truly.
I had a 30-minute massage and an hour-long facial today, a very kind gift which I fully wish to receive again. The 'gift' was also the wonderful experience of Sasha; her intuition, experience, natural kindness, knowledge and gentle professionalism. Both treatments, seamlessly combined (but I would recommend either if you can't afford both), were heavenly, using essential oils and holistic expertise which I don't understand, but my body did!
In short, Sasha is a marvel, thank you x

I had the most amazing facial with Sasha. I came away in a state of deep relaxation and my skin felt so fresh and rejuvenated. My skin had a glow. She also instantly puts you at ease if you’re feeling a bit anxious. I also really liked her treatment room was so clean and calm. I can’t wait for my next treatment.
Love this salon! Lilit is so wonderful. I get my brows threaded and waxing done with her. Couldn’t be happier with the results! Highly recommend :)

I've never had a Brazilian wax before and I couldn't have been happier with the result. Lilit was so good and completely reassured me. Excellent service and excellent result. Thank you. Highly recommend.
My friend and I went for a lash lift and tint for a friend's wedding - great service and lovely results :) we will both definitely come back!

Lilit is skilled, experienced, quick, efficient and kind. I had had to cancel several appointments because I needed to look after my baby. Lilit made it possible for me to attend WITH my baby for my waxing which I so desperately needed. She worked around me physically whilst I interacted with my baby, she knew how hard it had been for me to attend, I was so grateful for her help and flexibility. Thank you so much Lilit, I felt a million dollars when I left the salon ♥️
Half facial wax - so smooth, quick and precise. She really took time to figure out what would be best for me and my skin. Skin looks and feels great. Amazing value for money highly recommend
facial recognition cameras installed - no warning or signage whatsoever in entryway. avoid.

5th Dec. I was trying to collect my parcel in the store and when I walked in this boots the staffs are having arguments, so I was waiting patiently and then they came to me and ask for my name. I was waiting to show my parcel number, so I tried to check my user name immediately on my phone. Suddenly the staff yelled at me, she said, Look at me!

I was really shocked and I am scared, I wonder why she speak in a rude tone with me because I did nothing wrong, I behave well and I have a slight smile on my face. Is that because I am a little Asian girl? So I look easy to bully, they don't need to pay anything so they can yell at me and ordered me to 'Look at them' with no respect. I almost cry and I feel panic, but I can do nothing because I am just a foreigner living alone in this area and they yell at me to let me look at them, I thought maybe it's just some strange social rules in UK, but after I ask my local friend, they say no, they are just being rude and trying to bully me. Say I'm checking my information on my phone, even if I'm really too shy to look at this lady, what did I do wrong?

I hope the manager in this store could take care of their staff and check if everything's all right, make sure they are not under pressure or have any severe issues with their body or brain. Try to be as a civilized human being please, don't yell at a customer.

I was appalled by the service I received yesterday from the woman with short hair and glasses. She was unprofessional, rude and patronising when the shop was empty. She immediately made assumptions about the nature of my condition without letting me speak and lectured me like I was a child over the perfectly reasonable yes/no question I asked about how to take the drug safely given my circumstances and she didn't even answer it in the end. It's really unkind and unnecessary to be spoken to by somebody older than you in that way especially when you are just asking for guidance. I never write reviews but I was urged to by my partner who is a medical student who overheard it and thought it was really unacceptable. While waiting for the prescription we had to listen to the pharmacists openly making fun of other customers they had just served.

I just witnessed a lady who I assume is the manager (shortish hair and glasses) being very rude to one of the staff. The products are fine but to me that is not acceptable. I don’t really ask much of a pharmacy, just a decent range of products and basic respect towards customers and staff.

This has been my local branch for 21 years now. Given how busy it is, and how rude and impatient some customers can be, I think the staff do a great job. Sure there have been some oddballs over the years, usually locum staff or those who don’t stick around.

The working conditions really aren’t great - I don’t believe it’s had a refit in the time I’ve been using it. It feels cramped for staff and customers at times which I’m sure leads to friction.

It’s an invaluable part of the local high street in Bishopston and I am very grateful for it and those who keep it running.

I’m new to Bristol and have been trying to find someone who is good for eyebrows. After 3-4 beauty salons/ people Ive finally found this beauty salon.  2nd time going now and the lady is really nice and I’m please to say she is great at what she does. Love my eyebrows. Thank you

I've been coming in this beauty salon around 3 years for a haircut, and today my hairdresser made me look like a princess couse of my wedding, absolutely happy and thankful to her. Also she made for me awesome wedding make up! Recommend!
Misguiding info on google. It says open but when i came its closed and i am in a rush needed to get my eyebrows done before going on an event

Very good service and she is very kind .
She has good skills.
Adorable price.
Love the service

Love every visit! Grace is fabulous and her skills with making nails look beaut are off the chart! She also uses Lycon for a less painful wax which is great and is such a love to hang out with. Best beauty experience!
I’ve just had two treatments with Immy and they were great!! I had the eye lash tint and lift and a manicure 💅 thank you so much! So so pretty! I’ll be back!
I go to Grace for nail art and I think that she is great. She always does an amazing job and I've already booked my next appointment!

I've been coming to Grace Kingsley for just over a year now. This review is definitely a long time coming but all of the talented women who are part of the GK group deserve recognition!

Lizzy has done my nails and waxing each time I have come to GK. Not only is Lizzy a wonderfully skilled beautician, but her commitment to making her clients feel gorgeous is why I've kept coming back to GK all this time! If I'm not feeling like chatting after a long day at work, Lizzy makes you feel so calm and at ease during your appointment, without making you feel the need to fill any silence! Similarly, we have definitely spent a good few hours chatting away! She's so lovely and is a true asset to this business!

Millie has also done my brows a few times and is again an exceptional beautician! Her warm and bubbly personality makes a brow wax so relaxing and enjoyable!

Immy provided me with an exceptional facial/massage combination today. She is a genuine star and you can see her enthusiasm and skill shine through. Not only did I feel relaxed, but I can also see a massive difference in my skin already! I cannot wait for my next appointment!

You won't find a better place to meet your beauty and self care needs than GK. Grace and her team are a phenomenal addition to the industry and to Bristol! Xx

Grace has been MUA and nails for my photoshoots for years, she is hands down the BEST in Bristol, I recommend her to every bride and they are always over the moon with her work. If you’re getting married or need makeup for an event you will not get better than Grace in the area. Book her if you can!!! 💯🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

Thank you to the lovely Chloe who makes coming to Lulu Cosmetics a real pleasure.  This was my second Seventy Hyal Skin Booster treatment.  I was very impressed with the results of the first treatment so look forward to more improvement following the second treatment.  I could definitely see a difference in my skin with it looking plumper and more healthy.  The treatment really is not painful after numbing cream is applied and Chloe is so professional that I was hardly aware of it being done.  I will be back - thank you once again, Chloe!!

Abigail is an absolute miracle worker! Without a doubt the best eyebrow technician out there! Having never had any cosmetic work done I was quite nervous and wanted a really natural look, which is exactly what I got and I couldn’t be happier. She listened to all my worries and explained everything regarding colouring and different techniques which would work for my skin type (she definitely knows her stuff). I always get complimented on how my eyebrows look!

A beautiful clinic which was sparkling clean. Friendly, welcoming and a professional environment. Could not recommend it more!!

Abigail at Lulu has microbladed my eyebrows many times and each time i am very happy with them. I recently had my brows 'topped up' here and was impressed with both Abigail's work (as usual) and with the clinic in general, being professional and relaxing. At Lulu, I also had a 1ml lip enhancement by Tallulah, which i was also very pleased with as Tallulah made me feel at ease and left me with a great final result. Can't wait to visit Lulu Cosmetics again!

Could not recommend Lulu cosmetics enough if you are in Bristol and wanting professional, tailored and friendly treatments. What I love about Lulu's is that they won't simply just do the work on your face for the price, they really take time to talk through what is best for you, follow up with you, and cater it to your needs. Lulu was great at understanding my specific needs as a trans client and feminising my face!  Love it here.

I had the natural enhancement package done by Abigail and absolutely LOVED the results! My brows and lashes are so much more noticeable and full and it takes me way less time to get ready in the mornings. The salon is super clean and super friendly and I had a lovely experience!

I first came to Louise for a massage, which was not only amazing but great value. Louise takes real care of her clients, gives them time, checks in on their needs and makes the treatment work for them! Since then, I have become a regular with Louise getting waxes - I wouldn’t go anywhere else because of how excellent Louise’s service is, and how lovely it is to catch up when I come for my wax every few weeks! I couldn’t recommend Redland Treatment Rooms enough.
Very nice massage, shoulders & back feel much lighter now. Louise is great. Will come again. Definitely recommend.

After many years of chopping and changing beauticians in and around Clifton. Its was a complete joy to find Louise 6 plus years ago and I have been a loyal customer ever since. She is a professional who ensures that you feel the very best you can when you leave the salon and beyond.

A beautiful salon run by the friendly Louise, nothing is too much trouble and she makes sure your satisfied with your treatments. I love working from here, the rooms are lovely and it's in a great location just off Whiteladies rd.
Totally lovely service! Louise takes great care of everyone. Could not have felt more relaxed and could not recommend higher :-)

I have been visiting the Hampton Clinic for ten years and there is absolutely nowhere else I would go for my treatments. Customers are always welcomed by a warm, polite and efficient team who are experts in their field. Treatments are carried out in an extremely respectful and personal manner. The knowledge that each practitioner has feels incredibly reassuring that you really are receiving an outstanding service and a shared goal to reach the results that you are looking for. A particular mention to Delphine, who has been my practitioner since the beginning and whose kind, friendly and trusting nature makes each treatment feel so comfortable and enjoyable. Thank you all for your service, I look forward to continuing my regular custom at the Hampton Clinic !

Always a great experience! I’ve been having facial treatments at The Hampton Clinic for a few years now. The staff are all so friendly and always make you feel comfortable! Today I had a lovely appointment with Delphine. She is so friendly, knowledgeable and genuinely care about getting the best results for you. She was extremely thorough, made me feel comfortable, relaxed, really listened to my skin concerns and made sure to address them during the treatment. I couldn’t recommend highly enough.

Elzbieta

I switched to the Hampton after a year with another provider in Bristol and the treatments are SO much more effective. I really like coming here too, Laura and Shana are lovely, caring, and professional. I genuinely look forward to these xx

I have been visiting The Hampton Clinic for over a year and it has changed ownership within the last few months. I was initially apprehensive about the changes that may occur, some changes were inevitable. But I have to say I am still impressed with the service and treatments. Even though some therapists have left and some new have joined, the clinic has retained its warm and welcoming atmosphere and attention to customer service. The new owners have ensured that clients still always come first and client experience and satisfaction is the number one priority. I would highly recommend The Hampton Clinic, a special shout out to Shanna who has been carrying out my recent treatments. She is so lovely and makes me feel very comfortable and relaxed ♥️♥️♥️

Have been coming to the clinic for a few years now for IPL with Jo. I have always had a great experience with her. I feel she goes out of her way to make sure you’re happy and contempt with the outcome of the treatment, and wants to meet really high standards. All the while, making sure you’re comfortable and relaxed. The staff are also really knowledgable and you get lots of great general skincare advice!

I recently trained with Jojo doing microneedling, dermaplaning, chemical peels and led light therapy and she was absolutely amazing! She helped me gain my confidence and taught me at my own pace. She was so lovely and the 1 to 1 support is amazing, I learnt so much while training with Jo! I would 1000% recommend and will be going to her with all of my other training I need in the future! I really recommend JoJo if you suffer with anxiety, she has such a calm atmosphere and is very welcoming!🤍.

Completed my Gel Polish & E-File courses with Jojo's - she has a lovely training studio which is very slick, professional, and clean! She was very easy to chat to and engage with and was happy go at my own pace. As a neurodivergent person, I really appreciated how accommodating Jo was - nothing was too much to ask for and no question was silly. She's very down to earth and approachable, not intimidating or anxiety inducing at all!! The same can be said for the model she brouht in - I really felt at ease. Couldn't recommend Jojo's enough 💜

My daughter has successfully just finished a full nail tech course with Jo, she was very nervous on the first day but by lunchtime her nerves had eased and she was loving every minute, Jo is a lovely lady who made her feel at ease, Jos knowledge is out of this world we have constantly asked questions and always been given an answer, her patience and tone is great especially for younger people, my daughter has said this was an amazing course and really taught her soooo much, from the nails my daughter did before this course to now is worlds apart, my daughter did 4 consecutive days she had so much fun she didn’t want to stop,
My daughter is now looking into completing a lash course with no in a few months time. 😊

I completed my gel Polish course with jojo, I had a really good time and learnt lots of techniques and tips to help me gain more skills. Jojo was very welcoming and I would definitely be happy to book further courses in the future. Thankyou!

JoJo’s is incredible, from a stylish, minimal and hygienic space to excellent treatments. I would rate 10 stars if I could. Jo is so professional along with a huge heart. Her training is outstanding having witnessed her training students whilst being a model, she puts 110 into everything and really strives to make sure her students are successful. I have been having nails, brows, waxing and facials for forever with Jo and I have always had the best experience! Thank you Jo

I was at the salon on Saturday for a gel pedicure and manicure.
I was welcomed in a nice atmosphere, but the end result was not good at all.

I wrote a complaint to the head of the salon and asked for a full refund because I was served by a person with little experience without being informed about it in advance 😧

The head of the salon agreed with me that the quality of the services was not enough good and she offered me a repair visit.

Unfortunately, this solution does not suit me because they have already abused my trust and I am going on vacation.

I asked for a full refund again and got the answer that I can only get a refund for my hands because the feet are made well, which is completely absurd.

I asked for a refund again and I was blocked 🚫

I am disappointed with the unprofessionalism of the owner and I do not recommend it.
I’ve been going to the treatment room for years for my waxes, and have had pedicures, manicures and eyelash extensions done here also. Highly recommend all the services!
Would give 6 stars if I could! Nicola is amazing - listened to everything I wanted and the final outcome was perfect. Won’t go anywhere else for brows. Highly recommend xx

Had a beautiful eyebrow tint and wax (best shape and colour ever). Needed to contact them about something afterward and they were super responsive, informative and have given good advice on a treatment that may suit me a bit better next time. I thought the ladies that worked here were really lovely, but particularly impressed with their response to my follow-up query.

I was purchased a gift voucher for The Treatment Room so I booked a facial & bio sculpture gels. I would give 5 stars for the facial, if was absolutely perfect, excellent service & my skin felt brand new afterwards. The manicure, however, was pretty poor. Two of my cuticles bled when being pulled (not cut), it was a poor & messy finish with polish on the tops of my fingers plus not my full nail was painted and it's peeling already after 9 days. I'd definitely go back for a facial but not nails. I did mention it at the time but also felt awkward as I was paying with a voucher, I might have spoken up a bit more if I was paying myself.

Wow where do I even begin ? Emily done myself, 7 bridesmaids and mother of the brides hair on Saturday morning. She created the most wonderful hair for every single one of us, and we still can’t get over it. Even down to the fact she managed to get all 9 of us ready with plenty of time to spare, without breaking a sweat! Emily is so wonderful, talented and just so calming and the most amazing hairdresser you could ever wish to have on the morning of your wedding. Even everything in the run up with communication was seamless. If you are looking for the most talented hairdresser who can make your dreams come true, do not hesitate booking Emily, we couldn’t recommend her enough!

Emily was wonderful in helping create a hairstyle I really loved for my wedding last October! It was perfect, and she was such a lovely person to have around on the morning of the wedding. She had a very calm, professional, efficient but relaxed approach meaning me, my bridesmaids and my mum were all ready with time to relax and enjoy the final moments of getting ready together without rushing. Her communication from my initial query to the big day itself was great, and the trial was really fun and useful too. Thank you Emily for making me feel extra beautiful and relaxed on my special day! Kirstie

Emily recently did my wedding hair and bridal party. She's very talented, listens to what you want and knows what will suit you. I absolutely loved my wedding hair and it looked just as stunning late into the evening. She's really lovely to work with and is highly recommended.

Emily is a very talented hair and makeup artist. She worked her magic on me for my wedding day and made me look stunning.Emily did my hair and make up and it was flawless, she did an amazing job. Emily even did my bridesmaids hair which looked absolutely perfect.Emily is a very friendly,welcoming lady and communication between her was brilliant. Would highly recommend Emily

Emily did my hair for my wedding for me & 4 bridesmaids. She did the BEST job! My hair looked stunning and she was so lovely to have around on the wedding morning. Her work is exceptional and I would recommend her to anyone!

I’ve been visiting this clinic for a few treatments now and have had a really positive experience each time. The staff are always welcoming and make you feel completely at ease, especially if you’re feeling unsure or nervous about any treatment.

Charlotte has been doing my laser hair removal and she’s been lovely throughout — very friendly, professional, and reassuring. The results so far have been really good, and I’m genuinely very happy with how it’s going.

Highly recommended

Had a Restore facial treatment with Ellie last night and my skin feels and looks so, so incredible the next morning. Instant reduced redness and that glow is unreal!

The treatment itself was really enjoyable. Ellie clearly knows her stuff - super knowledgeable and lovely company - and was really helpful from consultation through to aftercare.

Clearly a really well-run clinic with a wealth of knowledge and a super lovely treat. Will deffo be back.

Treatments with Zhane are something that I look forward to every month. She is so knowledgeable (even considering other factors contributing to your skin like diet and stress) and my skin has improved within a couple of months thanks to her treatments and her recommendations for a skincare routine at home. Zhane makes you feel very comfortable and relaxed. She is such a bubbly person and I always feels like I’m catching up with an old friend, despite having only known her for a short time.

Just got back from my first facial and I absolutely loved it. I was made to feel welcome and at ease by the whole team. Throughout the treatment products were explained including what was being used and why. At the end of the session I was given personalised recommendations for products and treatments.

I’ve started my treatment about a mouth ago and I already see a great improvement in my skin quality. My beautician Ara is very thoughtful and considerate and pays a great attention to any changes in the skin quality and addresses them. I would definitely recommend!

Visited Spardha yesterday for first eyebrow threading. Spardha was great at explaining my eyebrow shape and how to get the best shape. Very thoughtful in her approach and listens attentively. Glad i found a regular beautician for my brows.
Spardha knows what she is doing! Gives wonderful service to my beloved. A kind caring and skilled practitioner of true south Asian beauty care. Highly recommended!

I’ve been going to Spardha for my eyebrow threading for the past 6 months and she’s amazing every time! She recently did a lash lift for me too, and I absolutely love the results. She’s professional, friendly, and always makes sure I’m comfortable. Highly recommend her – I wouldn’t go anywhere else!

My Search for Perfect Eyebrows is OVER! Spardha is a Miracle Worker!

I am beyond thrilled – genuinely, very, very, VERY pleased – with my eyebrow plucking by Spardha! After what feels like forever searching for someone who truly understands how to shape eyebrows, Spardha is a revelation. She has an incredible eye for detail, and the precision in her plucking technique is just fantastic. She listened to exactly what I wanted and delivered results that are nothing short of perfect.
I haven't been this happy with my eyebrows in such an incredibly long time. Seriously, she is THE BEST. I left feeling incredibly happy and so much more confident. My eyebrows frame my face beautifully now, all thanks to her.
Spardha is now my one-and-only go-to for eyebrows, without a shadow of a doubt. If you're particular about your brows and want them done perfectly, look no further. I cannot recommend her and her salon highly enough! Thank you so, so much, Spardha, for your amazing work!

Spardha's Beauty Care is a great place to go for your beauty treatments. I have been seeing Spardha for facial and eyebrows for years and have been using her products for years. Her facials are unreal! My skin has never felt so good. I wear make up a lot and with her facials I feel like I don't need to wear make up at all! My skin feels fresh. It also lasts for days. She has an in-depth understanding of skin and skin products and will always give you her honest advice on what to use and what to stay away from. Highly recommend getting your treatments done by Spardha.

I had such a lovely experience with Emma at Bristol Beauty! She is incredibly kind, gentle, and truly caring in everything she does. From the moment I walked in, I felt relaxed and well looked after. Emma takes her time to make sure you're comfortable and happy with the treatment, and it really shows how much she cares about her clients. Highly recommend!

I had a wonderful experience with Emma at Bristol Beauty. She was lovely to chat to while she did an amazing job of reconstructing my two big toenails. I'm so pleased with them and now feel confident wearing sandals on holiday!

Emma was fantastic! Would highly recommend. I went for toenail reconstruction (my 2 big toes). Emma explained everything clearly and gave good advice on how to maintain them. I can't believe how amazing the results were. Very happy!

It was a pleasure getting my pedicure with Emma; she is lovely! I had the Wilde-Pedique treatment to re-create and cover an unsightly toenail, topped with gel polish. She fitted me in at short notice and I was so grateful that my feet were holiday-ready in time for my trip away.

Emma is a lovely and professional therapist. She is attentive to clients and works at a very high standard. I have always been impressed with her punctuality, flexibility and ability to make me feel at ease during treatments like intimate waxing.

I first came across Emma when I was looking specifically for Lycon hot waxing, as opposed to other more painful and cheaper types of waxing. She offers a good range of treatments and has an exceptional standard of hygiene and cleanliness. You can tell she is specially trained for the treatments she does as she does not only an incredible job, but in good time; a positive sign that she is confident and experienced in what she does.

I'd never hesitate to recommend Emma to anyone. She is fantastic and I've never had an issue with any treatments or services.

I've had eyelash extensions on a couple of occasions at a couple of different venues but Jess at Love thy lashes was by far the most professional and friendly. She also offered the biggest choice and opportunity to personalise the application to my exact wishes...or in my case, when I didn't really know what I wanted as I'm not a 'makeup person' Jess was happy to advise what would suit me best. It was an absolute pleasure to visit her lovely beauty studio shed which she's turned into a little haven in the busy city. I highly recommend her work and she was a lovely person too.

Jess is professional, helpful and very accommodating. I needed lashes done in a hurry and not only did she fit me in last minute and manage to give me a brilliant quality set of lashes before I had to hurry to next appointment, she also took some.money off as I couldn't have a full set due to time constraints. Really pleased!

Absolutely fab , The most friendliest service, I booked a appointment with this business for my partner to attend and she came back glowing ,
So happy with the lashes and nails , I would highly recommend LOVE THY LASHES to anyone who would like to be number one in there partners life .
She had such a lovely experience with the beautician
She has already booked her next appointment .
Extremely friendly and very professional.
Love thy lashes is number one for me couldn’t wait to take my partner out and show off the smoking hot eyes and nail , thanks Love thy lashes made my partner fill grate which makes me fill grate 2x extremely satisfied customers 😘

If you are looking for a personalised, rejuvenating experience then I recommend jess. Every time I go to her, I leave feeling like a beautiful girl deserving of princess treatment. The care she has taken on my nails, lashes and brows has really made me not want to go anywhere else! The space is clean, girly and comfortable. And then there is her attention to detail, amazing.  I love my lashes, nails and bows so much :)
Jess is very good at what she does. Had my natural volume lash fixed some weeks ago and I loved it. She's a professional. I recommend.

Natalie, the owner, did an amazing job with my wax.

As someone who is semi new to waxing, she made me feel relaxed and truly looked after.

Natalie took her time to explain everything to me and was very generous with her time, yet so efficient! She's a true professional and you can tell she really cares about her work and clients.

I highly recommend Natalie for first time waxers - I will definitely be back!

Nat was absolutely amazing. She made me feel relaxed and at ease instantly for my pedicure and was complimentary about my hugely calloused feet! It really felt like being at a best friend's house. Will be coming here for all my treatments now. Highly recommended!

I had a spray tan with Jade who is brilliant. She is lovely and makes you feel so at ease. My tan turned out perfectly for my wedding and was so reasonably priced. I would recommend this place to anyone.

Martina is my regular beauty therapist and i cannot begin to sing her praises enough! She is so very lovely and the best at what she does. ✨
I have regular biab’s with her and my nails have never been better! The health and condition of them are so much stronger than ever before and they are finally naturally long! 💅🏽
My waxes are always pretty painless, very efficient and thorough 👌🏼
Highly recommend this place as they offer high quality services and both Martina and the owner, Nat, are exceptionally welcoming!
This is the best beauty salon in all of Bristol! Natalie who owns it is an incredible beautician - so efficient and quick and does an amazing job every single time. Could not recommend anymore!
This is the best nail technician I have visited to date! Thank you Dotti for doing an amazing job with my nails  I look forward to returning in the new year I highly recommend visiting!
Very friendly girls. Always happy to help if you haven't idea for your nails
Agnes is amazing!! I love my nails so much, she takes so much care over them and they are honestly the best I’ve ever had! Thank you!
I couldn't recommend Doti more.  Very knowledgeable,  talented,  professional nails technician.
Friendly stuff,  great atmosphere and professional service with outstanding quality  of work. Fully recommended. Picture was taken after 2 weeks

Mark is an absolute legend. Very thorough, very friendly, very professional and patient. Gave me some incredible and weird ink, all crisp, all really nicely done.
Great music too, just really enjoyed the whole experience. Can't wait for even more!
Had some lasering done as Mark does tatoo removal too. Very professional and happy with the results. Highly recommend 👌

Last week, I've had the pleasure of getting my first ever tattoo, along with my best friend, and we had an incredible experience with Mark. From start to finish, Mark proved to be not only a highly skilled tattoo artist but also a friendly professional who made the entire process enjoyable.

Mark's knowledge of tattoos was truly impressive. He took the time to explain the process and answered all of our questions, making us feel comfortable and well-informed throughout. His expertise and attention to detail were fantastic, which gave us a sense of confidence and trust in his work.

He took the time to understand our design ideas, offering valuable suggestions and guidance to ensure the final result met our expectations.

Mark maintained a high level of cleanliness and hygiene, which is especially important given the nature of the work, and we felt reassured knowing we were in capable hands.

I highly recommend Mark to anyone looking for a tattoo artist who is not only skilled but also friendly and professional. Our first tattoo experience with Mark was exceptional, and we couldn't be happier with the results. We left the studio feeling very excited to show off our new tattoos.

Thank you, Mark, for making our first tattoo experience a memorable one!

Great place. Mark was most welcoming when I enquired about a new tattoo (even though it was only small). He managed to fit me in a week or so after - late on an evening and did a fantastic job. Such a great bloke and a nice relaxed atmosphere too. Will be back for more for sure!

Me and my mum had our foot tattoos done here last year. Absolutely lovely friendly staff. Very professional and very clean and great price. We'll definitely be going back for more. Highly recommend Marked Up Studio.

After two years searching for a decent beauty therapist in Bristol, I found the best I could find! Simply excellent. The first thing that impressed me was the high level of hygiene practices, during the wax (I received a personal towel, something to refresh my skin and a disposable slip), before the manicure, and during the all treatment. Great attention to details: my bed for the wax was warm, which was a nice treat during a very cold day! Megan, my beauty therapist for that day, was so kind, precise, calm. I requested to apply only nail polish and if I see my nails after 4 days they are still perfect as she applied the gel polish. I have already booked next appointment. Thanks for this great service!

The staff at Fuchsia Beauty are extremely professional and hold a variety of qualifications which they rightfully deserve. But they are also warm, welcoming and approachable, which helps you to feel at ease from the moment you walk through the door.

If you love being pampered to a high standard, but hate going to a busy/packed salon, I would HIGHLY recommend visiting Fuchsia Beauty.

Also the things Jenny is capable of designing on your nails is beyond comprehension!!!
Excellent pedicure, Jenny was super friendly and my feet were well and truly pampered. Great value. Would definitely recommend.
Very cool please very hard working woman never be afraid to pop in

Just had a wax with Becky and she was perfect. Very thorough and made sure I was happy with everything before I left. All staff are really friendly and chatty too! 100% recommend this place - really good prices too.

Very friendly and intimate salon. Tara is a curly hair specialist and I wish I’d found her sooner. She gave me the best and cheapest haircut I’ve ever had and provided me with lots of sage advice about hair care, which I’ve started implementing with great effect. I will certainly be back. I couldn’t recommend her more. Her colleague was also very friendly and welcoming.

A fantastic little salon! I have my hair done by Liliana who is a very knowledgeable and creative hairdresser, and very good company. It feels like chatting with a friend, which is essential when my hair naturally takes 3 or so hrs to highlight/style! I showed her a picture of the cut and colour I was after (a pearly blonde shade with bangs), and she matched it perfectly (my pictures don't do the colour justice!) Tara the owner has also been very friendly and helpful. Pricing is somewhere in the upper half of the market, but I've always felt it's worth the money as they do such an excellent job. Thank you!

From start to finish I had THE most enjoyable experience of having my hair highlighted by Tara! Warm, friendly, family atmosphere, like being at home.  The foil highlights are beautiful and I have more styling choices as well.  Thank you so much Tara and your lovely team x
I had a great experience here with Liliana. Chat kept flowing and she did a wonderful job with my hair. Would definitely recommend this place and come again next time 😍

Amazing work, staff and all around experience!
I came here for a balayage with Liliana and she did not disappoint! Not only did she give me exactly what I was asking for my hair, she was also very knowledgeable and communicated what she was doing in the process. I found it so comforting being taken care of by her and I knew my hair was in good hands.
I had such a good experience and felt so comfortable, I decided to return the next day to get my Wedding hair styled by Tara. She was so welcoming and really put me to ease while styling my hair. She listened to what I did and did not want as well as offered her suggestions, which I truly appreciated. At the end, I had countless compliments and mentions on my beautiful hair. I could not speak higher of this salon and their staff, I am so grateful and looking forward to my next appointment.

Absolutely love it!
They offer a wide range of hair and beauty services
The team are so welcoming and friendly
I have facials with Sophie she uses nimue skin care that I love!
And have my hair done with Nancy
She uses beauty work hair extensions they last so long and never fall out and stay glossy and such a perfect color match
Would highly recommend
Also had fat freezing and had great result
My nails have never felt so good. Great work guys keep it up.👌
Always a lovely welcome. Perfect nails every time.
Have  had many treatments here very professional
Friendly, professional and great service.

The design what I chose was nice and elegant but after they finished with my nails they look tacky and uneven the shaping of my nails are different lengths and sizes within a day of having my nails done they where feeling lose and chipping so easily there was gaps in my nails and within 6 days 2 nails have came straight off my nail damage for £55 was not worth the money. Girls don’t come here to get your nails done your nails will come out worse in the long run
Lovely family run business. The lady was very clear about everything during the process and informed us of the price before doing the nails. We are very happy!!

This place is the best ever shop to get your nails done, hands and feet.  Really friendly family. No hidden charges, no cutting your own  nails off, especially if your growing them,unlike other nail shops,  just lovely nails for cash.
I have my Pride coloured nails now
my nails look gorgeous! stuff were amazing too.
Lovely family run nail salon, Cindy and her son provide an excellent service with lots of options and they are very affordable, efficient and friendly.

First time I have been to Kaycie and Kyle in Brislington.
Very friendly and professional nails salon.
A full set of nail, by a lovely young girl named Lillie, fantastic experience and beautiful nails, very happy.

Been coming here for along time now and wont go anywhere else!! Girls always happy and friendly. Nails done to high standard and not over priced. So many ideas and designs for your nails I have different ones every 3 weeks!  Love being pampered here thanks girls :)

Used to go there years ago and always found it a good place. I recently went back and as the first time the nails cracked  after a day they offered a free service but the result has been bad again. Nice people working there but definitely won't go back!

Been going here for years for nails, threading and waxing. Sienna always helps my indecisive  mind pick some great color combinations! Waxing is good and quick. They always try to be as accommodating as possible even though they are a very busy salon.  It’s a good sign when a salon is booked up weeks in advance in my opinion!

I hate to write a bad review because the nail tech I had was so sweet buuuut both thumb nails have been left destroyed. I went for a BIAB fill a few weeks ago and noticed the edges of my nails were left unsealed and lumpy. I even showed my partner who knows nothing about nails and he thought it looked bad. I went to get my nails redone at a different shop today and after having the BIAB removed from Kaycie Kyle, we all saw that my thumb nails had turned green, soft, and are ruined. They need to regrow before they can be done by a nail tech again. I asked what happened and I was told that the BIAB that was done previously wasn’t done properly so it was allowing water to get trapped under my thumb nails. The constant moisture has made my nails softer than they usually are, green, and unsafe to work on. I’ve attached the nails I had gotten done at Kaycie Kyle and what they look like now.

I went on the 27th of October to the salon .Shannon one of the team in Coldharbour branch did a very bad treatment for me as she injured my skin around the left big toe and in addition to that she hurt the same toe from behind with a sharp object without showing any emotion or care or even said sorry to me when I mentioned that to her . Her work in general was very poor as did cut my finger nails with different lengths and she was working without any interest in her work . I contacted one of the managers for beauty box ( Tracy ) , from Westubury on Trym branch , she promised me to talk to the salon owner as today she was available in that branch and return to me , unfortunately she didn’t do that despite I called them today several times and I am still waiting for their response.
Do not go to the Beauty box salons especially the Coldharbour Road branch .
There might be an issue also regarding the honesty of  keeping your personal details private .

I went to Beauty Box on Coldharbour Road with my mum for her birthday present. It was the only place I phoned that would do both manicures at the same time. Lucy and Kat were lovely and listened to what we wanted. We were both very pleased with our gel nails; thanks very much ladies!

Just visited here and had my back and shoulders waxed by Rebecca.  First time I had this done and was anxious and even concerned that the amount of hair could be safely waxed. Very thick and most of my back and shoulders. Rebecca was great at reassuring me that it would be fine and kept everything light hearted. What I was most amazed at was how quick she got everything done and without having to go over missed bits. Yes, it hurt like hell! But I was given permission to swear and it was all over before I knew it. I was amazed how easy You made it. Thank you Rebecca! Excellent work. Highly recommended.
Kat (I think!) was brilliant and sorted out my nails when I'd accidentally booked the wrong procedure. Super communicative and happily gave advice on colour & shape when asked

I booked in with Lucy for a luxury manicure and gel polish and was extremely happy with the great service I received.  Lucy had a lovely manner and was very friendly as well as keen to deliver an excellent quality service.  The manicure included a hand and arm massage, masque and hot mitts which left my hands feeling super soft and in great condition.  Lucy then did a brilliant job with the gels and is quite a perfectionist which suited me perfectly !  I had also booked my daughter in to have her toenails filed and polished and she was very happy with the result.  Really nice, small salon with a friendly team - we'll definitely be back!

I have been visiting Atkinsons Beauty Spa now for easily 10 years. Lynn the Proprietor is a warm and welcoming host and extremely knowledgeable, making her own products which can also be purchased. The staff are all excellent and again knowledgeable. Lizzy the Manager keeps everything in its place and the place works like clockwork. It is a soothing sanctuary that I personally couldn’t be without!

Thank you to all the staff for running the best Beauty Salon in Bristol! ❤️

A regular client of Lyn and her team for the past 20 years, last week I was reminded that not only do the Atkinson team provide an excellent service, but they go further with their individualised approach to beauty care. Following Lyn's advice I now have a great new hair cut and colour and lovely new make up regime. Highly recommended. Thank you!

I have been going to Atkinsons for years and I would never go anywhere else. Lynn is the best therapist you could have and she goes above and beyond to ensure that you get the treatment that's best for you. Her facials really improved my skin and I cannot thank her enough!

I have just had my 3rd acne facial (which incorporates many steps including IPL) with Lyn and I am honestly over the moon with my results so far! I have had persistent acne and scarring for well over 10 years and I have tried everything on the market, only to be bitterly disappointed. I initially met Lyn to discuss my skin and she took over an hour to really understand my skin and lifestyle and she made me feel so relaxed and that I was in safe hands! I am so chuffed that I have found Lyn, and I cannot wait to return again for my next facial (which is now moving onto refining my skin rather than treating any acne as it has improved so much!) I would highly recommend Lyn's salon to anyone!

I have been going to Atkinsons for years and every time the service is brilliant, professional and welcoming. Lyn goes above and beyond to tailor her services to what you want and has a wealth of knowledge on beauty and skin care.

Biggest one I visited here in Bristol. Great location. There are two entrances, which is very convenient. You can find various skincare, haircare, bodycare, fragrances, accessories and make-up products here. Also, they offer some quick bites and drinks. You can pick up your online order here too.

This seems like a good shop. However, the store demonstrates poor organisation and a lack of prioritisation. There were two people at a till. One person refused to support clients instead doing something else. Thus a queue formed behind the one client facing worker. Unfortunately a gentlemen took a long time, of the order of fifteen minutes to sort something that should be trivial, and just general conversation. Then the store was closed so clients could not be helped. The store did not prioritise sorting out clients priorities.

Absolutely appalling service from the manager and young woman on shift, my mum went in to get pain killers and was rejected because they apparently had “served her before.” My mum had never been to this boots in her life, the manger (an old woman with grey hair) then started laughing in our faces with her younger colleague who clearly had no idea how to do her job properly. The moment we stepped in through the doors they were giving us daggers. Another time, I wanted temporary pain killers for my braces, they told me to “ask your authodontist not to tighten them again.” Thats part of my treatment?? They have to be tightened so my teeth can be alligned over time. Just go to the boots down the road unless you want to be treated like a second-tear citizen for purchasing a simple medicine.

Don’t open when they say they will. Not great communication, if they are going to stay shut for the day it would be good to put up a sign. Ended up ordering from Amazon instead but annoying as I can’t get to my prescriptions which were meant to be urgent. They have been shut every time I came by!

Staff are good when you do manage to get in!

The pharmacy has a huge backlog of prescription. Last year they were fulfilling them almost as soon as they received them; earlier this year they were telling me there was a 2-day wait; just now I was told I could wait up to a week.
I've been having my haircut and styled for years at Seventh Avenue.  They always to a great job and keep up with latest styles and trends.  I wouldn't trust anyone else with my hair!

I've been having my haircut at Seventh Avenue for at least 15 years, and have also used Lucy in the salon upstairs - they are all really lovely, and always do an exceptional job. They have saved my hair from many home-attempt disasters, and gave me a beautiful head of curls for my wedding day. It's the only place I can go to knowing I can be confident i'll be happy with the end result!

I can't recommend Lucy enough, every spray tan I have is perfect, even the hands which is where I have struggled before with other salons. The express tan is amazing as I can shower it off after a couple of hours which saves the white bed sheets! Everyone in the salon is so lovely and friendly which makes the experience so enjoyable.

Not knowing they were about to close, I stuck my head round the door and asked for a Wash and BD.  Sadly they said, sorry, but they were about to close and then one very kind blonde lady chased after me and said she'd do it.  15 minutes later I waled out of the salon with one of the best blow dry's I have ever had.  I don't know her name but she was super kind and super efficient.  I had a brilliant night out and my hair held together all night.  Fantastic.  Thank you so much.

Lovely ladies and lovely job to the hair. I've been nervous to have highlights for a while due to other salons messing up. I went here and had some great advice about colours  and had highlights put in and am more than happy with the outcome.

My son bought me another manicure & Pedicure treatments at Pamperbanana and this is the 2nd time we’ve been. Absolutely love the place, the staff are so welcoming and really friendly, and would definitely go again and recommend them. We didn’t feel awkward at all being two men arriving at door. Keep up the good work.
Just out from the best massage,  relaxing, chilled,  you only know how tense you are when you are no longer tense.  Perfect and professional ambience. Obviously coming back. Thank you all.
Great wedding day package for men to get you looking your best for the big day! Saw me quite last minute too. The only fault is that it took a little longer than stated.
Had a facial treatment which i really enjoyed, the staff were really friendly

We had some beauty treatments with Bernadett, she is not only highly skilled but also creates a very relaxing and enjoyable experience.
I highly recommend her, she is a  very professional beautician and a lovely person. We also learned a lot about our  skin,and skincare. My husband and I are both thrilled with the results of her treatments. Our skin looks fabulous!

Had a lovely massage today by Tina who made me feel very comfortable and relaxed. The massage was amazing and I will definitely be returning again! X

Thank you x
I had a Thai massage, Tina was fantastic. Came to Bristol for a little break and booked in here, the ladies were lovely and the place was clean, tidy and relaxing.

I had a terrible gel manicure over the weekend.  within a couple of hours of me leaving the salon 3 nails had fallen off.  It's been 2 days now and all bar 2 nails have peeled off.  I was very careful not to pick at anything or do the washing up without gloves on and they have were barely hanging on the last 24 hours.  When I requested to get some money back for this I was simply told no.  Will absolutely not be going back.
Had a back and shoulder massage due to tension from work and Emily was amazing. She made feel very relaxed and comfortable and the massage was the best I'd ever had. I'll definitely be returning!

I visited Bristol in August and stopped by this shop at the request of a friend. I’m really grateful to the lovely staff for their thoughtful introduction, and they were also kind enough to help me find my blue water bottle.

A friend from Taiwan.

Came in for some quiet time tea and ended up leaving with a new face cream & vitamin C serum. Sephora (hopefully that’s the correct spelling) was lovely and helpful :) Always such a peaceful atmosphere inside this shop

Just had the most wonderful experience in this shop. Oceania (hope that’s the right spelling) offered me some delicious herbal tea then took me through the full range of Frankincense products in a completely unrushed and informative way. All ranges here are top quality formulations and they stock a great selection, perfectly displayed. The staff are lovely and extremely helpful.

Lovely shop helpful staff, adorable products, Wild Rose 🌹 range is my favourite, leaves my skin radiant refreshed and energised.
Women’s Balance BALM I also use so love ❤️ this product amazing feeling, helps skin tone and very good. Thank you for recommending such a wonder product.

Nicola

The therapist was late letting me in for an evening myofascial massage, leaving me waiting outside. Rather than offer an apology, she complained about having to juggle evening clients alone. She then spent 15 minutes describing therapies I hadn’t requested—such as cupping and dry needling. By this point, we were 20 minutes into a paid treatment. I was then asked to do a ‘gait analysis’, which I declined.
If an extended consultation is required, the appointment should be booked accordingly—either longer, or clearly explained in advance. It shouldn’t eat into the treatment itself.

She proceeded to ask me to remove my shorts while standing right next to me, without offering any privacy. During the massage, she was rough with a knee injury we had just discussed. When I raised this, she offered to end the session—leaving no real option. When I asked for a refund, she refused, left the room agitated, then returned and told me she would “make sure I never came back again.”

I reported this to Nicola Dimmer, who not only defended the therapist, but failed to even acknowledge: the unapologetic lateness; lack of privacy; the aggravation of an existing injury; the refusal to refund a session the therapist had offered to terminate after causing me pain; or – the open threat made to a longstanding client (with good relationships with other therapists).

If this is the kind of conduct Neal’s Yard is willing to stand behind, that says more than any complaint ever could. I haven’t returned—and I’ve found better, more professional care elsewhere.
Best braids I’ve had since moving to England 8 years ago. Friendly warm and professional service. I would recommend 100%.

I have been coming to this company for 20 years, I travel from Weymouth to come to this specific salon and for the entirety of the time I have been coming here I have received amazing service without fail, comfort is a lovely and incredible woman who is brilliant at what she does! Would 100% recommend her to everyone and having her do my hair is worth the travel. I visited this Saturday to have my braids put back in and got nothing less then perfection :) working by herself in the shop and still smashes it, credits to this woman! See you again soon - Sara

For a first time customer, I had an amazing time doing my hair. Aunty Comfort even offered my hot chocolate. Her team was  awesome, friendly and professionals. Her team even helped me unblock my piercing which I had struggled to do. I love them too bits. I will definitely will be back!

I needed cornrows done last minute before a boxing fight. And I was very impressed with every part of the service. The booking was arranged for the next day, even though I phoned up quite late in the evening. Everyone in the salon was very helpful.  The staff have a very good understanding of different designs. And despite being busy, they manage to pay a lot of attention to each customer's request. The atmosphere is friendly but professional at the same time. My hair was done exactly how I wanted. I felt very comfortable in the ring. And it still looked just as tidy after the fight as it was immediately after I  got it done. Many thanks to all the staff. I will definitely be back next time I'm fighting. And I would highly recommend this salon to anyone who wants to have their hair braided be that for combat sports, or any other purpose.

I have been coming to this salon for over 20 years to have my hair braided. I have always had such a good, friendly and professional service, so much so that my daughter (20) also comes to have her hair braided here. She is out of Bristol studying and like me will only come here to Comforts to have her hair braided. My hair always looks amazing when I leave the salon, if I could leave more than 5 starts I would!

I was shopping in Superdrug in Bristol looking for a product for my face spots , but I had absolutely no idea what to look for. A really friendly staff named Sabrina noticed I needed help and went out of her way to assist me. She was patient, friendly, and took the time to explain my options. Thanks to her, I found exactly what I needed. Sabrina’s customer service was outstanding

Came in today to buy some stuff as it had some offer when the membership thing is included. Went to the billing section and and told them I have the Superdrug card thing, and as soon as i mentioned that the staff (a man 30s - polish or Eastern European I believe) made a uncomfortable/displeased face. So instead of searching up my card I asked if I could do the email and he gave it but still, it felt so pressured that I had to type it fast or the guy is pissed. So I just left without adding my membership card/points whatever I had.
I would understand if it was busy and there was a queue behind, but there was none. So being pressured felt wrong.
I just left without saying thank you.
