hi I entered superdrug on 30th of December I asked a lady do u work here she said ya in a very abrupt tone I was enquiring about the beauty station she said on her break the tone in her voice was very abrupt I asked her when is she back she said see that lady ask her which I did she said she wasn't working there she was on a break I felt like I was getting passed from one to another why can't someone cover breaks I thought makes sense and my mam was in to the pharmacy enquiring about her medicine the lady was behind the counter not paying attention to us completely ignored us until she said they wernt available making us wait 15 minutes its not the 1st time I've endured this a,simple polite manner when dealing with the public not to be so rude I think customer service is very important when working in retail and dealing with the public not a nice vist at all

My partner had a very disappointing experience here due to the attitude of a member of staff. When my partner asked what time the pharmacy would reopen after a break, the response was unfriendly and bordered on rude. She was told by the staff member that "... I do not care" about her timing or whether she was able to return, which was completely unprofessional. Having read other reviews, it is clear this is not an isolated incident and that there may be a broader issue with how customers are treated at this branch. Superdrug should urgently look into this, as respect and basic courtesy should be standard.

Normally an okay place to get the stuff you need. However, today I went to pick up a few small items, and I had one member of staff act like I was doing something suspicious (I was not, I just could not find what I was looking for, until a more helpful member of staff actually helped me). The other member of staff just followed me around, did not try to help (or show any amount of good customer service), and then at the checkout, one looked into my bag after I paid! Hello, people can buy stuff at other shops? Please check your own CCTV, and you'll know. Don't drive away your legitimate customers by allowing your staff to act like this for no reason. Ridiculous, makes you want to just avoid it

I absolutely love how Anna cuts and blow drys my hair. She is so attentive to detail and discusses what she thinks would be best but absolutely listens to what I would like. She doesn't rush her work and also gives a fab hair wash and head massage.. I would thoroughly recommend her!!

Unfortunately I didn't have a good experience at this salon. I asked for a colour that started a little down from the root to blend into my existing highlights & natural hair. I got highlights to the root. My hairdresser didn't ask me what colour I wanted to achieve so just put on a toner that she wanted.

I've been growing my hair for many months now and she cut the top layers & fringe which I had explained that I didn't want. She seemed to not pay any attention when I tried to discuss my cut saying "we would talk about the cut once the colour was on". I felt she thought she knew what I wanted so didn't bother to ask any further. I'm now left with the (many months) of hair growth gone, which is extremely annoying.

The salon is vividly decorated but it's shabby. Peeling paint, layers of dust and clutter. Another hairdresser was vaping whilst I was there.

I will say as positive it is reasonably priced and they do try and accommodate changes of appointment but overall it wasn't a pleasant experience.

Mac Daddies captures Bristol’s vibe and style better than any other barbershop in the city. Sean, the founder and owner, runs the Westbury Park shop, and I’ve visited three times now — with myself, my son, and the friends who first introduced us. Every time, I’m genuinely impressed by how he instinctively finds a style that suits me far better than anything I’ve had from top-end salons.

I had a great experience all round at Mack Daddy's. I received a great restyle & fab customer service from the man himself. He listened to & interpreted brilliantly what I was hoping for from my new 'do' in addition to making me feel at ease enough to chatter away whilst doing so. I'm really happy with the result as he styled it for me after cutting, to give me an idea of how to do it myself & which would be the best products to use. The price was amazing, when considering what other salons around Bristol charge for their Senior Stylist or Creative Director to do a total restyle. Keeping it real. Seriously happy client here. Gem👌😁

Comfortable salon, warm and friendly and excellent knowledge and advice for hair styling. Anna's a brilliant stylist, cut and highlights exactly as I wanted. And I always enjoy chatting with her. Thank you!
The best massages in town! Thank you Cleo, it was well needed and fantastic as always.. neck and shoulders feeling grateful and less tense. See you soon!
Had my first facial with Amber and can say my skin has never been so glowing I am super happy with the outcome and will be returning every month :) xxx

I think the previous reviewer must have gone somewhere else because the standard of service at this salon is exceptional. All of the beauty therapists are serious perfectionists - I mainly have nails, waxing and massage. I'm a bit OCD - particularly when it comes to waxing and nails and I'm qualified in massage myself so super picky when I have one.
My first time getting a massage so was a bit nervous but was made to feel very welcome and the massage was very relaxing. Highly recommend

The professionals at The Beauty Room make you feel so welcome and relaxed. Some places you may feel awkward going in on your own but not Beauty Rooms. The treatment I had, I've been twice now and booked for next week too have been back,neck and shoulder massage. You feel so relaxed and back neck and shoulders feel so loose.  Thank you ladies. See you next session.

My partner and I have been members here since August 2025, and honestly, I can't imagine training anywhere else in Bristol now. We initially prioritized Nuffield for the wet facilities–the 20m pool, sauna, and steam room are excellent–but the variety of the gym floor and group classes has kept us hooked. From Body Pump to Pilates, the quality of instruction in the two studios is consistently top-tier.

The staff are genuinely friendly and the complimentary towel service is a brilliant touch that makes the experience feel much smoother. However, to give a complete picture: the facility is showing its age slightly. The lockers are on the smaller side, and you won't find a hyper-modern or "fancy" aesthetic here. It feels like a standard, established UK club rather than a futuristic luxury spa–which is fairly typical and perfectly acceptable, but worth noting if you are expecting brand-new fittings.

The pool does get busy during peak hours (after work and weekends), but with a little patience, it is always manageable. The membership is at a premium price point, but if you are consistent with your routine, it is hands down the best investment you can make for yourself.

I am glad I have now cancelled my membership and I am writing this to warn others about the declining standards at Nuffield Health. Despite recent price increases, there is no planned investment in the facilities. The environment has become a genuine health and safety concern.
The condensation in the changing rooms is dangerous. Steam is not being properly extracted, leading to saturated floors and visible mould a clear breach of Regulation 6 and Regulation 12 of the Workplace Regulations 1992. Asking members to pay more while allowing the building to fall into this state is unacceptable.
To make matters worse, I requested a copy of my signed contract to review my rights. The staff were unable to find it and one staff member I dealt with clearly has not been trained in customer service and used a very argumentative manner in response to my questioning on how they can not find a copy I must remind management that under the Data Protection Act 2018 (UK GDPR), they have a legal obligation to provide a copy of my personal data including my signed agreement within 30 days of a request. It’s also worth noting that the same member of staff has been leaving 5 star reviews for the gym to cover over negative reviews!
It is bold to increase fees while failing to provide a safe environment or basic administrative transparency. I plan to formally report these ventilation and safety issues to the Local council Environmental Health Department for inspection. I strongly suggest management prioritises repairs over profit before an injury occurs. And as for the majority of the staff they are all great and very helpful!! And I appreciate these issues can’t be solved by themselves more the powers above!

I’ve been a member of Nuffield Clifton on and off for over 15 years. Unfortunately, it’s clear that the facility has not seen meaningful maintenance or upgrades during that time, despite consistent and significant membership price increases. It now appears the cost of membership is around £115 a month – pricing that suggests a premium experience, but the reality is far from that.

Facilities and Cleanliness:
The gym feels outdated and poorly maintained. The swimming pool water often looks murky and gives off an odd smell. While it seems a “cleaning team” has been introduced in response to negative reviews, their efforts don’t appear thorough. Surfaces might get wiped down, but deeper cleaning is clearly being neglected.

The changing rooms are especially disappointing. Dirty, wet towels are often left lying around. The cover sheets in changing rooms are visibly caked in muck, makeup, and grime. Showers frequently contain hair, plasters, and general residue. Lockers are outdated and could benefit from a full refurbishment.

The cleanliness of the shower area continues to be a concern. There is frequently visible hair in the drains and on the floors, suggesting that these areas are not being adequately cleaned or checked throughout the day. The showers themselves appear old and rusted, with grime accumulating around the fittings, making them look neglected and unhygienic.

In the changing rooms, the sheet pullovers used on benches are often stained with make-up, dirt, and general grime, which is not only off-putting but raises concerns about sanitation standards. Small but noticeable issues such as paint peeling near the hand dryers and a faulty shower cubicle door — which is almost coming off.

Classes and Studios:
Pilates and other studio spaces are also poorly managed. One of the Pilates rooms currently contains building equipment scattered across the floor. In a recent class, there was even a pot noodle left in the corner – not quite the calm, clean environment you’d expect from a health and wellbeing venue.

Gym Equipment and Amenities:
Many machines do not support Bluetooth connectivity, and screens that used to play Sky Sports have been removed. This removes a once-popular feature that added to the gym experience.

Suggested Improvements:
•	Clean the changing rooms regularly and thoroughly – not surface wipes, but a full, scheduled clean with accountability.
•	Swimming pool loungers – invest in heated ones like other clubs offer.
•	Sports access on gym screens – reinstate Sky Sports or a similar subscription for gymgoers.
•	Steam room – update it fully, not just patch repairs.
•	Make the cleaning team effective – provide training or oversight to ensure the job is done properly.
•	Locker replacement – update the lockers to provide a more modern, functional experience.
•	General maintenance – ensure studio spaces are free from construction gear or leftover food.
•	Transparency on pricing – if fees increase, members deserve to see tangible improvements.

I've been a member at Nuffield Clifton for about 3 years.  The gym facilities are good, as are the pool, sauna and steam room, though the changing rooms & showers could do with a little tlc.  However, the gym's best asset is their Fitness Manager, Jessica.  I began PT sessions with her earlier this year and she's honestly the reason I keep my membership going. If you're looking for an experienced & knowledgeable PT that really listens to your goals, demonstrates & explains exercises well, pushes you just the right amount whilst understanding your limitations, regularly varies & tailors your routines and is also really nice with it, then I can't recommend her highly enough.

I had a good return here for 1 afternoon only, visiting for the first time since my student days in 2011-14. The gym floor has been reconfigured, with newer machines and a larger, better situated free weights area. I also used the swimming pool and sauna, which are fantastic for the Clifton location. Unfortunately, the changing rooms and lockers are way past their best and in other areas the decor is worn, with wiring left exposed. Repairs also appear to have been abandoned, with errant ladders lying about. I suspect the facility hasn’t been given much care since at least 2011, accounting for its deterioration. This place just about manages a 4* but they urgently need to invest in the facilities, especially in the changing rooms.

My partner and I booked the Swim and Eat package and everything was exceptional. Food was incredible - some of the best I’ve ever had (particularly the caramelised fig and pinenut panacotta). Staff were very friendly and helpful, and the overall atmosphere was gorgeous and very romantic. We’ll definitely be making a return in the future.

I really enjoyed my food this visit. Ordering the venison I found it was cooked very well. The starters were good too and I particularly liked the pork belly, though all were impressive. The pasta was a bit too one note and heavy in flavour. Service was a little slow. The atmosphere is unique but really lovely
The most lovely spa, it is gorgeous. The food is great, and the staff are so kind! There wasn't a huge range of vegetarian options, but the food was nice anyway.

I have wanted to visit here for soooo long! Finally got the perfect excuse and brought my best friend for her birthday. We were greeted at reception and given a quick tour of the facilities. We were given a robe and a towel each and we changed into these before going up to the massage waiting room. We were collected by our massage therapists and taken into our own private rooms for the massage. The treatment was lovely and the hour passed by way too quickly! We then were taken to a relaxation are and made a cup of tea which was lovely after the massage.

I would like to offer a pro tip at this point, there was an autumnal nip in the air and we hadn't remembered to take flipflops but the floor was super chilly on the toes! If you feel the cold like I do, remember your sandals or flipflops!

After we had booked time to use the pool and facilities. We had the best time popping between the sauna, pool, hot tub, and steam room. It was never too busy in any of the areas and they were all clean. We were incredibly fortunate with the weather and it literally felt like we had gone on holiday for the day!

We hadn't booked in for lunch but the smells coming from the kitchen were making us both hungry so we asked if they took walk ins at the spa reception and the lady said yes. We popped through a little door and were in the restaurant and were seated at a lovely table in 10 mins. Our waitress was lovely and we ordered some of the small plates and some lovely refreshing drinks. The food came out relatively quickly considering how busy it was (it was peak lunch time 1.30pm) and was well presented and oh so delicious! I don't often eat out so to me the food was amazing! The tapas style food we picked was so flavourful and the perfect amount for sharing. We were recommended a delicious pudding and enjoyed every mouthful!

My friend and I have been on a few different spa days together around Bristol and this by far took the number 1 spot! Thank you to all who made our treat day so wonderful! We will be back!

Lovely light and airy spot for breakfast with a beautiful view of the pool. The food was delicious (we tried the bacon chop breakfast and Turkish eggs) and the chai lattes were spot on. A memorable experience, though at £86 for four it’s more of a treat than a regular option.

When you are away with work and working late it’s often hard to find a reliable barber you don’t really know.. these guys are open til 7 and I only wanted a grade 0 and beard trim… highly recommended,  attentive and professional and provided exactly the look I was after.. will be back 👍🏻

5 stars!
Outstanding service and a very welcoming atmosphere. I’d like to give a special mention to Marcel — my go-to barber. He’s always professional, attentive, and incredibly skilled. Every haircut is done with precision and care. Highly recommended!

The best barbers I have been to in the UK! It was my second time getting a haircut from here, today and I can’t express how happy I am with the result. Both Amar and Julian are excellent barbers. Julian gave me an amazing mullet today, quite happy with it, given it’s my first time getting one. He also took some really good pictures of the cut for me. The vibes of the barber shop are great, all the barbers there are very friendly and make you feel welcomed. They play great music too and are quite interactive with the customers. In all a very good experience, would highly recommend!!

I had a men's scissor cut with Marcelo. Was great to be able to speak to Portuguese with someone else in Bristol. I'm really happy with the cut and the he was really caring. Overall a great experience, highly recommend!
I went to cut my hair and beard today, Amar did an incredible job, by far the best haircut I ever had, very professional!
Very nice place with nice woman in there all MEN should go. The woman there need to be a bit more vibrant but other than that all good.🥰🥰🥰
If I could put 0 I would you are sexist as I was a woman and I knocked on the door and you said you was fully booked so my partner has just rung and you said you can just call in so you lied to me
I second everything Claudia mentioned 5 years ago about this place. So relaxing and I slept soooooo well. Also my posture has been much better and my scoliosis is cured.
very bad experienced i said to them i need massage girl took me in and she sais they don’t do massage only escorts here soo don’t waste money rubbish centre

First visit here. 06/11/19. Nice choice of girls. I picked two hot Romanian girls. They were polite, sexy as hell and funny too. Wonderful experience especially with two girls absolutely delicious. Make sure you have had a good breakfast and you will need plenty of energy. Also very clean and organised place. Well done 5 STARS !

An exceptional experience. Following the float session, I experienced a profound sense of tranquility, akin to the sensation of weightlessness reminiscent of being in the womb. The environment is exceptionally comfortable, impeccably clean, and meticulously designed. The staff were outstanding—welcoming, knowledgeable, and attentive. I definitely recommend giving this a try; it is profoundly calming and rejuvenating.

I visited the Bristol Float Centre with a gift voucher from my son, and the whole experience was outstanding. It was peaceful, totally relaxing, and exactly what I needed. The staff were warm, friendly, and made me feel really welcome from the moment I arrived.

I absolutely loved the experience and will definitely be booking again!

We had an amazing experience & have already recommended the Bristol Float Centre to friends. We booked the cabin with the massage beforehand. We were welcomed by Spin who was lovely, and talked through it all with us. The Float was so relaxing and it was such a treat to switch off completely. The facilities are beautiful and we hope to be back soon!

We had an amazing time at Bristol Float Centre! The experience was very relaxing and enjoyable, would 100% recommend the Cabin. There was more than enough space for the two of us. A brilliant day out!

It was definitely an experience! I’d call it a “two-visit” kind of thing: the first time just to figure out what’s going on and notice all the sensations, and the second time to properly sink in and enjoy the journey.
The mobiliser was a brilliant way to start—easily my favourite part.
And a special shout-out to Spin (hope I’ve spelled that right!) for being such a thoughtful hostess. She even spotted my additional needs and signed “bye” to me on the way out. Such a lovely touch. 🙏🏼

Thank you so much Jitka.  My massage yesterday was amazing!

If you are stressed out go and get a massage from Jitka!  The massage was amazing - the pressure was just right, I felt totally confident and safe in her hands.  Plus, I don't really know how, but it enabled me to feel much more connected to the ground afterwards - less thoughts whirring round my head than usual.  I wish I could have a massage with her every week!

I had the holistic massage but there were elements of mindfulness to it as well as she encouraged me to really connect to 'now' and properly experience the massage.   It's not often you really are just where you are but Jitka made that possible.  Thanks again!

Thank you so much Jitka, I was able to move and rotate my hips much more smoothly and pain free after this first treatment.  This problem will take time to resolve and I  have become aware that I have to persevere to look after myself with regular re-habilitation/physio exercises alongside massage treatments. No such thing as a quick fix!

Communication was excellent and  I was very happy how the session  was planned.  She made me aware at all times what was happening, such as when the area was being warmed and at which point pressure was going to be increased.  The soft tone of her voice  and her  warmth was felt.  This made it very easy for me to fully  trust her and relax which in turn has enabled  my body to benefit from the treatment already and be on the right path to recovery.

Without hesitation, I highly recommend Minia. Her expertise has been paramount in helping me out of persistent pain for various conditions, tennis elbow and pain and currently restrictions in rotator cuff. Her knowledge along with her approach and techniques used and after care advice have and are currently easing me out of pain and discomfort. (Also, a very lovely person). Thank you

Minia is incredible. I went to see her due to a slipped TMJ disc and she worked absolute wonders at relieving my pain. She also taught me how to treat it at home between sessions which has made a huge difference. I also have chronic pain in my back and she carried out her own research and managed to identify the source of the problem (something 3 years of GP visits, chiropractors and osteopaths had all failed to do) and I am now on the road to getting it treated. I am so grateful for Minia’s help, she is so knowledgable and really goes above and beyond. I am recommending her to everyone I meet and will continue to see her sporadically as she’s just so good!!

If you’re looking for a friendly professional who can help sort out the aches and pains in your back then look no further. Minia has a calming aura and takes a genuine interest in trying to work out the cause of the pain and working out how to stop it reoccurring. I’ll be going back one a month for my back M.O.T

After a few sessions with Ella, my TMJ feels so much more manageable. Ella’s massage techniques are outstanding - the relief during the sessions, powerful. Ella is brilliant - so informative, sensitive, professional, knowledgable. Ella has given me exercises to work on between sessions which are super-helpful too. Highly recommended!

I am a massage therapist basednear Brighton  and Minia was one of my amazing teachers. I finally managed to get a treatment with Minia recently, while she was teaching in Brighton.

I wanted a mixture of Deep Tissue/Relaxation but also asked if she would assess some hip pain I have been having

Minia is extremely knowledgeable around anatomy, considers all aspects that may be contributing to pain such as old injury, lifestyle, stress levels, so takes a holistic approach to treatment.

Minia's hands are like liquid gold. She managed to deliver wonderful deep pressure in a beautifully slow and controlled way. I literally felt I was melting. On addressing my hip, she was checking in with me to understand my pain levels and adjusting the pressure to ensure this was at a manageable level and to release any stuck tension. This was really specific work and was super helpful for me to reconnect with what was going on.

She gave some incredible stretches and a short but effective self care plan that has been helping me to continue my healing at home.

If I lived in Bristol, I would absolutely see Minia regularly to treat my hip and would also ave regular maintenance sessions.

Fancy moving to Brighton Minia? 🤣

I had an excellent experience at Simon Lee’s clinic. I am very pleased to have chosen Simon for my mid-face and neck lift surgery in November 2025. The procedure was carried out under local anaesthetic and I was kept informed throughout. I’m very happy with the results. Simon was extremely professional, knowledgeable and caring. I am extremely grateful for all the care I received during the procedure and post surgery. I would highly recommend him.

Lisa Antony

I’ve been a client at the Simon Lee Clinic for over a year now. I’ve had various treatments including preime facial and cheek fillers. The team are kind, friendly, give useful guidance and information. They make me feel better about my own appearance, they’ve helped me love the face I live in while helping me care for it and gently maximise it’s natural appearance. I do not wear make up and my skin hasn’t looked this good in ages.

I had a truly wonderful experience with Cat, the Preime HydroFacial was a wonderful treatment and my skin was immediately showing the benefits without any down time.

The clinic is always a warm and welcoming space. I highly recommend having a consultation, I trust the team fully to understand my concerns and suggest the right treatments for me.

Thanks and see you again soon

Tori J-D

I have had the New Fraxel repair,  much less invasive,  hardly any pain and only used anesthetic cream. Hardly any down time within under a week just slight redness and I was out and about.
I have had this procedure a few times for scars and it is as good as it gets without surgical intervention.
The whole team are super and always make me feel comfortable.
Delighted with the results.
Thankyou team and have a fab 2026.
Emma therapist at Mr Lee clinic is excellent,  makes you feel relaxed with very little awareness of needles going in . Never rushed and numbing cream applied .

Very nice place but can be very annoying and disappointing you can strike luck some time with the woman there but thay are not good most of them so I would avoid most places like this plase learn from my mistakes😔😔
I have never tasted such a fine dining meal in London as tonight's dinner. Thank you

Worst customer service ever
L
My home

I'm afraid to say this, but I've been a member of this gym for over 3 years now and I am thinking of giving up my membership due to the lack of attention to some major health and safety problems, despite reporting them.
The deadlift platform downstairs is absolutely not fit for purpose, being severely slanted. I put my back out doing deadlifts a on it and subsequently don't use it at all. You are not allowed to deadlift upstairs where the floor is slightly less wonky so there is nowhere to do heavy weights that keeps your back safe.
The gym is really busy and it's hard to find space to work if you go after work and sometimes in the daytime too.
There is also black mould growing on the windows in the cardio room- not good for anyone with respiratory problems.
The equipment being old and a bit manky I can cope with but the lack of care and respect for their gym customers' health is a real problem.
I feel sad leaving this review as most of the gym staff are really lovely but feel this is only way these complaints will be responded to.

I joined Workout Ashton earlier last year after moving back to Bristol, and I’ve been genuinely impressed. The range of equipment is excellent, I never have to wait around for machines. The place is clean, well-organised, and the atmosphere is welcoming without being overbearing. I particularly enjoy finishing up in the sauna; it’s a small luxury that makes the whole experience feel a notch above your average gym. Staff are friendly, approachable, and seem to take real pride in the place. For the price, it’s remarkable value, and I can see myself being a long-term member here.
I do love this gym.  It is light, airy, not too busy with friendly helpful staff.  Circumstances have meant I’ve had to cancel my membership, but should matters improve, I’ll be back x

This Gym is brilliant if you are staying in Bristol for a short time and just want a one month membership.It is very well equipped and very friendly. NB: Make sure you join and cancel on the same  day as you have to give a months notice to quit and you may be charged for another month if you don't. This is easy to do and there are no problems with doing this. There is a lovely cafe too after all your hard work. Cheers.

Love this gym, it’s the only one I’ve ever felt completely comfortable at. Really lovely PTs (shout out to Charli) and super welcoming staff who always say hello and make you feel at home. It’s always clean, they’re always upgrading equipment and the facilities, and there are saunas and cold (and hot) showers too, as well as a female only room. Best gym ever, thank you team workout!
Referred here by my GP after a sports injury, turns out they don't cover hamstring strains. I did find somewhere else locally though so it was a happy ending.
Great place lovely lady's all the time
How much is the price

Very nice place but not very good woman to mach it the woman I pick roxey was very nervous and put me on edge a lot. And her hart was not in it. So I would avoid this plase unless the woman here buck up a bit.😮‍💨😮‍💨😮‍💨

Kyle is an outstanding trainer, being quite the advanced gym goer/bodybuilder myself for 20+ years, Kyles session’s are brutal (thats how it should be ha) and he showed me new techniques/exercises that really made our sessions intense and with purpose. I would highly recommend Kyle from those starting out to even the most advanced of lifters, save yourself time by learning to train the right way instead of years learning and potentially half-assing it! There’s a reason Kyle looks how he does he knows his nutrition and trains bloody hard. Looking forward to our next PT session.

Training with Kyle has been one of the best decisions I’ve made for my health and fitness. I started at 84 kg and, with his guidance and motivation, I’ve successfully reduced my weight to 71 kg. That’s 13 kg down — and it wouldn’t have been possible without his consistent support and expertise.

Kyle is a true subject matter expert in fitness. He not only understands the science behind workouts and nutrition but also knows how to tailor training programs to individual needs. Every session with him was challenging, well-planned, and focused on results.

What I appreciate most is how he pushed me to go beyond my limits while always ensuring proper form and safety. His no-nonsense yet encouraging approach kept me accountable and motivated throughout the journey.

If you're serious about getting fit and want someone who truly knows what they're doing, Kyle is the trainer you want by your side.

Kyle is an outstanding personal trainer who brings heaps of energy, motivation, and professionalism to every session. From the moment you walk through the door, you're greeted with his warm smile and positive attitude, setting the tone for a productive workout. His impressive physique and qualifications speak volumes, but what truly sets him apart is the genuine care and attention he gives to each of his clients. Kyle takes the time to understand your goals and tailors his approach to support you every step of the way. Whether you're just starting out or you've been training for years, I couldn't recommend Kyle more highly for anyone seeking expert guidance and real results on their health and fitness journey.

I experienced a remarkable transformation after I began training with Kyle. At the start, I had lost my confidence and self-esteem. However, within just four weeks of consistent training and following a disciplined diet plan, everything began to change.
My knee issues significantly improved, my complexion returned to normal, and I was able to fit into my old trousers again. Most importantly, my confidence soared.
If you're looking to transform your body, I highly recommend this gym. Kyle is incredibly knowledgeable and supportive. His expertise in both fitness and nutrition genuinely surprised me, and his guidance has made a lasting impact on my health and well being. 😊😊😊

I started training with Kyle in February 2024, weighing just 60kg. I had a hard time gaining weight and didn’t enjoy the gym that much due to being unsure of what to do or how to train effectively. From our very first session, Kyle not only taught me proper technique but also how to push my body to its limits to start seeing real results.

He’s always friendly, supportive, and consistently gives valuable feedback—both in the gym and when it comes to nutrition. Thanks to his support, a year later I’ve gone from 60kg to 87kg, and most of that is lean muscle.

Kyle is also a great nutritionist. He listened to my feedback and regularly adapted my meal plans to make sure I was bulking or cutting properly, depending on my goals.

I enjoy every session. Kyle constantly switches things up and introduces new exercises to keep the workouts intense. Now, I can confidently smash out a solo intensive gym session and see the gains.

I had a fantastic experience here. From the moment I walked in, the staff was incredibly professional and welcoming. I saw Katherin for and I was so impressed by their knowledge and attention to detail. They took the time to explain the entire process and made sure I was comfortable throughout. My skin has never looked better! Highly recommend for anyone looking for high-quality, expert care.

I recently visited Shapins Clinic for face and laser treatments, and honestly, I had a really good experience. The staff were friendly, explained everything clearly, and made me feel comfortable from the start. The clinic is clean, modern and feels very professional.

My skin already feels smoother and brighter, and the results look natural, which I loved. They didn’t try to push any extra services, just honest advice based on what I needed.

Overall, really happy with the service. I feel more confident now, and I’ll definitely go back for more treatments. Highly recommend Shapins Clinic if you want quality care and real results.

I recently had a body contouring treatment with Shapins Clinic with Dr.Katherin Ferrer, and I couldn’t be happier with the results! From the moment I arrived, she made me feel completely comfortable and well-informed. Dr.Katherin is incredibly professional, gentle, and clearly experienced in what she does.

The treatment itself was smooth, relaxing, and far more effective than I expected. I’ve already noticed a visible improvement in my shape and confidence. She explained every step clearly, answered all my questions, and made sure I understood how to maintain the results.

If you’re thinking about body contouring, I highly recommend booking with Dr.Katherin Ferrer. Amazing service, beautiful results, and a truly positive experience!

I had a very good experience at the clinic. Dr. Katherin is professional, does her job really well, and communicates clearly, which made me feel comfortable during the process. She is also quite friendly and easy to talk to.

The staff at the clinic were helpful and made sure I felt relaxed throughout my visit. Overall, it was a pleasant experience and I would recommend the clinic to others.
From consultation to treatment, everything at Shapins Clinic Bristol was excellent. Dr Katherin’s knowledge and gentle approach made the experience stress free and the results truly impressive.

Writing this on behalf of my friend.

Absolutely love Beauty Zone, Bristol! From the moment you walk in, you’re made to feel welcome and comfortable. The staff are incredibly professional, friendly, and clearly know what they’re doing. They take the time to understand exactly what you want and deliver results that exceed expectations every single time.
The place is calming, and well-maintained, which instantly gives you confidence in their services. The quality of work is top-notch, prices are reasonable, and the overall experience feels luxurious without being pretentious. I always leave feeling refreshed, confident, and pampered.
Highly recommend Beauty Zone to anyone looking for excellent service, great results, and a genuinely relaxing experience. I wouldn’t go anywhere else! 💯✨

Absolutely shocking, went with thick eyebrows, loads of room to have them shaped nicely, explained how I want them to look even and arced, left in tears with two different shaped eyebrows, and one shorter than the other. The employee sleeve was on my mouth, she was overly rough. Expressed my concern, and the owner had nothing to say, would not recommend. Don’t go!

I am writing this review on behalf of my partner who received rude, unprofessional and sanitarily questionable service in addition to extremely poor privacy arrangements:

This is my first time visiting. The general vibe wasn’t welcoming, when I entered nobody acknowledged my presence until I managed to get the attention of the lady at the front desk and was then told to follow someone upstairs. When I entered the room the bed had a dirty paper towel on it from the previous client which wasn’t a good first impression. A new paper was laid out and I was left to change and lay on the bed. There was no additional cover provided for me, no conversation of what areas I want to be waxed and she didn’t even tell me her name. The procedure was very messy, I was left with wax dribbled over me from when wax was picked up from the pot. It was overall a really uncomfortable service. For other areas I was told it’s my fault my hair growth is so bad because I have shaved, even though I have been a regular waxer for 8 years. At certain points in the appointment she was audibly huffing and sighing which felt extremely rude. There was very little conversation throughout the whole thing which made me feel quite uncomfortable. The final straw was when I turned over near the end to notice she was using the same spatula to dip back into the waxing pot which is extremely unhygienic and a serious health hazard. I’ve paid for many professional waxes and this was just not up to standard.

I had Sikina (hope I’m spelling her name right!) give me a face and neck wax and she was incredibly professional and light handed, I barely felt a thing when normally I find waxes quite painful. She was amazing and I highly reccomend her.

I just had an appointment with Sakina and I had to leave a glowing review. The standard of treatment is top tier all round, I always come away leaving extremely satisfied. I live in London usually but originally from Bristol so when I come home and I need my brows done, I’ll ALWAYS come here. Thank you Sakina for 5 star treatment!! X

Fantastic massage! Lauren is amazing and the new location is great, very warm, cosy and relaxing. She's helped me a few times when I had pulled a muscle in my arm, as well as getting lots of knots out of my shoulders. I highly recommend it!

The massages I’ve had with Lauren have been so healing for me. I live with chronic pain and do a lot with my body physically, so my muscles are often tight and I need help to relax and ease the pain. It’s usually my lower back, but sometimes I get pain in other areas too and Lauren always takes the time to listen to what’s going on and find exactly the right treatment for me.

She has such a wide range of skills, from gentle and relaxing massage to deep tissue, sports, and Thai techniques, so every session feels really tailored and effective. I always leave feeling looser, calmer, and genuinely better in my body.

Highly recommend Lauren - she’s so experienced, intuitive, and caring, and will really take the time to help you.

I had a hot stone massage which was just what I needed. I felt so much better after leaving and was grateful I could book in quite last minute, and on a Sunday as loads of places are usually shut on the weekend. The space was very cosy and I felt very comfortable. Communication was also great. Will definitely be going back!

I have been a customer of this lovely massage boutique since almost it's initial days. I recommend everyone to visit and indulge in a rejuvenating massage (full body/head/hand etc). The Massage Boutique frequently offers discounts and offers so please check it out! Special shout out to Rachael who's a lovely person and ofcourse a brilliant masseuse.
Lauren really knows what she’s doing when it comes to massage! I had a really stiff shoulder and she worked her magic on it and it felt as good as new within a few days! Highly recommend 😊

Spencer’s clinic has been my choice for the past eight months and I always feel looked after. He greets me with warmth and checks that I am happy with every step. If I ask for a small tweak, he invites me back and sorts it without fuss. He cares about how I feel about the results, not just the procedure. When I need to adjust an appointment, he responds promptly and accommodates my schedule. I trust him with my treatments.

Spencer , truly the best at what he does. So talented, so careful, and always focused on what will look natural and suit you best. The care and skill he brings to every treatment make the whole experience feel effortless and top notch.

British cosmetic clinic services is the gold standard for injectables in Bristol. Combining exceptional clinical expertise with an artistic eye and uncompromising client care, their results are consistently refined, natural, and confidence-enhancing. From consultation to aftercare, every detail reflects a truly top-notch service — the kind that sets the benchmark for the entire industry. Great work Spencer xxx

Spencer makes me feel at home every time. I feel well looked after, he makes your satisfaction his priority and he makes time to see his patients to check on their treatments after their appointment. I can directly communicate with him about any worries, concerns or questions and he is always helpful and kind to answer them. I have been going to him for two years now and I don't consider going anywhere else.

I have had several ‘tweaks’ done by Spencer and he always knows EXACTLY what I want doing. Plus I completely trust any suggestions he makes due to his level of expertise. Every experience has resulted in exactly what I wanted. Spencer is also a lovely person who is great at putting me at ease, and extremely trustworthy, he will let you know if he thinks what you are asking for is not going to suit you, and I think going somewhere where they have that level of morality and pride in their work is very important too. Very highly recommend. And if you are in any doubts, just book a free consultation with him first to discuss.

I had my lips done by Spencer and I honestly couldn't be happier with the results. From the consultation to the final outcome, everything was handled with such professionalism and care. Spencer really listened to what I wanted, explained every step clearly, and made me feel completely comfortable. The results are natural, beautifully balanced, and exactly what I hoped for.
Highly recommend Spencer to anyone looking for expert, safe, and stunning lip work.

Went to the clinic with great enthusiasm. I had seen that there were many positive reviews on Google.

To my great surprise, the whole treatment lasted 5 minutes for two different areas. I have already had laser done on these areas several times, but never like this – they literally used only a few pulses on each area. I was shocked... Naturally, today the hair has grown back in patches. This amuses me to some extent, because I look like a leopard, but on the other hand it annoys me that I paid money for this.

Otherwise, the staff are very polite and welcoming.

I had a laser session with Agnes today and she was honestly amazing. From the moment I arrived she made me feel completely at ease, explained everything clearly, and checked in with me throughout the session. She was incredibly professional but also genuinely caring, which made a huge difference. I’ve had many laser sessions before and this was by far the best experience I’ve had, I felt comfortable, looked after, and confident I was in good hands. I wouldn’t hesitate to book with her again.

I decided to start with my armpits to see how it goes. Today was my fourth session and, although I wasn’t expecting results quickly, I’ve already noticed the hair is growing more slowly.
Kaliyah was my therapist today — she’s very nice and friendly, which makes the whole experience much more pleasant. She also explained all the aftercare to me really clearly.

I had a laser session with Kaliyah today and was extremely impressed with her professionalism and attention to detail. It was my first time with her, and she truly stood out compared to previous sessions I’ve had.

Kaliyah took the time to ensure no areas were missed, which I really appreciated, and she explained everything she was doing throughout the session. I’ve seen other therapists before, but her thorough and careful approach really made a difference. Highly recommended!

I had a laser session with Bindya today and was very pleased with her professionalism and attention to detail. She took the time to ensure that no areas were missed, which I really appreciated. I have seen other therapists before, but her thorough approach truly stood out.

In general, the clinic could benefit from a bit more attention to cleanliness and presentation, but considering the price point, the overall experience remains good value.
Always a brilliant experience. Super clean location and Kat’s attention to detail and perfection on my lashes is always 10/10..

Just got back from my first treatments, I was given a consultation first and was given amazing advice.

I’m glad I went with the treatments I went with instead of what I think I wanted, you can tell they’re trustworthy and they really care that you get the results you are looking for!

At my appointment I felt the atmosphere was very welcoming and friendly; Lovely conversation, made me feel very comfortable and at ease during my treatments.

(Botox, lip dissolving and fat dissolving)

Looking forward to seeing the results once the swelling has gone down and looking forward to the next visit!
Stunning lips, great lashes and overall very comforting experience. Thank you very much!

I had the Golden Package and Kat explained  me all the procedures  and treatment.  She was absolutely  great. I am very happy with the results.  Definitely  i recommend  the treatment.  And if course i have been back for more. I had under eye skin booster and lip filler, anti wrinkle, brow shape etc. I absolutely love it.
❤

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Exceptional Lash Restoration at KW Beauty & Aesthetics

I previously faced a challenging lash situation due to an unfortunate experience with another provider, resulting in damaged lashes. The lady at KW Beauty & Aesthetics, however, not only rectified the issue but also managed to restore the health and beauty of my lashes.

Located conveniently in a central area with ample parking, KW Beauty & Aesthetics offers a seamless experience for clients. The salon exudes a tranquil ambiance, creating a serene atmosphere that contributes to a truly enjoyable visit.

In addition to their exceptional technical skills, the staff engage in pleasant and engaging conversations during appointments, making the overall experience even more delightful.

I extend my heartfelt appreciation to KW Beauty & Aesthetics for their expertise in lash care and their commitment to providing a top-notch experience. I have found a long-term beauty partner in them.

From the very first second, I felt completely comfortable. The massage was absolutely incredible — truly one of the best experiences I’ve had. I finally managed to fully relax and forget about all my worries and stress. The men’s head spa massage was done at a very high professional level, and I left feeling refreshed and calm. I highly recommend this experience and will definitely be telling all my friends and family about it. Sabina also offers a couple’s head spa, so it’s absolutely something to try together with your wife.
We loved the experience, highly recommended. Very kind and attentive 🤗

Too be honest I wouldn’t return.

Last minute booking stressful week decided to book a 30 min Thai massage. Instead offered a happy ending and basically was just rubbed with oil…

Won’t be coming back
Paid for 90min but received only 60min and massage was extremely light not effective in muscle releife.

Great experience! I’m a professional massage therapist visiting Bristol for a short holiday, and I was looking for the perfect blend of firm and relaxing massage. My therapist, June, delivered exactly what I needed. She quickly identified problem areas and made sure the pressure was just right throughout. She worked with a fantastic attitude, and I highly recommend this massage venue!

Had a deep tissue today but I don't fell like I'd go back. Bit chaotic compared to lots of previous messages I had elsewhere and the masseur had cold hands when started. Tried to explain I had sore muscles after sport but she couldn't understand. Maybe basic Thai massage is OK

After two nights in Bristol, I was looking for a massage session that would put me back in place.
oh boy, that was well needed.
June who "handled" my deep tissue massage.
strongest massage ever.
worth it.

I came here as I was rehabilitating a suspected calf strain following a rather indulgent training block (I got a little greedy on the speed work, should have known better). Whilst the massage itself was was painful, my calf is starting to feel much better and I can get out for some light running again. It's been a long road to recovery but at last I am able to see the light at the end of the tunnel. Thank you Cherries!

I recently went to a message place that advertised itself as a luxurious and relaxing experience. What a complete joke! The atmosphere was grimy and unkempt, with dirty towels strewn haphazardly on the floor and a musty smell that permeated the air. There was even a dirty girl working there, who looked like she hadn't showered in days and had greasy hair that was falling out of her ponytail.  The so-called "message" I received was a complete disaster - the masseuse had no idea what she was doing and spent more time talking to me about her personal problems than actually giving me a decent rubdown. Her techniques were sloppy and unprofessional, and I left feeling even more tense and stressed than I did when I walked in.  Save yourself the time and money and avoid this dirty, unprofessional message place and the gross girl working there. I wouldn't recommend this place to my worst enemy.
Me Nan don’t like it
Great post-clubbing vibes
Very good offer extra on the side as well 😉
Very good Swedish massage. Adam gave good advice, was knowledgeable and talked through any issues he found, whilst allowing a relaxing experience. Wouldn’t hesitate to recommend.
Adam really professional and knowledgeable. I felt really loose and the next day managed a  7 mile walk.Weekly appointments are working wonders for me.

I got a very good massage in this shop. I had back pain before. I came here twice. The masseur had good skills and good service attitude. The environment was good. I like this shop very much. I recommend everyone to come to this shop to try their massage skills are very good

I’ve been to the Chinese Health Spa a couple of times now and I’m leaving this review with confidence. The first time I had a relaxing massage with a lady and it was lovely. This last time I went with pain in my legs and back and had a different lady give me the treatment, which exceeded any expectation. She was knowledgeable and attentive, she used hot stones as well and adjusted the session to what I really needed! I really appreciated that, once I find a knowledgeable person (as a fitness instructor and dancer, I’ve had many massages in my life) I stick to them.
Plus it’s always professional, clean and welcoming. :) I will be returning.

Called at 9:00am and managed to get an appointment at 9:30am. You are charged by time, 30, 45, or 60 minutes and you just let the lady know whether you want a full body, neck and back etc. I had a full body massage for 60 minutes and cupping for 20 minutes The room was clean and had a good smell with Chinese type panpipe music playing. The lady was very friendly, asking whether I wanted a firm or more relaxing massage. She managed to get rid of all my knots and relieve my tension. I would highly recommend.
Masseuse quickly identified problematic areas and started breaking down the knots in my back.
Very good professional massage, friendly staff. Sorted out all my knots and I feel completely relaxed, well worth it 👌

Really great experience. I've had multiple massages in Thailand and this place briefly had me believing I was back in the land of smiles. The masseuse was professional and strong when she needed to be, the room was clean and my back feels much better. Would definitely return.

I'll provide this feedback in a constructive, and full transparency manner. I was welcomed by a friendly, welcoming, and inviting team. Whether the room was well equipped and tidy, there was a very unpleasant smell in the reception and the cabin, that raised some concerns about the cleaning conditions of the spa. My therapist was very approachable, however I didn't feel that the massage made me feel any better. The good intentions of the staff did not extend to the best therapeutic session. Half of my massage was seated, when I wanted to lay down and relax. The conversation of other staff outside the cabin, was very distracting. Personally, my experience was not too good.

My friend and I both had a massage here and it was wonderful. The two masseuses were excellent, made us feel welcome and at ease immediately. I felt fabulous afterwards and only wish I lived near to Bristol as I’d definitely visit regularly. Very much recommend.

Pretty poor. I waited at the door while the two staff members chatted and finished whatever admin they were doing before opening the door. The place wasn't particularly tidy as a whole, with open doors to back rooms etc.

We went into the massage room and my masseuse put music on coming directly from her phone, which already seemed to lack some professionalism. Later, during the message, she got a call, which interrupted the music and then turned into a loud Youtube advert.

My masseuse chatted to me for the first twenty minutes of the massage, which was nice in a way, but also a bit distracting when I just wanted to relax. I also had a hard time understanding her as she had a thick accent, and I felt the need to concentrate to decipher what she was saying.

Worst of all, we finished over twenty minutes early. I had checked my watch before we started just in case. I had to fight my case with her when we were done. She said that her manager had seen when I came in on camera and that I had gone to the toilet, as if some kind of timer had started the moment I walked in. Either way, the massage was 35 minutes and I was being ripped off. She did return to massage me for about 7-8 minutes but the experience had been pretty much ruined by that point.

It's not 1 star because the lady was nice enough once we got started and she did give me a pretty good massage.

A great find, right by the Hippodrome.

Clean, welcoming and very friendly, genuine staff.

Been twice now for different muscle issues, my back and shoulders feel so much more relaxed and comfortable now. Highly recommend to anyone considering a visit.

I have had a few treatments now both with Bianca and Mimi and have been so so so happy with the results.
Both practitioners were very kind and professional and gave me advice based on what they believe would genuinely enhance me.
I feel that there are a lot of clinics that would just take your money but I definitely feel that this team are ethical in their recommendations.
Thank you and I can't wait to return!

I started going to Contour Couture in Bristol last year when I looked into botox / fillers treatments. Mimi was very professional and explained the best available treatments for me and even advising against some things I had originally mentioned as they wouldn't be good for my skin type, which i really appreciated. I have continued to have follow up treatments and wouldn't go anywhere else as Mimi is always so welcoming and knowledgeable. Thank you!

Have been coming to Mimi for various filler and Botox over the years and she and her team are no short of the best! Always leave super happy with my results, such a relaxing and welcoming atmosphere as well! Couldn’t recommend them enough, the best ever!!

In the last two weeks I have had two appointments cancelled, both on the day. The first an hour and a half hours before my appointment. The other half an hour. After driving to Bristol to Yeovil. Which takes an age!
For whatever the reason. This really isn’t good enough.
Very disappointing and frustrating.
I will not being booking with Contour Couture again.

I had Russian lip filler done yesterday by Mimi who did an amazing job. I was nervous as I had a bad experience at another clinic where the practitioner was very heavy handed, it was so painful that I fainted and had awful swelling for days after. However, Mimi was incredibly gentle so I experienced minimal pain and swelling, and the swelling has already gone down significantly overnight. She also worked so quickly and catered to my specific preferences rather than using a ‘one style fits all’ approach to give me lips that suit my face and style. It just goes to show that going to someone with good knowledge, experience & consideration for your needs makes all the difference! Very happy with the result and would definitely recommend them to anyone

Had my first ever eyelash extensions done by Ashley; I love them! Ashley took the time to consider absolutely everything to give me lashes that were perfect for me. She knew the right questions to ask and things to consider. As I’ve never had lash extensions before, I was nervous that they’d either be ‘too much’ or not enough, but these are bang on. Also a little more affordable than some other places I’d called. I definitely recommend!

I've had many different treatments at Glow Up Studio by both Charly & Ash - they're wonderful and so welcoming! Charly is so professional and knowledgeable in what she does and I feel so safe in her hands, she makes you feel comfortable and assured throughout the whole process - wouldn't go anywhere else! Ashleigh is so friendly and creates a super cosy & comfortable environment - I'm over the moon with my treatments every time. Both ladies are truly lovely, and hard working professionals - love every visit! 🩷

I had a heavenly Aqua/H2O facial with the wonderful Ashleigh today. From the moment I walked in I felt instantly relaxed. Ashleigh’s expertise and knowledge of skin really shines through, and I loved how she explained each step with such care. My skin feels refreshed, glowing, and truly pampered. I can’t recommend her enough! ❤️

Ash is the best. Always smashes the assignment when I need my make up doing for an event, I also recently had a lash lift, my long lashes meant it turned out amazing! Ash is super lovely and always feel safe and comfortable in her hands

Ash is the absolute best in the business! Started coming to glow up toward the start of the year and I’ve not looked back. I come away after every single appointment so so happy with how my lashes look. Ash makes sure she knows exactly what look you’re after and gets it bang on every time. Appointments are always a laugh aswell and enjoyable! Wouldn’t go anywhere else in the city xx
Tasty fast food

It was my first time Brazilian waxing and Sara made it so much easier. I can’t imagine any better experience than Urban Soul. Definitely worth choosing this. I would be definitely looking forward to book more treatments.

sara is very kind and understanding. I made a faff about my booking and she was so accommodating, funny, and easy to talk to. also incredible at her trade. had a facial with a shoulders/arm massage and i feel like a new person. felt very safe, and very comfortable. thank you
Can't recommend Urban Soul enough. Sara is such a talented, friendly and attentive practitioner. I've been getting massages here for a couple of years and I always feel brand new after.

Just fantastic! Sara was accommodating and kind, plus my nails turned out beautifully! I got my nails done for a wedding in Italy and they lasted for 14 full days without chipping. Highly recommend this salon, I'll be back soon!

Went in for a wax with Sara and she was fantastic. Super friendly, professional, and made me feel really comfortable. The whole process was as quick as it could be. Place was clean and welcoming. Highly recommend – I’ll definitely be back!

Absolutely amazing massage! Everything was perfect, and Anja was truly fantastic professional, kind, and very attentive. I felt completely relaxed and looked after. Highly recommended, I will definitely be coming back!

One of the best massages I’ve had! Super smooth check in/out, friendly and welcoming staff. The massage itself was fantastic (I went for the 80 minute luxury massage) and she applied the perfect amount of pressure to all different parts of the body (and I like a firm massage, so I was happily surprised!). Left relaxed and muscles aren’t tight. Would recommend!

I had booked the Autumn Glow Up and then read reviews afterwards that suggested this company was not all it was cracked up to be, so I was dubious to say the least. I went into Bristol ahead of the appointment Trent to visit the spa and confirm details of my booking as I didn’t want a wasted trip. The spa was closed (this was a Wednesday at 3pm) and looked filthy from the outside and as I looked through the windows looked totally disorganised - and it was fully shut. However, I put my reservations to one side and did not cancel the appointment which was scheduled for the Friday. On Thursday night at around 8:15pm I received a phone call from Pure saying that my therapist had phoned in sick and that the appointment would have to be rescheduled. I wasn’t surprised in the slightest and asked for a refund. Luckily for me the money has been refunded but I have completely lost any faith in this  company and will not be returning let alone recommending them.
Amazing massage! Staff are also really helpful and kind. Was late for our appointment and they happily moved it around, so  that we could get full experience. Will be coming again!

Tamika was great! She asked what I was looking for from the massage and what I’d like her to concentrate on.
The room was lovely and relaxing and I felt totally relaxed after the massage and facial.
I will be returning!
Great experience! Our captain was so knowledgeable and easy to talk to. It was so relaxing and such a unique way to experience a sauna. I wish they were always in Bristol! Would definitely go again.

Absolutely top notch time today - hosted by Carl (on his bday no less) - can’t fault this experience. The sauna is great with view over the harbour and cold plunge a cool 8 degrees. 10/10 recommend and hope it becomes a permanent Bristol fixture x

Myself & freind paid a visit to Skuna Sauna on the floating harbour this evening. We had a warm welcome by Karl who took us down to the sauna. We spend a hour going from the sauna (98c) to the cold plunges. We both help so refhreshed after. Only downside is the changing facilities are a bit small but workable for a fab time. Wished i booked in time for the sailinh sauna, next time...

Oh just beautiful! I love contrast therapy but to be able to do it and enjoy our lovely harbour from a new perspective was quite magical. The skipper was so friendly and gave a clear safety briefing giving the impression the crew really care about doing things properly. I had a great afternoon, please stay Bristol needs this!

What a great experience. So lovely to have a sauna with a view of the harbour all lit up at night. Plus the addition of aufgus with a great host. Thanks guys! Hope to see you back at in Bristol again soon!

I was so impressed with The Other Space. Had a shellac pedicure and 4 weeks later it’s only just started to chip! My past pedicures have only ever lasted a week! The products used left my feet feeling super soft. It’s such a great little space and doesn’t feel like your usual nail bar. I look forward to heading back very soon.

I had a shellac manicure and art at The Other Space and I was incredibly impressed with the service. It’s a relaxing, beautifully decorated, calming space. Nathan did a great job, and the manicure has lasted longer than others I’ve had elsewhere. I couldn’t recommend highly it enough.

I've really struggled to find a gel nail that actually stays on past a week! I've tried them all and they either completely come off or start to lift and chip resulting in random nails with colour, no colour or half on and half off. The gel Nathan uses is amazing. Mine lasted 4 weeks and not single chip or lift! Well worth the money, and after three weeks they still look smart. Nathan is so chilled too. The choice of colours is FAB too!

I enjoyed a blissfully relaxing morning here today. I was so impressed by the nail product range being vegan and cruelty free whilst still having a really cool range of colours. My nail technician Nathan was so friendly and knowledgable. I would highly recommend this place for a truly high quality experience.
Great place for a fabulous manicure, had the 3rd one today. No chipping or flaking in 5 weeks!! Nathan does a wonderful job and does not rush at all. Definitely will be back 😊

I had more than one session with Edoardo and I really had benefit of the experience. At the end of every session ,I felt more relaxed, less stressed and my breath was better. Edoardo was very gentle, professional and willing to listen to my experience and give me good advice. Highly recommended !

It was my first time having Shiatsu and i was a little nervous because i was in a lot of pain. It didnt take long to feel relaxed with Edoardo however. He worked on my tight back and neck muscles and areas where i have had sciatica pain. I have already booked to go back next week. It was painful but Edoardo asked several times if the pressure was ok and he adjusted it to my needs. I feel after long term pain, i may need a few treatments but i slept for 12 hours after! Im still in pain but i do notice some difference which im grateful for considering its just an hour treatment, im impressed. Thankyou Edoardo.

I have a shiatsu treatment every month with Edoardo, they are different each time but always feel incredible and so powerful! Edoardo is extremely intuitive and seems to know exactly what your body needs, his treatments have a lasting affect for days after.
Highly recommend Edoardo's shiatsu for physical and mental well-being, and to help keep the balance in our crazy lives!

As this was my first shiatsu massage, I was unsure what to expect and admittedly sceptical. Within the first two minutes of meeting Edoardo and beginning the treatment, it was apparent how professional and talented Edoardo is. I would highly recommend this to anyone with ‘old age back’ or high stress. I left feeling like someone flicked the reset button! 10/10! Will be booking again.

Edoardo is clearly a highly skilled practitioner. His shiatsu treatments convey such a profound stillness and sense of calm that I nearly always fall asleep and with out fail, leave the session feeling completely rested, peaceful and renewed.

Darcy has a beautiful energy and is a highly skilled practitioner. The sessions are truly relaxing and rejuvenating. Her products and techniques are modern and holistic. Darcy's attention to detail means you feel really cared for during and after the facial and my skin feels lovely too. I can really notice an improvement, I can't wait for my next session.

I had the most amazing facial with Darcy. I am a new customer and so booked the bespoke classic facial. Darcy tailored everything to me both in terms of my skin but also what I wanted from the treatment (relaxation!). The products were great, the treatment was thorough and I felt super relaxed throughout. I’ll be back for sure.

Darcy is the most incredible facialist.
She is incredibly knowledgeable and talented at what she does.  As well as being the loveliest, most genuine and welcoming person!
Darcy is incredibly mindful of the products and tools that she incorporates into her treatments.  She now has an online shop to allow one to support skin integrity at home between treatments.
I always feel like I float out of her treatments; refreshed, replenished, rejuvenated and relaxed.
My skin is left glowing and so am I!

Darcy is absolutely brilliant, the most relaxing facials I've ever had and my skin always looks and feels great after. She uses a range of tools and styles to make each treatment tailored to you and your needs, making it really good value for money. She has a beautiful, cosy treatment space too. Would highly recommend!

I've had two wonderful facials with Darcy and would highly recommend. She creates a really relaxing and luxurious experience, and expertly tailors the treatment to your needs. If you're after a bespoke, indulgent experience with great results, look no further!

Possibly my best deep tissue massage ever! I was nervous as although I really needed a full intense massage, this was my first time back after a surfing injury resulted in spinal surgery. Almudena is an incredible practitioner, blending targeted intensity with sensitivity and real relaxation, part way through I asked her to extend the session when I realised how good she was. Can't recommend highly enough and will be back again, thank you.

​I recently booked a massage treatment for my mother at Rituals East Street Bristol, and she was absolutely delighted with the experience.
​She was very pleased with the treatment and left with a truly relaxing feeling. The service was exceptional, especially from her therapist, Almudena. My mother emphasized how super attentive and incredibly welcoming Almudena was throughout the entire session.
​I would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for professional treatments and genuinely caring staff. Thank you, Almudena, for making it such a wonderful, relaxing day for her!

I usually suffer from back pain and Almudena has made a great improvement in my condition.
Her salon is really clean and cozy. I felt very comfortable at all times. Making a booking is always straight forward. I would really recommend.

My go to in Bristol for all my beauty treatments. Another amazing session today getting the works with Almudena & Helen. Incredible service, incredible treatments at a really fair price. Don't look any further x

Almudena is an amazing massuese. She not only knows the exact pressure points, but can feel out the problem area and fix it. My shoulder and neck soreness are gone after the session. Highly recommend.

I had a consultation for a skin care routine and treatments with Maggie.
She was really helpful in understanding my concerns with my skin and developing a targeted treatment. Using the skin peel treatments had rejuvenated my skin, making it feel plump and glowing. The follow up from Maggie was also fabulous.

All in all, the high level of service and information has made this an amazing experience from a trustworthy practitioner.

I had my antiwrinkle treatment with Maggie at Natural Beauty Aesthetics and it was amazing! She did a thorough consent all electronic and easy, answered all my questions and the treatment was painless, she is a great injector! I will definitely come back for more services! Absolutely loving the results!
Maggie was amazing, incredibly professional and highly knowledgeable. She gave me really helpful advice and the facial left my skin in great condition. I don't think you can do better than her !

I had a facial treatment with Maggie and I can say that I am highly satisfied. She is a very competent, professional and humanly beautiful person♥️I have already booked a new treatment with her. I recommend it very much!!!

AMAZING TREATMENT! Best aesthetic nurse practitioner un Bedminster!
Maggie was amazing and she knows her stuff to the tea! Great aftercare and support after a few days of treatment was great.
I am getting so many compliments on my skin after my skinbooster.
Coming back before Christmas.

I had an amazing experience at Pro Clinics for my tattoo removal. From the moment I walked in, the atmosphere was welcoming and professional.

A special shoutout to John—he’s incredibly friendly and genuinely cares about his clients. His positive energy and reassuring manner made a big difference!

The results have been fantastic so far, and I couldn’t be happier with the care I received. If you’re considering tattoo removal, I highly recommend Pro Clinic and especially John. You’ll be in great hands!

Andrea is brilliant. She is professional, caring and excellent at what she does. She always makes me feel comfortable, explains everything clearly, and the results for laser hair removal have been great. I would highly recommend her.

I've now had IPL treatment with Andrea for 2 years running now and found her to be extremely helpful, friendly and professional.  I feel totally at ease with the procedure and the set up of the clinic and am planning to have additional treatments in the future.  So glad I found this clinic, it's not intimidating at all.

Andrea is very professional and skillful.
During my initial assessment she was very friendly, answered all of my questions and made me feel relaxed about the procedure. I did have some pain during the treatments but that was expected. The results started to show after the first occassion and that made me very happy and gave my confidence back. I should have come to Pro Clinics sooner.

I had laser hair removal with Andrea and would highly recommend the service. Andrea was brilliant and very professional- she explained everything very clearly and I felt very at ease. I’m so happy with the results! No more painful and expensive waxing!

My second visit to The Orchard Sauna was just as enjoyable as the first. I was even able to stay in the cold plunge for more than double the amount of time! Will make it a regular treat. Lovely staff and clientele. What a gem.

A lovely laid back vibe, especially good because it was an silent evening session.
Two plunge pools mean you can choose between cold and VERY cold!
It's great to be able to look out of the sauna at the goats...

A really gorgeous experience! We went at 8pm so it was quiet at the farm and quite magical to look across on an evening. The facilities have everything you need, and it's really pretty with the plants and seating area. It's fairly small for 8 people but if you time it right, you can alternate the cold dips without waiting around. Felt fantastic after!

Had the loveliest time at Orchard Sauna. Booked in for a silent session on the winter solstice and it was just what I needed, and being able to lie there and hear the birds outside was just lush! Will definitely be back. 🧡

Beautiful peaceful place in the middle of the city.  Have some me-time during the silent sauna session with the occasional fresh plunge in the barrel or mini-pool, or just sit on the comfy outdoor sofa with a book. A completely rejuvenating experience, and you’ll sleep like a baby in the evening!

Bella was so amazing. I have always had massage but this was the best. All part of my body that was sore feels relaxed now. Soooo good, she’s amazing. I fell asleep 😊😁😁. I will definitely be back again

I have had several massages at D&C Thai Massage, since it opened. Today’s was  with Aliyem Blessing. I feel very relaxed and my body is no longer feeling a bit stiff & old, I asked for extra attention to my shoulders, as I hold a lot of tension here. Which Aliyem did concentrate upon. I’m now wondering why I didn’t go sooner. I would recommend a massage for a relaxing treat. Aliyem was friendly, listen to what I needed and left me feeling soothed and relaxed.

Shout out to Bella and Minnie.

Best massage ever!! Came up from London for a few days, was feeling stressed prior the massage, afterwards never felt better! Relieved all my knots and sores from jiu jitsu.
Had a couples session with my partner, both absolutely love it, better than any other chiropractor and sport physio massage I e had in London. I would love to gatekeep this place but I live in London. If you read this ask for Bella and Minnie. You’re welcome.

Bella was fantastic and such a great massage, never felt so relaxed.

She was very friendly and attentive and got  neck to click and felt amazing.

Definitely be back

Bella was very good, was like a full chiropractor session, back and neck cracked amazing! Feel so good afterwards

Must try, regular sessions! So good for pain relief

What a gem! Joanna was polite, professional, and kind, asking thoughtful questions and offering excellent advice on posture and alignment. I walked 30km yesterday, and another 10km today, so my legs badly needed a massage. I stumbled across Joanna’s incredible loft studio by searching google maps, and luckily I got her last booking of the day. I can’t recommend her highly enough, and hope to visit again the next I’m in Bristol. 11/10 🙏🏆

Joanna is an incredible healer! I felt instantly calm as I entered her space. She worked intuitively with my needs, informing me throughout and checking in with my over her techniques. The peace she created within my body stayed with me for a long time post session, I would 100% recommend Joanna for a blissful massage, she is brilliant!! I cannot wait for my next massage.

This place is amazing.
It’s a little place hidden away in broad street but when you go upstairs and into the room - beautiful!! Such a relaxing atmosphere!!
I’ve had different treatments here and I always come back cause when I say I walk out so relaxed, I mean it.
Joanna is very good at her job. If you want a deep muscle treatment or a nice relaxing facial they are all great. Joanna also checks on you for pressure and checks temperature during the treatment, so always aware of her clients.
Like I said if you want a good deep muscle message, reflexology or a facial etc this place won’t let you down

Joanna was amazing, I had a fantastic shoulder and neck massage (possibly the best I've ever had) followed by myofascial sculpting facial which was so relaxing that I was falling asleep.
