All accompanied by soothing therapeutic music and followed by loads of information on stretches and yoga positions to assist with posture and body aches. Thanks so much!

Visited Joanna's place on a windy Friday afternoon, for a reflexology treatment. It was like a relaxing foot massage, without the diagnosis part.
She was friendly and welcoming, we had an initial chat about my physical situation then started the session. She has lots of qualifications and felt that I'm in good hands. I can highlight the scent, the atmosphere, the decoration, the music and the thorough and professional approach, everything was spot on.
FYI, the bell to ring is "Flat 1".

Ellen is amazing! Every massage I have had from her has always left me feeling relaxed. She not only listens to your wants and needs but uses her skills to ensure everything is just right. I would never go anywhere else for a massage! What I loved about my most recent experience was how she blended different aspects of massage. Whilst I asked for a traditional, Swedish style she was able to incorporate elements of deep tissue and lymphatic drainage as she brilliantly discussed the benefits of each. Nothing is ever too much and I cannot recommend her more highly. Thanks Ellen!!
Had an amazing massage with Ellen. Very skilled and responsive to what I needed. Put me at ease straight away and felt so much lighter and relaxed after. Highly recommend and will definitely be back.

I've had the pleasure of experiencing a few massage sessions with Ellen, and I cannot recommend her highly enough! From the moment you walk into her serene and welcoming space, you feel an immediate sense of calm. Ellen has an incredible ability to tune into what your body needs and tailor each session to address any tension or discomfort. Her technique is nothing short of exceptional—every movement feels purposeful and expertly executed.

What really sets Ellen apart is her warm and attentive demeanor. She takes the time to listen to your concerns and creates an environment where you feel completely at ease. Each massage leaves me feeling rejuvenated, both physically and mentally. Ellen's therapies are truly transformative, and I always look forward to my next appointment. If you're looking for a massage therapist who is not only highly skilled but also genuinely caring, Ellen is the one!

I had a massage with Ellen last week and it was fab. She's so lovely and has a really relaxing, calming energy. She creates a gorgeous space and went to work with gentleness, yet enough force on the areas I needed working on. Would highly recommend and I'll be back 😊 Thank you Ellen

Ellen is an incredible massage therapist. I have been to see her several times and each time she carefully listens to what I need and delivers a bespoke treatment. I always leave feel like she has got into the sore bits and I feel lighter and refreshed. I highly recommend her.

Jane’s work is absolutely outstanding, to say the very least. I had considered microblading for a few years but was hesitant to go ahead as I wanted a very natural result and I was concerned that I would end up with unnatural looking eyebrows. Jane really listened, made me feel comfortable and offered excellent advice on what shape & colour brows would best suit me. I’m absolutely delighted with my eyebrows, very natural and I love the colour & shape. Jane is incredibly talented and a consummate professional. I would 100% recommend.

I have just had my eyebrows touched up with Jane and was very pleased with the whole experience. I don't yet know the final result as they are still healing, but I can say that Jane was very professional and made sure I was happy with everything. I was very happy with the result at the end of the session. She is very thorough too, which I really appreciated as someone who tends to obsess over tiny details. I will definitely recommend Jane to anyone looking to have their brows done! Thanks Jane!

I have been seeing Jane for several years for various treatments, including microblading, microneedling, facials, and most recently HBOT therapy. Jane consistently demonstrates professionalism, thoroughness, and exceptional attention to detail. Her dedication to ensuring client satisfaction is a key reason I have remained a loyal client. I have recommended Jane to lots of friends and will continue to do so as she is incredibly passionate and talented at what she does. Thanks Jane x

When I walked into Jane's salon I was at an all time low. My shin was badly scarred through burns, an excision and an area of abraded skin. Jane immediately spotted the scar tissue and worked on it with her
microneedling technique. We are 3 sessions in our of the recommended 6.and I can see how the scars are disappearing,
The excision is flattening out and hopefully the scars will be reduced to the point where I will feel confident to wear a skirt next year.

I was incredibly nervous about having something permanent done to my face. From start to finish, Janes reassuring and professional manner filled me with confidence in her abilities. She listened to my requirements and the desired effect was perfected with her professional expertise and attention to detail. I am absolutely delighted with Janes work which has given me a surprisingly new found confidence. Jane sincerely is the best thing that has ever happened to my face and I am so pleased with my decision to have had the work done, especially by her.

One of the best experiences with nails technician so far !!! Anna is a very talented and professional young lady!!!I've been her client for over two years and I've never been dissatisfied!!!  top-quality service 👌maintaining hygiene standards - sterile devices, packed, opened in front of me each time!! Plus, she's a very nice and warm person! I just want to go and spend time with her! I highly recommend her! Compared to others, she's the best so far!!!!
Once again, I highly recommend it!! Anna is the best!!!!
* Eva

I can wholeheartedly recommend Anna! Her nail art is truly amazing. Thanks to her precision and attention to detail, the results are always professional and high-end. She maintains the highest standards of hygiene regarding her equipment and station, which I really appreciate. Anna is also very kind and outgoing, making every visit a great experience ! It’s a pleasure to keep coming back to her!

Alexandra did the best nails I've ever had done. Lovely friendly person, such attention to detail and care and enthusiasm for what she does. I wanted to feel like I'd treated myself and I definitely did. She showed me how to help my broken nails get stronger gave me lots of tips.  My appointment was relaxed yet so professionally done at every stage. Thank you.

I had the most amazing Hydra-Facial treatment at Bedminster Sun and Beauty with Romy, and I couldn’t be happier with the results! From the moment I walked in, Romy made me feel so comfortable and explained every step of the treatment with great care and professionalism. The facial itself was incredibly relaxing, and my skin felt instantly refreshed, smooth, and glowing afterwards — honestly the best my skin has looked in ages!

Romy’s attention to detail and gentle approach made the whole experience exceptional. You can tell she truly loves what she does and cares about her clients’ skin. I left feeling pampered and rejuvenated.

Highly recommend Romy if you’re looking for glowing, healthy skin and a top-quality Hydra-Facial experience. I’ll definitely be coming back!

I come here to get hydra facials and nails done quite regularly.

My nails from Alexa are always FABULOUS!! She spends ample time shaping them and paints them with such precision.

My hydra facial/diamond microdermabrasion with Romy is always excellent as well. My skin is always glowing and looking so refreshed after.

I love coming here! Overall, great experiences always.

Vee from start to finish was absolutely amazing in very way. The level of professionalism was outstanding. Made me feel comfortable from the second I arrived for my lip filler appointment which I am over the moon with they look incredible, couldn’t recommend skin and joints more. I will definitely be back thank you so so much hun

Walking into Vee’s clinic is such a refreshing experience—she greets you with so much warmth that you instantly feel at ease. She’s incredibly friendly, makes you comfortable, and explains every step of the treatment with clear knowledge and confidence.

She asks you to sit on the “magic chair,” now I understand why after the treatment—because she truly is a magician with skin! I went to her just before my engagement, and my skin now feels healthy, glowing, and absolutely radiant because of her!

Vee is professional, informative, and simply phenomenal at what she does. I can’t recommend her enough—I’ll definitely be going back again and again! 🌸

Remarkable experience and results! My Hair PRP was successful and my hair has improved immensely since doing my treatments. I must say Vee is very knowledgeable and is an expert in her field. Vee is so passionate in what she does and will guide you along your journey to self care. I can't recommend Vee enough!

I am a regular visitor to fully Korean-owned facial clinics back home in Asia, so when I first moved here, I was desperately trying to find a place that could offer the same level of professionalism and results.

That’s when I came across Vee. I decided to book a consultation and was greeted by a warm, professional lady who clearly knows exactly what she’s doing—and is truly passionate about her work.

I had my first Korean facial today and it was ABSOLUTELY AMAZING—exactly like the ones back home 😭 From every single step of the treatment to, most importantly, the results, everything was spot on. I honestly didn’t think I’d find something this comparable here.

Needless to say, I was already booking my next appointment as I was leaving. Highly, highly recommend! ✨

I cannot recommend this amazing clinic enough! I had a hydrafacial from Vee today and my treatment was EXCEPTIONAL! She performed almost 10 steps on me as I requested some extra serums and she also spent an extra 15 minutes on me thoroughly polishing my skin. She is the most qualified, thorough aesthetician who is medically qualified and knows her stuff! Her kind and gentle personality make you feel at ease the second you step into her clinic. My skin has never felt cleaner or looked better. Hands down the best clinic in Bristol! Thank you so much Vee, I can’t wait to come back!! 💗

Oh my gosh I cannot thank Joanna enough. I arrived in a flap because my nose piercing had fallen out and the hole was beginning to close. She knew a huge amount about piercings and really reassured me she would help me out. She went beyond above and beyond to help! It was really painful because I had been aggregating the piercing myself, but I trusted her completely. She was really sensitive to me being stressed and upset but also really calm in making sure she got the problem fixed. Will definitely return as I haven't had an experience like this where I have felt so cared for and had so much trust. Thank you!!

Had my nails done for my WEDDING by Marta in April, i honestly left the shop and cried in my car. She kept insisting I should have long nails as it was my wedding day even though I kept asking her to make them shorter. I sent her a photo of what I’d like ahead of time and if this was the best work she can do then she shouldn’t be working in a professional environment. There was nobody else in the salon (a manager or someone I could complain to about them) so in the end I came home, soaked them off and re- did them myself! The ombré was not blended, there were bubbles in the nails, they were just hideous in every way! There was no way they were going to look nice in any of my wedding photos as they were!

I regularly have my bikini wax and nails done by Maggie. She is always super fast, funny yet professional, and makes you feel very comfortable. I would highly recommend Maggie to anyone.  Additionally, all the other girls always greet you and recognise you, which makes you feel special when you walk in the door.

recently had the pleasure of getting permanent makeup done by Joanna, and I couldn't be happier with the results! From start to finish, the experience was absolutely fantastic. Joanna's expertise and attention to detail are unmatched. She took the time to understand exactly what I wanted and delivered results that exceeded my expectations.

The procedure was virtually painless, and Joanna made sure I was comfortable every step of the way. Her professionalism and warm personality made the entire process enjoyable. Now, I wake up every day feeling confident and beautiful, all thanks to her incredible work.

If you're considering permanent makeup, I highly recommend Joanna. She's truly a master of her craft, and I am over the moon with my new look! Thank you, Joanna!

I've been coming to little paradise beauty for over a year now and it's the nicest salon I have ever been to. Joanna who does my lashes is super friendly and always makes me feel comfortable when doing my lashes.

I always look forward to seeing her for our chats and giggles, she really is a superstar.

Thank you for all the beautiful sets of lashes and for making me feel so looked after, I can't wait to come here for years to come ❤️

Bit too small, just too narrow. 6 people really is the max for this one. I was in a 7 person session so you'd have to rotate someone out. Also you can't get out when the sauna is full you need to wait and time it.
Free drinking water was good though.

Loved my first time at Suvi Sauna at the Pickle Factory, what a lovely cosy sauna built inside an old horse box! I'm looking forward to another visit and having more time to sit by the fire too. Thanks so much :)

Lovely staff and good location but last three times I've been now, it's just not been hot enough. There are many possible reasons as to why (how water is added, people in and out) but I've just never had this issue at any other sauna and think three in a row is quite something... Would be nice to see this improved and I don't think it can just be blamed on the sauna users who I've seen behave differently each time

A great spot for a sauna, hidden away in Easton. A horsebox sauna that seats upto 6 people with three cold plunge baths, changing rooms and a communal space. A cheery welcome and everything you need for that perfect sauna experience:)
I absolutely love the Suvi Saunas at both the Pickle Factory (Bristol) and at Clevedon! The saunas are very well maintained and the staff are always lovely. I highly recommend these saunas!

Really friendly environment. Kavita was very professional and made me feel relaxed as I was having my skin tags removed. Felt no
Pain at all. Highly recommend this place.

Felt very rushed and didn’t feel like she was trying to personalise it to what I wanted for my brow tint and shape. I tried to say how I like them but I shouldn’t have bothered as she didn’t listen anyway and came out with the worst looking brows I’ve ever had in 10 years of getting them done. Wouldn’t recommend.

Came in for sugaring and was super happy with outcome! Kavita was so quick and precise with it, and she was constantly talking me through what she was doing and if i needed to take a breather! Definitely less painful than waxing, and she was super friendly which was very comforting, would definitely recommend!!

Unfortunately the lash lift was very underwhelming. The staff were kind but the service felt very rushed. Very upset having paid £60 - especially as a student when money is already scarce 😞. I’m not contacting the service back for a refund because i doubt i will receive it. Really upset to be honest but this experience taught me to carefully look at prior reviews before getting expensive treatments done.

I’ve had several treatments at Bonjour belle, all the staff are welcoming, sugaring left my skin smooth & silky and my crystal clear facial left my skin rejuvenated, easy to book the treatment online as well. Will definitely be rebooking with them

Miss Tina is hands down the best therapist at Gedhawa! I booked a 120-minute traditional Thai massage with her today and it was absolutely outstanding from start to finish. Her technique is incredibly professional—precise pressure, gentle yet effective stretches, and every movement perfectly targeted. My chronically tight shoulders and lower back melted away within minutes, and the whole session was so relaxing I nearly drifted off to sleep.
She’s exceptionally attentive: right at the beginning she asked detailed questions about my problem areas and preferred pressure, and throughout the massage she checked in to make sure everything felt right. After the session, she kindly reminded me to drink plenty of water and rise slowly. That level of care made the entire experience feel genuinely warm and thoughtful.
The spa itself is spotless, beautifully scented with authentic Thai aromatherapy, and the soft background music creates the perfect calming atmosphere. If you want a truly restorative and authentic Thai massage, request Miss Tina without hesitation—she’s worth every one of these five stars. I’m already looking forward to my next visit! Thank you, Miss Tina, for leaving me completely rejuvenated! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

I had a Thai Oil Massage with Tina and I have no words for how amazing the massage was. She consistently checked I was ok with the pressure, she was actually listening to my body before I had to say anything. I was actually running late but she didn't rush me. She was so calm, gentle, kind and such an expert at what she does. Thank you so much Tina ❤️🙏🏽🌿🌸

The staff are all so lovely too. As I said, I was running late, and they sorted my parking for me. I of course paid for my parking, but they took my car reg and offered on this occasion to take the burden of me. So kind.

I cannot wait to return. Thank you.

P.s. the pictures attached do not do justice to just how nice the location/building is. They also have a shower and sauna in the process of being built if I am correct

I was really exhausted and made a same-day appointment in a rush.
From the moment I walked in, the atmosphere and the receptionist’s calm and welcoming attitude made me feel at ease.

My therapist, Miss Ellie, was very attentive from start to finish. Even though it was a short session, I felt completely refreshed ❤️‍🩹

The tea and cookies served after the treatment were such a lovely touch. I’d love to visit again if I have the chance.
Thank you so much for the wonderful experience!

The place is amazing! I been to sooo many  Thai massage places in Uk and Europe and this is the best place I ever been to! Design, customer service everything is just perfect! I will be back over and  over again again!

I had an absolutely amazing massage with Napa, and I can honestly say it was the best massage I’ve ever had. From start to finish, she made me feel completely comfortable and cared for. Her technique was incredible — she knew exactly where I was holding tension and worked through all the tight spots with the perfect pressure.

I walked in feeling stressed and worn down, and walked out feeling lighter, relaxed, and totally refreshed. It genuinely felt like all the stress I’ve been carrying just melted away. My body feels so much better, and I can’t remember the last time I felt this calm.

If you’re looking for someone who is skilled, attentive, and truly gifted at what she does, Ma is the one. I can’t recommend her enough — I’ll definitely be back! :) xx

Jen did a full head balayage with money pieces on my hair, the experience was amazing start to finish! The transformation of my hair was incredible and Jen was super lovely throughout, I will definitely be back for my next appointment and my hair is fresh and perfect for christmas.

I had a great appointment with Jen, who gave me a full-head caramel balayage - and I absolutely love it! She made me feel really comfortable and took the time to understand exactly what I wanted. Would definitely recommend!

Lola did the most fantastic job on my hair. I love her communication and how quickly she understood what I wanted. It was a pleasure to get my hair done by her. She is incredibly skilled at color, hair cuts and blowouts. My hair has never looked better.

I went there today for the first time with my 4 year old daughter for a double appointment. I arrived with my sister and husband as i needed help with getting my daughter through her first hairdressing appointment. Everyone was super welcoming, patient with my daughter and with me and the quality of the haircut was fantastic. I will definitely go back!
My only constructive feedback is i wished they dropped Moroccan Oil as a brand in the store.
Thank you for your great service today!
Had an lovely experience the whole appointment .Jen gave me a full head of balayage with cut and curl. I’m obsessed with my new hair and will definitely be returning.

I had such a wonderful experience having the microdermabrasion and oxygen facial with Fran. She was incredibly attentive and knowledgeable, taking the time to explain everything and offer helpful advice for my skin. I felt completely relaxed throughout the treatment and it truly felt like my skin was given the best care and attention. I left feeling refreshed, confident and glowing. I would highly recommend her to anyone looking for a professional and relaxing skincare experience

Had the most amazing facial with Sarah today! My skin is feeling so hydrated & glowing all ready for my Hen Party at the weekend. Always such a beautiful, calm & professional space, with the best therapists. Highly recommend, you’ll always be well looked after here. Thank you x

I had a beautiful Reflexology treatment which was just amazing. My wife had a lovely massage. We have booked again for January. The premises is warm clean and very welcoming. We would highly recommend. Thank you team.

Have been visiting the treatment rooms regularly for the past year and everytime Jessie is exceptional at her job. I always leave so fresh and happy. All the staff are lovely and welcoming and is a lovely clean and soothing environment

Erin is a wonderful therapist, sensitive and professional. She put me at ease immediately with her friendly disposition. The massage was excellent and I left feeling relaxed and free from tension. I shall return and would highly recommend Erin and the Treatment Rooms for the quality of their service.

I've been having HydraBeauty Facials with Kirstie, every 5-6 weeks, for a couple of years now and it's become a bit of a non-negotiable part of my routine. I have absolutely no intention of quitting!

The treatments and the consistency genuinely feel like they've made a real difference to my temperamental skin. I break out less often and with a lot less severity and vastly improved healing than before.

Kirstie is not only a pro at what she does, she really cares for her clients. She takes time, every time, to analyse my skin and tailor the treatment appropriately. I feel confident in her hands and just that little bit special that I'll be getting a more bespoke appointment that addresses what my skin really needs that day. Kirstie's also just a lovely person - fun and bubbly - so I always know I'll leave in a good mood. It's been a bit of a journey at times, but Kirstie has fully been on that journey with me as both an expert and a cheerleader. An absolute gem. Couldn't recommend the treatment or Kirstie enough.

I love Lanes Health & Beauty. I have been coming here since August 2024 after a friend recommended and I have been coming back ever since. Kirstie is fantastic, she makes you feel so comfortable and is brilliant at what she does. I have regular waxes with her and have also had the most amazing facials by her too. Highly recommend! :)

I started having HydraBeauty Facials with Kirstie in February 2024 in the lead-up to my wedding in September, and the difference they have made to my skin has been incredible. My skin looked the best it ever has for my wedding, and I’ve continued having treatments ever since - including now, while expecting my first baby!

Kirstie is amazing at what she does. She always tailors each facial to exactly what my skin needs at the time, and has been especially thoughtful and knowledgeable about adapting treatments during pregnancy. Every appointment feels like a full hour of relaxation where you genuinely feel looked after, treated, and special.

My skin feels amazing - smoother, fresher and so much more even, with a healthy glow. I get so many compliments now, and it’s all down to Kirstie’s expertise and care!!

I honestly couldn’t recommend Kirstie enough - she is fantastic, and I would recommend her to anyone and everyone. 💛

I’ve been going to The Lanes Health and Beauty monthly for about two years now. I first went for waxing, and it was honestly the best Hollywood wax I’ve ever had. I then moved on to laser hair removal as I wanted more permanent results, and I’ve not looked back since!

Mya is the best beauty therapist I’ve ever had, she’s kind, caring, and extremely professional. I’ve never once felt judged by her, and she always makes me feel completely comfortable during treatments that could otherwise feel awkward.

Thank you so much, Mya,  I couldn’t recommend you enough!

I've been having Hydrofacials with Kirstie at The Lanes Health & Beauty for around two years now. The difference in my skin since having regular facials is incredible! My acne has completely cleared up and my skin has a constant glow. Kirstie is a very friendly and knowledgeable therapist who makes me feel very comfortable, welcome and also knows my skin to a T! I know that I am in very safe and capable hands everytime I visit. I'd definitely recommend!

High-pressure, pushy sales tactics from start to finish. I left my second consultation feeling cornered, pressured, and completely unclear about what I was signing up for. When I returned a few weeks later, I was told I had to purchase overpriced products alongside the treatment—products that weren’t available anywhere else. I was in a vulnerable place at the time and deeply regret allowing myself to be manipulated in this way. The staff showed a startling lack of compassion, and the entire experience felt transactional and unpleasant. I’ve spoken with several others who had almost identical experiences. This company is toxic, manipulative, and untrustworthy—avoid at all costs.

Am being treated for lower face and good amount of my body.

Was treated today by Aine.

Lovely staff and clear instructions during treatment and for pre-/aftercare. Am seeing significant results already after my first treatment or two ^^
I saw Chloe for laser hair removal. I’ve seen great results after my first few sessions with significant reduction in hair growth and Chloe has been helpful and kind in the sessions.
Aine in Brighton is a brilliant consultant! She is very thorough and professional and reassuring. Thank you for being so lovely !
Aine is wonderful. Makes the laser experience as comfortable as possible. Couldn’t recommend her enough! :)

This Boots is a huge store....loads of choice. They have Pharmacy, baby items, sun protection products, makeup counters, toiletries, travel products, photo station, free health check for over 40s, recycle section, meals, snacks, headphones, hair accessories and loads more. It is over two floors! Staff are busy but really helpful.

I absolutely adore Eveline Patricia, the Givenchy expert at Boots in Brighton!
She’s incredibly welcoming and very professional. She always knows exactly what to recommend, and thanks to her, I’ve discovered so many amazing perfumes. Her warmth and knowledge make every visit feel special and honestly, she’s the reason I’ll forever be a Givenchy girl:)
If you're in Brighton, definitely ask for Eveline!

I had a wonderful experience at Boots thanks to Evaline. She was extremely knowledgeable about fragrances, offered only original perfumes, and guided me through several options with great taste. Very elegant, professional, and genuinely kind!
Sophia at the too faced make up counter was so so so kind and helpful! Definitely recommend seeing her for a colour match and product information.  A complete asset to the team! Thank you Sophia ❤️❤

I had such a great experience with Eveline Patricia. Boots Givenchy expert! She makes the whole process feel easy and personal I ended up discovering new scents I prolly wouldn’t have discovered on my own, and it really stood out to me how much she cares about matching people with the right products. If you’re ever in Brighton, definitely look for Eveline

Had a wonderful Indian Head Massage from Andrea which was pure bliss.
Combined with an afternoon in the Hotel leisure suite and lunch in the restaurant it has been like a spa day. Hugely recommend for a relaxing afternoon in Brighton.
Had an Indian head massage here and it was incredible. Very relaxing and the lady talked me through what she was doing. Very professional service.
Pedicure was very relaxing. Seat included foot spa bath. Exfoliating massage was very invigorating. Huge range of colours to choose from. Michelle was excellent and very friendly
Absolutely amazing Both my husband and myself had a 30 minute massage and felt like we were floating on air the rest of the day. Would definitely recommend if staying in Brighton

From my initial email query through to the end the ladies were lovely, professional & accommodating.
My friend & I were staying at the hotel and each had a treatment.
Both were very good
Highly recommended

Had my hair done by Maisie for the first time, wanted to go blonder as I’m naturally a warmer brown at the moment, and we had a discussion about it, I showed her the exact pictures I was going for and asked if it was feasible to achieve that colour, which she told me it would be. Unfortunately was left coming away darker than before and when I tried to speak to Maisie about this, she didn’t reply to my messages for days and when she did recommended another colour was needed (another £130), which I made clear in the first appointment I didn’t have hundreds to spend at once. The last message I sent still hasn’t been replied too over a week and a half later. Really upset with the treatment and service provided, and now have booked in with a previous salon to fix it. I’ve never had this issue before with hairdressers and absolutely hate complaining but when paying £130 to colour my hair and not have it at all how I asked I feel I have been cheated a little. I think better communication and honest answers could be applied to her customer service in the future. For reference, first pic is before having my hair dyed, the second pic is after, and the third was the inspo picture.

Had my hair done with Rose, and this girl knows what she doing! I’ve asked questions about hair she answered all of them and gave me more advice how to look after them better. Very lovely woman to chat with. Highly recommend Rose :) thank you so much

Maisie did my extensions and I was in in so much pain when laying my head on my pillow and noticed loads of ripped out hair follicles attached to the tape, went back in and her and Kelly told me it was allergic reaction and to take anti histamine ( it wasn’t) I showed another stylist from different salon and she took them out immediately for free because they would have continued to rip my hair out, I was left with fine damaged hair, I sent Maisie photo proof of my hair and the damage and all I received was very rude messages from her and Kelly gaslighting me into thinking was normal and making me out to be difficult. They refused to give me any money back ( I paid nearly £500 for the service and had the extensions in for less than 2 weeks and was 17) very poor service and even worse customer service, no accountability taken whatsoever.

As a nervous client I was worried to have my first salon experience however Kelly and the girls couldn’t be more accommodating. They made me feel so comfortable and my hair looks amazing every time. The large selection of drinks and sweet treats always are a nice touch. I’ve never felt more confident than when I leave the salon. Can’t thank or recommend you enough girls. Xxxx

I had the privilege to have my hair done by Kelly . This was my first visit and I was very nervous. Kelly made me so welcome and reassuring throughout the visit . My hair have never looked so beautiful before . 8 weeks later and I still love it and can’t wait for my next visit .

Best place I’ve been to get my nails done in Brighton. Lovely women, keen to have a natter and really took care with each step of the process. And SO affordable, I’ve paid double elsewhere so I can go more often now. Highly recommend, thanks Kate and Tracy!

Absolutely awful! Avoid at all costs! My nail was drilled into and when I spoke up, I was accused of exaggerating. The owner refused to apologize, insisting they’ve been doing this for years and that I was overreacting.

If you’re okay with a manicure that looks like the pictures, that’s your choice - but it’s not just unprofessional, it’s downright terrible. I went to Tania.

PS. I just noticed another hole on the surface of my ring finger nail. Two deep holes in total. I’m honestly in shock. My friends are, too. Tania was literally drilling my cuticle at the expense of my nail. What she offered is to cover it with the nail polish.
PSS - what’s Tania has done - she removed cuticles with the electric cuticle drill bit together with the top surface of my nails. It really hurts now all day long as if I had a bad dental pain but in my nails, and they are thin and bendy. Shocking service.

Dear Tracy and Tania, the cuticles are gently pushed back at the beginning to avoid removing them while damaging the nail surface! Basics!

I’ve been coming to Jagwa  for the last 5 years for both hair and nails and wouldn’t look anywhere else. Professional service , lovely people and amazing results ! Thank you for always making me feel special when I walk out the door.

my favourite salon and i ve tried a few in brighton! for both waxing and hair. always a lovely experience with amazing results. i am obsessed with my haircut! can't recommend this place enough and the lovely ladies that work there!

I couldn't recommend Jagwa Salon enough! I have been going there to have my nails done for a year now and am never disappointed! 🙂 Tracy and the rest of the team are amazing! They are professional and welcoming and I always see my visits as a bit of a treat!
Definitely a 5* experience! 🙂
Thanks Tracy for such a lovely experience and beautiful nails too xx

Connie is the best! She always makes me feel super comfortable and relaxed, and I love our chats during my sessions. The waxing is quick, professional, and honestly as painless as it can be. I actually look forward to my appointments – couldn’t recommend her more!

My first time here and just an incredible experience - I am blown away! Sammy made my appointment SO easy and her technique was truly faultless, I’ve never experienced such little pain during a wax!
Massive MASSIVE thank you to Sammy for the absolute BEST wax I’ve ever had 👏👏 could not recommend her more, she was totally brilliant ❤️❤️

The best waxes in Brighton and I can’t recommend Sammy enough! She is super friendly and easy to talk to, making you feel very comfortable throughout and makes the process go very quickly.

The treatment rooms are always spotless and I’ve always left with flawless results due to the attention to detail… I wouldn’t go anywhere else!
First time visiting this clinic. I was met at the door by Connie who was polite and friendly and did a very thorough job waxing. I will definitely return to GOGOBrazilian

Giusy is amazing!! I can't recommend her enough! She is incredibly attentive, and make the entire waxing experience as comfortable and smooth (literally!) as possible. The space is always clean and calming, and Giusy has a great way of making you feel relaxed and at ease.
She takes her time to ensure everything is done perfectly, with great attention to detail and hygiene. She is super friendly and easy to talk to, which really helps take your mind off any discomfort. I have been going to her for a year now and wouldn’t want to go anywhere else.

This is by far the best eyelash extensions I have ever had and I have tried a few!! I have been with Imelda for close on four years now and refuse to go any where else, the quality is outstanding, the time and care Imelda takes every time I see her is absolutely 1st class!! Her prices are excellent and my lashes always look perfect with no way of telling they are not real lashes at all.  I would highly recommend her for not only lashes but her ear piercing and other services she provides.  Best of the best!!!

Imelda is incredibly professional and meticulously applies each lash with such care. She uses high quality products and minimal glue, so the results look completely natural. My lashes have given me a massive confidence boost and I cannot recommend her highly enough.

Imelda did my eyelashes for the first time in July. I was really pleased with the result, they looked natural at the same time as giving me longer and and thicker eye lashes that made my eyes look brighter too. The lashes are so comfortable, I really don't know they are there. This is by far the best experience I have had with these type of lashes, previously my eyes have felt uncomfortable but this time with Imelda, I totally forget that I have such beautiful lashes. I have been using the coating sealant too and after two weeks all my lashes remain firmly in place. They are really brilliant and I thoroughly recommend Imelda for this.

I have been coming to the Brighton eyelash Salon for a while now and I would not go anywhere else for my lashes, they are the best ever. Imelda is a creative genius and they always look AMAZING. The lashes are high quality and last weeks, I am not exaggerating here either. There is a real art to creating natural yet full, luxurious lashes and Imelda has nailed it, go to her and you will not leave disappointed!

Superb lashes done regularly by Imelda over the last 2 years, I have tried other salons before where they did a poor job! So very pleased to always have beautiful lashes, they last for a long time and I have had them done for a very reasonable cost, so I am very grateful. Very professional service and great aftercare advice too. I can highly recommend her to others whom expect high quality lashes at a very fair price.
Amazing nail artist, best nails in town. Recommended

So happy with the whole experience of my eyebrow waxing! Jen was so lovely and easy to talk to and did an amazing job, my brows are perfect i’m so happy with them. Lovely , clean setup, also a very accessible and inclusive online booking system- all in all 10/10 will be back , and highly recommend :) x

Absolutely wonderful and heart warming.

Best electrolysis technique I've ever had. Conversations, should you opt in to them, are wonderful and calming and very good distraction from being stabbed in the face and my hair follicles being permanently zapped away.

Everyone who works here is an absolute sweetheart and will do their best to make sure you're looked after and treated with dignity, respect and care.

I moved to Brighton summer last year and since then, I see Jen twice a month for spray tans and waxing. I can honestly say she's AMAZING at what she does. She's a complete perfectionist, and I have never felt disappointed leaving Turn Beautiful. Other places I've been to seem to just want to get the job over and done with and rush it, but Jen always takes the time and makes sure you're happy with the end result. She's lovely and bubbly, and makes you feel completely comfortable. The prices are very affordable at Turn Beautiful but quality products are used, which is rare! I have recommended Jen to many friends and they have all raved over her work - and gone back. :)

I've been using Turn Beautiful since Jen first opened up and the services they offer is the best in Brighton. Jen and her team are lovely who always go above and beyond. The Lyon hot wax is amazing, I have curly hair and I've never experienced any ingrown hair since they switched to this wax. Not only do they provide excellent waxing services, Turn Beautiful also do gel nails using a Bio Sculpture Gel, which is vegan friendly and strengthens the nails. Gosia has excellent attention to detail and always knows how I want my nails shaped and the perfect colour for my skin tone. Olivia has recently joined and still maintained that high standard that I alway receive at Turn Beautiful. I can't wait to go back and see Olivia to progress. I'm sure under Jen's supervision she'll continue her amazing journey as a beautician - I had so many compliments when Olivia did my nails for the first time. I've yet to get my eyelashes done, but I've seen other clients and the result are amazing. I love coming to Turn Beautiful and I'm treated like a close friend/family member. If your looking for amazing service, this is the place to go to in Brighton.

I have been to so many salons all over Brighton & Hove and have never found anyone I would go back to. Every time I have been to Jen she has been so welcoming and friendly and I can't fault her treatments at all. I would definitely recommend to everyone to have eyelashes done with Jen - She is literally the best! I definitely wouldn't go anywhere else now!

Look at these nails! Sprinkles so fresh you can almost taste them. Making me hungry for donuts just looking at them.

Alex is so wonderful. A master of her craft, she's speedy and so, so talented. And the studio is super cute, tucked away from the hustle and bustle. The whole experience was a complete joy.

Please consider Alex for your next nails, you won't regret it!

The only place worth going in Brighton to get your nails done. Alex is amazing, super friendly and relaxed. Have been going here for over a year now and always get comments on how cool my nails are! Thanks Alex!
Alex is an amazing nail artist and lovely person. She's professional, talented, very hygienic and fantastic value. Highly recommended.
Alex was lovely and made my nails look so pretty!
Best place to get your nails done in Brighton and incredible nail art

Hollie couldn’t have been more lovely and my brows look AMAZING. Asked me exactly what I wanted and had me involved in the process & touched up brows and my makeup afterwards! I’m not from Brighton but it’s made me think about coming back just to see her!

Had an appointment booked yesterday for a lip wax. I came on time was waiting and waiting nobody showed up. I asked if anybody's working at the benefit counter today and lovely Carol at the next beauty stand said no. I came all the way and waited and Did not receive a text message or email or phone call that my appointment is cancelled. It is very upsetting. I hope that never happens again.

I'm inexperienced in applying make-up and needed advice on how to cover up an embarrassing spot on the top of my nose; the makeup I've been using didn't cover it. Thankfully, I saw Eloise at Benefit (Boots store) Brighton today.  She was amazing!  She understood my problem and was empathetic and extremely helpful. Eloise gave me a makeup session and advice on products to use and explained each step in applying the various products / makeup. Within minutes I couldn't see the spot. I am so grateful to her for making me feel so much better and that gives me confidence to do what I need. Thank you Eloise, much appreciated.  Christine

I got my makeup done by Hollee, she is so fun and makes the whole experience enjoyable!! She really knows what shes doing and the products shes using!! I ended up getting the og lip tint!! Shes super lovely and would absolutely go back again

"I recently visited the Benefit makeup counter for a brow shaping appointment and was blown away by the service! The artist took the time to understand my brow goals and expertly shaped my brows to perfection. The whole experience was so relaxing and enjoyable. Highly recommend for anyone looking to level up their brow game

Suzi is an experienced therapist with an extremely positive and welcoming attitude. I have enjoyed massage , facials , manicures and pedicures, all of which have been great. Her micro zone facials are particularly good and my skin looks and feels fantastic afterwards. Her massages are firm and therapeutic and she demonstrates good knowledge of the skin and body. I am now loving the Dermalogica products she has used and suggested for me and I would not hesitate to recommend her.
I've go to Suzi for a pedicure, facial and to have my eyebrows plucked. She works from a lovely setting, makes you feel really relaxed and it's now a monthly treat for me to visit her.
Suzi gave me the best pair of eyebrows since Joan Crawford and a dazzling pedicure to boot. Highly recommended!
Nobody better than Suzi!

I can't recommend Fay at Brighton Beauty Bar enough! She is incredibly kind and truly listens to my needs before offering her expert advice. Every service I've received—from microblading and Botox to lip fillers and brow shaping—has left me feeling confident and refreshed. Fay has a knack for enhancing my features while keeping a natural look. The salon itself is beautiful, and over the past three years, I've consistently enjoyed the best treatments here.

I’ve been seeing Fay for a while now and honestly couldn’t recommend her enough. She’s so lovely, professional, and really takes the time to make sure everything looks natural and suits me perfectly. I always feel so comfortable during appointments and leave feeling confident and happy every time. Truly the best! 🤍✨

I’ve been coming to this salon for a few years now and have had several treatments with Fay. She’s always so professional, kind, and reassuring  I completely trust her advice and skills. The results are always amazing, and I’ve never been disappointed. I wouldn’t go anywhere else!
I also recommended her to my friends they are all happy too ❤️

I went in wanting to correct a crazy eyebrow that has always looked out of shape. I was a bit nervous about it and explained what I wanted and what I didn't want. She listened and was very clear and conscientious both in listening to what I wanted and taking her time to make sure it was absolutely perfect. If you are nervous about any of these treatments this is the place to go. I promise you will not be disappointed. I am very happy with the result.

I started getting my eyebrows threaded here about a year ago and I havent been anywhere else since.
Really such a great job, professional, she is always lovely, the place is so clean and welcoming, and I always leave feeling amazing!!
Would 100% recommend
Very clean and professional salon. Loved the way they shaped my eyebrows using threading. They give you rose water for your eyebrows after. £6 ...bargain!

"Excellent service and a fantastic central location! I’m a long-time regular here because they always do a perfect job with my eyebrows. Yesterday they went above and beyond by squeezing me in last-minute right before closing because I had a trip today. Truly professional and friendly staff. Highly recommended!"

Got biab done today and they look exactly like the picture I’d shown as inspiration for what I wanted- very happy with them! Would definitely recommend as the staff are the sweetest and work is done professionally!

Yesterday I had a product allergen patch test for all of the products that would be used, even the tint which I wasn't sure I was going to have that; and booked for today for 2pm (moved to 2.30 and I am greatful).
I was greeted nicely by both members of staff on entry.

I was treated so well and taken good care of. I had lovely conversation with my lash technician, I think her name was Hailey (im so sorry Im terrible with names!!! The lady who lost her voice at the festival she told me about😅🤣).
I quized her about lash 'tint' to go with the lash lift, as I hadn't been walked through that process or done any research/knew about it yet and wondered what difference it made.
This amazing lady answered all of my questions and put me so at ease. She checked in with each step of the process making sure I was comfortable, the entire time.
The appointment flew by, we are both so so happy with the result and I am so greatful for this first time experience 🙌.
I’ve had lash lifts and eyebrow tinting done by Maryam many times, and she’s always very professional and friendly. The salon itself is clean, welcoming, and has a lovely atmosphere.
My first visit and Roxy went above and beyond for me. Attention to detail was amazing, she explained everything to me and gave me advice. They look STUNNING! I will be back. Thank you! xxx
Agol is absolutely fantastic, she is super accommodating and always works with you to get the design you want. My nails always get lots of compliments. Thank you! x
Came for the vegan gel but was really impressed overall. Super swift service and lovely staff! Nails are still in great condition after a couple of weeks 💅 100% recommend!
Just had my nails done by Sophie. I am very happy with the result, she listened to exactly what I wanted. I'll be back in a few weeks for my infill!
Roxy and Shadi were brilliant! Very kind and did a beautiful job. I’m awful with people touching my feet, but they were so soft and gentle, felt so rested!

I’ve been seeing Nicky for acupuncture to help with dizziness, a frozen shoulder, and an old scar on my forehead — and I can genuinely say she has been amazing with each one.

After every session, I feel clearer, lighter, and even my vision noticeably improves. People around me have been commenting that I look younger and more refreshed, which I believe is a direct result of the treatments.

Nicky has a calm, intuitive approach and a real gift for healing. I feel very lucky to have found her and wouldn’t hesitate to recommend her to anyone looking for a truly skilled and caring therapist.

Highly recommend Nicky, she has been helping me with my back and shoulder pain, last year I've had few sessions with her and I was pain free for a year, she is professional and always put me at ease with needles as I'm a bit anxious about needles in my body, she's been great and will definitely go back if I have any problems in the future.

Nicky is a great professional who makes me feel comfortable and confident in her skills as an acupuncturist. I suffer from neck and back pain, and her sessions always help alleviate my discomfort. Additionally, I experienced a period of migraines that Nicky's treatments significantly reduced. I highly recommend it! :)

Nicky is great at her job and makes you feel most welcome. Explaining how the treatment works to put your mind at ease. Above all though the treatments work magnificently. I had nerve pain pretty severe in my neck and tried lots of chiropractor visits to no avail. 2 times visiting nicky and I was completely pain free. Try for yourself and you won't be disappointed. Acupuncture all the way. Thank you Nicky. Couldn't be happier.

I have been seeing Nicky for a couple of years now, and she always manages to find the right treatment for how I am feeling and what is going on for me at that time.
Her treatments are always highly effective and multi dimensional. Since I have been coming to Nicky she has helped me with a range of issues including high blood pressure, back neck and shoulder pain, digestive issues, and sinus / snoring issues.
Whats more I always feel that Nicky is 100% client focused and puts everything in to her sessions.
I feel a better and richer person for having gone to Nicky for my acupuncture treatments.

We had Nina coming to my 50th birthday weekend with the girls. She was amazing, very friendly and professional. We all loved her massage. The organisation with the office for the weekend was very smooth, highly recommended. Ami x

We had booked The Perfect Pamper for a bridal shower party! Communication with Charlotte was fab! We had Nina and Natalie for our massages and they were great! Everyone really enjoyed their massages. Affordable and great service. Thank you!

I booked The Perfect Pamper after searching for a company close to home for my daughter's local hen party - she has another hen do abroad next weekend for those that can travel. Our therapists, Sacha & Claire were so friendly & professional making us all feel very comfortable with our treatments. We had manicures, facials, massages (my daughter particularly enjoyed her deep tissue massage) and reflexology.
Everyone felt wonderful after treatments and thought it was such a great idea to have all this perfect pampering at home.
Thanks for booking us at short notice too.
I will definitely be recommending to everyone I know, an excellent service and very good value for money.
This was a SUPERB experience! Charlotte was a fantastic teacher, brilliant at massage, as well as being really patient, knowledgable and funny! We loved every minute and cannot recommend her enough!

Charlotte was both highly personable and a superb teacher. Everything was explained and demonstrated very clearly, and were left feeling like we acquired new skills AND had a gorgeous massage in the process! We will definitely be booking the follow up course

I had a gel manicure done at Mermaid today, and Bardha was fantastic! This was my first ever gel manicure and she was so reassuring, talked me through the process and patiently let me choose my colour. I was a bit nervous about whether my nails would look nice as they’re so short right now, but they turned out so lovely! Will definitely be back and book with Bardha again.

I had the most phenomenal wax here! Dido was so good-  her attention to detail and technique were incredible, so thorough and painless! I was very impressed and very grateful!! The room and atmosphere was also lovely and really stress-free. I will definitely return- Thankyou so much!

Unfortunately the  BIAB manicure I had done yesterday did not last even a day and came off completely tonight from one finger. I also feel after looking closer at the painting during day time hours it has not been done precisely . I wouldn't have written a review, but this has never happened to me in previous salons. In that case I feel there should be a customer refund.
I had a lovely couples massage with my partner. We booked very last minute on the phone, and they were lovely. The massages were amazing, we both left feeling rejuvenated.

Spur of the moment booking for a full body massage while visiting Brighton for work. The massage from Nikol was fantastic and definitely the best I've had. From the warm welcome she made me feel completely at ease and during the massage regularly checked with me that the pressure being applied was ok (it was perfect). Would definitely recommend, thank you.

I have been for a few different treatments and they are always brilliant. Most recently I have been going for facials. Taz knows exactly what my skin needs and i come away feeling refreshed and rejuvenated. Best service and quality products. Highly recommend.

I received a gift voucher to The Beauty Place Hove, and had an appointment with Tasmyn for an Eventis skin analysis. Tasmyn immediately made me feel at ease, explained everything very well, answered all my questions and most importantly educated me on a few things I didn't know! At 50 my skin has suddenly changed a lot, and it feels liberating to actually know facts and switch off all the background noise of information on social media or internet. Thank you very much.

Love, love, love this place. I missed going to the salon so much, glad to be back. The stuff are friendly and successful treatments. They tailor everything to your personal needs. Wouldn't go anywhere else x
I booked a deluxe facial for my wife for her birthday, so said it was extremely relaxing, professional, and her skin feels amazing. Would recommend!

I had such a great experience with my waxing treatment! The therapist made me feel completely comfortable from start to finish and the whole process was quick and as painless as possible. I’m really happy with the results. I’ll definitely be coming back and would recommend them to anyone looking for a professional, caring beauty therapist!”

I have been visiting  Dr. Adam since April, receiving masseter botox to address my TMJ symptoms. After just the first session, I had remarkable improvement and my TMJ discomfort resolved which was such a relief. After a couple of sessions I noticed that my jaw had reduced in bulkiness which was another concern of mine, and now I visit every couple months for maintenance.

From my very first visit, I was impressed by the clinic’s immaculate, modern, and welcoming environment. As this was my first time getting a treatment like this, I initially felt quite nervous; however, Dr. Adam’s professionalism, warmth, and reassuring manner immediately put me at ease. He takes the time to explain each step of the process clearly, and I felt comfortable and confident.

The injections themselves are virtually painless, and the results are reliable each time. In addition, the pricing is very reasonable compared to other clinics, particularly given Dr Adam’s surgical background and expertise in the medical field, you know you can trust him!

I wouldn’t consider going anywhere else and I highly recommend Dr. Adam to anyone considering treatments for medical or aesthetic purposes (or both)!

I've been using Dr Adam for over 7 years since moving to Hove from London where I'd used a number of different clinics over the years for botox & fillers. Dr Adam & his clinic far outshine all of the previous providers used and I recommend him 100%.

I could not recommend Dr Adams enough. He provides an incredibly professional and effective service and does so with a very warm and welcoming manner. I will always feel comfortable and confident in Dr Adams' hands.

Dr Adam is very professional and knowledgeable about his work. The clinic is modern, clean and in a great location. The fillers turned out perfect! Excellent result achieved, particularly with the tear through filler. I’d definitely recommend and see him again!
Dr Adam is exceptionally professional and gentle — the results are natural, subtle, and confidence-boosting every time.

I had a shellac manifure at the Fiveways Beauty Room this morning and I am super pleased with the whole experience. My nails look gorgeous thanks to Sophie's caring and talented hands. Also, the space is so relaxing that I felt happy and de-stressed immediately. I would go back for other treatments and higly recommend it to anyone who wants affordable and exquisite treatments.

I go to Ellie for my BIAB and have been going for a year or so. She’s efficient yet doesn’t rush, my nails last eve try time until my infill! The loads of colour options and Ellie can even do nail art if I’m feeling crazy. The salon is gorgeous and relaxing, I always get offered a coffee which is a nice touch! I love coming here and wouldn’t go elsewhere, it’s also super affordable!

What a lovely experience ! Calm and friendly and professional . Had a facial today and it was really well explained beforehand . I chattered all through it but Sophie was charming about me doing that . I often feel a little intimidated by  these places and the beauticians because I am not young .  But I just felt welcome and comfortable. Going back next week for nails and eyebrows . A little oasis of charm and calm.

I had the organic alchemist facial and i couldn't recommend this enough!! The best facial and massage ive ever had. Felt so relaxed and the smells of the products were out of this world.
I go here monthly for eyebrows and nails and Ellie never fails to make them perfect for me!

I'm an old school bloke & felt slightly nervous about 'beauty' treatments but feet are shot to bits, heels & soles a horror film. Made to feel comfortable, relaxed and not a nightmare despite my manic tickles. Also a better quality pedicure than Brighton centre

I visited this centre and had consultations with Dr. Lam and Chloe, and both of them were absolutely lovely. From the moment you walk in, the interior feels very welcoming, modern, and thoughtfully designed — you instantly feel comfortable there.

I had several procedures done, and I really appreciated how carefully they listened to all my wishes and concerns. Everything was explained clearly, and the treatments were tailored specifically to me, which made the whole experience feel very personal and professional.

What stood out the most for me is that the team genuinely focuses on what is best for the client, rather than trying to upsell unnecessary treatments. This level of honesty and client-first approach is quite rare, and I truly appreciated it — especially because I have experience with other clinics and can easily compare.

I can sincerely recommend this centre to anyone looking for high-quality care, professionalism, and a genuinely pleasant experience.

I had my CO₂ treatment at Grand Aesthetics Clinic yesterday and the experience was exceptional from start to finish. Dr. Liam, who carried out my treatment, was incredibly professional and made me feel completely comfortable throughout. Every step of the procedure was explained in detail, which really put me at ease, and I felt genuinely well looked after at all times. The hospitality was outstanding, and the clinic itself is cosy, beautiful, and modern. A truly calming space. I couldn’t be happier with my experience and would highly recommend Grand Aesthetics Clinic, especially Dr. Liam, to anyone seeking expert care in a luxurious and welcoming environment.

I had the most amazing hydro facial with Chloe and I honestly couldn’t be happier with the whole experience. The atmosphere was calm, clean, and so relaxing from the moment I walked in. Chloe made me feel completely at ease and explained every step of the treatment. My skin looked noticeably brighter, smoother, and more hydrated immediately after.

What really impressed me was her knowledge and the personalised recommendations she gave me for my skin type. You can tell she truly cares about her clients and their results. I will definitely be back and would highly recommend Chloe to anyone looking for a professional and effective facial treatment.

I’m now a regular customer at Grand Aesthetics. Kelly is fantastic! Her knowledge and advice are spot-on, and she has really taken the time to consider and tailor the treatment for my skin. I’m seeing great results already. I completely trust her expertise and highly recommend her!

I felt completely at ease and beautifully taken care of by Dr Susie. She really listens, understands what works for you as an individual and communicates the process so well. I felt that she took the time to make sure I was really happy with my treatment and I so appreciate the extra mile she went to. She's also just a lovely person. Would wholeheartedly recommend her and the clinic to anyone.

I could not be any happier, I am so in love with my new nails! I was taken care of with Hadis who was the loveliest lady ever and it felt like my nails went from nothing to absolute perfection in no time at all!! I passionately recommend this beautiful business for anyone looking for a job done perfectly and exactly how you want it! Thank you so much 🥹💕

First time in Hadis and very nice experience. I went with my little girl and everyone was very welcoming. She suddenly wanted to have some polish nail as well and they accommodated it without any problem. I had pedicure with shellac and dip powder on my hands. I didn’t even know it existed and so far very pleased with it ( should last 3-4 weeks!) . Mahsa has been superb and I do recommended her! I’ll go back there soon

Hadis is an incredibly talented beautician. She is meticulous and detail oriented. She listens carefully and has a good sense of what will suit your needs.

Would highly recommend coming to Hadis Beauty Bar.
Really great experience! Hadis did an amazing job with my nails (shellac), created a gorgeous pattern.

The loveliest women at Hadis! Got nail extensions and pedicure and had a wonderful experience and service. One of my nails chipped after a few days and I was welcomed back so kindly to get it sorted straight away. This is definitely my new go to salon. Thank you girls!
Charley is great my nails look beautiful I keep getting compliments on them
Love this little gem of a beauty salon.Charlie the owner friendly and very good at what she does
My sister had her make-up for her wedding done by Chatley

Great clinic! The technician was really lovely and went through everything with me. She made sure I was happy with my new shape before starting microblading. I was given a mirror so I could see what was going on throughout my treatment. Thank you microblading eyebrows for my new eyebrows, the colour is perfect and I've had so many compliments!! Strongly recommend.

Absolutely brilliant training course. Really amazing instructors. They were so knowledgable and really keen to support all the students in the group. I can't recommend this course enough. The amount of information, support before and after the course has been fab. The kit is brilliant. Thank you to the team for such and amazing few days.

Horrible job....not going back for the top up as have ZERO confidence in therapist...brown are uneven ..one is higher than the other...all in all lousy..lacklustre therapist...kept waiting an hour....hurt like HELL because she did not keep applying the numbing cream until I asked her too. She was in a hurry and after waiting for my appt fpr over 10 weeks and a cancelled one; this is what I end up with! These people are AMATEURS...know nothing about customer service and are SO DUMB that I had to contact them several times about the patch test. I am reporting to Beauty Standards too. Rubbish with a capital R.

The most professional nail tech I’ve ever been to. This is only two of some of the amazing work Diana has done on me. She is very friendly and takes her time to make a perfect job. Never have I left her place not 100% happy with her work.

One of the best nail techs in the area. She is extremely knowledgeable about nails and I've learnt so much about nails being her client. Diana is also incredibly skilled and talented with nail art. Diana has never injured me or been too rough with my nails and she has helped me to feel more comfortable and confident with my nails as I was an avid nail biter. My nails are restored, strong and healthy which is something I thought would never happen. I've never been unhappy with her work as she is so precise and listens to what you want to achieve.

Incredible nail tech in Brighton. Diana is an artist. Her skills and creativity blows my mind. Lovely space, fantastic value and the choices of designs, colours and shapes are impressive. I used to bite my nails terribly and with Diana’s help I stopped and now I have healthy nails that are strong and look great too. Diana’s knowledge and passion to help everyone is what makes her and her studio stand out from the rest. I wouldn’t go anywhere else.

I searched long and hard to find a nail technician that I could get along perfectly with; and finally, I have found it! I find Diana to be very skilled in what she does. My nails were in a terrible condition, bitten nails and a couple of them detached from the nail bed. Not only did she fix the problems but she made them look amazing and I've been getting compliments from everyone.
As usual perfect!

Absolutely incredible!
From the moment I spoke to Monica, she made me feel at ease. She listened to exactly what I wanted. My wedding hair and makeup lasted all day and night and I felt the most confident and ‘me’ I’ve ever felt. She also worked her magic on both my sisters’ hair as they were my maids of honour, making sure everyone looked and felt amazing. Ella did my mum’s and sisters’ makeup and everyone said how amazing they looked. I had so many compliments, so thank you so much for making me feel so special on my wedding day - I couldn’t have asked for a better person to have with me that morning. I can’t recommend Monica enough!

I can't recommend Monica enough for wedding hair and makeup. She did such a beautiful job of my look exactly as I was hoping for, made my bridesmaids look absolutely perfect -  and brought the most positive, enthusiastic and calm energy to the day. She also does a fantastic set of brows & lashes!
Monica puts a huge amount of pride, love and magic into her work.

I was lucky to have Monica do my hair and make up for my wedding, as well as four of my bridesmaids hair. Originally I had booked with her friend, but when the booking fell through Monica kindly agreed to take it on and I’m so glad she did! She was just fantastic, from the trial to the wedding day she absolutely nailed my vision. The look complimented my dress so well and I had never felt so glam! Not only is she talented, but also has such a great energy, she’s fun, relaxed, and all round a great laugh to have around on my wedding morning, and my bridal team would all agree they loved her too! Would 1000% recommend her to anyone 😍

Monica did my hair & makeup for my wedding recently as well as the hairdo for my 5 bridesmaids. I absolutely loved both my hair & makeup, and she managed to make my “vision” a reality perfectly, all the while juggling to get 6 ladies ready for the ceremony on time. Not only is she an extremely talented hair & makeup artist, she also helped me calm down as I was feeling quite nervous and overwhelmed by walking down the aisle, so she was an absolute pleasure to have around! My bridesmaids including my 7 year old niece also adored their hairdos. I have never felt more beautiful and confident as I did on my wedding day, and I can warmly recommend Monica’s services for any future brides as she’ll make you look and feel like a million dollars!

Monica was my chosen make up artist for my sister’s wedding and I was so happy with the outcome.  The make up lasted well throughout the whole day.  Even in the full sunshine I did not need to retouch my makeup at all.  I have used several make up artists before but Monica did an absolutely amazing job.  Thank you so much Monica.  I would highly recommend.

Visited Little Jasmine’s for the first time today for a couples massage with my husband as a treat for my birthday and had the most wonderful experience. Both therapists were so lovely and friendly and we both left saying that was the best head shoulder back massage we’ve had to date! Will most definitely be returning again. Highly recommend!

It was my first time going to spa massage and I am very impressed.
I chose thai oil deep tissue massage because my back felt very tired and stiff. After just one treatment I already feel so much better. The receptionist was very friendly and my therapist Peanee very skilled and made me feel most comfortable.
Amazing experience! Thank you!
Just had a full body 45 min massage here as I’d got it as a Christmas present. It was sooo nice! And the ladies in there, Stella and Enara, were so friendly and lovely. Highly recommend

I had the Rejuvenating Package of a facial and massage, which was recommended for menopause (though I imagine it is wonderful for anyone!).
It was absolutely fantastic, my first gentle foray into hot stones and only the second facial I’ve ever had, and the massage before it had me in a state of bliss after being unwell for some time.

Gloria was my therapist, and is just perfect, very warm and extremely experienced and professional. I felt in safe hands, literally…

Gabriella handled my first enquiry last week and then when I asked if I could bring it forward at short notice today, they fitted me in. She’s wonderful too, a credit to the company.
I’ll be booking again for sure and will get my friends gift vouchers, I know they’ll love it. I used to manage a back pain clinic so I have some experience in this field, and am so glad I’ve found somewhere I want to go back to now I’ve moved back to Brighton. 🙏🏼

Jang my masseuse was fantastic - obviously very experienced and perfect amount of pressure. I had the thai fusion massage which was a mix of traditional thai, hot oils and hot stones. Would definitely recommend!

RHEA is absolutely amazing! 🌟 She’s not only a wonderful hairdresser but also made the whole experience perfect from start to finish. I was served in the best way I could possibly imagine — so professional, friendly, and attentive. I’m definitely coming back, 100%! Highly recommend!
PS.  She did exactly what I wanted, even better!

Thrilled to bits to start my journey with Rhea as my new hairdresser!
I was lucky enough to get a cancellation before Christmas to have my colour done and Rhea listened to what I was hoping to achieve and delivered brilliantly.
Lovely salon, a friendly team and quality products… looking forward to my next appointment in February. Thank you

One of my friends recommended this salon to me 2 years ago and I’ve been going there since then.
Tegan has always been amazing. She listens to my needs and does exactly what I want. I love our little chats and my hair feels amazing after each appointment. Thanks Tegan :x

I’ve been getting my hair done by Tegan, and she’s absolutely fantastic! She really listens to what I want and takes the time to understand exactly what I need. Every appointment feels easy and enjoyable, and I always leave loving my hair. She puts real  attention to detail and genuine care. If you’re looking for someone who truly listens and delivers amazing results, I can’t recommend Tegan enough!

I saw Frankie. She was excellent in explaining  as to what I wanted and how I could easily manage my hair in a few different ways. I’ve lived in New York, New York for 12 years and came back. I’ve never met a hairstylist like Frankie. Clearly I’ll be back for her professionalism and excellent personality. Thank you very much Frankie.

I’ve been a client of Andrea since 2017. One might say that I’ve not tried anyone else in Brighton & Hove, however I don’t even wan to because I’m 100% sure that she’s the best beautician in the city.
It’s 2026 now: 9 years of customer experience is very telling! 😉

I cannot recommend her enough to people. If you want to have value, kindness, professionalism and integrity for money then ‘Permanent Beauty Boutique’ is the place to go: very clean, neat, organised and welcoming atmosphere. My permanent place to get myself back to shape.

I have problematic skin: oily-combination with rosacea. I take anti-aging treatments and eyebrow wax. Andrea nails all!

5 stars out of 5, not less.
Andrea and Anita are absolutely amazing! I have come here twice now and I absolutely love their work. Could not recommend it more!!

I have been a costumer of Andi many years and travel to her salon from far away. I won’t go anywhere else. I am extremely pleased with the treatment. She is also one of the best beauty therapists. She is very professionals and so lovely and friendly. Happy with my nails done by Anita. Highly recommended! Thank you!

I've been going to Andrea's beauty salon for a while now. She is an excellent therapist, kind and friendly. I highly recommend her to anyone looking for a highly skilled professional beauty therapist. I always feel very relaxed and pampered. The girls are always make sure they give the best service no matter if it's a facial treatment or manicure🤍

Andrea is very kind, friendly and professional. I trust her knowledge for knowing what my skin needs to treat with. She updates herself with new techniques all the times. She is very reliable, booking is easy, good communication. She is worthy, I do highly recommend her.
Best Brazilian blow dry in the city! soft, long lasting great quality, products used are coconut oil based. Also lovely women. Would highly recommend.

Very disappointing experience which ruined my morning. I advanced paid £20.95 each for 2 pedicures (£42) through Groupon, but when I arrived found my appointment slots had been cancelled out. She said she did not make any money on the Groupon appointments and had given our slots to regular customers who pay her more. She refused to find another appointment slot for me and said it was Groupon's fault and basically pushed us out the door. The rudest salon experience I have ever had by a long shot. It seems she uses Groupon to fill in empty slots and feels justified to cancel and not make restitution because she says 'most the profit goes to Groupon, and I give appointments to my regulars first" -- clearly she resented how little she gets paid. As the owner of the business, it did not make sense to me why she sabotaged our goodwill by refusing to honour our pre-paid appointments, blaming Groupon. Exercise caution using this salon, because if she cancels on you,  you as customer have to do all the administration (taking nearly two hours with Groupon so far and as yet unresolved), then having to  contact credit card company to get the charges removed. An utter disaster for us -- ruined our morning. I'm remain out £41.90 because of her dispute with Groupon -- we did nothing wrong but it is us that has to fight to get our money back. [update: in the end, if you PHONE Groupon, then you get good service - do not use email. The customer service rep promptly refunded me my money.]

I bought a Groupon for a pedicure for my mum and the only availability they had was Tuesday daytime. She called up as soon as she got the voucher and after multiple attempts of trying to get through by phone call, they just said they’d only be able to fit her in on a Tuesday daytime. She works all day on Tuesdays, but does have Thursday to Sunday’s off. She asked whether any of those days were free at any time and they said no.

Today (Thursday afternoon), we decided to go into the salon to see if she could book. One staff member  was sat down in the empty salon of Natural Beauty, Church Road, Hove. When my mum tried the door, she found the door was locked and the lady l seemed reluctant to open it. When the lady finally opened the door, she stood at the door, blocking the entrance and didn’t invite my mum in. My mum explained that she’d like to book this pedicure in which the woman replied it was only Tuesday daytime she could book for this deal. The salon was empty so my mum asked whether she could have it now, in which the woman replied no? By this point, my mum said she wasn’t happy and that she was going to contact Groupon, to which the woman replied ‘okay’. The woman who worked there basically did not care at all. I’m not sure why she was sat in the salon, with the door locked and no customers and yet the opening times stated they were currently open. It’s the worst way to run a business and an absolute embarrassment that Groupon would be associated with such a joke of business.

Just to also add no where on the Groupon offer did it state that there was only availability for booking this on a Tuesday otherwise I would have not booked it for my mum as I know she works.

I would avoid at all costs. They don’t care and to only think that they’re like this before your treatment, goodness knows what they’d be like during your treatment.

Came here on a Groupon. Not worth the money I paid. Salon messy and not very clean. Would not recommend. She didn't do the pedicure as I asked either so a fail all round. Seeking a refund from Groupon.

Really liked the Tanino hair therapy.  I got the straightening hair treatment that contained no formol! I love that because when I used to get a keratin treatment there was formol in the products, it damaged my hair and the fumes would burn my eyes whilst getting it done. The  products luzinete has is does quite the opposite, highly recommend.
